40001001	Yeesu Krista yandaba hida nnanaɦ'. Bà da meedra Yeesu Kristwu hurberm Daviida buudmn, bá da meed wiiwu Ĥabrahaama buudmn.
40001002	Ĥabrahaama da meedra Yisɦaaka, Yisɦaaka t maadm Yakooba, Yakooba t maadm Yuudawu n ɦà teelba,
40001003	Yuuda t maadm Fɛɛrɛswu n Jɛɛraa, bà da hoɦl bá nya na Taamra. Fɛɛrɛsa t maadm Hɛsroona, Hɛsroona t maadm Raama,
40001004	Raama t maadm Ĥaminadaaba, Ĥaminadaaba t maadm Naasoona, Naasoona t maadm Salmoona,
40001005	Salmoona t maadm Boɦaasa, bà da hoɦl ɦá nya na Raɦaaba. Boɦaasa t maadm Ĥoobeeda, bà da hoɦl ɦá nya na Ruuta. Ĥoobeeda t maadm Yisaaya,
40001006	Yisaaya t maadm hurberm Daviida. Daviida t maadm Salomoona, ɦá nya da ba na Ĥuuriyaa fɔgn.
40001007	Salomoona t maadm Roobɦaama, Roobɦaama t maadm Ĥabiyaawa, Ĥabiyaawa t maadm Ĥasaa,
40001008	Ĥasaa t maadm Yoosafaata, Yoosafaata t maadm Yooraama, Yooraama t maadm Ĥosiyaasa,
40001009	Ĥosiyaasa t maadm Yootaama, Yootaama t maadm Ĥahaasa, Ĥahaasa t maadm Hiskiyaasa,
40001010	Hiskiyaasa t maadm Manasea, Manasea t maadm Ĥamoona, Ĥamoona t maadm Yosiyaasa,
40001011	Yosiyaasa t maadm Yekɔn̈yaawu n ɦà teelba. L´ vuuguu nnii ban da mɔgr Yisraɦeel tiiba n san n lo-ba Babiloon tantn.
40001012	Ban da mɔgr Yisraɦeel tiiba n san n lo-ba Babiloon tantn n l` kaannaa, Yekɔn̈yaa t maadm Saaltiɦeela, Saaltiɦeela t maadm Sorobabɛɛla,
40001013	Sorobabɛɛla t maadm Ĥabiyuuda, Ĥabiyuuda t maadm Ĥɛlyakiima, Ĥɛlyakiima t maadm Ĥasoora,
40001014	Ĥasoora t maadm Sadooka, Sadooka t maadm Ĥayiɦaama, Ĥayiɦaama t maadm Ĥɛliyuuda,
40001015	Ĥɛliyuuda t maadm Ĥɛlɦasaara, Ĥɛlɦasaara t maadm Mataana, Mataana t maadm Yakooba,
40001016	Yakooba t maadm Yoosɛfa, Maaria sida. Maariiwii da meedra Yeesua, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.
40001017	Tii lee, bà kala wahii mɛnhii. L´ lɔg Ĥabrahaama kakeɦnan Daviida, samba t ka ba kwiɦr n banaaba, bá n bà kwɛɛlba. L´ ta lɔg Daviida kakeɦnan ban da mɔgr Yisraɦeel tiiba n san n Babiloon tantn, samba t ka ta ba kwiɦr n banaaba, bá n bà kwɛɛlba. L´ ta lɔg vuugu Yisraɦeel tiiba nn san Babiloon tantn kuu kakeɦnan Krista maadb, samba t ka ta ba kwiɦr n banaaba, bá n bà kwɛɛlba.
40001018	Ln da ɦer nnanaɦ' bà maad Yeesu Krista. Maarii nnii Yeesu Krista nya. Bà da bagra-wu Yoosɛfa, ɦá ɦɛm fuuga n Voɦoom Buudm gemmntn, wú n ɦà sid bà ban lɔg taa.
40001019	Ĥá sid Yoosɛfa da ba nidhɔma. Ĥá ka ba sɔkl na ɦà rɛɛ-wu nidba nɔngan ka diila na ɦà kir-wu sabaɦ'.
40001020	Ĥan da diila welee lee, Saberma tumtɦii t san ɦá man jaamiitn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Yoosɛf, Daviida yakiiga, lɔg Maarii na v` fɔga, daa siil fobɛɦgu! Fuuga ɦan ba n kee, ɦà ɦera-ka n Voɦoom Buudm gemmntn.
40001021	Ĥà kee ɦà meed budaaga, v` baɦdg-ka na Yeesua, l´ kɔtɔd na ‟Saŋgband daɦl nidba juuni”, blaɦb kaa na kà nan daɦl ká tigr jugu kà ree-d d` fubɛɦii ni.»
40001022	L´ mɛnguu ɦera welee na gwɛɛt Saberma nn da bed ka tagaa n ɦà gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta noor tii ɦe t´ jugun.
40001023	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: Biiriiga nan ɦɛna fuuga kà meed budaaga, bà baɦdg-ka na Ĥemanuɦeela, hidrii kɔtɔd n bà lamn nnii na Saŋgband ba t` man.
40001024	Yoosɛfa nn himtg lee, n ɦɛm wo Saberma tumta nn da bed-wu jaamiitn lee. Ĥá lɔgm Maarii na ɦá fɔga,
40001025	gwɛntaɦ' n ka ba nyaan ɦá ɦɛn kakeɦnan Maaria nn dan n maadm ɦá budaaga. Lee, Yoosɛfa t baɦd-ka na Yeesua.
40002001	Bà da meedra Yeesuwu Betlɛɛhɛm kɔrgun, Yuudee tantn. Lee wen, Ĥerooda mad huraant. Ban meedr Yeesu lee, taadba biiba bá kwɛɦɛɛ ŋmɛdii jugun bee t rɛn n toŋu kwɛɛn tigan n daan Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
40002002	Ban taan lee, n gbaam na: «Buga ban meedr l´ ka ba na ká di Yuudaa tiiba hurbermt kee, ¿kà ba tee? T` da ba toŋu kwɛɛn, n yum ká ŋmɛdga, tii nnii tn daan na t` seeŋ ka jeeŋla-ka.»
40002003	Huraa Ĥerooda nn ɦomr welee lee, ɦá rarm t hamt ɦá ni, l´ lag n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun nidba mɛmba mɛɦ'.
40002004	Ĥá kpogl gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba mɛmba, n gbaam-ba na ¿tee nnii ln da ba na bá meed Saŋgband nn bantg wii?
40002005	Bá leed-wu na: «L` da ba na bá meed-wu Betlɛɛhɛm, Yuudee tantn, blaɦb kaa, Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta da ɦɔda na:
40002006	Ven, Betlɛɛhɛm, Yuudee kɔrhiiga ven, Yuudee tant nii, lag ven nnii kɔrtutugmbuga, huraaɦii nan ror v` ni, ɦà kpaɦaam mà tigr Yisraɦeel.
40002007	Lee wen, Ĥerooda t hoɦ taadbee gɔɦlgan na bá kɛɛml-wu vuugu ŋmɛdgee nn da red kuun.
40002008	L´ tog ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ked-n Betlɛɛhɛm n` bag bugee n` miig kà kan ba ree hɔm! Ka n´ nyaan-kaa, n` ɦe na mà ta miig, mà san mà seeŋ ka jeeŋla-ka.»
40002009	Huraa nn bed-ba welee lee, bá lɔɔm huru, n ta yum ŋmɛdga ban da ba toŋu kwɛɛn n yum kee ked bà nɔngan. Ká san n taam kaalaŋa bugee kan da ba ree, n hiw haarii jugun n jeɦnt.
40002010	Bá yum welee, l´ ɦɛm-ba lamɛɛgu biii.
40002011	Bá jib haariin, n yum bugee n kà nya Maaria, n gbaɦnt dind ká nɔngan, n seeŋ ka jeeŋla-ka. L´ tog, bá rawdr bá kadakii n saɦm-ka want: sika n nyabiir nyanyaam n tlaar kpaam.
40002012	Tii n t` kaan, Saŋgband t bɔɦɔɔ-ba jaamiitn na bá daa ŋmɛtgii Ĥerooda man bii. Bá lɔgm hurjeenu n kulii bá kɔrgu.
40002013	Taadbee nn kul lee, Saberma tumtɦii t daan Yoosɛfa man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu jaamiitn na: «Vidg! Lɔg bugee n kà nya v` siil v` san Ĥejift tantn, v` bɛm kan kakeɦnan mà daa bɔɦɔɔ-v na v` ŋmɛtgn, blaɦb kaa Ĥerooda bagl bugee na ɦà kuu-ka!»
40002014	Yoosɛfa t vid yelmaa, n lɔgm bugee n kà nya, n lɔɔm huru n nyingu n san Ĥejift tantn.
40002015	Ĥá san n ka ba kan kakeɦnan goor Ĥerooda nn dan n kuum dii. Welee ɦera na gwɛɛt Saberma nn da bed ka tagaa n ɦà gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta noor tii ɦe t´ jugun. Tii nnii na: Mà hoɦ mà budaaga na ká rɛn Ĥejift tantn.
40002016	Ĥerooda nn da miig na taadbee hogl-wu lee, ɦá lo kwɛɛwweerga biii. Lee wen, ɦá ɦiluu vuugu taadbee nn da kɛɛml na ŋmɛdga da reda kuun, n tom na bá ku Betlɛɛhɛm kɔrgu n kɔrni ɦí ba kú kpama ɦii kunidbudai mɛnii kakeɦnan hí soɦdg bina ɦarɛɦa hii.
40002017	Reekan lee, gwɛɛt Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yeremia nn da bed tii, t´ ɦɛm t´ noor ɦɛn. Tii nnii na:
40002018	Bà ɦomra ŋmɛɛga kiiga mɔɔ Ramaa kɔrgun, nidba kuum ka nagdra bayen. L` ba na Raheela kuuma ɦà bii. Ĥà kpaa bag na bá kwiiŋl ɦà kwɛɛwr, blaɦb kaa ɦá bii kpiidrn.
40002019	Ĥerooda nn da kpiir lee, Saberma tumtɦii t bɔɦɔɔ Yoosɛfwu jaamiitn Ĥejift tantn na:
40002020	«Vidg! Lɔg bugee n kà nya, v` ŋmɛtgii n ban Yisraɦeel tantn. Bá da bag bugee na bà kuu-ka bee, bà kpiidrn.»
40002021	Lee, Yoosɛfa t vid n lɔgm bugee n kà nya n ŋmɛtgii Yisraɦeel tantn.
40002022	Ĥan taai lee, n ɦom na Ĥarkeelawɔsa diira Yuudee huraant n kad ɦá sa Ĥerooda jargan. Lee wen, fobɛɦgu t mug-wu. Ĥá diil ɦá ni na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà kad tantiin. L´ werii-wu jaamiitn ln ba na ɦá ɦe lee. Tii lee, ɦá vid n san Galilee tantn,
40002023	n kad kɔrgu kuugun bà hoɦ-ku na Nasarɛɛt. Welee ɦera na gwɛɛt Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed tii ɦe t´ jugun. Tii nnii na: Bà nan ba bà hoɦm-wu na Nasarɛɛt tia.
40003001	Lee n l` kaann, nidɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa t ree ɦayen kpamloŋun, Yuudee tantn, n baɦ n ka faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
40003002	«Lagii-n neerm, na saŋgbambiimn huraant nyɔɦra n nn!»
40003003	Yohanɛɛs nnii nid gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya nn da bed gwɛɛt t` hɛl wii. Ĥà da beda na: nidɦii toola kpamloŋun na: Maantr-n Sabermwu huru, koo-n-wu huri ɦì bɛm tiɦ'!
40003004	Yohanɛɛsa da hɛgra dimr bá rog-d n kaanfoɦt deera kowt, ka boow gband damr ɦá sargan. Ĥà da jul tawri, n kpam loolan hekpaam.
40003005	Yerusalɛm kɔrgu, n Yuudee tant mɛnt, n tant t` ba Yɔrdaan kol kpama tii mɛntii nidba da kena ɦà man.
40003006	Bà da rea bà fubɛɦii ka bɔɦɔɔ nidba nɔngan, lee ɦà huur-ba Yɔrdaan koln.
40003007	Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba kɔd t ta daan Yohanɛɛsa man na ɦá hor-ba nyaalm. Ĥan nyan-ba lee, n ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Waabɛɦt nen! ¿Wen werii-n na n` ba n` bee n` fetg Saŋgband yaagu kù kena kuu nuɦu nii?
40003008	Ĥɛm-n nan ŋmɛɛhɔmt l` weraa na n` lagii neerm!
40003009	Daa diilgm-n na n` ba n` bee n` bɔɦɔɔm n jaɦ n` kwɛɛwan na n` yandaa nnii Ĥabrahaama! Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na Saŋgband ba d` bee d` lɔg tanɦanɦena, d` ɦe ɦà kitg Ĥabrahaama yakii.
40003010	Bá jaɦ lad na bà kɛɦ tiit rugi, bà luur-t. Tiib b´ kpaa roon roonhɔma bii, baa bà luug-b bà lɔɔlg boglamn.
40003011	«Man lee, maa huura-n n nyaalm na l´ werii na n` lagaa neerm. Ĥii ɦà kena mà kaa wii ba n gemmnt ka yata-ma. Mà kpaa tɔn na mà fitg ɦà nanawda. Wii kee ɦà hor-n n Voɦoom Buudm, n ta bogm.
40003012	Ĥà lɔgra ɦà naabint degrga, ɦà ba ɦà fug na ɦà ree lɛlgu, l` saa figm ɦà vaadg-m ɦà lo ɦà buugun, ɦà kolm lɛlgu ɦà fut boglam m´ kpaa ku felaɦ miin.»
40003013	Lee wen, Yeesua t vid Galilee tantn n san Yohanɛɛsa man Yɔrdaan koln, na ɦá hor-wu Saŋgband nyaalm.
40003014	Yohanɛɛsa t ka kir ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ln bɛm na vii hor-ma, ¿l´ ɦɛm lan na vii daan mà jugunii?»
40003015	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Gwɛɦŋa lee, tii l` ɦe wo ln gbaam lee! Biilm, l` ba na t` tag welee, ka bo na t` ɦe bii Saŋgband nn gbaama bii mɛmbii.» Lee wen, Yohanɛɛsa t tii n huurm-wu.
40003016	Huurb n b` kaann yelmaa, Yeesua t rorm nyaalmn. Lee, saŋgbambiim fiid noor t rawd ɦá jugun, ɦá yum Saŋgband Voɦoom hoɦntna ɦà jugun kurŋmɛnd dela.
40003017	Noor diir t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wunwii nnii mà Budaaga, mà sɔkla-ka kpaalaa. Mà nyaag̈bii mɛmbii kulaa kà jugun.»
40004001	Tii n t` kaann, Saŋgband Voɦoom t kpaɦaa Yeesu n san-wu n kpamloŋun na Kunida ŋmɛgii n wun.
40004002	Ĥá san n ɦɛm kan goora kwɛɦnaa, muunu n nyingu, ka boow noor. Lee, kɔm t kuum-wu.
40004003	Lee wen, Kunida t nyuɦ ɦá man n ŋmɛgii n wun ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l` ba na ven nnii Saŋgband Budaagaa, si wad tanɦanɦena kitg diit!»
40004004	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Lag diit n jaɦ nnii nida nn ju ka neer. Ĥà ta neera n gwɛɛt t` ror Saŋgband noon tii mɛntii.»
40004005	Lee wen, Kunida t san-wu n Yerusalɛm, kɔrbuudgun, n dewl-wu Saŋgband haar jutaŋtaŋan,
40004006	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l` ba na ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga, forg v` tiɦdg, blaɦb kaa, l` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Saŋgband nan ba d` si d´ tumtba wad na bà tɔgr-v n bà niɦi na tand daa gbuɦdg v` nakpaŋa.»
40004007	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` ta ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Daa ŋmɛgii n v` Saberm Saŋgband!»
40004008	Kunida t ta san-wu n duvɔgr diir jutaŋtaŋan, n werii-wu tant jugun tigɦee mɛnɦee, n ɦà kwɛgdm,
40004009	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka v´ gbaɦnt dind mà nɔngan, n doot-ma tiŋanii, mà to-v l` mɛnguu.»
40004010	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nyab kan, Saatan! L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Door v` Saberm Saŋgband tiŋan, ka ɦɛna ɦá sɔklb, wii n jaɦ'.»
40004011	Reekan, Kunida t saa-wu. Saŋgbantumtba t daan ɦá man, n ka tɔra-wu.
40004012	Tii kaann, Yeesua t ɦom na bà mug Yohanɛɛs n riw sarga, lee, ɦá vid n san Galilee tantn.
40004013	Ĥan san lee, n ka ba kad Nasarɛɛt kɔrgun, ɦá san n ka ba Kafarnahuum. Kɔrguu ba Galilee nyaam maaru, Jibuloon n Naftalii tantn.
40004014	L` da ɦera welee na gwɛɛt Saŋgband nn da bed ka tagaa n d` gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaywu tii ɦe t´ noor ɦɛn.
40004015	Tii nnii na: Nen, nen go Jibuloon n Naftalii tantn, n nyaam weenn tantn, n Yɔrdaan kol bal tantn, n nan Galilee saanba kɔrgun nen, kewlg-n!
40004016	Nidba bá ked nyingun bee, toŋu ragdg bà ɦɛn, bá da ba kuumn n nyeet kɔrgun bee, wiinga daan bà ɦɛn.
40004017	Yeesua nn san Galilee tantiin lee, n baɦ yelmaa n ka faa gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Lagii-n neerm na saŋgbambiimn huraant nyɔɦra n nn!»
40004018	Yeesua nn da ked ka kagraa Galilee nyaam gbiir lee, n yum ɦɔlii moogdba bareɦba: Simoon, ban daarŋa na Fetrwii n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Ĥandrea. Bà da lɔɔla bɛdb nyaamn ka moog ɦɔlii.
40004019	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tagd-n mà kaa, l` saa n` faam Gohɔmt, nidba tia t´ ɦɛn, wo gwɛɦma nn lɔɔla n` bɛdni ka moog ɦɔlii lee.»
40004020	Yelmaa, bá saa kan bá bɛdni n tag ɦá kaa.
40004021	Ĥá mɔɔ kɛna, n yum teelvolba bareɦba, Yakoobwu n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Yohanɛɛsa. Bareɦdrbee da ba na Jebdea kwɛɛlban. Bá n bà sa bà da ba kpiirgun ka maantra bà bɛdni. Ĥá hoɦ-ba.
40004022	Bá vid yelmaa n saa bá sawu n kpiirguu n tag ɦá kaa.
40004023	Yeesua da gilma n Galilee tant mɛnt, ka weraa gwɛɛt Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn, ka faa saŋgbambiimn huraant Gohɔmt, ka gbaadaa nidba bɛɦii mɛnii n bà ɦajamnt mɛnt.
40004024	Nidba t ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt Siirii tant mɛntn, bá daan-wu n bá ju kunyɔŋu n bɛɦii jugu jugu bee wo biiba kunidba nn da kad bá ɦɛn bee n kpikpitiiba n balmdindmba, ɦá gbaadaa-ba.
40004025	Nidfigm da tagda ɦà kaa ka rɛn Galilee tantn n Kɔrni Kwiɦr tantn n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n Yuudee tantn n tant t´ ba Yɔrdaan kol bal tiin.
40005001	Yeesua nn da nyan nidfigmii lee, n kot duuga kiiga ɦɛn n kad. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man.
40005002	Ĥá baɦ n ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
40005003	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá welaa n Saŋgband ka hoɦla bayen n tiŋa bee! Bee heɦl n saŋgbambiimn huraant.
40005004	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá kuum bee! Saŋgband nan kwiiŋla bà kwɛɛwa.
40005005	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá ba n kwɛɛwhɔma bee! Bee nan heɦl tant.
40005006	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá bag n bà kwɛɛwr mɛnd na gobiint ɦe wo Saŋgband nn sɔkla lee! Bee nan yul-t.
40005007	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá yu volba ɦigm bee! Saŋgband nan ta yul bá ɦigm.
40005008	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii biiba bá kwɛɛwa ba kelkel bee! Bee nan yul Saŋgband nɔnga.
40005009	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii biiba bá kena n nigiigu bee! Bà nan hoɦaa-ba na Saŋgband bii.
40005010	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii biiba ban lɔɔ kunyɔŋu gobiint kaa bee! Bee heɦl n saŋgbambiimn huraant.
40005011	«Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii nen, ban su, ka lɔɔ kunyɔŋu, ka bɔɦɔɔ n` ɦɛn gokaat mà kaa nen.
40005012	Nyaagm-n ka ba lamɛɛgun, fadbermt hɔda-n saŋgbambiimn! Biilm, ta welee nnii ban da lo kunyɔŋu gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba bá da bee n` nɔngan bee.»
40005013	«Nen nnii tant ɦɛn yaarm. Ka yaarm lamɛɛgu t riir, ¿baa bà ɦe lan bà ŋmɛlg-m-ku? M` ta kpaɦ na bá ɦee-m n bii. B´ tɛl nnii na bá vaa-m duun, nidba nawdrm-m.
40005014	«Nen nnii tant ɦɛn wiinga. Kɔrgu ban mɛɦr duuga jutaŋtaŋan kuu kpaɦ kù bee kù bɛm foɦmgan.
40005015	Bà kpaa tɔla kand, n lig-d tɔka kwɛɛn. Bà tɔla-d n lil n baɦga, d´ ka wiir bá ba haarn bee mɛmbee.
40005016	Welee nnii ln ba na n` wiinga ta wiir nidba nɔngan, na bá yum hɔmgu nn ɦɛna kuu, lee bà nyɔkm n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii.»
40005017	«Daa diilgm-n na mà daan na mà kpii Saŋgband baɦlb n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da werii tii! Mà ba daan na mà kpii-t. Mà daan na mà ɦe t´ jugun.
40005018	Tii lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, saɦ na saŋgbambiim n tant nan bɔraa, baɦlbii kpaɦ b` bɔrii waarbuga laa taka kayenga mɔmga l´ mɛnguu ban soɦ kpaalaa.
40005019	Tii nnii ln ba na, ɦii ɦá kpaa vala baɦlbii huuga biib, b` la ba tutugŋaa, n ka weraa nidba na bá ta ɦɛm welee wii, bà nan hoɦaa-wu saŋgbambiimn huraantn na buga. L´ saa ɦii ɦá vala baɦlbii hɔm, ka weraa volba na bá ta ɦɛm welee wii, bà nan hoɦaa-wu saŋgbambiimn huraantn na berma.
40005020	Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na ka n` kpaa vala bii Saŋgband nn gbaama bii hɔm l` yata baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba, n` nan kpaɦ n` bee n` jib saŋgbambiimn huraantn.
40005021	«N` ɦomra na bà da beda t` yandaba na: ‟ Daa ku nida! Na nid ɦá kur ɦà nidtuur wii, bà nan yaa-wu n yaagu.”
40005022	Man lee, maa rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, nid ɦá lo kwɛɛwweerga n ɦà teel wii, bà nan hoɦaa-wu yaagu, yaani yaadba nɔngan. L` saa ɦii ɦá suudg ɦá teel na: ‟Joojooŋu”, bà nan hoɦaa-wu yaagu, yaani yaadbermba nɔngan. Ĥii ɦá bed ɦà teel na: ‟Tilantiigu”, l` mag n wun na bá lo-wu taabuugu boglamn.
40005023	Ka v´ daan na v` vid v` vit Saŋgband, n taam vit daɦŋa man, n deed na v` teela ba n gwɛɛt tiit n v` ɦɛn,
40005024	l` ba na v` saa v` vit wantii vit daɦŋee man, v` san v` teelwii man, n` ku taa n gwɛɛt, nigiigu ɦe n` huuga saɦ lee, v` ŋmɛtgn v` vid v` vit Saŋgband.
40005025	Ka ɦii t sam-v huraa, n´ lɔɔm huru taa kaa, n ka ked yaagu yaalaŋa, l` ba na v` ɦe na, v´ n wun n` ɦom n taa saɦ ka nyi ba hurun ka ban taai, ka sol na ɦá daa da ɦà taag-v yaagu yaada nuɦun, wii taag-v tawdba nuɦun, l` saa bee riw-v sarga.
40005026	Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na, nan kpaa ror sargeen, kakeɦnan v` daa nan faad v` fɔmr mɛnd.
40005027	«N` ɦomra na bà da beda na: ‟ Daa yaruum!”
40005028	Man lee, maa rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na daaw ɦá yu vola fɔga n ka geewa-wu wo bii to-wu wii, ɦà fɛtg-wu n yaruub ɦɛb ɦá kwɛɛwrn.
40005029	Ka v` najuudu nɔmb fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` lugdg-b, v` kɔɦdg vɔkun. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` bɔrii v` gbanu gidgu, n vn ba v` bɛm n v` gbanu mɛnu, bà lɔɔlg-v taabuugu boglamn.
40005030	Ka v` najuudu nuɦu fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` gitg-ɦu, v` kɔɦdg vɔkun. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` bɔrii v` gbanu huliiga kiiga, n vn ba v` bɛm n v` gbanu mɛnu, bà lɔɔlg-v taabuugu boglamn.
40005031	«Bà da ta beda na: ‟ Ka ɦii t vo ɦá fɔga, l` ba na ɦá ɦɔr yaala sadgm wadga, ɦà to fɔg̈wii.”
40005032	Man lee, maa rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na ka daawɦii t vo ɦá fɔga, fɔg̈wii ba ɦe yaruub, ɦá yɔlm sidjeena, daawwii ɦera na ɦá ɦe yaruub. L´ saa, daaw ɦá lɔg fɔg ban voor wii, wii ta kitg yaruutgu.
40005033	«N` ta ɦomra na, bà da beda t` yandaba na: ‟ Ka v´ feer n Saŋgband, daa kɔɦdg v` foorbii! L` ba na v` ɦe b´ jugun wo vn da fɛd Saberma nɔngan lee.”
40005034	Man lee, maa bɔɦɔɔ-n na daa foorm-n felaɦ'! Daa foorm-n n saŋgbambiim! Mii nnii Saŋgband huraant jarga.
40005035	Daa foorm-n n tant! Tii nnii d´ jad dn dea d´ nakpai d` ɦɛn dii. Daa foorm-n n Yerusalɛm kɔrgu! Kuu nnii Hurberma kɔrgu.
40005036	Daa ta foorm-n n n` jugu, l´ kɔtɔd na n` kpaɦ n` bee n` ɦe na n` jiiga kiiga feentg laa ká haaw!
40005037	Bɔɦɔɔm-n kuyengu na ‟Ĥiin” laa ‟Ĥaai”! Bii ban hewla bii, b` rɛna Kunida man.
40005038	«N` ɦomra na bà da beda na: ‟ Ka ɦii t kpedg v` nɔmb, ba v` ta bee v` kpedg ɦà reb. Ka ɦii t kaɦdg v` nyind, ba v` ta bee v` ta kaɦdg ɦà red.”
40005039	Man lee, maa bɔɦɔɔ-n na n` daa ŋmɛlgm bɛɦgu ɦii ɦá ɦɛna-n bɛɦgu wii. Ka ɦii t gbudg-v kataŋŋa v` najuudu nyakpiigu, v` saa ɦà fɛlg-v galu reku.
40005040	Ka ɦii bag na ɦà yaa-v n yaagu, na ɦà soɦdg v` kwɛɛn tuku, lag n faagrgu mɛɦ' v` saa n wun.
40005041	Ka ɦii t mug-v n kwɛgdi, na v` tu wanjeet v` san tanbilmrii, v` tu-t, v` san tana ɦarɛɦ'.
40005042	Si ɦii ɦá jama-v bii wii! Daa kirm na v` kɛɛm ɦii ɦá bag na ɦà kɛɛm bii v` man wii!
40005043	«N` ɦomra na bà da beda na: ‟ L` ba na v` sɔklm ɦá sɔkla-v wii, ka kpaa sɔkla v` rafeeda.”
40005044	Man lee, maa bɔɦɔɔ-n na sɔklm-n n` rafeedba, l` saa n` seeŋ̈m bá lɔɔ-n kunyɔŋu bee ɦɛn,
40005045	ka bo na n` bɛm n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii bii gobiint! Biilm, ɦà saa muunu ror bɛɦba ɦɛn wo ɦun ta ror hɔmba ɦɛn lee. Ĥà ta ɦɛna toŋu t niim hɔmba ɦɛn, n biiba bà kpaɦ hɔm bee ɦɛn, ɦà kpaa rooda ɦii.
40005046	Ka n` sɔkla biiba bá sɔkla-n bee n jaɦ', ¿n` ta hɔd fat tiitn? ¿Nidbɛɦba mɛɦ ta kpaa ɦɛna yenmii?
40005047	Ka n` seeŋa n` teelba n jaɦ', ¿n` diila na n` ɦɛna bii l` yata l´ mɛnguu laa? ¿Nidbɛɦba mɛɦ ta kpaa ɦɛna welee?
40005048	Bɛm-n hɔmba kpaalaa, wo n` Sa ɦá bee saŋgbambiimn wii nn ta ba hɔm kpaalaa lee.
40006001	«Mad-n n̈yen na n` daa ɦɛm Saŋgband ŋmɛɛgt nidba nɔngan, ka bag na bá nyaan-n! Ka n` ɦɛna-t welee diila nii, n` nan kpaa soɦda fat tiit n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii nuɦun.
40006002	«Ka v´ ɦe kunyɔŋtiiwu hɔmgu, daa faam n kɔrgu, wo rarbɛɦm tiiba nn ɦɛna kpoglb disagtn n hurfɛgan lee! Bà ɦɛna welee ka bag na nidba nyɔkm-ba. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bà fɛtg bà fat soɦdgm.
40006003	Ka v` ɦɛna kunyɔŋtiiwu hɔmgu kuuguu, v` galu daa miig v` najuudu nn ɦɛna bii,
40006004	ka bo na ɦii daa miig na v` ɦɛna hɔmgu, l` saa v` Sa ɦà yu bii v` reb ɦɛna foɦmgan bii wii, nan faad-v.
40006005	«Ka n` seeŋaa, daa ɦɛm-n wo rarbɛɦm tiiba nn ɦɛna lee! Bà sɔkla na bà jeɦr faaga kpoglb disagtn, n hurfɛgan ka seeŋa, na nidba mɛmba yum-ba. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bà fɛtg bà fat soɦdgm.
40006006	Ven lee, ka v` bo na v` seeŋaa, v` jib dugun, v` gar v` ɦɛn v` seeŋ̈m v` Sa. Ĥà ta ba kan gɔɦlgan ka yu bii vn ɦɛna bii. Ĥà nan faada-v.
40006007	Ka n` seeŋaa, daa bɔɦɔɔm-n gwɛɛt kɔd l` vɔka, wo bá kpaa seeŋa Saŋgband bee nn ɦɛna lee! Bà diila na, ka bà seeŋa l` vɔkaa, Saŋgband soɦdg bà seeŋb.
40006008	Daa tɔgiim-n n ban! Biilm, saɦ na n` gbaam Saŋgband bii, dii mi weem n` reb bag bii.
40006009	Nen lee, seeŋ̈m-n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟T` Sa, vn beel saŋgbambiimn, v` hidr bɛm buudr,
40006010	v` huraant daan, v` sɔklb bɛm tant ɦɛn, wo bn ba saŋgbambiimn lee.
40006011	Si-t jana t` goor diit!
40006012	Waa-t t` bɛɦgu tn ɦer kuu, wo tn waa bá ɦɛna-t bɛɦgu bee lee!
40006013	Daa saa na t` lɔɔ hoglgan, lee, ree-t bɛɦgun! [Blaɦb kaa, ven heɦl n huraant, n gemmnt, n jaɦrb kakeɦnaan. L´ bɛm welee!]”
40006014	Biilm, ka n` waa volba bɛɦgu ban ɦer-n kuu, n` Sa ɦà ba saŋgbambiimn wii nan ta waa-n.
40006015	Lee, ka n` kpaa waa volba bà bɛɦgu ban ɦer-n kuu, n` Sa nan ta kpaa waa-n n` reku.
40006016	«Ka n´ boow noor, daa toɦd-n n` noora wo rarbɛɦm tiiba nn ɦɛna lee! Bà toɦda-ɦa na baawena nyaan na bà boowra noor. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bà fɛtg bà fat soɦdgm.
40006017	Ven lee, ka v´ boow noor, hig v` nɔnga, v` sagdr v` jii,
40006018	ka bo na nidba daa miig na boowra noor! V` Sa ban kpaa yu wiiyen ba ɦà miig na boowra noor. Ĥà yul bii vn ɦɛna foɦmgan bii. Lee, ɦà nan faada-v.»
40006019	«Daa kolm-n kwɛgdm ka doog tant ɦɛn! Dindiit n jankpalaɦm bee ka ju welee kwɛgdmii m` booda. Bawdba ta bee ka kaɦ huturi ka baaw.
40006020	Kolm-n kwɛgdm ka doog saŋgbambiimn! Reekan, dindiit n jankpalaɦm kpaɦ na l` jum-m m` booda. Bawdba ta kpaɦ kan na bà kaɦm huturi ka baaw.
40006021	Nida kwɛgdm kan ba ree, ɦá kwɛɛwr ta ba kan.
40006022	«Niini boo gbanu kand. Ka v` niini ba hɔmii, v` gbanɦuu mɛnɦuu t ka ba wiingan.
40006023	Ka v` niini t koɦlaa, v` gbanɦuu mɛnɦuu t ka ba nyeetn. Ka wiinga ká ba v` ni kee ba nyeetii, ¿nyeetii bɛm kpimm lan n jaɦ?
40006024	«Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà bɛm bermba bareɦba yuuma. Ĥà ba ɦà kirm vola ka sɔkla vola, laa, ɦà nawr n vola ka kir vola. N` kpaɦ n` bee n` tagd Saŋgband kaa ka ta tagd lig̈biir kaa.
40006025	«Tii kaa nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na daa kuum-n n̈yen n diila na n` kee n` nyaan tee diit na n` di n daam na n` nyi n` neera, laa dimt na n` yoɦra! Neerm ba daɦt l` yata diit, gbanu ta ba daɦt l` yata dimt, ¿lag welee?
40006026	Geem-n ŋmɛnii hí sol n faaga hii! Hì kpaa buud, hì kpaa lɔg dikaɦb, hì kpaa doog buunin, gwɛntaɦ lee, n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii doowa-hi. ¿N` kpaa ba daɦt kɔd l` yata ŋmɛnii?
40006027	¿N` ni wen ba ɦà ku ɦayen n diila, ɦà bee ɦà hewl goor dyend mɔmr ɦà neerm ɦɛn na m´ vɔka?
40006028	¿L` ɦer lan nn kuu n̈yenwu n diila dimt kaa? Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan kpam moot fiit nn rɛna n tn berŋa lea! T` kpaa ɦɛna bii, t` kpaa ruug dima.
40006029	Gwɛntaɦ', mà bɔɦɔɔ-n, na Salomoona nn da la ba n kwɛgdm kɔd lee, ɦà da kpaɦ n dimhɔma n taam moogu kuyengu fiit.
40006030	Wo Saŋgband nn yoɦ moot t´ ba jana kpam tii dima, l` ba na su bà kee bà kɔɦdg-t bogmn lee, ¿d` kpaa kee d` ɦe nenwu welee l` yatga, nen, n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba gigidgu nen?
40006031	Tii lee, daa kuum-n n̈yen n diila ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟¿T` kee t` di bee? ¿T` kee t` nyi bee? ¿T` kee t` yoɦ bee?”
40006032	Bá kpaa seeŋa Saŋgband bee kuudra bayen hɛngu n welee diilɦee. Nen lee, n` Sa bee saŋgbambiimn ka mi na n` halwa welee wantii.
40006033	Yaagr-n Saŋgband huraant bag̈b, n neerhɔmm dn gbaama mii saɦ', l` saa d` si-n bii b` fad-n bii mɛmbii!
40006034	Daa kuum-n n̈yenwu n diila su jugun! Su goorii kee d` ta bɛm n d` mɔmr d` diila. Kunyɔŋu kú kena baa goted kuu magaa n goorii.»
40007001	«Daa bɔɦɔɔm-n na volba ret koɦln, ka bo na bá daa nan ta biir na n` ret koɦln!
40007002	Saŋgband nan yaa-n n yaagu ka tagd wo nn ta yaa lee, d` nan ta lɔgl kɛɛmtga nn kɛɛmla volba n kee, d` kɛɛml-n.
40007003	¿Ben kaan vn geewa nyakakiiga ká ba v` teela nɔmbn kee, ka kpaa yu faɦgidgu kú ba v` rebn kuu?
40007004	¿L` ba l` ɦe lan na v` biir v` teel na ɦá saa v` ree nyakakiiga ká ba ɦá nɔmbn kee, l` ba na faɦgidgu ba v` reb nii?
40007005	Rarbɛɦm tii ven! Ree faɦgidgu kú ba v` nɔmbn kuu saɦ', lee wen lee, v` nyaan hɔm na v` ree nyakakiiga ká ba v` teela rebn kee.
40007006	«Daa lɔgm-n want ban vid Saŋgband tii ka tɔɔ gwɛi, ka sol na hí daa bidg hiyen n` ɦɛn hì sadr-n! Daa lɔg-n n` laalm n` vaa ɦafaant nɔngan ka sol na t´ daa nawdrm-m!
40007007	«Jam-n, bà si-n! Bag-n, n` nyaan! Koɦoo-n, bà rawdg-n!
40007008	Ĥá jamaa, bá saɦm-wu. Ĥá bagii, ɦá yum. Ĥá koɦaa, bá rawd-wu.
40007009	N` huuga ɦii bee, ka ɦà buga t gbaam-wu diit, ¿ɦà bag tand ɦà si-ka?,
40007010	laa, ¿ɦà to-ka waag̈b l` ba na kà gbaama-wu ɦɔlga?
40007011	Ka l` ba na nidbɛɦjɔtnt nen, nii miil n` bii wanhɔmt saɦb de, ¿n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii, wii nan saɦl biiba bà gbaama-wu wanhɔmt bee lan n jaɦ?
40007012	«Tii lee, bii nn sɔkla na nidba ɦɛm-n bii mɛmbii, ta ɦɛm-n-ba-b. Mohiiswu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadii nn gbaama bii nnii.»
40007013	«Jib-n n fiid d´ ba fɛfɛgŋa dii! Fiid d´ ba yalmr dii n huru ɦú kpaɦ gemm ɦuu keda nidwu n boorlaŋa. Nidba kɔd jiba n welee fiidii ka tagd welee hurɦuu.
40007014	L´ saa, fiid d´ ba fɛfɛgŋa dii n huru ɦú ba giidm ɦuu keda nidwu n neerm mɔmmn, nidba kaalkaɦba yul welee fiidii n welee hurɦuu.
40007015	«Mad-n n̈yen n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba! Bà kena n` man ka ba heee wo fɛi, l` ba na bá kwɛɛwa nii, diidt mɔmtn.
40007016	N` kee n` miigiim-ba bá ɦɛbn. ¿N` nyi nyana ɦii t tɔɔ taama boŋ̈mb ɦɛnii?, ¿laa doot raɦint ɦɛnii?
40007017	Tihɔmb roona roonhɔma, l´ saa tibɛɦb t roonm roonbɛɦa.
40007018	Tihɔmb kpaɦ b` bee b` rɔn roonbɛɦa, l´ saa tibɛɦb kpaɦ b` bee b` ta rɔn roonhɔma.
40007019	Tiib b` kpaa roon roonhɔma bii, bà lua-b, n tod boglam.
40007020	Ta welee nnii nn kee n` miigiim gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba bá ɦɛbn.
40007021	«Lag bá hoɦ-ma na ‟Berma! Berma!” bee mɛmbee nan jiba saŋgbambiimn huraantn. Bá ɦɛna mà Sa ɦá bee saŋgbambiimn wii sɔklb ɦɛn bee n jaɦ nan jiba t` ni.
40007022	Yaagu goor daa kenaa, kɔd kee bà hoɦm-ma na ‟Berma! Berma!”, ka bɔɦɔɔ na ‟T` da faa v` hidrn gwɛɛt tn da soɦdg Saŋgband man tii. T` da vɔɦda kunidba v` hidrn. T` da ɦɛna hoolgu kɔd v` hidrn.”
40007023	Lee wen, maa biir-ba na ‟Mà kpaa mii-n felaɦ'. Nyab-n mà man, nen, nen ɦɛna bɛɦgu nen!”
40007024	«Tii lee, nid ɦá ɦomr gwɛɛt man bed tii n ka ɦɛna t´ ɦɛn wii, bà nan tɔnaa-wu n rarm tiiɦii ɦà mɛɦr ɦà haar fiiga jugun.
40007025	Toŋu t niim, kola t hu, ɦam t fugm kimm, l´ mɛnguu t bewl n ka hɛɦr haarii, d´ ka ba lor, blaɦb kaa, bà da lo d` boboga fiiga jugun.
40007026	L´ saa, ɦá ɦomr gwɛɛt man bed tii n ka kpaa ɦɛna t´ ɦɛn wii, bà nan tɔnaa-wu n nidjoojooŋu kú mɛɦr kù haar gwiɦiim jugun.
40007027	Toŋu t niim, kola t hu, ɦam t fugm kimm, l´ mɛnguu t bewl n heɦ haarii, d´ luurm n koɦl d´ mɛndii kpaalaa.»
40007028	Yeesua nn werii gwɛɛtii l´ tog lee, ɦá gwɛɛt weriibii t ka ɦɛna nidfigm yɔlaa yem.
40007029	Biilm, ɦà da kpaa weraa wo bá baɦlb weriitba dela, wii da ba n gemmnt ka weraa hɔm.
40008001	Yeesua t hoɦnt duuga, nidfigm t ka ŋmiɦaa ɦá kaa.
40008002	Bolmɦii t nyuɦ ɦá man, n gbaɦnt ɦá nɔngan n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, ka v` sɔkla, v` ɦe mà riir kelkel.»
40008003	Yeesua t teed ɦá nuɦu n tarm-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà sɔkln. Riir kelkel!» Ĥan bed welee lee, ɦá rorm kelkel yelmaa.
40008004	L´ saa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kewlg hɔm, daa ɦe wo bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛtii ɦii man! Gwɛntaɦ lee, san v` werii vyen gotia ɦà nyaan vn ba lee, l` saa v` ɦe vit Mohiisa nn da sir wad na bá ɦɛm tii ka bo na baawena miig na l` gbaad-v.»
40008005	Yeesua nn da jibaa Kafarnahuum kɔrgun lee, Roomaa tawdbermɦii t nyɔɦl ɦayen n wun, n ka jobla-wu
40008006	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, mà ŋmɛɛɦeeda gbanu kpiira ɦá ka door haaga ka ɦum wiiru biii.»
40008007	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Maa mà san mà gbaad-wu.»
40008008	Tawdbermwii t leed-wu na: «Berma, mà kpaa tɔn na v` jib mà fiid, biir gwɛɛgu kuyengu l` gbaad-wu!
40008009	Mà mɔma, mà ba mà bermba kwɛɛn, ka ta mad tawdba mà kwɛɛn. Ka má biir bá ni ɦii na ‟Keda!”, ɦá san. Ka má ta biir vol na ‟Daana!”, ɦá daan. L´ saa, ka má ta biir mà ŋmɛɛɦeed na ‟Ĥe binbii!”, ɦá ɦɛm-b.»
40008010	Yeesua nn ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu yɔlaa yem, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ bá da tagd ɦà kaa bee na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, mà ban nyaan ɦiiwu Yisraɦeel tigrn, wiilaɦ ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimnmina tuurm.
40008011	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, nidba kɔd nan rɛna n toŋu kwɛɛn, volba rɛn toŋu faaga, bà kad Ĥabrahaamwu n Yisɦaakwu n Yakoob bà man diit delaŋa saŋgbambiimn huraantn.
40008012	L` saa bà kɔɦdg biiba ln da ba na bá nan heɦm Saŋgband huraantii bee n kankaan, nyeetn, bà kom kan ka duum bà nyina.»
40008013	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ tawdbermwii na: «Kuliim vaa! V` reb tii b´ ɦɛn bii ba b` ɦe b´ jugun.» Lee wen, l´ ta gbaad tawdbermwii ŋmɛɛɦeedwii yelmaa.
40008014	Yeesua t dan n san Fetraa n mid Fetra yaafɔga door ka ba n tulgu bɛɦii.
40008015	Ĥá tarm fɔg̈wii nuɦu, bɛɦhii t went-wu. Ĥá vid n baɦ n ka saɦ-ba diit.
40008016	Jabhoolm, bá daan Yeesuwu n nidba kɔd, l` ba na kunidba da kad bá ɦɛn. Ĥá voom kunidbee n ɦà noon gwɛɛt, n ta gbaad bɛɦtiiba mɛmba.
40008017	Welee nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya nn da bed tii nn da ɦer t` jugun. Tii nnii na: Ĥà lɔgra t` ɦajamnt, n soɦd t` bɛɦii.
40008018	Goor diir nidfigm da kaadg Yeesua. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá mɛwdg nyaam bal.
40008019	Baɦlb weriitɦii t nyuɦ-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, maa mà tagd v` kaa baatea.»
40008020	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Haant ba n t` vadi, ŋmɛnii ba n hì soɦga, Nida Budaaga lee, kee kpaɦ n kaalaŋa ká kan ba kà doot na kà voɦoo.»
40008021	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba huuga bilma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, si-ma huru mà san mà kuur mà sawu saɦ'!»
40008022	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Tagd mà kaa, v` saa kpiirmba kugm bá kpiirmba!»
40008023	Yeesua t jib kpiirgun, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t heɦl-wu.
40008024	Myenm ɦɛn ɦambermm t vid n ka fug nyaamii ɦɛn, m` wada waalaa kpiirguu ɦɛn. Yeesu wii go.
40008025	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ-wu n himii-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, soɦdg-t! T` ba t` kpiidr!»
40008026	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` sol fobɛɦgu na laa? Ĥiluu n` nyaan lan nnii n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba tutugmbiima.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n vid n gwɛɛl ɦamii n nyaalmii n talmt. L´ mɛnguu t kwiim nigaɦ'.
40008027	L´ ɦɛm bá mɛmbee yɔlaa yem, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ben nid nnii wunwii, na l´ lag n ɦam n nyaalm mɛɦm valgm wii?»
40008028	Yeesua nn taai nyaam bal Gadaraa tiiba tantn lee, nidba bareɦba t rorm bili huuga n ka kena ka tuuga-wu. Kunidba da kad bá ɦɛn, bá ka ba talmt biii, ɦii t ka kpaa beraa n huru ɦú ked n kan ɦuu.
40008029	Nidbee t baɦ n ka toola na: «Saŋgband mɔmr Budaaga! ¿T´ n vn n tet? ¿Daan nnaɦ na v` dar t` tobr l` ban ta vuugu ban da baɦ kuun?»
40008030	Ĥafaant kodibermr diir da ba vɔku n kan ka ju t` diit.
40008031	Kunidbee t ka jobla Yeesu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka v` bo na v` voo-tii, saa t` jib ɦafaant kodiirndinan.»
40008032	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ked-n!» Bá rorm nidbee reɦdrbee ni, n san n jib ɦafaantii ni. Yelmaa ɦafaantii t begdr duuga fidun huuu n lɔɔm nyaamn n ŋmɛɦɛɛ tyen n kpiidr.
40008033	Nidba bá da kiima ɦafaantii bee t solm, n jib kɔrgun, n bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛtii mɛntii n bii b` gɛtg n nidba bareɦba kunidba nn da kad bá ɦɛn bee.
40008034	Yelmaa kɔrguu nidba mɛmba t rorm n san na bà nyaan Yeesua. Ban san n yum-wu lee, n ka jobla-wu na ɦá nyab bà tantn.
40009001	Yeesua t jib kpiirgun, n gew n ŋmɛtgii nyaam bal, n san ɦá kɔrgun.
40009002	Bá tu balmdindɦiiwu jargun n daan-wu n ɦà man. Ĥan nyan bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Di kwɛɛwr, mà buga! L` waa-v v` fubɛɦii.»
40009003	Ĥan bed welee lee, baɦlb weriitba biiba t ka bɔɦɔɔ n bà ni na: «Nidwunwuna suul Saŋgband.»
40009004	Ĥá miig ban diila tii, n gbaam-ba na: «¿Ben kaan nn ba n diilbɛɦanɦena n` jugu ni?
40009005	Ka má biir na ‟L` waa-v v` fubɛɦii”, laa ‟vidg v` keda!”, ¿l´ huuga ben yatg gemmii?
40009006	Lee, maa mà werii-n na Nida Budaaga man, mà ba n gemmnt tant ɦɛn na mà waaliim fubɛɦii.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ balmdindwii na: «Vidg! Lɔg v` jargu v` kuliim naa!»
40009007	Nidwii t vid n kulii ɦaa.
40009008	Nidfigmii nn nyan welee lee, fobɛɦgu t mug-m m´ ka nyɔka Saŋgband na dii sira nidba welee gemmntii.
40009009	Yeesua t nyab kan, n san n ka beraa n yum lambɦu soɦdgtɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Matewa, ɦà kad lambɦu faadb disakun. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Tagd mà kaa!» Ĥá vid n tag ɦá kaa.
40009010	Ĥá jib Matewa haarn n ka ju diit wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba. Lambɦu soɦdgtba kɔd, n fubɛɦtiiba t daan n ka ju bá man.
40009011	Farisii tiiba t yum welee n gbaam ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿L` ɦer lan n` bermwu n lambɦu soɦdgtba n fubɛɦtiiba ban ju diit taa man?»
40009012	Yeesua t ɦom, n leed na: «Nidba bá kpaɦ n bɛɦii bee, bà kpaa ked taadmta man. Bɛɦtiiba keda taadmta man.
40009013	L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Mà bagl na nidba bɛm hɔmgu tiiba, mà kpaa bag na nidba vidm. Ked-n n` ɦom gwɛɛtii kɔtɔd! Mà ba daan na mà hoɦ nidhɔmba, mà daan na mà hoɦ fubɛɦtiiba.»
40009014	Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t san Yeesua man n gbaam-wu na: «¿L` ɦer lan t´ n Farisii tiiba tii nn boow noor, vii gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kpaa boowii?»
40009015	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` diila na ka bá hoɦ nidba yaala kasant man, bà san bà kir diit yaala tiiwii nɔngan wo bà ba kunyɔŋun laa? Vuugu kenan, yaala tia kpaɦ ɦà bɛm bá man, l` saa-ba bayen. Vuuguu daa taanaa, bà boow noor.
40009016	Ĥii kpaa lɔg dimtokwɛɛlgu n lag dimbudŋu, blaɦb kaa dimtokwɛɛlgu ba kù dar dimbudŋuu l` mɔɔg sadgm.
40009017	L´ saa n` lɔgl rufetii ka hid daam, ¿laa bee? Ĥii kpaa lɔg dakwɛɛlm n hit rukpeemgun, blaɦb kaa, ka m´ wɛɛgaa, kù kitg m` futr, l` saa daamii n ruuguu l` kul n kol. Tii lee, l` ba na bá lɔg dakwɛɛlm bà hitg rukwɛɛlgun, l´ mɛnguu bɛm hɔm.»
40009018	Yeesua nn da ɦeewr-ba n gwɛɛtii bɔɦɔɔb lee, Yuudaa tiiba huraaɦii t taan, n gbaɦnt dind ɦá nɔngan, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Mà bufɔka kpiira l` ban hiidg. Hai! Daan v` ɦig v` nuɦu ká ɦɛn, kà himtg!»
40009019	Ĥá vid n tag ɦá kaa, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba.
40009020	Fɔgɦii da ta ba n bɛɦii ka ju kunyɔŋu kakeɦnan bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ'. Bɛɦhii nnii na jiim da ror-wu wo ɦà huura kidga l` kpaa jeɦnta. Fɔg̈wii t nyuɦ Yeesuwu n ɦà kaann, n tarm ɦá dimgu noor.
40009021	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ni na: «Ka má bee n tarm ɦá dimgu mɔmguu, mà bɛɦii wentg-ma.»
40009022	Yeesua t bid ɦayen n yum-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Bugaa, jum kwɛɛwr! V` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daɦra v` jugu.» Yelmaa, fɔg̈wii bɛɦii t went.
40009023	Yeesua t taai Yuudaa tiiba huraawii haarn, n mid dawni hoɦdba t manyii bayen, n ka hɔd kuurm, nidba kuum ka biira.
40009024	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Riir-n nnaɦreen! Bufɔkee ba kpi, kà gooln.» Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, bá ka laɦ-wu.
40009025	Bá wen voor nidba n ree-ba duunii, ɦá jib dugun, n mug bufɔkee nuɦu, ká vid.
40009026	Gwɛɛtii t yadgii bá tantii mɛntiin.
40009027	Yeesua t vid reekan n lɔɔm huru, n san n ka beraa n joomba bareɦba ɦɛn, bá vid n ka tagd ɦà kaa ka toola na: «Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan t` kunyɔŋu!»
40009028	Yeesua t taai haaga, joombee t nyuɦ ɦá man, ɦá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` tia na maa mà bee mà ɦe n` yumaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Ĥiin, Berma! T` tian.»
40009029	Lee, ɦá tarm bá niini ɦɛn n bɔɦɔɔ na: «N` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa nnii Saŋgband nn ba d` to-n bii nn gbaama bii.»
40009030	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, bá niini t went. Ĥá baɦl-ba ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá ɦe hɔm na ɦii daa miig gwɛɛtii.
40009031	Bá nyab n san n ka la bɔɦɔɔ ɦà gwɛɛt n koot, l´ yadgii tantii mɛntiin.
40009032	Ban da nyab lee, bá daan Yeesuwu n nidɦii ɦà kpaa bea ka gwɛɛla, blaɦb kaa kunidɦii da kad ɦà ɦɛn.
40009033	Yeesua wen voor kunidwii, tantaaguwii t baɦ n ka gwɛɛla yelmaa. L´ ɦɛm nidfigm yɔlaa, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥii ban nyaan binbii tuurmb felaɦ Yisraɦeel tantn.»
40009034	Farisii tiiba t ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kunidba huraa saɦl-wu gemmnt na ɦá vɔɦd kunidba.»
40009035	Yeesua da lintgaa kɔrbermi n kɔrkaaɦii mɛniin. Ĥà da weraa gwɛɛt bà kpoglb disagtn, ka faa saŋgbambiimn huraant Gohɔmt, ka gbaadaa bɛɦii mɛnii, n ɦajamnt mɛnt.
40009036	Ĥà da yul nidfigm ɦan da taŋaa n mii kunyɔŋu biii. L` da gira nidbee, bá bɔrii ŋmeenm, n ka boo fɛi ɦí kpaɦ n kimt ɦii.
40009037	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Dikaɦb ba kɔd koogun, gwɛntaɦ, nidba kpaɦ kɔd na bà lɔg-b.
40009038	Tii lee, jobl-n dikaɦb tii na ɦá tamn dikaɦlɔgdba ɦà koogun na bá lɔg ɦá dikaɦb!»
40010001	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee, n saɦm-ba gemmnt na bá vɔɦd kunidba, ka gbaadaa bɛɦii mɛnii, n ɦajamnt mɛnt.
40010002	Tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee hida nnanaɦ': Nooga saɦ Simoon ban daarŋ na Fetrwii n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Ĥandrea; Yakoobwu n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Yohanɛɛsa, bareɦdrbee ba na Jebdea kwɛɛlban;
40010003	Filfwu n Baatelmia; Tomaaswu n lambɦu soɦdgt Matewa; Ĥalfea kwɛɛl Yakoobwu n Taadea;
40010004	Simoon ɦá ŋmɛta ɦá kɔrgu ɦɛn wii n nan Kariyoot tii Yuudaasa ɦá da gweedm Yeesuwu wii.
40010005	Yeesua t tom nidba kwiɦr n bareɦbee ka baɦla-ba na: «Daa san-n nidba bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee tantn! Daa jib-n Samarii kɔrnin!
40010006	San-n Yisraɦeel tiiba man n jaɦ', bà boo fɛɛbii hí bɔd hii.
40010007	Faam-n Gohɔmt hurfɛga ka bɔɦɔɔ na saŋgbambiimn huraant nyuɦnn!
40010008	Gbaadiim-n bɛɦtiiba, himiim-n kpiirmba, ɦɛm-n bolmba kita kelkel! Vɔɦd-n kunidba! Bà sira-n gemmntii yem, ta ɦɛm-n ŋmɛɛg̈bii yem!
40010009	Daa lɔg-n sika, laa lig̈bfeela, laa lig̈bmɔla na n` lo n` ruin!
40010010	Daa lɔg-n ruugu, laa tugreɦdrgu, laa nanawda, laa dagbɛɦgu na n` mad! Biilm, l` ba na ŋmɛgda soɦdgm ɦá fat.
40010011	«Ka n´ taai kɔrgu kuugun, n` bag nid ɦá sɔkla na ɦà soɦdg-n wii n` bɛm ɦá haarn kakeɦnan goor nn kee n` nyab kɔrguun dii.
40010012	Ka n´ san n jib haar diirn, n` seeŋ-ba.
40010013	Ka haariin tiibee t soɦdg-nii, n` nigiigu seeŋbii kpat bà man. Ka bá ba soɦdg-nii, nigiigu seeŋbii ŋmɛtgn n` man.
40010014	Ka n´ jib haar diirn, laa kɔrgu kuugun, bá kirm na bà kpaɦ bà soɦdg-n, laa bà kpaɦ bà kewlg n` noon gwɛɛtii, n` nyab kan, n` nit-ba n n` niɦi.
40010015	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, yaagu yaam goorii, Sodoom n Gomoor tiiba kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm tɛgiigu ka yala kɔrgu kú kid-n kuu reku.»
40010016	«Ĥom-n! Mà tuuma-n wo fɛi dela diidt huuga. Tii lee, bɛm-n rarm wo hɔmii, ka ba n n` nyɔnyɔgm.
40010017	Mad-n n̈yen hɔm na, nidba kee bà hoɦm-n yaani ka gbuu-n huɦi bá kpoglb disagtn.
40010018	Bà kee bà hoɦm-n bermba n hurbermba duuran mà kaa, ka bo na n` bee n` biir n` reb mi mà hidrn bii bá nɔngan n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nɔngan.
40010019	Bá wen kee bà hoɦm-n yaani yaalantii, n` kwɛɛwa daa toom n net kee n` biir tii, n nn kee n` gwɛɛl lee, gwɛɛt nn kee n` biir tii, l` kee l` si-n-t l´ wendii mɔmr.
40010020	Gwɛɛtii kpaa kee t` rorm n` diilan. N` Sa Voɦoom kee m` lɔɔm gwɛɛt n` noon.
40010021	«Biiba kee bà gweedm bayen bà teelba na bá kuu-ba. L` saa, samba biiba ta gweedm bayen bà bii na bá kuu-hi. Ta welee nnii, bii hiihi nn kee hì vidg hì reba ɦɛn, hì ɦe bà kuu-ba.
40010022	Baaben tia kee ɦà nyaɦaam-n mà kaa. Gwɛntaɦaa, ɦii ɦà nan ba ɦà mad hɔm kakeɦnan wii, l` nan daɦ ɦá jugu.
40010023	Ka bá dan n ka lɔɔ-n kunyɔŋu kɔrgu kuugu nii, n` siil n` tɔtg kɔrvolgun. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, n` nan kpaa linta Yisraɦeel kɔrnin l` diɦ saɦ na Nida Budaaga daan.
40010024	«Kpɛlŋtɦii kpaɦ bermt n yat ɦá weriita, laa ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii kpaɦ bermt n ɦà jugu tia ɦɛn.
40010025	L` mag n kpɛlŋt na ɦá kitg wo ɦá weriita, wo ln ta mag n ŋmɛɛɦeed na ɦá kitg wo ɦá jugu tii lee. Ka bá baɦdg haar sa na ‟Bɦelsebuula”, l´ kɔtɔd na kunidba huraa, ¿hida ban ba bà baɦ ɦá kwɛɛn tiiba ɦee, ɦà ba ɦà bɛm bɛɦa lan n jaɦ'?
40010026	Tii lee, daa solm-n nidba fobɛɦgu! Bii b´ ba foɦmgan bii nan ror wiingan, bii b` ba na bà kpɛɦdrn bii mɛmbii nan ror feelgan.
40010027	Bii mà reb bɔɦɔɔ-n nyeetn bii, bɔɦɔɔm-n-b wiingan! Bii bá reb nyeera-n sabaɦ bii, da n` toolgm-n-b n kɔrgu!
40010028	Daa solm-n biiba bá kuu gbanu, ka kpaɦ bà bee bà ku liliigu bee! Tii lee, solm-n Saŋgband na d` ba d` bee d` lɔɔlg gbanu n liliigu taabuugun.
40010029	¿Bà kpaa gweedma kaagŋmɛnbihii hireɦ wadbuga kayenga? Ln la ba welee lee, ŋmɛnbihiiga kayenga kpaa tɛɦda tiŋan n` Sa Saŋgband kpaa mi.
40010030	Nen lee, d` lag n n` juunin jii mɛɦ n kaalm n ka mi hí noor.
40010031	Lee, daa solm-n fobɛɦgu! N` ba daɦt n yat kaagŋmɛnbihii kɔd.
40010032	«Ka ɦii t ree n bɔɦɔɔ nidba nɔngan yaklaa na man heɦl wii, mà nan ta ree mà biir mà Sa ɦá bee saŋgbambiimn wii nɔngan na man heɦl-wu.
40010033	Ka ɦii t kii nidba nɔngan na ɦà kpaa mii-ma, mà nan ta kii mà Sa ɦá bee saŋgbambiimn wii nɔngan na mà kpaa mii-wu.
40010034	«Daa miim-n na mà daan tant ɦɛn na mà lo nigiigu nidba huuga. Mà ba daan n nigiigu, mà daan n hoodr.
40010035	Mà daan na mà radg kwɛɛlwu n ɦà sa bá huuga, bɛɛrwu n ɦà nya bá huuga, bufɔg̈wu n ɦà yaag̈b bà huuga.
40010036	Nida teelba kee bà kitg ɦà rafeedba.
40010037	Ĥii ɦá sɔkla ɦà sa laa ɦá nya ka yata-ma wii kpaa tɔn na ɦà bɛm mà kpaturu tia. Ĥii ɦá sɔkla ɦà kwɛɛl laa ɦá bɛɛr ka yata-ma wii kpaa tɔn na ɦà bɛm mà kpaturu tia.
40010038	Ĥii ɦá kpaa bigd ɦà dabragr ka tagd mà kaa wii kpaa tɔn na ɦà bɛm mà kpaturu tia.
40010039	Ĥii ɦá bag na ɦà soɦdg ɦà neerm wii, ɦà nan bɔraa-m. L´ saa ɦii ɦá bɔraa ɦá neerm mà kaa wii, ɦà nan yuuŋa-m.
40010040	«Ĥii ɦá soɦdg-n wii, man nnii ɦan soɦdg. L´ saa, ɦii ɦá soɦdg-ma wii ta soɦdg ɦii ɦà tamn-ma wii.
40010041	Ĥii ɦá soɦdg Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii na ln ba na Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt nnii, ɦà nan soɦdg fat wo Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta fat dela, l´ saa, ɦii ɦá soɦdg nidhɔmɦii na ɦà ba hɔma Saŋgband nɔngan wii, ɦà nan soɦdg fat wo nidhɔma fat dela.
40010042	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ɦii ɦá nan saɦ nyaalnigiim kpowdgan kaaba bá ba mà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba huuga bee ni ɦii, na ln ba na mà gwɛɛt soɦdgtaa, wiilaɦ nan soɦdg ɦà fat.»
40011001	Yeesua nn werii baɦlbii ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee l´ diɦ lee, ɦá vid n san kɔrnin na ɦà ta weriim gwɛɛt ka faa Gohɔmt.
40011002	Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa da ba sargan, lee, n ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ Krista ŋmɛɛgt gwɛɛt. Ĥá tom ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba balanba
40011003	na bá gbaam-wu na ¿wii nnii nid ban mi na ɦà kenan wii laa, l` ba na bá hɔd jeenɦii le?
40011004	Bá san n gbaam Yeesuwu welee, ɦá leed-ba na: «Ŋmɛtg-n n` biir Yohanɛɛswu bii nn ɦum ka yu bii:
40011005	Joomba yuln, kparuuba ked hɔm, bolmba bɛɦii gbaadaa, dintammba ɦum, kpiirmba himtra, bà bɔɦɔɔ kunyɔŋtiiba Gohɔmt.
40011006	Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦii ɦá nan kpaa gwidaa gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaawr l` baɦr n man wii.»
40011007	Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn lɔɔr huru ka ŋmɛtgaa bà berma man lee, Yeesua t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt na: «¿N` san kpamloŋun na n` nyaan bee? ¿N` san na n` nyaan kaagu ɦam nn fug ɦù lig̈wa ɦuu laa? Mà kpaa diila.
40011008	¿N` san kan na n` nyaan ben mɔmbii? ¿N` san na n` nyaan nidɦii ɦà fidr dimhɔma laa? Nidba bá fidr dimhɔma bee, ¿lag bee gool huraamba haya nii?
40011009	¿L` ba na n` san kpamloŋun na n` nyaan ben mɔmbii? ¿N` san na n` nyaan Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii laa? Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na: N` nyana Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtberm nnii.
40011010	Wii gwɛɛt nnii Saŋgband nn da bed Wadbuudgan na: Maa mà tom mà tumtwu v` nɔngan na ɦá maantr-v huru.
40011011	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, nidba ban meedr tant ɦɛn bee mɛmbee, bá huuga ɦii kpaɦ berm ka yata-wu. Gwɛntaɦ', ɦii ɦá ba na bututugŋa kpaalaa saŋgbambiimn huraantn wii ba berm ka yata-wu.
40011012	Lɔg vuugu Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa nn da faa Gohɔmt kuu kakeɦnan goonaa, bà hɛlwa saŋgbambiimn huraant n talmt l´ saa nidtalmba bag na bà kad t` ɦɛn.
40011013	Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba, n Mohiisa baɦlb da beda Huraantii gwɛɛt kakeɦnan Yohanɛɛsa vuugu.
40011014	Lee, ka n` sɔkla na n` tii mà gwɛɛtii, miim-n na Yohanɛɛs nnii Ĥelii ban da bed na ɦà ba ɦà daan wii.
40011015	Ka ɦii ba n tobɦaa, ɦá kewlg hɔm!
40011016	¿L` ba na mà tɔnii goona nidba n teba? Bà tɔna bii hí ror n ka kad bantn, volii toola hí tuurii na:
40011017	‟T` hoɦra-n bina werii, n´ ka ba haaw. T´ yuum himaɦr yumii, n´ ka ba kom.”
40011018	Biilm, Yohanɛɛsa daann, n ka kpaa ju, n ka kpaa nyi daam, nidba t ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Ĥà ba n kunida.”
40011019	Nida Budaaga man, maa daan n ka ju ka nyi, nidba t ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Nyaan-n nidwunwuna! Ĥà diila deb n danyab ɦɛn n jaɦ ka turaa n lambɦu soɦdgtba n neerbɛɦm tiiba.” Lee, Saŋgband rarm weraa na m` ba deedee myen m` ŋmɛɛgtn.»
40011020	Yeesua t baɦ n ka kpal kɔrni ɦan da ɦer ɦì ni hoolgu ŋmɛɛgt l´ yat ɦii, blaɦb kaa, nidba bá go ɦí ni bee, bà ba lagii neerm. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na:
40011021	«Korasiin kɔrgu ven, kunyɔŋu nan luura v` ɦɛn! Betsayidaa kɔrgu ven, kunyɔŋu nan luura v` ɦɛn! Ka má da ɦe hoolgu Tiir n Sidoon kɔrnin wo man da ɦer n` huuga lee, nyimlena kɔrnɦiin tiiba t da fid kutukunt dimt, n figm bayen toom na l´ werii na bà bagl na bà lagii neerm.
40011022	Tii nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na, yaagu yaam goorii, Tiir n Sidoon kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm tɛgiigu ka yala n` reku.
40011023	«L´ saa Kafarnahuum kɔrgu ven, ¿diila na nan via vyen n faaga kakeɦnan saŋgbambiimnn? Ĥaai! Bà nan hoɦla-v n tiŋa kakeɦnan tiŋrba man. Ka hoolgu ɦɛb b´ da ɦer v` huuga bii, b´ da ɦe Sodoom kɔrgu nii, nyimlena kɔrguu la bee n jana.
40011024	Tii nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na, yaagu yaam goorii, Sodoom kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm tɛgiigu ka yala v` reku.»
40011025	L´ vuuguu, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai mà Sa, saŋgbambiim n tant l` Berma! Mà seeŋa-v na ven ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n werii kaaba vn da kpɛɦdr bermba n rarbiilm tiiba bii.
40011026	Biilm, mà Sa, ln sɔkl na v` ɦe bii nnii welee.
40011027	«Mà Sa taag wantii mɛntii mà natadn. Ĥii kpaa mi Budaaga man, ka l` kpaɦ na mà Sa miil-ma. L´ saa, ɦii ta kpaa mi mà Sa ka l` kpaɦ na Budaaga man, man miil-wu. Ĥii man sɔkl na mà werii-wu mà Sa wii, wii ta miil-wu.
40011028	«Nen, nen toɦd wanjeet l` giid-n nen, daan-n mà man n` mɛmbee mà tuur-n n` voɦoo!
40011029	Bɛm-n mà kwɛɛn mà weraa-n mà gwɛɛt! Mà ba bulaa, ka hoɦla mayen n tiŋa, lee, n` ba n` yuuŋ nigiigu.
40011030	Biilm, ka n` ba mà kwɛɛnii, l` kpaɦ l` gii-n. Want man ba mà tulg-n tii ba vɛliigu.»
40012001	Goora ɦiiɦa n ɦà kaannaa, Yeesua t jib n jofiili kpamb biibn ka gɛta, l` ba Saabaat goor. Kɔm da kura ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba. Bá baɦ n ka kaɦ jofiili ka nyiɦaa.
40012002	Farisii tiiba t yum welee n bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Ĥiluu v` nyaan v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn ɦɛna bii t` baɦlb nn kpaa saɦ huru na bá ɦɛm Saabaat goor bia!»
40012003	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` ba kaal Wadbuudgan bii Daviida nn da ɦer goor diir biin? Goorii kɔm t kuu-wu n ɦà nidba.
40012004	¿Ĥá da ba jib Saŋgband haarn wú n ban bá jum kpooni ban da sir Saŋgband ɦii? L` ba na l` ba si huru na bá di kpoonɦii, l´ kɔtɔd na t` baɦlb saɦl huru gotiiba n jaɦ na bee jum welee kpoonɦii.
40012005	Laa, ¿n` ba kaal Mohiisa baɦlb wadgan na gotiiba bà ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b Saŋgband haarn Saabaat goor bee na l` saɦl-ba huru na bá daa valgm goorii? ¿Na ban la kpaa vala-d lee, bà ba koɦl bii Saŋgband nɔnga nii?
40012006	Tii lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na ɦii bee nnaɦreen ka yata Saŋgband haar.
40012007	L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Mà sɔkla na nidba bɛm hɔmgu tiiba, mà kpaa bag na nidba vidm. Ka nn miim biilm gwɛɛtii kɔtɔdii, nn kpaɦ n` biir bá ba n bà nyɔnyɔgm bee na bá ret koɦln.
40012008	Biilm, Nida Budaaga nnii Saabaat goor berma.»
40012009	Yeesua t gɛt ka ked n san n jib bá kpoglb disakun.
40012010	Nidɦii ba kan ɦà nuɦu t vaaw. Biiba bà da ba kan bee t ka bag na ɦá ɦe bii goorii, lee wen bà biir na ɦà koɦl gwɛɛt. Lee, bá gbaam-wu na: «¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá gbaad ɦiiwu Saabaat goor?»
40012011	Ĥá leed na: «Ka n` ni ɦii ba n fɛɛgu kuyen, kú lɔɔm vadkilmgun Saabaat goor, ¿ɦà kpaɦ ɦà san ɦà ree-ku kan?
40012012	Lee, nidbilma ba daɦt ka yala fɛɛgu. Welee lee, t` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá ɦe nidwu hɔmgu Saabaat goor.»
40012013	Ĥan bed welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ nidwii na: «Teedg v` nuɦu!» Ĥá teed-ɦu, ɦú maant n ka ba hɔm wo volɦuu.
40012014	Farisii tiiba t rorm n san n kolm taa n koom kpaab ɦá jugun na bà kuu-wu.
40012015	Yeesua nn ɦomr na bà bagl huru na bà kuu-wu lee, ɦá nyab kaalaŋeen n san jeenlaŋa. Nidba kɔd t tag ɦá kaa, ɦá gbaad bɛɦtiiba mɛmba.
40012016	Ĥan gbaad-ba lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá daa ɦe ɦii miig-wu.
40012017	L´ ɦɛm welee na gwɛɛt Saŋgband nn da bed n d` gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya noor tii ɦe t´ jugun. Tii nnii na:
40012018	Nyaan-n mà ŋmɛɛɦeed man bantg wii! Wii nnii man sɔkla. Mà lo ɦá ni mà nyaag̈b mɛmb. Mà nan hoɦla mà Voɦoom ɦà ɦɛn, ɦà faam mà gobiint tigan.
40012019	Ĥà kpaa kee ɦà bagm ɦiiwu n gwɛɛt, ɦà kpaa kee ɦà kɔdrm, bà kpaa kee bà ɦom ɦá noor hurfɛgan ɦà weraa ɦayen.
40012020	Ĥà kpaa kee ɦà kaɦdg kaagu ban nyɔdr ɦuu, ɦà kpaa kee ɦà kpii kand d` kuaa dii. Ĥà kee ɦà ɦɛm welee kakeɦnan ɦá daa ɦɛna na gobiint di jugun.
40012021	Lee, tiga mɛna nan lɔɔ ɦà daag̈b ɦà ɦɛn.
40012022	Bá daan n Yeesuwu n nidɦii kunida t kad ɦà ɦɛn n ɦɛm ɦá joom, n ka ta ba tantaagua. Ĥá voom kunidwii t rorm nidwii ni, ɦá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla, ka ta yu.
40012023	L´ ɦɛm nidfigm yɔlaa yem, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Ĥá ba na Daviida yakiiga wii nnii laa?»
40012024	Farisii tiiba wen ɦomr welee, bá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà vɔɦdg kunidba ka l` kpaɦ na kunidba huraa Bɦelsebuula saɦl-wu gemmnt na ɦá vɔɦd-ba.»
40012025	Lee, Yeesua t miig bá diila n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka huraaɦii nidba t radg taa n ka taaw taa hoodr de, ¿huraantii kpaɦ t` kpia? Ka kɔrgu kuugu laa haar diir nidba t radg taa n ka taaw taa hoodr de, ¿kɔrguu laa haarii ba l` bee l` neera?
40012026	Ka Saatana vɔɦd ɦà mɔma, l´ weraa na ɦà taawa ɦayenwu hoodrii, ¿lan nnii ɦá huraant nn ba t` neer kakeɦnana?
40012027	N` bɔɦɔɔ na Bɦelsebuula saɦl-ma gemmnt na mà vɔɦd kunidba, ¿wen saɦ nii kpaturu tiiba gemmnt na bá vɔɦd-baa? N` kpaturu tiiba mɔmba weraa na n` ba gokaat.
40012028	Lee, ka l` ba na mà vɔɦda kunidba n Saŋgband Voɦoom gemmnt biilmii, l` weraa na Saŋgband huraant fɛtg n` man daanma!
40012029	Nidɦii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà jib nidhaɦrkaɦɦii haarn ɦà kpiil ɦà want ka ba boow-wu saɦ'. Ĥá wen bea n bɔm-wu l´ diɦaa, ɦá bam haariin wantii mɛntii.
40012030	Ĥii ɦá kpaa nyɔɦr-ma wii ba na mà rafeedn, l´ saa, ɦii ɦá kpaa tɔra-ma na t` kpogl wii, ɦà yadran.
40012031	Tii nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na, Saŋgband nan waalaa nidba bá fubɛɦii mɛnii, n suut ban suu-d tii mɛntii, gwɛntaɦ, ɦii ɦá suudg Voɦoom Buudm wii, d` nan kpaɦ d` waal-wu ɦà fubɛɦgee.
40012032	Nid ɦá bɔɦɔɔ Nida Budaaga gwɛɛt bɛɦgu wii, d` nan waalaa-wu, l´ saa ɦii ɦà gwɛɛla lii n Voɦoom Buudm ɦɛn wii, d` nan kpaa waalaa-wu vuugunkunan, laa vuugu kú nan kena kuun.
40012033	«Ka v` bo na v` bɛm n roonhɔmaa, l` ba na v` bɛm n tihɔmb. Ka v` ba n tibɛɦbii, v` bɛm n roonbɛɦa. Tii lee, bà miigaa tiib n b` roona weenn.
40012034	Waabɛɦt nen, ¿n` ba n` ɦe lan n` bɔɦɔɔm gohɔmt ka ba nidbɛɦba? Nida noon ror bii b` hugl ɦá kwɛɛwrn bii.
40012035	Nid ɦá ɦɛna hɔmgu wii rea wanhɔmt ɦà kɛghɔmtn, nid ɦá ɦɛna bɛɦgu wii t ree wanbɛɦt ɦà kɛg̈bɛɦtn.
40012036	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, yaagu yaam goorii, bà kee bà yaa n nidba goyemret t´ da ror bà noon tii ɦɛn.
40012037	Tii lee, v` gwɛɛt t` ror v` noon tii ɦɛn nnii ban ba bà yaa n vn, bà nyaan na ¿ba n v` nyɔnyɔgm laa koɦlnn?»
40012038	Lee wen, baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba biiba t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma, tn sɔklm na v` ɦe hoolgu kuugu l` weriim na v` gemmnt rɛn Saŋgband man.»
40012039	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Goona nidba nn la ba bɛɦgu ka gwid Saŋgband kaawr lee, bá ka gbaama na bà nyaan hoolgu kuugu. Tii lee, bà kpaɦ bà nyaan kuugu ka l` kpaɦ na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yonaasa reku n jaɦ'.
40012040	Wo Yonaasa nn da ɦer goora ɦataɦ n nyint ttaɦ ɦɔlbermga raawtn lee, ta welee nnii Nida Budaaga nn kee kà ta ɦe goora ɦataɦ n nyint ttaɦ bilun.
40012041	Saŋgband yaagu yaam goor, Niniiv tiiba kee bà vidg goona nidba jugun, bà tulg-ba gwɛɛt, blaɦb kaa na, Yonaasa da faa-ba gwɛɛt bá lagii neerm. L´ saa, ɦii bee nnaɦ ka yata Yonaasa.
40012042	Yaagu yaam goorii, fɔg ɦá da ba huraant Sabaa tantn wii kee ɦà vidg goona nidba jugun, ɦà tulg-ba gwɛɛt, blaɦb kaa na, ɦà rɛn tanvɔgtn na ɦà kewlg Salomoona rarm gwɛɛt. L´ saa, ɦii bee nnaɦ ka yata Salomoona.
40012043	«Ka kunida t riir nida ni, ɦá san n ka yɔɦwa kaalaŋkparmtn ka bag voɦoolaŋa, ka kpaa yu kiigaa.
40012044	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦayen na: ‟Maa mà ŋmɛtg mà haar man da red diin.” Ĥan bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, n ŋmɛt d´ ni, n mid d` ba hɛngu, bá haadr-d n manyii wantii mɛntii.
40012045	Lee wen, ɦá san n hoɦ kunidvolba balbleɦ', bee ba talmt ka yata-wu, n hewl ɦá ɦɛn, bá ŋmɛtgii n kad haariin. Lee wenii, nidwii neerm t ka ba kunyɔŋu kɔd l` yala nooga. Tii lee, goona nidba bá ba bɛɦgu bee, l` nan ta ɦɛna-ba yenmii.»
40012046	Yeesua nn da ɦeewr n nidfigm n gwɛɛlb lee, ɦá nyakwɛɛlba n bà nya bá taan. Ban taan lee, n kpat n ka jeɦr duun, ka bag na bà gwɛɛl n wun. [
40012047	Ĥii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ĥoma! V` nyawu n v` nyakwɛɛlba jeɦra duun ka bag na bà gwɛɛl n vn.»]
40012048	Ĥá leed nidwii na: «¿Wen nnii mà nya? ¿Teba nnii mà nyakwɛɛlba?»
40012049	Lee, ɦá teed ɦá nuɦu ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ɦɛn, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyaan-n, mà nyawu n mà nyakwɛɛlba nnanaɦ'!
40012050	Ĥii ɦá ɦɛna bii mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii nn sɔkla bii wii, wii nnii mà nyakwɛɛla, laa mà nyabɛɛra, laa mà nya.»
40013001	L´ goorii, Yeesua t rorm haaga n san n kad Galilee nyaam maaru.
40013002	Nidfigm t kpogl taa ɦá man l` kpaɦ jaɦ', ɦá saa n jib kpiirgun n kad. Nidfigmii t ka jeɦr nyaalm kpamga.
40013003	Ĥà da gwɛɛla nawdlam ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt kɔd, ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidɦii da san ɦà koogun na ɦà mɛɛ figm.
40013004	Ĥan da mɛɛ lee, miim t tɛɦr huru kpamga, ŋmɛnii t daan n tɔɦm-m.
40013005	Miim t ta tɛɦr fidɛndɛi ɦɛn, tant kpaɦ kan kɔd. Wo tant nn da kpaɦ m` ɦɛn kɔd lee, m´ rorm yelmaa.
40013006	Muunu t dan n buum, tantulm t hɔɦm figmii t kparŋ, blaɦb kaa, m´ rugi da ba bee n jib tant kwɛɛn.
40013007	Miim t ta tɛɦr ɦint bia huuga. Ĥintii t berŋ n waal figmii ɦɛn, n fiid-m.
40013008	L´ saa, miim t ta tɛɦr tanhɔmtn, n maadm, n lo bia hɔm. Miim t lo bia lɛmu, volm bia kwɛɦroond, volm t ta lo bia kwɛɛtaɦ'.
40013009	Ka ɦii ba n tobɦa, ɦá kewlg hɔm!»
40013010	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ Yeesua man, n gbaam-wu na: «¿Ben kaan vn bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛt ka gwɛɛla nawdlamii?»
40013011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Nen lee, l` sira-n na n` miig saŋgbambiimn huraant kpɛŋkpɛɦgan gwɛɛt, bee lee, l` ba si-ba welee.
40013012	Tii lee, ɦá ba n bii wii, bà nan mɔɔ-wu saɦb, ɦà bɛm n kɔd, l´ saa ɦá kpaɦ n bii wii, bà nan fɛla bà soɦdg ɦà do bii tutugm ɦan ba n bii.
40013013	Bà geewa ka kpaa yu, ka kewla ka kpaa ɦum l` kɔtɔd, tii kaa nnii man gwɛɛla-ba n nawdlamn.
40013014	Welee nnii gwɛɛt weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya nn da bed l` hɛl-ba tii nn ɦer t` noor ɦɛn. Tii nnii na, Saŋgband beda na: N` nan ba n` la kewlgm ka kpaa ɦum l` kɔtɔd, n` nan ba n` la geem ka kpaa yu bii.
40013015	Tigrndina nidba juuni haɦran. Bà nyiid bà tobɦa kimm, n muur bá niini kimm. Bà kpaa bag na bà nyaan n bà niini, na bà ɦom n bà tobɦa l` jib bà kwɛɛwan. Bà kpaa bag na bà bidg bayen n mà wee na mà gbaad-ba.
40013016	Nen lee, nen nnii lamɛɛgu tiiba. N` yul n n` niini, ka ɦum n n` tobɦa.
40013017	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba kɔd, n nidhɔmba kɔd da bagl na bà nyaan n` reb yu bii gwɛntaɦ', bà ba nyaan-b, na bà ɦom n` reb ɦum bii gwɛntaɦ', bà ba ɦom-b.»
40013018	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥom-n nawdlam man gwɛɛl ka tɔnaa n dikaɦbuudr mii kɔtɔd.
40013019	Ĥii ɦá kewla saŋgbambiimn huraant gwɛɛt, n ka ba ɦom t´ kɔtɔd wii, ɦà tɔna huru kpamga dikaɦbuudr diir kan tɛɦr ree. Kunida kena n tawd bii ban bodr ɦà kwɛɛwrn bii, n saa-wu wergu.
40013020	Vola tɔna fidɛndɛi dikaɦbuudvol kan tɛɦra ree. Ĥà ɦuma huraantii gwɛɛt, n soɦd-t yelmaa n nyaag̈b.
40013021	Gwɛntaɦ', ɦà kpaa saa na t´ baɦ rugi ɦá kwɛɛwrn, ɦà kpaa mugaa-t l´ hiid. Lee, ka kunyɔŋu kuugu t daan ɦà ɦɛn laa, ka ɦà ju kunyɔŋu gwɛɛtii kaa, ɦá kirm Saŋgband yelmaa.
40013022	Nidvola ta tɔna tant dikaɦbuudr nn tɛɦr ɦint huuga tii. Ĥà ɦuma huraantii gwɛɛt n soɦd-t gwɛntaɦ', tant ɦɛn neerm diila n kɛgt lamɛɛgu kú hogla kuu t jib ɦá kwɛɛwrn n feg gwɛɛtii, t´ ka ba roon bii.
40013023	Lee, nidvolwii tɔna tanhɔmt dikaɦbuudr kan tɛɦr ree. Ĥan kewla huraantii gwɛɛt lee, n ɦom t´ kɔtɔd, n ɦɛm t´ ɦɛn ŋmɛɛg̈b wo dikaɦbuudr nn roon bia tanhɔmtn lee. Diir roona bia lɛmu, vol kwɛɦroond, vol kwɛɛtaɦ'.»
40013024	Yeesua t gwɛɛl nawdlam volm ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgbambiimn huraant boo nidɦii ɦá bodr ɦà koogun dikaɦbuudr.
40013025	Goor diir nyingu nidba nn da gor lee wen, nidwii rafeeda t sabii n buudm dikaɦtɔgiitgu kuugu dikaɦbuudrii huuga n nyab.
40013026	Dn dan n berŋ n baɦ roonb lee, dikaɦtɔgiitguu t ta berŋ.
40013027	Koogu tiiwii ŋmɛɛɦeedba t san n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Berma, ¿lag dikaɦbuudr nnii vn da bodr v` koogu nii? ¿Dikaɦtɔgiitgunkuna mana n tee?”
40013028	Ĥá leed-ba na: ‟Mà rafeedɦii ɦera welee.” Lee wen, ŋmɛɛɦeedbee t gbaam-wu na: ‟¿Sɔkla na t` san t` vɔr dikaɦtɔgiittii?”
40013029	Ĥá leed-ba na: ‟Ĥaai! Ka n´ san na n` vɔr dikaɦtɔgiittii, n` titm n` vɔr dikaɦb.
40013030	Saa-n l` mɛnguu, l` bewlg l` berŋ kakeɦnan dikaɦlɔg̈b, lee wen, mà biir dikaɦlɔgdba na bá baal dikaɦtɔgiittii ka voor saɦ bà boow-t gwɛwa, bà totr boglam, l` saa bà lɔg dikaɦb bà deeg mà buugun.”»
40013031	Yeesua t ta gwɛɛl nawdlam volm ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgbambiimn huraant tɔna gumsarbiir nida nn buud dii.
40013032	Ban buud-d d` ba kaaga lee, d´ berŋ n kit tibermb n yat jivaat tiitii mɛntii. Dn kita tibermb lee, ŋmɛnii t ka kena ka ɦɛna hí soɦga b´ huliitn.»
40013033	Ĥá ta gwɛɛl nawdlam volm na: «Saŋgbambiimn huraant tɔna kpoonu ragr fɔga nn lɔg n sɔdm ɦá kpooni joom gaanbilmun, n ham, tɛɛgtii mɛntii t dan n fuur lee.»
40013034	Yeesua da bɔɦɔɔ nidba gwɛɛtii mɛntii n nawdlamn. Ĥà da kpaa bɔɦɔɔ-ba tiit yem l` kpaɦ n nawdlamn.
40013035	Ĥà da ɦɛna welee na gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta nn da bed weem daa tii riir t´ noor ɦɛn, tii nnii na: D` kee d` bɔɦɔɔm-ba gwɛɛt n nawdlamn. D` kee d` reem kpɛŋkpɛɦgan gwɛɛt, lɔg t´ manna l` mɛnguu reem goor kakeɦnan jana tii ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba.
40013036	Lee wen, Yeesua t saa nidfigm, n kulii haaga. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ree-t dikaɦtɔgiitgu ban da bodr dikaɦbuudr huuga kuu nawdlam kɔtɔd.»
40013037	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ĥii ɦá buud dikaɦbuudr wii, wii nnii Nida Budaaga.
40013038	Koogu ɦan buud kù ni kuu, kuu nnii tant ɦɛn nidba. Dikaɦbuudr ɦan buud dii, dii nnii Saŋgband huraant nidba. Dikaɦtɔgiitguu nnii Kunida reba.
40013039	Rafeed ɦá buud dikaɦtɔgiitgu wii, wii nnii Kunida. Dikaɦlɔg̈b nnii tant diɦm goor, l´ saa dikaɦlɔgdba nnii saŋgbantumtba.
40013040	Wo ban baal dikaɦtɔgiitt ka lɔɔla-t boglamn lee, welee nnii ln nan ta ba l` bɛm tant diɦm goor.
40013041	Nida Budaaga nan tamna kà tumtba, bà baal Saŋgband huraantn biiba bá ɦɛna volba lotra fubɛɦgan bee, n bá ɦɛna bɛɦgu bee,
40013042	bà lɔɔlg-ba taabuugu boglawiilmn. Reekan nnii ban nan ba bà kom ka duum bà nyina.
40013043	Lee wen, l` saa biiba bá vala Saŋgband bee, bà ŋmɛluum bá Sa huraantn wo muunu dela. Ka n` ba n tobɦa, n` kewlg hɔm!»
40013044	«Saŋgbambiimn huraant ta tɔna kɛgt ban kpɛɦdr koogu kuugun tii. Nidɦii t dan n tud t´ jugun, l´ ɦɛm-wu lamɛɛgu biii, ɦá lilm-t kpɛɦdrb n san n gweedm want ɦan da ba n tii mɛntii, n daɦm kooguu.
40013045	«Saŋgbambiimn huraant ta tɔna yagyaglt ɦà bag bɛɛrm laalm wii.
40013046	Ĥá wen yu miim m` ba daɦt kɔdii, ɦá san n gweedm want ɦan da ba n tii mɛntii, n daɦm-m.
40013047	«Saŋgbambiimn huraant ta tɔna bɛdb ban kɔɦda nyaamn, b´ moogm ɦɔlii jugu jugu bii.
40013048	Ka ɦɔlii t hu b` keɦee, ɦɔlii moogdba t ree-b gbiir ɦɛn, n kad n baalm ɦɔlhii, n lo hɔmii bà furian, n vaa hí kpaɦ hɔm hii.
40013049	Welee nnii ln nan ta ba l` bɛm tant diɦm goor. Saŋgbantumtba nan ba bà ro nidbɛɦba n bayen, nidhɔmba n bayen,
40013050	bà lɔɔlg nidbɛɦbee taabuugu boglawiilmn. Reekan nnii ban nan ba bà kom ka duum bà nyina.»
40013051	Yeesua t gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ɦomra l` mɛnguu kɔtɔd?» Bá leed na: «Ĥiin, t` ɦomran.»
40013052	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tii lee, baɦlb weriit nnii ɦá miig saŋgbambiimn huraant gwɛɛt wii, welee nnii ɦan boo haar tiiɦii ɦà ɦɛna ɦá buunin dikaɦkwɛɛnt n dikaɦkpeemt wii.»
40013053	Yeesua nn gwɛɛl nawdlamii l´ diɦ lee, ɦá vid
40013054	n kulii ɦá kɔrgu. Reekan, ɦá jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun n ka weraa gwɛɛt. L´ ɦɛm nidba bá da ba kan bee mɛmbee yɔlaa. Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ĥà mir tee rarmnminaa? ¿Ĥà ɦer lan n ka ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛbnbinaa?
40013055	¿Lag wii nnii kafinta kwɛɛla? ¿Lag Maarii nnii ɦá nya? ¿Lag ɦá nyakwɛɛlba nnii Yakoobwu n Yoosɛfwu n Simoonwu n nan Yuuda?
40013056	¿L´ saa ɦá nyabɛɛrba kpaa ba t` huuga? ¿Ĥà mir tee gemmntntina mɛntii?»
40013057	Tii kaa nnii ban da lag n ka bo na bà kir Saŋgband. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Bà vala gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwu baatea, gwɛntaɦ, ɦii kpaa vala-wu ɦá kɔrgun, ɦayen ɦà teelba mɔmba ta kpaa vala-wu.»
40013058	Wo ban da kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim lee, ɦá ka ba ɦe kan hoolgu kɔd.
40014001	L´ vuuguu, Galilee gomn Ĥerooda t ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt.
40014002	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba na: «Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsn! Ĥà himtg kuumn n ka neer. Tii nnii ɦan ba n gemmnt ka ɦɛna hoolgu.»
40014003	Biilm, Ĥerooda mɔma da sira wad na bá mug Yohanɛɛs bà boow-wu bà riw-wu sarga. Ĥà da ɦera welee Filfa fɔg Ĥeroodyaada kaa,
40014004	l´ kɔtɔd na Yohanɛɛsa da bɔɦɔɔ Ĥerood na: «L` ba si huru na v` soɦdg v` maara fɔg v` mad.»
40014005	Ĥerooda da bagl na bá ku Yohanɛɛsa, ka ŋmɛta ka sol Yuudaa tiiba fobɛɦgu, blaɦb kaa bá mɛmbee da bɔɦɔɔ na wii nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta.
40014006	L´ dan n ɦɛm na Ĥerooda maadb goor kasant taann, nidba kɔd t daan ɦaa na bà di diit. Ĥeroodyaada bɛɛra t ham bá nɔngan, l´ ɦɛm Ĥeroodwu lamɛɛgu biii.
40014007	Ĥá foorm na ɦà ba ɦà to-wu bii ɦan ba ɦà gbaam-wu bii mɛmbii.
40014008	Ĥá nya t baɦl-wu, ɦá san n bɔɦɔɔ Ĥerood na: «To-ma nnaɦreen Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa jugu sumtɛluugan!»
40014009	Ĥan bed-wu welee lee, l´ jaarŋ-wu kɔd. Wo ɦan da fɛtg foorb nidba ɦan da hoɦ kasant man bee nɔngan lee, ɦá saa n saɦm wad na bá to-wu Yohanɛɛsa jugu.
40014010	Ĥan sir wad lee, n tom ɦii, ɦá san sargan n git Yohanɛɛsa jugu,
40014011	n lo-ku sumtɛluugan, n ŋmɛtgn n to bɛɛrwii, wii t soɦd-ku n san ta to ɦá nya.
40014012	Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦom welee, n daan n lɔgm-wu n san n kuur. Ban kuur-wu lee, n san n bɔɦɔɔ Yeesuwu bii b` gɛtg bii.
40014013	Yeesua nn ɦomr gwɛɛtii lee, n jib kpiirgu n nyab, n san riikan ɦii kan kpaɦ ree. Nidba t ɦom, n rorm bá tigan hiinu hiinu, n tag ɦá kaa nakpai ka kagraa nyaam.
40014014	Ĥá wen red kpiirguu nii, n tud nidfigm ɦɛn, l` hɛɦr nyaam nyaam. Ĥigm t ɦɛm-wu biii. Ĥá baɦ n ka gbaadaa bà bɛɦtiiba.
40014015	Jabr t jab, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kaalaŋankena ba kpamloŋun, muunu t ta lɔɔ. Saa nidbee bà san kɔrnin bà daɦ diit bà di!»
40014016	Ĥá leed-ba na: «L` kpaa gbaama na bá kuliim. Si-n-ba diit n` mɔmba bà di!»
40014017	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «T` mada nnaɦ kpooni ɦinu n ɦɔlii hireɦ n jaɦ'.»
40014018	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Daan-n-ma n wantii!»
40014019	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá saɦm nidfigmii wad na bá kad moot ɦɛn. Lee, ɦá lɔgm kpooni ɦinuɦii n ɦɔlii hireɦhii, n vii ɦá nɔnga n faaga ka seeŋa Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b. L´ saa, ɦá gbeɦm kpoonɦii n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, bá raarm nidfigmii.
40014020	Baawena t jum n togm, gbeɦa t tɔlm. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t hugl furia kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ n lag n nyab n.
40014021	Bá da diir bee, daba da taara wo ruuni ɦinu, bà ba kaal fɔg̈ba n bii.
40014022	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t heɦ yelmaa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá jib kpiirgun, bà mɛwdg nyaam bal ɦà nɔngan, wii mɔma hɔd saɦ na ɦà seeŋ nidfigmii.
40014023	Ĥá wen seeŋ-ba bá lɔɔm huruu, ɦá juul duuga kiiga ɦɛn na ɦà bɛm ɦayen ka seeŋa Saŋgband. Nyingu t dan n nyin ɦà la ba kan ɦayen.
40014024	Lee wen, kpiirgu kuu t santg n tant, nyaalm wada t ka vida ka tawdra-ku, ka jaŋla-ku, blaɦb kaa, ɦam da fugl ka tuuga-ba.
40014025	Kɔdai nn dan n ka jaaw lee, Yeesua t ka kedaa n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba weenn ka nawdra nyaalm ɦɛn.
40014026	Bá wen nyan ɦà nawdra nyaalm ɦɛn ka kena, fobɛɦgu t kuum-ba, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na kuumn n baɦ n ka mɔɔ fobɛɦŋmɛi.
40014027	Yelmaa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Bɛm-n ŋmeenm! Mann. Daa solm-n fobɛɦgu!»
40014028	Lee wen, Fetra t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, ka l` ba na venn biilmii, si wad na mà daan v` man nakpai nyaalm ɦɛn!»
40014029	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Daana!» Fetra t rorm kpiirgun n ka ta nawdra nyaalm ɦɛn ka kedaa ɦà man.
40014030	Ĥá wen nyan ɦam t fugdg kimm, fobɛɦgu t mug-wu. Ĥá baɦ n ka ŋmiɦaa nyaalmn ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga ka toola na: «Berma, soɦdg-ma!»
40014031	Yelmaa, Yeesua t teed ɦá nuɦu n mug-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nyaan lan nnii v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba tutugŋa! ¿Nigaa na laa?»
40014032	Bareɦdrbee t jib kpiirgun, ɦam t jeɦnt.
40014033	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá da ba kun bee, bá gbaɦnt dind Yeesua nɔngan n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga biilm.»
40014034	Lee, bá fɛl nyaam mɛwdgm n taai Genesarɛɛt tantn.
40014035	Tantii tiiba t miig Yeesua, n toolgii taa bá tigɦee mɛnɦeen na ɦá daann. Nidba t lɔgm bɛɦtiiba mɛmba n daan n ɦà man,
40014036	n ka jowdra-wu na ɦá saa na bɛɦtiibee tad n ɦà dimgu noor mɔmr. Bá da tadaa n dn bee mɛmbee, l` gbaadaa-ba kpaalaa.
40015001	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba da vidg Yerusalɛm n daan Yeesua man, n gbaam-wu na:
40015002	«¿Ben kaa nnii v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn kpaa vala baɦlb t` yandaba nn da to-t bii? Bà kpaa nita bá niɦi wo kowt nn gbaama lee saɦ n jum bá diit.»
40015003	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nen lee, ¿ben kaa nnii nn ɦɛna n̈yen n` kowt ɦɛn ka kir Saŋgband baɦlb?
40015004	Biilm, Saŋgband beda na: Valg v` sawu n v` nya! Lee na: Ĥii ɦá suudg ɦá sa laa ɦá nya wii, l` ba na bá kuu-wu!
40015005	Nen lee, nii weraa na ka nida t ree n bɔɦɔɔ ɦá sa laa ɦá nya na: ‟Mà kɛgt mà nn ba mà lɔg mà tɔrg-v n tii, t` kitg Saŋgband kowt want”
40015006	l` kpaɦ na welee nidwii ta tɔrg ɦà sa laa ɦá nya. Nn ɦɛna nnii ka kuu Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka weraa taa n` yandaba kowt.
40015007	Rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya da ba n gobiint na ɦà ree Saŋgband noon gwɛɛt ɦà biir l` hɛl-n na: Saŋgband beda na:
40015008	‟Tigrndina jeeŋla-ma d` noon n jaɦ', d´ kwɛɛwr nii, d` kpaa nyɔɦr-ma.
40015009	Kowt nidbambena nn ɦɛna-ma tii kpaa tɔn. Bà weraa kowt nidba nn kudr tii, wo l´ biir na Saŋgband baɦlbn.”
40015010	Tii kaann, Yeesua t hoɦ nidfigm n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kewlg-n n` ɦom gwɛɛtntina!
40015011	Lag bii b` jiba nida noon bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦwu Saŋgband nɔngan. Bii b` rɛna ɦà noon bii, bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa.»
40015012	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦl bayen n wú n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Miil na gwɛɛt vn bed tii weer Farisii tiiba?»
40015013	Ĥá leed na: «Tiib mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii nn ba hoow bii, bà nan vɔda-b.
40015014	Saa-n-ba! Bee nnii kimtjoomba. Ka joomɦii dud ɦà joomtuura, ¿bareɦdrbee kpaɦ bà san bà lɔɔ vadgu ni?»
40015015	Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ree-t nawdlamii kɔtɔd!»
40015016	Ĥá leed na: «¿Ta nii mɛɦ', n` nyi ban ta na n` ɦomaa?
40015017	¿N` kpaa ɦum na bii b` jiba nida noon bii mɛmbii, b` keda ɦà raawtn, n ŋmɛt n rorm ɦá gbanu nii?
40015018	L´ saa bii b` ror nida noon bii, b` mana ɦà kwɛɛwrn, bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa Saŋgband nɔngan.
40015019	Lee, diilbɛɦa mana nida kwɛɛwrn, n ka hɛɦr-wu na ɦá kuum nidba, na ɦá ɦɛm yaruub, na ɦá bɛm nantelmt, na ɦá bam, na ɦá bɔɦɔɔm gokaat n volba jugun, ka ta su volba.
40015020	Bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa. Lee, ka ɦii t di diit ka ba nit wo kowt nn gbaama lee, welee kpaa ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa Saŋgband nɔngan.»
40015021	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t vid n lɔɔm huru n san Tiir n Sidoon tantn.
40015022	Reekan, Kanaɦaan fɔgɦii t vid n san ɦá man, n ka toola na: «Berma, Daviida yakiiga, nyaan mà kunyɔŋu! Kunidɦii tagda mà bufɔka kaa ka jaarŋa-ka biii.»
40015023	Ĥá ka ba leedg-wu lii. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Voo-wu! Ĥà tagda t` kaa ka hawla t` tobɦa.»
40015024	Ĥá leed na: «Bà tamn-ma na mà kpaɦaa Yisraɦeel tiiba n jaɦ'. Bà boo fɛi ɦí bɔd ɦii.»
40015025	Ĥan bed welee lee, fɔg̈wii t la san, n gbaɦnt dind ɦá nɔngan, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, tɔrg-ma!»
40015026	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` kpaɦ hɔm na bá lɔg bii diit bà vaa gwɛi.»
40015027	Fɔg̈wii t ŋmɛl-wu na: «Berma, biilm, beda tii nnii. Gwɛntaɦ lee, gwɛi jul yɔyɔra ɦá tɛɦra hì tiiba tiŋa ɦee.»
40015028	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Taa nya, v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim berŋn! Bii vn bag bii ba b` ɦe b´ jugun.» Ĥan ɦeewr fɔg̈wii n bɔɦɔɔb lee, l´ gbaad bufɔkee yelmaa.
40015029	Yeesua t nyab kan, n san Galilee nyaam maaru, n kot duuga kiiga ɦɛn n kad.
40015030	Nidfigm t daan nyaam nyaam, ka mad kparuuba, n joomba, n ɦajammba, n tantaagumba, n bɛɦtivolba kɔd. Bá lo-ba ɦá nɔngan, ɦá gbaad-ba.
40015031	Nidba nn nyan tantaagumba gwɛɛla, l´ gbaad ɦajammba, kparuuba ked hɔm, joomba ta yu lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa, bá ka nyɔka Yisraɦeel Saŋgband.
40015032	Yeesua t hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` ɦɛna-ma ɦigm n nidbambena. Jana nnii goora ɦataɦ ban tagd mà kaa, ka kpaa ju bii. Mà kpaɦ mà saa-ba na bá kuliim welee, giilb ba b` fad-ba. Lee, bà lotr hurun ka kulaa.»
40015033	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam-wu na: «Kpamloŋunkunan, ¿tee nnii tn ba t` nyaan diit t` doow nidfigmnmina?»
40015034	Ĥá ŋmɛl-ba na: «¿N` ba n kpooni ɦilaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Ĥilbleɦ n ta ɦɔlbii hilanii.»
40015035	Lee wen, ɦá saɦm nidfigmii wad na bá kad tiŋan.
40015036	L´ saa ɦá lɔgm kpooni ɦilbleɦii n ɦɔlhii, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n gbeɦm wantii n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, bee t raarm l´ mɛnguu nidfigmii.
40015037	Baawena t jum n togm. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t kolm gbeɦa ɦá tɛl ɦee, l´ hugl futɛtɛɦt tlbleɦt keɦ', bá kulii n.
40015038	Nidba bá da diir diit bee, daba da taara wo ruuni ɦinaa, ka kpaa kaal fɔg̈ba n bii.
40015039	L´ tog, Yeesua t seeŋ nidfigmii na bá kul hɔm, wii t jib kpiirgun n san Magadaan kɔrgun.
40016001	Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba t nyuɦ Yeesu na bà feer-wu kutukŋa, n gbaam-wu na ɦá ɦe hoolgu kuugu l` werii na ɦá gemmnt rɛn Saŋgband man.
40016002	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Jabr ɦɛn, muunu nn lɔɔ lee, n´ yum naamɔlgu, n bɔɦɔɔ na su toŋu kee kù bɛm hɔm.
40016003	L´ saa ɦateekwɛɛn weem, ka muunu rɛna ka ba siii, l` ŋmɛta ka ta ba bimmii, n´ ka bɔɦɔɔ na jana toŋu ba kù ni saaga. Reekan lee, n` yul toŋu beeb, ka bo n miig b´ ba b` gɛtg bii. Lee, gwɛɦŋa vuugunkuna nii, n` yul waari ɦiiɦi gwɛntaɦaa, n` kpaa bea na n` ɦom ɦí kɔtɔd.
40016004	Goona nidba nn la ba bɛɦgu ka gwid Saŋgband kaawr lee, bá ka gbaama na bà nyaan hoolgu kuugu. Tii lee, bà kpaɦ bà nyaan kuugu ka l` kpaɦ na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yonaasa reku n jaɦ'.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n saa-ba n nyab.
40016005	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba da mɛwdg nyaam bal ka hɔŋ na bà lɔg diit.
40016006	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Kiig-n n` diir noon hɔm! Mad-n n̈yen hɔm n Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba kpoonu ragr!»
40016007	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t diil n bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ĥà gwɛɛl welee na ¿tn ba lɔg kpoonu laa?»
40016008	Ĥá ɦom ban bɔɦɔɔ lee n gbaam-ba na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn diila na nn kpaɦ n kpoonu? Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba tutugŋa lea!
40016009	¿N` la ban ɦom nnii? ¿N` kpaa deeda kpooni ɦinuɦi man da gbeɦr n dɔm nidba ruuni ɦinuɦi ɦii ɦɛnii? ¿N` kpaa ta deeda furia nn da hugl n kulii n ɦee ɦɛnii?
40016010	L´ saa, ¿n` la kpaa deeda kpooni ɦilbleɦi man da gbeɦr n dɔm nidba ruuni ɦinaa ɦii ɦɛnii? ¿N` ta kpaa deeda futɛtɛɦt nn da hugl n kulii n tii jugu ɦɛnii?
40016011	¿Lan nnii nn kpaa ɦum na lag kpoonu gwɛɛt nnii mà nn bɔɦɔɔm-nii? Mad-n n̈yen hɔm n Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba kpoonu ragr!»
40016012	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦom na ɦan ba gwɛɛl n ban l` hɛl ragr ban ɦɛna n kpoonu dii, na yid ɦan baɦlm-ba na bá mad bayen n Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba gwɛɛt ban weraa tii.
40016013	Yeesua t vid n san kɔrni ɦí nyɔɦr n Sesaree ɦiin. Sesaree kɔrguu, huraa Filfa da mɛɦra-ku. Reekan, ɦá gbaam ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿Nidba bɔɦɔɔ Nida Budaaga gwɛɛt na kee nnii wenii?»
40016014	Bá leed-wu na: «Biiba bɔɦɔɔ na ven nnii Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa, volba na Ĥeliin, ta volba na Yeremiin laa na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtvolɦiin.»
40016015	Ĥá ŋmɛt n gbaam-ba na: «Nen de, ¿nii bɔɦɔɔ na man nnii wenii?»
40016016	Simoon ban ta hoɦ na Fetrwii t leed na: «Ven nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii. Dii neeran. Ven nnii d´ Budaaga.»
40016017	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Simoon, Yonaasa kwɛɛla, ven nnii lamɛɛgu tia. Lag nida ree gwɛɛtii n werii-v. Mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii ree gwɛɛtii n werii-v.
40016018	Man lee, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-v na ven nnii Fetra, l´ kɔtɔd na ‟fiigu”, maa mà mɛɦ mà kpaturu fiiguu ɦɛn, l` saa kuum mɔmm kpaɦ m` bɛm n gemmnt tiit ɦù ɦɛn.
40016019	Maa mà to-v saŋgbambiimn huraant fiid noor saaba. Bii vn ba v` kirm tant ɦɛn bii mɛmbii, bà ta kirm-b saŋgbambiimn. L´ saa bii vn ba v` saɦm huru tant ɦɛn bii mɛmbii, bà ta saɦm-b huru saŋgbambiimn.»
40016020	Tii n t` kaann, ɦá baɦl ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá daa biir ɦiiwu felaɦ na wii nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.
40016021	Lee wen n jaɦ, Yeesua t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba gwɛɛt wiingan, ka ta kpaa kpɛɦdra bii. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ba na mà san Yerusalɛm, mà di kunyɔŋu kɔd, kpalmmba, n gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba niɦin. Bà kee bà kuu-ma, l` saa gotaɦrd goor, mà himtg.»
40016022	Fetra t ree-wu kpamga, n baɦ n ka kpal-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, Saŋgband daa saa na welee gwɛɛtii taan v` ɦɛn felaɦ'! Bii kpaɦ b` ɦee-v.»
40016023	Ĥan bed welee lee, Yeesua t bid ɦayen n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nyab nnaɦ', v` san vɔkun n man, Saatan! Lakla-ma mà hurun. Kpaa diila wo Saŋgband, diila wo nida.»
40016024	Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Ka ɦii bag na ɦà tagd mà kaa, l` ba na ɦá gwid ɦá ret, ɦà bigd ɦá dabragr ka tagd mà kaa.
40016025	Biilm, ɦá bag na ɦà soɦdg ɦà neerm wii, ɦà nan bɔraa-m. L´ saa ɦá bɔrii ɦá neerm mà kaa wii, ɦà nan soɦda-m.
40016026	Ka nida t yuuŋ tant ɦɛn kwɛgdm mɛnm n bɔrii ɦá neerm, ¿ɦà way bee? ¿Bii bee na nida lɔg ɦà daɦ ɦá neerm?
40016027	Biilm, Nida Budaaga nan kena kà Sa nyɔkbn ká n saŋgbantumtba, lee wen kà faad baawena ka kɛɛmla n ɦà ɦɛb.
40016028	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bá bee nnaɦreen bee huuga, biiba nan kpaa ku ka ban nyaan Nida Budaaga kena ka ba ká huraantn.»
40017001	Goora ɦaroond kaann, Yeesua t lɔgm Fetrwu n Yakoobwu n ɦà teel Yohanɛɛsa, wú n ban bá kot duvɔgr diir jugun, n ka ba kan bayen.
40017002	Ĥá tet beeb bá nɔngan. Ĥá nɔnga t baɦ n ka ŋmɛdwa wo muunu dela, ɦá dimt t feent wasaɦ'.
40017003	Yelmaa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee t yum Mohiiswu n Ĥelia, bá n Yeesu l` gwɛɛla.
40017004	Lee wen, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma, l` ba hɔm na t` bɛm nanaɦ'. Ka v` sɔkla mà fil nanaɦ sugt ttaɦ': venwu kuyen, Mohiiswu kuyen, Ĥeliiwu kuyen.»
40017005	Ĥan da ɦeewr n gwɛɛlb lee, wadr diir t hoɦntn ka ŋmɛdwa n fiid-ba. Noor diir t rɛn wadriin ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wunwii nnii mà Budaaga. Mà sɔkla-ka biii. Mà nyaag̈bii mɛmbii kulaa kà jugun. Ĥom-n n kan!»
40017006	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn ɦomr noorii gwɛɛla lee, fobɛɦgu t kuum-ba, bá luurm tiŋan, n baɦl bá nɔnii n tant.
40017007	Yeesua t nyuɦ bá man, n tarm bá ɦɛn, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Vidg-n! Daa solm-n fobɛɦgu!»
40017008	Lee wen, bá vii bá nɔnii n yum Yeesua ba ɦayen, ɦii ta kpaɦ ɦà man.
40017009	Ban da hoɦnta duur lee, ɦá baɦl-ba na: «Daa biir-n ɦiiwu bii nn nyan bii kakeɦnan Nida Budaaga man, man nan himta kuumn mà neer lee wen!»
40017010	Lee, bá gbaam-wu na: «¿Ben kaa nnii baɦlb weriitba nn bɔɦɔɔ na l` ba na Ĥelia daan saɦaa?»
40017011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Biilm, Ĥelia ba ɦà daan ɦà lo want mɛnt t´ tagan.
40017012	Lee, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, Ĥelia fɛtg daanm, nidba t ka ba miig-wu, n ɦɛm-wu wo ban sɔkl lee. Ta welee nnii ban ba bà ta ɦe Nida Budaaga mɔmga daddad.»
40017013	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦom na ɦà bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛtii l` hɛl Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa.
40017014	Ban san n taai nidfigm man lee, nidɦii t nyuɦ Yeesua, n gbaɦnt dind ɦá nɔngan,
40017015	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, nyaan mà buga ɦigm! Kà kuul kpikpiir, l` via-ka welee hɛngu, kà lɔɔdra boglamn n nyaalmn.
40017016	Mà lɔgra-ka n san-ka n v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba man, bá ka ba bee n gbaad-ka.»
40017017	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nen, nidbɛɦba bá kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nen! ¿L` ba na mà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan tedaa? ¿L` ba na mà jum-n n kwɛɛwr kakeɦnan tedaa? Daan-n-ma n bugee!»
40017018	Ĥá gwɛɛl n kunidwu n daat. Kunidwii t rorm bugee ni, l´ gbaad-ka yelmaa.
40017019	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ-wu, wú n ban bá ka ba bayen. Lee wen, bá gbaam-wu na: «¿Ben ɦer le, t´ ka ba bee na t` vo kunidwii bugee nii?»
40017020	Ĥá leed-ba na: «N` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ba tutugmbiim kpaalaa. Tii kaa nnii nn ba bee n voom kunidwii bugee ni. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ka nn bɛm n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim m´ berŋ wo gumsarbiir delaa, bii nn kpaɦ b` bɛm-n n gemm. Nn ba n` bee n` biir duugankena na: ‟Vidg nnaɦ v` san v` viil vyen laɦaa!” Kà ta ɦe welee. [
40017021	Gwɛntaɦaa, seeŋb n noor bɔb n jaɦ' tɔra na bá bee bà ree kunidbambena].»
40017022	Goor diir, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t kpogl taa bá mɛmbee Galilee tantn, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Bà kee bà mug Nida Budaaga man, bà taag-ma nidba niɦin,
40017023	bee kuu-ma. L` saa gotaɦrd goor, mà himtg kuumn.» Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, himaɦr t mug-ba biii.
40017024	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t taai Kafarnahuum kɔrgun. Reekan, Saŋgband haar lambɦu soɦdgtba t nyuɦ Fetra man, n gbaam-wu na: «¿N` Berma faada Saŋgband haar lambɦu?»
40017025	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ĥiin! Ĥà faadan.» Ĥan leedg-ba welee lee, n san n ka jiba haaga, Yeesua t foog n gbaam-wu na: «Simoon, ¿diila na lan lambɦu gwɛɛt? ¿Teba faad tantntina ɦɛn huraamba lambɦu? ¿Bá haya tiiba laa, saanba le?»
40017026	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Saanba.» Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «L` ba hɔm, l` kpaɦ na haar tiiba faadm.
40017027	Gwɛntaɦaa, t` kpaa bag na l´ weer nidbee. Tii lee, san v` lɔɔlg ɦinga nyaamn v` mug ɦɔlga. Ĥɔlga vn kee v` mug nooga kee, v` wiig kà noor v` nyaan lig̈bkpaŋ̈m, m` ba m` ta na bá faad mà lambɦu, n ta v` reɦu mɛɦ', v` lɔg-m v` faad.»
40018001	L´ wendii, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ Yeesua man, n gbaam-wu na: «¿Wen ba bermwu saŋgbambiimn huraantn l` yata?»
40018002	Ĥá hoɦ bukaaga kiiga n jeɦl-ka bá nɔngan,
40018003	n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ka n` ba lagii n̈yen n kit wo bukai, n` nan kpaɦ n` jib saŋgbambiimn huraantn.
40018004	Ĥii ɦá hoɦlg ɦayen n tiŋa n kit wo bugankena dela wii, wii nnii ɦá ba bermtn l` yata saŋgbambiimn huraantn.
40018005	L´ saa, ɦii ɦà soɦda bukaaga kiiga kà boo kengee mà hidrn wii, mà mɔm nnii ɦan soɦda.
40018006	Ka kaaba biiba tia mà gwɛɛt, nidɦii t werii bá ni ɦiiwu hurbɛɦu, ɦá gwid Saŋgband kaawr, l` mag n wun na bá lilg neer ɦá lakpandn bà lɔɔlg-wu nyaam kilmgun.»
40018007	«Kunyɔŋu ben reku nnanaɦ' tant ɦɛn na fɔrm tɔr m` hɛɦr nidba ka lɔɔla-ba bɛɦgu nii! Biilm, fɔrmii ba m` bɛm welee kakeɦnan. Lee, ɦá kena n welee fɔrmii wii, kunyɔŋu ba kù jib-wu.
40018008	«Ka v` nuɦu, laa v` nakpaŋa fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` gitg v` nuɦuu, laa v` nakpaŋee, v` kɔɦdg vɔkun. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` jib neerm mɔmmn ka ba n nuɦu ɦuyen, laa nakpaŋa kayen, n vn ba v` jib boglam m` bee kakeɦnan miin, ka ba n niɦi ɦiriɦ laa nakpai hireɦ'.
40018009	Ka v` nɔmb ta fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` lugdg-b v` kɔɦdg-b vɔkun. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` jib neerm mɔmmn ka ba n nɔmkperb, n ban ba bà lɔɔlg-v taabuugu boglamn v` ba n niini ɦiriɦ lee.
40018010	«Mad-n n̈yen! Daa nyaɦaam-n kaabambena huuga ɦayenɦa mɔma! Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na kaabee saŋgbantumtba ba saŋgbambiimn ka jeɦr mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii nɔngan kakeɦnan. [
40018011	Biilm, Nida Budaaga daan na kà daɦ bá bɔd bee juuni.]
40018012	«¿N` diila na lan gwɛɛtntina ɦɛnii? Ka nidɦii ba n fɛi lɛmu, kuyengu t boorm, ¿ɦà kpaɦ ɦà saa fɛi kwɛɛwɛɦ n ɦiwɛɦ ɦí tɛl ɦii duuga ɦɛn ɦà san kù bɔd kuu bag̈b?
40018013	Ka ɦá nyaan kuu, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n biilm na ɦá ka nyaaga kú man l` yata kwɛɛwɛɦ n ɦiwɛɦ ɦí ba bɔr ɦii man.
40018014	Ta yenmii, n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii kpaa bag na kaabee huuga ɦii bɔr felaɦ'.»
40018015	«Ka v` teela t koɦl-v n gwɛɛt, san v` nyaan-wu, v` werii-wu ɦà bɛɦgu, v´ n wun bareɦ'. Ka ɦá kewlg n vnaa, daɦra ɦà jugu.
40018016	Lee, ka ɦá kir n ka ba ɦom n vn, v` hoɦ teel ɦayen laa bareɦ v` hewl v` ɦɛn, ka bo na l´ tag wo ln ɦɔd Wadbuudgan na: Ka gwɛɛt tiit t´ ɦeaa, l` ba na nidba bareɦ laa bataɦba nyaan-t, bà ɦig t` ɦɛn.
40018017	Reekan, ka ɦá ta kir n ka ba ɦom n banaa, v` san v` doolg gwɛɛtii kpaturu nɔngan. Ka ɦá ta kir n ka ta ba ɦom n kpaturɦuu, v` saa v` geem-wu wo nid ɦá kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim wii, laa lambɦu soɦdgta.
40018018	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bii nn ba n` kir tant ɦɛn bii mɛmbii, bà ta kir-b saŋgbambiimn. Bii nn ba n` si huru tant ɦɛn bii mɛmbii, bà ta si-b huru saŋgbambiimn.
40018019	«Mà ta bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ka n` huuga nidba bareɦba t ɦom n taa tantntina ɦɛn n ka seeŋa ka gbaama ban sɔkla bii, mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii ba ɦà to-ba-b.
40018020	Biilm, ka nidba bareɦ laa bataɦba t kpogl taa mà hidr kaa, mà bɛm bá huuga.»
40018021	Lee wen, Fetra t nyuɦ Yeesua, n gbaam-wu na: «Berma, ka mà teela koɦla-ma n gwɛɛt hɛruɦ', ¿mà waaliim-wu kakeɦnan tɔmb mlaa? ¿Mà waaliim-wu kakeɦnan tɔmb mlbleɦm laa?»
40018022	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ĥaai! Mà kpaa bɔɦɔɔ-v na kakeɦnan tɔmb mlbleɦm, mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na kwɛɛlbleɦ kakeɦnan tɔmb mlbleɦ'.
40018023	«Tii nnii, saŋgbambiimn huraant nn tɔn wo huraaɦii nn da hoɦ ɦà ŋmɛɛɦeedba, na bá werii-wu ɦà kwɛgdm ban sug m´ ɦɛn mii jugu.
