40018024	Bá wen baɦaa, bá daan-wu n bá ni ɦii, wiilaɦ t dii-wu fɔmr lig̈biir rubermi lɛmu.
40018025	Wo fɔmtiiwii nn da kpaɦ n bii na ɦà ŋmɛlg welee lig̈biirii lee, bermwii t bɔɦɔɔ na bá gweedm-wu, bà ta gweedm ɦà fɔg̈wu n ɦà bii, n nan want ɦan ba n tii mɛntii, ka bo na l´ bee l` faad fɔmrii.
40018026	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii t luurm ɦá dina ɦɛn ɦá bermwii nɔngan, n ka jobla ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Dii-ma n kwɛɛwr! Mà bag mà faad-v l´ mɛnguu.”
40018027	Bermwii t yum ɦá ɦigm, n saɦm-wu fɔmrii, n saa-wu na ɦá kuliim.
40018028	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii t rorm n taŋ n ɦà ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurɦii, wii t dii-wu lig̈biir ruuni lɛmu. Ĥá togd ɦá lakpand, n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Faad-ma mà fɔmr vn diir-ma dii!”
40018029	Ĥá tuurwii t luurm ɦá nakpai kwɛɛn, n ka jobla-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Dii-ma n kwɛɛwr! Mà yerii mà faad-v.”
40018030	Ĥá ka ba tii. Ĥan ba tii lee, n wed bá riw-wu sarga, na ɦá bɛm kan kakeɦnan ɦá daa faad ɦà fɔmrii.
40018031	Ĥá ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurmba t yum welee, l´ weer-ba biii, bá san n bɔɦɔɔ bá bermwu bii b` gɛtg bii mɛmbii.
40018032	Lee wen, wii t tom bá daan-wu n ŋmɛɛɦeedwii, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Ŋmɛɛɦeedtalmgu ven, ¿ɦn ba jobl-ma na mà saa-v v` fɔmr? ¿Man ba si-v-dn?
40018033	¿Ln ta kpaɦm na v` ta nyaan v` tuura ɦigm wo mà nn nyan v` ɦigm leen?”
40018034	Bermwii t lo kwɛɛwweerga biii, n wed bá riw ŋmɛɛɦeedwii sarga, na bá gbum-wu kakeɦnan ɦá daa faad ɦà fɔmrii mɛndii.»
40018035	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t hewl na: «Welee nnii mà Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii nn nan ta ɦɛna n` huuga baaben tia, ka ɦalaɦ kpaa waalaa ɦà teelwu ɦà bɛɦgu n ɦà kwɛɛwr mɛnd.»
40019001	Yeesua nn da fɛlg gwɛɛtii bɔɦɔɔb lee, n nyab Galilee tantn, n san Yuudee tantn, ka tagaa n kɔrni ɦì ba Yɔrdaan kol bal ɦiin.
40019002	Nidfigm t tag ɦá kaa, ɦá gbaad bɛɦtiiba ban da daan n ɦà man bee.
40019003	Farisii tiiba t nyuɦ ɦá man, na bà fɔrii-wu, n gbaam-wu na: «¿T` baɦlb saɦl daawwu huru na ɦá bee ɦà vo ɦà fɔg̈wu baa gotet kaa?»
40019004	Ĥá leed na: «¿N` ban kaal bii ln ɦɔd Wadbuudgan biin? L` ɦɔda kà ni na: Weem kɔtɔdn, want mɛnt Reeta da ree daawwu n fɔga,
40019005	n bɔɦɔɔ na: tii kaa nnii ln ba na daawa riir n ɦayen, ɦà saa ɦà sawu n ɦà nya, wú n ɦà fɔg bà neer taa man, bareɦdrbee bewlg nid ɦayen.
40019006	Welee lee, bà kpaɦ bà ta bɛm nidba bareɦ', bà kitg nid ɦayen. Tii lee, l` kpaɦ na nida radg bii Saŋgband nn kpowlg n taa bii.»
40019007	Farisii tiiba t gbaam-wu na: «Ka l` ba welee de, ¿ben kaa nnii Mohiisa nn da sir huru na ka daawɦii bo na ɦà vo ɦá fɔga, l` ba na ɦá to-wu yaala sadgm wadga saɦ ɦà voo-wii?»
40019008	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Mohiisa da sira-n huru na n` vɔɦd n` fɔg̈ba, l´ kɔtɔd na n` ba tangerm. Weem kɔtɔdn, l` da kpaɦ welee.
40019009	Lee, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, ka daawɦii t vo ɦá fɔga ɦà ba ɦe yaruub, n lɔgm fɔgjeenaa, ɦà kitg yaruutgu.»
40019010	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l` ba na daawa vo ɦá fɔg l` bɛm welee, l` ba hɔm na ɦii daa lɔg fɔga.»
40019011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Daba mɛmba kpaɦ n beer na bà soɦdg welee gwɛɛtii, biiba Saŋgband nn sir beer n jaɦ bee, bee beel bà soɦdg-t.
40019012	Gwɛɛt t´ kewr daba na bá daa lɔgm fɔg̈ba tii, t` ba jugu jugu. Biiba bee, l` ba na bà meedra-ba bà kpaɦ n daat. Volba bee, l` ba na bá nidtuurmba ɦera bá kit dalegmtiiba. L´ saa, volba kir fɔglɔg̈b saŋgbambiimn huraant kaa. Lee, ɦii ɦà ba n beer na ɦà soɦdg gwɛɛtii wii, ɦà soɦdg-t.»
40019013	Nidba biiba da san n bii Yeesua man na ɦá dee hì ɦɛn ɦá niɦi, ɦà seeŋ hì ɦɛn. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka kpal-ba.
40019014	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saa-n bii daan mà man! Daa kewr-n-hi! Nidba bá boo hí dela bee, bee heɦl n saŋgbambiimn huraant.»
40019015	Ĥan bed welee lee, n ɦigii ɦá niɦi hí ɦɛn n nyab kan.
40019016	Nidɦii t nyɔɦl ɦayen n Yeesu n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Ben ba hɔm na mà ɦɛm ka bo na mà bɛm n neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii?»
40019017	Ĥá leed-wu na: «¿L` ɦer lan vn gbaama-ma na ben ba hɔmii? Ĥayenɦa n jaɦ beel hɔm. Ka v` sɔkla na v` jib neerm mɔmmn, valgm Saŋgband baɦlb.»
40019018	Nidwii t gbaam-wu na: «¿Baɦlteb?» Ĥá leed na: « Daa ku nida! Daa yaruum! Daa bam! Daa bɔɦɔɔm gokaat n nidba jugun!
40019019	Valgm v` sawu n v` nya! Sɔklm v` nidtuur wo vn ta sɔkla v` mɔm vyen lee!»
40019020	Kuliigee t leed-wu na: «Mà valg baɦlbii mɛmbii. ¿Ben tɛl na mà ta ɦɛmaa?»
40019021	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka v` bag na v` bɛm hɔmwu kpaalaa, ked v` gweedm vn ba n bii mɛmbii, v` lɔg lig̈biirii v` si kunyɔŋtiiba, lee wen, v` bɛm n kwɛgdbermm saŋgbambiimn. L` saa, v` daan v` tagd mà kaa.»
40019022	Kuliigee wen ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii, n gbɛlŋ, n gɛt ka ked, blaɦb kaa, kà da ba n kɛgt kɔd.
40019023	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, l` ba gemm n kwɛgdm tiiɦii na ɦá jib saŋgbambiimn huraantn.
40019024	Lee, mà ta rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, l` ba gemm n deer na d´ jib n jajawu vadbn. L` ta yatg gemm n kwɛgdm tiiɦii na ɦá jib Saŋgband huraantn.»
40019025	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba wen ɦomr gwɛɛtii, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka l` ba welee, ¿wen t ka ba ɦà bee ɦà daɦ ɦá jugu?»
40019026	Ĥá geed-ba n bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` ba gemm n nida, gwɛntaɦaa, bii kpaɦ gemm n Saŋgband.»
40019027	Lee wen, Fetra t lɔgm gwɛɛlb n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tii gwid l´ mɛnguu kaawr n ka tagd-v. ¿L` kee l` bɛm tenwu n laa?»
40019028	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, Nida Budaaga nn nan kadaa kà huraant jargan kɔrkwɛɛlgun lee, nen kwiɦr n bareɦba nen da tagd-ma nen, n` nan ta ba n` kad huraamba jarii ɦɛn, n` yaa yaagu n Yisraɦeel hui kwiɦr n hireɦhii.
40019029	L` saa, biiba bà nan saa bà haya, laa bá maaba, laa bá nyakwɛɛlba, laa bá nyabɛɛrba, laa bá samba, laa bá nyamba, laa bá bii, laa bá koot mà kaa bee, bà nan soɦda welee tɔmb lɛmu, bà ta jib neerm m` bee kakeɦnan miin.
40019030	Tii lee, biiba bà ba nɔŋrba gwelŋa bee, bá kɔd nan kita kaawrba, l` saa biiba bà ba kaawrba gwelŋa bee, bá kɔd nan kita nɔŋrba.»
40020001	«Biilm, saŋgbambiimn huraant tɔna haar tiiɦii, ɦá red ɦateekwɛɛn weem na ɦà bag ŋmɛgdba ɦà lo ɦà koogun na bá ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b.
40020002	Wú n ban bá ɦom n taa na ɦà ba ɦà faad-ba ruugu gobilmr, lee, ɦá tom-ba ɦá koogun.
40020003	L´ dan n ka waɦda waari ɦiwɛɦ', ɦá rorm n yum volba ba baŋun ka kpaa ɦɛna bii,
40020004	ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: ‟Nen, ta san-n mà koogun n` ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b, mà da mà faad-n bii b` mag bii!”
40020005	Bee t ta san kooguun n ka ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b. Muunu t dan n jeɦnt sɔbb, haar tiiwii t rorm n ɦɛm yenmii. L´ dan n waɦd waari ɦitaɦi jabr ɦɛn ɦá rorm n ta ɦɛm yenmii.
40020006	L´ dan n ka waɦda waari ɦinuɦi jabr ɦɛn ɦá rorm kaawrm n ta yum nidvolba kad baŋun. Ĥá gbaam-ba na: ‟¿L` ɦer lan nn kad goorii mɛndii ka kpaa ɦɛna bii?”
40020007	Bá leed-wu na: ‟Ĥii ba soɦdg-t ŋmɛɛg̈b biibn”. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: ‟L` ba hɔm, nen, ta san-n mà koogun n` ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b!”
40020008	«Jabr t jab, ɦá hoɦ ɦá kark n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Hoɦ ŋmɛgdbee v` baɦ n mà nn soɦdg ŋmɛɛg̈b n kaann bee, v` da v` fɛlg n mà nn soɦdg nooga bee, v` faad baawenwu ɦà lig̈biir!”
40020009	Ban baɦ ŋmɛɛg̈b jabr l` waɦda waari ɦinu bee, bá san ka soɦda ruugu ruugu.
40020010	L´ saa bá nn soɦdg ɦateekwɛɛn nooga bee, bá ka ked ka diila na baa bà soɦdg l` yatg welee, bá ŋmɛt n ka tɔɔ-ba ta ruugu ruugu.
40020011	Bá ka soɦda ruugu ruuguu ka nyeera koogu tiiwii gwɛɛt,
40020012	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Soɦdg ŋmɛgdbambena n kaan, bá ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b waaru ɦuyen n jaɦ', v´ ŋmɛt n faadm-ba wo vn faadr-t lee, l` ba na ŋmɛɛg̈b gira ten, goorii mɛndii t` dɛn muuntantaŋan.”
40020013	Lee wen, ɦá leed bá huuga bilm na: ‟Mà tuura, mà ba koɦl-v n gwɛɛt. Ĥn tii na ba v` ɦe ŋmɛɛg̈b goorii mɛndii v` soɦdg ruugu, ¿laa laa?
40020014	Tii lee, lɔg v` lig̈biir v` nyab kan! Nid man soɦdg ŋmɛɛg̈bn n kaan wunaɦ, man sɔkl na mà faad-wu wo man ta faadr-v lee.
40020015	¿L` ba si-ma huru na mà ɦe n mà lig̈biir wo man sɔkla leen? Laa, ¿lɔɔ-ma n nɔmmɔlb na mà ɦɛna hɔmgu le?”»
40020016	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesua t ta hewl na: «Kaawrba nan kita nɔŋrba, l` saa nɔŋrba kitg kaawrba.»
40020017	Yeesua nn da ked Yerusalɛm kɔrgun lee, n ree gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee kpamga, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
40020018	«Ĥom-n! T` kotgaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Reekan nnii ban kee bà taag Nida Budaaga gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba nuɦun, bee biir na bá kuu-ka.
40020019	Tii kaann, bà taag-ka bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nuɦun, bà laɦ-ka, bà gbuu-ka taŋgbanii, bà kpaɦ-ka dabragr ɦɛn. Ban kee bà kpaɦ-ka dabragr ɦɛn lee, gotaɦrd goor, kà himtg kuumn kà neer.»
40020020	Jebdea kwɛɛlba n bà nya t nyuɦ Yeesua man. Ban nyuɦ-wu lee, bá nya t sunt ɦá tiŋa na ɦà gbaam-wu bii. Yeesua t gbaam-wu na:
40020021	«¿Bag bee?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Si huru na vn kee v` bɛm v` huraantn lee, mà kwɛɛlba bareɦbambena kad volwu v` najuudu ɦɛn, volwu v` galu ɦɛn.»
40020022	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` kpaa mi nn gbaama bii. ¿N` kee n` bee n` nyi wiiru kpowdga man ba mà nyi kee?» Bá leed-wu na baa bà bee bà nyii-ka.
40020023	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Biilm, n` kee n` nyi kpowdgee, gwɛntaɦ lee, lag man beel mà roodg ɦii ɦà nan kadaa mà najuudu ɦɛn wii, laa mà galu ɦɛn wii, kaalahii hɔda kan biiba mà Sa nn maantr-hi bee.»
40020024	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr volbee nn ɦomr welee lee, bá lo kwɛɛwweerga n teelba bareɦbee.
40020025	Lee wen, Yeesua t hoɦ bá mɛmbee n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` miil hɔm na tiga huraamba wayaa n bà bermt ka ɦɛna tigɦee daddad, l´ saa wembomba weraa-ɦa bá gemmnt ka nawdra-ɦa.
40020026	L` kpaɦ na l´ ta bɛm welee n` huuga. Ka n` huuga ɦii bag na ɦà di bermtii, l` ba na ɦá kitg n` kwɛɛla, n` tom-wu, l` saa
40020027	ka n` huuga ɦii bag na ɦà bɛm noograa, l` ba na ɦá kitg n` yuuma.
40020028	Ta welee nnii Nida Budaaga man, man ba daan na bá ɦɛm-ma ŋmɛɛg̈b. Mà daan na mà ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b ka tɔra volba, l` saa mà lɔg mà neerm mà faad na mà daɦ nidba kɔd juuni.»
40020029	Tii kaann, bá rorm Yerikoo kɔrgun, nidfigm t ta tag Yeesua kaa.
40020030	Joomba bareɦba da kada huru maaru n ɦom na Yeesua beraan, bá baɦ n ka toola kimm na: «Berma! Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan t` kunyɔŋu!»
40020031	Nidfigm t ka kpal-ba ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá kpat belaɦ'. Ban la bɔɦɔɔ-ba welee lee, bà gwɛda n kwɛɛn ka toola kimm na: «Berma! Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan t` kunyɔŋu!»
40020032	Yeesua t jeɦnt, n hoɦ-ba, n gbaam-ba na: «¿N` bo na mà ɦee-n bee?»
40020033	Bá leed-wu na: «Berma, ɦe na t` niini yum!»
40020034	Ĥá yum bá ɦigm, n tarm bá niini ɦɛn. Yelmaa, bareɦdrbee niini t went, bá ka tagdg ɦá kaa.
40021001	Bá san n ka nyuɦaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgu n taai Betfagee kɔrgu man, Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn. Ban taai kan lee, Yeesua t tom ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba ɦà nɔngan
40021002	ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ked-n kɔrgu kú baa laɦii n` nɔngan kuun! Nn ba n` taai kan yelmaa lee, n` ba n` nyaan boŋniiga baɦr kan, ká n kà buga, n` baɦdg-ka n` daan n man, ká n kà bugee.
40021003	Ka ɦii t gbaam-n lii, n` leedg-wu na berma bagl-hi. Ka n´ leedg welee, bà si-n huru yelmaa n` daan n hin.»
40021004	L` da ɦera welee na gwɛɛt weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta nn da bed tii ɦe t´ noor ɦɛn. Tii nnii na:
40021005	Biir-n Siyoon kɔrgu na: Geedg! V` huraa kena v` man, ka ba bulaa, ka kad boŋŋa ɦɛn, da boŋhɛrgan.
40021006	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ta san welee, n ɦɛm bii ɦan bed na bá ɦe bii,
40021007	n daan n boŋniigee n kà bugee, n dɔɔm bá dimt hí ɦɛn, ɦá juul n kad.
40021008	Nidba kɔdgu t ka yada bá dimt hurun. Volba badra tiit vaara ka ta doola ɦù ɦɛn.
40021009	Nidba bá da dɛɦr Yeesua nɔngan n bá da kena n ɦà kaann bee, bà da toola na: «Ĥoosaanaa! Bá nyɔkm Daviida yakiiga! Saŋgband kaawlm ɦii ɦà kena wii ɦɛn! Ĥà kena d` hidrn. Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband saŋgbambiimn !»
40021010	Yeesua nn da jib Yerusalɛm kɔrgun lee, nidba mɛmba t ka nyamra bayen ka gbaama na: «¿Nidwen nnii wunwii?»
40021011	Bá da tagd ɦà kaa bee t leed na: «Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yeesuun, Galilee tantn kɔrgu ban hoɦ na Nasarɛɛt kuun tiin.»
40021012	Yeesua t jib Saŋgband haarn n voom nidba bá da gweedma n bá da daɦ kan bee mɛmbee. Ĥà da ta hɛɦra lig̈blagiitba kpela, n kurŋmɛngweedmtba jarii ka daɦaa tiŋan.
40021013	L´ tog, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Bà nan hoɦaa mà haar na seeŋb haar. Nen lee, nii t lɔgm-d, n ɦɛm bawdba kaalaŋa.»
40021014	Joomba n kparuuba t nyuɦ Yeesua man Saŋgband haariin, ɦá ɦɛm l´ gbaad-ba.
40021015	Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba nn nyan hoolgu ŋmɛɛgt ɦan da ɦɛna tii n nan kaaba nn da toola Saŋgband haariin na bá nyɔkm Daviida yakiiga lee, l´ weer-ba.
40021016	Lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Kpaa ɦum kaabee nn bɔɦɔɔ tiin?» Ĥá leed-ba na: «Mà ɦuman.» Lee, n gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ban kaal Wadbuudgan felaɦn? L` ɦɔda kà ni na: Ĥera kaaba t ka nyɔka-v, l` lag n kunidbii hí ɦɛɛma beɦeem hii mɛɦ'.»
40021017	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá nyab bá man n rorm kɔrguun, n san Betaanii n goom.
40021018	Toŋu t vɛt ɦateekwɛɛn, Yeesua t ka ŋmɛtgaa kɔrguun, kɔm t mug-wu.
40021019	Ĥá yum hurmaaru tiib biib b` boo ɦaadgu, n nyuɦii b´ man n mid vaat hɛnt, roona kpaɦ'. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-b na: «Nan kpaa roon felaɦ'!» Yelmaa, tiibii t kparŋ kpaalaa.
40021020	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t yum welee, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa. Bá gbaam-wu na: «¿L` ɦer lan tiibnbina nn kparŋ myenm ɦɛn welee?»
40021021	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ka n` ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ka kpaa nigaa n n` nii, n` ba n` bee n` ɦe, lag mà reb ɦer tiibii bii n jaɦaa, n` ta ba n` bee n` biir duugankena na: ‟Ĥɔgdg vyen, v` san v` lɔɔ nyaamn!”, l` ta ɦe welee.
40021022	Ka n` ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, n` soɦdgm bii nn kee n` gbaam n` seeŋbn bii mɛmbii.»
40021023	Ban taa lee, Yeesua t jib Saŋgband haarn, n ka weraa gwɛɛt. Lee wen, gotibermba, n kɔrgun kpalmmba t nyuɦ ɦá man n gbaam-wu na: «¿Hurteɦu noon nnii vn ɦɛna wennaɦ? ¿Wen sir-v huru na v` ɦɛmaa?»
40021024	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Maa mà ta gbaam-n gwɛɛgu kuyen, kuyengu liglig. Ka n´ leedg-ma kù ɦɛnii, mà biir-n ɦii ɦá sir-ma huru na mà ɦɛm welee wii.
40021025	¿Wen da tamn Yohanɛɛs na ɦá huurm nidba? ¿Saŋgband laa, nidba le?» Lee wen, bá baɦ n ka wii-t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ka t´ leedg na Saŋgband da tamn-wu, ɦà gbaam-t na, ¿l´ ɦɛm lann tn da ba tii ɦà gwɛɛt?
40021026	Lee, ka t´ ta leedg na nidba da tamn-wu, ɦaai, l` ba na t` siil nidba. Nidba mɛmba diila na da Yohanɛɛs nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii.»
40021027	Lee wen, bá saa n leed Yeesu na: «T` kpaa mi lii.» Ĥá ŋmɛl-ba na: «Ka welee, mà ta kpaɦ mà biir-n ɦii ɦà sir-ma huru má ka ɦɛna wantntina wii.»
40021028	Yeesua t lilm-ba bɔɦɔɔb na: «Ĥom-n gwɛɛtntina! ¿N` diila t´ ɦɛn na laa? Nidɦii da ba n kwɛɛlba bareɦba. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ noogr na: ‟Mà buga! Jana goorii, san v` ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b mà koogun!”
40021029	Kwɛɛlwii t leed-wu na: ‟Mà kpaɦ mà san.” L´ mɔɔ jaɦ', ɦá lagii diila, n san kooguun n ka ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b.
40021030	Sawii t ta bɔɦɔɔ reɦdrwii goyentii. Wii t leed-wu na: ‟Taa maara! Maa mà san.” Lee, n ka ba san.
40021031	¿Bareɦdrbee huuga, wen ɦer bii bá sa nn sɔklm bii?» Bá leed-wu na: «Kwɛɛlnoogra.» Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, lambɦu soɦdgtba n yaruutba nan taa Saŋgband huraantn n` nɔngan,
40021032	blaɦb kaa, nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa daan n` huuga n ka weraa-n gobiint huru, n´ ka ba tii ɦà ɦɛn. Lambɦu soɦdgtba n yaruutba lee, bee t tii ɦá ɦɛn. Nii nn la nyan welee lee, n ka ba lagii diila na n` ta tii ɦà ɦɛn.»
40021033	«Kewlg-n nawdlam volma! Mii nnii na, nidɦii da hoowra tibit t´ roon bà ɦɛna n daam tii ɦá koogun, n mɔɦm dabid n kaad-ku, n tiim kan vadgu n kɛrm-ku na bá nawdrm kú ni tiroonɦee ka rea daam. L´ saa, ɦá mɔɦm kooguun bibidr diir d´ kot n faaga na bá juulm d´ ɦɛn ka kiig kpambii ɦɛn. Ln diɦ lee, ɦá to-b daam tiiba biiba, na bá maantrm ka kiig, bá n wun bà rada taa daam. Ĥan ɦer welee lee, n vid n san huru.
40021034	Daam vuugu t dan n taan, ɦá vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba biiba n tom-ba, na bá san ɦà nidbee man bà soɦdgn ɦà rem.
40021035	Ban san lee, nidbee t moogm tumtbee n gbum bilmwu biii, n kuum ɦayen, n tawdr taɦrwu tana ɦá kuum.
40021036	Kooguu tiiwii t ŋmɛt n vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedvolba, bee ba kɔd ka yata ɦan da tomr nooga bee. Nidbee t ɦɛm-ba wo ban da ɦer noogrbee lee.
40021037	Ĥá saa n vii ɦayen ɦà kwɛɛla n tom ka diila na bà kee bà valg wii na ln ba na ɦá kwɛɛln.
40021038	Nidbee nn dan n yum kwɛɛlwii lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ taa na: ‟Kpay-n ɦá nan ba ɦà heɦm kooguu wii! Tn kuu-n-wu! L` saa t` nan mad kooguu.”
40021039	Ban bed welee lee, n mug-wu, n ree-wu n kooguu kaann, n kuum-wu.»
40021040	Yeesua t nan gbaam-ba na: «¿Ĥee waa! Kooguu tiiwii daa kena waa, ɦà ɦe lan nidbee lee?»
40021041	Bá leed-wu na: «Ĥà kee ɦà ku nidbɛɦtntina ka kpaa yu t´ ɦigm, l` saa ɦà lɔg kooguu ɦà to jeenba na l´ taam daam vuugu bá rad-wu ɦá rem.»
40021042	Yeesua t fɛl ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Tand mɔɦdba nn da kɔɦdg dii, dii kitg bobogr tand mɔmr. Saberma ɦera welee hoolguu, t´ yum-ku n t` niini. ¿N` nyi ban kaal gwɛɛtii Wadbuudga nii?
40021043	Tii kaa nnii man rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, bà nan soɦda n` do Saŋgband huraant bà to tigr diir d´ ba d` roonm huraantii roona dii. [
40021044	Nid ɦá kee ɦà lor tandii ɦɛn wii, ɦà kee ɦà kaɦ ɦayen, l´ saa, ka tandii t lor ɦii ɦɛnii, ɦà kitg tanjoom.]»
40021045	Gotibermba n Farisii tiiba t ɦom nawdlam Yeesua nn gwɛɛl mii kɔtɔd n miig na ɦà gwɛɛla l` hɛl bee.
40021046	Lee wen, bá baɦ n ka bag huru na bà mug-wu, gwɛntaɦ ka sol nidba, blaɦb kaa, bà da bɔɦɔɔ na wii nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii.
40022001	Yeesua t mɔɔ-ba nawdlam gwɛɛlb ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
40022002	«Saŋgbambiimn huraant tɔna huraaɦii ɦà da maantr ɦà kwɛɛla yaala kasant.
40022003	Ln tog lee, ɦá tom ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba na bá hoɦ nidba ɦan bed na bá daan bà di diit kasantii goor bee. Bá san n hoɦm-ba, bá kirm n ka ba daan.
40022004	Ĥá tom ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedvolba na bá san bà biir-ba na: ‟Gwɛɦŋa, mà diit biiran nnii, mà kura mà naagi n mà dɔm m` ba kpaam mii, diit biiran, daan-n n` di!”
40022005	Ban san n bɔɦɔɔ-ba welee lee, bá ka ba diilg diitii ɦɛn lii, n san bá ŋmɛɛgt ɦɛb. Ĥayenɦa t san ɦá kpam, vola t san ɦá yaku,
40022006	l´ saa, volba t moogm ŋmɛɛɦeedbee, n lo-ba kunyɔŋu, n kuum-ba.
40022007	Huraawii t lo kwɛɛwweerga, n tom ɦá tawdba, bá san n kuum nidkuudbee, n totr bá kɔrgu boglam.
40022008	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba na: ‟Yaala kasant diit biiran, lee, man da hoɦ bee, bà da kpaa tɔn na bà di diitii.
40022009	San-n hurfɛgan n` hoɦ nidba nn ba n` nyaan bee!”
40022010	Ŋmɛɛɦeedbee t san hurin, n kpogl biiba ban da nyan bee mɛmbee, hɔmbee n bɛɦbee, lee, yaala disaku t hu.
40022011	Huraawii t jib na ɦà nyaan ban hoɦr bee n mid nidɦii ba kan ka kpaa fidr yaala kasant dimgu.
40022012	Ĥá gbaam-wu na: ‟Mà tuura! ¿Ĥer lan n jibn nnaɦ ka kpaa fidr yaala kasant dimgu?” Nidwii t ka ba leedg-wu lii.
40022013	Lee wen, huraawii t bɔɦɔɔ ŋmɛɛɦeedba na: ‟Boow-n ɦá nakpai, n ɦà niɦi, n kɔɦdg-wu n kankaan nyeetn. Reekan nnii ɦan kee ɦà kom ka duum ɦà nyina.”»
40022014	Yeesua nn bed welee lee, n hewl na: «Bà hoɦ kɔd gwɛntaɦ n bant kaalkaɦba.»
40022015	Lee wen, Farisii tiiba t kpogl taa na bà ɦe noor dyen bà bag huru bà feer Yeesuwu kutukŋa bà mug-wu ɦà gwɛɛlbn.
40022016	Kpoglb kaann, bá lɔgm bá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba biiba, n huraa Ĥerooda kpaturu tiiba biiba n tom-ba na bá biir Yeesu na: «Berma! T` miil na bɔɦɔɔ gobiint, na v` weraa huru l´ reɦu ba na bà tagd ka neer wo Saŋgband nn gbaama lee. Kpaa sol nidwu n ɦà nɔnga wee. Ka nida ba n bermt tiit, laa ɦà kpaɦ n bermt tiitii, kpaa sol-wu.
40022017	Tii lee, ɦiluu gwɛɛtntina, v` biir-t bii vn diila bii: ¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá faadm Roomaa hurbermwu lambɦu laa, bá daa faadm le?»
40022018	Yelmaa, Yeesua t miig bá diilbɛɦa, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! ¿L` ɦer lan nn ŋmɛgaa n mana?
40022019	Werii-n-ma lig̈biir ban faad lambɦu n dii!» Bá werii-wu lig̈bkpaŋ̈m miim.
40022020	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿Wen jugu nnii ban rea? ¿Wen hidr nnii ban ɦɔd m` ɦɛnii?»
40022021	Bá leed-wu na: «Roomaa hurberma.» Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «To-n hurbermwu bii b` ba na ɦá reb bii! L` saa n` ta to Saŋgband bii b` ba na d´ reb bii.»
40022022	Yeesua nn bed-ba welee lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem, bá saa-wu n nyab.
40022023	Goorii, Sadusii tiiba biiba t daan Yeesua man. Bee bɔɦɔɔ na kpiirmba nan kpaa himta kuumn. Bá gbaam Yeesu na:
40022024	«Berma! Mohiisa da beda na, ka daawɦii t kpi ka ba meed buga, l` ba na ɦá nyakwɛɛlɦii lɔg kuŋfɔg̈wii, ɦà meed-wu n budaaga, kà bɛm na ɦá maar ɦá kpiir wii rekan.
40022025	Tii lee, ɦii kwɛɛlba balbleɦba da bee t` huuga. Noogra t lɔgm fɔga, n dan n kuum ka kpaɦ n buga, n saa na ɦá teela lɔg kuŋfɔg̈wii.
40022026	Reɦdrwii t lɔgm kuŋfɔg̈wii, l´ tag-wu yenmii. Taɦrwii t ta lɔgm-wu, l´ ta tag-wu yenmii. L´ saa, volbee mɛmbee t ta lɔgm-wu, l` ta tagaa-ba yenmii.
40022027	Bá mɛmbee kuum kaann, fɔg̈wii t ta kuum.
40022028	Wo bá mɛmbee nn da lɔgr-wu fɔgt lee, goor kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn dii, bá leblmbee huuga, ¿wen nan ba ɦà heɦm-wu?»
40022029	Yeesua t leed-ba na: «N` bɔdan. N` kpaa mi Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt, n` ta kpaa mi Saŋgband gemmnt.
40022030	Biilm, nidba nn nan himta kuumn lee, daba kpaa kee bà lɔgm fɔg̈ba, fɔg̈ba ta kpaa kee bà yɔlm sidba. Nidba nan ba bà neer wo saŋgbantumtba nn neer saŋgbambiimn lee.
40022031	Gwɛɛt Saŋgband nn da bed-n t` hɛl kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn tii waa, ¿n` nyi ban kaal tn? D` da beda na:
40022032	Man nnii n` yandaa Ĥabrahaama Saberma, ta n` yandaa Yisɦaaka Saberma, ta n` yandaa Yakooba Saberma. Saŋgband nnii nidneermba Saŋgband, lag kpiirmba redn.»
40022033	Gwɛɛt ɦan da weraa tii t ɦɛm nidfigm m´ da kewla-wu mii yɔlaa.
40022034	Farisii tiiba nn da ɦomr na Yeesua ɦera Sadusii tiiba t mud bá noor ɦɛn lee, bá kpogl taa.
40022035	Bá ni bilma, l` ba na baɦlb weriitn, ɦá ka bag na ɦà fɔrii Yeesu n gbaam-wu na:
40022036	«Berma! Baɦlb huuga, ¿baɦlteb yatg bermb?»
40022037	Yeesua t leed-wu na: « L` ba na v` sɔklm v` Saberm Saŋgband n v` kwɛɛwr mɛnd, n v` rem mɛnm, n v` diila mɛna.
40022038	Bii nnii baɦlbermb b` yata.
40022039	Baɦlreɦdrb b´ tɔn noogrb bii, bii nnii na: L` ba na v` ta sɔklm v` nidtuur wo vn sɔkla v` mɔm vyen lee.
40022040	Bii Mohiisa nn werii ɦá wadgan, n bii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn werii bii mɛmbii baɦra n baɦlb breɦbnbina.»
40022041	Wo Farisii tiiba nn kpogl taa lee, Yeesua t gbaam-ba gwɛɛtntina na:
40022042	«¿N` diila na lan Saŋgband nn bantg wii ɦɛnii? ¿Wii nnii wen yakiiga?» Bá leed-wu na: «Wii nnii Daviida yakiiga.»
40022043	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿L` da ɦer lan le, Voɦoom Buudm wenta Daviida diir noon na ɦà bee ɦà hoɦ-ka na ‟Berma”? Daviida da beda na:
40022044	Saberm Saŋgband beda mà berm na: ‟Daan v` kad mà najuudu ɦɛn kakeɦnan! Mà daa mà lo v` rafeedba v` nakpai kwɛɛn.”
40022045	Ka l` ba na Daviida hoɦl Saŋgband nn bantg wii na ‟Berma”, ¿lan nnii ɦan ta ba ɦà bɛm na Daviida yakiiga?»
40022046	Bá ni ɦii t ka ta ba bee na ɦà leedg-wu gwɛɛgu kuyengu mɔmgu. Lɔg goorii n jaɦaa, bá ni ɦii t ka ta kpaa ŋmiinaa na ɦà gbaam-wu lii.
40023001	Tii kaann, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na:
40023002	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba to bayen na bà reem Mohiisa baɦlb kɔtɔd.
40023003	L` ba na n` valgm ka ɦɛna bii ban bɔɦɔɔ bii ɦɛn. Lee, daa ɦɛm-n wo ban ɦɛna lee! Bà kpaa ɦɛna bii ban weraa bii ɦɛn.
40023004	Bà boowa wanjeet ka tula nidba, ka kpaa tia na bà tarm bà nabiir mɔmr wantii ɦɛn, na bá tɔrg-ba na bá bee bà toɦd-t.
40023005	Bà ɦɛna bà ŋmɛɛgt mɛnt ka bag na nidba geem-ba. Ta welee nnii ban ɦoor gobuudt gbantoot ɦɛn t´ yadg n yat volba ret, ka gbenaa bà juuni laa ka tog bá baaga ɦɛn, ka ta lɔg dimtoot t´ vɔk n yat volba ret ka hɔr bá dimyoolnt gwia ɦɛn.
40023006	Bà sɔkla na bà kad kaalaŋhɔmiin kasant man. Ban jiba kpoglb disagtn lee, n ka ro jarii hí jeɦr nɔngan hii ka kadaa.
40023007	Bà sɔkla na bà kad nidba huuga na bà seeŋ̈m-ba n valgm ka hoɦ-ba na weriitba.
40023008	Nen lee, daa bagm-n na bá hoɦm-n na weriitba! N` mɛmbee, n` ba na teelban, ka ba n weriit ɦayen.
40023009	Daa hoɦm-n n` huuga ɦiiwu tant ɦɛn na n` sa! N` ba n sa ɦayen, wii beel saŋgbambiimn.
40023010	Daa ta bagm-n na bá hoɦm-n na bermba! ¿N` kpaɦ n berm ɦayen? ¿Lag wii nnii Krista, l´ kɔtɔd na Saŋgband nn bantg wii?
40023011	Ĥá ba n` huuga bermtn wii, l` ba na ɦá bɛm n` tumta.
40023012	Ĥii ɦá kola ɦayen n faaga wii, bà nan hoɦla-wu n tiŋa, l` saa ɦii ɦá hoɦla ɦayen n tiŋa wii, bà nan kola-wu n faaga.
40023013	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` kewra saŋgbambiimn huraant fiid noor na nidba daa jib. N` kpaa jiba kan n` mɔmba, ka ta kpaa saa na bá bag na bà jib kan bee jib. [
40023014	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` fɛɛra kuŋfɔg̈ba niɦin kpelkpel, ka seeŋa l` kpaa diɦaa na bá biir na nen nnii hɔmba. N` welee ɦɛbii kaa nnii ln nan daraa n` tobɦa kimm l` yatg.]
40023015	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` gilma n tant mɛnt, n nyaam ɦɛn, ka bag na n` yuuŋ yem tiiɦii ɦà lagii kwɛɛwr ɦà jib n` kpaturun. N` daa yuuŋa ɦii, n´ ɦɛm ɦá kit taabuugu boglamn tia l´ yat wo nn ba lee tɔmb mreɦ'.
40023016	«Kimtjoomba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` bɔɦɔɔ na ka ɦii t feer n Saŋgband haarii, na l` kpaɦ l` mug. Lee, na ka ɦá feer n Saŋgband haarii sikaa, na l` mug.
40023017	Joojoont n joomt nen! ¿Ben yatg bermbii? ¿Sika laa, Saŋgband haar d´ ɦɛna sika t kit buuda le?
40023018	N´ ta bɔɦɔɔ na ka ɦii t feer n Saŋgband vit daɦŋaa, na l` kpaɦ l` mug. Lee, na ka ɦá feer n vit want ban dee vit daɦŋa ɦɛn tii, na l` mug.
40023019	Joomt nen! ¿Ben yatg bermbii? ¿Vit wantii laa, vit daɦŋa ká ɦɛna wantii t kit buudt le?
40023020	Miim-n na ɦii ɦà foor n vit daɦŋa wii, ɦà foora n vit daɦŋee, n want ban dee ká ɦɛn tii mɛntii mɛɦ'.
40023021	Ĥii ɦà foor n Saŋgband haar wii, ɦà foora n haarii, n Saŋgband d´ go d´ ni dii mɛɦ'.
40023022	Ĥii ɦà foor n saŋgbambiim wii, ɦà foora n saŋgbambiimn huraant jarga, n Saŋgband d´ kad kà ɦɛn dii mɛɦ'.
40023023	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` lɔgl jivaat t´ ba na jit kuut tii wo budiit dela n rad-t tɔmb kwiɦr, n lɔgm myenm n saɦm Saŋgband. L` ba hɔm gwɛntaɦ', n` hɔŋaa bii baɦlb nn weraa b` ba jeegu bii. Bii nnii gobiint ɦɛb, n volba ɦigm nyaanb, n gwɛɛt madm. Yanta tii nnii ln ba na n` ɦɛm-t n ŋmɛɛg̈b ka kpaa hɔŋaa vontii.
40023024	Kimtjoomba nen! N` kuɦl daam na n` ree danyawdga, n ŋmɛt n ka nyi ka vool deer!
40023025	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` naada n` kpowdii kaawa n n` sumii kaawa, l` ba na n` bawdwant n n` nɔmvuurɦu want l` hugl t´ keɦ'.
40023026	Farisii joomgu ven! Need v` kpowdga ni saɦ', lee kà kaawr ta bɛm kpelkpel.
40023027	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` tɔna bili ban gwɛɦr kaalɦu ɦii, ɦí ka ba kwɛɛlm ɦí faaga, l` ba na nidba kowa n bii b´ boodg bii mɛmbii hugl ɦì keɦ'.
40023028	Nen tɛtɛ, n` ba yenmii, nidba nɔnga nii, n` tɔna nidhɔmba n` gbanu faaga, l` ba na rarbɛɦm n bɛɦgu mɛngu l` hugl n` ni.
40023029	«Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba-n, rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` mɔɦl gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba n nidhɔmba bili ka ɦɛna-ɦi kwɛɛlm,
40023030	ka bɔɦɔɔ na ka n` da bee n` yandaba vuugu nii, n` da kpaɦ n` hewl bà jugun na n` kuu-ba.
40023031	Welee lee, n` mɔmba n` weraa na nen nnii bá da kur gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba bee yakii.
40023032	Tii lee, fɛlgm-n bii n` yandaba nn da koolg bii!
40023033	Waabɛɦt nen! Jukpattntina! ¿N` nan ɦɛna lan n` fɛtg ka ba lɔɔ taabuugu boglam nii?
40023034	Tii nnii ln ba na maa mà tamn n` man gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba, n rarm tiiba, n baɦlb weriitba. N` nan ba n` kuum bá ni biiba, ka kpaɦ volba dabragr ɦɛn, ka ta gbu volba taŋgbanii n` kpoglb disagtn. N` nan ba n` dɛɛr-ba n tiga.
40023035	Tii nnii tobr darm ln gbaam mii nn nan luur n` ɦɛn, nidba ban da kur n bà nyɔnyɔgm bee kaa. Bee nnii l´ lɔg nidhɔm Ĥabɛɛla kakeɦnan Bɛɛrɛkia kwɛɛl Sakaria, nn da kur Saŋgband disaku n vit daɦŋa l` huuga wii.
40023036	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, tobr darm ln gbaam nidba nn kur bee mɛmbee kaa mii, m` nan luura goona nidba ɦɛn.
40023037	«Yerusalɛm tiiba nen! Nen, nen kuu gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nen! Nen, nen lɔd tana ka kuu biiba Saŋgband nn tamna n` man nen! ¿Tɔmb mlan nnii man sɔkl na mà kpogl-n mà man, wo kɔrga nn kpogla ká kɔrbit ká bagt kwɛɛn lee?, n´ ka la ba tii.
40023038	Tii lee, Saŋgband ba d` gwid n` kɔrgu kaawr kù bidg dabit.
40023039	Biilm, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, jana n jaɦaa, n` nan ta kpaa yuu-ma kakeɦnan nn nan ba n` bɔɦɔɔm na: Saŋgband kaawl ɦii ɦà kena d` hidrn wii ɦɛn!»
40024001	Yeesua t rorm Saŋgband haarn n ka nyaba. Lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ-wu n ka weraa-wu Saŋgband haar dabira nn ba kwɛɛlm lee.
40024002	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿Ndee n` yul l´ mɛnguu nn ba leen? Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, l` nan kpaa tɔl tand dyend mɔmr d` dɛɛr d` tuurnd ɦɛn nnaɦreen felaɦ'. L´ mɛnguu nan luuran.»
40024003	Ĥan da san n kad Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn lee, lee wen ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man bayen n gbaam-wu na: «Biir-t vuugu ln nan ɦɛna welee kuun! ¿Lan nnii tn kee t` ɦe t` miig na v` daanm n tant diɦm vuugu nyuɦnn?»
40024004	Ĥá leed na: «Mad-n n̈yen hɔm na ɦii daa hogl-n!
40024005	Nidba kɔd nan ba bà kenm mà hidrn ka bɔɦɔɔ na bee nnii Krista. Lee wen bà hogl nidba kɔd bà fiwlg-ba.
40024006	N` nan ɦuma bà taaw hooda n` kpamii, l` saa n` ta ɦom bà gwɛɛla l` baɦr n hooda ban taaw vɔkun ɦee gwɛɛt. Welee daa si-n fobɛɦgu! L` ba na welee ɦe, gwɛntaɦ, lag tant diɦm nnii saɦ'.
40024007	Tigr nan vida d` tuurnd ɦɛn, ɦà teew taa hoodr, l` saa huraaɦii kɔrgu gbuɦdg hurvolɦii reku hoodr. Kɔmbermm nan ba m` riir, l` saa tant dam kɔrni jugu jugun.
40024008	Welee kunyɔŋuu weraa na tant diɦm nyuɦnn. L` boo futia wiiru nn weraa-wu na ɦà nyuɦ maadb lee.
40024009	«Lee wen, nidba nan ba bà sam-n na bà lɔɔm-n kunyɔŋu, l` saa bà kuum-n. Tiga mɛna kee ɦà nyaɦaam-n mà kaa.
40024010	Lee, nidba kɔd kee bà gwid gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaawr. Bà nan ba bà rɔɔm taa, ka nyaɦaa taa.
40024011	Gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nan rɛna kɔd, bà hoglm nidba kɔd l` fiwla-ba.
40024012	Bɛɦgu nan ba kù yadg, l` saa nidba kɔd Saŋgband sɔklb bɔr.
40024013	Lee, ɦii ɦà nan ba ɦà mad hɔm kakeɦnan wii, l` nan daɦ ɦá jugu.
40024014	Bà kee bà faa saŋgbambiimn huraant gohɔmtntina tant mɛnt biɦ', ka bo na baaben tii ɦá neer tant ɦɛn wii ɦom-t. Tii n t` kaann, tant diɦm vuugu taan.
40024015	«N` nan yul ɦii ban hoɦ na ŋmɛrwaŋu wii ba kaalaŋbuudgan. Wii nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Dan̈yeela nn da bed ɦà gwɛɛt wii. –Ĥá kaal gwɛɛtntina wii, l` ba na ɦá ɦom-t hɔm!–
40024016	Lee wen, biiba bà nan ba bà bɛm Yuudee tantn bee, bá siil bà juul duuran!
40024017	Ĥii ɦà nan ba ɦà bɛm haaga wii, ɦá daa jib dugun na ɦà lɔg ɦá want ɦà solm ka mad!
40024018	L´ saa ɦii ɦà nan ba ɦà bɛm kpam wii, ɦá daa ŋmɛtgn haaga na ɦà lɔg ɦá dimt!
40024019	Goorɦee ni, futiiba n fɔg̈ba bá nan ba bà ɦɛɛlgm bii bee kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm bermgu.
40024020	Joblm-n Saŋgband na l´ daa nan taŋ n ɦawet wen, laa t` voɦoob goor na n` solm!
40024021	Goorɦee ni, kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm bermgu l` yatg. Lɔg weem kɔtɔdn kakeɦnan n jana, kunyɔŋu kuugu ban taa-ku, l´ saa, ɦii nan ta kpaa yu kú tuurŋu felaɦ'.
40024022	Ka Saŋgband da ba biir na d` ba d` gwiɦdg goorɦee ɦɛnii, ɦii nn nan kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà fetg ɦà neer. Lee, d` gwiɦdg goorɦee ɦɛn nidba dn bantg bee kaa.
40024023	Tii lee, ka ɦii t dan n ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na Krista ba nnaɦ', laa ɦà ba laɦaa, daa tii-n n wun!
40024024	Gokaat Kristmba n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nan rorn. Bà nan ba bà ɦɛm hoolbermgu kɔd, ka ta ɦɛna want tiit ɦii kpaa ɦum t` kɔtɔd, na bà hoglm nidba. Bà nan ta ba bà lagiim n biiba Saŋgband nn bantg bee mɛɦ', ka kpaɦ bà bee-ba.
40024025	Ĥom-n! Mà beda-n l` mɛnguu n dool.
40024026	Lee, ka ɦii t biir-n na: ‟Geedg n` nyaana! Ĥà ba kpamloŋun”, daa san-n kan! Laa, ka ɦii t biir-n na: ‟Geedg-n! Ĥà ba dugun”, daa tii-n!
40024027	Biilm, wo toŋu nn ŋmɛdaa l´ wiid toŋu kwɛɛn kakeɦnan kù faaga lee, ta welee nnii Nida Budaaga nn nan kena.
40024028	Bii b` ku n ka ba riikan bii, bii man nnii ɦagulangunt nn kpogla taa.
40024029	«Goorɦee kunyɔŋu nn ba kù gɛtg yelmaa lee, muunu ɦe nyeet, kidga ta kpaɦ kà wiir, ŋmɛdii begdr saŋgbambiimn ka tɛɦra, want t´ ba n faaga tii mɛntii hamtr n taa.
40024030	Lee wen, waaru ɦuuɦu riir toŋu ɦɛn ka weraa na Nida Budaaga daanm ba nyɔɦ', l` saa tant ɦɛn tiga mɛna nidba mɔɔm. Bà nan ba bà nyaan Nida Budaaga kena wat ɦɛn, ka ba n gemmnt kɔd, ka ba ká jeegun.
40024031	Kà nan tuuma kà tumtba tant mɛntn, bà hoɦ muulŋbermga, bà kpogl biiba kan da bantg bee, lɔg toŋu faaga kakeɦnan kù kwɛɛn.
40024032	Lɔg-n gwɛɛt tod nn weraa-t tii n` tɔnii-t n` ɦoma! N` wen yu d` hulii ba nɛmnɛm vakwɛɛnt rɛnaa, n´ miig na yobr ba nyɔɦ'.
40024033	Ta yenmii, nn nan yu bii man bɔɦɔɔ-n bii ɦɛna lee, miig-n na Nida Budaaga daanm ba nyɔɦ', na kà ba kà taan!
40024034	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Waagankena nan kpaa ku kà diɦ saɦ bii man bɔɦɔɔ bii mɛmbii ban ɦe.
40024035	Saŋgbambiim n tant nan booran, maa gwɛɛt lee, tii nan kpaa boor felaɦ'.»
40024036	«Gwɛntaɦ lee, goor mɔmr laa waaru mɔmu Nida Budaaga nn nan kena lee wen, ɦii kpaa mi. Saŋgbantumtba mɛɦ kpaa mi, Budaagee mɔmga ta kpaa mi, ká Sawu n jaɦ miiln.
40024037	Bii b` da ɦer Nowea vuugun bii, yenbii nnii b´ nan ta ɦɛna Nida Budaaga daanm goor.
40024038	Biilm, goora ɦá da daan nyaalm waalm nɔngan ɦee nii, nidba da juln, ka nyi, ka yɔl taa, laa ka tɔɔ bá bɛɛrba na bá yal, kakeɦnan goor Nowea nn da jib kadakŋun dii.
40024039	Bà da kpaa diila bii gwɛɛt kakeɦnan vuugu nyaalm nn da waal n tu bá mɛmbee kuu. Welee nnii ln nan ta ɦɛna Nida Budaaga nn nan kena lee wen.
40024040	Goorii, daba bareɦba nan ba bà bɛm kpam, l` lɔg ɦayen, l` saa vola.
40024041	Fɔg̈ba bareɦba nan ba bà gbaɦr ka naam, l` lɔg ɦayen, l` saa vola.
40024042	Tii lee, neer-n ka sug na, n` kpaa mi goor n` Berma nn nan kena dii.
40024043	Ĥom-n gwɛɛtntina hɔm! Ka haar tia t miig vuugu bawda nn kee ɦà daan ɦaa nyingu kuu, ɦà kpat ɦà neer ka sug, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà saa na bawda daan ɦà gbuɦ ɦá haar.
40024044	Tii nnii ln ba na, nii ta maantr n̈yen n` hɔd na, Nida Budaaga nan kena waaru nn kpaa diila ɦù ɦɛn ɦuun.
40024045	«¿Wen nnii ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá ba hɔm ka mi rarm? Wii nnii ɦá berma nn banta na ɦá sugm ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurmba ɦɛn, ka saɦ-ba diit l´ wen mag lee wen.
40024046	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii nnii lamɛɛgu tia, ka l` ba na ɦá berma nan kpen ɦà mid ɦà ɦeewr n ŋmɛɛg̈bii n ɦɛb hɔm.
40024047	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bermwii nan tɔɔ-wu ɦà kɛgt mɛnt na ɦá kiigm t´ ɦɛn.
40024048	Ka l` ba na ŋmɛɛɦeedbɛɦnii, ɦà diilg n ɦà ni na ɦà berma kpaa kpena gwelŋa.
40024049	Lee wen, ɦà mug ɦà ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurmba ɦà gbum, ka kad ka ju ka nyi, wú n dakuudba.
40024050	Goor diir ɦà bermwii nan kpen ɦà mid ɦà kpaa hɔd, ka ta kpaa mi waaru ɦan kpena ɦuu ɦɛn.
40024051	Lee wen, ɦà dar ɦà tobr kimm, ɦà voo-wu, bà lɔɔlg-wu rarbɛɦm tiiba kaalaŋa. Reekan nnii ɦan ta kee ɦà kom ka duum ɦà nyina.»
40025001	«Lee, saŋgbambiimn huraant nan ba t` tɔn wo biirii kwiɦr hí da lɔgr hì kana n rorm n san na hì tuug yaala kuliiga hii.
40025002	Hí huuga hinuhi da ba joojoont, hinuhi ba rarm.
40025003	Hí da ba joojoont hii t lɔgm hí kana gwɛntaɦ', n ka ba lɔg kpaam na hì ked ka mad.
40025004	Rarm rei lee, hii t lɔgm hí kana, n ŋmɛt n lo kpaam kpalbɦan n ka mad.
40025005	L´ ɦɛm na yaala kuliiga ba daan weem, goom t mug biiriihii mɛnhii, hí gor.
40025006	Tuŋkoɦgu huuga, noor diir t dan n tool na: ‟Yaala kuliiga kena lena! Riir-n n` tuug-ka!”
40025007	Yelmaa, biirii kwiɦrhii t himtr kpirkpir, n baɦ n ka maantra hì kana.
40025008	Joojooŋbiiriihii t bɔɦɔɔ rarm rei na: ‟Si-n-t kpaam jaɦ', t` kana kuuln!”
40025009	Rarm rei t leed-hi na: ‟Ĥaai, l` kpaɦ l` ta na t` si-n, ked-n yakun n` daɦ!”
40025010	Joojooŋbiiriihii t san na hì daɦ kpaam, yelmaa yaala kuliigee t taan. Rarm biirii hinuhi hin maantr hiyen hii t jib yaala disakun kuliigee kaa, bá riw huturu n gar.
40025011	Biirivolhii t dan n taan n kaan, n ka toola na: ‟Berma, berma! Rawdg t` jibn!”
40025012	Yaala kuliigee t leed-hi na: ‟Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, mà kpaa mii-n.”»
40025013	Yeesua nn gwɛɛl-ba nawdlamii lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Neer-n ka sug na, n` kpaa mi goor ka ta kpaa mi waaru!»
40025014	«L` nan ba l` bɛm wo nidɦii nn da ked huru n ɦɛm lee. Ĥan da bo na ɦà san huru lee, n hoɦ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba n to-ba ɦá kwɛgdm.
40025015	Ĥà da to noogrwu ruuni lɛmi ɦinu, reɦdrwu ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦ', taɦrwu ruuni lɛmu. Ĥà da to-ba ka kɛɛmla volwu n ɦà beer, volwu n ɦà beer, lee n nyab.
40025016	Ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦà da soɦdg ruuni lɛmi ɦinuɦi wii t lɔgm lig̈biirii n baɦ yaku ɦɛb yelmaa, l´ hewl-wu ta ruuni lɛmi ɦinu.
40025017	Ĥá da soɦdg ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦi wii t ta ɦɛm welee, l´ hewl-wu ta ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦ'.
40025018	L´ saa ɦá da soɦdg ruuni lɛmu wii t tiim vadb n kuur ɦá berma lig̈biirii.
40025019	«L´ hiid, ŋmɛɛɦeedbee bermwii t kpen, n hoɦm-ba na bá werii-wu ɦà lig̈biir.
40025020	Ĥá da soɦdg ruuni lɛmi ɦinuɦi wii t daan n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! Da to-ma ruuni lɛmi ɦinu, má lɔgm-ɦi n ɦɛm yaku, n yuuŋ ta ruuni lɛmi ɦinuɦi volɦi, ɦii nnanaɦ'.”
40025021	Ĥá berma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟L` ba hɔm, ven nnii ŋmɛɛɦeedhɔma. Wo vn mug want t´ ba jaɦ tii hɔm lee, maa mà to-v want t` ba kɔd tii. Jibn mà haarn v` jum lamɛɛgu!”
40025022	Ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá da soɦdg ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦi wii t ta daan n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! Da to-ma ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦ', má lɔgm-ɦi n ɦɛm yaku, n yuuŋ ta ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦi volɦi, ɦii nnanaɦ'.”
40025023	Ĥá berma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟L` ba hɔm, ven nnii ŋmɛɛɦeedhɔma. Wo vn mug want t` ba jaɦ tii hɔm lee, maa mà to-v want t` ba kɔd tii. Jibn mà haarn v` jum lamɛɛgu!”
40025024	L´ saa, ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá da soɦdg ruuni lɛmu wii t daan n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! Mà miil na ven nii nidɦii ɦá gwɛɛt ba gemm wii. Vii lɔgl dikaɦb v` kan da ba bod ree, n vaad dikaɦb v` kan da ba diin bii ree.
40025025	Fobɛɦgu da ɦera-ma, má san n tiim vadb n kuur v` lig̈biirii, tii lee, jaɦ v` want!”
40025026	Ĥá bermwii t leed-wu na: ‟Ŋmɛɛɦeedbɛɦgu ven, waamgunkuna! Ndee da miil na maa lɔgl dikaɦb mà kan da ba bod ree, na mà vaada dikaɦb mà kan da ba diin ree.
40025027	Vn da mi welee lee, l` da ba na v` lo mà lig̈biirii bankan, man kpen mà mid d´ meed n hewl, mà soɦdg-d n yadgu mɛɦ'.
40025028	Soɦdg-n ɦà do ruuni lɛmɦuu n` to-ɦu ɦá da ba n ruuni lɛmi ɦinu wii!
40025029	Miim-n na, ɦá ba n bii wii, bà nan mɔɔ-wu saɦb, ɦà bɛm n kwɛgdm kɔd kpaalaa. L´ saa, ɦá kpaɦ n bii wii, bà nan fɛla bà soɦdg ɦà do bii tutugm ɦan ba n bii.
40025030	Ŋmɛɛɦeedbɛɦgunkuna lee, kù kpaɦ na bá ɦee-ku n bii, kɔɦdg-n-ku nyeetn! Reekan nnii kun ba kù kom ka duum kù nyina.”»
40025031	«Nida Budaaga daa kena kà jeegun ká n saŋgbantumtba mɛmba lee, kà kad kà huraant jargan.
40025032	Tant ɦɛn tiga kpogl taa ɦà biɦ kà nɔngan, kà ro nidba volba n bayen, volba n bayen, wo kimta nn ro fɛi n ɦiyen, buri n ɦiyen lee.
40025033	Kà nan lɔɔ fɛi n kà najuudu wee, kà lo buri n kà galu wee.
40025034	«Lee wen, huraa biir bá ba n ɦà najuudu wee bee na: ‟Nen, mà Sa nn kaawl n` ɦɛn nen, daan-n n` soɦdg huraant! Bà da maantr-n-t tant reem daa n dool.
40025035	Biilm, kɔm da kura-ma, n´ saɦm-ma diit. Nyunyuudu da kura-ma, n´ saɦm-ma nyaalm. Mà da ba saana, n´ soɦd-ma n` hayan.
40025036	Mà da kpaɦ n dimgu, n´ saɦm-ma dimgu. Mà da doora bɛɦii, n´ kiigm mà ɦɛn. Mà da reewra sargan, n´ daan n luud-ma.”
40025037	«Lee, nidhɔmba bá da ɦɛna Saŋgband sɔklb ɦɛn bee gbaam-wu na: ‟¿Berma! Tedaa nnii tn da nyan-v kɔm t kuu-v, t´ saɦm-v diitii? ¿Tedaa nnii tn da nyan-v nyunyuudu t kuu-v, t´ saɦm-v nyaalmii?
40025038	¿Tedaa nnii tn da nyan-v v` ba saana, t´ soɦd-v t` haya nii?, laa, ¿v` kpaɦ n dimgu, t´ saɦm-v dimgu?
40025039	¿Tedaa nnii tn da nyan-v v` ba n bɛɦii laa v` reewr sargan, t´ daan n luud-vii?”
40025040	Lee, huraa leedg-ba na: ‟Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, nidba ɦii nn kpaa lɔg wo bii bee, bà ta ba na mà teelban. Nn da tɔra bà ni ɦiiwu lee wen, man nnii nn da tɔra.”
40025041	«Tii n t` kaann, huraa biir bá ba n ɦà galu wee bee na: ‟Nen, Saŋgband nn da gwɛɛl nobɛɦr n` kaa nen, nyab-n mà man n` san vɔkun! Ked-n boglam m` bee kakeɦnan miin! Bà da maantr-m Kunidwu n ɦà tumtba.
40025042	Biilm, kɔm da kura-ma, n´ ka ba si-ma diit. Nyunyuudu da kura-ma, n´ ka ba si-ma nyaalm.
40025043	Mà da ba saana, n´ ka ba soɦdg-ma n` hayan. Mà da kpaɦ n dimgu, n´ ka ba si-ma dimgu. Mà da ba n bɛɦii, laa mà da ba sargan, n´ ka ba kiig mà ɦɛn.”
40025044	«Lee, bee leedg-wu na: ‟Berma! ¿Tedaa nnii tn da nyan-v kɔm t kuu-v laa, nyunyuudu t kuu-v laa, v` ba saana laa, v` kpaɦ n dimgu laa, v` ba n bɛɦii laa, v` ba sargan, t´ ka ba tɔrg-vii?”
40025045	Lee, huraa leedg-ba na: ‟Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, nn da kpaa tɔra mà teelba ni ɦiiwu lee wen, ta man nnii nn da ta kpaa tɔra.”
40025046	Lee, bà dar bà tobr bà ɦom wiiru l` kpaa diɦaa, l` saa hɔmba jib neerm m` bee kakeɦnan miin.»
40026001	Yeesua nn bed gwɛɛtii l´ diɦ lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na:
40026002	«N` miil na l` tɛla goora ɦarɛɦ na bá di Gɛtgm kasant. Baa bà gweedm Nida Budaaga na bà kpaɦ-ka dabragr ɦɛn.»
40026003	Lee wen, gotibermba n Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba t kpogl taa gotiberm Kayiifa haarn.
40026004	Bà lo noor Yeesua ɦɛn na bà ɦe rarm bà mug-wu bà ku.
40026005	Bà da beda na: «L` kpaɦ na t` mug-wu kasant gooran, ka lag welee, kɔrgu ba kù vidg t` ɦɛn.»
40026006	Yeesua da ba Betaanii kɔrgun, bolmɦii haarn bà hoɦ-wu na Simoona.
40026007	Fɔgɦii t nyuɦ ɦá man, ka mad kpalaliiga kiiga ká ba kwɛɛlm biii, daɦt kpakunuukaɦm ba ká keɦ'. Ĥan nyuɦ ɦá man lee, n vu kpaamii ɦà jugu, ɦà ɦeewr n diit n deb.
40026008	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t yum welee l´ weer-ba, bá bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Ĥà koɦl kpaamii na laa?
40026009	Ban ba bà gweedm-m daɦt, bà lɔg m´ lig̈biir bà si katɛdtiiba.»
40026010	Yeesua t miig na fɔg̈wii gwɛɛt nnii ban bɔɦɔɔ, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn lɔɔ fɔg̈wii kunyɔŋu? Ĥan ɦer-ma bii, b` ba hɔm.
40026011	Katɛdtiiba lee, bee ba bà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan. Man lee, mà kpaɦ mà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan.
40026012	Ĥan vu mà gbanu kpaam lee, ɦà maantr-ɦu na bá kuur-ɦu bilun.
40026013	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ban nan ba bà faam Gohɔmt tant mɛntn lee, bà nan ba bà bɔɦɔɔm bii fɔg̈wii nn ɦer bii, ka deeda ɦá ɦɛn.»
40026014	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee huuga bilma da bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Yuudaas Kariyoot tia. Wii t san gotibermba man,
40026015	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka má gweedm-n Yeesu, ¿n` to-ma bee?» Lee, bá kaalm lig̈bkpaŋ̈m kwɛɛtaɦ n faadm-wu.
40026016	Lee wen, ɦá baɦ n ka bag huru ɦú ba ɦù tɔrg na ɦá gweedm-ba-wu ɦuu.
40026017	Kpooni kasant deb gonoogrd t taan, bà da ɦɛna-ɦi ka kpaa sɔd ragr tɛɛgtn. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam Yeesu na: «¿Tee nnii vn sɔkla na t` san t` dig Gɛtgm kasant diit?»
40026018	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ked-n kɔrgun wenguaa n` biir-wu na mà bɔɦɔɔ na mà vuugu taann, na ɦaa nnii man ba mà di Gɛtgm kasant, má n mà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba.»
40026019	Bá san n ɦɛm wo ɦan bed-ba na bá ɦe lee, n dig Gɛtgm kasant diit.
40026020	Muunu nn lɔɔr lee, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee, bá baɦ diit deb.
40026021	Ban da ɦeewr n deb lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, n` huuga ɦii ba ɦà gweedm-ma.»
40026022	L´ ɦɛm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba fobɛɦgu biii. Bá baɦ n ka gbaama-wu ɦayen ɦayen na: «Berma! ¿Man laa?»
40026023	Ĥá leed na: «Ĥii man n ɦà t` heɦg kpoonu jit sumgan wii, wii kee ɦà gweedm-ma.
40026024	Nida Budaaga ba kà kpi wo ln ɦɔd ká gwɛɛt Wadbuudgan lee, gwɛntaɦ lee, nid ɦá ba ɦà gweedm-ka wii, kunyɔŋbermgu nan luura ɦà ɦɛn. Ka bà da ba meed wii, ln bɛm hɔm l` yatg.»
40026025	Yuudaas ɦá da gweedm-wu wii t yaɦd ɦá noor n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Man laa?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Beda tii nnii.»
40026026	Ban da ɦeewr n diit deb lee, Yeesua t lɔgm kpoonu n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n gbeɦm-ɦu, n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Jaɦ-n n` di! Mà gbanu nnii.»
40026027	Tii kaann, ɦá ta lɔgm kpowdga n daam, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n to-ba-ka, ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyii-n-ka n` mɛmbee!
40026028	Mà jiim nnii. Mii lɔɔ tuurnt Saŋgband n nidba l´ huuga. Mii kee m` sool nidba kɔd kaa na l´ waal bà fubɛɦii.
40026029	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na waa, jana n jaɦ mà nan ta kpaa nyi daam kakeɦnan goor má n nn tn nan nyi dakwɛɛlm mà Sa huraantn.»
40026030	Tii n t` kaan bá yuum kasantii yumii. L´ tog, bá ka kedaa Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn.
40026031	Ban ked lee, ɦà bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nyingunkuna nii, n` kee n` siil n` yadr taa n` mɛmbee l` baɦr n man, n` lag n` kir Saŋgband, wo dn bed Wadbuudgan na: D` nan kua kimta, l` saa kodiirn fɛi yadr taa kpeee n koot.»
40026032	Lee, ɦá ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Man kee mà himtg kuumn lee, mà san Galilee tantn mà hɔd-n kan.»
40026033	Fetra t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l´ yatg wo ben, volba t kirm Saŋgband l` baɦr n vn, man lee, maa kpaɦ mà kir-d felaɦ'.»
40026034	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, nyingunkuna nii, saɦ na kɔdaaga jawdgaa, v´ fɛtg foorb tɔmb mtaɦm na kpaa mii-ma.»
40026035	Fetra t leed-wu na: «Ka l` la ba na má n vn t` kpia, mà kpaɦ mà gbu mà feer na mà kpaa mii-v.» Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba volbee t ta bɔɦɔɔ bá mɛmbee yenmii.
40026036	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá taai kaalaŋa kiigan, bà hoɦ-ka na Getsimanii. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Kad-n nnaɦ'! Maa sanii laɦaa mà seeŋ Saŋgband.»
40026037	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, n lɔgm Fetrwu n Jebdea kwɛɛlba bareɦbee, wú n ban l´ san. Himaɦr t mug-wu, ɦá rarm t ka fid ɦá ni.
40026038	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Himaɦr hu mà kwɛɛwrn, mà rarm t ka fid, mà hurgan diɦaa. Kpat-n nnaɦ n` bɛm ka neer, daa gor-n, má n nn t` neer!»
40026039	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, n dodgii jaɦ', n luurm tiŋan, n baɦ ɦá nɔnga n tant n ka jowaa Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai, mà Sa! Ka l` ba l` si huruu, v` lɔg wiiru kpowdgankena v` san n kan n vɔku, ká daa daan mà ɦɛn. Gwɛntaɦaa, l´ ɦe wo vii nn sɔkla lee, l´ daa ɦe wo maa nn sɔkla lee!»
40026040	Ĥá ŋmɛtgn gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee man n mid bà go. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ Fetr na: «Ka welee, ¿n` ba bee na má n nn t` neer waaru ɦuyenɦu mɔmɦu?
40026041	Neer-n ka jobla Saŋgband na bii daa hogl-n! Nida diilan ba na ɦá ɦɛm bii hɔmb, gwɛntaɦaa, ɦà gbanu ba gigdm.»
40026042	Ĥá dodgii tɔmreɦdrm, n jow Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai, mà Sa! Ka l` ba na kpowdgankena daa gɛtg, na l` ba na mà nyii-kaa, l´ ɦe v` sɔklb jugun!»
40026043	Ĥá ta lilm ŋmɛtgnm ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba man, n mid bà go, bà niini ba jeegu n goom, bà kpaa bea na bà muudg-ɦi.
40026044	Ĥá lilm bá man nyabm, n dodgii, n jow Saŋgband tɔmtaɦrm ka bɔɦɔɔ goyentii.
40026045	L´ nan diɦ ɦá ŋmɛtgn gwɛɛt soɦdgtbee man n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿N` la doora ka go ka voɦaa? Nyaan-n! Waaru taan nnii na bá mug Nida Budaaga bà taag-ka fubɛɦtiiba natadn.
40026046	Vidg-n t` nyab-n! Kpay-n! Nid ɦá gweedma-ma wii nanaɦ'.»
40026047	Yeesua nn da ɦeewr n gwɛɛlb lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee huuga bilma, bà hoɦ-wu na Yuudaasa t taan. Nidba kɔd da tagda ɦà kaa, ka mad hoodjui n dagbɛɦa. Gotibermba n Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba da tomra-ba na bá mug Yeesua.
40026048	Yuudaasa da beda nidba ban da tomr na bá mug-wu bee na: «Nid man kee mà seeŋ mà ɦog wii, wii nnii. Mug-n-wu!»
40026049	Ban taai Yeesua man lee, Yuudaasa t seeŋ-wu yelmaa na: «Taa maara! V` gbanɦuu!» n ɦog-wu.
40026050	Yeesua t leed-wu na: «Mà tuura! Ĥe vn daan na v` ɦe bii!» Lee wen, nidba ban da tamn bee t tiɦd ɦá ɦɛn n mug-wu.
40026051	Yeesua tuurmba bá da ba ɦà man bee huuga bilma t rood ɦá hoodjuuga ruugan, n kɛɦd gotiberma ŋmɛɛɦeeda tobr n git.
40026052	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Venaa! Ŋmɛlg v` hoodjuugee ká ruugan! Miim-n na biiba bá jaɦr hoodjui bee, bà nan ta kuul bá mɛmbee hoodjuuga kuum.
40026053	Diila na ¿mà kpaɦ mà bee mà gbaam mà Sawu saŋgbantumtba fonfoni kwiɦr n ɦiriɦ ɦà tuun-ma-ba gwɛɦmna laa?
40026054	Ka má ɦe welee, ¿l` ɦe lan na gwɛɛt ln ɦɔd Wadbuudgan tii bee t` ɦe t´ noor ɦɛn wo ln gbaam lee?»
40026055	Lee, ɦá ta bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm na: «¿N` lɔgra hoodjui n dagbɛɦa n daan mà do wo na man nnii bawd laa? Goor wo goor, mà kad Saŋgband haarn ka weraa gwɛɛt, n` kpaa mugaa-ma.
40026056	Tii lee, bii nn ɦɛna-ma bii mɛmbii, l` ɦɛna welee na gwɛɛt weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bɔɦɔɔ ka doola tii ɦe t´ noor ɦɛn.» Lee wen, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t solm bá mɛmbee n saa-wu ɦayen.
40026057	Bá da mug Yeesuwu bee t san-wu n gotiberm Kayiifaa. Baɦlb weriitba n kpalmmba, bee t kpogl taa kan.
40026058	Fetra da sabaa bà kaa ka ba vɔkun, ka geewa Yeesua, n san n taai gotibermaa, n jib bá kaa haaga, n kad tawdba man, na ɦà nyaan ln ba l` toglg n bii.
40026059	Gotibermba n yaani yaadbermbee mɛmbee t ka bag na bà nyaan gokaat gwɛɛt tiit bà biir n Yeesua ɦɛn ka bo na bà kuu-wu.
40026060	Nidba kɔd nn da la kena kan ka tokla gokaat hɛnt ɦà ɦɛn lee, l` kpaa ta na bá kuu-wu. Kaannaa, nidba bareɦba t rorm n jeɦnt,
40026061	n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna da beda na ɦà ba ɦà bee ɦà gbuɦ Saŋgband disaku ɦà ŋmɛtg ɦà lɔg goora ɦataɦ ɦà mɛɦ-ku.»
40026062	Gotiberma t vid n jeɦnt, n bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «¿Kpaa leeda liin? ¿Nidbambena bɔɦɔɔ na lan v` ɦɛnii?»
40026063	Ĥá kpat n ka hen belbel. Gotiberma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Saŋgband bee! Mà gbaama-v d´ hidrn na v` leedg-t gwɛɛt ka foor. ¿Ven nnii Krist Saŋgband Budaaga laa?»
40026064	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Beda tii nnii. Lee mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, l´ lɔg jana l` san n nɔngan, n` nan yul Nida Budaaga kad Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia najuudu ɦɛn. N` nan ta yul-ka wat ɦɛn kà kena n faaga.»
40026065	Lee wen, gotiberma t sad ɦá dimgu n kwɛɛwweerga n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥà gwɛɛl ka suuda Saŋgband. T` ta kpaa haaraa na ɦii biir-t lii ɦà ɦɛn. N` mɔmba n` ɦomra ɦan suudg Saŋgband lee.
40026066	¿N` diila na laa?» Bá leed na: «Ĥà koɦl gwɛɛt l´ mag na bá kuu-wu.»
40026067	Ban bed welee lee, n lɔɦdr ɦá nɔnga ɦɛn nyanyaat, n gbum-wu kuda. Volba t waagm-wu kataŋii,
40026068	ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ven nnii Krista, ¿laa laa? Biir-t! ¿T` ni wen gbudg-vii?»
40026069	Fetra da kpat n ka ba haaga. Ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔgɦii t nyuɦ ɦá man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ven, da ta ba Yeesu Galilee tiiwii man.»
40026070	Ĥá kii nidba mɛmba nɔngan ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà kpaa mi vn bo na v` biir tii.»
40026071	Tii kaann, ɦá san fiid noon, ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔgvola t ta yum-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ bá da ba kan bee na: «Wunwii da ba Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tiiwii man.»
40026072	Fetra t lilm kiim ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà foora na mà kpaa mi nidwunwuna.»
40026073	L´ mɔɔ jaɦ', bá da ba kan bee t nyuɦ Fetra, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Biilm, ven nnii bá huuga bilma, v` gwɛɛlb rɛɛra-v.»
40026074	Reekan, Fetra t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka mà bɔɦɔɔ gokaatii, Saŋgband dar mà tobr! Mà foora na mà kpaa mi nidwunwuna.» Ĥan ɦeewr n gwɛɛtii n bɔɦɔɔb lee, kɔdaaga t jawd.
40026075	Lee wen, Fetra t deed gwɛɛt Yeesua nn da bed-wu tii na: ‟Saɦ na kɔdaaga jawdgaa, v´ fɛtg foorb tɔmb mtaɦm na kpaa mii-ma.” Ĥan deedg welee lee, n rorm duun n kom n diɦ ɦá ni.
40027001	Ĥateekwɛɛn weem, gotibermba mɛmba, n Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba t lo noor na bà ɦe na bà ku Yeesua,
40027002	n wed bá bɔm-wu n san n taag-wu gomn Filaata natadn.
40027003	Yuudaas ɦá da gweedm Yeesuwu wii nn nyan na bà lo noor na bà ku Yeesu lee, ɦá kom ɦayen, n lɔgm lig̈bkpaŋ̈m kwɛɛtaɦm ban da faadr-wu mii, n san na ɦà ŋmɛlg gotibermba n kpalmmba.
40027004	Ĥan san lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà gweedm nidhɔmwu n ɦà nyɔnyɔgm na bá kuu-wu. Mà ɦera fubɛɦga.» Bá leed-wu na: «L` ba nyaan-t rii, v` gwɛɛtn.»
40027005	Yuudaasa t kɔɦd lig̈biirii Saŋgband disakun, n san n baɦ ɦayenwu muɦu n kuum.
40027006	Gotibermba t lɔgm lig̈biirii, n bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Jiim lig̈biirn. T` baɦlb kpaa saɦ huru na bá lo-d Saŋgband haar kadakŋan.»
40027007	Tii n t` kaann, bá ɦom n taa, n lɔgm lig̈biirii, n daɦm daformɔɦdɦii koogu, na bà kugm kun nidsaanba.
40027008	Tii kaa nnii ban la hoɦ kooguu n jana na ‟Jiim koogu”.
40027009	Lee wen nnii, gwɛɛt weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yeremia nn da bed tii nn da ɦer t` noor ɦɛn. Tii nnii na: Bà lɔgra lig̈bkpaŋ̈m kwɛɛtaɦm, lig̈biir Yisraɦeel tiiba nn da ɦomr n taa na bà faad ɦá ɦɛn dii,
40027010	n daɦm daformɔɦdɦii koogu, wo Saberma nn da sir-ma wad lee.
40027011	Yeesua t jeɦnt gomna nɔngan, ɦá gbaam-wu na: «¿Ven nnii Yuudaa tiiba huraa?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Beda tii nnii.»
40027012	Tii n t` kaann, gotibermba n kpalmmba t kudm gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ɦɛn. Ĥá ka ba leedg lii.
40027013	Filaata t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Kpaa ɦum gwɛɛt kɔd ban kena n v` ɦɛn tiin?»
40027014	Ĥá ka ba leedg gwɛɛgu kuyengu mɔmgu ɦɛn felaɦ', l´ ɦɛm gomnwu yɔlaa yem.
40027015	Bind wo bind, Gɛtgm kasant nn taana lee, gomna t ree sarga tiiɦiiwu sargan, kɔrgu nn sɔkl wii, n hoɦl.
40027016	Lee wen, l´ mid nidɦii reewr sargan bà hoɦ-wu na Barabaasa, nidba mɛmba mii-wu.
40027017	Nidba t kpogl taa figm, Filaata t gbaam-ba na: «¿N` sɔkla na mà ree wenwu sargan mà hoɦlga?, ¿Barabaas laa, Yeesu ban hoɦ na Krist wii le?»
40027018	Biilm, Filaata mɔma da miil na bermba da ɦera nɔmmɔlb n taag Yeesuwu ɦà natadn.
40027019	Filaata nn da kad ɦà huraant jargan ka yaa lee, ɦá fɔga t tamn nid na ɦá biir-wu na: «Daa jib nidwunwuna gwɛɛtn! Ĥà ba n ɦà nyɔnyɔgm. Nyingunkuna nii, mà diira kunyɔŋu biii ɦá kaa jaamiitn.»
40027020	Gotibermba n kpalmmba t haɦm nidba na bá gbaam na bà ree Barabaaswu sargan, l` saa bà ku Yeesua.
40027021	Gomna t lilm-ba gbaamb na: «¿Bareɦdrbee huuga, n` sɔkla na mà ree wen mà hoɦlgaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Barabaasa.»
40027022	Ĥá ta ŋmɛt n gbaam-ba na: «¿Maa mà ɦe lan n Yeesu ban hoɦ na Krist wii?» Bá mɛmbee t leed na: «Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn!»
40027023	Filaata t gbaam-ba na: «¿Ĥà koɦl ben mɔmbii?» Lee wen, bá nagd bá ni n ka toola na: «Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn!»
40027024	Filaata wen nyan na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà ɦe bii, nidba gwɛda n kwɛɛn ka biira lee, ɦá lɔgm nyaalm, n nit ɦá niɦi bá nɔngan, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà gwɛɛt kpaɦ nidwunwuna kuumn. N` gwɛɛtn.»
40027025	Nidfigmii t leed-wu na: «T´ n t` bii t` gwɛɛtn.»
40027026	Lee wen, Filaata t ree Barabaaswu sargan, n wed bá gbum Yeesuwu taŋgbanii. Ban gbur-wu lee, ɦá lɔgm-wu n taag bá natadn na bá kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn.
40027027	Lee, tawdba t san Yeesuwu n gomna haarn. Bá hiinɦuu mɛnɦuu t kpogl taa ɦá man.
40027028	Bá fitr ɦá dimt, n lɔgm dimmɔlgu n fid-wu.
40027029	L´ saa bá bagm ɦina jajalɦi n ruugm degrga n lig-wu, n bagm nyakaku n to-wu ɦá najuudun. Ban ɦer welee lee, n ka gbaɦnta dind ɦà tiŋa, ka laɦ-wu, ka seeŋa-wu na: «Taa maara! V` gbanɦuu!»
40027030	Bà da lɔɦdra nyanyaat ɦá ɦɛn, ka soɦdra nyakakuu ka gbu ɦá jutaŋtaŋan.
40027031	Ban laɦr-wu l´ tog lee, bá fit-wu dimmɔlgu bá nn fid-wu kuu, n ŋmɛt n fidm-wu ɦá dimt, n san n wun na bà kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn.
40027032	Ban red kɔrguun lee, n taŋ n daawɦii, bà hoɦ-wu na Simoona. Ĥà da ba na Sirɛɛn kɔrgu tiin. Bá mug-wu n kwɛgdi na ɦá tu Yeesua dabragr.
40027033	Bá san n taai kaalaŋa kiigan, bà hoɦ-ka na Golgotaa, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na ‟Jukuuga”.
40027034	Reekan, bá lɔgm ragr diir, n sɔdm daamn, n to Yeesu na ɦá nyi. Ĥan lɛm daamii lee, n kirm na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà nyi.
40027035	Tii kaann, bá kpaɦm-wu dabragr ɦɛn, n raarm taa ɦá dimt ka taaw t` ɦɛn waari na ɦá bee n jum dimgu kuuguu, ɦà lɔg-ku.
40027036	L´ saa, bá kad kan n ka sug-wu.
40027037	Bá lɔgm dagwɛku, n ɦoorm kú ɦɛn bii ban kpaɦr-wu b` kaa bii, n kpaɦ-ku ɦá jugu faaga. Bà da ɦɔda kù ɦɛn na ‟Wunwii nnii Yeesua, Yuudaa tiiba huraa”.
40027038	Bà da ta kpaɦra bawdba bareɦba ɦá kpama, volwu n ɦà najuudu ɦɛn, volwu n ɦà galu ɦɛn.
40027039	Nidba bá da beraa n kan bee da jool-wu nanjoi ka suu-wu,
40027040	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ven, ven da bag na v` gbuɦ Saŋgband disaku na v` ŋmɛtg v` lɔg goora ɦataɦ v` mɛɦ jeengu ven, ¿kpaɦ v` bee v` soɦdg vyenwu kuum nii? Ka l` ba na ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga, hoɦntn nan dabragr ɦɛn t` nyaana!»
40027041	L´ saa gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba, n kpalmmba, bee ta laɦ-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
40027042	«¿Ndee ɦà da soɦda nidvolba kuumn laa? ¿L´ ɦɛm lan ɦan kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà soɦdg ɦayen? ¿Lag wii nnii Yisraɦeel tiiba huraa? Gwɛɦma lee, ɦá hoɦntn nan dabragr ɦɛn, l` saa t` tii ɦà ɦɛn.
40027043	Ĥà da lɔgra ɦayen n to Saŋgband, n ka kɔkma na wii nnii d´ Budaaga. Tii lee, ka Saŋgband sɔkla-wu hɔm gobiint, d´ daɦ nan ɦá jugua!»
40027044	L´ lag n bawdba ban da kpaɦr ɦà man bee mɛɦba t ka ta suu-wu wo volbee nn da suu-wu lee.
40027045	L´ waɦd muunu huuga, muunu t lig, nyeet t fiid tant mɛnt kakeɦnan jabr waari ɦitaɦ'.
40027046	Ln san n ka waɦda waari ɦitaɦi weenn lee, Yeesua t tool kimm n ɦà lamn na: «Ĥelii! Ĥelii! ¿Lamaa sabaktanii?» L´ kɔtɔd nnii na: «Mà Saŋgband! Mà Saŋgband! ¿L` ɦer lan vn vaa-maa ?»
40027047	Bá da ba kan n ɦom welee bee ni biiba t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ĥà hoɦl Ĥelia.»
40027048	Bá huuga bilma t solm, n lɔgm dimtoogu n veɦ-ku daŋmiigun, n viil-ku nyakaka noon, n teedgii-ku Yeesu na ɦá mɔg daamii.
40027049	Volba t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hɔdg saɦ t` nyaan na ¿mig Ĥelia ba ɦà daan ɦà soɦdg-wu kuumn laa?»
40027050	Yeesua t lilm ŋmɛɛga kimm n kuum.
40027051	L´ waarɦuu ɦɛnii, dimgu kú da lil Saŋgband disakun kuu, kú kɛɛml kú huuga n sad kpaaaw faaga kakeɦnan tiŋa. Tant t dam, fiini t waagm muuli.
40027052	Bili noora t huudr. Saŋgbantiiba kɔd bá da kpiidr weem bee t himtr kuumn,
40027053	n rorm bilin. L´ saa Yeesua himtgm kaann, bá jib kɔrbuudgun, nidba kɔd t yum-ba.
40027054	Roomaa tawdbermwu n tawdba wú n bà da sug Yeesua ɦɛn bee, bá yum tant nn dam lee, n bii b` ɦer bii mɛmbii. Lee wen fobɛɦgu t mug-ba biii, bá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biilm, nidwunwuna da ba na Saŋgband Budaagan.»
40027055	Fɔg̈ba kɔd da ba kan ka jeɦraa vɔkun ka geewa. Bee da baɦ Galilee tantn n ka tagd ɦà kaa, ka tɔra-wu.
40027056	Maarii Magdalaa tiiwu n Maarii Yakoobwu n Yoosɛf bà nya, n Jebdea kwɛɛlba nya da ba fɔg̈ba bá da ba kan bee huuga.
40027057	Jabr nn dan n jab lee, Ĥarimatee kɔrgun dakwɛgtiiɦii t daan, bà hoɦ-wu na Yoosɛfa, ka ta kitg Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgta.
40027058	Ĥá san Filaata man, n gbaam-wu Yeesua gbanu. Filaata t saɦm huru na bá to-wu-ɦu.
40027059	Bá wen to-wu kpiira, ɦá fiid-wu dimkwɛɛlgun,
40027060	n san n kuur bilkwɛɛlun, ka da tii-ɦu fiigun n dool-ɦu ɦayen. Ĥan kuur-wu lee, n biruu tanbibiɦgu n riw bilɦuu noor ɦɛn, n kulii.
40027061	Lee wen, Maarii Magdalaa tiiwii n Maarii volwii da ba kan ka kad bilɦuu nɔngan.
40027062	Goorii toŋvɛtr da ba na voɦoob goorn. Gotibermba n Farisii tiiba t kpogl taa, n san Filaata man,
40027063	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Taa maara! T` deedg na gokaat tiiwii nn da neer lee, ɦà da bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà kee ɦà himtg gotaɦrd goor kuumn ɦà neer.
40027064	Tii lee, si wad na tawdba kiigm ɦá bilɦuu ɦɛn kakeɦnan goora ɦataɦa, ka bo na ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba daa ɦe bà sabii bà lɔg ɦá gbanu, bà da bà bɔɦɔɔm kɔrgun na ɦà himtg kuumn. Ka l´ ɦe na bá biir welee gokaatii, l` koɦl gwɛɦŋa kpaalaa l` yatg ln da ba nooga lee.»
40027065	Filaata t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` ba n tawdba. Tom-n-ba bà kiig bilɦuu ɦɛn wo nn ba n` bee lee!»
40027066	Bá san bilɦuu man n gwɛɦdr ɦú noon tandii n jeɦl kan tawdba na bá sugm.
40028001	Saabaat goor nn da gɛtg lee, l´ vɛt laad. Goorii ɦateekwɛɛn, muunkwɛɛlu, Maarii Magdalaa tiiwii n Maarii volwii, bá san na bà nyaan bilu.
40028002	Myenm jugun, tant t nyamr kimm, Saberma tumtɦii t rɛn saŋgbambiimn n hoɦntn, n biruu tand d´ da reewr bilu noor ɦɛn dii, n dool kpamga, n kad d´ jugun.
40028003	Ĥà da ŋmɛdwa wo toŋu nn ŋmɛdaa lee, ɦà dimt ba feent wasaɦ'.
40028004	Fobɛɦgu t mug tawdba biii, bá baɦ n ka deɦra kpaɦkpaɦ, n kit wo kpiirmba.
40028005	Saŋgbantumta t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ fɔg̈bee na: «Nen lee, fobɛɦgu daa mad-n! Mà miil na n` bagl Yeesu ban kpaɦr dabragr ɦɛn wii.
40028006	Ĥà kpaɦ nnaɦ', ɦà himtg kuumn wo ɦan da bed lee. Daan-n! Kpay-n kaalaŋa bá kan da doolg-wu ree!
40028007	Solm-n weem, n` biir ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na ɦà himtg kuumn, lee gwɛɦŋa ɦà dɛɦdg n` nɔngan n san Galilee tantn. Reekan nnii nn kee n` nyaan-wu. Mà tn bo na mà biir-n tii nnii.»
40028008	Bá kpiduu n nyab bilɦuu man, fobɛɦgu n nyaag̈b mɛɦ mad-ba. Bá solm kili n san n Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n gelmga.
40028009	Yelmaa Yeesua t tuug-ba, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` gbanɦii!» Bá nyuɦ ɦá man, n mug ɦá nakpai, n doot-wu tiŋan ka jeeŋla-wu.
40028010	Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Fobɛɦgu daa mad-n! Ked-n n` biir mà teelba na bá san Galilee, reekan nnii ban kee bà nyaan-ma.»
40028011	Fɔg̈bee nn da baɦr huru ka ked lee, tawdba bá da sug bilu ɦɛn bee huuga biiba t ŋmɛtgii kɔrgun, n bɔɦɔɔ gotibermba bii b` gɛtg bii mɛmbii.
40028012	Gotibermba n kpalmmba t kpogl taa, n ɦom n taa, n lɔgm lig̈biir kɔd n faadm tawdba,
40028013	n baɦl-ba na: «Bɔɦɔɔm-n kɔrgun na ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba daan nyingu, n` door ka go, n bam ɦá gbanu.
40028014	Ka gomna t ɦom na bà baawra ɦà gbanu n` go, t` kwiiŋl ɦà kwɛɛwr, ɦà ta kpaɦ ɦà ɦee-n bii.»
40028015	Tawdba t soɦd lig̈biirii, n ta ɦɛm wo ban baɦl-ba na bá ɦe lee. Welee nnii gwɛɛtii nn yadg Yuudaa tiiba huuga kakeɦnan jana.
40028016	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n ɦayenwii t san Galilee tantn, n juul duuga Yeesua nn da werii-ba kee ɦɛn.
40028017	Bá wen nyan wii, n doot ɦá tiŋa ka jeeŋla-wu. Bá huuga biiba t ka la kpaa tia l` diɦaa bà ni.
40028018	Ĥá nyuɦ bá man n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Saŋgbambiim n tant ɦɛn gemmnt mɛnt taagra mà natadn.
40028019	-
40028020	Ked-n tiga mɛna nidba mɛmba man! Huurm-n-ba Saŋgband nyaalm, Sa, n Budaaga, n Voɦoom Buudm hidrn! Weriim-n-ba na bá valgm bii man to-n bii mɛmbii! Lee, n` ɦɛm bà kita mà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba. L´ saa, miim-n na maa mà bɛm n` man goorɦee mɛnɦee kakeɦnan tant diɦm goor!»
41001001	Nnaɦ nnii Gohɔmt t´ bɔɦɔɔ Saŋgband Budaaga Yeesu Krista gwɛɛt tii nn baɦaa.
41001002	L` ɦɔda gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya wadgan na: Saŋgband da beda na: Nyaana, maa mà tom mà tumtwu v` nɔngan na ɦá maantr-v huru.
41001003	Nidɦii toola kpamloŋun na: Maantr-n Sabermwu huru, koo-n-wu huri ɦì bɛm tiɦ'!
41001004	Tii nnii, Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa nn ree ɦayen kpamloŋun, n ka huur nidba nyaalm, ka faa na: «Lagii-n neerm! Tii-n bà hor-n Saŋgband nyaalm, ka bo na d´ waa-n n` fubɛɦii!»
41001005	Tii nnii, Yuudee tant mɛnt n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun tiiba nn da kena ɦà man. Bà da rea bà fubɛɦii ka bɔɦɔɔ nidba nɔngan, lee ɦà huur-ba Yɔrdaan koln.
41001006	Ĥà da hɛgra dimr bá rog-d n kaanfoɦt deera kowt, ka boow gband damr ɦá sargan. Ĥà da jul tawri, n kpam loolan hekpaam.
41001007	Ĥà da rea ka bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm na: «Ĥii ɦà kena mà kaa wii, ɦà ba n gemmnt ka yata-ma, mà kpaa tɔn na mà sunt ɦà tiŋa, mà gbentg ɦà nanawda ŋmiɦi.
41001008	Man lee, maa huura-n n nyaalm. Wii kee ɦà hor-n n Voɦoom Buudm.»
41001009	L´ vuuguu, Yeesua t rɛn Galilee tant kɔrgu kuugun, bà hoɦ-ku na Nasarɛɛt, n daan, Yohanɛɛsa t huurm-wu nyaalm Yɔrdaan koln.
41001010	Ln tog Yeesua t ka ror nyaalmn lee, n yum saŋgbambiim rawda, Voɦoom Buudm hoɦntna ɦà jugun kurŋmɛnd dela.
41001011	L´ saa ɦá ɦom noor diir rɛna n saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ven nnii mà Budaaga, mà sɔkla-v kpaalaa. Mà nyaag̈bii mɛmbii kulaa v` jugun.»
41001012	Lee kaann yelmaa, Saŋgband Voɦoom t heɦ-wu n san-wu n kpamloŋun.
41001013	Ĥá san n ɦɛm kan goora kwɛɦnaa, kunidba huraa Saatana ŋmɛgaa n wun. Ĥà da neera kpamnamt huuga, saŋgbantumtba tɔra-wu.
41001014	Ban mug Yohanɛɛs n riw sarga lee, Yeesua t vid n san Galilee tantn, n ka faa Gohɔmt Saŋgband nn bed tii.
41001015	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Vuugu ban da baɦ kuu taann. Saŋgband huraant nyuɦnn. Lagii-n neerm, l` saa n` tii Gohɔmtii ɦɛn!»
41001016	Wo Yeesua nn da ked ka kagraa Galilee nyaam gbiir lee, n yum ɦɔlii moogdba bareɦba, Simoonwu n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Ĥandrea. Bà da lɔɔla bɛdb nyaamn ka moog ɦɔlii.
41001017	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tagd-n mà kaa, l` saa n` faam Gohɔmt, nidba tia t´ ɦɛn, wo gwɛɦma nn lɔɔla n` bɛdni ka moog ɦɔlii lee!»
41001018	Yelmaa, bá saa kan bá bɛdni, n tag ɦá kaa.
41001019	Ĥá kɛdgii n nɔngan jaɦ', n yum teelvolba bareɦba, Yakoobwu n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Yohanɛɛsa. Bareɦdrbee da ba na Jebdea kwɛɛlban. Bà da ba bà kpiirgun, ka maantra bà bɛdni.
41001020	Yelmaa, ɦá hoɦ-ba. Bá vid n saa bá sa Jebdeewu n ɦà ŋmɛgdba kpiirgun, n nyab ka tagdaa ɦá kaa.
41001021	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t vid n san Kafarnahuum kɔrgun. L´ dan n taam Saabaat goor, ɦá jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun, n baɦ n ka weraa gwɛɛt.
41001022	Ĥá gwɛɛt weriibii t ka ɦɛna nidba bá da kewla-wu bee yɔlaa yem. Biilm, ɦà da kpaa tɔn wo baɦlb weriitba dela, wii da ba n gemmnt ka weraa hɔm.
41001023	Ĥan da ɦeewr-ba n weriib lee, nidɦii ba bá huuga, kunida jaarŋa-wu. Nidwii t vid n tool kimm na:
41001024	«Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia, ¿t´ n vn n tet? ¿Daan na v` kuu-t nnii? Mà miil-v hɔm: Ven nnii Saŋgband tumtbuuda!»
41001025	Yeesua t gwɛɛl n kunidwii n daat ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpat kpoɦ v` riir nidwii ni!»
41001026	Kunidwii t dam nidwii hɔm, n rorm ɦá ni ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga kimm.
41001027	L´ ɦɛm nidba mɛmba fobɛɦgu biii, bá ka gbaama taa na: «¿Lan nnii welee? Gokwɛɛntn nanaɦ'. Nidwunwuna ba n gemmnt! Ĥà saɦl kunidba wad bà vala-wu.»
41001028	L´ saa bá tool taa Yeesua gwɛɛt t yadgii Galilee tant mɛntn.
41001029	Bá rorm Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun, bá n Yeesuwu n Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, bá dɛɦd ka kedaa yelmaa Simoonwu n Ĥandreembaa.
41001030	Simoona yaafɔga da doora ka ba n tulgu bɛɦii. Yeesua nn taai yelmaa lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na fɔg̈wii ba n bɛɦii.
41001031	Ĥá nyuɦ ɦá man, n mug ɦá nuɦu n vii-wu. Bɛɦhii t went-wu, yelmaa ɦá baɦ n ka saɦ-ba diit.
41001032	Jabr nn da jab, muunu t lɔɔ lee, nidba t tu bɛɦtiiba mɛmba, n nidba kunidba nn da kad bá ɦɛn bee, n daan n Yeesua man.
41001033	Kɔrguu mɛnguu t kolm taa n ka ŋmiɦr haarii fiid noon.
41001034	Ĥá gbaad nidba kɔd, bá ju kunyɔŋu n bɛɦii jugu jugu bee. L´ saa ɦá ta voom kunidba kɔd. Ĥà da kpaa saa na kunidbee gwɛɛlm, blaɦb kaa bà da miil-wu.
41001035	Toŋu t vɛt ɦateekwɛɛn weem, nyeet nyi bee, Yeesua t vid n rorm ɦayen, n san kɔrgu kpamga kaalaŋa kiigan, ɦii kpaɦ kan, n ka seeŋa Saŋgband.
41001036	Simoonwu n ɦà tuurmbee bá san ka bag-wu.
41001037	Ban san n yum-wu lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nidba mɛmba bagl-v.»
41001038	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tn san-n jeenlaŋa, kɔrni ɦí ba kpama ɦiin! L` ba na mà ta faam ɦí ni Gohɔmt. Tii kaa nnii man daan.»
41001039	Ĥan bed welee lee, n san Galilee tant mɛntn, ka jiba Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn, ka faa Gohɔmt, ka vɔɦd kunidba.
41001040	Bolmɦii t daan ɦá man, n gbaɦnt dind ɦá nɔngan, n jobl-wu na ɦá tɔrg-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka v` sɔkla, v` ɦe mà riir kelkel.»
41001041	L´ ɦɛm-wu ɦigm biii. Ĥá teed ɦá nuɦu, n tarm-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà sɔkln. Riir kelkel!»
41001042	Yelmaa bolmt t nyab nidwii ɦɛn, ɦá rorm kelkel.
41001043	L´ saa, Yeesua t gwɛɛl n wun ka gaarŋa ɦà nɔnga, ka baɦla-wu na:
41001044	«Kewlg hɔm, daa biir ɦiiwu gwɛɛtii felaɦ'! Gwɛntaɦ lee, san v` werii vyen gotia ɦà nyaan vn ba lee, l` saa v` ɦe vit Mohiisa nn da sir wad na bá ɦɛm t` hig nakakeet tii, ka bo na baawena miig na l` gbaad-v.»
41001045	Ĥan la bed-wu gwɛɛtii ka gaarŋa ɦà nɔnga lee, nidwii t nyab n baɦ n ka fulwa n koot Yeesua nn ɦer-wu bii. Tii kaa nnii Yeesua nn da kpaa rea ɦayenwu feelgan kɔrgu kuugun. Ĥá saa n ka ba kpamga rii, ɦii kan kpaɦ ree. Nidba t ka rɛna baateekan ka kena ɦà man.
41002001	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaann, Yeesua t ŋmɛt Kafarnahuum kɔrgun, nidba t ɦom na ɦà ba haaga.
41002002	Nidba kɔd t kpogl taa, n ka ŋmiɦr haar keɦ', kaalaŋa t ka kpaɦ', n lag n duun mɛɦ'. Ĥá ka weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
41002003	Daba banaaba biiba t daan n balmdindɦii ka toɦd-wu jargun.
41002004	Ban taan lee, nidba ba kɔd ka ŋmiɦr haar keɦ', bá ka kpaa yu bolmr na bà jiblg-wu Yeesua man. Bá juul disaku faaga, n nyat vadgu Yeesua kan da ba ree, n hoɦlgii-wu n vadguun, ɦà door ɦà jargun.
41002005	Yeesua nn nyan nidbee gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim lee, n bɔɦɔɔ bɛɦtiiwii na: «Mà buga, l` waa-v v` fubɛɦii.»
41002006	Baɦlb weriitba biiba da kada kan. Bá ka diila n bà ni na:
41002007	«¿Nidwunwuna ŋmiin n bee n ka gwɛɛla welee? Ĥà suul Saŋgband. ¿Wen ba ɦà bee ɦà waa ɦii fubɛɦii ka l` kpaɦ na Saŋgband n jaɦ?»
41002008	Yeesua t miig yelmaa bá jugun diila, n gbaam-ba na: «¿Ben kaan nn ba n welee diilɦee n` jugu ni?
41002009	Ka má biir balmdind na l` waa-wu ɦá fubɛɦii, laa ka má biir-wu na ɦà vidg, ɦà lɔg ɦà jargu ɦà keda, ¿l´ huuga ben yatg gemmii?
41002010	Lee, maa mà werii-n na Nida Budaaga ba n gemmnt tant ɦɛn na kà waaliim fubɛɦii.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ balmdindwii na:
41002011	«Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na: Vidg! Lɔg v` jargu v` kuliim naa!»
41002012	Yelmaa, nidwii t vid nidba mɛmba nɔngan, n lɔgm ɦá jargu, n lɔɔm huru. L´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa, bá ka nyɔka Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` ban nyaan binbii tuurmb felaɦ'.»
41002013	Yeesua t ŋmɛtgii Galilee nyaam maaru weenn. Nidba kɔd t ka kena ɦà man, ɦà weraa-ba Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
41002014	Ĥan dan n ka beraa lee, n yum Ĥalfea kwɛɛl Levia, ɦà kad lambɦu faadb disakun. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Tagd mà kaa!» Ĥá vid n tag ɦá kaa.
41002015	Tii kaann, Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, bá jib Levia haarn, n ka ju diit, bá n lambɦu soɦdgtba n fubɛɦtiiba kɔd. Bee kɔd da tagda ɦà kaa.
41002016	L´ saa, baɦlb weriitba bá da ba Farisii tiiba kpaturun bee t yum na Yeesuwu n fubɛɦtiiba, n lambɦu soɦdgtba jul diit taa man. Ban nyan welee lee, n gbaam ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿L` ɦer lan wú n lambɦu soɦdgtba n fubɛɦtiiba ban ju diit taa man?»
41002017	Yeesua t ɦom, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nidba bá kpaɦ n bɛɦii bee, bà kpaa ked taadmta man. Bɛɦtiiba keda taadmta man. Mà ba daan na mà hoɦ nidhɔmba, mà daan na mà hoɦ fubɛɦtiiba.»
41002018	Goor diir nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n Farisii tiiba da boowa noor. Nidba t daan yelmaa Yeesua man, n gbaam-wu na: «¿L` ɦer lan Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n Farisii tiiba reba nn boow noor, vii gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kpaa boowii?»
41002019	Ĥá leed-ba na: «N` diila na ka bá hoɦ nidba yaala kasant man, ¿bà san bà boow noor yaala tiiwii nɔnga nii? Ĥaai! Ĥá wen bee bá man, bà kpaɦ bà kir diit deb.
41002020	Vuugu kenan, yaala tia kpaɦ ɦà bɛm bá man, l` saa-ba bayen. Vuuguu daa taanaa, bà boow noor.
41002021	«Ĥii kpaa lɔg dimtokwɛɛlgu n lag dimbudŋu, blaɦb kaa, dimtokwɛɛlgu ba kù dar dimbudŋuu l` mɔɔg sadgm kɔd.
41002022	L´ saa n` lɔgl rufetii ka hid daam, ¿laa bee? Ĥii kpaa lɔg dakwɛɛlm n hit rukpeemgun, blaɦb kaa, ka m´ wɛɛgaa, ruuguu kitg, l` saa daamii n ruuguu l` kul n kol. Tii lee, l` ba na bá lɔg dakwɛɛlm bà hitg rukwɛɛlgun.»
41002023	Saabaat goor diir Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba da keda huru, n san n jib n jofiili kpamb biibn ka gɛta. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t baɦ n ka kaɦ huru kpamga jofiili ka nyiɦaa.
41002024	Farisii tiiba nn nyan welee lee, n gbaam Yeesuwu na: «Ĥiluu v` nyaan v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn ɦɛna Saabaat goor bia! ¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá ɦɛm welee?»
41002025	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` nyi ban kaal Wadbuudgan bii Daviida nn da ɦer goor diir biin? Goorii, kɔm t kuu-wu n ɦà nidba, diit kpaɦ bá man.
41002026	Lee daa, Ĥabyataara ba na gotiberma. ¿Daviida t ka ba jib Saŋgband haarn n lɔgm kpooni ban da sir Saŋgband ɦii n juma? ¿Ĥà da ta ba si-ɦi wú n bà l` da bee been? L` ba na nidyemtia kpaa juu-ɦi ka l` kpaɦ na Saŋgband gotia.»
41002027	Yeesua t ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgband ɦera Saabaat goor na l´ bɛm nidwu n hɔm. D` ba ɦe nidwu Saabaat jugun.
41002028	Tii nnii ln ba na Nida Budaaga nnii Saabaat goor berma.»
41003001	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t ŋmɛtgii n jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun. Nidɦii ba kan, ɦà nuɦu t vaaw.
41003002	Bá da ba kan bee t ka kiig-wu hɔm na bà nyaan na mig ¿ɦà ba ɦà gbaad nidwii Saabaat goor laa? Bà da bagl na ɦá ɦe bii goorii, lee wen, bà biir na ɦà koɦl gwɛɛt.
41003003	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ nid ɦá nuɦu vaawr wii na: «Vidg v` jeɦnt nidba nɔngan!»
41003004	Yeesua t gbaam nidba bá da kiig-wu bee na: «Saabaat goor waa, ¿t` baɦlb saɦl huru na bà ɦɛm hɔmgu laa bá ɦɛm bɛɦgu le? ¿Na bá soɦdgm nidwu kuumn laa bá kuum-wu le?» Bá kpat n ka hen belbel.
41003005	Ĥá geed-ba n kwɛɛwweerga. L´ ɦɛm-wu ɦigm biii bá kwɛɛwbɛɦa kaa. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ nidwii na: «Teedg v` nuɦu!» Ĥá teed-ɦu, ɦú maant.
41003006	Farisii tiiba t rorm n san n yum Ĥerooda kpaturu tiiba, bá kolm taa yelmaa n koom kpaab ɦá jugun na bà kuu-wu.
41003007	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t vid n san Galilee nyaam maaru, nidfigm t tag ɦá kaa. Bà da reda tant jugu jugu: Galilee n Yuudee tantn,
41003008	n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, n Ĥidumee tantn, n tant t´ ba Yɔrdaan kol bal tiin, kakeɦnan Tiir n Sidoon maaru kɔrnin. Nidfigmii da reda ka kena Yeesua man, blaɦb kaa, bà da ɦuma ɦan da ɦɛna bii mɛmbii.
41003009	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá maantr kpiirgu kuugu, ɦà jib kù ni, ka bo na nidba daa wadrm-wu.
41003010	Ĥan da gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba kɔd lee, nidba bá da ju kunyɔŋu n bɛɦii bee t ka hɛɦr taa, ka bag na bà tad n wun, na bá bɛɦii wentg-ba.
41003011	L´ saa kunidba wen yu Yeesuaa, bá luurm ɦá nakpai kwɛɛn, n ka toola na: «Ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga.»
41003012	Tii lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá daa ɦe ɦii miig-wu.
41003013	L´ saa, Yeesua t kot duuga kiiga ɦɛn n hoɦ nidba ɦan da bag bee, bá daan ɦá man.
41003014	Ĥá bant bá huuga nidba kwiɦr n bareɦba, n hoɦ-ba na ɦá tumtba. Ĥà bantg-ba na ɦà mad-ba ɦá man kpaalaa, na ɦà tom-ba na bá faam Gohɔmt,
41003015	ɦà ta si-ba gemmnt bà vɔɦd kunidba.
41003016	Nidba kwiɦr n bareɦba ɦan da bantg bee nnanaɦ': Simoona –Yeesua da daarŋ-wu na Fetra–,
41003017	Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, Jebdea kwɛɛlba –Yeesua da daarŋ-ba na Bowanɛrgɛɛsmba, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na ‟Bá tɔn toŋu taarb bee”–,
41003018	Ĥandreewu n Filfwu n Baatelmiiwu n Matewwu n Tomaaswu n Ĥalfea kwɛɛl Yakoobwu n Taadeewu n Simoon ɦá ŋmɛta ɦá kɔrgu ɦɛn wii,
41003019	n nan Yuudaas Kariyoot tia, ɦá da gweedm Yeesuwu wii.
41003020	Tii kaann, Yeesua t ŋmɛt n kpen haar ɦan da go diin. Nidfigm t ta lilm taa kpoglb. Wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka kpaa yu huru na bà di diit.
41003021	Baa haar tiiba nn da ɦomr ɦan da ɦɛna bii lee, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ĥá jugun koɦln.» Bá lɔɔm huru na bà daan bà mug-wu.
41003022	Baɦlb weriitba bá da red Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n tiɦdgii kan bee, bà da bɔɦɔɔ na kunidba huraa Bɦelsebuula mada-wu, na wii saɦl-wu gemmnt na ɦá vɔɦd kunidba.
41003023	Tii lee, Yeesua t hoɦ-ba n gwɛɛl-ba nawdlam na: «¿Lan nnii Saatana nn ba ɦà bee ɦà vɔɦd ɦayen?
41003024	Ka huraaɦii nidba t radg taa n ka taaw taa hoodr de, ¿huraantii kpaɦ t kpia?
41003025	L´ saa, ka haar diir nidba t radg taa n ka taaw taa hoodr de, ¿haarii ba d` bee d` neera?
41003026	Tii lee, ka l` ba na Saatana tam ɦayen ɦà mɔmwu hoodr, l´ ɦɛm na radgm jib ɦà huraant nii, ɦá gemmnt kpaɦ t` bee t` neer kakeɦnan, t` ba t` diɦ.
41003027	Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà jib nidhaɦrkaɦɦii haarn ɦà baaw ɦá want ka ba boow-wu saɦ'. Ĥá wen bea n bɔm-wu l´ diɦaa, ɦá bam haariin wantii mɛntii.
41003028	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Saŋgband nan waalaa nidba bá fubɛɦii mɛnii n suut ban suu-d tii mɛntii,
41003029	l` saa, d` nan kpaɦ d` waal nid ɦá suudg Voɦoom Buudm wii fubɛɦga felaɦ', ɦá fubɛɦgee ba ka bɛm kakeɦnan.»
41003030	Ĥà da beda welee, blaɦb kaa, bà da bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà ba n kunida.
41003031	Yeesua nyakwɛɛlba n bà nya bá taan yelmaa. Ban taan lee, n kpat n ka jeɦr duun. Bá tom ɦii na ɦá hoɦ-wu.
41003032	Nidba kɔd da kada ɦà man, ka kaadg-wu n lo-wu huuga. Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ĥoma, v` nyawu n v` nyakwɛɛlba jeɦra duun ka bag-v!»
41003033	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿Wen nnii mà nya? ¿Teba nnii mà nyakwɛɛlba?»
41003034	L´ saa, ɦá geed nidba bá da kaadg-wu bee, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyaan-n, mà nyawu n mà nyakwɛɛlba nnanaɦ'!
41003035	Ĥii ɦà ɦɛna Saŋgband nn sɔkla bii wii, wii nnii mà nyakwɛɛla, laa mà nyabɛɛra, laa mà nya.»
41004001	Yeesua t baɦ n ka lil Saŋgband gwɛɛt weriib Galilee nyaam maaru. Nidfigm t kpogl taa ɦá man l` kpaɦ jaɦ', ɦá saa n jib kpiirgun n kad. Kpiirguu da ba nyaalm ɦɛn, nidba bee ba tant ɦɛn, ka nyɔɦr n nyaalm.
41004002	Ĥà da gwɛɛla nawdlam ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt kɔd. Ĥà da weraa ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
41004003	«Ĥom-n! Nidɦii da san ɦá koogun na ɦà mɛɛ figm.
41004004	Ĥan da mɛɛ lee, miim t tɛɦr huru kpamga, ŋmɛnii t daan n tɔɦm-m.
41004005	Miim t ta tɛɦr fidɛndɛi ɦɛn, tant kpaɦ kan kɔd. Wo tant nn da kpaɦ m` ɦɛn kɔd lee, m´ rorm yelmaa.
41004006	Muunu t dan n buum, tantulm t hɔɦm figmii t kparŋ, blaɦb kaa, m´ rugi da ba bee n jib tant kwɛɛn.
41004007	Miim t ta tɛɦr ɦint bia huuga. Ĥintii t berŋ n waal figmii ɦɛn, n fiid-m, m´ ka ba roon bii.
41004008	L´ saa, miim t ta tɛɦr tanhɔmtn, n maadm, n lo bia hɔm. Miim t lo bia kwɛɛtaɦ', volm bia kwɛɦroond, volm t ta lo bia lɛmu.»
41004009	L´ saa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka ɦii ba n tobɦa na ɦà ɦomaa, ɦá kewlg hɔm!»
41004010	Yeesua t rorm nidfigm huuga n dodgii vɔkun. Bá da ba ɦà man bee n tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee t gbaam-wu na ɦá ree-ba nawdlamii kɔtɔd.
41004011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Nen lee, l` sira-n na n` miig Saŋgband huraant kpɛŋkpɛɦgan gwɛɛt. L´ saa, nidvolbee lee, bee kewla gwɛɛt mɛnt n nawdlamn.
41004012	Tii kaa nnii, Wadbuudga nn bɔɦɔɔ na: Bà geewa hɔm gwɛntaɦ, ka kpaa yu. Bà kewla hɔm gwɛntaɦ, ka kpaa ɦum l` kɔtɔd. Ka lag welee, nyimlena bá bidg bayen n Saŋgband ween na d´ waa-ba bà fubɛɦii!
41004013	L´ saa, ɦá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ba ɦom nawdlamii kɔtɔd? Ka welee, ¿n` nan ɦɛna lan n` ɦom nawdlam volmii mɛnmii kɔtɔd?
41004014	Kpaada mɛɛ Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
41004015	Nidba biiba tɔna huru kpamga dikaɦbuudr diir kan tɛɦra ree: ban ɦum gwɛɛt yelmaa lee, Saatana t daan n tawd gwɛɛt ban mɛɛr bà kwɛɛwan tii.
41004016	Ta yenmii nnii, volba nn boo fidɛndɛi dikaɦbuudr diir kan tɛɦda ree: ban ɦum gwɛɛt lee, n soɦd-t yelmaa n nyaag̈b.
41004017	Gwɛntaɦ', bà kpaa saa na t´ baɦ rugi bá kwɛɛwan, bà kpaa mugaa-t l´ hiid. Lee, ka kunyɔŋu kuugu t daan bà ɦɛn laa, ka bà ju kunyɔŋu kuugu gwɛɛtii kaa, bá kirm Saŋgband yelmaa.
41004018	Volba boo tant dikaɦbuudr kan tɛɦra ɦint huuga tii: bà ɦomra gwɛɛt n soɦd-t gwɛntaɦ',
41004019	tant ɦɛn neerm diila, n kɛgt lamɛɛgu kú hogla kuu, n want sɔklb jugu jugu t jib bá kwɛɛwan n feg gwɛɛtii, t´ ka ba roon bii.
41004020	L´ saa, nidvolba tɔna tanhɔmt dikaɦbuudr kan tɛɦra ree: bà ɦuma gwɛɛt, n tii t´ ɦɛn, n ka ɦɛna t´ ɦɛn ŋmɛɛg̈b wo dikaɦbuudr nn roon bia tanhɔmtn lee, diir roona bia kwɛɛtaɦ', vol t roonm kwɛɦroond, vol lɛmu.»
41004021	Yeesua t gbaam-ba na: «¿Ĥii nyi daan n kand n lig-d tɔka kwɛɛn laa n lo-d gad kwɛɛnii? Ĥà lila-d n baɦga, ¿laa laa?
41004022	Bii ban kpɛɦdr bii mɛmbii, bà nan rea-b bà nyaan-b, l` saa bii b` ba kpɛŋkpɛɦgan bii mɛmbii, bà nan rea-b wiingan.
41004023	Kewlgm-n hɔm, ka n` ba n tobɦa na n` ɦom!»
41004024	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥɛm-n hɔm n nn kewla bii! Saŋgband nan saɦl-n d´ kɛgt, ka kɛɛmla n kɛɛmtga nn kɛɛma n` mɔmba n kee d` ta hewl kà ɦɛn.
41004025	Tii lee, ɦá ba n bii wii, bà nan mɔɔ-wu saɦb. L´ saa ɦá kpaɦ n bii wii, bà nan fɛla bà soɦdg ɦà do bii tutugm ɦan ba n bii.»
41004026	Yeesua t ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgband huraant tɔna wo nid ɦá bodr ɦà kpiilmn jowa wii.
41004027	Buudb kaann, ɦá ka dootaa nyingu ka goraa, toŋu ragda ɦà vida. L´ wen vuuguu nii, jowa t baɦm kwɛɛwa, n rorm, n berŋ, ɦà kpaa mi ln ɦɛna lee.
41004028	Tant mɔmt ɦɛna dikaɦb t berŋ. Nooga saɦ jɔŋu berŋan, n maadm, tii kaann, kú sod.
41004029	Jɔnt nn bu yelmaa lee, nidba t lɔgm bá kpasaant n bà jui n baɦ jɔnt sɔɦb, blaɦb kaa, dikaɦlɔg̈b vuugu taaran.»
41004030	Yeesua t ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿T` ba t` tɔnii Saŋgband huraant n ben lee? ¿T` ba t` gwɛɛl nawdlam tem ka tɔnaa n tina?
41004031	Saŋgband huraant tɔna gumsarbiir. D´ ba kaaga yem.
41004032	Bá wen buud-dii, d´ berŋ n kit tibermb n yat jivaat tiitii mɛntii. B` toowa hulibibiɦt yaamnt, ŋmɛnii t ka bea ka lɔɔ hí soɦga b` vaat huuga.»
41004033	Welee nnii ɦan da weraa gwɛɛt ka gwɛɛla nawdlam kɔd. Ĥà da weraa nidba ka gwɛɛla nawdlam na bá bee bà ɦom.
41004034	Ĥà da kpaa gwɛɛla-ba n yem l` kpaɦ n nawdlamn, l´ saa wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá wen ba bayen, ɦá ree-ba l` mɛnguu kɔtɔd.
41004035	Goorii mɔmr jabr ɦɛn, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Tn mɛwdg-n nyaam bal!»
41004036	Bá nyab nidfigm man, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka mɛwla-wu n kpiirgu ɦan da ba kù ni kuu. Kpiirvont da ta nyɔɦra n kun. Ban da ba nyaalm huuga lee,
41004037	ɦambermm t baɦ n ka fug kimm, nyaalm wada jiba kpiirgu ni, kú baɦ n ka hugla yelmaa.
41004038	Yeesua ba kpiirguu kaann ka go, ka tog ɦà jugu judɛɦdgu. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t himii-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, t` ba t` kpiidr! ¿L` kpaa ɦɛna-v liin?»
41004039	Ĥá himt, n gwɛɛl n ɦam n talmt, n bɔɦɔɔ nyaalm na: «Kpat belaɦ'! Kwiiŋl vyen!» Lee wen, ɦam t jeɦnt, l´ mɛnguu t kwiim nigaɦ'.
41004040	L´ saa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿N` sol fobɛɦgu na laa? Hal n jana, ¿n` nyi kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim n Saŋgband nnii?»
41004041	Fobɛɦgu t mug-ba biii, bá ka gbaama taa na: «¿Ben nid nnii wunwii, na l´ lag n ɦam n nyaalm mɛɦm valgm wii?»
41005001	L´ saa bá san n taai Gerasaa tiiba tantn Galilee nyaam bal.
41005002	Yeesua t hoɦnt kpiirgun, yelmaa nidɦii t rorm bili huuga, n ka kena ka tuuga-wu. Kunidba da kad nidwii ɦɛn,
41005003	ɦá ka go bili huuga. Ka bà la boow-wu n konhaɦrkaɦa, ɦá la kaɦm-ɦa.
41005004	Bà da lɔɔ-wu kona hɛruɦ ɦà nakpain, n ɦà niɦin. Ban da la lɔɔ welee lee, ɦà bea ka kaɦ ɦá niɦin n ɦà nakpain konɦee gidga gidga. Bà da kpaa mi ban ba bà boow-wu n bii na ɦá kad yenlaŋa.
41005005	Ĥà da lintgaa welee kakeɦnan bili huuga n dui ɦɛn, nyingu n muunu, ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga ka kɛɦ ɦayenwu nɔt n tana.
41005006	Ĥá wen nyan Yeesuwu vɔkun, n baɦ kili ka tuuga-wu, n nyuɦ ɦá man, n gbaɦnt dind ɦá nɔngan,
41005007	n tool kimm ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgband mɔmr Budaaga Yeesu! ¿Má n vn n tet? Mà jobla-v Saŋgband hidrn, daa dar mà tobr!»
