41005008	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ welee, blaɦb kaa, Yeesua da sira kunidwii wad ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kunid ven, riir nidwii ni!»
41005009	Lee wen, Yeesua t gbaam nidwii na: «¿Bà hoɦ-v na wenii?» Kunidba t leed-wu na: «Bà hoɦl-t na ‟Hiinu”, blaɦb kaa, t` ba kɔd ɦá ni.»
41005010	L´ saa bá ka jobla Yeesuwu ka lil na ɦá daa voo-ba kɔrguu ni.
41005011	Ĥafaant kodibermr diir da ba kan duuga ɦɛn, ka bag diit.
41005012	Lee wen, kunidbee t ka jobla Yeesu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Si-t huru na t` san t` jib ɦafaant t´ ba laɦii tiin!»
41005013	Ĥá tii. Lee, kunidbee t rorm nidwii ni n san n jib ɦafaantii ni. Kodiirii mɛndii da taara wo ɦafaant ruuni ɦiriɦ'. Ĥafaantii t begdr duugee ɦɛn huuu n lɔɔm nyaamn n ŋmɛɦɛɛ tyen n kpiidr.
41005014	Nidba bá da kiima-t bee t solm, n san n ka bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛtii kɔrgun n kafiin. Nidba t daan na bà nyaan bii b` gɛtg bii.
41005015	Bá taan Yeesua man, n yum nid kunidba hiinu nn da kad ɦá ɦɛn wii, ɦà kad ka fidr dimt, ɦà rarm ba ɦá ni hɔm. L´ saa fobɛɦgu t mug-ba.
41005016	Bá da nyan l` mɛnguu bee t kɛɛm-ba bii b` da ɦer nid kunidba nn da kad ɦá ɦɛn wii, n ta bii b` da ɦer ɦafaant bii.
41005017	Ban ɦomr welee lee, n baɦ n ka jobla Yeesu na ɦá nyab bà tantn.
41005018	Ĥan vidg n san n ka jiba kpiirgun lee, nid kunidba nn da kad ɦá ɦɛn wii t ka jobla-wu na ɦá saa ɦá bɛm ɦá man.
41005019	Ĥá ka ba si-wu huru, tii lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ŋmɛtg v` kul naa, v` haarn, v` kɛɛml naa reba Saberma nn nyan v` kunyɔŋu n ɦɛm-v bii.»
41005020	Nidwii t kulii, n raag tant ban hoɦ na ‟Kɔrni Kwiɦr” tii ni, ka kɛɛmla bii Yeesua nn ɦer-wu bii mɛmbii. L´ ɦɛm nidba bá da kewla ɦà noon bee yɔlaa.
41005021	Yeesua t jib kpiirgun, n ŋmɛtgii, n ka ba nyaalm maaru. Nidba kɔdgu t kpogl taa ɦá man.
41005022	Nidɦii t taan yelmaa, bà hoɦ-wu na Yaɦiruusa. Ĥà da ba na Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku bermɦiin. Ĥan taan n yum Yeesu lee, n gbaɦnt ɦá dina ɦɛn ɦá nɔngan,
41005023	n ka gbaama-wu ka jobla-wu na ɦá tɔrg-wu, ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà bufɔka ba kuumn. Mà jobla-v, daan v` dee v` nuɦu ká ɦɛn, l` wentg-ka kà neer!»
41005024	Yeesua t tag ɦá kaa. Nidba kɔdgu t ka heɦla-wu, ka hɛɦr taa ka fɛgr-wu rena n rena.
41005025	Fɔgɦii ba kan, ka door bɛɦii bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ', jiim ror-wu wo ɦà huura kidga.
41005026	Ĥá san dɔgdbermba kɔd man, ka ju kunyɔŋu biii bá niɦin, n diɦ ɦá lig̈biir mɛnd, l` kpaa wenta-wu, ɦà bɛɦii ŋmɛta ka gwɛda n kwɛɛn.
41005027	Ĥá ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt, ɦá daan n jib nidba huuga, n nyuɦ-wu n ɦà kaann.
41005028	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ni na: «Ka má bee n tarm ɦà dimgu kuugu mɔmgu, mà bɛɦii wentg-ma.» Ĥá tad n Yeesua dimgu.
41005029	Jiim m´ da ror-wu mii t jeɦnt myenm ɦɛn, l´ saa ɦá ɦom ɦá gbanun na ɦá bɛɦii wentg-wu.
41005030	Waarɦuu ɦɛn yelmaa, Yeesua t miig na gemmnt tiit reda ɦà ni. Ĥá bid ɦayen nidba huuga, n gbaam-ba na: «¿Wen tad n mà dimt lee?»
41005031	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` mɔma yul na nidba fɛgra-v rena n rena, ¿ben t ɦɛm v´ ka gbaama na wen tad n vna?»
41005032	Ĥá ka ɦilwa ɦá kpama na ɦà nyaan ɦii ɦá ɦer welee wii.
41005033	Fɔg̈wii da miil bii b´ gɛtg ɦá ɦɛn bii. Fobɛɦgu t mug-wu ɦá ka deɦra, lee ɦá daan yelmaa n gbaɦnt Yeesua tiŋa, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu ɦá gobiint.
41005034	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bugaa, vn tii Saŋgband ɦɛn lee, v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimii daɦra v` jugu. Ked ka ba nigiigun, v` bɛɦii wentg-v!»
41005035	Ĥan da ɦeewr-wu n bɔɦɔɔb welee lee, nidba biiba t rɛn berm Yaɦiruusaa, n dan n ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` bufɔka fɛlgn. Daa jaarŋ̈m berma!»
41005036	Yeesua nn ɦomr gwɛɛtii lee, n bɔɦɔɔ Yaɦiruus na: «Daa diilgm, tiim welee n jaɦ'!»
41005037	Yeesua t ka ba tii na ɦii heɦlg-wu. Ĥá lɔgm Fetrwu n Yakoobwu n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Yohanɛɛsa, na bee heɦlg-wu.
41005038	Bá taai berm Yaɦiruusa haarn, Yeesua t mid nidba biira ka jokra bayen, ka kuum, ka mɔɔ ŋmɛi kimm.
41005039	Ĥá jib haaga, n gbaam-ba na: «¿N` biira ka jokra n̈yen na laa? ¿N` kuum na laa? Bugee ba kpi, kà gooln.»
41005040	Bá ka laɦ-wu. Lee wen, ɦá voom-ba, bá rorm duun bá mɛmbee. Ĥá hoɦ bufɔkee sa, n kà nya, n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee, wú n ban bá jib dugun, bufɔkee kan ba ree.
41005041	Ĥá mug bufɔkee nuɦu n bɔɦɔɔ-ka n bà lamn na: « Talitaɦ kumi!» l´ kɔtɔd nnii na «Bufɔka, vidg! Man bɔɦɔɔ-v.»
41005042	Bufɔkee t vid yelmaa n ka ked. Kà da ba n bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ'. Nidba wen nyan welee l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa, fobɛɦbermgu t mug-ba.
41005043	Reekan lee, Yeesua t baɦl-ba ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá daa ɦe ɦii miig gwɛɛtii. L´ saa ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Si-n-ka diit kà di!»
41006001	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesua t nyab kaalaŋeen, n kulii ɦá kɔrgu. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t heɦl-wu.
41006002	L´ dan n taam Saabaat goor, ɦá baɦ n ka weraa nidba gwɛɛt Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun. Nidba kɔdgu da kewla ɦà noon, l` ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa yem. Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ĥà mir tee gemmntntina? ¿Rartem nnii ɦan soɦdg mii? ¿Ta hoolteku nnii ɦan ɦɛna kuu?
41006003	¿Lag wii nnii kafinta, Maaria kwɛɛla? ¿Lag ta wii nnii Yakoobwu n Yooseewu n Yuudwu n Simoon, bà maara? ¿L´ saa ɦá nyabɛɛrba kpaa ba t` huuga?» Tii kaa nnii ban da lag n ka bo na bà kir Saŋgband.
41006004	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Bà vala gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwu baatea, gwɛntaɦ', ɦii kpaa vala-wu ɦá kɔrgun, ɦá reba huuga, ɦayen ɦà teelba mɔmba ta kpaa vala-wu.»
41006005	Ĥá ka ba bee na ɦà ɦe kan hoolgu kɔd, lee n dee ɦá nuɦu bɛɦtikaalkaɦba ɦɛn, bá bɛɦii t went-ba.
41006006	L´ saa, l´ ka ɦɛna-wu yɔlaa na bà kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim.
41006007	Ĥá hoɦ ɦá tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee, n tom-ba bareɦ bareɦ'. Ĥá saɦm-ba gemmnt na bá vɔɦd kunidba.
41006008	Ĥá ta baɦl-ba na: «Daa lɔg-n bii na n` ked huru ka mad, lɔg-n dagbɛɦgu n jaɦ'! Daa mad-n diit, laa ruugu, laa lig̈biir n` ruin!
41006009	Fid-n nanawda, daa mad-n tugreɦdrgu!»
41006010	Ĥá lilm-ba bɔɦɔɔb na: «Ka n´ taai kɔrgu kuugun, bá hoɦ-n haar diirn, n` bɛm d´ ni kakeɦnan n` daa nyaba kɔrguun.
41006011	Ka kɔrgu kuugun nidba t kir na bà kpaɦ bà soɦdg-n, laa bà kpaɦ bà kewlg n` noon gwɛɛtii, n` riir bá kɔrgun, n` nit-ba n n` niɦi l` werii-ba na ka bá bɔr, bá ret nnii.»
41006012	Tumtbee t san kɔrnin, n ka faa nidba na: «Lagii-n neerm!»
41006013	Bà da vɔɦda kunidba kɔd, ka ta gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba kɔd ka gwɛɦ-ba kpaam.
41006014	Lee wen, huraa Ĥerooda t ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt. Bà da hoɦl ɦá hidr baatea. Biiba da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛs ɦá da kpiir wii himtgn! Tii nnii ɦan ba n gemmnt ka ɦɛna hoolgu.»
41006015	Volba bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Ĥeliin.» Volba ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦiin, ɦà ta boo weem gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba.»
41006016	Ĥerooda nn ɦomr welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsn. Mà da beda bá git ɦá jugu, gwɛntaɦ', wii himtg n ka neer.»
41006017	Biilm, Ĥerooda mɔma da sira wad bá mug Yohanɛɛs n bɔm, n riw-wu sarga. Ĥeroodyaada kaa nnii ɦan da ɦer welee. Ĥà da lɔgra Ĥeroodyaadwu fɔgt, l` ba na ɦá maar Filfa fɔgn.
41006018	Tii kaa nnii Yohanɛɛsa nn da bɔɦɔɔ Ĥerood na: «L` ba si huru na v` soɦdg v` maara fɔg v` mad.»
41006019	Ĥeroodyaada t lo kwɛɛwweerga biii n Yohanɛɛsa n ka bag na bá kuu-wu, gwɛntaɦ', n ka kpaa bea, Ĥerooda kaa.
41006020	Ĥerooda da sol Yohanɛɛswu fobɛɦgu. Ĥà da miil na Yohanɛɛs nnii nidhɔma, na Saŋgband da tomra-wu. Tii lee ɦá ka hɛgr ɦà ɦɛn. Ka Yohanɛɛsa bɔɦɔɔ-wu tiit, l´ ka jaarŋa-wu kɔd, gwɛntaɦ', ɦá ka la sɔkla na ɦà kewlgm n wun.
41006021	Lee wen, goor ban meedr Ĥeroodwu dii kasant t taan, Ĥeroodyaada t yuuŋ huru hɔm. L´ goorii, Ĥerooda t dig diit, n hoɦm ɦá kwɛɛn tiiba bermba, n tawdbermba, n Galilee tantn wembomba.
41006022	Ĥeroodyaada bɛɛra t jib nidba bá da ju diit bee man, n ham. L´ ɦɛm Ĥeroodwu n ɦà tuurmbee lamɛɛgu biii, bá nyɔk bɛɛrwii. Huraa t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Gbaam-ma vn sɔkla bii, mà to-v!
41006023	Mà foora na, maa mà to-v vn kee v` gbaam-ma bii, ka l` la ba na mà radg mà huraant kɔrgu gbaraɦ mà to-v gidgu.»
41006024	Bɛɛrwii t rorm yelmaa, n san n bɔɦɔɔ ɦá nya na: «¿Maa mà gbaam bee?» Wii t leed-wu na: «Gbaam Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa jugu.»
41006025	Ĥá ŋmɛt weem weem huraa man, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà sɔkla na v` lo Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa jugu sumtɛluugan v` to-ma gwɛɦmina.»
41006026	Ĥan bed welee lee, huraa t gbɛlŋ. Wo ɦan da fɛtg foorb nidba ɦan da hoɦ kasant man bee nɔngan lee, ɦá ka ba bee na ɦà kir n bɛɛrwii.
41006027	Ĥá ree yelmaa ɦá tawdba huuga tawd ɦayen, n tom-wu ka saɦ-wu wad na ɦà san ɦà daan n Yohanɛɛsa jugu. Tawdwii t lɔɔm huru, n san sargan, n git Yohanɛɛsa jugu.
41006028	L´ tog ɦá lo-ku sumtɛluugan, n daan n to bɛɛrwii. Wii t san n to-ku ɦá nya.
41006029	Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba wen ɦomr welee, bá daan n lɔgm-wu n san n kuur.
41006030	Yeesua tumtba t ŋmɛtgn ɦá man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu ban ɦer bii mɛmbii n ban werii bii mɛmbii.
41006031	Nidba da ba kan kɔdgu l` kpaɦ tinaɦ', ka kena ka rɔdma n taa, lee, huru t ka kpaɦ na Yeesuwu n ɦà tumtba bà di diit. Tii lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Daan-n t` riir kpamga, ɦii kan kpaɦ ree, n` voɦoo jaɦ'!»
41006032	Wú n ban, bá jib yelmaa kpiirgun, n san riikan ɦii kan kpaɦ ree.
41006033	Ban lɔɔr huru lee, nidba kɔd t yum-ba, n miig-ba. Lee wen, bá baɦ kili n ka gitgaa-ba. Volba ta rɛna kɔrni mɛnin ka hewla bà ɦɛn. Bá solm weem nakpai n taai kaalaŋeen, Yeesuwu n ɦà tumtba nɔngan.
41006034	Yeesua wen red kpiirgun, n tud nidfigmii ɦɛn, l` hɛɦr nyaam nyaam. Ĥigm t ɦɛm-wu biii. Nidbee da boo fɛi ɦí kpaɦ n kimt ɦii. Ĥá baɦ n ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt kɔd.
41006035	Jabr nn dan n ka jabaa lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ ɦá man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kaalaŋankena ba kpamloŋun, l´ saa, jabr t ta jab.
41006036	Saa nidbee bà san kpama kafiin n kɔrnin, bà daɦ diit bà di!»
41006037	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Si-n-ba diit n` mɔmba bà di!» Bá ŋmɛl-wu na: «¿Sɔkla na t` san t` daɦ kpooni lig̈biir ruuni lɛmi ɦiriɦ t` daan t` si-ba bà dia?»
41006038	Lee wen, ɦá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ba n kpooni ɦilaa? San-n n` nyaan!» Bá gbaam n ɦom, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpooni ɦinu, n ta ɦɔlii hireɦ'.»
41006039	L´ saa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Biir-n nidba mɛmba na bá kad gbeɦr gbeɦr moot ɦɛn!»
41006040	Bá kad gbeɦr diirn nidba lɛmu, diirn nidba kwɛɦnu.
41006041	Lee wen, ɦá lɔgm kpooni ɦinuɦii n ɦɔlii hireɦhii, n vii ɦá nɔnga n faaga ka seeŋa Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n gbeɦm kpoonɦii, n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá raar nidbee. Ĥá ta raarm ɦɔlii hireɦhii bà mɛmbee.
41006042	Baawena t jum n togm.
41006043	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t kolm kpoongbeɦa n ɦɔlgbeɦa ɦà tɛl ɦee, l´ hugl furia kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ', bá lag n nyab n.
41006044	L` ba na nidba bá da diir kpooni bee, daba da ba kan ruuni ɦinu.
41006045	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t heɦ yelmaa ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá jib kpiirgun, bà mɛwdg nyaam bal ɦà nɔngan, Betsayidaa kɔrgu weenn, lee wen, wii mɔma hɔd saɦ na ɦà seeŋ nidfigmii.
41006046	Ĥá wen seeŋ-ba bá lɔɔm huruu, ɦá juul duuga kiiga jugun na ɦà seeŋ Saŋgband.
41006047	Nyingu t nyin, kpiirguu ba nyaam huuga, Yeesu wii ba tant ɦɛn ɦayen.
41006048	Ĥá yum na ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba jul kunyɔŋu ka ka kpiirgu, blaɦb kaa, ɦam da fugl ka tuuga-ba. Kɔdai nn dan n ka jaaw lee, ɦá ka kedaa n bà wee ka nawdra nyaalm ɦɛn, n san n ka gɛta n bà ɦɛn.
41006049	Bá wen nyan-wu ɦà nawdra nyaalm ɦɛn ka ked, bá ka diila na kuumn, lee bá baɦ n ka mɔɔ ŋmɛi.
41006050	Bà da yul welee bá mɛmbee, fobɛɦgu mad-ba. Lee wen, ɦá gwɛɛl n ban yelmaa n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Bɛm-n ŋmeenm! Mann. Daa solm-n fobɛɦgu!»
41006051	L´ saa, ɦá jib bá man kpiirgun, ɦam t jeɦnt. L´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa biii.
41006052	Bà da ba ɦom hoolgu ɦan da ɦer kpooni t yad kuu kɔtɔd. Bá rarm da kpaa bea na m` mug l` kɔtɔd.
41006053	Bà fɛl nyaam mɛwdgm n taai Genesarɛɛt tantn, n baɦ bá kpiirgu n gbiir.
41006054	Ban red kú ni yelmaa lee, nidba t miig Yeesua,
41006055	n solm kili ka toola taa n kɔrni. Bá tu bɛɦtiiba diman ka ked n kaalai bá kan da ɦum na ɦà ba ree.
41006056	L´ saa, baatee ɦá kan da ked ree, mig kɔrhiin laa kɔrbermin laa kafiin, nidba da kena n bà bɛɦtiiba ka doola-ba kpoglb bantn, ka jowdra-wu na, ka l´ yatg wo ben, ɦá saa bà tad n ɦà dimgu noor mɔmr. Bá da tadaa n dn bee mɛmbee, l` gbaadaa-ba kpaalaa.
41007001	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba biiba t vid Yerusalɛm n daan, n kpogl taa Yeesua man.
41007002	Bá yum na ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba biiba jul diit ka ba nit bà niɦi wo bá kowt nn gbaama lee.
41007003	Biilm, Farisii tiiba n Yuudaa tiiba volba da vala weem yandaba kowt ban da werii-ba tii. Bà kpaa ju ka ba nit bà niɦi wo kowtii nn gbaama lee.
41007004	L´ saa ka bá kpen yaku, bà kpaa ju ka ba hor saɦ'. Bà da vala kowt vont kɔd ban da soɦdg tii, wo wombii, n hurii, n tot l` naadb.
41007005	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba t gbaam Yeesu na: «¿Ben kaa nnii v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn kpaa vala baɦlb t` yandaba nn da to-t bii? Bà jul diit n nakakeet ka koɦla kowt.»
41007006	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Yesaaya da ba n gobiint na ɦà ree Saŋgband noon gwɛɛt ɦà biir l` hɛl-n wo ln ta ɦɔd Wadbuudgan na: Saŋgband beda na ‟Tigrndina jeeŋla-ma d` noon n jaɦ', d´ kwɛɛwr nii, d` kpaa nyɔɦr-ma.
41007007	Kowt nidbambena nn ɦɛna-ma tii kpaa tɔn. Bà weraa kowt nidba nn kudr tii, wo l´ biir na Saŋgband baɦlbn.”»
41007008	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` kɔɦdg Saŋgband baɦlb kpamga, n ka vala kowt nidba nn to-n tii.»
41007009	Ĥá lilm-ba bɔɦɔɔb na: «N` miil Saŋgband baɦlb kɔɦdgm hɔm, ka mad nan n` mɔmba n̈yen n` kowt!
41007010	N` yandaa Mohiisa da ba n gobiint ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ na Saŋgband beda na: Valg v` sawu n v` nya! Lee na: Ĥii ɦá suudg ɦá sa laa ɦá nya wii, l` ba na bá kuu-wu!
41007011	«Nen lee, nii weraa na ka nida t ree n bɔɦɔɔ ɦá sa laa ɦá nya na: ‟Mà kɛgt mà nn ba mà lɔg mà tɔrg-v n tii, t` kitg kɔrbaan, l´ kɔtɔd na Saŋgband kowt want”,
41007012	n` saɦl-wu huru na ɦá daa tɔrg ɦà sa laa ɦá nya.
41007013	Nn ɦɛna nnii ka kuu Saŋgband gwɛɛt, ka weraa taa n` yandaba kowt. N` ta ɦɛna wanvont kɔd t` tɔn welee.»
41007014	Tii kaann, ɦá lilm nidfigm hoɦm n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kewlg-n n man n` mɛmbee, n` ɦom gwɛɛtntina!
41007015	Bii b` jiba nida ni bii, b` kpaɦ b` bee b` ɦe na ɦá kitg bɛɦwu Saŋgband nɔngan. Bii b` rɛna nida ni bii, bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa. [
41007016	Kewlg-n hɔm, ka n` ba n tobɦa na n` ɦom!]»
41007017	Yeesua wen nyab nidfigm man, n san n jib haaga, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam-wu na ɦá ree-ba nawdlamii kɔtɔd.
41007018	Ĥá leed-ba na: «L` lag n nii mɛɦ, ¿n` ta kpaa bea na n` ɦomaa? Bii b` jiba nida ni bii, b` kpaɦ b` bee b` ɦe na ɦá kitg bɛɦa Saŋgband nɔngan.
41007019	B` kpaa jiba ɦá kwɛɛwrn, b` jiba ɦà raawtn, n ŋmɛt n rorm. ¿N` kpaa ɦumn?» Ĥan bed gwɛɛtii lee, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na nida ba ɦà bee ɦà di diit mɛnt ka kpaa hɔgaa.
41007020	L´ saa ɦá lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Bii b´ rɛna nida ni bii, bii ɦɛna ɦá kit bɛɦa.
41007021	Diilbɛɦa ɦà hɛɦr nid na ɦá ɦɛm wo ɦá jugun kpaa ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦee, ɦee rɛna ɦà kwɛɛwrn. Tii lee, ɦá ka yarwa, ka baaw, ka kuu nidba,
41007022	ka ba nantelmt, ka sɔkla bii b´ ba na volba reb bii, ka ba talmt, ka bɔɦɔɔ gokaat, ka neer bɛɦgu, ka ba nɔmmɔlb, ka su volba, ka ba dewt, ka ba joojoont.
41007023	Bii bɛɦbnbina mɛmbii rɛna nida kwɛɛwrn ka ɦɛna ɦà kita bɛɦa Saŋgband nɔngan.»
41007024	L´ saa Yeesua t vid kan, n lɔɔm huru, n san Tiir tantn. Ĥan taai kan lee, n jib haar diirn na ɦà foɦnt na ɦii daa miig na ɦà ba kan, gwɛntaɦ', nidba t la miig.
41007025	Fɔgɦii da bee, ɦà bufɔka ba n kunida. Ĥá ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt. Ĥá vid yelmaa n san ɦá man, n luurm ɦá nakpai kwɛɛn.
41007026	Fɔg̈wii da ba na Siirii tantn Feniisii tiin, lag da Yuudaa tiin. Ĥá ka jobla Yeesu na ɦá vo kunidwii ɦà riir ɦá bufɔka ni.
41007027	Tii lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Saa saɦ bii di diit! L` kpaɦ hɔm na bá lɔg bii diit bà vaa gwɛi.»
41007028	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Berma, biilm, beda tii nnii. Gwɛntaɦ lee, ka bii ju diit yɔyɔra tɛɦra tiŋanii, gwɛi t ka tigaa yɔyɔrɦee.»
41007029	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Gwɛɛt vn leedg tii kaa, kuliim naa! Kunida reda v` bufɔka ni.»
41007030	Ĥá ŋmɛt ka kulaa yelmaa, n san n mid ɦà buga door fiigu ɦɛn, kunida t riir ká ni.
41007031	Yeesua t vid Tiir tantn, n san n Sidoon kɔrgun, n Kɔrni Kwiɦr tantn, n ŋmɛtgii n Galilee nyaam weenn.
41007032	Bá daan-wu n daawɦii ɦà ba na dintamn, ɦà kpaa gwɛɛla hɔm, n ka jobla Yeesu na ɦá dee ɦà nuɦu ɦá ɦɛn, l` gbaad-wu.
41007033	Yelmaa ɦá ree-wu nidba huuga, n san-wu n kpamga ɦɛn ɦayen, n kid dintamwii tobɦan ɦá nabia, n tuu nyanyaat n tatr ɦá gelmga.
41007034	L´ tog ɦá vii ɦá nɔnga n faaga, n ɦiir, n bɔɦɔɔ n bà lamn na: «Ĥefaata!» l´ kɔtɔd nnii na «Nyatg!»
41007035	Yelmaa, nidwii tobɦa t nyatr, ɦá gelmga t rɔt, ɦá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla hɔm.
41007036	Yeesua t baɦl nidba mɛmba na bá daa bɔɦɔɔm gwɛɛtii ɦii man. Ĥan da la baɦla-ba lee, bà gwɛda n kwɛɛn ka fulwa gwɛɛtii n koot.
41007037	L´ saa, l´ ɦɛm nidba yɔlaa yem kɔd, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥan ɦɛna bii mɛmbii ba hɔm l` kpaɦ jaɦ'. Ĥà lag n ka ta ɦɛna dintammba n tantaagumba ɦum ka gwɛɛla.»
41008001	L´ vuuguu, nidfigm t lilm taa kpoglb. Ban da kpaɦ n bii na bà di lee, Yeesua t hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n bɔɦɔɔ na:
41008002	«L` ɦɛna-ma ɦigm n nidbambena. Jana nnii goora ɦataɦ' ban tagd mà kaa, ka kpaa ju bii.
41008003	Biiba rɛn vɔkun n daan. Ka má saa-ba na bá kuliim welee, giilb ba b` fad-ba, bà lotr hurun.»
41008004	Bá gbaam-wu na: «Kpamloŋunkunan, ¿tee nnii tn ba t` bee t` nyaan bii na t` doow bá mɛmbee?»
41008005	Ĥá ŋmɛl-ba na: «¿N` ba n kpooni ɦilaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Ĥilbleɦ'.»
41008006	Yelmaa, ɦá saɦm nidfigmii wad na bá kad tiŋan. Ban kad lee, ɦá lɔgm kpooni ɦilbleɦii, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n gbeɦm-ɦi n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá raar nidfigmii. Bá raarm-ba.
41008007	Bà da ta ba n ɦɔlbii hilanii. Ĥá ta seeŋ Saŋgband ɦɔlbihii kaa na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá lɔg-hi, bà ta raar nidbee.
41008008	Baawena t jum n togm. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t kolm gbeɦa ɦá tɛl ɦee l´ hugl futɛtɛɦt tlbleɦt keɦ'.
41008009	L` ba na nidba bá da diir kpooni bee da ba kan wo ruuni ɦinaa. Ban diir lee, ɦá seeŋ-ba na bá kul hɔm.
41008010	Yelmaa, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá jib kpiirgun n san Dalmanutaa tantn.
41008011	Farisii tiiba t taan, bá n Yeesu bá ka bɔɦɔɔ. Bá ka bag na bà ŋmɛgii n wun na bà nyaan ɦá kɔtɔd, lee, n gbaam-wu na ɦá ɦe hoolgu kuugu, l` werii na ɦá gemmnt rɛn Saŋgband man.
41008012	Ĥá ɦiir kpuuu, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Ben ɦer goona nidba t ka gbaama hoolgu kuugu? Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Saŋgband kpaɦ d` si goona nidba nen hoolgu kuugu.»
41008013	Ĥan bed welee lee, n nyab bá man, n ŋmɛt n jib kpiirgun, n mɛwd nyaam bal.
41008014	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t hɔŋ na bà lɔg diit. Bà da mada kpoonu ɦuyenɦu kpiirgun.
41008015	Ĥá to-ba baɦlb ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kiig-n n` diir noon hɔm, mad-n n̈yen n Farisii tiiba kpoonu ragr n Ĥerooda kpoonu ragr!»
41008016	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ĥà gwɛɛl welee na ¿tn kpaɦ n kpoonu laa?»
41008017	Ĥá ɦom ban bɔɦɔɔ tii, n gbaam-ba na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn bɔɦɔɔ taa na nn kpaɦ n kpoonu? ¿N` la ban ɦom nnii? ¿L` ban jib n` jugun nnii? ¿N` rarm haawnn?
41008018	¿N` ba n niini ka kpaa yun? ¿N` ba n tobɦa ka kpaa ɦumn? ¿N` kpaa deeda
41008019	man da gbeɦr kpooni ɦinuɦi n dɔm nidba ruuni ɦinu leen? ¿Kpoongbeɦa nn da kolm ɦee da hugl furia ɦalaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ'.»
41008020	L´ saa, ɦá ta gbaam-ba na: «Man da gbeɦr kpooni ɦilbleɦ n dɔm nidba ruuni ɦinaa lee, ¿kpoongbeɦa nn da kolm ɦee da ta hugl futɛtɛɦt tlaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Tlbleɦ'.»
41008021	Tii lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka welee, ¿n` nyi ban ɦom nnia?»
41008022	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t taan Betsayidaa kɔrgun, reekan, bá dar joomɦii n san n ɦà man, n ka jobla-wu na ɦá dee ɦà nuɦu ɦá ɦɛn, ɦà gbaad-wu.
41008023	Ĥá mug joomwii nuɦu n dar-wu, n ree-wu kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn. Reekan, ɦá tuu nyanyaat, n gwɛɦm nidwii niini ɦɛn, n tarm ɦá ɦɛn, n gbaam-wu na: «¿Yul bii?»
41008024	Joomwii t vii ɦá nɔnga n keruu n koot n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà yul nidba, mà yul-ba wo tiit, gwɛntaɦ' bee kedan.»
41008025	Ĥá lilm nidwii niini ɦɛn tarmb. Tii kaann, nidwii t geed ɦá nɔngan tuuu. L´ gbaad-wu kpaalaa, ɦá ka yu want mɛnt kpanykpany.
41008026	Yeesua t saa-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Daa jib n Betsayidaa kɔrgun, kul naa yelmaa!»
41008027	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t vid n ka kedaa kɔrni ɦì nyɔɦr n Sesaree ɦiin. Sesaree kɔrguu, huraa Filfa da mɛɦra-ku. Ban da ɦeewr n kɛna lee, ɦá gbaam-ba na: «¿Nidba bɔɦɔɔ mà gwɛɛt na man nnii wenii?»
41008028	Bá leed-wu na: «Biiba bɔɦɔɔ na ven nnii Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa, volba na Ĥeliin, ta volba na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦiin.»
41008029	Ĥá ŋmɛt n gbaam-ba na: «Nen de, ¿nii bɔɦɔɔ na man nnii wenii?» Fetra t leed na: «Ven nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.»
41008030	Lee wen, Yeesua t baɦl-ba, ka venaa-ba nabiir, ka bɔɦɔɔ na bá daa biir ɦiiwu gwɛɛtii felaɦ'.
41008031	Tii kaann, ɦá baɦ n ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` ba na Nida Budaaga man, mà di kunyɔŋu kɔd. Kpalmmba, n gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba kee bà kir-ma, bà kuu-ma. L` saa, mà kuum kaann goora ɦataɦ goor, mà himtg.»
41008032	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛtii ka kpaa kpɛɦdra bii. Lee wen, Fetra t ree-wu kpamga n baɦ n ka kpal-wu.
41008033	Ĥan bed welee lee, ɦá bid ɦayen, n geed ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, n ta kpalm Fetr ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nyab nnaɦ', v` san vɔkun n man, Saatan! Kpaa diila wo Saŋgband, diila wo nida.»
41008034	L´ saa, Yeesua t hoɦ nidfigm, n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka ɦii bag na ɦà tagd mà kaa, l` ba na ɦá gwid ɦá ret, ɦà bigd ɦá dabragr ka tagd mà kaa.
41008035	Biilm, ɦá bag na ɦà soɦdg ɦà neerm wii, ɦà nan bɔraa-m. L´ saa, ɦá bɔrii ɦá neerm mà kaa n Gohɔmt kaa wii, ɦà nan soɦda-m.
41008036	Ka nida t yuuŋ tant ɦɛn kwɛgdm mɛnm n bɔrii ɦá neerm, ¿ɦà way bee?
41008037	¿Bii bee na nida lɔg ɦà daɦ ɦá neerm?
41008038	Ka ɦii ba n jiwɦi mà kaa n mà gwɛɛt kaa goona nidbɛɦba bá gwid Saŋgband kaawr bee huuga, Nida Budaaga nan ta bɛm n jiwɦi ɦá kaa goor kan kee kà daan kà Sa jeegun ká n saŋgbantumtbuudba dii.»
41009001	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bá bee nnaɦreen bee huuga, biiba nan kpaa ku ka ban nyaan Saŋgband huraant t` kena ka ba n gemmnt.»
41009002	Goora ɦaroond kaann, Yeesua t lɔgm Fetrwu n Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, wú n ban bá kot duvɔgr diir jugun n ka ba kan bayen. Ĥá tet beeb bá nɔngan.
41009003	Ĥá dimt t feent wasaɦ n ka nyalwa, ɦii ta kpaɦ tant ɦɛn na ɦà ɦe t` feentg welee.
41009004	Tii n t` kaann, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee t yum Ĥeliiwu n Mohiisa, bá n Yeesu l` gwɛɛla.
41009005	Lee wen, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma, l` ba hɔm na t` bɛm nanaɦ'. T` ba t` fil sugt ttaɦ': venwu kuyen, Mohiiswu kuyen, Ĥeliiwu kuyen.»
41009006	Ĥà da kpaa mi ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii. Fobɛɦgu da mug-ba kɔd, wú n ɦà tuurmbee.
41009007	Wadr diir t hoɦntn n fiid-ba. Noor diir t rɛn wadriin ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wunwii nnii mà Budaaga. Mà sɔkla-ka biii. Ĥom-n n kan!»
41009008	Yelmaa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦiluu bá kpama, n yum Yeesua ba ɦayen, ɦii ta kpaɦ ɦà man.
41009009	Ban da hoɦnta duur lee, ɦá baɦl-ba na: «Daa biir-n ɦiiwu bii nn nyan bii, kakeɦnan Nida Budaaga man, man nan himta kuumn mà neer lee wen.»
41009010	Bá ka mad ɦà baɦlbii hɔm. L´ saa, bá ka gbaama taa na: «¿Na lan nnii na ɦà nan himta kuum nii?»
41009011	Lee, bá gbaam-wu na: «¿Ben kaa nnii baɦlb weriitba nn bɔɦɔɔ na l` ba na Ĥelia daan saɦaa?»
41009012	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Biilm, Ĥelia ba ɦà daan saɦ', ɦà lo want mɛnt t´ tagan. Gwɛntaɦ', ¿lag Wadbuudga ta bɔɦɔɔ ka ɦigaa na Nida Budaaga nan jul kunyɔŋu kɔdgu, bà nyaɦaa-ka?
41009013	Lee, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, Ĥelia fɛtg daanm, nidba t ɦɛm-wu wo ban sɔkl lee, l´ ɦɛm l´ jugun wo Wadbuudga nn bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt lee.»
41009014	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee nn hoɦntn duur n taai gwɛɛt soɦdgtvolbee man lee, n mid nidfigm t kaadg-ba n lo-ba huuga, bá n baɦlb weriitba biiba bà bɔɦɔɔ.
41009015	Nidba wen nyan Yeesua, n ɦɛm kpiraɦ', n solm ka kedaa ɦà man na bà seeŋ-wu.
41009016	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿N´ n ban n` bɔɦɔɔ na laa?»
41009017	Nidfigmii huuga nidɦii t leed-wu na: «Berma, man bo na mà daan n mà buga v` man. Kunida kad kà ɦɛn, n ka kewr-ka na ká daa gwɛɛlm.
41009018	Kunidwii vuudra-ka tiŋan kaalai mɛniin, nyafifiit ror n kà noor, kà tagma ká nyina, kà gbanu haɦaa teteer gamm. Mà beda v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá vo kunidwii, bá ka ba bee.»
41009019	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nen, nidbɛɦba bá kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nen! ¿L` ba na mà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan tedaa? ¿L` ba na mà jum-n n kwɛɛwr kakeɦnan tedaa? Daan-n-ma n bugee!»
41009020	Bá wen daan n wú n bugee, kunidwii t yum Yeesua, n dam bugee kimm, ká luurm tiŋan, n biruu, nyafifiit ror n kà noor.
41009021	Ĥá gbaam ká sa na: «¿Bintedn ln baɦ n ka ɦɛna-ka wennaa?» Ĥá leed na: «L` baɦ-ka kà buluumgan.
41009022	Welee hɛngu kunidwii hɛɦra-ka ka lɔɔla-ka boglamn, n nyaalmn, na ɦà kuu-ka. Tii lee, ka v` ba v` bee v` ɦe bii, nyaan t` kunyɔŋu, v` tɔrg-t!»
41009023	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Beda na ka mà ba mà bea! Tii lee, miim na ka ɦii ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, ɦà ba ɦà bee ɦà soɦdg ɦan bag bii mɛmbii.»
41009024	Yelmaa bugee sa t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà tian. Tɔrg-ma na l` ba gemm na mà tii!»
41009025	Yeesua wen nyan nidfigm sana ka kena bà man, ɦá gwɛɛl n kunidwii n daat ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kunid ven! ¿Ven kewra bugee na ká daa gwɛɛlmaa, na ká daa ɦomaa? Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na riir bugee ni, l` saa daa ŋmɛtg v` kad kà ɦɛn felaɦ'!»
41009026	Kunidwii t mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga n dam bugee kimm n talmt, n rorm ká ni. L´ ka boo bugee kpiiran. Nidba bá da ba kan bee, bá kɔd t ka bɔɦɔɔ na kà kpiiran.
41009027	Yeesua t mug ká nuɦu, n vii-ka, ká jeɦnt faaga.
41009028	Tii kaann, ɦan kul haaga, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t tag ɦá kaa, wú n ban bá ka ba bayen lee, bá gbaam-wu na: «¿Ben ɦer le, t´ ka ba bee na t` vo kunidwii bugee nii?»
41009029	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Seeŋb n noor bɔb n jaɦ' tɔra na bá bee bà vo kunidbambena.»
41009030	Bá vid reekan n jib n Galilee tantn ka gɛta tuuu. Yeesua da kpaa bag na nidba miig wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá kan ba ree.
41009031	Ĥà da weraa-ba gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Bà kee bà mug Nida Budaaga man, bà taag-ma nidba niɦin, bee kuu-ma. L` saa mà kuum kaann goora ɦataɦ goor, mà himtg kuumn.»
41009032	Lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka kpaa ɦum ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii. Bá ka ba n fobɛɦgu na bà gbaam-wu lii.
41009033	Bá taai Kafarnahuum kɔrgun, n jib haar diirn, Yeesua t gbaam ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿Nn bɔɦɔɔm taa na lan ka kenaa?»
41009034	Bá kpat n ka hen belbel, blaɦb kaa, bá nn kenm lee, ka gbaama taa na bà miig ɦá ba berm bá huuga wii.
41009035	Lee wen, ɦá kad n hoɦ gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka ɦii bag na ɦà kolg ɦayenwu n faaga, l` ba na ɦá hoɦlg ɦayenwu n tiŋa ɦà kitg nidba mɛmba tumta.»
41009036	L´ saa, ɦá dar bukaaga kiiga, n jeɦl-ka bá nɔngan, n ɦog-ka, n bɔɦɔɔ na:
41009037	«Ĥii ɦà soɦda bukaaga kiiga kà boo kengee mà hidrn wii, mà mɔm nnii ɦan soɦda. L´ saa, ɦá soɦda-ma wii, lag mayen nnii ɦan soɦda, ɦà ta soɦda ɦà tamn-ma wii.»
41009038	Yohanɛɛsa t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma, t` nyana nidɦii vɔɦd kunidba v` hidrn, t´ ka bo na t` kir n wun na ɦà kpaa ba t` kpaturun.»
41009039	Ĥá leed na: «Daa kir-n n wun! Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà ɦe hoolgu kuugu mà hidrn, ɦà ŋmɛtg yelmaa ɦà bɔɦɔɔm mà gwɛɛt bɛɦgu.
41009040	Ĥii ɦá kpaɦ na t` gotii wii ba na t` tuurn.
41009041	Ĥii ɦá saɦ-n nyaalm kpowdgan na n` nyi na n` Berm nnii Krista, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: ɦà nan soɦda ɦà fat.
41009042	«Ka kaaba biiba tia mà gwɛɛt, nidɦii t werii bá ni ɦiiwu hurbɛɦu, ɦá gwid Saŋgband kaawr, l` mag n wun na bá lilg neer ɦá lakpandn, bà lɔɔlg-wu nyaamn.
41009043	«Ka v` nuɦu fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` gitg-ɦu. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` jib neerm mɔmmn ka ba n nuɦu ɦuyen, n vn ba v` jib taabuugu boglam m` kpaa ku miin ka ba n niɦi ɦiriɦ'. [
41009044	Reekan, jona ɦá ju gbanu ɦee kpaa ku, l´ saa boglamii ta kpaa ku felaɦ'.]
41009045	Ka v` nakpaŋa fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` gitg-ka. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` jib neerm mɔmmn ka ba n nakpaŋa kayen, n vn ba v` jib taabuugu boglamn ka ba n nakpai hireɦ'. [
41009046	Reekan, jona ɦá ju gbanu ɦee kpaa ku, l´ saa boglamii ta kpaa ku felaɦ'.]
41009047	Ka v` nɔmb ta fɔraa-v na v` lɔɔ bɛɦgu nii, l` ba na v` lugdg-b. L` ba hɔm n yat na v` jib Saŋgband huraantn ka ba n nɔmkperb, n vn ba v` bɛm n niini ɦiriɦ', bà lɔɔlg-v taabuugu boglamn.
41009048	Reekan, jona ɦá ju gbanu ɦee kpaa ku, l´ saa boglamii ta kpaa ku felaɦ'.
41009049	«Boglam nan ɦuma baawen wo yaarm nn ɦum jit lee.
41009050	Yaarm nnii bii hɔmb. Ka yaarm lamɛɛgu t riir, ¿n` ɦe lan n` ŋmɛlg-m-ku? Neer-n taa man lamɛɛgun wo yaarm nn ɦɛna jit t ka ba lamɛɛgu lee!»
41010001	Yeesua t vid reekan, n san Yuudee tantn, n Yɔrdaan kol bal. Nidfigm t lilm taa kpoglb ɦà man, ɦá baɦ n ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt wo ɦan daa ka weraa lee.
41010002	Farisii tiiba biiba t san ɦá man na bà fɔrii-wu. Bá gbaam-wu na: «¿T` baɦlb saɦl daawwu huru na ɦá bee ɦá vo ɦá fɔga?»
41010003	Ĥá leed-ba ka gbaama na: «¿Mohiisa sir-n baɦlteb?»
41010004	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Mohiisa sira huru na ka daawɦii bo na ɦà vo ɦá fɔgaa, l` ba na ɦá ɦɔr yaala sadgm wadga saɦ le, ɦà voo-wu»
41010005	Ĥá leed-ba na: «N` tangerm kaa nnii Mohiisa nn da ɦɔd baɦlbii.
41010006	Tii lee, l` ɦɔda na, weem kɔtɔdn, Saŋgband nn da ree want mɛnt lee, n ta ree daawwu n fɔga.
41010007	Tii kaa nnii ln ba na daawa riir n ɦayen, ɦà saa ɦà sawu n ɦà nya, wú n ɦà fɔg bà neer taa man,
41010008	bareɦdrbee bewlg nid ɦayen. Reekan, bà kpaɦ bà bɛm nidba bareɦ', bà kitg nid ɦayen.
41010009	Tii lee, l` kpaɦ na nida radg bii Saŋgband nn kpowlg n taa bii.»
41010010	Tii kaann, bá kulii haaga. Ban taai haaga lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t lilm Yeesuwu gwɛɛtii gbaamb.
41010011	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka daawɦii t vo ɦá fɔga, n lɔgm fɔgjeena, ɦà kitg yaruutgu fɔgnoogra nɔngan.
41010012	Ta welee nnii, ka fɔgɦii t vidg ɦà sida, n yɔlm dajeena, wii ta kitg yaruutgu.»
41010013	Nidba biiba da san n bii Yeesua man na ɦá ɦig hì ɦɛn ɦá niɦi. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka kpal-ba.
41010014	Ĥá yum welee, l´ weer-wu. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Saa-n bii daan mà man! Daa kewr-n-hi! Nidba bá boo hí dela bee, bee heɦl n Saŋgband huraant.
41010015	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bá kpaa soɦda Saŋgband huraant wo bukai bee, bà nan kpaa jiba t´ ni.»
41010016	Tii kaann, ɦá ɦɔgd biihii ɦà nyakɔgrgun ka deaa ɦà nuɦu hí ɦɛn kayen kayen, ka kaawla hì ɦɛn.
41010017	Yeesua nn da lɔɔ huru lee, nidɦii t daan ka sana kili, n gbaɦnt ɦá tiŋa, n gbaam-wu na: «Berma, ven nnii weriithɔma. ¿L` ba na mà ɦe ben saɦ na mà soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii?»
41010018	Ĥá leed-wu na: «¿Ben kaan vn hoɦ-ma na hɔma? Ĥii kpaɦ hɔmwu rii. Saŋgband n jaɦ beel hɔm.
41010019	Vn ba lee, miil baɦlb. Saŋgband beda na: Daa ku nida! Daa yaruum! Daa bam! Daa bɔɦɔɔm gokaat n nidba jugun! Daa hogl ɦii v` soɦdg ɦà want! Valgm v` sawu n v` nya!»
41010020	Nidwii t leed-wu na: «Berma, mà kaamn n jana, mà vala baɦlbii mɛmbii.»
41010021	Yeesua t geed-wu, n sɔkl-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «L` goda-v bii byen: Ked v` gweedm v` want mɛnt, v` lɔg lig̈biirii v` si kunyɔŋtiiba! Lee wen, v` nan yuuŋ kwɛgdbermm saŋgbambiimn. L` saa, v` daan v` tagd mà kaa.»
41010022	Nidwii wen ɦomr gwɛɛtii, n gulnt ɦá jugu, n gbɛlŋ, n gɛt ka ked, blaɦb kaa, ɦà da ba n kɛgt kɔd.
41010023	Yeesua t geed ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ɦá kpamga, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan ln ba gemm na kwɛgdm tiiba jibm Saŋgband huraantna!»
41010024	Gwɛɛtii t ɦɛm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba yɔlaa. Ĥá lilm-ba bɔɦɔɔb na: «Mà bii-n, l` ba gemm na nida jib Saŋgband huraantn!
41010025	L` ba gemm n deer na d´ jib n jajawu vadbn. L` ta yatg gemm n kwɛgdm tiiɦii na ɦá jib Saŋgband huraantn.»
41010026	Gwɛɛtii t ta ɦɛm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba yɔlaa kɔd, bá saa n ka gbaama taa na: «Ka l` ba welee, ¿wen t ka ba ɦà bee ɦà daɦ ɦá jugu?»
41010027	Ĥá geed-ba, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` ba gemm n nida, gwɛntaɦaa, bii kpaɦ gemm n Saŋgband. Bii kpaa yata dii.»
41010028	Lee wen, Fetra t saa n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tii gwid l´ mɛnguu kaawr, n ka tagd-v.»
41010029	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ka nida t saa ɦá haar, laa ɦá maaba, laa ɦá nyakwɛɛlba, laa ɦá nyabɛɛrba, laa ɦá nya, laa ɦá sa, laa ɦá bii, laa ɦá koot mà kaa n Gohɔmt kaa,
41010030	ɦà nan yuuŋ haya, n maaba, n nyakwɛɛlba, n nyabɛɛrba, n nyamba, n bii, n koot l` yatg kɔd vuugu tn neer gwelŋa kuun, n ta kunyɔŋu. Lee n l` kaan, goor diir ɦà nan soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii.
41010031	Tii lee, biiba bà ba noogrba gwelŋa bee, bá kɔd nan kita kaawrba, l` saa biiba bà ba kaawrba gwelŋa bee, bá kɔd nan kita noogrba.»
41010032	Tii kaann, bá baɦ huru ɦú kotgaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun ɦuu n ka ked. Yeesua da keda ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nɔngan. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba da ba n fobɛɦgu kɔd, fobɛɦgu da ta mada nidba bá da tagd bà kaa bee mɛɦ'. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee nn da tagd ɦà kaa lee, ɦá ta lilm-ba hoɦm n ree-ba kpamga, n baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba bii b` kee b` daan ɦà ɦɛn bii.
41010033	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥom-n! T` kotgaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Reekan nnii ban kee bà taag Nida Budaaga gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba nuɦun, bee biir na bá kuu-ka. Tii kaann bà taag-ka bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nuɦun,
41010034	bà laɦm-ka, ka tuura kà ɦɛn nyanyaat, ka gbuu-ka taŋgbanii, l` saa bà kuu-ka. Gwɛntaɦ', ká kuum kaann goora ɦataɦ goor kà himtg kuumn.»
41010035	Tii kaann, Jebdea kwɛɛlba Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛs bá nyuɦ Yeesua man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, t` sɔkla na v` ɦee-t bii tn ba t` gbaam-v bii.»
41010036	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` sɔkla na mà ɦee-n bee?»
41010037	Bá leed-wu na: «Vn nan kadaa v` huraant jargan lee, biiba kad v` kpama, volwu v` najuudu ɦɛn, volwu v` galu ɦɛn. T` jobla-v na, v` si-t huru na tii nan kad kan.»
41010038	Lee wen, ɦá ŋmɛl-ba na: «N` kpaa mi nn gbaama bii. ¿N` kee n` bee n` nyi wiiru kpowdga man ba mà nyi kee, laa n` soɦdg kunyɔŋu huurb biib man kee mà soɦdg bii?»
41010039	Bá leed-wu na: «T` ba t` bee.» Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Biilm, n` kee n` nyi wiiru kpowdga man kee mà nyi kee, n` ta soɦdg kunyɔŋu huurb man kee mà soɦdg bii.
41010040	Gwɛntaɦ lee, lag man beel mà roodg ɦii ɦà nan kadaa mà najuudu ɦɛn wii, laa mà galu ɦɛn wii. Kaalahii hɔda kan biiba Saŋgband nn da maantr-hi bee.»
41010041	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr volbee nn ɦomr welee lee, n lo kwɛɛwweerga n Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa.
41010042	Lee wen, Yeesua t hoɦ bá mɛmbee n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` miil hɔm na ban hoɦ na tiga huraamba bee, bà wayaa n bà bermt ka ɦɛna tigɦee daddad, l´ saa wembomba weraa-ɦa bá gemmnt ka nawdra-ɦa.
41010043	L` kpaɦ na l´ ta bɛm welee n` huuga. Ka n` huuga ɦii bag na ɦà di bermtii, l` ba na ɦá kitg n` kwɛɛla, n` tom-wu,
41010044	l` saa, ka n` huuga ɦii bag na ɦà bɛm noograa, l` ba na ɦá kitg n` yuuma.
41010045	Ta welee nnii, Nida Budaaga man, man ba daan na bá ɦɛm-ma ŋmɛɛg̈b. Mà daan na mà ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b ka tɔra volba, l` saa mà lɔg mà neerm mà faad na mà daɦ nidba kɔd juuni.»
41010046	Bá san n taai Yerikoo kɔrgun. Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t rorm kɔrgun. Ban red lee, nidfigm tagd bà kaa. Bá san n ka beraa n joomɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Bartimea, Timea kwɛɛla, ɦà kad huru maaru, ka jamaa.
41010047	Ĥá wen ɦomr na Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia beraanii, ɦá baɦ n ka toola na: «Yeesu, Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu!»
41010048	Nidba kɔd t ka kpal-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá kpat belaɦ'. Ban la bɔɦɔɔ-wu welee lee, ɦà gwɛda n kwɛɛn ka toola kimm na: «Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu!»
41010049	Yeesua t jeɦnt n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Hoɦ-n-wu!» Bá hoɦ joomwii n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vidg nan, ɦà hoɦl-v!»
41010050	Lee wen, ɦá vaa ɦá dadimr, n vid hulaɦ' ɦá nakpai ɦɛn, n san Yeesua man.
41010051	Wii t gbaam-wu na: «¿Bag na mà ɦee-v bee?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà Berma, ɦe na mà yum!»
41010052	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vn tii Saŋgband ɦɛn lee, v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimii daɦra v` jugu, ba v` bee v` keda.» Yelmaa, ɦá niini t went, ɦá ka tagd Yeesua kaa.
41011001	Bá san n ka nyuɦaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgu, Betfagee n Betaanii kɔrni man n taai duuga kiiga bà hoɦ-ka na ‟Kpaamtiit duuga”. Ban taai kan lee, Yeesua t tom ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba ɦà nɔngan ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
41011002	«Ked-n kɔrgu kú baa laɦii n` nɔngan kuun! Nn ba n` taai kan yelmaa lee, n` ba n` nyaan boŋhɛrga baɦr, ɦii ban kad kà ɦɛn. N` baɦdg-ka, n` daan n.
41011003	Ka ɦii gbaama-n na ¿ben kaan nn ɦɛna welee?, n` biir-wu na: ‟Berma bagl-ka, na ɦà ba ɦà ŋmɛlgn-v-ka gwelŋalena.”»
41011004	Bá lɔɔm huru yelmaa, n san n yum boŋhɛrga kiiga, kà baɦr feelgan, haar diir fiid noon. Bá baɦd-ka.
41011005	Nidba bá da ba kan bee t gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ɦɛna bee? ¿Ben kaan nn baɦda boŋŋee?»
41011006	Bá leed-ba wo Yeesua nn bed-ba lee. Nidbee t saa-ba na bá ked n kan.
41011007	Bá dar boŋŋee n san n wun. Ban san n kan lee, n lɔgm bá dima n dɔɔm boŋŋee ɦɛn, ɦá kad ká ɦɛn.
41011008	Nidba kɔd t lɔgm bá dima n yad-ɦa hurun, volba t dool hurun bambiɦt ban kaɦr n koot tii.
41011009	Bá da dɛɦr ɦá nɔngan n bá da kena n ɦà kaann bee da toola na: «Ĥoosaanaa! Saŋgband kaawlm ɦii ɦà kena wii ɦɛn! Ĥà kena d` hidrn!
41011010	Saŋgband kaawlm huraant t´ kena tii ɦɛn, t` yandaa Daviida huraant nnii! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband saŋgbambiimn!»
41011011	Yeesua t jib Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, n san Saŋgband haarn. Ĥan san kan lee, n ɦiluu bii b` da gɛta kan bii mɛmbii. Ln tog lee, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee t lɔɔm huru ka ked Betaanii kɔrgun, blaɦb kaa, nyingu da nyinaan.
41011012	Toŋu t ragd, bá rorm Betaanii kɔrgun na bà lɔɔ huru, kɔm t mug Yeesua.
41011013	Ĥá geedgii vɔkun n yum tiib biib b` boo ɦaadgu, ka ba n vaat. Ĥá sanii na ɦà nyaan na b` ba n roona laa. Ĥan nyuɦ b´ man lee, n mid vaat hɛnt. L` da ban ta roonɦee vuugu.
41011014	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ tiibii na: «Kpaɦ v` neer, ɦii daa nan di v` roona didii felaɦ'!» Ĥan bed welee lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦom.
41011015	Tii n t` kaann, bá taai Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Yeesua t jib Saŋgband haarn, n baɦ n ka vɔɦd nidba bá da gweedma, n bá da daɦ want kan bee. Ĥà da hɛɦra lig̈blagiitba kpela n kurŋmɛngweedmtba jarii ka daɦaa tiŋan.
41011016	Ĥà da kpaa saa na ɦii toɦd want ka gɛta n haariin.
41011017	L´ saa ɦá ka weraa-ba gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Bà nan hoɦaa mà haar na tiga mɛna seeŋb haar. Nen lee, nii lɔgra-d n ɦɛm bawdba kaalaŋa.»
41011018	Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba t ɦom gwɛɛtii, n ka bag huru na bà kuu-wu. Gwɛntaɦ', bà da sol-wu na, nidba mɛmba da nyɔka ɦà gwɛɛt ɦan weraa tii kɔd.
41011019	Jabr nn dan n jab lee, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t rorm kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn.
41011020	Toŋu t ragd, bá baɦ huru ɦateekwɛɛn weem n ka ked. Ban san n ka gɛta lee, n yum tiib Yeesua nn da gwɛɛl b` ɦɛn nobɛɦr bii t kparŋ kakeɦnan b` rugi.
41011021	Fetra t deed bii b` da gɛtg bii, n bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma, geedg v` nyaana! Tiib vn da gwɛɛl b` ɦɛn nobɛɦr bii, b` kparŋ b` mɛmbii.»
41011022	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Tiim-n Saŋgband ɦɛn!
41011023	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ɦii ba ɦà bee ɦà biir duugankena na ‟Ĥɔgdg vyen v` san v` lɔɔ nyaamn!”, ka ɦà tia na ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii ba t` ɦe t´ jugun, ka kpaa nigaa n ɦà kwɛɛwr nii, t` ta ɦe ɦá noor ɦɛn welee.
41011024	Tii kaa nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na, n` wen seeŋa Saŋgband ka gbaam-d bii, tii-n na n` soɦdg blaɦb, lee Saŋgband da d` ta si-n-b.
41011025	L´ saa, n` wen jeɦr faaga ka seeŋa Saŋgband, ka n` mad ɦiiwu n` kwɛɛwan, waa-n-wu! Ka n` ɦɛna welee, n` Sa ɦà ba saŋgbambiimn wii ta waa-n n` fubɛɦii. [
41011026	Tii lee, ka n` kpaa waa volba fubɛɦii, n` Sa ɦà ba saŋgbambiimn wii nan ta kpaa waa-n n` rei.»]
41011027	Tii n t` kaann, bá ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Yeesua t jib Saŋgband haarn n ka gilma d´ ni. Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba, n kɔrgun kpalmmba, bá daan ɦá man.
41011028	Ban daan ɦá man lee, n gbaam-wu na: «¿Hurteɦu noon nnii vn ɦɛna wennaɦ? ¿Wen sir-v huru na v` ɦɛmaa?»
41011029	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Maa mà ta gbaam-n gwɛɛgu kuyen, kuyengu liglig. Ka n´ leedg-ma kù ɦɛnii, mà biir-n ɦii ɦà sir-ma huru na mà ɦɛm welee wii.
41011030	¿Wen da tamn Yohanɛɛs na ɦá huurm nidba? ¿Saŋgband laa, nidba le? Leedg-n-ma lii!»
41011031	Lee wen, bá baɦ n ka wii-t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ka t´ leedg na Saŋgband da tamn-wu, ɦà gbaam-t na, ¿l´ ɦɛm lann tn da ba tii ɦà gwɛɛt?
41011032	Lee, ka t´ ta leedg na nidba da tamn-wu… Ĥaai!» Bà da sol nidfigm. Nidba mɛmba diila na da Yohanɛɛs nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtn gobiint.
41011033	Lee wen, bá saa n leed-wu na: «T` kpaa mi lii.» Ĥá ŋmɛl-ba na: «Ka welee, mà ta kpaɦ mà biir-n ɦii ɦà sir-ma huru má ka ɦɛna wantntina wii.»
41012001	Tii n t` kaann, Yeesua t baɦ n ka gwɛɛla-ba nawdlam ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nidɦii da hoowra tibit t´ roon bà ɦɛna n daam tii ɦá koogun, n mɔɦm dabid n kaad-ku, n tiim kan vadgu, n kɛrm-ku na bá nawdrm kú ni tiroonɦee ka rea daam. L´ saa, ɦá mɔɦm kooguun bibidr diir d´ kot n faaga na bá juulm d´ ɦɛn ka kiig kpambii ɦɛn. Ln diɦ lee, ɦá to-b daam tiiba biiba, na bá maantrm ka kiig, bá n wun bà rada taa daam. Ĥan ɦer welee lee, n vid n san huru.
41012002	L´ dan n taam daam vuugu, ɦá vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii n tom-wu, na ɦá san ɦà nidbee man ɦà soɦdgn ɦà rem.
41012003	Ĥan san lee, nidbee t mug-wu n gbum, n voom-wu, ɦá kulii ɦá nii.
41012004	Kooguu tiiwii t vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedvolɦii n tom. Bá san n gbum wii n ɦà jugu wee, n suum-wu.
41012005	Koogu tia t lilm jeenwu tuumb, bá mug-wu n kuum. L´ saa bá ta ɦɛm volba kɔd welee, ka gbu biiba, ka kuu volba.
41012006	L´ tɔlm kooguu tiiwii nid ɦayen, ɦá mɔm ɦá kwɛɛla, ɦà sɔkla-wu biii. Ĥá lɔgm kwɛɛlwii n tom nidbee man ka diila na bà kee bà valg wii na ln ba na ɦá kwɛɛln.
41012007	Kwɛɛlwii nn san bá man lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ taa na: ‟Kpay-n ɦá nan ba ɦà heɦm kooguu wii! Tn kuu-n-wu, l` saa t` nan mad kooguu!”
41012008	Ban bed welee lee, n mug-wu, n kuum n kooguu kaann.
41012009	¿L` ba na kooguu tiiwii ɦe laa? ¿Lag ɦà ba ɦà san ɦà ku nidbee, l` saa ɦà lɔg kooguu ɦà to jeenba?
41012010	-
41012011	L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Tand mɔɦdba nn da kɔɦdg dii, dii nnii d´ kitg bobogr tanbermr. Saberma nn ɦer bii nnii, t´ ka geewa l` ba hɔm biii . ¿N` nyi ban kaal gwɛɛtii Wadbuudga nii?»
41012012	Bermbee t miig na ɦà gwɛɛl nawdlamii l` hɛl bee. Bá ka bag huru na bà kuu-wu, gwɛntaɦ' ka sol nidba. Tii lee, bá saa saɦ n nyab.
41012013	Bá vii Farisii tiiba biiba, n huraa Ĥerooda kpaturu tiiba biiba n tom-ba Yeesua man, na bá kpɛɦɛɛ ɦà noor kpamga, bà mug-wu ɦà gwɛɛtn.
41012014	Bá san ɦá man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma! T` miil na bɔɦɔɔ gobiint. Kpaa sol bii nidba nn diila bá jugun bii, kpaa sol nidwu n ɦà nɔnga wee. Tii lee, weraa huru l´ reɦu ba na bá tagd ka neer wo Saŋgband nn gbaama lee. Biir-t nan lii! ¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá faadm Roomaa hurbermwu lambɦu? ¿L` ba na t` faadm-ɦu laa t` daa faadm le?»
41012015	Ĥá miig yelmaa na bà kpɛɦdr bà gobiint diila ɦà ba bá jugun ɦee n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn ŋmɛgaa n mana? Daan-n-ma n lig̈bkpaŋ̈m miim mà nyaana!»
41012016	Bá daan n wun. Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿Wen jugu nnii ban rea? ¿Wen hidr nnii ban ɦɔd m` ɦɛnii?» Bá leed-wu na: «Roomaa hurberma.»
41012017	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «To-n hurbermwu bii b` ba na ɦá reb bii! L` saa, n` ta to Saŋgband bii b` ba na d´ reb bii.» Gwɛɛt ɦan leedg-ba tii t´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem.
41012018	Sadusii tiiba biiba t daan Yeesua man. Bee bɔɦɔɔ na kpiirmba nan kpaa himta kuumn. Ban daan ɦá man lee, n gbaam-wu na:
41012019	«Berma! Mohiisa da ɦɔda baɦlbnbina n to-t, bii nnii na: Ka daawɦii t lɔg fɔga ka ba n nyakwɛɛla n kuum ka kpaɦ n buga, l` ba na ɦá nyakwɛɛlwii lɔg kuŋfɔg̈wii, ɦà meed-wu n budaaga, kà bɛm na ɦá maar ɦá kpiir wii rekan.
41012020	Tii lee, ɦii kwɛɛlba balbleɦba da bee. Noogra t lɔgm fɔga, n kuum ka ba meed buga.
41012021	Reɦdrwii t lɔgm kuŋfɔg̈wii, n kuum ka ba meed-wu n buga. L´ ta tag taɦrwii yenmii.
41012022	Kwɛɛlba balbleɦbee t lɔgm fɔg̈wii bá mɛmbee ka ku ka ba meed-wu n buga kiiga. Bá mɛmbee kuum kaann, fɔg̈wii t ta kuum.
41012023	Wo bá mɛmbee nn da lɔgr-wu fɔgt lee, goor kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn dii, bá leblmbee huuga, ¿wen nan ba ɦà heɦm-wu?»
41012024	Yeesua t leed-ba na: «N` bɔdan. N` kpaa mi Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt, n` ta kpaa mi Saŋgband gemmnt.
41012025	Biilm, kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn lee, daba kpaa kee bà lɔgm fɔg̈ba, fɔg̈ba ta kpaa kee bà yɔlm sidba. Bà nan ba bà neer wo saŋgbantumtba nn neer saŋgbambiimn lee.
41012026	¿N` ban kaal Mohiisa wadgan bii b` hɛl kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn lee gwɛɛtii felaɦn? L` ɦɔda kan na Saŋgband da beda-wu suŋsuŋa man na, dii nnii ɦà yandaa Ĥabrahaama Saberma, ta ɦà yandaa Yisɦaaka Saberma, ta ɦà yandaa Yakooba Saberma.»
41012027	Ĥá fɛl na: «Saŋgband nnii nidneermba Saŋgband, lag kpiirmba redn. Tii lee, n` hogla n̈yen kpaalaa.»
41012028	Baɦlb weriitɦii t ɦom Yeesuwu n Sadusii tiiba bà bɔɦɔɔ. Ĥá yum na Yeesua gwɛɛl hɔm. Ĥá nyuɦ ɦá man n gbaam-wu na: «¿Baɦlb mɛmb huuga, baɦlteb yatg bermb?»
41012029	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Baɦlb b´ yatg bii, bii nnii na waa: Yisraɦeel tiiba nen, ɦom-n na Saberm t` Saŋgband nnii Saberm ɦayen!
41012030	L` ba na v` sɔklm v` Saberm Saŋgband n v` kwɛɛwr mɛnd, n v` rem mɛnm, n v` diila mɛna, n v` gemmnt mɛnt.
41012031	Baɦlreɦdrb nanaɦ': L` ba na v` ta sɔklm v` nidtuur wo vn sɔkla v` mɔm vyen lee. Baɦlb biib ta kpaa yata baɦlb breɦbii.»
41012032	Baɦlb weriitwii t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma! L` ba hɔm biii. Vn bed tii ba gobiint. Saberm nnii Saŋgband dyen, Saŋgband diir ta kpaɦ n dii kaan.
41012033	Tii lee, l` ba na nida sɔklm Saŋgband n ɦà kwɛɛwr mɛnd, n ɦà rarm mɛnm, n ɦà gemmnt mɛnt. Lee, ɦà ta sɔklm ɦá nidtuur wo ɦan sɔkla ɦayen lee. Tii ba hɔm n yat Saŋgband vit mɛnt, ban totra tii n ban kpaa totra tii.»
41012034	Yeesua t yum na ɦà leedg rarm gwɛɛt, lee ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpaa ba vɔku n Saŋgband huraant.» Tii n t` kaann, ɦii t ka ta kpaa ŋmiinaa na ɦà gbaam-wu lii.
41012035	Yeesua nn da weraa gwɛɛt Saŋgband haarn lee, n gbaam na: «¿Lan nnii baɦlb weriitba nn bɔɦɔɔ na Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii Daviida yakiiga, na kpaalaa nnii?
41012036	L` ba na Voɦoom Buudm da wentg Daviida diir noon, wii mɔma t bɔɦɔɔ na: Saberm Saŋgband da beda mà berm na: ‟Daan v` kad mà najuudu ɦɛn kakeɦnan! Mà daa mà lo v` rafeedba v` nakpai kwɛɛn .”
41012037	Daviida mɔma hoɦl-wu na ‟Berma”. Ka l` ba welee de, ¿lan nnii Krista nn ba ɦà ta bɛm na ɦá yakiiga?»
41012038	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ nidba ɦan da weraa bee na: «Mad-n n̈yen hɔm n baɦlb weriitba. Bà sɔkla na bà gilm yakun ka fidr kwɛgdm dimt, ka ta sɔkla na nidba seeŋ̈m-ba n valgm.
41012039	Ka bá san kpoglb disagtn, bá ka ro jarii hí jeɦr nɔngan hii ka kadaa. Bà roor kaalaŋhɔmii kasant diit julant.
41012040	Bà fɛɛra kuŋfɔg̈ba niɦin kpelkpel, ka seeŋa Saŋgband l` vɔka na bá biir na bee nnii hɔmba. Tii lee, bà nan daraa bà tobɦa kimm l` yatg.»
41012041	Yeesua t jib Saŋgband haarn, n kad ka nyɔɦr n bá kan lɔɔla lig̈biir ree. Ĥan kad kan lee, n ka geewa nidfigm nn kena ka lɔɔla lee. Kwɛgdm tiiba kɔd ta kena ka lɔɔla lig̈biir kɔd.
41012042	Katɛdkuŋfɔgɦii t daan n lɔɔl wadbii hireɦ'.
41012043	Lee wen, ɦá hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Katɛdkuŋfɔg̈wunwuna lɔɔlg lig̈biir l´ yat nidvolbee mɛmbee.
41012044	Bee dewdg bà lig̈bia ɦɛn lig̈biir bá d´ kpaa halwa dii n lɔɔl. L´ saa kuŋfɔg̈wii lee, wii t lɔɔl lig̈biir ɦan ba n na ɦà jum ka neer dii kpaalaa.»
41013001	Yeesua nn da ror Saŋgband haarn lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtɦii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, nyaana! Haarndina dabira berŋ hali! D´ tanɦee ba kwɛɛlm biii!»
41013002	Ĥá leed-wu na: «¿Yul dabirɦee nn berŋ lee? L` nan kpaa tɔl tand dyend mɔmr d` dɛɛr d` tuurnd ɦɛn nnaɦreen felaɦ'. L´ mɛnguu nan luuran.»
41013003	Wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba Fetrwu n Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛswu n Ĥandree bá juul Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn. Ban juul lee, ɦá kad ka yaagr Saŋgband haar nɔnga. Wú n ban, bà da ba kan bayen. Bá gbaam-wu na:
41013004	«Biir-t vuugu ln nan ɦɛna welee kuun. ¿Lan nnii tn kee t` ɦe t` miig na welee wantii mɛntii ba t` ɦea?»
41013005	Lee wen, ɦá leed na: «Mad-n n̈yen hɔm na ɦii daa hogl-n!
41013006	Nidba kɔd nan ba bà kenm mà hidrn ka bɔɦɔɔ na bee nnii man. Lee wen, bà hogl nidba kɔd bà fiwlg-ba.
41013007	N` nan ba n` ɦom bà taaw hooda n` kpamii, l` saa n` ta ɦom bà gwɛɛla l` baɦr n hooda ban taaw vɔkun ɦee. Lee, l´ daa si-n fobɛɦgu! L` ba na welee ɦe, gwɛntaɦ', lag tant diɦm nnii saɦ'.
41013008	Tigr nan vida d` tuurnd ɦɛn, ɦà teew taa hoodr, l` saa huraaɦii kɔrgu gbuɦdg hurvolɦii reku hoodr. Tant nan ba t` dam kɔrni jugu jugun, l` saa kɔmbermm riir. Welee kunyɔŋuu weraa na tant diɦm nyuɦnn. L` boo futia wiiru nn weraa-wu na ɦà nyuɦ maadb lee.
41013009	L´ saa, nen lee, kiig-n n` diir noon hɔm! Nidba biiba nan ba bà sam-n yaagu yaalant. Volba nan ba bà gbum-n kpoglb disagtn. Volba nan ta ba bà hoɦm-n bermba n huraamba duuran mà kaa, ka bo na n` bee n` biir n` reb mi mà hidrn bii bá nɔngan.
41013010	Saɦ na tant diɦm taanaa, l` ba na bá faa Saŋgband Gohɔmt tiga mɛnan.
41013011	Ka bá dan n ka moog-n ka ked n yaagu yaalant, n` kwɛɛwa daa toom na: ¿n` kee n` biir na laa? Tii lee, yaagu yaam wenii, bɔɦɔɔm-n gwɛɛt t´ kee t` kenm n` noon tii. Gwɛɛtii kpaa kee t` rorm n` diilan, Voɦoom Buudm kee m` lo-t n` noon.
41013012	Biiba kee bà gweedm bayen bà teelba na bá kuu-ba. L` saa samba biiba ta gweedm bayen bà bii na bá kuu-hi. Ta welee nnii bii hiihi nn kee hì vidg hì reba ɦɛn, hì ɦe bà kuu-ba.
41013013	Baaben tia kee ɦà nyaɦaam-n mà kaa. Gwɛntaɦaa, ɦii ɦà nan ba ɦà mad hɔm kakeɦnan wii, l` nan daɦ ɦá jugu.
41013014	«N` nan yul ɦii ban hoɦ na ŋmɛrwaŋu wii ba kaalaŋa l´ kann kpaɦm na ɦá bɛm ree. –Ĥá kaal gwɛɛtntina wii, l` ba na ɦá ɦom-t hɔm!– Lee wen, biiba bà nan ba bà bɛm Yuudee tantn bee, bá siil bà juul duuran!
41013015	Ĥii ɦà nan ba ɦà bɛm haaga wii, ɦá daa jib dugun na ɦà lɔg want ɦà solm ka mad!
41013016	L´ saa ɦii ɦà nan ba ɦà bɛm kpam wii, ɦá daa ŋmɛtgn haaga na ɦà lɔg ɦá dimt!
41013017	Goorɦee ni, futiiba n fɔg̈ba bá nan ba bà ɦɛɛlgm bii bee kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm bermgu.
41013018	Joblm-n Saŋgband na welee daa nan taan ɦawet wen!
41013019	Goorɦee ni, kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm bermgu l` yatg. Lɔg weem kɔtɔdn, Saŋgband nn da ree want mɛnt kakeɦnan n jana, kunyɔŋu kuugu ban taa-ku, l´ saa, ɦii nan ta kpaa yu kú tuurŋu felaɦ'.
41013020	Ka Saberma da ba biir na ɦà ba ɦà gwiɦdg goorɦee ɦɛnii, ɦii nn nan kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà fetg ɦà neer. Lee, ɦà gwiɦdg goorɦee ɦɛn nidba ɦan bantg bee kaa.
41013021	Tii lee, ka ɦii t dan n ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na Krista ba nnaɦ laa ɦà ba laɦaa, daa tii-n n wun!
41013022	Gokaat Kristmba n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nan rorn. Bà nan ba bà ɦɛm hoolgu kɔd, ka ta ɦɛna want tiit ɦii kpaa ɦum t` kɔtɔd, na bà hoglm nidba. Bà nan ta ba bà lagiim n biiba Saŋgband nn bantg bee mɛɦ', ka kpaɦ bà bee-ba.
41013023	Nen lee, kiig-n n` diir noon hɔm! Mà beda-n l` mɛnguu n dool.
41013024	«Gwɛntaɦ', kunyɔŋbermgu kaannaa, muunu ɦe nyeet, kidga ta kpaɦ kà wiir,
41013025	ŋmɛdii begdr saŋgbambiimn ka tɛɦra, want t´ ba n faaga tii mɛntii hamtr n taa.
41013026	Lee wen, bà nyaan Nida Budaaga kena wat ɦɛn, ka ba n gemmnt kɔd, ka ba ká jeegun.
41013027	Kà nan tuuma saŋgbantumtba tant mɛntn, volba san n toŋu kwɛɛn, volba san n toŋu faaga, bà ree biiba kan da bantg bee baatea, bà kpogl-ba.
41013028	Lɔg-n gwɛɛt tod nn weraa-t tii n` tɔnii-t n` ɦoma! N` wen yu d´ hulii ba nɛmnɛm vakwɛɛnt rɛna, n´ miig na yobr ba nyɔɦ'.
41013029	Ta yenmii, nn kee n` nyaan welee taana lee, miig-n na Nida Budaaga daanm ba nyɔɦ', na kà ba kà taan!
41013030	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, waagankena nan kpaa ku kà diɦ saɦ bii man bɔɦɔɔ bii mɛmbii ban ɦe.
41013031	Saŋgbambiim n tant nan booran, maa gwɛɛt lee, tii nan kpaa boor felaɦ'.
41013032	«Gwɛntaɦ lee, goor mɔmr laa waaru mɔmu Nida Budaaga nn nan kena lee wen, ɦii kpaa mi. Saŋgbantumtba mɛɦ' kpaa mi, Budaagee mɔmga ta kpaa mi, ká Sawu n jaɦ miiln.
41013033	Mug-n n̈yen hɔm, daa gor-n na n` kpaa mi vuuguu!
41013034	L` nan ba l` bɛm wo nidɦii nn vida na ɦà keda huru lee. Ĥà lɔgl ɦá haar n to ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá kiigm d´ ɦɛn. Ĥá raarm-ba ŋmɛɛgi jugu jugu, l´ saa ɦá bɔɦɔɔ fiid noon sagd na ɦá sugm hɔm, na ɦá bɛm saw.
41013035	Tii lee, neer-n ka sug na n` kpaa mi haar tia wen kpena! Ka l` ba ɦe hɔm, ɦà nan kpena jabr, laa nyingu huuga, laa kɔdaaga jawda, laa ɦateekwɛɛn.
41013036	Ka ɦá da n taan myenm ɦɛn, l´ daa ɦe na ɦá mid n` go!
41013037	Man bɔɦɔɔ-n tii nnii na: Bɛm-n saw! Mà ta bɔɦɔɔ-t nidba mɛmba!»
41014001	Yuudaa tiiba da ba n kasant tiit bà hoɦ-t na Gɛtgm kasant n ta Kpooni kasant. Bà da jul-t n kpooni ban kpaa lɔɔ ɦì ni kpoonu ragr ɦii. L` da tɛla goora ɦarɛɦ na bá baɦ kasantii deb. Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba da ɦɛna rarm na bà mug Yeesua, lee bà kuu-wu.
41014002	Biilm, bà da bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «L` kpaɦ na t` mug-wu kasant gooran, ka lag welee, kɔrgu ba kù vidg t` ɦɛn.»
41014003	Yeesua da ba Betaanii kɔrgun, bolmɦii haarn bà hoɦ-wu na Simoona. Ĥan kad na ɦà di diit lee, fɔgɦii t jibn ka mad kpalaliiga kiiga ká ba kwɛɛlm biii, daɦt kpakunuukaɦm ba ká keɦ', ka ba kelkel, bà hoɦ-m na ‟naar”. Fɔg̈wii t gwɛɦd kpalaliigee noor, n huud-ka, n vu Yeesua jugu kpaamii.
41014004	L´ weer biiba bá da ba kan bee, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ĥà koɦl kpaamii na laa?
41014005	Ln bɛm na bá gweedm kpaamii l` yatg lig̈biir ruuni lɛmi ɦitaɦ', bà lɔg lig̈biirii bà si katɛdtiiba!» Reekan, bá ka kpal fɔg̈wii ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦan ɦer bii kpaɦ hɔm.
41014006	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Saa-n fɔg̈wii kpooo! ¿L` ɦer lan nn lɔɔ-wu kunyɔŋu? Ĥan ɦer-ma bii, b` ba hɔm.
41014007	Katɛdtiiba lee, bee ba bà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan. Ka n` sɔkla, n` ba n` bee n` ɦɛm-ba hɔmgu hɛruɦ'. Man lee, mà kpaɦ mà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan.
41014008	Fɔg̈wii ɦera ɦan bee na ɦà ɦe bii nnii. Ĥà fɛtg mà gbanu manyiib n gwɛɦm-ɦu kpakunuukaɦm na bá nan kuur-ɦu bilun.
41014009	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ban nan ba bà faam Gohɔmt tant mɛntn lee, bà nan ba bà bɔɦɔɔm bii fɔg̈wii nn ɦer bii, ka deeda ɦá ɦɛn.»
41014010	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee huuga bilma da bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Yuudaas Kariyoot tia. Lee wen, ɦá san gotibermba man, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na ɦà sɔkla na ɦà gweedm-ba Yeesua.
41014011	Ban ɦomr welee lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba lamɛɛgu. Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ka welee baa bà faad-wu lig̈biir. Tii n t` kaan, Yuudaasa t baɦ n ka bag hurhɔmu na ɦà gweedm-ba-wu.
41014012	Kpooni kasant deb gonoogrd t taan, goorii nnii ban da vid fɛɛbii Saŋgband na bà dig Gɛtgm kasant diit. Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam-wu na: «¿Tee nnii vn sɔkla na t` san t` dig Gɛtgm kasant diit?»
41014013	Lee wen, ɦá tom ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ked-n kɔrgun! N` kee n` taŋ n nidɦii ɦà toɦd nyaalm n dafod, n` tagd ɦá kaa.
41014014	Haar ɦan kee ɦà jib d` ni dii, n` biir d` tii na: ‟Berma gbaama-v na, disaku ɦan ba ɦà di kú ni Gɛtgm kasant wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kuu, ¿kù ba tee?”
41014015	Lee wen, ɦà werii-n disag̈bermgu kuugu kù dewr haar jugun n faaga, kù ni ba l´ mɛnguu. Reekan nnii nn ba n` dig diit.»
41014016	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtbee t lɔɔm huru, n san kɔrgun. Ban taai kɔrgun lee, n mid l´ mɛnguu ba deedee wo ɦá nn ta bed-ba lee, bá nan dig Gɛtgm kasant diit.
41014017	Muunu nn lɔɔr lee, wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee bá taan,
41014018	wú n ban bá kad n ka ju diit. Ban da ɦeewr n deb lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, n` huuga ɦii ba ɦà gweedm-ma, má n wulaɦ t` jul diit taa man.»
41014019	L´ ɦɛm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba fobɛɦgu. Bá baɦ n ka gbaama-wu ɦayen ɦayen na: «¿Man laa?»
41014020	Ĥá leed na: «L` hɛla n` huuga bilma, man n wulaɦ t` laglg n ka heɦga kpoonu jit sumgan.
41014021	Nida Budaaga ba kà kpi wo ln ɦɔd ká gwɛɛt Wadbuudgan lee, gwɛntaɦ lee, nid ɦá ba ɦà gweedm-ka wii, kunyɔŋbermgu nan luura ɦà ɦɛn. Ka bà da ba meed wii, ln bɛm hɔm l` yatg!»
41014022	Ban da ɦeewr n diit deb lee, Yeesua t lɔgm kpoonu, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n gbeɦm-ɦu, n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Jaɦ-n! Mà gbanu nnii.»
41014023	Tii kaann, ɦá ta lɔgm kpowdga n daam, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n to-ba-ka, bá nyim-ka bá mɛmbee.
41014024	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà jiim nnii. Mii lɔɔ tuurnt Saŋgband n nidba l´ huuga. Mii kee m` sool nidba kɔd kaa.
41014025	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, mà nan ta kpaa nyi daam felaɦ', kakeɦnan goor man nan nyi dakwɛɛlm Saŋgband huraantn.»
41014026	Tii n t` kaan, bá yuum kasantii yumii. L´ tog, bá ka kedaa Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn.
41014027	Ban ked lee, ɦà bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` kee l` haam n` rarm n` kir Saŋgband, wo ln ɦɔd Wadbuudgan na: Bà nan kua kimta, l` saa fɛi yadr taa kpeee n koot.
41014028	Man kee mà himtg kuumn lee, mà san Galilee tantn mà hɔd-n kan.»
41014029	Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l´ yatg wo ben, volba t kirm Saŋgband, man lee, maa kpaɦ mà kir-d felaɦ'.»
41014030	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, nyingunkuna nii, saɦ na kɔdaaga jawdg mreɦmii, v´ fɛtg foorb tɔmb mtaɦm na kpaa mii-ma.»
41014031	Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ ka ɦigr na: «Ka l` la ba na má n vn t` kpia, mà kpaɦ mà gbu mà feer na mà kpaa mii-v.» Gwɛɛt soɦdgtvolbee t ta bɔɦɔɔ bá mɛmbee yenmii.
41014032	Bá san n taam kaalaŋa kiigan, bà hoɦ-ka na Getsimanii. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Kad-n nnaɦ'! Maa san mà seeŋ Saŋgband.»
41014033	L´ saa ɦá lɔgm Fetrwu n Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, wú n ban bá dodgii jaɦ'. Fobɛɦgu t baɦ n ka mad-wu, ɦá rarm t ka fid ɦá ni.
41014034	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Himaɦr hu mà kwɛɛwrn, mà rarm t ka fid, mà hurgan diɦaa. Kpat-n nnaɦ n` bɛm ka neer, daa gor-n!»
41014035	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, n dodgii jaɦ', n luurm, ɦà nɔngan hɛl tiŋa, n ka jowaa Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na, ka l` ba l` tiaa, kunyɔŋu vuuguu daa daan ɦà ɦɛn.
41014036	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai, baaba! Ĥoo, mà Sa! Ba v` bee l` mɛngu. Lɔg wiiru kpowdgankena v` san n kan n vɔku! Gwɛntaɦaa, l´ ɦe wo vii nn sɔkla lee, l´ daa ɦe wo maa nn sɔkla lee!»
41014037	Ĥá ŋmɛtgn gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bataɦbee man n mid bà go. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ Fetr na: «Simoon! ¿Goolnn? ¿Ba bee na v` neer waaru ɦuyenɦu mɔmɦun?
41014038	Neer-n ka jobla Saŋgband na bii daa hogl-n! Nida diilan ba na ɦá ɦɛm bii hɔmb, gwɛntaɦaa, ɦà gbanu ba gigdm.»
41014039	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, n ta lilm dodgm, n ka jowaa Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ goyentii.
41014040	L´ saa, ɦá ta ŋmɛtgn ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba man, n mid bà go, bà niini ba jeegu n goom. Bá ka kpaa mi ln ba na bá biir-wu tii.
41014041	Ĥá wen dan n ŋmɛtgn bá man tɔmtaɦrmii, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿N` la doora ka go ka voɦaa? L` taara welee! Vuugu taan nnii. Nyaan-n! Baa bà mug Nida Budaaga bà taag-ka fubɛɦtiiba natadn.
41014042	Vidg-n, tn nyab-n! Nyaan-n! Nid ɦá gweedma-ma wii nanaɦ'.»
41014043	Yeesua nn da ɦeewr n gwɛɛlb lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee huuga bilma, bà hoɦ-wu na Yuudaasa t taan. Wii da gweedm Yeesua. Nidba kɔd da tagda ɦà kaa, ka mad hoodjui n dagbɛɦa. Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba, n kɔrgun kpalmmba da tomra-ba na bá mug Yeesua.
41014044	Ĥá da gweedm Yeesuwu wii da beda nidbee na: «Nid man kee mà seeŋ mà ɦog wii, wii nnii. Mug-n-wu, n` ked n wun, ka mad-wu hɔm!»
41014045	Ĥan taan lee, n nyuɦ Yeesua man, n hoɦ-wu na: «Taa maara!» Lee, n ɦog-wu.
41014046	Lee wen, nidbee t tiɦd Yeesua ɦɛn n mug-wu.
41014047	Bá da ba Yeesua man bee, bá ni bilma t rood ɦá hoodjuuga, n kɛɦd ɦii n git ɦá tobr, l` ba na gotiberma ŋmɛɛɦeedn.
41014048	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ bá daan na bà mug-wu bee na: «¿N` lɔgra hoodjui n dagbɛɦa n daan mà do wo na man nnii bawd laa?
41014049	Goor wo goor, má n nn t` bee taa man, mà weraa gwɛɛt Saŋgband haarn, n´ ka ba mug-ma. Tii lee, l` ɦera na Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt ɦe t´ noor ɦɛn.»
41014050	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtbee mɛmbee t solm n yadr taa, n saa-wu ɦayen.
41014051	L´ tɔlm kuliiga kiiga. Ká ka tagd ɦà kaa, ka hɛgr dimr dyend kà ɦɛn. Bá lɛwd ká dimr na bà mug-ka,
41014052	ká jaluu, n saa ká dimr n solm ka ba hɛngu.
41014053	Bá san n Yeesuwu n gotiberma haarn, gotiiba mɛmba, n kɔrgun kpalmmba, n baɦlb weriitba, bá kpogl taa kan.
41014054	Fetra da sabaa bà kaa ka ba vɔkun ka geewa Yeesua, ɦá jib gotiberma haaga n kad tawdba man, n ka huura boglam.
41014055	Gotibermba, n yaani yaadbermbee mɛmbee t ka bag gwɛɛt tiit na bà biir n Yeesua ɦɛn, ka bo na bà kuu-wu, gwɛntaɦaa, ka kpaa yu tiit.
41014056	Nidba kɔd t ka kena n gokaat n ɦá ɦɛn, gwɛntaɦaa, ka kpaa bɔɦɔɔ yent.
41014057	Biiba t vid n bɔɦɔɔ gokaat n ɦà ɦɛn na,
41014058	bà da ɦomra ɦà bɔɦɔɔ na nidba mɛɦra Saŋgband disakunkuna, na wii nan gbuɦl-ku, ɦà lɔg goora ɦataɦ ɦà mɛɦ jeengu, l` kpaɦ na nidba mɛɦra-kuu.
41014059	Ban da la bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, bà gwɛɛtii kpaɦ yent.
41014060	Gotiberma t vid yelmaa bá huuga, n gbaam Yeesu na: «¿Kpaa leeda liin? ¿Nidbambena bɔɦɔɔ na lan v` ɦɛnii?»
41014061	Ĥá kpat n ka hen belbel, n ka ba leedg lii. Gotiberma t lilm-wu gbaamb na: «¿Ven nnii Krist Saŋgband Budaaga laa?»
41014062	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ĥiin, man nnii. L´ saa, n` nan yul Nida Budaaga kad Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia najuudu ɦɛn . N` nan ta yul-ka wat ɦɛn, kà kena n faaga.»
41014063	Lee wen, gotiberma t sad ɦá dimgu n kwɛɛwweerga, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` ta kpaa haaraa na ɦii biir-t lii ɦà ɦɛn.
41014064	N` mɔmba n` ɦomra ɦan suudg Saŋgband lee. ¿N` nyan bɛ?» Bá mɛmbee t leed na ɦà koɦl gwɛɛt, na l` ba na bá kuu-wu.
41014065	Biiba t baɦ n ka lɔɦdra ɦà ɦɛn nyanyaat. Bá fiid ɦá niini ɦɛn dimtoogu n gbum-wu kuda ka gbaama-wu na: «Tad! ¿Wen gbudg-v lee?» L´ saa tawdba t lɔgm-wu n waagm-wu kataŋii.
41014066	Fetra t kpat n ka la ba haaga. Gotiberma ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔgɦii t taan,
41014067	n yum-wu ɦà huura boglam. Ĥá geed-wu hɔm, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ven, da ta ba Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tiiwii man.»
41014068	Ĥá kii ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà kpaa mi vn bo na v` biir tii. Mà kpaa ɦum l` kɔtɔd.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n rorm duun. [Lee wen, kɔdanoogrga t jawd.]
41014069	Ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔg̈wii t ta yum-wu, n lilm bá da ba kan bee bɔɦɔɔb na nidwunwuna ba na bá ni ɦiin.
41014070	Fetra t lilm kiim na ɦà kpaa mii-wu. L´ mɔɔ jaɦ', bá da ba kan bee t lilm Fetrwu bɔɦɔɔb na: «Biilm, ven nnii bá huuga bilma, ven nnii Galilee tia.»
41014071	Lee wen, Fetra t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka mà bɔɦɔɔ gokaatii, Saŋgband dar mà tobr. Mà foora na mà kpaa mi nid nn bɔɦɔɔ wii.»
41014072	Ĥan ɦeewr n gwɛɛtii n bɔɦɔɔb lee, kɔdareɦdrga t jawd. Ĥá deed gwɛɛt Yeesua nn da bed-wu tii na: «Saɦ na kɔdaaga jawdg tɔmb mreɦm, v´ fɛtg foorb tɔmb mtaɦm na v` kpaa mii-ma.» Lee wenii, ɦá baɦ n ka kuum.
41015001	Ĥateekwɛɛn weem, gotibermba t kpogl taa, bá n kpalmmba, n baɦlb weriitba, n yaani yaadbermba mɛmba, na bá diilg Yeesua gwɛɛt ɦɛn, bà mug noor dyen. Bá bɔɦɔɔ bá bɔm-wu. Bá lɔgm-wu n san n taag-wu gomn Filaata natadn.
41015002	Wii t gbaam-wu na: «¿Ven nnii Yuudaa tiiba huraa?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Beda tii nnii.»
41015003	Gotibermba t kudm gwɛɛt kɔdgu ka bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ɦɛn.
41015004	Lee wen, Filaata t lilm-wu gbaamb na: «¿Kpaa leeda liin? Ĥuma gwɛɛt kɔd ban kena n v` ɦɛn tii!»
41015005	Ĥá ka ba leedg lii felaɦ', l´ ɦɛm Filaatwu yɔlaa.
41015006	Bind wo bind, Gɛtgm kasant nn taana lee, gomna t ree sarga tiiɦiiwu sargan, kɔrgu tiiba nn gbaam-wu na ɦá ree ɦà hoɦlg-wii.
41015007	Lee wen, nidɦii reewr sargan, bà hoɦ-wu na Barabaasa. Bà da riw-wu sarga wú n nidbɛɦba biiba na bà da kura nidba kɔrgun ln da ba tulgu lee wen.
41015008	Nidfigm t nyuɦ Filaata man, n gbaam-wu na ɦá ɦe wo ɦan daa ka ɦɛna bina mɛna lee.
41015009	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` sɔkla na mà hoɦlg-n Yuudaa tiiba huraa laa?»
41015010	Ĥà da gbaama welee ka mi hɔm na gotibermba ɦera nɔmmɔlb n taag Yeesuwu ɦà natadn.
41015011	Lee, gotibermba t ka hɛɦr nidfigm na m´ gbaam Filaat na ɦá ree Barabaaswu sargan.
41015012	Filaata t gbaam nidfigm na: «¿Maa mà ɦe lan nid nn hoɦ na Yuudaa tiiba huraa wii?»
41015013	Bá leed-wu ka toola na: «Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn!»
41015014	Filaata t gbaam-ba na: «¿Ĥà koɦl ben mɔmbii?» Bá nagd bá ni n ka toola na: «Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn!»
41015015	Wo Filaata nn da sɔkla na l´ ɦe nidfigmii lamɛɛgu lee, ɦá ree Barabaaswu sargan, l´ saa ɦá wed bá gbum Yeesuwu taŋgbanii. Ban gbur-wu lee, ɦá lɔgm-wu n taag bá natadn na bá kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn.
41015016	Tawdba t lɔgm Yeesu n san-wu n gomna haaga, n hoɦ bá hiinɦuu mɛnɦuu.
41015017	Bá lɔgm huraamba dimmɔlgu n fid-wu, n ruugm ɦina degrga n lig ɦá jugu.
41015018	L´ saa, bá baɦ n ka seeŋa-wu wo ban seeŋa huraa lee, na: «Taa maara! V` gbanɦuu!»
41015019	Bá lɔgm nyakaku n ka gbu ɦá jutaŋtaŋan, ka lɔɦdra nyanyaat ɦá ɦɛn, ka sunta ɦà tiŋa, ka ɦilnta biii ɦá nɔngan.
41015020	Ban laɦr-wu l´ tog lee, n fit-wu huraamba dimguu n ŋmɛt n fidm-wu ɦá dimt. L´ saa, bá ree-wu n san na bà kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn.
41015021	Nidɦii da kpena kpam, n dan n ka beraa, bà hoɦ-wu na Simoona. Ĥà da ba na Ĥaleksandrwu n Ruufuus bà san, ka rɛn Sirɛɛn kɔrgun. Tawdba t mug-wu n kwɛgdi na ɦá tu Yeesua dabragr.
41015022	Bá san n Yeesuwu n kaalaŋa kiigan bà hoɦ-ka na Golgotaa, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na ‟Jukuuga”.
41015023	Bá lɔgm tlaar kpaam miim, n sɔdm daamn na bà to-wu na ɦá nyi, ɦá kirm ɦà ba nyi.
41015024	Tii kaann, bá kpaɦm-wu dabragr ɦɛn, n raarm taa ɦá dimt ka taaw t` ɦɛn waari na ɦá bee n jum dimgu kuuguu, ɦà lɔg-ku.
41015025	Bà da kpaɦra-wu dabragr ɦɛn ɦateekwɛɛn l` waɦda waari ɦiwɛɦ'.
41015026	Bá ɦoorm ɦá jugu faaga bii ban da kur-wu b` kaa bii. Bà da ɦɔda na: ‟Yuudaa tiiba huraa”.
41015027	Bà da ta kpaɦra bawdba bareɦba ɦá kpama, volwu n ɦà najuudu ɦɛn, volwu n ɦà galu ɦɛn. [
41015028	Tii nnii gwɛɛt Wadbuudga nn bɔɦɔɔ tii nn ɦer t` noor ɦɛn na: Bà da lo-wu nidbɛɦba huuga .]
41015029	Nidba bá da beraa n kan bee da jool-wu nanjoi, ka suu-wu, ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ven, ven da bag na v` gbuɦ Saŋgband disaku na v` ŋmɛtg v` lɔg goora ɦataɦ v` mɛɦ jeengu ven,
41015030	¿kpaɦ v` bee v` soɦdg vyenwu kuumn v` hoɦntn dabragr ɦɛn t` nyaanaa?»
41015031	L´ saa, gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba t ka ta laɦ-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ndee ɦà da soɦda nidvolba kuumn laa? ¿L´ ɦɛm lan ɦan kpaɦ ɦà soɦdg ɦayen?
41015032	Ka l` ba na wii nnii Yisraɦeel tiiba huraa, na ta wii nnii Saŋgband nn bantg wii, ɦá hoɦntn dabragr ɦɛn gwɛɦmina. Ka ɦá hoɦntn t´ yumaa, t` tii ɦà gwɛɛt ɦɛn.» Ban da kpaɦr ɦà man bee t ka ta suu-wu.
41015033	L´ waɦd muunu huuga, muunu t lig, nyeet t fiid tant mɛnt kakeɦnan jabr waari ɦitaɦ'.
41015034	Ln waɦdg mtaɦm lee, ɦá tool kimm n ɦà lamn na: «Ĥeloyi, Ĥeloyi, ¿lamaa sabaktanii?» L´ kɔtɔd nnii na: «Mà Saŋgband! Mà Saŋgband! ¿L` ɦer lan vn vaa-maa ?»
41015035	Bá da ba kan n ɦom welee bee ni biiba t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ĥom-n ɦan bɔɦɔɔ, ɦà hoɦl Ĥelia.»
41015036	Bá huuga bilma t solm, n lɔgm dimtoogu n veɦ-ku daŋmiigun, n viil-ku nyakaka noon, n teedgii-ku Yeesu na ɦá mɔg daamii ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hɔdg-n saɦ t` nyaan na ¿mig Ĥelia ba ɦà daan ɦà hoɦlg-wu dabragr ɦɛn laa?»
41015037	Yeesua t mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga kimm n kuum.
41015038	Dimgu kú da lil Saŋgband disakun kuu, kú kɛɛml kú huuga n sad kpaaaw, faaga kakeɦnan tiŋa.
41015039	Tawdberm ɦà da jeɦr Yeesua nɔngan wii t yum ɦan kpiir lee, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biilm, nidwunwuna da ba na Saŋgband Budaagan.»
41015040	Fɔg̈ba biiba da ta ba kan, ka jeɦraa vɔkun ka geewa. Maarii Magdalaa tiiwu n Maarii vol l` ba na Yakoobkaawu n Yoosee bà nyan, n Salomea, bà da ba fɔg̈bee huuga.
41015041	Yeesua nn da ba Galilee tantn lee, bà tagd ɦà kaa ka tɔra-wu. Fɔgvolba kɔd bá da san ɦà kaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bee da ta ba kan.
41015042	-
41015043	Jabr da fɛtg jabm, nidɦii t taan, bà hoɦ-wu na Yoosɛfa, bá meed-wu Ĥarimatee kɔrgun, l` ta ba na goorii nnii ban maantra voɦoob goor want ka hɔd na toŋu vɛtg Saabaat goor. Nidwii da ba yaani yaadbermba kpaturun, nidba vala-wu. Ĥà da ta hɔda Saŋgband huraant daanm. Ĥá ɦɛm ŋmeenm n san Filaata man, n gbaam-wu na ɦá si-wu huru na ɦà lɔg Yeesua gbanu.
41015044	L´ ɦɛm Filaatwu yɔlaa na Yeesua kpiira weem. Ĥá hoɦ tawdberma, n gbaam-wu na ¿mig Yeesua kpiira l` hiidgnn?
41015045	Tawdberma wen leedg-wu na Yeesua kpiira l´ hiidaa, ɦá saɦm Yoosɛfwu huru na ɦá lɔg kpiira.
41015046	Yoosɛfa t daɦm dimfeelgu, n hoɦl Yeesuwu dabragr ɦɛn, n fiid-wu dimfeelguun, n kuur-wu bilu ɦuuɦu ni, bá da tii-ɦu fiigu ni. Tii kaann ɦá biruu tand n riw bilɦuu noor ɦɛn.
41015047	Ĥan da kuuraa-wu lee, Maarii Magdalaa tiiwii n Maarii Yoosea nya bà geewa ɦá kan kuuraa-wu ree.
41016001	Saabaat goor nn da gɛtg lee, Maarii Magdalaa tiiwii, n Maarii Yakooba nya, n nan Salomea, bá daɦm kpakunuukaɦm na bà san bà gwɛɦ Yeesua.
41016002	Toŋu t vɛt laad goor ɦateekwɛɛn weem, muunu rɛna, bá lɔɔm huru n ka kedaa Yeesua bilun.
41016003	Ban da ked lee, ka gbaama taa na: «¿Wen kee ɦà heɦ-t tanbibiɦgu ban da riw bilu noon kuu na t` jiba?»
41016004	Ban san n ka nyuɦaa lee, n geedgii, n yum tanbibiɦguu t biruu n ka door kpamga.
41016005	Bá jib yelmaa bilun, n yum kan kuliiga kiiga, kà kad najuudu ɦɛn, ka fidr tugfeelgu kù ba vɔku. Fobɛɦgu t mug-ba.
41016006	Kuliigee t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Daa solm-n fobɛɦgu! ¿N` bagl Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tii ban da kpaɦr dabragr ɦɛn wiin? Ĥà himtg kuumn n ka neer, gwɛntaɦ', ɦà kpaɦ nanaɦ'. Geedg n` nyaan kaalaŋa bá kan da doolg-wu ree!
41016007	Gwɛɦmaa, ked-n n` biir Fetrwu n gwɛɛt soɦdgtba volbee na ɦà dɛɦdg n` nɔngan n san Galilee tantn, na reekan nnii nn kee n` nyaan-wu wo ɦan da bed lee.»
41016008	Bá rorm yelmaa n saɦ kili n san vɔkun. Fobɛɦgu da mug-ba biii, bá ka deɦra ka kpaa bɔɦɔɔ ɦiiwu lii.
41016009	Yeesua nn da himtg kuumn lee, laad goor ɦateekwɛɛn weem, ɦá ree ɦayen n werii nooga saɦ Maarii Magdalaa tia. Ĥà da voora fɔg̈wii ni kunidba balbleɦ'.
41016010	Maaria t san n bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛtii bá da tagd ɦà kaa bee. Ĥà da san n mid bà kad n diila ka kuum.
41016011	Lee, bá wen ɦomr na ɦà neeran, na Maaria mɔma nyana-wu, bá ka ba tii.
41016012	Tii n t` kaann, ɦá dan n ta ree ɦayen n werii gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba, bà baɦr huru ka ked rii.
41016013	Ban nyan welee lee, n gew n ŋmɛt n bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt soɦdgtvolbee, bá ka ta ba tii gwɛɛtii.
41016014	Tii n t` kaann, ɦá ta ree ɦayen n werii gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n ɦayenɦa, bà ɦeewr diit n deb. Ĥá kpalm-ba na bà kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, na bá kwɛɛwa haɦra tandaar dela. L´ kɔtɔd na nidba da nyana-wu ɦá himtg kuumn, bá bɔɦɔɔ-ba, bá ka ba tii.
41016015	Ĥan kpal-ba lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ked-n tant mɛntn, n` faam Saŋgband Gohɔmt nidba mɛmba!
41016016	Ĥii ɦà nan tia Gohɔmtii, bà hor-wu nyaalm wii, Saŋgband daɦ ɦá jugu, l` saa, ɦii ɦà nan kpaa tia Gohɔmtii wii, Saŋgband dar ɦà tobr kakeɦnan.
41016017	Bá nan tia Gohɔmtii bee, bà ɦɛm hoolgu ɦɛbnbina: bà kee bà vɔɦd kunidba mà hidrn, bà kee bà bee bà gwɛɛlm lam ban da kpaa mi mii,
41016018	ka bà moog waagi n bà niɦi, laa ka bá nyi raɦm, l` kpaɦ l` ɦee-ba bɛɦgu kuugu. Bà nan kee bà dɔɔm bá niɦi bɛɦtiiba ɦɛn bà bɛɦii gbaadaa-ba.»
41016019	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, l´ vii-wu n faaga ɦá kulii saŋgbambiimn n kad Saŋgband najuudu ɦɛn.
41016020	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t san tant mɛntn n ka faa Saŋgband Gohɔmt. Saberma da ba bá man ka tɔra-ba bà ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b. Bà da ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛb l` weraa na gwɛɛt ban faa tii ba gobiint.]
42001001	Taa maar Tehofiil, nidba kɔd da magii na bà ɦɔr bii b´ da gɛtg t` man bii.
42001002	Bà da beda gwɛɛtii wo bá da nyan t` baɦm kakeɦnan n ka faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt bee nn da ta bed-t gwɛɛtii lee.
42001003	Tii kaa nnii, wo man gbaam n ɦom b´ da gɛtg bii mɔmb weem daa lee, l´ ta ɦɛm-ma hɔm, berma, na mà ɦɔr-v wadgankena ka tagd gwɛɛtii wo tn gɛtg lee,
42001004	ka bo na v` miig na gwɛɛt ban da werii-v tii ba na gobiintn.
42001005	Ĥerooda nn da ba huraant Yuudee tantn lee, gotiiɦii da bee bà hoɦ-wu na Sakaria, ɦà ba Ĥabiyaawa gotiiba kpaturun. Bà da hoɦl ɦá fɔg na Ĥelisabɛɛta, ɦà ba na gotiberm Ĥaroona yakiiga kiigan.
42001006	Saŋgband da lɔgra bà reɦdrbee na hɔmba, bá ka ɦɛna Saberma baɦlbii mɛmbii ɦɛn hɔm ka tagd ɦà noor.
42001007	Wo Ĥelisabɛɛta nn da kpaa maad lee, bá ka kpaɦ n buga, bá reɦdrbee t ta kpalm.
42001008	Goor diir, Sakaria t dan n ka ɦɛna ɦá gotiit ŋmɛɛg̈b Saŋgband disakun. Ĥá kpaturu da beel ɦù ɦe ŋmɛɛg̈bii.
42001009	Gotiiba t tam waari wo bá kowt nn gbaama lee, l´ rood-wu na ɦá jib Saŋgband disakun na ɦà tod nyab nyanyaam.
42001010	Saŋgbantiiba hiinɦuu mɛnɦuu t ka seeŋa duun ban lɔɔ nyab nyanyaam bogmn lee wen.
42001011	Saberma tumtɦii t ree ɦayen n werii Sakarii ka ba daɦŋa bá kan totra nyab nyanyaam kee najuudu ɦɛn.
42001012	Sakaria nn nyan-wu lee, l´ hamt-wu, fobɛɦgu t mug-wu.
42001013	Saŋgbantumtwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Sakarii, daa bɛm fobɛɦgu! Saŋgband ɦomra v` seeŋb. V` fɔg Ĥelisabɛɛta kee ɦà meed-v budaaga v` baɦdg-ka na Yohanɛɛsa.
42001014	Lamɛɛgu kee kù ɦee-v kɔd, kà maadbii ta si nidba nyaag̈b.
42001015	Kà kee kà berŋ Saberma nɔngan. Kà kpaa kee kà nyim damɔlgu kà ta kpaɦ kà nyim dabiilm miim. Ká maadb goor Voɦoom Buudm kee m` bɛm ká ni.
42001016	Kà kee kà ɦe na Yisraɦeel tiiba kɔd ŋmɛtg bà tagd bá Saberm Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
42001017	Kà kee kà ked Saberma nɔngan ka ba n Voɦoom Buudm n gemmnt wo gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Ĥelia nn da ba n lee, na kà ku bii n hì samba huuga gwɛɛt, kà ɦe na kalanbaani tiiba ŋmɛtg nidhɔmba huru ɦɛn. Kà kee kà werii nidba na bá maantr bayen na bà soɦdg Saberma.»
42001018	Sakaria t bɔɦɔɔ saŋgbantumtwii na: «Mà kpalmn, mà fɔga t ta buum. ¿Lan nnii man ba mà miig na welee ba gobiilm?»
42001019	Saŋgbantumta t leed-wu na: «Man nnii Gabriɦeela, mà ba Saŋgband man ka tɔra-d, d` tamn-ma na mà gwɛɛl n vn na mà biir-v gohɔmtntina.
42001020	Gwɛɛtii nan ɦɛna t` jugun l´ daa taana. Wo vn ba tii t` ɦɛn lee, ba v` kitg tantaagua, kpaɦ v` gwɛɛlm kakeɦnan goor gwɛɛtii daa ɦɛna t` jugun.»
42001021	Lee wen, saŋgbantiiba hɔd Sakaria, l` ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa na ɦà hiida Saŋgband disakun.
42001022	Ĥan dan n rɛn lee, n ka kpaa bea na ɦà gwɛɛl n ban, nidba t miig na Saberma ree ɦayen n werii-wu Saŋgband disakun. Ĥá ka weraa-ba niɦi ka kpaa gwɛɛla.
42001023	Sakaria nn da fɛlg ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦɛb Saŋgband disakun lee, n ŋmɛt ka kulaa.
42001024	Lee n l` kaann, ɦá fɔg Ĥelisabɛɛta t ɦɛm fuuga, n ka kpaa ror rii kakeɦnan kidii hinu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n Saberma nn ɦer-ma bii!
42001025	Ĥà geedg n mà weenn, n sɔkl na ɦà hig mà jiwɦi nidba nɔngan.»
42001026	Ĥelisabɛɛta fuuga kidroondŋan, Saŋgband t tom d´ tumt Gabriɦeelwu Nasarɛɛt kɔrgun, Galilee tantn
42001027	biiriiga kiiga man kà ba na bà da bagra-ka daawɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Yoosɛfa, ɦà ba na hurberm Daviida yakiiga kiigan. Biiriigee hidr nnii na Maaria.
42001028	Saŋgbantumtwii t jib kaa n bɔɦɔɔ-ka na: «Mà seeŋa-v Maarii! Saŋgband ɦera-v hɔmgu, Saberma ba v` man.»
42001029	Ĥan bed welee lee, Maaria rarmn t hamt. Ĥá ka diila na seeŋbnbina kɔtɔd nnii na laa.
42001030	Saŋgbantumtwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Maarii, daa solm fobɛɦgu! Saŋgband ɦera-v hɔmgu.
42001031	Miim na ba v` ɦe fuuga, v` meed budaaga, v` baɦdg-ka na Yeesua.
42001032	Kà kee kà bɛm berma, bà hoɦ-ka na Saŋgband mɔmr Budaaga. Saberm Saŋgband kee d` kalg-ka kà yandaa Daviida huraant jargan,
42001033	kà kee kà bɛm huraantn ka mad Yisraɦeel tigr kakeɦnan. Kà huraant nan kpaɦ diɦm.»
42001034	Maaria t gbaam na: «¿Maa mà ɦe lan mà ɦe fuuga ka kpaa mi daawaa?»
42001035	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Voɦoom Buudm nan hoɦntna v` ɦɛn. Saŋgband mɔmr gemmnt fiid-v wo buɦuunu. Tii kaa nnii buga vn kee v` meed kee nn kee kà bɛm buudga, bà hoɦ-ka na Saŋgband Budaaga.
42001036	V` teel Ĥelisabɛɛta ta ba n fuuga ka ba ɦà meed budaaga, l` ba na ɦà kpalmn. Ban da bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà kpaa maad wii ba n fuuga ka ba ɦá kidroondŋan.
42001037	Biilm, bii kpaa ba gemm n Saŋgband.»
42001038	Maaria t leed-wu na: «Man nnii Saberma ŋmɛɛɦeeda. Saŋgband tuun-ma vn bed bii mɛmbii.» Lee, saŋgbantumta t nyab ɦá man.
42001039	Tumta nyabm n m` kaann, Maaria t lɔɔm huru n san weem kɔrgu kuugun kù ba Yuudee duura tantn,
42001040	n jib Sakaria haarn n seeŋ Ĥelisabɛɛta.
42001041	Ĥelisabɛɛta nn ɦomr ɦà seeŋb yelmaa lee, buga t dam ɦá raawtn. Voɦoom Buudm t hu ɦá ni,
42001042	ɦá gwɛɛl kimm na: «Saŋgband kaawl v` ɦɛn fɔg̈bee mɛmbee huuga n ta kaawl buga vn kee v` meed kee ɦɛn.
42001043	¿Man nnii wen na mà Berma nya daan taa?
42001044	Biilm, mà nn ɦomr v` seeŋb lee wen, buga t dam n nyaag̈b mà raawtn.
42001045	Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ven, ven tii na Saberma nn toolgn-v tii kee t` ɦe t´ jugun ven.»
42001046	Maaria t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà liliigu nyɔka Saberma.
42001047	Mà kwɛɛwr hu n nyaag̈b n Saŋgband mà jugu daɦda.
42001048	Ĥà sɔkl na ɦà lo nɔmb mà ɦɛn, ɦá taalm biiriiga man. Biilm, jana n jaɦaa, wai mɛnii ba hì hoɦm-ma na lamɛɛgu tia,
42001049	blaɦb kaa, Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia jeeŋla-ma l` kpaɦ jaɦ'. Wii nnii hidbuudr tia.
42001050	Bina mɛna wii yul bá vala-wu bee bá kunyɔŋu.
42001051	Ĥá vii ɦá gemmnt nuɦu, n yadr bá diila bá kwɛɛwan ɦawad gwɛɛt ka weraa bayen bee.
42001052	Ĥá daɦii huraamba bá jarii jugun, n kol taalm tiiba n faaga.
42001053	Ĥà doowra kunyɔŋtiiba bá jum n togm, n voom kwɛgdm tiiba bá kulii n kɔm
42001054	-
42001055	Ĥà daan n tɔr Yisraɦeel ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeeda . Ĥà ba hɔŋ na ɦà ɦɛm Ĥabrahaamwu n ɦà yakii hɔmgu kakeɦnan, wo ɦan da bed t` yandaba lee.»
42001056	Maaria t ɦɛm Ĥelisabɛɛta man wo kidii hitaɦ saɦ, n kulii baa.
42001057	Ĥelisabɛɛta maadb vuugu nn da taan lee, ɦá maadm budaaga.
42001058	Ĥá huugan tiiba n ɦà teelba nn da ɦomr na Saberma ɦera-wu hɔmgu lee, bá n wun l´ ka nyaaga.
42001059	Goniindr goor, bá daan na bà bɔtg-ka, n ka bag na bà baɦdg-ka kà sa hidr na Sakaria.
42001060	Ká nya t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥaai, baa bà hoɦm-ka na Yohanɛɛsa.»
42001061	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Naa ɦii kpaɦ bà hoɦ-wu welee.»
42001062	Bá gbaam ká sa ka weraa niɦi na ɦà sɔkla na bá baɦdg bugee hidted.
42001063	Sakaria t gbaam tand ban ɦoor d` ɦɛn dii na ɦà ɦɔr, bá daan n, ɦá ɦoorm na: «Ká hidr nnii na Yohanɛɛsa.» L´ ɦɛm bá mɛmbee yɔlaa.
42001064	Yelmaa ɦá gelmga t rɔt, ɦá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla ka nyɔka Saŋgband.
42001065	Lee, ɦá huugan tiibee mɛmbee t ɦɛm fobɛɦgu, Yuudee duurn tiibee mɛmbee t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa gwɛɛtii.
42001066	Biiba bá da kewaa gwɛɛtii bee t baɦ n ka diila t´ jugun ka gbaama bayen na: «¿Bugee nan kita bee?» Saberma gemmnt ba kà ɦɛn gobiint.
42001067	Bugee sa Sakaria nn gwɛɛl lee, Voɦoom Buudm t hu ɦá ni, ɦá baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ Saŋgband noon gwɛɛt na:
42001068	«Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband, Yisraɦeel Saberma, na ɦà lo nɔmb ɦá tigr ɦɛn n daɦm d´ jugu,
42001069	na ɦà ɦera bá maadm-t juuni daɦda ɦà ba n gemmnt ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeed huraa Daviida haarn,
42001070	wo ɦan da bed ka tagaa n ɦà weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbuudba lee.
42001071	Ĥà da ta beda na ɦà nan soɦda-t t` rafeedba niɦin n biiba bá nyaɦaa-t bee gemmntn,
42001072	ɦà deedg ɦà hɔmgu ɦan da bed na ɦà ba ɦà ɦe t` yandaba kuu ɦɛn, n deed ɦá tuurnbuudt ɦan da lo n ban tii ɦɛn.
42001073	Ĥà da beda n foorm n t` yandaa Ĥabrahaam na
42001074	ɦà nan soɦda-t t` rafeedba niɦin na t` bee t` ɦɛm ɦá ŋmɛɛg̈b ka kpaa nigaa,
42001075	ka ba buudba n hɔmba ɦà nɔngan kakeɦnan t` kuum.
42001076	Lee, ven mà buga, bà nan hoɦaa-v na Saŋgband mɔmr gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta. Nan ba v` dɛɦdg Berma nɔngan na v` maantrm ɦá huru,
42001077	na ɦá tigr miig na ɦà nan daɦl d´ jugu ka waa d´ fubɛɦii
42001078	t` Saberm Saŋgband ɦigm nyaanb n d` hɔmgu ɦɛb kaa. D` kee d` daan-t n saŋgbambiimn wiinga, ká wiir muunkwɛɛlu dela kee,
42001079	na ká wiir biiba bá ba nyeetn ka ta ba kuumn bee ɦɛn, na kà kpaɦaam-t nigiigu hurun.»
42001080	Bugee da berŋa, kà rarm bu. Kan da berŋ lee, n ka neer kpamloŋun kakeɦnan goor kan da ree kayen Yisraɦeel tigr nɔngan dii.
42002001	Vuugu ban da meedr Yohanɛɛs kuu ni nnii, hurberm Ĥoguusta nn da sir wad na bá kaal Roomaa tant biɦ nidba mɛmba.
42002002	Kaalbii da ba na noogrb nnii. B` da taŋ gomn Kirin̈yuusa nn da mad Siirii tant lee wen.
42002003	Nidba mɛmba da kulaa volwu ɦà kɔrgu, volwu ɦà kɔrgu bà ɦoor bà hida.
42002004	Yoosɛfa t ta vid Nasarɛɛt, Galilee tantn, n san Betlɛɛhɛm, Yuudee tantn, bá kan da meedr hurberm Daviidwu ree. Wii mɔma da ta ba na Daviida yakiigan.
42002005	Tii nnii ɦan da san na bá ɦɔr ɦá hidr reekan, wú n ɦà fɔg Maaria, ɦà ba n fuuga.
42002006	Ban da ba Betlɛɛhɛm lee, ɦá goor t taan,
42002007	ɦá maadm budaaga, ɦá bunoogrga, n fɔm-ka dimtootn. Ĥà da doolg-ka dɔm diit gorgwɛkun na bà da ba nyaan kaalaŋa saanba disakun.
42002008	Tantiin fɛi kimtba da gool kpamnoon, ka sug bá dɔm ɦɛn nyingu.
42002009	Saberma tumtɦii t ree ɦayen n werii-ba, Saberma wiinga t wiid bá ɦɛn, fobɛɦgu t mug-ba biii.
42002010	Lee, saŋgbantumtwii t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Daa solm-n fobɛɦgu! Mà kena-n n gohɔmt. T` ba t` si n` tigrii mɛndii nyaag̈bermb:
42002011	Jana goorii, bà meedra-n juuni daɦdwu Daviida kɔrgun. Wii nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii, wii nnii Berma.
42002012	N` kee n` nyaan kunidbuga kiiga, bá foow-ka dimtootn, n dool-ka dɔm diit gorgwɛkun. Welee kee l` werii-n na kee nnii.»
42002013	Yelmaa, saŋgbantumtba hagr t hoɦntn n mɔɔ tumtwii man, bá ka nyɔka Saŋgband ka yuuma na:
42002014	«Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband saŋgbambiimn, l` saa nigiigu daan nidba dn sɔkla tant jugun bee ɦɛn.»
42002015	Saŋgbantumtbee nn da nyab bà man n ŋmɛtgii saŋgbambiimn lee, fɛi kimtbee t bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Tn san t` taai Betlɛɛhɛm kɔrgun! L` ba na t` nyaan bii b` gɛtg kan bii, bii Saberma nn saa na t` miig bii.»
42002016	Ban bed taa welee lee, n vid n san weem weem, n yum Maariiwu n Yoosɛfa, n nan kunidbugee, kee door dɔm diit gorgwɛkun.
42002017	Ban nyan kunidbugee lee, n kɛɛml gwɛɛt saŋgbantumtba nn bed-ba kà ɦɛn tii.
42002018	Bá da ɦomr kimtba gwɛɛt bee, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa n gwɛɛt ban bɔɦɔɔ tii.
42002019	Maariiwii t ka mad bii b` gɛtg bii mɛmbii ɦà ni, ka diila b´ ɦɛn kɔd.
