42002020	Fɛi kimtba lee, bee t lɔgm huru n ka ŋmɛta ka kulaa, ka jeeŋla Saŋgband ka nyɔka-d bii ban ɦomr n yum n bà niini bii kaa. Biilm, l´ mɛnguu da gɛtg deedee wo saŋgbantumta nn da bed-ba lee.
42002021	Goniindr goor t taan. Goorii nnii ln ba na bà bɔtg bugee. Bá bɔtg-ka n baɦdg-ka na Yeesua. Hidrii nnii saŋgbantumta nn da werii kà nya na ɦá nan baɦdg-ka ɦá wen da ban ɦe fuuga lee wen.
42002022	Vuugu da taara na Yoosɛfwu n Maarii bá ɦe kowt t´ higda mɛɦla nakakeet tii, wo Saŋgband baɦlb nn bɔɦɔɔ lee. Bá lag n san n bugee Yerusalɛm kɔrgun na bà ta werii-ka Saberma,
42002023	wo ln ɦɔd Saberma baɦlbn lee na: Budanoogrga ban maad kee ba na Saberma rekan.
42002024	Bá ta ɦɛm kowtii. Baɦlb da gbaama na bá si haar ŋmɛnii hireɦ', laa kurŋmɛnhɛra ɦarɛɦ'.
42002025	Nidɦii da ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bà hoɦ-wu na Simɦoona. Nidwii da ba na nidhɔmn. Ĥà da vala Saŋgband ka hɔd ɦii ɦà ba ɦà daan na ɦà doolg Yisraɦeel tigr kwɛɛwr wii. Voɦoom Buudm da hu ɦà ni.
42002026	M` da ree n werii-wu na ɦà nan kpaa ku ka ba nyaan Krista, Saŋgband nn nan tamna wii.
42002027	M´ kpaɦaa-wu n san-wu n Saŋgband haarn. Yeesua reba nn da daan n wun na bà ɦe bii baɦlb nn gbaama bii lee,
42002028	Simɦoona t soɦd-wu ɦá nyakɔgrgun n nyɔk Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
42002029	«Saberma, gwelŋaa, v` gwɛɛt ɦera t` jugun nnii. Ba v` bee v` saa v` ŋmɛɛɦeeda kul nigiigun,
42002030	mà nyana n mà niini v` juuni daɦb
42002031	vn maantr tiga mɛna nɔngan bii,
42002032	bugankena nnii wiinga kà nan saa na tiga mɛna miig-v, ta kee kaa bà nyɔkm Yisraɦeel, v` tigr.»
42002033	Bii Simɦoona nn da bɔɦɔɔ n Yeesua ɦɛn bii t ɦɛm ɦá sawu n ɦà nyawu yɔlaa yem.
42002034	Ĥá kaawl bá ɦɛn n bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua nya Maarii na: «Saŋgband bantg bugankena na, kee kaa, Yisraɦeel tigrn nidba kɔd bɔr, kɔd ta daɦ bá juuni. Kà kee kà bɛm na Saŋgband waaru, ɦuu nan lɔɔ toor nidba huuga.
42002035	Kà kee kà reem wiingan diila nidba kɔd nn kpɛɦdra bà kwɛɛwan ɦee. L´ saa, ven lee, wiiru kee ɦù ɦom-v wo ban tiwaa nidwu hoodjuuga lee.»
42002036	Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtfɔgɦii da ta ba kan bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥaana. Ĥà da ba na Finuɦeela bɛɛrn, Ĥaaseera buudmn. Ĥà da biira hɔm. Wú n ɦà sid ɦan da yal ɦà bɛɛrmn wii, bà da kad bina ɦalbleɦ',
42002037	lee, ɦá kit kuŋfɔga n ka bee. Ĥà da ba n bina kwɛɦniind n ɦanaa. Ĥà da kpaa nyaba Saŋgband haarn felaɦ'. Ĥà da ɦɛna Saŋgband ŋmɛɛg̈b muunun n nyingun, ka boow noor ka seeŋa.
42002038	Lee wen nnii, wii nn da ta taan n baɦ n ka nyɔka Saŋgband. Ĥá lɔgm bugee gwɛɛt n ka bɔɦɔɔ bá da hɔd Yerusalɛm jugu daɦb bee mɛmbee.
42002039	Yeesua reba nn da ɦer bii Saberma baɦlb nn da gbaama na bá ɦe bii l´ tog lee, bá n wun bá kulii bá kɔrgu Nasarɛɛt, Galilee tantn.
42002040	Bugee da berŋa ka haɦaa. Rarbiilm da hu kà ni, l` ba na Saŋgband da ta ba kà jugun baagr.
42002041	Bind wo bind, Yeesua reba da keda Yerusalɛm kɔrgun na bà di Yuudaa tiiba Gɛtgm kasant.
42002042	Ĥan da taar bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ lee, wú n ban bá ta san wo kowt nn gbaama lee.
42002043	Kasant nn da diɦ lee, bá ŋmɛt ka kulaa. Yeesu lee, wii t kpat Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, ɦà reba kpaa mi.
42002044	Bà da diila na ɦà ba bà tuurmba bá n bà l` da kulaa bee man. Bá ɦɛm gobilmr ka ked saɦ n hiw n ka bag-wu bá reba n bà tuurmba man.
42002045	Gwɛntaɦaa, bà ba nyaan-wu. Lee wen, bá ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun ka bag-wu.
42002046	Gotaɦrd goor bá yum-wu Saŋgband haarn. Ĥà da kada baɦlb weriitba huuga ka kewla-ba, ka ta gbaama-ba gwɛɛt.
42002047	L` da ɦera bá da kewla-wu bee yɔlaa l` baɦr n ɦà rarm miib n ɦà gwɛɛt leeb.
42002048	Ĥá reba wen nyan wii, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem, ɦá nya t gbaam-wu na: «Mà buga, ¿na lan nnii vn ɦer-t welee? Má n v` sa t` bagl-v t` kwɛɛwa to.»
42002049	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿Ben kaa nnii nn bag-maa? ¿N` kpaa mi na l` ba na mà bɛm mà Sa haarnn?»
42002050	Lee, bá ka ba ɦom ɦan bo na ɦà biir-ba tii.
42002051	Yeesuwu n ban bá ŋmɛtgii Nasarɛɛt kɔrgun ɦà vala-ba. Ĥá nya da kpɛɦdra b´ da gɛta bii mɛmbii ɦà ni.
42002052	Yeesua da berŋa ɦà rarm buuna, Saŋgband n nidba yu na ɦà ba hɔm.
42003001	Roomaa hurberm Tibɛɛra nn da ba jargan ka mad ɦà binkwiɦr n nuurd lee, gomn Fɔɔns Filaata mad Yuudee tant, Ĥerooda mad Galilee tant, ɦá maar Filfa mad Yituurii n Tarkoniit tant, Lisan̈yaasa mad Ĥabilɛɛn tant.
42003002	Hanaanwu n Kayiif bee ba na gotibermban. Lee wen, Saŋgband t bɔɦɔɔ d´ gwɛɛt Sakaria kwɛɛl Yohanɛɛswu kpamloŋun.
42003003	Yohanɛɛsa t baɦ n ka linta Yɔrdaan kol tigan. Ĥà da linta ka faa na: «Lagii-n neerm! Tii-n bà hor-n Saŋgband nyaalm, ka bo na d´ waa-n n` fubɛɦii!»
42003004	L´ ɦɛm l´ noor jugun wo gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya nn da ɦɔd ɦà wadgan lee. Ĥà da ɦɔda na: Nidɦii toola kpamloŋun na: Maantr-n Sabermwu huru, koo-n-wu huri ɦì bɛm tiɦ'!
42003005	Waa-n duuran bɔrt mɛnt, n` gbuɦ duura n dui n` tɛɛŋl, n` vii hurgɔngɔnt t` bɛm biraa, n` hugl huri ɦí koɦl ɦii vat l` bɛm tɛlaa.
42003006	Lee wen lee, baawena nyaan juuni daɦb Saŋgband nn sir bii.
42003007	Nidfigm da kena Yohanɛɛsa man na ɦá hor-m nyaalm, ɦá ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Waabɛɦt nen! ¿Wen werii-n na n` ba n` bee n` fetg n Saŋgband yaagu kù kena kuu nuɦu nii?
42003008	Ĥɛm-n nan ŋmɛɛhɔmt l` weraa na n` lagii neerm! Daa bɔɦɔɔm-n n` kwɛɛwan na n` yandaa nnii Ĥabrahaama! Lee, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na Saŋgband ba d` bee d` lɔg tanɦanɦena, d` ɦe ɦà kitg Ĥabrahaama yakii.
42003009	Bà jaɦ lad na bà kɛɦ tiit rugi, bà luur-t. Tiib b´ kpaa roon roonhɔma bii, baa bà luug-b bà lɔɔlg boglamn.»
42003010	Lee wen, nidfigm t ka gbaama-wu na: «¿L` ba na t` ɦɛm bee?»
42003011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Nid ɦá ba n dimt treɦt wii, l` ba na ɦá lɔg kuyen ɦà si ɦii ɦà kpaɦ n kuugu wii, l´ saa ɦii ɦà ba n diit wii, l` ba na ɦá ta radg ɦà si ɦii ɦà kpaɦ n bii wii.»
42003012	Lambɦu soɦdgtba t daan na ɦá hor-ba nyaalm, n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿L` ba na t` ɦɛm bee?»
42003013	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Daa ɦɛm-n na nidba faadm lambɦu l` gɛta n bii baɦlb nn gbaama bii ɦɛn!»
42003014	Tawdba t ta gbaam-wu na: «Ten de, ¿l` ba na t` ɦɛm bee?» Ĥá leed-ba na: «Daa soɦdgm-n ɦii do lig̈biir n gemmnt, laa ka hogla gokaat n ɦà ɦɛn! Soɦdgm-n n` kidga lig̈biir n jaɦ', d` taara-n welee!»
42003015	Tigr t ka hɔd ka ba n daag̈b, baawena diila na, ka tiit, Yohanɛɛs nnii Saŋgband nn bantg wii.
42003016	Lee wen, Yohanɛɛsa t bɔɦɔɔ bá mɛmbee na: «Man lee, maa huura-n n nyaalm. Ĥii bee ka ba n gemmnt ka yata-ma. Ĥà ba ɦà daan. Mà kpaa tɔn na mà bee mà gbentg ɦà nanawda ŋmiɦi. Wii kee ɦà hor-n n Voɦoom Buudm, n ta bogm.
42003017	Ĥà lɔgra ɦà naabint degrga, ɦà ba ɦà fug na ɦà ree lɛlgu, l` saa figm ɦà vaadg-m ɦà lo ɦà buugun, ɦà kolm lɛlgu ɦà fut boglam m` kpaa ku felaɦ' miin.»
42003018	Yohanɛɛsa da bɔɦɔɔ-ba govont kɔd, ka haɦla-ba, ka faa-ba Gohɔmt.
42003019	Ĥá ɦɛm huraa Ĥeroodwu talmt, blaɦb kaa na Ĥerooda da soɦdg ɦayen ɦà maara fɔg Ĥeroodyaada, n ta ɦɛm ɦɛbbɛɦb kɔd.
42003020	Ĥá ta ɦɛm ɦɛbbɛɦb volb. Ĥà da mug Yohanɛɛs n riw-wu sarga.
42003021	Yohanɛɛsa nn da hod nidba lee, n ta huurm Yeesua. Ban da hod-wu l´ diɦ lee, ɦá ka seeŋa, saŋgbambiim t rawd,
42003022	Voɦoom Buudm t hoɦntn ɦà jugun kurŋmɛnd dela. Noor diir t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ven nnii mà Budaaga, mà sɔkla-v kpaalaa. Mà nyaag̈bii mɛmbii kulaa v` jugun.»
42003023	Yeesua da baɦdg ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b ka ban wo bina kwɛɛtaɦ'. Nidba da diila na Yoosɛfa bugan. Yoosɛf nnii Ĥelia buga,
42003024	Ĥelii nnii Mataata buga, Mataat nnii Levia buga, Levii nnii Malkia buga, Malkii nnii Yanaaya buga, Yanaay nnii Yoosɛfa buga,
42003025	Yoosɛf nnii Matityaasa buga, Matityaas nnii Ĥamoosa buga, Ĥamoos nnii Nahuuma buga, Nahuum nnii Ĥeslia buga, Ĥeslii nnii Nagaaya buga,
42003026	Nagaay nnii Maata buga, Maat nnii Matityaasa buga, Matityaas nnii Simɦia buga, Simɦii nnii Yoosɛka buga, Yoosɛk nnii Yooda buga,
42003027	Yood nnii Yoowanaana buga, Yoowanaan nnii Rɛsaa buga, Rɛsaa nnii Sorobabɛɛla buga, Sorobabɛɛl nnii Saaltiɦeela buga, Saaltiɦeel nnii Neria buga,
42003028	Nerii nnii Malkia buga, Malkii nnii Ĥadia buga, Ĥadii nnii Kɔsaama buga, Kɔsaam nnii Ĥelmadaama buga, Ĥelmadaam nnii Ĥeera buga,
42003029	Ĥeer nnii Yeesua buga, Yeesu nnii Ĥɛliɦɛɛsɛra buga, Ĥɛliɦɛɛsɛr nnii Yooriima buga, Yooriim nnii Mataata buga, Mataat nnii Levia buga,
42003030	Levii nnii Simɦoona buga, Simɦoon nnii Yuudaa buga, Yuudaa nnii Yoosɛfa buga, Yoosɛf nnii Yoonaama buga, Yoonaam nnii Ĥɛlyakiima buga,
42003031	Ĥɛlyakiim nnii Mleɦaa buga, Mleɦaa nnii Mnaa buga, Mnaa nnii Matataa buga, Matataa nnii Nataana buga, Nataan nnii Daviida buga,
42003032	Daviid nnii Yisaaya buga, Yisaay nnii Ĥoobeeda buga, Ĥoobeed nnii Boɦaasa buga, Boɦaas nnii Seelaa buga, Seelaa nnii Naasoona buga,
42003033	Naasoon nnii Ĥaminadaaba buga, Ĥaminadaab nnii Ĥadmiina buga, Ĥadmiin nnii Ĥarnia buga, Ĥarnii nnii Hɛsroona buga, Hɛsroon nnii Fɛɛrɛsa buga, Fɛɛrɛs nnii Yuudaa buga, Yuudaa nnii Yakooba buga,
42003034	Yakoob nnii Yisɦaaka buga, Yisɦaak nnii Ĥabrahaama buga, Ĥabrahaam nnii Tɛɛraa buga, Tɛɛraa nnii Nahoora buga,
42003035	Nahoor nnii Siruuga buga, Siruug nnii Ruɦua buga, Ruɦuu nnii Fɛɛlɛga buga, Fɛɛlɛg nnii Ĥeebɛra buga, Ĥeebɛr nnii Sɛɛlaa buga,
42003036	Sɛɛlaa nnii Keenaana buga, Keenaan nnii Ĥarfasaada buga, Ĥarfasaad nnii Seema buga, Seem nnii Nowea buga, Nowee nnii Lɛɛmɛka buga,
42003037	Lɛɛmɛk nnii Matusalɛɛma buga, Matusalɛɛm nnii Henooka buga, Henook nnii Yɛɛrɛda buga, Yɛɛrɛd nnii Maalalɦeela buga, Maalalɦeel nnii Keenaana buga
42003038	Keenaan nnii Ĥɛnoosa buga, Ĥɛnoos nnii Seeta buga, Seet nnii Ĥadama buga, Ĥadam nnii Saŋgband buga.
42004001	Voɦoom Buudm nn hu Yeesua ni lee, ɦá rorm Yɔrdaan kol maaru tigan n kpen. M´ kpaɦaa-wu n san n kpamloŋun.
42004002	Ĥá san n ɦɛm kan goora kwɛɦnaa, Kunida ŋmɛgaa n wun. Ĥà ba di bii goorɦeen. Goorɦee nn gɛtg lee, kɔm t kuum-wu.
42004003	Kunida t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l` ba na ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga, si wad na tandndina kitg diit!»
42004004	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Lag diit n jaɦ' nnii nida nn ju ka neer.»
42004005	Kunida t lɔgm-wu n kol-wu n faaga n werii-wu tant jugun tigɦee mɛnɦee myenm ɦɛn
42004006	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Mà ba mà to-v tigɦee gemmntii n ɦà kwɛgdmii. Bà da sira-ma-t, mà ba mà bee mà si-t man sɔkla wii.
42004007	Ka v´ doot-ma tiŋan, mà to-v l` mɛnguu.»
42004008	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Door v` Saberm Saŋgband tiŋan, ka ɦɛna ɦá sɔklb, wii n jaɦ'.»
42004009	Kunida t lɔgm-wu n san n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n dewl-wu Saŋgband haar jutaŋtaŋan n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka l` ba na ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga, forg nanaɦreen v` tiɦdg,
42004010	blaɦb kaa, l` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Saŋgband nan ba d` si d´ tumtba wad na bá kiigm v` ɦɛn.
42004011	Bà nan ba bà tɔgr-v n bà niɦi na tand daa gbuɦdg v` nakpaŋa.»
42004012	Ĥá leed-wu na: «L` ta ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Daa ŋmɛgii n v` Saberm Saŋgband!»
42004013	Kunida nn fɛlg Yeesuwu n ŋmɛgiib welee lee, n saa-wu n gɛt ka nyaba ka ta hɔd goor diir.
42004014	Yeesua t ŋmɛtgii Galilee tantn ka ba n Voɦoom Buudm gemmnt. Bá baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt tantii mɛntiin.
42004015	Ĥà da weraa gwɛɛt kpoglb disagtn, baawena nyɔka-wu.
42004016	Yeesua t san Nasarɛɛt kɔrgun bá kan da doowr-wu ree. Saabaat goor, ɦá jib kpoglb disakun wo ɦan daa ka ɦɛna lee, n vid na ɦà kaal Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt.
42004017	Bá to-wu gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya wadga. Ĥá wiim n yum kaalaŋa l´ kan ɦɔd na:
42004018	Saberma Voɦoom ba mà ɦɛn, ɦà bantg-ma na mà san n Gohɔmt mà to kunyɔŋtiiba. Ĥà tomra-ma na mà faa sarga tiiba na baa bà riir sargan, na mà biir joomba na bá niini ba ɦì yum, na mà ree biiba ban ɦɛna daddad bee bá kunyɔŋun,
42004019	na mà faa-ba bind Saberma nn kee ɦà ree ɦà hɔmgu ɦà werii dii.
42004020	L´ tog, ɦá mud wadgee n to-ka tɔrgta, n kad. Nidba bá da ba bà kpoglb disakun bee mɛmbee t fut bá niini ɦá ɦɛn.
42004021	Lee wen, ɦá baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt nn kewlg tii, t` ɦera t` noor ɦɛn jana wo nn ɦomr-t gwelmnmina lee.»
42004022	Bá mɛmbee t baɦ n ka nyɔka Yeesua. L´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem n gohɔmt ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ tii. Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Lag wii nnii Yoosɛfa kwɛɛla?»
42004023	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` ba n` bee n` biir-ma nawdlamnmina na: ‟Taada, taadm v` mɔm vyen”. N` ta ba n` bee n` biir-ma na n` ɦomra bii man ɦer Kafarnahuum kɔrgun bii mɛmbii. Na mà ta ɦe ŋmɛɛyent man ɦer kan tii nnaɦ mayen mà kɔrgun.»
42004024	Ĥá hewl-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Ĥii ban soɦdg gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦiiwu hɔm kɔrgu ban meedr-wu kuun.
42004025	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiilm na: Kuŋfɔg̈ba kɔd da ba Yisraɦeel tantn gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Ĥelia vuugun. Toŋu nn da ɦer bina ɦataɦ n gidgu ka kpaa ni lee, kɔmbermm t rorm tant ɦɛn.
42004026	Gwɛntaɦ', Saberma t ka ba tom Ĥeliiwu bá ni ɦii man ka l` kpaɦ kuŋfɔg ɦá da ba Sariftaa kɔrgun, Sidoon tigrn wii man.
42004027	Bolmba da ba kɔd Yisraɦeel tantn gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Ĥɛlisea vuugun. Gwɛntaɦ', Saŋgband da ba gbaad bà ni ɦii ka l` kpaɦ Siirii tii Naɦmaana.»
42004028	Bá da ba Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun bee mɛmbee nn ɦomr welee lee, n lo kwɛɛwweerga.
42004029	Bá vid n mug-wu n ree kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn ka kola-wu bá kɔrgu duur ɦɛn na bá heɦ-wu vadgun.
42004030	Lee, wii t rorm bá huuga n nyab.
42004031	Yeesua t san Kafarnahuum kɔrgun Galilee tantn n ka weraa nidba Saŋgband gwɛɛt Saabaat goor.
42004032	Ĥá gwɛɛt weriibii t ka ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa yem. Biilm, ɦà da ba n gemmnt na ɦà weriim.
42004033	Nidɦii da ba Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun kunida jaarŋa-wu. Ĥá mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga kimm n baɦ n ka toola na:
42004034	«Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia, ¿t´ n vn n tet? ¿Daan na v` kuu-t nnii? Mà miil-v hɔm: Ven nnii Saŋgband tumtbuuda!»
42004035	Yeesua t gwɛɛl n kunidwii n daat ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpat kpoɦ v` riir nidwii ni!» Kunidwii t vu nidwii tiŋan baawena nɔngan n rorm ɦá ni ka ba ɦee-wu bɛɦgu.
42004036	Fobɛɦgu t ɦɛm-ba, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ben gwɛɛt nnii tinaɦ? Nidwunwuna saɦl kunidba wad n daat n gemmnt bà ror nidba ni!»
42004037	Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt kan tigriin.
42004038	Yeesua t rorm Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun n san Simoonmbaa. Simoona yaafɔga da doora n tulgu bɛɦii l` ba kakaku, bá bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na ɦá gbaad-wu.
42004039	Ĥá ɦilnt ɦá ɦɛn n gwɛɛl n tulgu bɛɦii n daat. Bɛɦhii t went-wu, ɦá vid yelmaa n baɦ ka saɦ-ba diit.
42004040	Muunu lɔɔb kaann, bá da ba n bɛɦtiiba bá ba n bɛɦii jugu jugu bee t lɔgm-ba n san n Yeesua man, ɦá ka deaa bá ɦɛn ɦá niɦi bà bɛɦii wenta-ba.
42004041	Kunidba t ta rorm bɛɦtiiba kɔd ni ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga.» Yeesua t gwɛɛl kunidbee n daat ka kpaa bag na bá gwɛɛlm, blaɦb kaa na bà da miil na wii nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.
42004042	Toŋu nn da ragdg lee, ɦá rorm n san kpamga ɦɛn. Nidfigm t baɦ n ka bag-wu. Ban dan n yum-wu lee, n ka bag na ɦá kpat bà man.
42004043	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ba na mà ta faa Saŋgband huraant Gohɔmt kɔrvolɦiin. Tii kaa nnii Saŋgband nn tamn-ma.»
42004044	Lee, ɦá ka faa Saŋgband Gohɔmt Yuudee tantn bá kpoglb disagtn.
42005001	Goor diir, Yeesua da ba Genesarɛɛt nyaam gbiir ɦɛn, nidba t ka hɛɦr taa ɦà man, ka bag na bà ɦom Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
42005002	Ĥá yum kpiirt treɦt nyaamii kpamga, ɦɔlii lɔɔlgtba t riir t´ ni n ka satra bà bɛdni.
42005003	Ĥá jib bilmgu ni, l` ba na Simoona heɦl-ku, n jow-wu na ɦá heɦ-ku nyaalm ɦɛn, kù santg n gbiir. Yeesua t ka kad kù ni ka weraa nidfigm gwɛɛt, bee ba gbiir ɦɛn.
42005004	Ĥá wen werii gwɛɛt l´ diɦaa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ Simoon na: «Heɦ kpiirgu v` san nyaalm kan ba kilmgu ree, l` saa v´ n v` tuurmba, n` lɔɔlg n` bɛdni, n` mɔg ɦɔlii!»
42005005	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Berma! T` ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b nyinguu mɛnguu n ka ba mug bii. Gwɛntaɦ', v` noor ɦɛnii, maa mà lɔɔlg bɛdb v` nyaan.»
42005006	Bá lɔɔl n moogm ɦɔlii kɔdgu, bá bɛdni t baɦ n ka sadra.
42005007	Bá kamii bá tuurmba nuɦu na bá daan bà tɔrg-ba. Bee t daan n bà kpiirgu. Bá ree ɦɔlii n hugl kpiirt treɦtii fimfim, t´ baɦ n ka ŋmiɦaa nyaalm kwɛɛn.
42005008	Simoon Fetra t yum welee n gbaɦnt dind Yeesua tiŋa, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, nyablg vyen n man na, man nnii fubɛɦtia!»
42005009	Gobiintii, fobɛɦgu da kura Simoonwu biii, n lag n bá da ba ɦà man bee mɛmbee, ɦɔlii ban da mɔgr kɔdgu hii kaa.
42005010	L` da ta ba yenmii n Simoona tuurmba Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, Jebdea kwɛɛlba. Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ Simoon na: «Daa siil fobɛɦgu! Gwɛɦma ba v` faam Gohɔmt nidba tia t´ ɦɛn wo vn lɔɔla bɛdb ka moog ɦɔlii lee.»
42005011	Lee wen, bá ŋmɛlgn bá kpiirt gbiir ɦɛn, n saa kan wantii n tag ɦá kaa.
42005012	Yeesua nn da ba kɔrgu kuugun lee, nidɦii t daan ka ba n bolmt ɦá gbanu ɦɛn. Ĥan nyan Yeesu lee, n luurm ɦá nɔnga ɦɛn ɦá tiŋa n ka jobla-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, ka v` sɔkla, v` ɦe mà riir kelkel!»
42005013	Ĥá teed ɦá nuɦu n tarm-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà sɔkln. Riir kelkel!» Yelmaa bolmt t nyab ɦá ɦɛn.
42005014	Lee, Yeesua t baɦl-wu na: «Daa biir ɦiiwu gwɛɛtii felaɦ'! San v` werii vyen gotia, ɦà nyaan vn ba lee, l` saa v` ɦe vit Mohiisa nn da sir wad na bá ɦɛm t` hig nakakeet tii ka bo na baawena miig na l` gbaad-v!»
42005015	Nidba t ka la bɔɦɔɔ ɦà gwɛɛt kɔd. Nidfigm t ka kaada taa na bà ɦom ɦá gwɛɛt na ɦà ta gbaad bà bɛɦii.
42005016	Yeesu lee, wii ror kpamga ɦɛn ka seeŋa.
42005017	Goor diir, Yeesua da weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt, Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba kad ɦà man. Bà da rɛn kɔrni ɦì ba Galilee n Yuudee tantn ɦii mɛnin, n ta Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Saŋgband gemmnt da tɔra-wu ɦà gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba.
42005018	Daba biiba t daan ka toɦd balmdindɦiiwu jargun. Bà da bagl na bà jiblg bà doolg-wu Yeesua nɔngan.
42005019	Nidba da ba kɔd ka ŋmiɦr haar keɦ', bá ka kpaa mi bá kan ba bà jiblg-wu n ree. Bá juul disaku faaga n nyat vadgu, n hoɦlgii-wu n ɦà jargu nidbee huuga ɦá nɔngan.
42005020	Yeesua nn nyan bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim lee, n bɔɦɔɔ bɛɦtiiwii na: «Mà tuura! L` waa-v v` fubɛɦii.»
42005021	Lee wen, Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba t baɦ n ka diila na: «¿Wen nnii ɦá su Saŋgband welee? ¿Wen ba ɦà bee ɦà waa ɦii fubɛɦii ka l` kpaɦ na Saŋgband n jaɦ?»
42005022	Yeesua t miig bá jugun diila n gbaam-ba na: «¿Ben kaan nn ba n welee diilɦee n` jugu ni?
42005023	Ka má biir na ‟L` waa-v v` fubɛɦii” laa ‟vidg v` keda!”, ¿l´ huuga ben yatg gemmii?
42005024	Lee, maa mà werii-n na Nida Budaaga man, mà ba n gemmnt tant ɦɛn na mà waam fubɛɦii.» Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ balmdindwii na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na: Vidg! Lɔg v` jargu v` kuliim naa!»
42005025	Yelmaa, nidwii t vid nidbee niinin n lɔgm jargu ɦá nn door kù ɦɛn kuu, n ka kulaa baa ka nyɔka Saŋgband.
42005026	L´ ɦɛm bá mɛmbee yɔlaa, bá ka nyɔka Saŋgband. Fobɛɦgu t mug-ba bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` nyana jana tn ban nyaan bii.»
42005027	Lee n l` kaann, Yeesua t rorm n yum lambɦu soɦdgtɦii, bà hoɦ-wu na Levia, ɦà kad lambɦu faadb disakun. Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Tagd mà kaa!»
42005028	Levia t vid n saa ɦá want n ka tagd ɦà kaa.
42005029	L´ saa, ɦá san n duugm diit n jum Yeesuwu kasant baa. Lambɦu soɦdgtba kɔd n ta nidvolba t ta jum bá man.
42005030	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba bá da ba bà kpaturun bee t ka nyeera Yeesua gwɛɛt n bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿Ben kaan n´ n lambɦu soɦdgtba n fubɛɦtiiba nn ju ka nyi taa man?»
42005031	Yeesua t leed-ba na: «Nidba bá kpaɦ n bɛɦii bee kpaa ked taadmta man. Bɛɦtiiba keda taadmta man.
42005032	Mà ba daan na mà hoɦ nidhɔmba, mà daan na mà hoɦ fubɛɦtiiba na bá lagii neerm.»
42005033	Nidbee t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n t` reba boowa noor ka seeŋa. V` reba lee, bee jul ka nyi.»
42005034	Ĥá leed-ba na: «N` diila na ka bá hoɦ nidba yaala kasant man, ¿n` mug-ba n kwɛgdi na bá boow noor yaala tiiwii nɔngan laa?
42005035	Vuugu kenan, yaala tia kpaɦ ɦà bɛm bá man, l` saa-ba bayen. Vuuguu daa taanaa, bà boow noor.»
42005036	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba nawdlamnmina na: «Ĥii kpaa sada ɦá dimkwɛɛlgu na ɦà lɔg dimtoogu ɦà lag ɦà dimbudŋu. Ka lag welee, dimkwɛɛlguu sadg, dimtooguu ta kpaɦ kù mag n dimbudŋuu.
42005037	L´ saa, n` lɔgl rufetii ka hid daam, ¿laa bee? Ĥii kpaa lɔg dakwɛɛlm n hit rukpeemgun, blaɦb kaa ka m` wɛɛgaa, kù kitg, l` saa, daamii n ruuguu l` kul n kol.
42005038	Tii lee, l` ba na bà lɔg dakwɛɛlm bà hitg rukwɛɛlgun.
42005039	Ĥii ɦà nyir dakpeemm wii ta kpaa bag dakwɛɛlm. Biilm, bà bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Dakpeemm beel hɔm ka yata”.»
42006001	Saabaat goor diir, Yeesua t jib n jofiili kpamb biibn ka gɛta. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka kaɦ jofiili ka tɔg ka tagma.
42006002	Farisii tiiba biiba t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿Ben kaan nn ɦɛna t` baɦlb nn kpaa saɦ huru na bá ɦɛm Saabaat goor bii?»
42006003	Ĥá leed-ba na: «¿N` ba kaal Wadbuudgan bii Daviida nn da ɦer goor diir biin? Goorii, kɔm t kuu-wu n ɦà nidba.
42006004	¿Ĥà da ba jib Saŋgband haarn n lɔgm kpooni ban da sir Saŋgband ɦii n jumn? ¿Ĥà da ta ba si-ɦi wú n bà l` da bee been? L` ba na nidyemtia kpaa juu-ɦi ka l` kpaɦ na Saŋgband gotia.»
42006005	Ĥá ta lilm-ba bɔɦɔɔb na: «Nida Budaaga nnii Saabaat goor berma.»
42006006	Ta Saabaat goor diir, Yeesua t jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun n baɦ n ka weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt. Nidɦii ba kan ɦà najuudu nuɦu t vaaw.
42006007	Baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba t ka kiig-wu hɔm na bà nyaan na ¿ɦà ba ɦà gbaad ɦiiwu Saabaat goor laa? Bà da bagl hurɦii mɛnɦii na bà biir na ɦà koɦl gwɛɛt.
42006008	Ĥà mi ban diila tii. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ nid ɦá nuɦu vaawr wii na: «Vidg v` jeɦnt nnaɦ nidba nɔngan!» Nidwii t vid n jeɦnt.
42006009	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà gbaama-n na: ¿L` sira huru na bà ɦɛm benwu Saabaat goor? ¿Na bà ɦɛm hɔmgu laa, bá ɦɛm bɛɦgu le? ¿Na bá soɦdgm nidwu kuumn laa, bá kuum-wu le?»
42006010	Ĥá geed bá mɛmbee n bɔɦɔɔ nidwii na: «Teedg v` nuɦu!» Ĥá teed-ɦu, ɦú maant.
42006011	Volbee t lo kwɛɛwweerga n bɔɦɔɔ taa ln ba na bá ɦee-wu lee.
42006012	L´ vuuguu, Yeesua t juul duuga kiiga ɦɛn na ɦà seeŋ, n ɦɛm nyinguu mɛnguu ka seeŋa Saŋgband.
42006013	Toŋu nn dan n ragd lee, ɦá hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, n rood bá huuga kwiɦr n bareɦba n hoɦ-ba na ɦá tumtba.
42006014	Bee nnii Simoona –ɦà da ta daarŋ-wu na Fetra– wú n ɦà nyakwɛɛl Ĥandrea, Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛsa, Filfwu n Baatelmia,
42006015	Matewwu n Tomaasa, Ĥalfea kwɛɛl Yakoobwu n Simoon ɦá ŋmɛta ɦá kɔrgu ɦɛn wii,
42006016	Yakooba kwɛɛl Yuudwu n Yuudaas Kariyoot tii ɦá da gweedm Yeesuwu wii.
42006017	Yeesua da hoɦnta duugee wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n san n jeɦnt tɛɛmgun, ɦá kaa tagdtba kɔd kan ba ree. Nidfigm da ta ba kan, ka rɛn n Yuudee tantn, n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, n ta Tiir n Sidoon kɔrni ɦì ba nyaam maaru ɦiin.
42006018	Bà da daan na bà kewlgm Yeesua, na ɦá ta gbaad bà bɛɦii. Kunidba nn da bida bà rarm bee, ɦá gbaad-ba.
42006019	Baawena da bagl na ɦà tad n wun, blaɦb kaa na gemmnt tiit da ror ɦá gbanu ɦɛn ka gbaadaa bà mɛmbee.
42006020	Yeesua t geed ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii katɛdtiiba nen, nen heɦl n Saŋgband huraant.
42006021	Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii kɔm nn kuu gwɛɦmina nen, n` nan togln. Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii nen kuum nen, n` kee n` laɦdrm.
42006022	Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii nen, ka l` ba na nidba nyaɦaa-n, ka vɔɦd-n, ka suu-n laa, ka koɦla n` hida Nida Budaaga kaa.
42006023	Ka l´ dan n daan n` jugun welee n` nyaagm ka forwa na fadbermt hɔda-n saŋgbambiimn. Biilm, ta welee nnii bá yandaba nn da ɦɛna gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba.
42006024	«Lee, kwɛgdm tiiba nen, n` nan yul-ku, nii jul lamɛɛgu tant ɦɛn.
42006025	Nen, nen tegr nen, n` nan yul-ku, kɔm kee m` kuu-n. Nen, nen laɦdra gwɛɦma nen, n` nan yul-ku, n` kee n` bɛm ɦigmn ka kuum.
42006026	N` nan yul-ku, ka l` ba na nidba mɛmba bɔɦɔɔ n` gwɛɛt hɔm. Biilm, ta welee nnii bá yandaba nn da ɦɛna n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba.
42006027	«Mà bɔɦɔɔ nen, nen kewla-ma nen na: sɔklm-n n` rafeedba! Ĥɛm-n hɔmgu biiba bà nyaɦaa-n bee!
42006028	Gwɛɛlm-n nohɔmr biiba bà gwɛɛla nobɛɦr n` kaa bee ɦɛn, ka seeŋa biiba bà lɔɔ-n kunyɔŋu bee ɦɛn.
42006029	Ka ɦii t gbudg v` nyakpiigu ɦɛn, v` ta tog volguu. Ka ɦii t soɦdg v` dimbermgu, v` ta saa ɦà lag n kù kwɛɛn reku mɛɦ'.
42006030	Si ɦii ɦá jama-v bii wii! Ka ɦii t lɔg v` bii, daa gbaam-wu fɔmr!
42006031	Bii nn sɔkla na nidba ɦɛm-n bii, ta ɦɛm-n-ba-b wo nn ta bag lee.
42006032	Ka n` sɔkla biiba bá sɔkla-n bee n jaɦ, ¿n` ta hɔd fat tiitn? Fubɛɦtiiba mɛɦ ta ɦɛna welee.
42006033	Ka n` ɦɛna hɔmgu bá ɦɛna-n hɔmgu bee n jaɦ, ¿n` ta hɔd fat tiitn? Fubɛɦtiiba mɛɦ ta ɦɛna welee.
42006034	Ka n´ kɛɛm bii ɦii nn mi na ɦà kee ɦà ŋmɛlg-n wii n jaɦ, ¿n` ta hɔd fat tiitn? Fubɛɦtiiba ta kɛɛma fubɛɦtiiba ka hɔd na baa bà ta ŋmɛlg-ba yenmii wo ban da kɛɛm-ba lee.
42006035	Tii lee, sɔklm-n n` rafeedba, ɦɛm-n hɔmgu, kɛɛm-n ka kpaa hɔd na bá ŋmɛlg-n! Lee, n` nan soɦdg fat bermt, n` bɛm na nen nnii Saŋgband mɔmr bii. Biilm, d` ta sɔkla bá kpaa miigaa hɔmgu bee n bá ba talmt bee.
42006036	Yum-n volba ɦigm wo n` Sa nn ta yu n` ɦigm lee!
42006037	«Daa yaam-n volba n yaagu, na bá daa nan ta yaa-n n yaagu! Daa bɔɦɔɔm-n na volba ret koɦln, na bá daa nan ta biir na n` ret koɦln! Waam-n bá ɦɛna-n bɛɦgu bee, na bá nan ta waa-n n` bɛɦgu!
42006038	Saɦm-n volba, bà daa bà ta si-n! Bà kee bà si-n kɔd. Bà ba bà mɛg ka tikra l` hugl l` futr, bà lɔg bà hitg n` ruugun. Mɛgdga nn mɛg n kee nnii ban kee bà ta mɛg-n n kan.»
42006039	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba nawdlamnmina na: «Jooma ban dar jooma, ¿laa bee? Ka lag welee bà da bà lɔɔ vadgun bá reɦdrbee.
42006040	Kpɛlŋtɦii kpaɦ bermt n yat ɦá weriita. Ban werii ɦá ka mi hɔm wii ba ɦà bɛm wo ɦá weriita.
42006041	«¿Ben kaan vn geewa nyakakiiga ká ba v` teela nɔmbn kee, ka kpaa yu faɦgidgu kú ba v` rebn kuu?
42006042	¿Lan nnii vn ba v` biir v` teel na: ‟Saa mà ree nyakakiiga ká ba v` nɔmbn kee”, ven, ven kpaa yu faɦgidgu kú ba v` rebn kuu veni? Rarbɛɦm tii ven! Ree faɦgidgu kú ba v` nɔmbn kuu saɦ', lee wen lee, v` nyaan hɔm na v` ree nyakakiiga ká ba v` teela rebn kee.
42006043	«Tihɔmb kpaa roon roonbɛɦt, ta welee nnii tibɛɦb nn kpaa roon roonhɔma.
42006044	Bà miigaa tiib n b` roona weenn. Bà kpaa tɔɔ doot raɦint ɦɛn, bà ta kpaa tɔɔ taama boŋ̈mb ɦɛn.
42006045	Nid ɦá ɦɛna hɔmgu wii, ɦá hɔmgu rɛna ɦà kwɛɛwrn. Nid ɦá ɦɛna bɛɦgu wii, ɦá bɛɦgu ta rɛna ɦà kwɛɛwrn. Nida noon ror bii b` hugl ɦá kwɛɛwrn bii.
42006046	«¿Ben kaa nn hoɦ-ma na ‟Berma! Berma!”, ka kpaa ɦɛna man bɔɦɔɔ-n bii?
42006047	Mà ba mà werii-n nid ɦá kena mà man, ka ɦum mà gwɛɛt ka ɦɛna t´ ɦɛn wii nn tɔn wii.
42006048	Ĥà tɔna wo nidɦii nn da mɔɦ ɦà haar. Ĥà da tiira n tiim l´ kilnt ɦá kool bobogr fiiga ɦɛn. Toŋu t niim kɔd, kola t hugl n gbuu n heɦ haarii, d´ ka ba dam, blaɦb kaa na ɦà da mɛɦra-d hɔm.
42006049	Ĥá ɦum mà gwɛɛt ka kpaa ɦɛna t´ ɦɛn wii tɔna ɦà mɛɦr ɦà haar ka ba ti bobogr wii. Kola nn hugl n gbuu n heɦ haarii lee, d´ lotr n kit dabirgu kpaalaa.»
42007001	Yeesua nn gwɛɛl n kɔrgu l´ diɦ lee, ɦá san Kafarnahuum kɔrgun.
42007002	Reekan lee, Roomaa tawdbermɦii da ba kan ka ba n ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii, l` ba na ɦà sɔkla-wu hɔm. Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii da ba n bɛɦii ka ba kuumn.
42007003	Tawdbermwii nn ɦomr bà bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua gwɛɛt lee, ɦá tom Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba biiba na ɦá daan na ɦà gbaad ɦà ŋmɛɛɦeeda.
42007004	Bá taai Yeesua man n baɦ n ka jobla-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tawdwii mag na v` tɔrg-wu.
42007005	Ĥà sɔkla t` tigrii, wii mɛɦra-t t` kpoglb disakuu.»
42007006	Yeesua t san bá kaa. Ĥan nyuɦ haar lee, tawdbermwii t tamn ɦá tuurmba na bá biir-wu na: «Berma! Daa jaarŋ vyen! Mà kpaa tɔn na v` jibn mà fiid.
42007007	Tii kaa nnii man nyan na mà ta kpaa tɔn na mà daan mà mɔmwu v` man. Gwɛntaɦ lee, biir gwɛɛgu kuyengu, l` gbaad mà ŋmɛɛɦeeda.
42007008	Mà mɔma, mà ba mà bermba kwɛɛn, ka ta mad tawdba mà kwɛɛn. Ka má biir bá ni ɦii na: ‟Keda!”, ɦá san. Ka má ta biir vol na: ‟Daana!”, ɦá daan. L´ saa, ka má ta biir mà ŋmɛɛɦeed na: ‟Ĥe binbii!”, ɦá ɦɛm-b.»
42007009	Yeesua nn ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu yɔlaa yem n tawdbermwii beeb. Ĥá tint ɦayen n bɔɦɔɔ nidhiinu ɦú da tagd ɦà kaa ɦuu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiilm na: Mà ba nyaan gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimnmina tuurm la Yisraɦeel tigrn.»
42007010	Ban da tomr bee t ŋmɛtgii haaga n mid l´ gbaad ŋmɛɛɦeedwii.
42007011	Tii kaann, Yeesua t san kɔrgu kuugun bà hoɦ-ku na Naɦiin. Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba n nidfigm da tagda ɦà kaa.
42007012	Ĥan san n ka jibaa kɔrguun lee, n taŋ n bà toɦd kpiirɦii ka ked na bà kuur-wu. Kpiirwii da ba kwɛɛl ɦayenwu ligaɦ ɦá nya man, nyawii ba na kuŋfɔgn. Nidfigm da reda kɔrgun n ka tagd kpiirwii.
42007013	Berma wen nyan kuŋfɔg̈wii, l´ ɦɛm-wu ɦigm biii, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Daa kom!»
42007014	Ĥan bed fɔg̈wii welee lee, n nyuɦii kpiira kadakŋa man, n tarm ká ɦɛn, toɦdtba t jeɦnt. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kuliiga, vidg! Man saɦl-v wad.»
42007015	Kpiirwii t vid n kad n baɦ n ka gwɛɛla. Yeesua t lɔgm-wu n to-wu ɦá nya.
42007016	Fobɛɦgu t kuum nidba mɛmba. Bá ka nyɔka Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbermɦii reda t` huuga», l´ saa «Saŋgband t daan na d` daɦ d´ tigr jugu.»
42007017	Bii Yeesua nn da ɦer bii mɛmbii t yadgii Yuudee tantii mɛntii n kɔrni ɦì nyɔɦr ɦii mɛnɦiin.
42007018	Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t san n bɔɦɔɔ-wu Yeesua nn da ɦer bii mɛmbii. Ĥá hoɦ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtbee ni bareɦba
42007019	n tom-ba Berma man na bá gbaam-wu na ¿wii nnii nid ban mi na ɦà kenan wii laa, l` ba na bà hɔd jeenɦii le?
42007020	Ban taai ɦá man lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa tamna-t na t` gbaam-v na ¿ven nnii nid ban mi na ɦà kenan wii laa, l` ba na bà hɔd jeenɦii le?»
42007021	Lee wen, Yeesua gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba kɔd, ka vɔɦd kunidba nidba ni, ka ɦɛna joomba yu.
42007022	Lee, ɦá leed-ba na: «Ŋmɛtg-n n` biir Yohanɛɛswu bii nn ɦum ka yu bii! Joomba yuln, kparuuba ked hɔm, bolmba bɛɦii gbaadaa, dintammba ɦum, kpiirmba himtra, bà bɔɦɔɔ kunyɔŋtiiba Gohɔmt.
42007023	Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦii ɦá nan kpaa gwidaa gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaawr l` baɦr n man wii.»
42007024	Yohanɛɛsa nn tamn bee nn nyab lee, Yeesua t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt na: «¿N` san kpamloŋun na n` nyaan bee? ¿N` san na n` nyaan kaagu ɦam nn fug ɦù lig̈wa ɦuu laa? Mà kpaa diila.
42007025	¿N` san kan na n` nyaan ben mɔmbii? ¿N` san na n` nyaan nidɦii ɦà fidr dimhɔma laa? Nidba bá fidr kwɛgdm dimt ka neer kwɛgdba neerm bee, ¿lag bee gool huraamba haya nii?
42007026	¿L` ba na n` san kpamloŋun na n` nyaan ben mɔmbii? ¿N` san na n` nyaan Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii laa? Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na: N` nyana Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtberm nnii.
42007027	Wii gwɛɛt nnii Saŋgband nn da bed Wadbuudgan na: Maa mà tom mà tumtwu v` nɔngan na ɦá maantr-v huru.»
42007028	Ĥá lilm na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, bà ban meed nidɦii ɦà ba bermt n yat Yohanɛɛsa. Gwɛntaɦ', ɦá ba na bututugŋa kpaalaa Saŋgband huraantn wii ba berm ka yata-wu.
42007029	Kɔrgun tiibee n lambɦu soɦdgtbee da kewla ɦà gwɛɛt. Bà da miig na Saŋgband ba hɔm n ka ked Yohanɛɛsa huur-ba Saŋgband nyaalm.
42007030	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba lee, bee t kirm na Yohanɛɛsa daa hor-ba Saŋgband nyaalm. Welee weraa na bà kida bii Saŋgband nn gbaam bii.
42007031	«¿Wen nnii man ba mà kɛɛml n goona nidba? ¿Bà tɔn wenii?
42007032	Bà tɔna bii hí ror n ka kad bantn, volii toola hí tuurii na: ‟T` hoɦra-n bina werii, n´ ka ba haaw. T´ yuum himaɦr yumii, n´ ka ba kom.”
42007033	Biilm, Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa daann, n ka kpaa ju bii ka kpaa nyi daam, n´ ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Ĥà ba n kunida.”
42007034	Nida Budaaga man, maa daan n ka ju ka nyi, n´ ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Nyaan-n nidwunwuna! Ĥà diila deb n danyab ɦɛn n jaɦ ka turaa n lambɦu soɦdgtba n neerbɛɦm tiiba.”
42007035	Lee, bá tia Saŋgband rarm ɦɛn bee mɛmbee miig na m` ba deedee.»
42007036	Farisii tiiɦii da hoɦ Yeesu na wú n wun bá di diit. Ĥá san nidwiaa, bá kad diit deb.
42007037	Fɔgɦii da ba kɔrguun bà mii-wu na ɦá neerm kpaɦ hɔm. Fɔg̈wii nn da ɦomr na Yeesua ba Farisii tiiwiaa ka ju diit lee, ɦá san kan ka mad kpalaliiga kiiga, daɦt kpakunuukaɦm ba ká keɦ',
42007038	n mid Yeesua kad ŋmɛdgu ɦà nakpai teer n kaan. Ĥá jeɦnt ɦá kaa n ka kuum ka hilgra nyanyaam Yeesua nakpaŋbahii ɦɛn. L´ tog ɦá kɛwdr-hi n ɦà jii n ɦog-hi n haruu-hi n vu-hi kpaamii.
42007039	Farisii tii ɦá da hoɦ Yeesu wii nn nyan welee lee, n ka bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ni na: «Ka ln bɛm na nidwunwuna ba na Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtn gobiilmii, ɦan ba ɦà miig fɔg ɦà tarm ɦá ɦɛn wuna beeb na ɦá neerm kpaɦ hɔm.»
42007040	Yeesua t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ Farisii tiiwii na: «Simoon! Mà ba n gwɛɛt tiit na mà biir-v.» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Berma, bɔɦɔɔm!»
42007041	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nidba bareɦba da ba n ɦiiwu n fɔmr. Vola da ba n na ɦà ŋmɛlg ruuni lɛmi ɦinu, l´ saa volwii ruuni kwɛɦnu.
42007042	Wo ban da kpaa bea na bà ŋmɛlg-wu lig̈biirii lee, ɦá lɔgm fɔmrii n saɦm-ba. Bá reɦdrbee huuga, ¿wen ba ɦà sɔklm-wu l` yataa?»
42007043	Simoona t leed na: «Mà diila na nid ɦá fɔmr da ba bermr wii beel ɦà sɔklm-wu l` yata.» Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ba n gobiint.»
42007044	Lee wen, ɦá bid ɦayen n fɔg̈wii wee, n bɔɦɔɔ Simoon na: «¿Yul fɔg̈wunwuna? Mà jibn vaa, v´ ka ba si-ma nyaalm na mà hig mà nakpai. Fɔg̈wii lee, wii higra mà nakpai n ɦà nyanyaam n kɛwdr-hi n ɦà jii.
42007045	Ba soɦdg-ma ka ɦogaa-ma, wii lee, mà wen jibn n gwɛɦmaa, ɦà ɦɔgra mà nakpai ka harwa-hi.
42007046	Ba hakr mà jugu kpaam, wii lee, ɦà hakr mà nakpai tlaar.
42007047	Tii kaa nnii man rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-v na: Sɔklbermb ɦan sɔkl-ma bii werii na l` waal-wu ɦà fubɛɦii hì kpaɦ jaɦ hii. Ĥii ban waa ɦá fubɛɦii jaɦ wii ta sɔkla jaɦ'.»
42007048	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ fɔg̈wii na: «L` waa-v v` fubɛɦii.»
42007049	Wú n bà l` da ju diit bee t ka bɔɦɔɔ n bà ni na: «¿Ben tii nnii nidwunwuna ɦan lag n fubɛɦii n ka waa?»
42007050	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ fɔg̈wii na: «V` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daɦra v` jugu, keda, nigiigu bɛm v` man!»
42008001	Lee n l` kaann, Yeesua t ka linta n kɔrbermi n kɔrkaaɦin ka faa nidba Saŋgband huraant Gohɔmt. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee da tagda ɦà kaa,
42008002	n ta fɔg̈ba biiba Yeesua nn da voor kunidba bá ni n ta gbaad bá bɛɦii bee. Bee nnii Maarii Magdalaa tii ɦan da voor ɦà ni kunidba balbleɦba wii,
42008003	n Ĥerooda haar ɦɛn sagd Kusaa fɔg Yohaana, n Susaanwu n ta fɔgvolba kɔd. Bá mɛmbee da lɔgl bá kwɛgdm ka tɔra Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba.
42008004	Nidba da rɛna kɔrnin ka kena Yeesua man. Ĥan dan n yum nidfigm kpogla taa lee, ɦá gwɛɛl-ba nawdlam na:
42008005	«Nidɦii da san ɦá koogun na ɦà mɛɛ figm. Ĥan da mɛɛ lee, miim t tɛɦr huru kpamga, bá nawdr m´ ɦɛn, l´ saa ŋmɛnii t tɔɦm-m.
42008006	Miim t ta tɛɦr fidɛndɛi ɦɛn. Mn dan n rorm lee, n kparŋ, blaɦb kaa, m` da kpaa ba tannigiitn.
42008007	Miim t ta tɛɦr ɦint bia huuga. Ĥintii n figmii l´ rorm gbaraɦ'. Ĥint t waal figm ɦɛn, m´ ka ba lo bia.
42008008	L´ saa, miim t ta tɛɦr tanhɔmtn, n rorm, n berŋ, n maadm, n lo m´ mɛnmii bia lɛmu lɛmu.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n hewl ka toola na: «Ka ɦii ba n tobɦa na ɦà ɦomaa, ɦá kewlg hɔm!»
42008009	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam-wu na ɦá ree-ba nawdlamii kɔtɔd.
42008010	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Nen lee, l` sira-n na n` miig Saŋgband huraant kpɛŋkpɛɦgan gwɛɛt. L´ saa, nidvolbee lee, bà bɔɦɔɔ bee gwɛɛtii n nawdlamn, na bá geem ka kpaa yu, ka kewla ka kpaa ɦum.
42008011	«Nawdlamii kɔtɔd nnii na, dikaɦbuudr nnii Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
42008012	Nidba biiba tɔna huru kpamga dikaɦbuudr diir kan tɛɦr ree. Bà ɦuma gwɛntaɦ', Kunida t daan n tawd gwɛɛtii bá kwɛɛwan na bá daa tii na l` daɦ bá juuni.
42008013	Volba bee tɔn fidɛndɛi, bà ɦuma gwɛɛt, n soɦd-t n nyaag̈b, gwɛntaɦ', bà kpaa saa-t na t´ baɦ rugi. Bà tia l` kpaa hiida, tarmga nn kena bá jugun lee, bá kɔɦd gwɛɛtii.
42008014	Dikaɦbuudr d` tɛɦda ɦint huuga dii tɔna bá ɦum gwɛɛt bee, gwɛntaɦaa, tant ɦɛn diila, n kwɛgdm lamɛɛgu kú hogla kuu, n want sɔklb jugu jugu t jib bá kwɛɛwan n feg gwɛɛtii, t´ ka ba roon bii hɔmb.
42008015	Dikaɦbuudr d` tɛɦdg tanhɔmtn dii tɔna bá ɦum gwɛɛt, n lo-t bá kwɛɛwhɔman bee. Welee nidbee mada gwɛɛtii ka ɦɛna t´ jugun, ka roon bia wo ln gbaam lee.
42008016	«Ĥii kpaa tɔla kand na ɦà lɔg tɔka ɦà lig d` ɦɛn, laa ɦà lo-d ɦà gad kwɛɛn. Ĥaai, ɦà lila-d n baɦga na bá jibna bee yum wiinga.
42008017	Bii b` ba foɦmgan bii mɛmbii, bà nan rea-b bà nyaan-b. Bii b` ba kpɛŋkpɛɦgan bii mɛmbii, bà nan rea-b wiingan bà miig-b.
42008018	Ĥee-n hɔm n nn kewla lee! Ĥá ba n bii wii, bà nan mɔɔ-wu saɦb. L´ saa ɦá kpaɦ n bii wii, bà nan fɛla bà soɦdg ɦà do bii tutugm ɦan diila na ɦà ba n bii.»
42008019	Ĥá nyakwɛɛlba n bà nya t daan na bà nyaan-wu, gwɛntaɦ n ka kpaa bea. Nidba kɔd da kaadg-wu.
42008020	Bá san n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` nyawu n v` nyakwɛɛlba jeɦra duun ka bag na bà nyaan-v.»
42008021	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ bá mɛmbee na: «Bá ɦum Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka ɦɛna t´ jugun bee nnii mà nyawu n mà nyakwɛɛlba.»
42008022	Goor diir, Yeesua t jib kpiirgun wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tn mɛwdg-n nyaam bal!» Bá lɔɔm huru.
42008023	Ban da ɦeewr kpiirgu n kaab lee, Yeesua t gor. Ĥambermm miim t daan myenm ɦɛn n ka fug kimm, nyaalm t ka hugla kpiirgu, bá ka ba kuumn.
42008024	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyuɦ-wu, n himii-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma! Berma! T` ba t` kpiidr.» Ĥá himt n gwɛɛl ɦamii n nyaalmii n talmt l´ kwiim. L´ mɛnguu t kwiim nigaɦ'.
42008025	Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «¿N` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ba tee?» Fobɛɦgu mad-ba, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «¿Ben nid nnii wunwii? Ĥà saɦl ɦam n nyaalm mɛɦm wad m` vala-wu.»
42008026	Bá taai Gerasaa tiiba tantn, l` hɛl Galilee tant.
42008027	Yeesua nn da hoɦnta tiŋan lee, kɔrguun daawɦii t tuug-wu. Daawwii da ba n kunidba. L` vɔk ɦan kpaa fidr dimt ka ta kpaa go haaga, ka go bili huuga.
42008028	Ĥan nyan Yeesu lee, n mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga n luurm ɦá tiŋa n tool kimm na: «Saŋgband mɔmr Budaaga Yeesu! ¿Má n vn n tet? Mà jobla-v, daa dar mà tobr!»
42008029	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ welee, blaɦb kaa, Yeesua da sira kunidwii wad na ɦá riir ɦá ni. Biilm, kunidwii da hiidg nidwii ni. Bà da boowa nidwii niɦi n ɦà nakpai n kona na ɦá daa ked rii, gwɛntaɦ', ɦà tɛtra konɦee, kunidwii ked-wu n kpamloŋun.
42008030	Yeesua t gbaam-wu na: «¿Bà hoɦ-v na wenii?» Ĥá leed na: «Bà hoɦl-ma na ‟Hiinu”». Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ welee blaɦb kaa na kunidba kɔd da ba ɦà ni.
42008031	Kunidbee t ka jobla Yeesu na ɦá daa voo-ba nidwii ni bà kul tiib kwɛɛn.
42008032	Ĥafaant kodibermr diir da hɔɦwra ka bag diit duuga ɦɛn. Kunidbee t ka jobla Yeesu na ɦá saa-ba bà jib ɦafaantiin. Ĥá tii.
42008033	Lee, kunidbee t rorm nidwii ni, n san n jib ɦafaantii ni. Ĥafaantii t begdr duugee ɦɛn huuu n lɔɔm nyaamn n ŋmɛɦɛɛ tyen n kpiidr.
42008034	Nidba bá da kiima ɦafaantii bee nn nyan welee lee, n solm n san n ka bɔɦɔɔ kɔrgun n kafiin bii b` gɛtg bii.
42008035	Nidba t rorm na bà nyaan bii b` gɛtg bii. Bá taai Yeesua man n yum nidwii kunidba t riir ɦá ni. Ĥá ka kad Yeesua tiŋa, ka fidr dimt, ɦà rarm ba ɦá ni hɔm. Fobɛɦgu t mug-ba.
42008036	Bá da nyan l` mɛnguu bee t kɛɛm-ba lan nnii Yeesua nn da gbaad-wu lee.
42008037	Gerasaa tiiba mɛmba t ka bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na ɦá nyab bà man. Fobɛɦgu da mada-ba kɔd. Lee, ɦá jib kpiirgun n ka nyaba.
42008038	Nid kunidba nn da red ɦà ni wii t ka jobla-wu na ɦá saa ɦá bɛm ɦá man. Ĥá voom-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
42008039	«Ŋmɛtg v` kul naa, v` san v` kɛɛml bii Saŋgband nn ɦer-v bii mɛmbii!» Nidwii t ŋmɛtgii n san n faa kɔrguu mɛnguun bii Yeesua nn da ɦer-wu bii mɛmbii.
42008040	Yeesua nn da ŋmɛtgii nyaam bal volii weenn lee, nidba kɔd t tuug-wu. Biilm, bá mɛmbee da hɔda-wu.
42008041	Daawɦii t taan bà hoɦ-wu na Yaɦiruusa. Da wii nnii Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku berma. Ĥá gbaɦnt ɦá dina ɦɛn Yeesua nɔngan n ka jobla-wu na ɦá daan baa,
42008042	na ɦá bufɔka kayenga ɦan ba n kee bo na kà kpi, kà ba n bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ'. Yeesua nn da kedaa daawwiaa lee, nidfigm da hirwa ɦà kpama ka fɛgr-wu.
42008043	Fɔgɦii da ba kan ka ɦe bina kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ n bɛɦii. Bɛɦhii nnii na jiim da ror-wu wo ɦà huura kidga l` kpaa jeɦnta. Ĥá diɦ ɦá lig̈biirii mɛndii dɔgdbermba man, ɦii ba bee n gbaad-wu.
42008044	Ĥá nyuɦ Yeesuwu n ɦà kaann n tarm ɦá dimgu noor. Jiim t jeɦnt-wu yelmaa.
42008045	Yeesua t gbaam na: «¿Wen tarm-ma?» Bá mɛmba t ka kia. Lee, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, nidfigm fɛgra-v rena n rena.»
42008046	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na ɦii tarm-ma, blaɦb kaa mà miig na gemmnt tiit reda mà ɦɛn.»
42008047	Fɔg̈wii nn nyan na bà miig-wu lee, ɦá daan ka deɦra n gbaɦnt Yeesua tiŋa, n bɔɦɔɔ baawena nɔngan b´ da ɦer ɦà tarma ɦá dimgu bii, n lan nnii ɦan tarm dimguu l´ gbaad-wu yelmaa lee.
42008048	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bugaa, v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daɦra v` jugu. Keda, nigiigu bɛm v` man!»
42008049	Ĥan da ɦeewr-wu n gwɛɛlb lee, ɦii t rɛn berm Yaɦiruusaa n daan n ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` bufɔka fɛlgn. Daa jaarŋ̈m berma!»
42008050	Yeesua t ɦom n bɔɦɔɔ Yaɦiruus na: «Daa diilgm, tiim welee n jaɦ', v` bufɔka ba kà himtg!»
42008051	Ban san n taai lee, Yeesua t ka ba tii na ɦii jib ɦà kaa haaga ka l` kpaɦ na Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛswu n Yakoobwu n bufɔkee sawu n kà nyawu n jaɦ'.
42008052	Bá da ba kan bee mɛmbee kuum ka jokra bà hirii kwɛɛn bugee kaa. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Daa kom-n! Kà ba kpi, kà gooln.»
42008053	Ĥan bed welee lee, bá ka laɦ-wu. Bà da miil hɔm na kà kpiiran.
42008054	Ĥá mug ká nuɦu n tool kimm na: «Buga, vidg!»
42008055	Ká himt n vid yelmaa. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na bá si-ka diit kà di.
42008056	L´ ɦɛm ká reba yɔlaa. Ĥá baɦl-ba na bá daa biir ɦiiwu gwɛɛtii.
42009001	Yeesua t kpogl ɦá tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee n saɦm-ba gemmnt na bá vɔɦd kunidba mɛmba ka ta gbaadaa bɛɦii.
42009002	Ĥá tom-ba na bá faam Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt, na bá gbaadiim bɛɦtiiba,
42009003	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka n` nyaba, daa lɔg-n bii n` ked ka mad wo dagbɛɦgu laa, ruugu laa, diit laa, lig̈biir! Ĥii daa ta mad tugreɦdrgu!
42009004	Ka bá soɦdg-n haar diirn, n` bɛm d´ ni kakeɦnan n` daa nyaba kan.
42009005	Baatee bá kan ba soɦdg-n ree, n` nyab kan n` nit-ba n n` niɦi l` werii-ba na ka bá bɔr, bá ret nnii.»
42009006	Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t nyab, n ka gilma kɔrni mɛnin ka faa Gohɔmt ka gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba baatea.
42009007	Galilee huraa Ĥerooda t ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ bii b` gɛta bii mɛmbii. Ĥá ka kpaa mi ln ba na ɦá ɦe lee. Nidba biiba da bɔɦɔɔ na Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa himtg kuumn n ka neer.
42009008	Volba bɔɦɔɔ na gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Ĥelia ŋmɛtgn tant ɦɛn. Volba ta bɔɦɔɔ na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii himtgn.
42009009	Ĥerooda t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà da beda bá git Yohanɛɛsa jugu. ¿Ben tii nnii wunaɦ man ɦum bà bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt?» Lee, ɦá ka la bag na ɦà nyaan Yeesua.
42009010	Yeesua tumtba t ŋmɛtgn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu ban da ɦer bii. Wú n ban bá san kpamga ɦɛn l` nyɔɦr n kɔrgu kuugu, bà hoɦ-ku na Betsayidaa.
42009011	Gwɛntaɦ' nidfigm t miig n tag ɦá kaa. Ĥá soɦd-ba n ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt, n ta gbaad bá da ba n bɛɦii bee.
42009012	Jabr nn da jabaa lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee t nyuɦ Yeesua man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «T` ba kpamloŋun. Biir nidfigmii na bá san kpama kɔrnin n kafiin na bà nyaan diit bà di, na bà nyaan dugu bà doot.»
42009013	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Si-n-ba diit n` mɔmba bà di!» Bá ŋmɛl-wu na: «T` ba n kpooni ɦinu n ɦɔlii hireɦ n jaɦ'. ¿Laa bagl na t` san t` daɦ nidfigmii diit le?»
42009014	Daba da ba kan wo bà ta ruuni ɦinu. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Biir-n bà kad gbeɦr gbeɦr kwɛɦnu kwɛɦnu!»
42009015	Bá ɦɛm wo ɦan bed lee, n bɔɦɔɔ bá kad.
42009016	Ĥá lɔgm kpooni ɦinuɦii n ɦɔlii hireɦhii, n vii ɦá nɔnga n faaga ka seeŋa Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n gbeɦm l´ mɛnguu n to ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá raar nidfigmii.
42009017	Baawena t jum n togm, gbeɦa t tɔlm. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t hugl furia kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ n lag n nyab n.
42009018	Goor diir Yeesua da ba kpamga ɦɛn ka seeŋa, ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ba ɦá man. Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿Nidba bɔɦɔɔ mà gwɛɛt na man nnii wenii?»
42009019	Bá leed na: «Biiba bɔɦɔɔ na ven nnii Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa, volba na Ĥeliin, ta volba na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦiin, ɦá himtg kuumn n ka neer.»
42009020	Ĥá ŋmɛt n gbaam-ba na: «Nen de, ¿nii bɔɦɔɔ na man nnii wenii?» Fetra t leed na: «Ven nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.»
42009021	Yeesua t baɦl ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ka venaa-ba nabiir na bá daa biir ɦiiwu gwɛɛtii felaɦ'.
42009022	Ĥá ta lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «L` ba na Nida Budaaga man, mà di kunyɔŋu kɔd. Kpalmmba, n gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba kee bà kir-ma, bà kuu-ma. L` saa, gotaɦrd goor mà himtg.»
42009023	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ nidba bá da ba kan bee na: «Ka ɦii bag na ɦà tagd mà kaa, l` ba na ɦá gwid ɦá ret, ɦà bigd ɦá dabragr gormɛna ka tagd mà kaa.
42009024	Biilm, ɦá bag na ɦà soɦdg ɦà neerm wii, ɦà nan bɔraa-m. L´ saa, ɦá bɔrii ɦá neerm mà kaa wii, ɦà nan soɦda-m.
42009025	Ka nida t yuuŋ tant ɦɛn kwɛgdm mɛnm, ka l` ba na wii mɔma bɔrii ɦà neerm laa ɦà koɦl-m, ¿ɦà way bee?
42009026	Ka ɦii ba n jiwɦi mà kaa n mà gwɛɛt kaa, Nida Budaaga nan ta bɛm n jiwɦi ɦá kaa kan kee kà daan kà jeegun, kà Sawu n ɦà tumtbuudba l´ rekun.
42009027	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na, bá bee nnaɦreen bee huuga, biiba nan kpaa ku ka ban nyaan Saŋgband huraant.»
42009028	Yeesua nn gwɛɛl gwɛɛtii l´ ɦɛm wo yag̈bilmgu lee, ɦá lɔgm Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛswu n Yakooba bá kot duur ɦɛn na ɦá seeŋ.
42009029	Ĥan da seeŋa lee, ɦá nɔnga t lagii beeb, ɦá dimt t feent wasaɦ n ka hawla niini.
42009030	Yelmaa, wú n nidba bareɦba biiba t ka gwɛɛla. L` da ba na Mohiiswu n Ĥelii
42009031	bá daann ka ba n saŋgbambiimn wiinga. Bá n Yeesu bà da bɔɦɔɔ lan nnii ɦan ba ɦà kpi Yerusalɛm ka ɦɛna ɦá ŋmɛɛg̈b lee.
42009032	Fetrwu n ɦà tuurmba bà da gor kpaalee. Ban himtg lee, n yum Yeesuwu ɦà jeegun, n nidba bareɦba bá da jeɦr ɦà man bee.
42009033	Nidbee nn dan n ka nyaba ɦá man lee, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, l` ba hɔm na t` bɛm nanaɦ'. T` ba t` fil sugt ttaɦ': venwu kuyen, Mohiiswu kuyen, Ĥeliiwu kuyen.» –Ĥà da kpaa mi ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii.–
42009034	Ĥan da gwɛɛla welee lee, wadr diir t hoɦntn n fiid-ba, l´ ɦɛm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba fobɛɦgu.
42009035	Noor diir t rɛn wadriin ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wunwii nnii mà Budaaga. Mà roodg-ka. Ĥom-n n kan!»
42009036	Noorii nn gwɛɛl l´ diɦ lee, bá yum Yeesua ba ɦayen. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t hɔrm bá noora n gwɛɛtii ɦan da ba bà man lee wen, bà ba biir ɦiiwu bii ban da nyan bii.
42009037	Toŋu t vɛt, bá hoɦnt duur, nidfigm t tuug Yeesua.
42009038	Nidɦii t rɛn nidfigmiin ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, mà jobla-v! Geedg n mà buga weenn, mà buga kayenga.
42009039	Kunidɦii mugaa-ka, n ka ɦɛna kà mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga ka dama-ka kimm, ka ɦɛna nyafifiit ror n kà noor. Ĥà ɦɛna-ka daddad, ka kpaa saa-ka weem.
42009040	Mà jobl v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá vo kunidwii gwɛntaɦ', bá ka ba bee.»
42009041	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nen, nidbɛɦba bá kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nen! ¿L` ba na mà bɛm n` man kakeɦnan tedaa? ¿L` ba na mà jum-n n kwɛɛwr kakeɦnan tedaa? Daan-ma n v` bugee!»
42009042	Bugee nn da nyuɦna Yeesua man lee, kunidwii t vu-ka kimm. Ĥá gwɛɛl n kunidwii n daat, n gbaad bugee n to-ka ká sa.
42009043	Bá mɛmbee, bá yum Saŋgband gemmnt l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa.
42009044	«Ĥom-n hɔm man bo na mà biir-n gwɛɦma tii! Tii nnii na, bà kee bà mug Nida Budaaga man, bà taag-ma nidba niɦin.»
42009045	Lee, bá ka kpaa ɦum ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii. Saŋgband da ɦera na bá daa miig gwɛɛtii kɔtɔd, na bá daa ɦom. Bá ka ba n fobɛɦgu na bà gbaam-wu lii.
42009046	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t baɦ n ka gbaama taa na bà miig ɦá ba berm bá huuga wii.
42009047	Ĥá miig ban diila tii. Tii lee, ɦá lɔgm bukaaga kiiga, n jeɦl-ka ɦá man,
42009048	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥii ɦà soɦda bugankena mà hidrn wii, mà mɔm nnii ɦan soɦda. L´ saa, ɦá soɦda-ma wii ta soɦda ɦà tamn-ma wii. Biilm, n` huuga ɦii ɦà kpaa lɔg ɦayen na bii wii, wii nnii berma.»
42009049	Yohanɛɛsa t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, t` nyana nidɦii vɔɦd kunidba v` hidrn, t´ ka bo na t` kir n wun na ɦà kpaa ba t` kpaturun.»
42009050	Ĥá leed na: «Daa kir-n n wun! Ĥii ɦá kpaɦ na n` gotii wii ba na n` tuurn.»
42009051	Vuugu nn da taar na Yeesua nyab tant ɦɛn lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na wii ba ɦà san Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
42009052	Ĥá tom nidba ɦá nɔngan. Bá san n jib Samarii kɔrgu kuugun na bà maantr kaalaŋa.
42009053	Wo ɦan da ked Yerusalɛm lee, kɔrguun tiiba t ka ba tii na bà soɦdg-wu.
42009054	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba Yakoobwu n Yohanɛɛs t yum welee n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma! ¿Kpaa sɔkla na t` biir boglam tɛɦr n faaga m` kuu-ba?»
42009055	Ĥá bid ɦayen n bà wee n kpalm-ba gwɛɛtii kaa.
42009056	L´ saa, bá san kɔrjeengun.
42009057	Ban da lɔɔr huru lee, ɦii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Maa mà tagd v` kaa baatea.»
42009058	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Haant ba n t` vadi, ŋmɛnii ba n hì soɦga, Nida Budaaga lee, kee kpaɦ n kaalaŋa ká kan ba kà doot na kà voɦoo.»
42009059	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ vol na: «Tagd mà kaa!» Nidwii t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Si-ma huru mà san mà kuur mà sawu saɦ'!»
42009060	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Saa kpiirmba kugm bá kpiirmba! Ven lee, vii san v` faam Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt.»
42009061	Vola t ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, maa mà tagd v` kaa, lee, si-ma huru mà san mà gwɛɛl n taa reba saɦ'.»
42009062	Ĥá ree n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ĥii ɦá gbaɦnta n ka ko ka bag na ɦà geem n koot wii ba mag na bá ɦee-wu n bii Saŋgband huraantn.»
42010001	Lee n l` kaann, Berma t room nidvolba kwɛɛlbleɦ n bareɦ', n tom-ba ɦá nɔngan bareɦ bareɦ kɔrni mɛnin n kaalai mɛnii ɦá kan da ba ɦà san n ree, ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
42010002	«Dikaɦb ba kɔd koogun, gwɛntaɦ, nidba kpaɦ kɔd na bà lɔg-b. Tii lee, jobl-n dikaɦb tii na ɦá tamn dikaɦlɔgdba ɦà koogun na bá lɔg ɦá dikaɦb.
42010003	Ked-n! Mà tuuma-n wo fɛɛbii diidt huuga.
42010004	Daa mad-n taŋr, laa ruugu, laa nanawda! Daa ta jeɦntm-n n huru na n` seeŋ ɦii!
42010005	Ka n´ jib haar diirn, biir-n saɦ na: ‟Nigiigu bɛm n` man”.
42010006	Ka nigiigu nidɦii ba kan haarii nii, n` nigiigu seeŋbii kpat ɦà man. Ka lag welee, n` seeŋbii ŋmɛtgn n` man.
42010007	Bɛm-n haariin, jum-n ka nyi ban ba bà saɦm-n bii! Ĥá ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b wii, l` ba na ɦá soɦdg ɦà fat. Daa lintgm-n haya!
42010008	Ka n´ jib kɔrgu kuugun bá soɦd-n, dii-n ban ba bà to-n bii!
42010009	Gbaad-n kan kɔrguun bɛɦtiiba, n` biir kan tiiba na Saŋgband huraant nyɔɦra n ban!
42010010	Ka n´ dan n ka jiba kɔrgu kuugun bá ka kpaa soɦda nii, n` jib kan baŋun n` biir na
42010011	bá kɔrgu kwɛku kú mug n` nakpai kuu, n` fɛɛr-ku bá ɦɛn, gwɛntaɦ', bá miim na Saŋgband huraant nyɔɦra n ban.
42010012	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na Saŋgband yaagu yaam goor, Sodoom tiiba kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm tɛgiigu ka yala kɔrgunkuna reku.
42010013	«Korasiin kɔrgu ven, kunyɔŋu nan luura v` ɦɛn! Betsayidaa kɔrgu ven, kunyɔŋu nan luura v` ɦɛn! Ka má da ɦe hoolgu Tiir n Sidoon kɔrnin wo man da ɦer n` huuga lee, nyimlena kɔrnɦiin tiiba t da fid kutukunt dimt n figm bayen toom na l´ werii na bà bagl na bà lagii neerm.
42010014	Tii nnii yaagu yaam goor, Tiir n Sidoon kunyɔŋu nn nan ba kù bɛm tɛgiigu ka yala n` reku.
42010015	L´ saa, Kafarnahuum kɔrgu ven, ¿diila na nan via vyen n faaga kakeɦnan saŋgbambiimnn? Ĥaai! Bà nan hoɦla-v n tiŋa kakeɦnan tiŋrba man.»
42010016	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Ĥá ɦum n nn wii ta ɦuma n man, ɦá kir-n wii ta kir-ma, ɦá kir-ma wii ta kir ɦii ɦà tamn-ma wii.»
42010017	Nidba kwɛɛlbleɦ n bareɦba Yeesua nn da tomr bee t ŋmɛtgn ka ba nyaag̈bn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma! L` lag n kunidba mɛɦ t ka ta vala-t, ka t´ si-ba wad v` hidrn.»
42010018	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Man yum kunidba huraa Saatana tɛɦdgna huuu n faaga, wo toŋu nn ŋmɛdaa myenm ɦɛn lee.
42010019	Ĥom-n! Mà sira-n gemmnt na n` nawdrm waagi n namii, na n` wadrm rafeeda gemmnt mɛnt, bii kpaɦ b` ta ɦɛm-n bɛɦgu.
42010020	Tii lee, daa bɛm-n nyaag̈bn na kunidba vala-n! Bɛm-n nyaag̈bn na bà ɦɔda n` hida saŋgbambiimn!»
42010021	Yelmaa, Voɦoom Buudm t hugl Yeesuwu n nyaag̈b, ɦá ree n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai, mà Sa, saŋgbambiim n tant l` Berma! Mà seeŋa-v na ven ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n werii kaaba vn da kpɛɦdr bermba n rarbiilm tiiba bii. Biilm, mà Sa, ln sɔkl na v` ɦe bii nnii welee.
42010022	«Mà Sa taag wantii mɛntii mà natadn. Ĥii kpaa mi Budaaga man ka l` kpaɦ na mà Sa miil-ma. L´ saa, ɦii ta kpaa mi mà Sa ka l` kpaɦ na Budaaga man, man miil-wu. Ĥii man sɔkl na mà werii-wu mà Sa wii, wii ta miil-wu.»
42010023	Yeesua t bid ɦayen n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba weenn, n bɔɦɔɔ bee bayen na: «Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii nen, nen yu n` reb yu bii!
42010024	Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba kɔd n huraamba kɔd da bagl na bà nyaan n` reb yu bii gwɛntaɦ', bà ba nyaan-b, na bà ɦom n` reb ɦum bii gwɛntaɦ', bà ba ɦom-b.»
42010025	Lee wen, baɦlb weriitɦii t vid n jeɦnt, n ka bo na ɦà feer Yeesuwu kutukŋa, n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿L` ba na mà ɦe ben na mà yuuŋ neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii?»
42010026	Ĥá leed-wu na: «¿L` ɦɔd benwu Mohiisa wadii nii? ¿Kaal wadhiin ka ɦum na laa?»
42010027	Nidwii t leed na: « L` ba na v` sɔklm v` Saberm Saŋgband n v` kwɛɛwr mɛnd, n v` rem mɛnm, n v` gemmnt mɛnt, n v` diila mɛna. L` saa, v` ta sɔklm v` nidtuur wo vn sɔkla v` mɔm vyen lee.»
42010028	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Leedg hɔm. Ĥɛm welee ka bo na v` nan neer!»
42010029	Baɦlb weriitwii t ka bag na ɦà werii na wii nnii nidhɔma, n gbaam Yeesu na: «¿Wen nnii mà nidtuura?»
42010030	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Nidɦii da reda Yerusalɛm n ka hoɦntaa Yerikoo, n san n taŋ n bawdba, bá tiɦd ɦá ɦɛn, n fitr ɦá dimt, n bam-wu, n gbum-wu, ɦá ka hegaa, bá saa-wu hurun n nyab.
42010031	L´ ɦɛm na gotiiɦii da kena n hurɦuu. Ĥá wen nyan nidwii, n ɦagd n koogun, n gɛt ka ked.
42010032	L´ ta ɦɛm na gotiiba tɔrgtɦii ta tagdna huryenɦuu, n dan n taam kaalaŋeen, n geed, n yum nidwii, n ta ɦagd n koogun n gɛt ka ked.
42010033	L´ saa, Samarii tiiɦii t ka ta kena n kan, n taan nid ban gbur n sɔtr nɔt wii man. Ĥá wen nyan-wii, l´ ɦɛm-wu ɦigm biii.
42010034	Ĥá nyuɦii ɦá man, n lo ɦà nɔtn datulm n kpaam, n bɔm dimt. L´ tog, ɦá kal-wu ɦayen ɦà boŋŋa ɦɛn, n san-wu n saanba haarn, n kiigm ɦá jugun.
42010035	Toŋu t vɛt, ɦá ree ɦá ruugun lig̈bkpaŋ̈m mreɦm, n to ɦá kiig saanba haar ɦɛn wii, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Kiigm nidwunwuna jugun hɔm! Ka v´ dan n hewl kan bii, mà daa ŋmɛtgna mà ŋmɛlg-v bii vn hewl bii mà mɔma.”»
42010036	Yeesua nn bed welee lee, n gbaam-wu na: «Nidba bataɦbee huuga, ¿nyan wo wen nnii nid bawdba nn gbur n kɔɦd wii nidtuura?»
42010037	Baɦlb weriitwii t leed na: «Ĥii ɦà ɦer-wu hɔmgu wii.» Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ked v` ta ɦɛm welee!»
42010038	Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ban da ked huru lee, n san n keed kɔrgu kuugun, reekan fɔgɦii t soɦd-wu ɦaa, bà hoɦ-wu na Maarta.
42010039	Fɔg̈wii da ba n nyabɛɛra, bà hoɦ-wu na Maaria, ɦá kad Berma nakpai kwɛɛn n ka kewla bii ɦan da weraa bii.
42010040	Maartwii bidra ɦayen n haaga ŋmɛɛgt, lee, n bid ɦayen n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, mà nyabɛɛra saa má ka ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈bii mɛmbii mayen, ¿l` kpaa bɔɦɔɔ-v liin? Biir-wu na ɦá tɔrg-ma!»
42010041	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Maart ven waa, lɔɔ-ku vyen ka yɔɦwa ŋmɛɛkɔd huuga,
42010042	l` ba na bii byenb beel daɦt. Maaria bantg kaalaŋhɔmga, ɦii kpaa kee ɦà soɦdg-ka ɦà do.»
42011001	Goor diir, Yeesua da ba kaalaŋa kiigan ka seeŋa. Ĥan diɦ lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtɦii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma! Yohanɛɛsa da werii ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ln ba na bá seeŋ̈m lee. Ta werii-t ln ba na t` seeŋ̈m lee!»
42011002	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka n` seeŋa, bɔɦɔɔm-n na: «Taa maara! V` hidr bɛm buudr, v` huraant daan.
42011003	Saɦm-t t` goor diit goor wo goor!
42011004	V` waa-t t` fubɛɦii wo tn waa bá ɦɛna-t bɛɦgu bee mɛmbee lee! Daa saa na t` lɔɔ hoglgan!»
42011005	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tn biir na n` huuga ɦii ba n tuurɦii, ɦá vid tuŋkoɦgu n san tuurwii man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na:
42011006	‟Mà tuura, mà tuurɦii tɛɦdg mà ɦɛn, bii kpaɦ na ɦá di. ¿Kpaɦ v` kɛɛm-ma kpooni ɦitaɦi mɔmi?”
42011007	Ka volwii t leedg-wu ka ba ɦá dugun na: ‟Saa-ma kpooo! Má n mà bii t` fɛtg dootm n gar t` ɦɛn. Mà kpaɦ mà bee mà vidg mà rɛn mà to-v bii.”
42011008	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na ɦà ba ɦà la vidg ɦà to-wu ɦan bag bii mɛmbii. Ka ɦà la ba to-wu na bá tuurntii kaa, ɦá tɔɔ-wu na ɦan sol jiwɦi l´ kaa.
42011009	Man lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na: jam-n, bà si-n! Bag-n, n` nyaan! Koɦoo-n, bà rawdg-n!
42011010	Ĥá jamaa, bá saɦm-wu. Ĥá bagii, ɦá yum. Ĥá koɦaa, bá rawd-wu.
42011011	Ka n` ni ɦii ba na san, ɦá buga t gbaam-wu ɦɔlga, ¿ɦà bag waag̈b ɦà to-ka laa?,
42011012	laa ¿ɦà to-ka namga l` ba na kà gbaama-wu kɔɔleer?
42011013	Ka l` ba na nidbɛɦjɔtnt nen, nii miil n` bii wanhɔmt saɦb de, ¿n` Sa ɦà bee saŋgbambiimn wii, wii nan saɦl biiba bà gbaama-wu Voɦoom Buudm bee lan n jaɦ?»
42011014	Kunida da kad nidɦii ɦɛn, n ɦɛm ɦá kit tantaagua. Yeesua t voom kunidwii, ɦá rorm, n saa nidwii t baɦ n ka gwɛɛla hɔm. L´ ɦɛm nidfigm yɔlaa.
42011015	Biiba t ka bɔɦɔɔ na kunidba huraa Bɦelsebuula sira-wu gemmnt, ɦá ka vɔɦd kunidba.
42011016	Volba t ka bag na bà feer-wu kutukŋa, n gbaam-wu na ɦá ɦe hoolgu kuugu, l` werii na ɦá gemmnt rɛn Saŋgband man.
42011017	Yeesua nn da mi bà diila lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka huraaɦii nidba t radg taa n ka taaw taa hoodr de, ¿huraantii kpaɦ t kpia?, ¿bá haya kpaɦ ɦà lotr taa ɦɛnii?
42011018	N` bɔɦɔɔ na Bɦelsebuula saɦl-ma gemmnt na mà vɔɦd kunidba, ¿laa bee? Ka l` ba na Saatana nidba radg taa, n ka taaw taa hoodrii, ¿lan nnii ɦá huraant nn ba t` neera?
42011019	Ka maa vɔɦd-ba n welee gemmntii, ¿wen t ka saɦ nii kpaturu tiiba gemmnt na bá vɔɦd-ba? Tii lee, bee mɔmba nan weraa na n` ba gokaat.
42011020	Lee, ka l` ba na mà vɔɦda kunidba n Saŋgband gemmnt biilmii, l` weraa na Saŋgband huraant fɛtg n` man daanma!
42011021	Ka nidhaɦrkaɦɦii t lɔg ɦá hoodwant, n ka kiig ɦà haar ɦɛnii, bii kpaɦ b` tarm ɦà kwɛgdm ɦɛn.
42011022	L´ saa, ka nidɦii t daan ka haɦr ka yatg-wu, n bee n jum ɦá jugun, ɦà soɦdg ɦà hoodwant ɦan da ɦigr t` jugun tii, ɦà lɔg bii ɦan da ba n bii mɛmbii ɦà raar nidba.
42011023	Ĥii ɦá kpaa nyɔɦr-ma wii ba na mà rafeedn. Ĥii ɦá kpaa tɔra-ma na t` kpogl wii, ɦà yadran.
42011024	«Ka kunida t riir nida ni, n san n ka yɔɦwa kaalaŋkparmtn ka bag voɦoolaŋa. Wo ɦan ba nyaan kiiga lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦayen na: ‟Maa mà ŋmɛtg mà haar man da red diin.”
42011025	Ĥan bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, n ŋmɛt d´ ni, n mid bá haadr-d n manyii wantii mɛntii.
42011026	Lee wen, ɦá san n bagm kunidvolba balbleɦ', bee ba talmt ka yata-wu. Bá ŋmɛtgii taa kaa n kad haariin. Lee wenii, nidwii neerm t ka ba kunyɔŋu kɔd l` yala nooga.»
42011027	Yeesua nn da bed gwɛɛtii welee lee, fɔgɦii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu ka ba nidba huuga na: «Lamɛɛgu tii nnii fɔg ɦá ɦer v` fuuga n maadm-v n ɦɛɛl-v wii.»
42011028	Ĥá leed na: «Biiba bà ɦum Saŋgband gwɛɛt n ka vala-t bee, bee nnii lamɛɛgu tiiba.»
42011029	Nidba nn da kaada taa Yeesua man lee, ɦá baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Goona nidba kpaɦ hɔm. Bà gbaama na bà nyaan hoolgu kuugu l` werii na mà gemmnt rɛn Saŋgband man. Tii lee, bà kpaɦ bà nyaan kuugu ka l` kpaɦ na weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yonaasa reku n jaɦ'.
42011030	Wo bii b` da ɦer Yonaaswu bii nn da ba na hoolgu Niniiv tiiba nɔngan lee, ta welee nnii bii b´ kee b` ɦe Nida Budaaga ɦɛn bii nn ta ba b` bɛm na hoolgu goona nidba nɔngan.
42011031	Saŋgband yaagu yaam goor, fɔg ɦá da ba huraant Saabaa tantn wii kee ɦà vidg goona daba jugun ɦà tulg-ba gwɛɛt, blaɦb kaa na ɦà rɛn tanvɔgtn na ɦà kewlg Salomoona rarm gwɛɛt. L´ saa, ɦii bee nnaɦ ka yata Salomoona.
42011032	Saŋgband yaagu yaam goor, Niniiv tiiba kee bà vidg goona nidba jugun bà tulg-ba gwɛɛt, blaɦb kaa na Yonaasa da faa-ba Saŋgband gwɛɛt, bá lagii neerm. L´ saa, ɦii bee nnaɦ ka yata Yonaasa.
42011033	«Ĥii kpaa tɔla kand na ɦà kpɛɦdr-d laa ɦà lig-d tɔka kwɛɛn. Bà lila-d n baɦga na bá jibna bee yum wiinga.
42011034	Niini boo gbanu kand. Ka v` niini ba hɔmii, v` gbanɦuu mɛnɦuu t ka ba wiingan. Ka v` niini t koɦlaa, v` gbanɦuu t ka ba nyeetn.
42011035	Tii lee, ɦe hɔm na wiinga ka ba v` gbanun kee daa bɛm na nyeetn!
42011036	Ka welee, v` gbanɦuu mɛnɦuu ba wiingan, v` gbanu riikan kpaɦ nyeetn, ɦú mɛnɦuu kee ɦù bɛm wiingan wo kand wiinga nn ɦɛna n ka wiir-v lee.»
42011037	Yeesua nn gwɛɛl l´ diɦ lee, Farisii tiiɦii t hoɦ-wu na bá san baa bà di diit. Ĥá jib baa n kad diit deb.
42011038	Farisii tiiwii wen nyan na Yeesua bo na ɦà baɦ diit deb ka ba nit wo kowt nn gbaama lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu yɔlaa.
42011039	Berma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpay nn ba, Farisii tiiba nen! N` naada n` kpowdii kaawa n n` sumii kaawa, l` ba na n` kwɛɛwan ba na n` bam ka ɦɛna talmt.
42011040	Joojoont nen! ¿Lag Saŋgband ree bii ban yu biin? ¿Lag dii ta ree bii ban kpaa yu biin?
42011041	Saɦm-n kunyɔŋtiiba bii nn ba n n` wombiin n n` sumiin bii! Lee, l´ mɛnguu bɛm-n n kpelkpel.
42011042	«Farisii tiiba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` lɔgl jivaat t´ ba na jit kuut tii wo budiit dela n rad-t tɔmb kwiɦr, n lɔgm myenm n saɦm Saŋgband. L` ba hɔm gwɛntaɦ', n` hɔŋaa na n` ɦɛm gobiint ɦɛn, ka ta hɔŋaa na n` sɔklm Saŋgband. Yanta tii nnii ln ba na n` ɦɛm-t n ŋmɛɛg̈b ka kpaa hɔŋaa vontii.
42011043	«Farisii tiiba nen, kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn! N` sɔkla na n` kad bermba jarii ɦɛn na bá yum-n Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn, ka sɔkla na bá seeŋ̈m-n n valgm nidba huuga.
42011044	Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` boo bili ban ked ɦì ɦɛn ka kpaa mi na bilin ɦii.»
42011045	Baɦlb weriitɦii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, vn gwɛɛla welee lee, ta suul n t` mɛɦ nnia!»
42011046	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Baɦlb weriitba nen, kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn! N` tula nidba wanjeet, kà kpaa tia na n` tarm n` nabiir mɔmr wantii ɦɛn na n` tɔrg-ba.
42011047	Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn! N` mɔɦl gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba kwɛɛlm bili, l` ba na n` yandaba da kura-ba.
42011048	L` weraa na n` diila na n` yandaba nn da ɦer bii da ba hɔm. Bà da kura gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba, nii t ka mɔɦ bá bili.
42011049	Tii kaa nnii Saŋgband nn da bed rarm gwɛɛt na: ‟Mà kee mà tuun-ba gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba n tumtba, bà nan ba bà kuum bá ni biiba ka mɛdra volba”.
42011050	Tii lee, l` kee l` dar goona nidbee tobr gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba bá yandaba nn da kur bee kaa. Bee nnii, l´ lɔg tant reem
42011051	Ĥabɛɛla kuuŋa daa kakeɦnan Sakarii ban da kur Saŋgband disaku n vit daɦŋa l` huuga wii kuum. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, l` kee l` dar goona nidbee tobr nidba ban kur bee kaa.
42011052	«Baɦlb weriitba nen! Kunyɔŋu nan luura n` ɦɛn. N` lɔgra saabr ban rawda rarm fiid noor n dii. N` ba jib kan n` mɔmba, ka ta kpaa saa na bá bag na bà jib kan bee jib.»
42011053	Yeesua nn da red Farisii tiiwiaa lee, baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba t ɦɛm kwɛɛwweerga, n baɦ n ka jaarŋa-wu ka gbaama-wu gwɛɛt yɔɦyɔɦ'
42011054	ka kpɛɦɛɛ ɦá noor kpamga na ɦá titm gwɛɛt tiit.
42012001	L´ vuuguu, nidba da kpogl taa kɔd n ka ŋmiɦr ka fetra taa nakpai. Yeesua t gwɛɛl n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba saɦ', ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mad-n n̈yen n Farisii tiiba kpoonu ragr. Dii nnii na bà yul volba ret ka saa bá ret.
42012002	Bii b´ ba foɦmgan bii nan ror wiingan. Bii b` ba na bà kpɛɦdrn bii mɛmbii nan ror feelgan.
42012003	Tii kaa nnii n` ret bed nyeetn tii mɛntii, bà kee bà ɦom-t wiingan. Vn nyeera ɦii tobrn dugun ka riw n` ɦɛn tii, bà kee bà toolgm-t n kɔrgu.
42012004	Mà bɔɦɔɔ mà tuurmba nen na, daa solm-n biiba bà kuu nida gbanu n jaɦ bee! Bà ɦɛna welee ka kpaɦ bà bee bà mɔɔg bii ɦɛb.
42012005	Mà ba mà werii-n ln ba na n` solm wii. Solm-n Saŋgband na d` ba d` bee d` ku nida ka ta ba n gemmnt na d` lɔɔlg-wu taabuugun. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n biilm na, dii nnii ln ba na n` solm!
42012006	¿Bà kpaa gweedma kaagŋmɛnbihii hinuhi wadbii hireɦ? Gwɛntaɦ', Saŋgband kpaa hɔŋaa hì ni kiiga.
42012007	D` lag n` juunin jii mɛɦ n kaalm n ka mi hí noor. Lee, daa solm-n fobɛɦgu! N` ba daɦt n yat kaagŋmɛnbihii kɔd.
42012008	«Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na ka ɦii t ree n bɔɦɔɔ nidba nɔngan yaklaa na man heɦl-wii, Nida Budaaga man, mà nan ta ree mà biir saŋgbantumtba nɔngan na man heɦl-wu.
42012009	Lee, ka ɦii t kii nidba nɔngan na ɦà kpaa mii-ma, ta welee nnii Nida Budaaga man, man nan ta kia saŋgbantumtba nɔngan na mà kpaa mii-wu.
42012010	Nid ɦá bɔɦɔɔ Nida Budaaga gwɛɛt bɛɦgu wii, Saŋgband nan waalaa-wu. L´ saa, ɦá suudg Voɦoom Buudm wii, d` nan kpaa waalaa-wu.
42012011	«Bà kee bà san-n n Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn bermba n huraamba n gomna nɔngan. Ban kee bà san-n n lee, n` kwɛɛwa daa toom na: ¿n` ba n` ɦe lan n` riiraa?, laa ¿n` ba n` biir na laa?
42012012	Voɦoom Buudm kee m` werii-n l` wendii mɔmr nn ba n` biir tii.»
42012013	Lee, nidfigm huuga ɦii t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma! Biir mà maar na má n wun t` radg taa kwɛgdm t` sa nn saa-t n mii.»
42012014	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà tuura! ¿Wen lo-ma na mà yaam-n n yaagu, laa mà raarm-n kwɛgdm?»
42012015	Lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥee-n hɔm! Mug-n n̈yen n lig̈biir sɔklb! Lag nida neerm nnii ɦá kwɛgdm, ka ɦà la ba n mn kɔd.»
42012016	Ĥá gwɛɛl-ba n nawdlam na: «Kwɛgdm tiiɦii da ba n koot kɔd, t´ dan n ɦɛm dikaɦb hɔm.
42012017	Ĥá ka diila ka bɔɦɔɔ n ɦà ni na: ‟¿Lan nnii man ba mà ɦea? Mà kpaɦ n kaalaŋa na mà kpɛɦdr mà dikaɦt.”
42012018	Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Ln ba welee lee, maa mà gbuɦ mà buuni, mà yadg-ɦi, mà ɦɛwii ɦì ni mà jɔnt n dikaɦvontii mɛntii.
42012019	Lee wen mà biir mayen na mà ba n dikaɦt kɔd na mà jum kakeɦnan n bina kɔd, maa mà kad ka voɦaa ka ju ka nyi ka nyaaga.”
42012020	Lee, Saŋgband t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Joojooŋunkuna! Nyingunkuna v` neerm ba m` diɦ. Lee wen, ¿wen ba ɦà heɦm n v` dikaɦt vn deegr tii mɛntii?”
42012021	Welee nnii ln ba n ɦii ɦà bag kwɛgdm ɦayen ɦà jugun n jaɦ ka kpaɦ kwɛgdm Saŋgband nɔngan wii.»
42012022	Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Tii kaa nnii man bɔɦɔɔ-n na: Daa kuum-n n̈yen n diila na n` kee n` nyaan tee diit na n` di n` neera, laa dimt na n` yoɦra!
42012023	Biilm, neerm ba daɦt l` yata diit, gbanu ta ba daɦt l` yata dimt.
42012024	Geedg-n n` nyaan kaakaara! Ĥà kpaa buud, ɦà kpaa lɔg dikaɦb, ɦà kpaa doog buunin, gwɛntaɦ lee, Saŋgband doowa-ɦa. ¿N` kpaa ba daɦt kɔd l` yata ŋmɛnii?
42012025	¿N` ni wen ba ɦà ku ɦayen n diila ɦà bee ɦà hewl goor dyend mɔmr ɦà neerm ɦɛn na m´ vɔka?
42012026	Ka n` kpaɦ n` bee n` ɦe bii b` ba jaɦ bii, ¿ben kaan nn kuu n̈yen n diila vontii ɦɛnii?
42012027	Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan kpam moot fiit nn berŋa! T` kpaa ɦɛna bii, t` kpaa ruug dima. Gwɛntaɦ', mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, Salomoona nn da la ba n kwɛgdm kɔd lee, ɦà da kpaɦ n dimhɔma n taam moogu kuyengu fiit.
42012028	Wo Saŋgband nn yoɦ moot t´ ba jana kpam tii dima, l` ba na su bà kee bà kɔɦdg-t bogmn lee, ¿d` kpaa kee d` ɦe nenwu welee l` yatga, nen, n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba gigidgu nen?
42012029	Daa kuum-n n̈yen n diila ka bag hɛruɦ nn kee n` di n nn kee n` nyi bii!
42012030	Bá kpaa seeŋa Saŋgband bee kuudra bayen hɛngu n welee diilɦee. Nen lee, n` Sa bee ka mi nn halwa bii.
42012031	Yaagr-n Saŋgband huraant bag̈b saɦ', l` saa d` si-n bii b` fad-n bii mɛmbii!
42012032	«Nen, nen ba na mà kaa tagdtba nen, daa bɛm-n fobɛɦgu! N` sa sɔkl na ɦà lo-n huraantn.
42012033	Gweedm-n n` want n` lɔg lig̈biirii n` si kunyɔŋtiiba! Mad-n taŋa ɦà kpaa koɦla ɦee! Kolm-n kwɛgdm ka doog saŋgbambiimn! Reekan, m` kpaa kee m` bɔr felaɦ', bawdba kpaa kee bà vɔɦ-m, dindiit ta kpaɦ t` bee t` koɦl-m.
42012034	Nida kwɛgdm kan ba ree, ɦá kwɛɛwr ta ba kan.»
42012035	«Maantr-n n̈yen n` hɔd na n` baɦ ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦɛb, ka haɦlg n` damɦa n` sariin, n tɔl n` kana n ka wiir!
42012036	Bɛm-n wo ŋmɛɛɦeedba bá hɔd bà bermwu bee, ɦá wen kee ɦà riir yaala kasant kaalaŋa ɦà taan ɦà koɦaa, bà rawdg-wu.
42012037	Ŋmɛɛɦeedba bá neer ka hɔd bà berm na laawen nnii ɦan taana bee, bee nnii lamɛɛgu tiiba. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Ĥá wen taana ɦà mid bà neer ka hɔd, ɦà togdg ɦà damr, ɦà wed bà kad, ɦà lɔɔm-ba diit bà ju.
42012038	Ka ɦá taan tuŋkoɦgu, laa l´ gɛtg welee, n mid bà neerii, bee nnii lamɛɛgu tiiba.
42012039	Ĥom-n gwɛɛtntina hɔm! Ka haar tia t miig vuugu bawda nn kee ɦà daan ɦaa kuu, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà saa na bawda daan ɦà gbuɦ ɦá haar.
42012040	Maantr-n n̈yen n` hɔd na Nida Budaaga nan kena waaru nn kpaa diila ɦù ɦɛn ɦuun.»
42012041	Fetra t gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Gwɛɛla nawdlamnmina tii ɦɛn n jaɦ laa, n baawen le?»
42012042	Berma t leed-wu na: «¿Wen nnii ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá ba hɔm ka mi rarm? Wii nnii ɦá berma nn banta na ɦá sugm ɦá haar jugun, ka saɦ diit ŋmɛɛɦeedvolbee, volwu ɦà ret, volwu ɦà ret, l´ wen mag lee wen.
42012043	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii nnii lamɛɛgu tia, ka l` ba na ɦá berma nan kpen ɦà mid ɦà ɦeewr n ŋmɛɛg̈bii n ɦɛb hɔm.
42012044	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Bermwii nan tɔɔ-wu ɦà kɛgt mɛnt na ɦá kiigm t´ ɦɛn.
42012045	Lee, ka ŋmɛɛɦeedwii t diilg n ɦà ni na ɦà berma kpaɦ ɦà kpen weem, lee wen ɦà mug ŋmɛɛɦeedvolbee, daba n fɔg̈ba, ɦà gbum, ka kad ka ju ka nyi l` kuu-wu,
42012046	goor diir, ɦà bermwii nan kpen ɦà mid ɦà kpaa hɔd, ka ta kpaa mi waaru ɦan kpena ɦuu ɦɛn, ɦà dar ɦà tobr kimm, ɦà voo-wu, bà lɔɔlg-wu bá kpaa vala Saŋgband bee kaalaŋa.
42012047	Ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá mi ɦá berma nn sɔkla bii, n ka kpaa ɦɛna b´ ɦɛn wii, bà kee bà gbuu-wu l` ɦom-wu biii.
42012048	L´ saa, ŋmɛɛɦeed ɦá kpaa mi ɦà berma nn sɔkla bii, n ɦɛm bii l´ ka ba na bá gbuu-wii, bà gbuu-wu jaɦ'. Bá reɦa sir kɔd wii, bà nan gbaama-wu kɔd, bá reɦa to kɔd l´ yat wii, bà nan gbaama-wu kɔd l` yatg.»
42012049	«Mà daan n bogm tant ɦɛn, man bagm na nyimlena m` hulwa.
42012050	L` ba na bá hor-ma huurb biib, mà rarm t ka fid mà hɔd na l´ gɛtg weem l` fɛt mà ɦɛn.
42012051	¿N` diila na mà daan n nigiigu tant ɦɛnn? Ĥaai, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na mà daan na mà ɦe na nidba kpalm taa.
42012052	Lɔg jana v` san n nɔngan, hayendn nidba banu kee bà hɛluum taa. Bareɦba hɛluum bataɦba, bataɦba hɛlwa bareɦba.
42012053	Sa kee ɦà hɛluum ɦá kwɛɛla, kwɛɛla hɛlwa ɦá sa. Nya hɛluum ɦá bɛɛra, bɛɛra hɛlwa ɦá nya. Yaag̈ba hɛluum ɦá bufɔga, bufɔga hɛlwa ɦá yaag̈ba.»
42012054	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm na: «N` yul toŋu haawaa n kù kwɛɛn, n´ bɔɦɔɔ na toŋu ba kù ni. Kú ta niim.
42012055	Ka n´ nyaan muunu hɔɦ ka kpaa fug ɦam, n´ bɔɦɔɔ na tulgu ba kù ɦe. Kú ta ɦɛm.
42012056	Nen, nen yu volba ret ka saa net nen, n` bea ka yu b´ ɦɛna tant ɦɛn n saŋgbambiimn bii, ¿lan nnii nn kpaa bea ka yu b´ gɛta gwɛɦma bii?
42012057	«¿Ben kaan nn kpaa miigaa n` mɔmba bii b` ba hɔm bii?
42012058	Ka ɦii t sam-v huraa, n´ lɔɔm huru taa kaa, n ka ked yaagu yaalaŋa, l` ba na v` ɦe na v´ n wun n` ɦom n taa saɦ ka nyi ba hurun ka ban taai, ka sol na ɦá daa da ɦà taag-v yaagu yaada nuɦun, wii taag-v tawdba nuɦun, l` saa bee riw-v sarga.
42012059	Mà fɛda-v na, nan kpaa ror sargeen kakeɦnan v` daa nan faad v` fɔmr mɛnd.»
42013001	L´ vuuguu, nidba t daan Yeesua man, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu Galilee tiiba Filaata nn da wed bá kuum bá ɦeewr n Saŋgband n vidb bee gwɛɛt.
42013002	Yeesua t leed-ba na: «Ka Filaata t wed bá kuum-ba welee de, ¿n` diila na bee nnii fubɛɦtibermba l` yata Galilee tiiba volbee laa?
42013003	Lag welee! Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n, ka n` ba lagii neermii, n` kee n` ta kpiidr n` mɛmbee wo ban kpiidr lee.
42013004	L` saa, nidba kwiɦr n baniindba Siloowa disagsemgu nn da hadg n luurm n wadr bá kuum bee, ¿n` diila na bee da koɦl n yat Yerusalɛm kɔrgu tiiba volbee laa?
42013005	Lag welee! Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n, ka n` ba lagii neermii, n` kee n` kpiidr n` mɛmbee wo ban kpiidr lee.»
42013006	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá gwɛɛl-ba nawdlamnmina na: «Nidɦii da hoowra feega ɦà koogun, n dan n san na ɦà tɔɔ feem, n mid ká ba rɔn.
42013007	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ nid ɦan lo na ɦá maantrm kooguu wii na: ‟Ĥiluu v` nyaana! Bina ɦataɦ nnanaɦ man kena na mà tɔɔ feem feegankenan ka kpaa yu bii. Luug-ka! ¿Ben kaa nnii kan soɦdg kaalaŋa yemii?”
42013008	Ĥá maantra kooguu wii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Berma, saa-ka dona! Maa mà ti vadb mà kaadg, mà lo buranbint,
42013009	ka tiit, kakeɦnan daanɦee, kà ba kà rɔn. Ka ká dan n ka ba rɔnaa, v` luug-ka.”»
42013010	Saabaat goor diir, Yeesua da weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku kuugun.
42013011	Fɔgɦii da ba kan ka ba n bɛɦii, l` ba na l` ɦera bina kwiɦr n ɦaniind kunidɦii nn da fod ɦà kaawr ɦá ka kpaa bea na ɦà vidg tiɦ'.
42013012	Yeesua wen nyan-wii, n hoɦ-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Taa nya! V` bɛɦii gbaadn.»
42013013	Ĥan bed welee lee, n ɦig ɦá ɦɛn ɦá niɦi, yelmaa ɦá vid tiɦ', n baɦ n ka nyɔka Saŋgband.
42013014	Lee wen, l´ weer kpoglb disakuu berm na ben nnii Yeesua nn gbaad nidwu Saabaat goor. Ĥá yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ nidba bá da ba kan bee na: «Goora ɦaroond beeln, l` ba na bá ɦɛm ɦee ni ŋmɛɛg̈b. Ka n` bag, n` kenm welee goorɦeen bà gbaadaa-n, lag na Saabaat goor.»
42013015	Berma t leed ɦá gwɛɛtii ɦɛn na: «Rarbɛɦm tiiba nen! Saabaat goor, baawena baɦda ɦà dɔm na m´ san m` nyi nyaalm, ¿laa laa?
42013016	Lee, fɔg̈wunwuna, Ĥabrahaama yakiigankena, Saatana baɦ-ka sarga bina kwiɦr n ɦaniind nnanaɦ', ¿ln kpaɦm na bá baɦdg-ka sargeen Saabaat goor laa?»
42013017	Gwɛɛt Yeesua nn da leedg tii t´ tul ɦá rafeedbee jiwɦi. L´ saa nidfigm lee, mii nyaaga n ŋmɛɛbermt ɦan da ɦɛna tii mɛntii.
42013018	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Saŋgband huraant tɔn bee? ¿Mà ba mà tɔnii-t n ben lee?
42013019	T` tɔna gumsarbiir nida nn buud dii. Biirii t rorm n kit tiib, ŋmɛnii t ka ɦɛna hí soɦga b´ huliitn.»
42013020	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Mà ba mà tɔnii Saŋgband huraant n ben lee?
42013021	T` tɔna kpoonu ragr fɔga nn lɔg n sɔdm n ɦá kpooni joom gaanbilmun, n ham, tɛɛgtii mɛntii t´ dan n fuur lee.»
42013022	Yeesua da baɦ huru na ɦà san Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Ĥan da kedaa lee, n ka keeda kɔrnin n kafiin ka weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
42013023	Nidɦii t gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Nidkaalkaɦba n jaɦ' nnii Saŋgband nn kee d` daɦ bá juuni laa?» Ĥá leed-ba na:
42013024	«Jaarŋ-n n̈yen na n` jib n fiid d´ ba fɛfɛgŋa dii! Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na, nidba kɔd kee bà bagm na bà jib ka kpaa bea.
42013025	Haar berma nn kee ɦà vidg ɦà riw huturu ɦà gar lee, n` kpat bal, n` baɦ n` gbum huturu ka hoɦ na: ‟Berma! Rawdg t` jibn!”. Ĥà leedg-n na: ‟Mà kpaa mi n` kan manan.”
42013026	Lee, n` biir-wu na: ‟T´ n vn t` da jul ka nyi, v` weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt t` kɔrgun.”
42013027	Ĥà lil-n bɔɦɔɔb na: ‟Mà kpaa mi n` kan manan. Nyab-n mà man n` san vɔkun, nen, n` mɛmba nen ɦɛna bɛɦgu nen.”
42013028	Nn kee n` nyaan Ĥabrahaamwu n Yisɦaakwu n Yakoobwu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba mɛmba, bà ba Saŋgband huraantn, l´ kɔɦdg nenwu kankaa lee, n` kom reekan ka duum n` nyina.
42013029	Nidba kee bà rɛn n baatee, lɔg toŋu kwɛɛn kakeɦnan kù faaga bà kad diit delaŋa Saŋgband huraantn.
42013030	Welee lee, bá ba gwelŋa kaawrba bee ni biiba nan kita noogrba, l` saa bá ba gwelŋa noogrba bee ni biiba nan kita kaawrba.»
42013031	L´ vuuguu, Farisii tiiba biiba t nyuɦ Yeesua man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nyab nanaɦ'! San jeenlaŋa na Ĥerooda bo na ɦà kuu-v!»
42013032	Ĥá leed-ba na: «San-n n` biir rargɔɦlga tiiwii na: ‟Mà vɔɦda kunidba, ka gbaadaa nidba jana n su, gotaɦrd goor mà fɛlg mà ŋmɛɛg̈b.
42013033	Gwɛntaɦ', l` ba na mà baɦr mà huru jana n su n suvɛtr, blaɦb kaa na l` kpaɦ na bá ku gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦiiwu jeenlaŋa, ka l` kpaɦ na Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.”
42013034	«Yerusalɛm tiiba nen! Nen, nen kuu gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nen! Nen, nen lɔd tana ka kuu biiba Saŋgband nn tamna n` man nen! ¿Tɔmb mlan nnii man sɔkl na mà kpogl-n mà man, wo kɔrga nn kpogla ká kɔrbit ká bagt kwɛɛn lee?, n´ ka la ba tii.
42013035	Tii lee, Saŋgband ba d` gwid n` kɔrgu kaawr. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n biilm na n` nan kpaa yuu-ma kakeɦnan vuugu nn nan ba n` bɔɦɔɔm na: Saŋgband kaawl ɦii ɦà kena d` hidrn wii ɦɛn.»
42014001	Saabaat goor diir, Yeesua t san Farisii tiiba huraaɦiaa na ɦà di diit. Bá da ba kan bee t ka kiig-wu hɔm.
42014002	Nidɦii ta ba kan, ka kad ka yaagr Yeesua ka ba n ɦahimr bɛɦii, ɦà gbanu t fuur duɦ'.
42014003	Yeesua t yaɦd ɦá noor, n gbaam baɦlb weriitba n Farisii tiiba na: «¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá gbaad bɛɦtiiɦiiwu Saabaat goor, laa b` kpaa saɦ huru le?»
42014004	Bá kpat n ka hen belbel. Lee wen, ɦá vii bɛɦtiiwii n gbaad-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá kuliim.
42014005	L´ tog, ɦá gbaam bá da kiig-wu bee na: «Ka n` ni ɦii buga, laa ɦá naag̈b t lɔɔ lɔkun, l` ba Saabaat goor, ¿ɦà kpaɦ ɦà ree bugee laa naag̈bii yelmaa?»
42014006	Bá ka ba bee na bà leedg-wu gwɛɛtii jugun.
42014007	Yeesua t yum na ban da hoɦr na bá di diit bee baala kaalaŋbermii ka kadaa. Ĥá gwɛɛl n bà mɛmbee nawdlam na:
42014008	«Ka bá hoɦ-v yaala kasant man, daa bantg kaalaŋbermga v` kad. Ka tiit, bà ta hoɦii nidhɔmɦii ɦá yatg-v.
42014009	Ĥii ɦà hoɦ n` reɦdrbee wii wen kenaa, ɦà biir-v na: ‟Vidg v` saa wunwii n kaalaŋankena!” Lee wen, v` vidg n jiwɦi, v` san v` kad kaalaŋkaawrgan.
42014010	Lee, ka bá hoɦ-v kasant man, san v` kad kaalaŋkaawrgan, ka bo na, ɦii ɦá hoɦ-v wii nn kee ɦà daan lee, ɦà biir-v na: ‟Mà tuura, vidg v` daan bermba kaalaŋa!” Lee wen lee, l` jeeŋl-v nidba v´ n bà n` kad diit delaŋa bee nɔngan.
42014011	Ĥá kola ɦayen n faaga wii, bà nan hoɦla-wu n tiŋa, l´ saa ɦá hoɦla ɦayen n tiŋa wii, bà nan kola-wu n faaga.»
42014012	Yeesua t ta bɔɦɔɔ nid ɦá da hoɦ-wu na ɦá di diit wii na: «Ka v´ dig diit muunun laa jabr na v` si nidbaa, daa hoɦ v` tuurmba laa, v` teelba laa, v` daɦŋan tiiba laa, kwɛgdm tiiba bá nyɔɦr n v` haar bee. Ka v´ hoɦ-ba bá jumaa, bà da bà ta hoɦ-v bá haya bà ŋmɛlg-v vn da sir-ba bii.
42014013	Lee, ka v´ dig kasant diit na v` si nidbaa, v` hoɦ katɛdtiiba n balmdindmba n kparuuba n joomba.
42014014	Lee wen, l` bɛm-v lamɛɛgu na, bà kpaɦ bà bee bà ŋmɛlg-v vn da sir-ba bii. L´ saa, Saŋgband nn nan himaa hɔmba kuumn lee, d` ŋmɛlg-v bii vn da sir bii.»
42014015	Nidba bá da ju diit bee nn ɦomr gwɛɛt Yeesua nn bed tii lee, bá huuga bilma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦii ɦá nan ba ɦà jum diit Saŋgband huraantn wii.»
42014016	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu nawdlamnmina na: «Nidɦii da bo na ɦà di kasant n hoɦm nidba kɔd.
42014017	Kasant goorii nn dan n taan lee, ɦá tom ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeed na ɦá biir ɦan da hoɦ bee na bá daan na diit biiran.
42014018	Bá mɛmbee t baɦ n ka ŋmɛta kaawr ɦayen ɦayen. Noogra t bɔɦɔɔ ŋmɛɛɦeedwii na: ‟Hai ɦo! Mà daɦra kpamb, l` ba na mà san mà ɦiluu-b. Mà kpaɦ mà bee mà daan.”
42014019	Vola t bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Hai ɦo! Mà daɦra naagi kwiɦr, mà keda mà magii-ɦi n kpaab mà nyaan. Mà kpaɦ mà bee mà daan.”
42014020	Taɦra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Mà ɦera yaala l` ban hiidg. Mà kpaɦ mà bee mà daan.”
42014021	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii t ŋmɛtgii ɦá berma man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu ban bed tii. Bermwii t lo kwɛɛwweerga n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟San weem kɔrgu yakun n hurin, v` daan n katɛdtiiba n balmdindmba n joomba n kparuuba!”
42014022	L´ mɔɔ jaɦ', ɦá ŋmɛtgn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Berma, mà ɦera wo vn bed lee, gwɛntaɦ' kaalant t la tɔlm.”
42014023	Bermwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟San kafinbiin n kpamnahurin, v` hoɦ nidba ka tidr-ba na bá daan taa saɦ na mà haar hugl!
42014024	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na: Man hoɦ nooga bee ni ɦii kpaɦ ɦà lɛm mà diit felaɦ'.”»
42014025	Yeesua da keda n huru, nidfigm tagd ɦà kaa. Ĥá bid ɦayen n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
42014026	«Ĥii ɦà tagd mà kaa wii, l` ba na ɦá sɔklm-ma l` yata ɦá sa laa, ɦà nya laa, ɦà fɔg laa, ɦà bii laa, ɦà teeldaba laa fɔg̈ba. L` ba na ɦá sɔklm-ma l` yata ɦá mɔma. Ka lag welee, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà bɛm mà gwɛɛt soɦdgta.
42014027	Ĥii ɦá kpaa bigd ɦà dabragr ka tagd mà kaa wii, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà bɛm mà gwɛɛt soɦdgta.
42014028	Ka n` huuga ɦii bo na ɦà mɛɦ disag̈bermguu, ɦá kad saɦ n ɦiluu na kù ba kù di lig̈biir ɦalaa, ka bag na ɦà nyaan na mii na lig̈biir taara-wu wo ɦá mɛɦ-ku kù diɦa.
42014029	Ka l´ ɦe wo lig̈biir ba ta, ɦá nyag yem n kool bobogr n ka ba bee na ɦà mɛɦ kù diɦaa, biiba bá ba bà nyaan welee bee mɛmbee ba bà laɦm-wu,
42014030	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Nidwunwuna nyag yem na ɦà ba ɦà mɛɦ disaku n ka ba bee na ɦà diɦ kù mɔɦb.”
42014031	Ta yenmii, ka huraaɦii ba n tawdba ruuni kwiɦr, n ka bo na ɦà teew hoodr n ɦà hurtuura, wii ba n tawdba ruuni kwɛɛrɛɦ, ɦá kad saɦ n ɦiluu na mina ɦà ba ɦà bee ɦà lɔg tawdba ruuni kwiɦrɦii ɦà tuugiim ɦá rafeed ɦà ba n tawdba ruuni kwɛɛrɛɦ wii laa.
42014032	Ka ɦá nyaan na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà beaa, ɦá lɔgm nidba balanba, n tom-ba na bá tuugii ɦà hurtuurwii, ɦà nyi baa vɔkun, bá jobl-wu na ɦá saa hoodr gwɛɛt, na bà ɦom n taa, nigiigu bɛm bá huuga.»
42014033	Yeesua t fɛl na: «Welee nnii ln ba, n` huuga ɦii ɦá ba gwid ɦà want mɛnt kaawr wii, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà bɛm mà gwɛɛt soɦdgta.»
42014034	«Yaarm nnii bii hɔmb. Ka yaarm lamɛɛgu t riir, ¿ɦii ba ɦà bee ɦà ŋmɛlg-m-ku?
42014035	Lee wen, m´ ta kpaɦ na bá ɦee-m n bii. M` ta kpaɦ na bá lo-m tantn laa, tanfontrn. L´ ka ba na bá vaa-m duun. Ka ɦii ban tobɦa na ɦà ɦomaa, ɦá kewlg hɔm!»
42015001	Lambɦu soɦdgtba n fubɛɦtiiba volba da san Yeesua man na bà kewlg ɦà noon gwɛɛt.
42015002	Farisii tiiba n baɦlb weriitba t ka nyeera taa ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna soɦda fubɛɦtiiba hɔm, wú n ban bà ju diit taa man.»
42015003	Lee wen, ɦá gwɛɛl-ba nawdlam na:
42015004	«Ka n` ni ɦii ba n fɛi lɛmu, kuyengu t boorm, ¿ɦà kpaɦ ɦà saa fɛi kwɛɛwɛɦ n ɦiwɛɦ ɦí tɛl ɦii kiimgwiɦiirn, ɦà san kù bɔd kuu bag̈b kakeɦnan ɦá wen kee ɦà nyaan-ku?
42015005	Ĥá wen yuu-ku, n ka nyaaga biii. Ĥá big-ku ɦá bagt ɦɛn,
42015006	n kulii n kun, n hoɦm ɦá tuurmba n ɦà huugan tiiba, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: ‟Tɔrg-n-ma nyaag̈b! Mà nyana mà fɛɛgu kú da bɔd kuu.”
42015007	Ta yenmii, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, ka fubɛɦtii ɦayenɦa t lagii neerm, nyaag̈bermb nan ba b` bɛm saŋgbambiimn l` yatg ln ba na bá nyaagm nidhɔmba kwɛɛwɛɦ n bawɛɦba man lee, blaɦb kaa, bà fɛtg neerm lagiib.
42015008	«Laa mina, ka fɔgɦii ba n sika lig̈bkpaŋ̈m kwiɦr, myenm t boorm, ¿ɦà kpaɦ ɦà tɔlg kand, ɦà haadr ɦà haar, ɦà bag hɔm, kakeɦnan ɦá wen kee ɦà nyaan-m?
42015009	Ĥá wen yuu-m, ɦá hoɦm ɦá tuurnfɔg̈ba, n ɦà huugan tiiba, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: ‟Tɔrg-n-ma nyaag̈b! Mà nyana mà sika lig̈bkpaŋ̈m m´ da bɔd mii.”
42015010	Ta yenmii, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, ka fubɛɦtii ɦayenɦa t lagii neerm, nyaag̈b t ka ba saŋgbantumtba huuga.»
42015011	Yeesua t lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Nidɦii da ba n kwɛɛlba bareɦ'.
42015012	Kwɛɛlkaawii t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá sa na: ‟Taa maara, radg-t v` want v` to-ma mà kaalaŋa!” Tii lee, sawii t raarm n to ɦá kwɛɛlbee reɦdrbee.
