42015013	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaann, kwɛɛlkaawii t gweedm ɦá want n lɔgm lig̈biir n nyab kɔrvɔku kuugun. Reekan, ɦá yadr ɦá lig̈biir ka neer neerbɛɦm, lig̈biirii t diɦ.
42015014	Ĥan diir d´ diɦ lee, kɔmbermm miim t rorm kɔrguun, ɦá ka kpaa mi ɦan ba ɦà di bii.
42015015	Ĥá san kɔrguun tiiɦii man n ka ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b na ɦà nyaan ɦà di. Nidwii t lo-wu kpam na ɦá kiigm ɦafaant ɦɛn.
42015016	Kɔm t kuum-wu kɔd ɦá ka bag na ɦà di ɦafaant diit, gwɛntaɦ' ɦii kpaa saɦ-wu.
42015017	Tii lee, ɦá baɦ n ka diila ɦan neer lee, l` ba na ɦá sa ŋmɛɛɦeedbee mɛmbee jul ka tog diit tɔl, lee, wii ba nanaɦ ka ku n kɔm.
42015018	Lee, ɦà ba ɦà nyab ɦà ŋmɛtgii ɦà sa man ɦà biir-wu na: ‟Hai, mà sa! Mà ɦera-v n Saŋgband n fubɛɦga,
42015019	mà kpaa tɔn na v` hoɦm-ma na v` buga. Lɔg-ma wo v` ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii!”
42015020	Ĥá vid na ɦà ŋmɛtgii ɦà sa man. Ĥan da nyuɦaa n haar lee, ɦá sa t yum-wu, l´ ɦɛm-wu ɦigm kɔd, ɦá solm n tuug-wu n ɦog-wu n haruu-wu.
42015021	Kwɛɛlwii t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá sa na: ‟Hai, mà sa! Mà ɦera-v n Saŋgband n fubɛɦga, mà kpaa tɔn na v` hoɦm-ma na v` buga.”
42015022	Lee, ɦá sa t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba na: ‟Daan-n weem n tugvɔvɔku kú ba kwɛɛlm kuu n` fid-wu! Lo-n nabtorga ɦà nabiirn, n` daan n nanawda n` fid-wu!
42015023	Daan-n n naabibiɦgu n` ku, t` di kasanbermt!
42015024	Mà kwɛɛlwunwuna da kpiiran, ɦà himtgn. Ĥà da bɔdan, mà nyana-wu.” Bá baɦ kasant deb nyaag̈bn.
42015025	Lee wen, daawwii kwɛɛlberma baa kpam. Ĥan dan n ka kpena n ka nyuɦna haaga lee, n ɦom bina gbuut n hamt.
42015026	Ĥá hoɦ ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii n gbaam-wu na: ‟¿Ben bee?”
42015027	Ŋmɛɛɦeedwii t leed-wu na: ‟V` nyakwɛɛla kpenn, lee, v` sa t kuum naabibiɦgu na ɦà kpen ka kpaɦ n bɛɦii.”
42015028	Kwɛɛlberma t lo kwɛɛwweerga n kirm na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà jib haaga. Ĥá sa t rɛn n ka jobla-wu na ɦá jib haaga.
42015029	Lee, kwɛɛlwii t leed ɦá sa na: ‟Kewlg! L` ɦera bina kɔd man ɦɛna-v ŋmɛɛg̈b. Mà ban kir v` gwɛɛt tiit. Ban si-ma burgu mɔmgu na má n mà tuurmba t` di kasant.
42015030	Gwɛntaɦ', v` kwɛɛlwunwuna nn diir v` kwɛgdm wú n yerm tiiba n kpen lee, v´ kuum-wu naabibiɦgu.”
42015031	Sa t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Mà buga! Vii ba mà man kakeɦnan. Man heɦ bii mɛmbii ba na v` rebn.
42015032	V` nyakwɛɛlwunwuna lee, wii da kpiiran, ɦà himtgn. Ĥà da bɔdan, mà nyana-wu. ¿Lan nnii tn kpaɦ t` di kasanhɔmt ka ba nyaag̈b nii?”»
42016001	Yeesua t ta bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Kwɛgdm tiiɦii da ba n ɦà kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagda. Bá dan n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagdwii yadra ɦà kwɛgdmii.
42016002	Berma t hoɦ-wu, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟L` boo mà ɦuma bà bɔɦɔɔ v` ɦɛn lii. Werii-ma lan nnii vn kiigr mà want ɦɛn lee, l´ kɔtɔd na ta kpaɦ v` kiigm mà kwɛgdm ɦɛn.”
42016003	Kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagdwii t diil n ɦà ni na: ‟Mà berma ba ɦà voo-ma ŋmɛɛg̈bn. ¿Maa mà ɦɛm bɛ? Mà kpaɦ n kwɛgdi na mà koom, l´ saa, ka mà jamaa, jiwɦi mad-ma.
42016004	Gwɛɦŋa mà miig man ba mà ɦe na ka má dan n bɔrii mà kaalaŋaa, nidba soɦdg-ma bà hayan lee.”
42016005	Ĥan diilg welee lee, n hoɦm biiba bà diir ɦá bermwu fɔmr bee mɛmbee ɦayen ɦayen, n gbaam noogr na: ‟¿Diir mà bermwu fɔmr ɦalaa?”
42016006	Ĥá leed-wu na: ‟Baŋkpaam girkpant lɛmu.” Kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagdwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Kpay v` wadga! Kad weem, v` ɦɔr na girkpant kwɛɦnu!”
42016007	L´ saa ɦá gbaam vol na: ‟Ven de, ¿diir fɔmr ɦalaa?” Wii t bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Jowa kutukɦi lɛmu.” Kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagdwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Kpay v` wadga! Ĥɔr na kwɛɦniind!”
42016008	Berma t jaɦr kwɛgdm ɦɛn sagdbawdwii ɦá rarm ɦan ɦer mii kaa. Biilm, biiba bá ba na tant heɦl n ban bee, bà ba n rarm bá want madmn taa bayen bà huuga l` yata biiba bá ba na wiinga heɦl n ban bee.»
42016009	Yeesua t hewl na: «Man lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na, lɔgm-n tantntina kwɛgdm ka ɦɛna tuurmba, ka bo na m` daa diɦaa n nnaa, bà soɦdgm-n haya ɦà bee kakeɦnan ɦeen!
42016010	Ĥii ɦà mi wankaat madm hɔm wii, ɦà ta miil wanbermt madm. Ĥii ɦà kpaa mi wankaat madm wii, ɦà ta kpaa mi wanbermt madm.
42016011	Ka n` kpaa mi tantntina ɦɛn kwɛgdm madm, ¿wen nan bea ɦà to-n gobiint kwɛgdmii?
42016012	L´ saa, ka n` kpaa mi vola kwɛgdm madm, ¿wen nan tɔɔ-n nii mɔmba n` rem?
42016013	Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà bɛm bermba bareɦba yuuma. Ĥà ba ɦà kirm vol ka sɔkla vola, laa ɦà nawr n vol ka kir vola. N` kpaɦ n` bee n` tagd Saŋgband kaa ka ta tagd lig̈biir kaa.»
42016014	Wo Farisii tiiba nn da sɔkla lig̈biir gwɛɛt lee, bá ɦom gwɛɛtii n ka laɦ Yeesua.
42016015	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` ɦɛna na nidba bɔɦɔɔm na n` ba hɔm, Saŋgband mi b´ ba n` kwɛɛwan bii. Nida nn geewa na bii bermb bii, Saŋgband geewa-b l` kpaa tɔn.
42016016	«Mohiiswu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadii vuugu da hiidg kakeɦnan Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa wen. Ĥá daanmii n jaɦ, bá ka faa Saŋgband huraant Gohɔmt, nidba t ka bag n gemmnt na bà jib t` ni.
42016017	Saŋgbambiim n tant ba t` bɔr l` kpaɦ gemm ka ta baɦlbn gwɛɛgu kuyengu nn ba kù bɔr lee.
42016018	«Ka daawɦii t vo ɦá fɔg n lɔgm fɔgjeena, ɦà kitg yaruutgu. Ĥii ɦà lɔgr fɔg ban voor wii, wii ta kitg yaruutgu.
42016019	«Kwɛgdm tiiɦii da bee ka yoɦ daɦt dimhɔma hɛna, ka ju kasanbermt gormɛna.
42016020	Kunyɔŋtiiɦii ta bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Lasaara. Ĥá san n ka door kwɛgdm tiiwii fiid noon, ka ba n nɔt ɦà gbanu ɦɛn hɛduɦ'.
42016021	Ĥà da bagl wo ɦà jum diit t´ da tɛɦra dakwɛgtiiwii tiŋa tii, gwɛntaɦ' ka kpaa bea, lee gwɛi da kena ka lɛntra ɦà nɔtn.
42016022	Kunyɔŋtiiwii t kuum. Saŋgbantumtba t ɦɔgd-wu, n san-wu n Ĥabrahaama nyakɔgrgun. L´ saa kwɛgdm tiiwii t ta kuum. Bá kuur-wu,
42016023	ɦá hoɦnt tiŋrba man, n ka ju kunyɔŋu. Ĥan ju kunyɔŋu lee, n dan n vii ɦá nɔnga, n geedgii vɔkun n yum Ĥabrahaama, Lasaara ba ɦá nyakɔgrgun.
42016024	Lee wen, ɦá mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga ka toola Ĥabrahaam na: ‟Mà sa! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu, v` tom Lasaar na ɦá taɦg nyaalnigiim ɦà nabiir noon, ɦà sool mà gelmga ɦɛn kà ɦe nigiigu. Mà jul kunyɔŋu biii boglamnminan.”
42016025	Ĥabrahaama t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Mà buga! Deedg na da soɦdg kwɛgdm kɔdgu v` neermn, l´ saa Lasaarwii t jum kunyɔŋu biii. Gwɛɦŋa lee, ɦá kwɛɛwr doot nnaɦ', ven lee, vii ba kunyɔŋun.
42016026	L´ saa, vadkilmgu kuugu radg t´ n nn t` huuga. Huru kpaɦ na biiba riir t` man bà daan n` kan ba ree, laa biiba riir n` man, bà daan tii kan ba ree.”
42016027	Kwɛgdm tiiwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Mà sa, ka l` ba welee, mà jobla-v na v` tom Lasaarwu mà sa haarn,
42016028	mà teelba ba kan banu. Ĥá san ɦà baɦl-ba, ka bo na bá daa nan ta daan taabuugunkunan.”
42016029	Ĥabrahaama t leed-wu na: ‟V` teelbee ba n Mohiiswu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da ɦɔd bii, l` ba na bá ɦom n ban.”
42016030	Kwɛgdm tiiwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Lag welee, taa maara! Ka tiŋrɦii t riir n ŋmɛt bá man n bɔɦɔɔ-baa, lee wen, baa bà lagii neerm.”
42016031	Reekan, Ĥabrahaama t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Ka bà ba ɦom n Mohiiswu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba, ka kpaɦrɦii t la rɛn n bɔɦɔɔ tetii, bà kpaɦ bà kewlg n wun felaɦ'.”»
42017001	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Bii la ba b` bɛm ka ɦɛna na nidba gwidiim Saŋgband kaawr. Bɛɦgu nan luura ɦii ɦà ɦɛna welee wii ɦɛn.
42017002	Ĥii ɦà kee ɦà ɦe welee wii, l` mag n wun na bá lilg neer ɦá lakpandn bà lɔɔlg-wu nyaamn, n ɦá nn ba ɦà ɦe na kaaba bá tia mà gwɛɛt ɦɛn bena ni ɦii gwid Saŋgband kaawr lee.
42017003	Tii lee, mug-n n̈yen! «Ka v` teela t koɦl-v n gwɛɛt, hoɦ-wu v` gbaam-wu! Ka ɦá biir-v na ɦà koɦln, v` lɔg v` waa-wu.
42017004	Ka ɦá koɦl-v n gwɛɛt tɔmb mlbleɦ gobilmrn, n ka ŋmɛtgna welee hɛngu ka bɔɦɔɔ-v na: ‟Mà koɦln”, v` lɔg v` waa-wu.»
42017005	Yeesua tumtba da beda-wu na: «Berma, hewl-t gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim!»
42017006	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ka nn bɛm n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim m´ berŋ gumsarbiir dela, nn ba n` bee n` biir tiibnbina na: ‟Vogdg vyen v` san v` hoow vyenwu nyaamn!” Tiibii ɦe nn gbaam bii.»
42017007	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tn biir na n` ni ɦii ba n ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii ɦà koo-wu kpamb, laa ɦà kiima-wu fɛi. Ĥá dan n yum ɦà kpena kpam, ¿ɦà ba ɦà biir-wu na ɦá daan weem ɦà kad ɦà di diit?
42017008	¿Laa, ɦà ba ɦà biir-wu na ɦá dig-wu diit, ɦà fid dimjeengu, ɦà lɔɔm-wu ɦà ju ka nyi le? Na ka ɦá di n diɦaa, wii ta kad ɦà jum ka nyi.
42017009	¿Ĥà kee ɦà ŋmɛtg ɦà nyɔkm-wu ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦan bed ɦá ɦɛm bii kaa? Ĥaai!
42017010	Ta nenii, l` ba yenmii. Nn kee n` ɦe ban bed na n` ɦe bii l` diɦ lee, n` biir na: ‟Ten nnii ŋmɛɛɦeedyemtiiba, t` ɦera ban bed na t` ɦe bii n jaɦ'.”»
42017011	Yeesua da lɔɔra huru n ka kedaa n Yerusalɛm weenn, ka tagd Samarii n Galilee l´ faaŋu.
42017012	Ĥan san n ka nyuɦaa kɔrgu kuugu lee, bolmba kwiɦr t tuugn-wu, n jeɦnt dodgan,
42017013	n baɦ n ka mɔɔ ka toola-wu na: «Berm Yeesu! Nyaan t` kunyɔŋu!»
42017014	Ĥá yum-ba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «San-n n` werii n̈yen gotiiba» Ban baɦ huru n ka ked lee, bá bolmt t gbaad.
42017015	Bá ni bilma nn nyan na l` gbaad-wu lee, ɦá ŋmɛtgn ɦá nakpain ka nyɔka Saŋgband ka toola kimm,
42017016	n taai n luurm Yeesua tiŋa, ɦà nɔnga baɦr tant ɦɛn, n seeŋ-wu na wii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b. Nidwii da ba na Samarii tiin.
42017017	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Ndee l` gbaad bà kwiɦlmbee, laa laa? ¿Bawɛɦba volbee ba tee?
42017018	Saanwunwuna kaann, ¿bawɛɦba volbee ni ɦii ba diilg na ɦà ŋmɛtgn ɦà seeŋ Saŋgband na d` ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b?»
42017019	L´ saa ɦá bɔɦɔɔ nidwii na: «Vidg v` ked! V` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daɦra v` jugu.»
42017020	Farisii tiiba da gbaama Yeesu na: «¿Laawen nnii Saŋgband huraant nn nan kenaa?» Ĥá leed-ba na: «Saŋgband huraant nan kpaa kena wo bii nn kena bà yuu-b lee.
42017021	Bà nan kpaa kee bà bɔɦɔɔm-n na: ‟Kpay-n, t` ba nnaɦ'!”, laa: ‟T` ba laɦaa!”. Tii lee, miim-n na Saŋgband huraant ba n` huuga!»
42017022	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na: «Vuugu kuugu nan kena n` bagm na n` nyaan Nida Budaaga goor dyend mɔmr, gwɛntaɦaa, n` kpaɦ n` nyaan diir.
42017023	Bà nan kee bà bɔɦɔɔm-n na: ‟Geedg-n laɦaa!”, laa: ‟Geedg-n nnaɦ'!”. Tii lee, daa san-n kan! Daa kpiduu-n n` san kan bii!
42017024	Wo toŋu nn ŋmɛdaa l´ wiid kakeɦnan baateekan lee, ta welee nnii Nida Budaaga nn kee kà bɛm ká daanm goor.
42017025	Gwɛntaɦaa, l` ba na ká di kunyɔŋu biii saɦ', l` saa goona nidba kɔɦdg-ka.
42017026	Bii b` da ɦer Nowea vuugun bii, yenbii nnii b´ nan ta ɦɛna Nida Budaaga daanm goor.
42017027	Nidba da juln, ka nyi, ka yɔl taa, laa ka tɔɔ bá bɛɛrba na bá yal, kakeɦnan goor Nowea nn da jib kadakŋun dii. Lee, nyaalm t waal tant ɦɛn, nidba t kpiidr bá mɛmbee.
42017028	L` kee l` ta bɛm wo Loota vuugun. Lee wen, nidba da jul ka nyi, ka daɦ want ka gweedma taa, ka buud dikaɦb ka mɔɦ haya.
42017029	Goor Loota nn red Sodoom kɔrgun dii, Saŋgband t ɦɛm boglawiilm n kusawu bogm t tɛɦr wo toŋu, n kuum Sodoom kɔrgun tiibee mɛmbee.
42017030	L` nan ba l` ta bɛm welee Nida Budaaga nn kee kà ree kayen ka werii lee wen.
42017031	L´ goorii, ɦii ɦà kee ɦà bɛm disaku faaga wii, ɦá daa hoɦnt na ɦà lɔg ɦá want t´ ba kú ni tii! Ta welee nnii ɦá kee ɦà bɛm kpam wii, ɦá daa ta kul haaga!
42017032	Deedg-n b´ da ɦer Loota fɔg̈wu bii ɦɛn!
42017033	Ĥá kee ɦà bagm na ɦà soɦdg ɦà neerm wii nan bɔraa-m, ɦá kee ɦà bɔrii ɦà neerm wii nan soɦda-m.
42017034	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na: Goorii, nidba bareɦba kee bà door gad ɦɛn nyingu, l` lɔg ɦayen, l` saa vola.
42017035	Fɔg̈ba bareɦba nan ba bà gbaɦr ka naam taa man, l` lɔg ɦayen, l` saa vola. [
42017036	Daba bareɦba kee bà bɛm kpam, l` lɔg ɦayen, l` saa vola.]»
42017037	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Teekan nnii welee nn kee l` ɦea?» Ĥá leed na: « Wankpiirŋu kan ba ree nnii ɦagulangunt nn kpogla taa.»
42018001	Lee kaann, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba nawdlamnmina na ɦà werii-ba na l` ba na bá seeŋ̈m kakeɦnan, l` kpaa giid-ba.
42018002	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Yaani yaadɦii da ba kɔrgu kuugun, ka kpaa sol Saŋgband, ka kpaa lɔg nidba wo bii.
42018003	Kuŋfɔgɦii da ta ba kan kɔrguun, ka ked ka yu yaani yaadwii na ɦá yaa ɦà yaagu, ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Maantr má n mà rafeed t` huuga gwɛɛt!”
42018004	L´ hiid kɔd, yaani yaada kpaa bag na ɦà yaa kuŋfɔg̈wii yaagu. Lee, ɦá dan n bɔɦɔɔ ɦayen na: ‟Gobiilm, mà kpaa sol Saŋgband, mà kpaa lɔg nidba wo bii,
42018005	gwɛntaɦ', ka mà ba ɦe fɔg̈wii ŋmɛɛg̈b, wo ɦan haam mà fuut lee, ɦà ba ɦà jaarŋ̈m-ma kakeɦnan.”»
42018006	Berma t lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Ĥom-n bii yaani yaadbɛɦwunwuna nn bed bia!
42018007	Ka welee, Saŋgband reba nn mɔɔ ka hoɦ-d nyingu n muunu lee, ¿d` kpaa kee d` to-ba gobiint? ¿D` kee d` hilg-ban?
42018008	Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na waa: D` kee d` to-ba gobiint weem. Lee, Nida Budaaga nn kee kà daan lee, ¿kà nan yul gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim tant ɦɛnii?»
42018009	Yeesua t ta gwɛɛl nawdlamnmina n biiba bà nyaɦaa bá nidtaaba ka diila na bee nnii hɔmba Saŋgband nɔngan bee.
42018010	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nidba bareɦba da kotg Saŋgband haarn na bà seeŋ. Bilma da ba na Farisii tia, volwii ba na lambɦu soɦdgtn.
42018011	Farisii tiiwii t rood ɦayen n jeɦnt kpamga, n ka seeŋa ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Saŋgband! Mà seeŋa-v na mà kpaa boo nidvolba nn ba lee. Bee nnii bawdba, gokaat tiiba, yaruutba, wo lambɦu soɦdgtwunwuna.
42018012	Mà boowa noor goora ɦarɛɦ laadn. Mà rada man ba n bii mɛmbii tɔmb kwiɦr, n lɔgm tɔmb myen n saɦm-v.”
42018013	Lambɦu soɦdgtwii lee, wii jeɦraa vɔkun, ka kpaa ŋmiinaa na ɦà vii ɦà nɔnga n faaga, ka bɛlaa ɦá niɦi ka bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Hai, Saŋgband! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu! Man nnii fubɛɦtia.”
42018014	Tii lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na: Nidwii da ŋmɛtg n kulii ɦaa, ka ba nidhɔma, Saŋgband t waa-wu ɦà fubɛɦii. Farisii tiiwii lee, d` da ba waa wiiwu ɦà rei. Tii lee, ɦá via ɦayen n faaga wii, bà nan hoɦla-wu n tiŋa, l` saa ɦá hoɦla ɦayen n tiŋa wii, bà nan via-wu n faaga.»
42018015	Nidba t lag n kunidbii mɛɦ n daann Yeesua man na ɦá ɦig hì ɦɛn ɦá niɦi. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t yum welee n ka kpal-ba.
42018016	Ĥá hoɦ biihii n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saa-n bii daan mà man! Daa kewr-n-hi! Nidba bá boo hí dela bee, bee heɦl n Saŋgband huraant.
42018017	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, bá kpaa soɦda Saŋgband huraant wo bukai bee, bà nan kpaa jiba t´ ni.»
42018018	Yuudaa tiiba huraaɦii t gbaam Yeesu na: «Berma, ven nnii weriithɔma! ¿L` ba na mà ɦe ben saɦ na mà soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii?»
42018019	Ĥá leed-wu na: «¿Ben kaan vn hoɦ-ma na hɔma? Ĥii kpaɦ hɔmwu rii. Saŋgband n jaɦ beel hɔm.
42018020	Vn ba lee, miil baɦlb. Saŋgband beda na: Daa yaruum! Daa ku nida! Daa bam! Daa bɔɦɔɔm gokaat n nidba jugun! Valgm v` sawu n v` nya!»
42018021	Daawwii t ŋmɛl-wu na: «Mà kaamn n jana, mà vala baɦlbii mɛmbii.»
42018022	Ĥan ɦomr welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «L` goda-v bii byen: Gweedm v` want mɛnt, v` lɔg lig̈biirii v` raar kunyɔŋtiiba! Lee wen lee, v` nan yuuŋ kwɛgdbermm saŋgbambiimn. L` saa, v` daan v` tagd mà kaa.»
42018023	Nidwii nn ɦomr welee lee, n gbɛlŋ, blaɦb kaa na ɦà da ba n kɛgt kɔd l` kpaɦ jaɦ'.
42018024	Yeesua nn nyan na ɦà gbɛlŋn lee, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan ln ba gemm na kwɛgdm tiiba jibm Saŋgband huraantna!
42018025	L` ba gemm n deer na d´ jib n jajawu vadbn. L` ta yatg gemm n kwɛgdm tiiɦii na ɦá jib Saŋgband huraantn.»
42018026	Bá da kewla-wu bee t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka l` ba welee, ¿wen t ka ba ɦà bee ɦà daɦ ɦá jugu?»
42018027	Ĥá leed na: «Bii b´ yata nid bii kpaa yata Saŋgband.»
42018028	Lee wen, Fetra t saa n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tii gwid tn da ba n bii kaawr n ka tagd-v.»
42018029	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Ka ɦii t saa ɦá haar, laa ɦá fɔga, laa ɦá teelba, laa ɦá sawu n ɦà nya, laa ɦá bii, Saŋgband huraant kaa,
42018030	ɦà ba ɦà soɦdg welee kɔd vuugu ɦan neer gwelŋa kuun. Lee n l` kaan, ɦà nan soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii.»
42018031	Yeesua da ree ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee kpamga, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ĥom-n! T` kotgaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Reekan nnii bii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da ɦɔd Nida Budaaga jugun bii mɛmbii nn kee b` ɦe b´ jugun.
42018032	Bà kee bà taag-ka bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nuɦun, bà laɦ-ka, bà suu-ka, bà tuur kà ɦɛn nyanyaat,
42018033	bà gbuu-ka taŋgbanii, l` saa bà kuu-ka. Gotaɦrd goor kà himtg kuumn.»
42018034	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka ba ɦom gwɛɛtii kɔtɔd. T` da bee-ba nyeet, bá ka ba ɦom ɦan bo na ɦà biir tii.
42018035	Yeesua da nyuɦaa Yerikoo kɔrgu, joomɦii kad huru maaru ka jamaa.
42018036	Joomwii t ɦom nidba kɛna n gbaam na: «¿Ben bee?»
42018037	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Yeesu, Nasarɛɛt tia beraan.»
42018038	Ĥá mɔɔm ka toola na: «Yeesu, Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu!»
42018039	Bá da ked nɔngan bee t ka kpal-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá kpat belaɦ'. Ban la bɔɦɔɔ-wu welee lee, ɦà gwɛda n kwɛɛn ka toola kimm na: «Daviida yakiiga! Nyaan mà kunyɔŋu!»
42018040	Yeesua t jeɦnt n bɔɦɔɔ na bá daan-wu n ɦà man. Joomwii nn nyuɦn lee, ɦá gbaam-wu na:
42018041	«¿Bag na mà ɦee-v bee?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Berma, ɦe na mà yum!»
42018042	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Yum! V` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daɦra v` jugu.»
42018043	Yelmaa ɦá niini t went, ɦá ka tagd Yeesua kaa ka nyɔka Saŋgband. Nidfigm t yum welee n ka ta nyɔka-d.
42019001	Yeesua nn da jib Yerikoo kɔrgun lee, n lintgii ka roraa n kù vonlaŋan.
42019002	L` ba na nidɦii da ba kan bà hoɦ-wu na Sakea. Ĥà da ba na lambɦu soɦdgtba bermn, ka ta ba kwɛgdm.
42019003	Ĥà da bagl na ɦà nyaan na wen nnii Yeesua, gwɛntaɦaa, ɦan da ba nidgɔɦwu lee, n ka kpaa bea na ɦà nyaan-wu. Nidfigm da leegra-wu.
42019004	Lee wen, ɦá solm n nɔngan n juul tiib biibn b` boo feega na ɦà bee ɦà nyaan-wu. Yeesua da ba ɦà ber n tiibii kwɛɛn.
42019005	Ĥan dan n taan kan lee, n vii ɦá nɔnga n faaga n bɔɦɔɔ Sakee na: «Sakee, hoɦntn weem! L` ba na mà go vaa jana.»
42019006	Ĥá hoɦntn weem weem n soɦd-wu n nyaag̈b.
42019007	Biiba bà da nyan welee bee mɛmbee t ka nyeera ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna jib na ɦà go fubɛɦtia haarn.»
42019008	Sakea t jeɦnt Berma nɔngan n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, kewlg! Bii man ba n bii, maa mà lɔg b` gidgu gbaraɦ', mà si kunyɔŋtiiba. L` saa, ka má da hogl ɦii n soɦd ɦá lig̈biir, mà ŋmɛlg-wu-d tɔmb mnaa.»
42019009	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Juuni daɦb jib jana haarndinan. Nidwunwuna ta ba na Ĥabrahaama yakiigan.
42019010	Nida Budaaga daan na kà bag kà daɦ bá da bɔd bee juuni.»
42019011	Nidba nn da kewla gwɛɛt ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ tii lee, ɦá ta gwɛɛl-ba nawdlam. Biilm, wo ɦan da nyɔɦr n Yerusalɛm kɔrgu lee, nidba t ka diila na baa bà nyaan Saŋgband huraant yelmaa.
42019012	Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Huraaɦiaa kwɛɛla da vidg n san kɔrvɔku kuugun na bá lo-wu huraant ɦà kpen ɦà mad ɦá kɔrgu.
42019013	Saɦ na ɦá vidg ɦà nyab, ɦá hoɦ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba kwiɦr n to baawenwu ruuni lɛmu n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Ĥee-n yaku n lig̈biirii kakeɦnan mà daa kpena!”
42019014	Gwɛntaɦ', ɦá kɔrgu tiiba da kpaa sɔkla-wu. Bá tom nidba ɦá kaa na bá san bà biir na bà kpaa bag na wii bɛm na bá huraa.
42019015	Ĥan san bá lo-wu huraant ɦá kpen ɦá kɔrgun lee, n bɔɦɔɔ bá hoɦ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba ɦan da to lig̈biir bee na ɦà nyaan b´ hewl bii.
42019016	Noogra t daan n jeɦnt n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! L` hewl-ma rubermgu v` ruuni lɛmɦuu ɦɛn.”
42019017	Huraa t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟L` ba hɔm. Ven nnii ŋmɛɛɦeedhɔma. Wo vn ɦer hɔm bii kaab man lee, maa mà to-v kɔrni kwiɦr v` mad.”
42019018	Ŋmɛɛɦeedreɦdrwii t ta daan n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! L` hewl-ma ruuni lɛmi ɦinu v` ruuni lɛmɦuu ɦɛn.”
42019019	Huraa t ta bɔɦɔɔ wii na: ‟Ven lee, maa mà to-v kɔrni ɦinu v` mad.”
42019020	Ŋmɛɛɦeedvolwii t daan n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Berma! Kpay v` ruuni lɛmɦuu! Mà da togdg-ɦu dimtoogun n kpɛɦdr.
42019021	Mà da sol-v fobɛɦgu na v` gwɛɛt ba gemm. Lɔgl bii vn ba lo bii, ka kɛɦ jɔnt vn ba ko tii.”
42019022	Huraa t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Ven nnii ŋmɛɛɦeedbɛɦgu. V` gwɛɛt vn bed tii kaa nnii man ba mà mug-v. Da miil na mà gwɛɛt ba gemm, na mà lɔgl bii man ba lo bii, ka lɔg dikaɦb mà kan da ba bod ree.
42019023	Tii lee, ¿ben kaan vn da ba lɔg mà lig̈biir na v` lo banka ni? Man ba mà kpen mà soɦdg-d n yadgu mɛɦ'.”
42019024	Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ bá da ba ɦà man bee na: ‟Soɦdg-n ɦà do ruuni lɛmɦuu n` to-ɦu ɦà ban rubermgu wii!”
42019025	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: ‟Berma! Ĥà ban rubermgua!”
42019026	Ĥá leed-ba na: ‟Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na ɦá ba n bii wii, bà nan mɔɔ-wu saɦb. L´ saa, ɦá kpaɦ n bii wii, bà nan fɛla bà soɦdg ɦà do bii tutugm ɦan ba n bii.
42019027	Mà rafeedba lee, bee ba sɔkl na mà bɛm bá huraa, daan-n n ban mà man n` kuu-ba mà nɔngan.”»
42019028	Yeesua nn bed welee l´ diɦ lee, n dɛɦd nɔngan ka kota Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
42019029	Ĥan dan n ka nyuɦaa Betfagee n Betaanii kɔrni duuga ban hoɦ na Kpaamtiit duuga kee man lee, n tom ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba ɦá nɔngan ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
42019030	«Ked-n kɔrgu kú baa laɦii n` nɔngan kuun! Nn ba n` taai lee, n` ba n` nyaan boŋhɛrga baɦr, ɦii ban kad kà ɦɛn. N` baɦdg-ka n` daan n.
42019031	Ka ɦii t gbaam-n na ¿ben kaan nn baɦda-ka?, n` biir-wu na: ‟Berma bagl-ka”.»
42019032	Ĥan tomr bee t san n ta yum welee wo ɦan da bed-ba lee.
42019033	Ban da baɦda boŋŋee lee, ká tiiba t gbaam-ba na: «¿Ben kaan nn baɦda-ka?»
42019034	Bá leed na: «Berma bagl-ka.»
42019035	Lee, bá san n kan n to Yeesua, n fitr bá dimt n dɔɔm ká ɦɛn n kal-wu.
42019036	Ĥan da kedaa lee, nidba t ka yada bá dima hurun.
42019037	Ĥan da nyuɦaa n Yerusalɛm kɔrgu n huru ɦú tiɦda n Kpaamtiit duuga ɦuu lee, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba hiinɦuu t ka ba lamɛɛgun, ka nyɔka Saŋgband kimm, blaɦb kaa na bà da nyana Yeesua ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛb kɔd.
42019038	Bà da nyɔka-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: « Saŋgband kaawlm huraa ɦá kena wii ɦɛn! Ĥà kena d` hidrn. Nigiigu bɛm saŋgbambiimn! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband saŋgbambiimn!»
42019039	Farisii tiiba biiba bá da ba nidfigm huuga bee t bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu na: «Berma! Ĥe v` gwɛɛt soɦdgtba talmt bà kpat kpoɦ'!»
42019040	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n na ka bá la kpat kpoɦoo, tana mɔɔm ŋmɛi.»
42019041	Yeesua nn nyuɦ Yerusalɛm kɔrgu lee, n geed n yum-ku n ka kuum kù ɦɛn,
42019042	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka na da ta bee n miig bii b` ba b` daan-v n nigiigu bii, ka la jana jana, ln bɛm hɔm! Lee, gwelmnmina, l` bee-v nyeet, kpaɦ v` bee v` nyaan.
42019043	Goora ɦiiɦa kenan, goorɦee nii, v` rafeedba kee bà kaadg-v n dabhaɦrkaɦa, bà lo-v huuga, bà fiid-v rena n rena.
42019044	Baa bà gbuɦ bà yɔkl-v kpaalaa, v´ n v` nidba mɛɦ'. Bà kpaɦ bà teel tand dyend mɔmr d` dɛɛr d` tuurnd jugun. Biilm, vuugu Saŋgband nn da daan na d` tɔrg-v kuu, ba lo nɔmb na v` miig-ku.»
42019045	Yeesua nn taai kɔrgun lee, n jib Saŋgband haarn, n baɦ n ka vɔɦd wangweedmtba
42019046	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Mà haar kee d` bɛm na seeŋb haarn. Nen lee, nii lɔgra-d n ɦɛm bawdba kaalaŋa.»
42019047	Yeesua da weraa gwɛɛt goorɦee biɦ Saŋgband haarn. Gotibermba, n baɦlb weriitba, n kɔrgun bermba da bagl huru na bà kuu-wu,
42019048	gwɛntaɦaa, ka kpaa miigaa huru ban ba bà tag ɦuu. Kɔrgu mɛngu da ɦuma n wun hɔm.
42020001	Goor diir, Yeesua da weraa Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka faa Gohɔmt Saŋgband haarn. Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba n kɔrgun kpalmmba t daan
42020002	n gbaam-wu na: «Biir-t! ¿Hurteɦu noon nnii vn ɦɛna wennaɦ? ¿Wen sir-v huru na v` ɦɛmaa?»
42020003	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Maa mà ta gbaam-n gwɛɛt. Biir-n-ma!
42020004	¿Wen da tamn Yohanɛɛs na ɦá huurm nidba? ¿Saŋgband laa, nidba le?»
42020005	Lee wen, bá baɦ n ka wii-t ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ka t´ leedg na Saŋgband da tamn-wu, ɦà gbaam-t na, ¿l´ ɦɛm lann tn da ba tii ɦà gwɛɛt?
42020006	Lee, ka t´ ta leedg na nidba da tamn-wu, kɔrguu mɛnguu lɔd-t tana na kù kuu-t. Kɔrgu miil hɔm na da Yohanɛɛs nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta.»
42020007	Lee wen, bá saa n leed-wu na: «T` kpaa mi na wen da tamn-wu na ɦá huurm nidba.»
42020008	Ĥá ŋmɛl-ba na: «Ka welee, mà ta kpaɦ mà biir-n ɦii ɦà sir-ma huru má ka ɦɛna wantntina wii.»
42020009	Lee, Yeesua t baɦ n ka gwɛɛla n nidba nawdlamnmina na: «Nidɦii da hoowra tibit t´ roon bà ɦɛna n daam tii ɦá koogun. Ĥá saa ɦá kooguu n daam tiiba na bá maantrm ka kiig kù ɦɛn, n san huru n hiid.
42020010	L´ dan n taam daam vuugu, ɦá vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedɦii n tom-wu, na ɦá san ɦà nidbee man ɦà soɦdgn ɦà rem. Ĥan san lee, daam tiibee t mug-wu n gbum, n voom-wu, ɦá kulii ɦá nii.
42020011	Kooguu tiiwii t vii ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedvolɦii n tom, lee, bá san n ta gbum-wu, n suum-wu, n ka ba to-wu bii.
42020012	Ĥá lilm ŋmɛɛɦeedtaɦrwu tuumb, wii lee, bá san n sɔɦm-wu nɔt n kɔɦd-wu n kankaan.
42020013	Kooguu tiiwii t saa n bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟¿Lan nnii man ba mà ɦea? Maa mà tom mayen mà buga. Mà sɔkla-ka biii. Bà kee bà ta la valg kee.”
42020014	Daam tiibee nn nyan-ka lee, n bɔɦɔɔ taa na: ‟Kpay-n ɦá nan ba ɦà heɦm kooguu wii! Tn kuu-n-wu, l` saa t` nan mad kooguu.”
42020015	Ban bed welee lee, n mug-wu, n ree-wu n kooguu kaann n kuum-wu.» Yeesua t nan gbaam-ba na: «¿L` ba na kooguu tiiwii ɦe laa?
42020016	¿Lag ɦà ba ɦà san ɦà ku nidbee, l` saa ɦà lɔg kooguu ɦà to jeenba?» Nidba nn ɦomr welee lee, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` kpaɦ l` bee l` ɦe welee!»
42020017	Ĥá geed-ba n bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Wadbuudgan gwɛɛtntina kɔtɔd nnii na laa?: Tand mɔɦdba nn da kɔɦdg dii, dii kitg bobogr tand mɔmr.
42020018	Ĥá kee ɦà lor tandii ɦɛn wii, ɦà kee ɦà kaɦ ɦayen. L´ saa, ka tandii t lor ɦii ɦɛnii, ɦà kitg tanjoom.»
42020019	Baɦlb weriitba n gotibermba da miil na bee kaa nnii Yeesua nn da gwɛɛla nawdlamii. Bá ka bag na bà mug-wu yelmaa, gwɛntaɦ' ka sol kɔrguu tiiba.
42020020	Bá baɦ n ka kiig Yeesua. Tii lee, bá tom nidba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá san bà kiigm-wu wo bà tia ɦà gwɛɛt, na bà gbaam-wu gwɛɛt, ka ɦá lɔɔ bá natadn, bà mug-wu bà san n kumandaa, Roomaa hurberma nn da lo bà man wiaa.
42020021	Bá san n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! T` miil na vn bɔɦɔɔ tii n vn weraa tii ba gobiilm, kpaa sol nida niini, weraa huru l´ reɦu ba na bá tagd ka neer wo Saŋgband nn gbaama lee.
42020022	Biir-t nan lii! ¿T` baɦlb saɦl huru na bá faadm Roomaa hurbermwu lambɦu laa, bá daa faadm le?»
42020023	Yeesua t miig bá rarm ban ɦɛna mii, n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
42020024	«Werii-n-ma lig̈bkpaŋ̈m miim! ¿Wen jugu nnii ban rea? ¿Wen hidr nnii ban ɦɔd m` ɦɛnii?» Bá leed-wu na: «Roomaa hurberma.»
42020025	Tii lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka welee, to-n hurbermwu bii b` ba na ɦá reb bii, l` saa n` ta to Saŋgband bii b` ba na d´ reb bii.»
42020026	Bá ka ba bee n mug-wu ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ kɔrgu nɔngan tii kaa. Lee, gwɛɛt ɦan da leedg tii t´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa bá kpat n ka hen belbel.
42020027	Sadusii tiiba biiba t daan Yeesua man. Bee bɔɦɔɔ na kpiirmba nan kpaa himta kuumn. Bá gbaam-wu na:
42020028	«Berma! Mohiisa da ɦɔda baɦlbnbina n to-t, bii nnii na: Ka daawɦii t lɔg fɔga ka ba n nyakwɛɛla n kuum ka kpaɦ n buga, l` ba na ɦá nyakwɛɛlwii lɔg kuŋfɔg̈wii, ɦà meed-wu n budaaga, kà bɛm na ɦá maar ɦá kpiir wii rekan.
42020029	Tii lee, ɦii kwɛɛlba balbleɦba da bee. Noogra t lɔgm fɔga, n kuum ka ba meed buga.
42020030	Reɦdrwii t lɔgm kuŋfɔg̈wii, l´ tag-wu yenmii.
42020031	Taɦrwii t ta lɔgm-wu, l´ ta tag-wu yenmii. L´ tag bá leblmbee mɛmbee yenmii.
42020032	Fɔg̈wii mɔma t dan n fɛl n kuum.
42020033	Wo bá mɛmbee nn da lɔgr-wu fɔgt lee, goor kpiirmba nn nan himta kuumn dii, bá leblmbee huuga, ¿wen nan ba ɦà heɦm-wu?»
42020034	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Goona, daba lɔgl fɔg̈ba, fɔg̈ba yɔl sidba.
42020035	Lee, Saŋgband nn yu na bà mag na bà nan himtg kuumn bà neer d´ man bee nan kpaɦ bà yɔlm taa.
42020036	Bà nan kpaɦ bà kuum. Bà kee bà bɛm wo saŋgbantumtba, ka ba na Saŋgband bii, ka ta ba na bà himtg kuumn n ka neer.
42020037	Mohiisa bɔɦɔɔ biilm na kpiirmba nan himta kuumn bà neer. Ĥá wen da bɔɦɔɔ suŋsuŋa kà hulwa kee gwɛɛt, ka hoɦ Saŋgband na ɦá yandaa Ĥabrahaama Saberma, ta ɦà yandaa Yisɦaaka Saberma, ta ɦà yandaa Yakooba Saberma.»
42020038	Saŋgband nnii nidneermba Saŋgband, lag kpiirmba redn. Dii nɔnga nii, bá mɛmbee neeran.»
42020039	Baɦlb weriitba biiba t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma! Leedg tii nnii.»
42020040	Lee, bá ka kpaa ŋmiinaa na bà lil-wu gwɛɛt gbaamb.
42020041	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿Lan nnii ban ba bà bee bà biir na Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii Daviida yakiiga?
42020042	L` ba na Daviida mɔma da rea ka bɔɦɔɔ yumii wadgan na: Saberm Saŋgband da beda mà berm na: ‟Daan v` kad mà najuudu ɦɛn!
42020043	Maa mà ɦe v` rafeedba bɛm v` kwɛɛn lee, v` nawdrm-ba. ”
42020044	Ka l` ba na Daviida hoɦl Krist na ‟Berma”, ¿lan nnii ɦan ta ba ɦà bɛm na Daviida yakiiga?»
42020045	Nidfigm nn da kewla Yeesu lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na:
42020046	«Mad-n n̈yen n baɦlb weriitba! Bà sɔkla na bà gilm yakun ka fidr kwɛgdm dimvɔgt, ka ta sɔkla na bá seeŋ̈m-ba n valgm. Ka bá san kpoglb disakun, bá ka ro jarii hí jeɦr nɔngan hii ka kadaa. Bà roor kaalaŋhɔmii kasant diit julant.
42020047	Bà fɛɛra kuŋfɔg̈ba niɦin kpelkpel, ka seeŋa l` kpaa diɦaa na bá biir na bee nnii hɔmba. Tii lee, l` nan daraa bà tobɦa kimm l` yatg.»
42021001	Yeesua t geed ɦá kpama n yum kwɛgdm tiiba lɔɔla lig̈biir bá kan lɔɔla Saŋgband kowt lig̈biir ree.
42021002	Ĥá ta yum katɛdkuŋfɔgɦii lɔɔla wadbii hireɦ'.
42021003	Lee wen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Katɛdkuŋfɔg̈wunwuna lɔɔlg lig̈biir l´ yat nidvolbee mɛmbee.
42021004	Bee dewdg bà lig̈bia ɦɛn lig̈biir ba d´ kpaa halwa dii n lɔɔl. L´ saa kuŋfɔg̈wii lee, wii t lɔɔl lig̈biir ɦan ba n na ɦà jum ka neer dii kpaalaa.»
42021005	Nidba biiba da gwɛɛla Saŋgband haar gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na bà mɛɦra-d n tanhɔma n wanhɔmt ban sir Saŋgband tii. Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na:
42021006	«Vuugu kenan, l` nan kpaa tɔl tand dyend mɔmr d` dɛɛr d` tuurnd ɦɛn nnaɦreen felaɦ'. L´ mɛnguu nan luuran.»
42021007	Bá gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Laawen nnii vn bed tii nn kee t` ɦea? ¿Lan nnii tn kee t` ɦe t` miig na welee wantii mɛntii ba t` ɦea?»
42021008	Ĥá leed na: «Mad-n n̈yen hɔm na ɦii daa hogl-n! Nidba kɔd nan ba bà kenm mà hidrn ka bɔɦɔɔ na bee nnii man, mà mɔm nnii, na vuugu taann. Gwɛntaɦ' daa tagd-n-ba!
42021009	N` nan ba n` ɦom bà bɔɦɔɔ hoodr gwɛɛt, n nan na biiba kpaa ɦum n taa. Lee wen, l´ daa si-n fobɛɦgu! L` ba na welee ɦe, gwɛntaɦ' lag tant diɦm nnii saɦ'.»
42021010	Lee, ɦá ta bɔɦɔɔ na: « Tigr nan vida d` tuurnd ɦɛn, ɦà teew taa hoodr, l` saa huraaɦii kɔrgu gbuɦdg hurvolɦii reku hoodr.
42021011	Tant nan ba t` dam kimm, kɔmbermm n kunyaagu ta riir kaalai jugu jugu tant ɦɛn, hoolgu ɦe saŋgbambiimn l` si nidba fobɛɦbermgu.
42021012	Saɦ na man bɔɦɔɔ tii ɦe, bà kee bà mug-n, bà ɦee-n daddad, bà sam-n na bá yaa-n n yaagu Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn, bà lo-n sargan. Bà kee bà lintgm-n n huraamba n bermba duura mà kaa.
42021013	Welee kee l` si-n huru na n` biir tiit mà hidrn.
42021014	L´ daa ɦe wo n` ba n` diilgm na n` kee n` biir teta!
42021015	Lee, mà kee mà si-n rarm n gwɛɛt nn kee n` leedg tii na n` rafeedba ni ɦii daa kii laa ɦá kir ka bɔɦɔɔ jeent t´ ɦɛn.
42021016	N` samba n n` nyamba, n` teelba n n` tuurmba mɔmba kee bà gweedm-n, bà ɦe bà ku n` ni biiba.
42021017	Baaben tia kee ɦà nyaɦaam-n mà kaa,
42021018	gwɛntaɦaa, n` jugun jiiga kiiga kpaɦ kà bɔr.
42021019	Haɦlgm-n n` kwɛɛwa hɔm! Welee nnii nn kee n` soɦdg n` neerm.
42021020	«Nn kee n` nyaan rafeedba t kaadg Yerusalɛm kɔrgu lee, n` miig l` vuuguu na l` nyuɦ na bá gbuɦ-ku.
42021021	Tii lee, bá kee bà bɛm Yuudee tantn bee, bá siil bà juul duuran! Bá kee bà bɛm Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bee, bá siil bà foɦnt! Bá kee bà goom kpam bee, bá daa siil na bà jib kɔrgun!
42021022	Goorɦee nnii Saŋgband yaagu yaam. Ĥee ni nnii ban ɦɔd Wadbuudgan bii mɛmbii nn kee b` ɦe b´ jugun.
42021023	Goorɦee ni, futiiba n fɔg̈ba bá nan ba bà ɦɛɛlgm bii bee kunyɔŋu nan ba kù bɛm bermgu. Goorɦee ni nnii tantii tiiba nn kee bà di kunyɔŋu l` saa Saŋgband lo kwɛɛwweerga n tigrii.
42021024	Bà kee bà kuu-ba n hoodjuuga, laa bà lo-ba sarga tiga ɦá kpaa tia Saŋgband ɦɛn ɦee mɛnɦee huuga. Tigɦee kee ɦà gbuɦm Yerusalɛm kɔrgu kakeɦnan ɦá vuugu daa diɦaa.
42021025	Hoolgu kuugu kee kù riir muunun, n kidgan, n ŋmɛdiin. Tant ɦɛnii, nyaam kee m` kpuurm ka waara, tiga mɛna nidba kad n diila n kwɛɛwtaaga.
42021026	Want t´ ba n faaga tii daa t` hamtr n taa, fobɛɦgu ku nidba bà diila bii b` ba b` daan tant biɦ bii jugun.
42021027	Lee wen, bà nyaan Nida Budaaga kena wat ɦɛn ka ba n gemmnt kɔd ka ba ká jeegun.
42021028	Hoolguu nn kee kù baɦdg ɦɛb lee, haɦlg-n n̈yen, n` vii n` juuni na n` juuni daɦb ba nyɔɦ'!»
42021029	Ĥá gwɛɛl-ba nawdlamnmina na: «Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan tod n tivont tiit!
42021030	Nn kena n yum t´ baɦ n ka toow vaat lee, n´ ka mi na yobr ba nyɔɦ'.
42021031	Ta yenmii, nn kee n` nyaan welee taana lee, miig-n na Saŋgband huraant ba nyɔɦ'!
42021032	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa: Waagankena nan kpaa ku kà diɦ saɦ bii man bɔɦɔɔ bii mɛmbii ban ɦe.
42021033	Saŋgbambiim n tant nan booran, maa gwɛɛt lee, tii nan kpaa boor felaɦ'.
42021034	«Mad-n n̈yen hɔm! Daa lɔg-n n` diila n` to kasant, n dakuuŋa, n tant ɦɛn neerm nn sɔkla bii! Ka lag welee, yaagu yaam goor nan tudaa-n kpataaa
42021035	kutukŋa dela. Goorii nan luura tant biɦ nidba ɦɛn.
42021036	Daa door-n goom! Seeŋ̈m-n hɛruɦ', ka bo na n` bɛm n kwɛgdi, na n` bee n` fetg bii b` kena bii nuɦun, lee n` nan riir n` jeɦnt Nida Budaaga nɔngan.»
42021037	Yeesua da weraa gwɛɛt Saŋgband haarn muunun. Nyingu, ɦá san goom duuga ban hoɦ na Kpaamtiit duuga kee ɦɛn.
42021038	Nidba kɔd da kena ɦateekwɛɛn weem ɦà man Saŋgband haarn na bà kewlgm ɦá gwɛɛt.
42022001	Yuudaa tiiba Kpooni kasant ban ta hoɦ na Gɛtgm kasant tii da nyuɦnan. Bà da jul-t n kpooni ban kpaa lɔɔ ɦì ni kpoonu ragr ɦii.
42022002	Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba t ka bag huru na bà ku Yeesua, gwɛntaɦ' ka sol kɔrgu fobɛɦgu.
42022003	Lee wen, Saatana t jib Yuudaas Kariyoot tiiwii ni, ɦà ba na Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee huuga bilmn.
42022004	Yuudaasa t san gotibermba n tawdba bà kiig Saŋgband haar ɦɛn bee bermba man. Wú n ban bá bɔɦɔɔ ɦan ba ɦà ɦe ɦà to-ba Yeesu lee.
42022005	L´ ɦɛm-ba lamɛɛgu, bá bɔɦɔɔ na baa bà faad-wu lig̈biir.
42022006	Yuudaasa t tii n ka bag huru ɦú ba ɦù tɔrg na ɦá gweedm-ba Yeesuwu sabaɦ ɦuu.
42022007	Lee, Kpooni kasant deb goor ban vid binbilmr fɛɛgu dii t taan.
42022008	Yeesua t tom Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «San-n n` dig-t Gɛtgm kasant diit!»
42022009	Bá gbaam-wu na: «¿Tee nnii vn sɔkla na t` dig-tii?»
42022010	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Kewlg-n! Nn kee n` jibm kɔrgun lee, n` kee n` taŋ n nidɦii ɦà toɦd nyaalm n dafod, n` tagd ɦá kaa. Haar ɦan kee ɦà jib d` ni dii,
42022011	n` biir d` tii na: ‟Berma gbaama-v na, disaku ɦan ba ɦà di kú ni Gɛtgm kasant wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kuu, ¿kù ba tee?”
42022012	Lee wen, ɦà werii-n disag̈bermgu kuugu kù dewr haar jugun n faaga, kù ni ba l´ mɛnguu. Reekan nnii nn ba n` dig diit.»
42022013	Ĥan bed welee lee, bá san n mid l´ mɛnguu ba deedee wo ɦá nn ta bed lee, bá nan dig Gɛtgm kasant diit.
42022014	Kasantii diit deb waaru t taan. Lee, Yeesuwu n ɦà tumtba t kad na bà jum.
42022015	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà da bagl na ka l´ la ɦe lana, má n nn t` di kasantii saɦ na mà kunyɔŋu deb vuugu taan.
42022016	Biilm, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, mà nan ta kpaa juu-t kakeɦnan kasantii kɔtɔd nn nan togla Saŋgband huraantn.»
42022017	Ĥá soɦd kpowdga ká ni n daam, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Jaɦ-n kpowdgankena n` nyii-ka ka tɔɔ taa n` mɛmbee!
42022018	Biilm, mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, mà nan ta kpaa nyi daam saɦ na Saŋgband huraant daan.»
42022019	Tii kaann, ɦá lɔgm kpoonu n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n gbeɦm-ɦu n to-ba ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Binbii nnii mà gbanu ban tɔɔ-n ɦuu. Ĥɛm-n wennaɦ' ka deer mà ɦɛn!»
42022020	Diit deb kaann, ɦá ta lɔgm kpowdga n daam n ta ɦɛm yenmii n to-ba-ka ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpowdgankena ba na Saŋgband tuurnkwɛɛntn. D` tag n mà jiim m´ sool n` kaa mii n lo-t.
42022021	Gwɛntaɦ' ɦá gweedma-ma wii kada mà man nnaɦ'.
42022022	Nida Budaaga ba kà kpi wo ln gbaam lee, gwɛntaɦ', kunyɔŋbermgu nan luura ɦá gweedm-ka wii ɦɛn.»
42022023	Bá baɦ n ka gbaama taa na bá ni wen ba ɦà ɦe welee.
42022024	L´ saa, bá ka kpal taa ka gbaama taa na bá ni wen nnii berma.
42022025	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tiga huraamba mada-t. Bá mad nidba bee t ka bag na bá hoɦm-ba na hɔmgu ɦeedba.
42022026	Nen lee, l` kpaɦ na n` ɦɛm taa welee. L` ba na n` huuga ɦá ba na berm wii ba ɦà bɛm wo buga, ɦá mad-n wii ɦɛna wo ŋmɛɛɦeeda.
42022027	¿Wen nnii bermwu biilm? ¿Ĥá kad bà jeɦla-wu diit wii laa, ɦá jeɦla diit wii le? ¿Lag ɦá kad bà jeɦla-wu diit wii? Man lee, maa ba n` man wo ɦá jeɦla diit wii.
42022028	«Nen, nii ba saa-ma mà kunyɔŋdebn felaɦ'.
42022029	Wo mà Sa nn to ɦá huraant na mà mad lee, ta welee nnii man ta tɔɔ-n-t.
42022030	Má n nn, t` kee t` di t` nyi mà huraantn. N` kee n` kad huraamba jarii ɦɛn, n` yaa yaagu n Yisraɦeel hui kwiɦr n hireɦhii.»
42022031	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ Fetr na: «Simoon ven, kewlg! Saatana jam huru na ɦà daan ɦà kuɦ-n wo ban kuɦ joom na bà ree rugt lee.
42022032	Man lee, maa seeŋ Saŋgband v` ɦɛn na v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim daa bɔr. Vn kee v` ŋmɛtgn mà man lee, v` haɦlg v` teelba.»
42022033	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma! Ka v` ked sargan má n vn t` san. Ka v` ku, má n vn t` kpi.»
42022034	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Fetr! Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na, jana kee v` feer tɔmb mtaɦm na kpaa mii-ma, kɔdaaga ban jawdg.»
42022035	Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Man da tomr-n n` kpaa mad taŋr, ka kpaa mad ruugu, ka kpaa fidr nanawda lee, ¿bii t dan n fadm nn?» Bá leed-wu na: «Bii da ba fad-t.»
42022036	Tii lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Gwɛntaɦ gwɛɦma lee, ɦá ba n taŋr wii, ɦá lɔg-d! Ĥá ta ba n ruugu wii, ɦá lɔg-ku! Ĥá kpaɦ n hoodjuuga wii, ɦá gweedm ɦà tugvɔku ɦà daɦ kiiga!
42022037	Mà rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n na, l` ba na bá t da ɦɔd Wadbuudgan l` baɦr n man tii ɦe t´ jugun. Tii nnii na: Nidba da lɔgra-wu wo nidbɛɦa. Biilm, gwɛɛt ban da ɦɔd mà ɦɛn tii ba t` ta ɦe welee.»
42022038	Bá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, kpay hoodjui hireɦ'!» Ĥá leed-ba na: «L` taara welee.»
42022039	Yeesua t rorm n san Kpaamtiit duuga ɦɛn, wo ɦan daa ka ɦɛna lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t tag ɦá kaa.
42022040	Ban san n taam kaalaŋeen lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Joblm-n Saŋgband na bii daa hogl-n!»
42022041	Lee, ɦá san dodgan wo nuɦu tand kɔɦdgm, n gbaɦnt n ka jowaa Saŋgband
42022042	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hai, mà Sa! Ka l` ba l` si huruu, v` lɔg wiiru kpowdgankena v` san n kan vɔku, ká daa daan mà ɦɛn! Gwɛntaɦaa, l´ ɦe wo vii nn sɔkla lee, l´ daa ɦe wo maa nn sɔkla lee!»
42022043	Saŋgbantumtɦii t rɛn saŋgbambiimn n daan ɦá man na ɦà haɦlg-wu.
42022044	Kwɛɛwtaaga t mug-wu, ɦá tor ɦá ni n seeŋb, naasaaga t ka hita-wu. Naasaagee da kitg wo jiim n ka tɛɦra tiŋan.
42022045	Yeesua nn seeŋ l´ diɦ lee, ɦá ŋmɛtgn ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ween n dan n midm kunyɔŋu t yatg-ba bá gor.
42022046	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` go na laa? Vidg-n, n` joblm Saŋgband na bii daa hogl-n!»
42022047	Yeesua nn da ɦeewr n gwɛɛlb lee, nidhiinu t rɛn bá nɔngan. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba huuga bilm ban hoɦ na Yuudaas wii da dɛɦra bà nɔngan. Yuudaasa t nyuɦ Yeesua man na ɦà ɦog-wu.
42022048	Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Yuudaas! ¿Bo na v` seeŋ-ma ka ɦogaa-ma na v` gweedm Nida Budaaga man?»
42022049	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá da ba Yeesua man bee nn nyan b´ bo na b` ɦe bii lee, bá gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿T` lɔg t` hoodjui t` vidg bà juguni?»
42022050	Yelmaa, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ni ɦii t kɛɦd gotiberma ŋmɛɛɦeeda n git ɦá najuudu tobr.
42022051	Lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saa-n! L` taara welee», n tarm ŋmɛɛɦeedwii tobr, n gbaad-wu.
42022052	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ gotibermba, n Saŋgband haar ɦɛn kigdba bermba, n kpalmmba bá da daan na bà mug-wu bee na: «¿N` lɔgra hoodjui n dagbɛɦa n daan mà do wo na man nnii bawd laa?
42022053	Goor wo goor mà ba n` huuga Saŋgband haarn, n` kpaa bag na n` mug-ma. Gwɛntaɦ lee, waarɦunɦuna ba na n` reɦun ka ta ba na nyeetn gemmnt reɦun.»
42022054	Bá mug Yeesu n san n gotiberma haarn. Fetra da sabaa bà kaa ka ba vɔkun.
42022055	Bá sal bogm gotibermaa haaga, nidba t kaad-m n ka huura. Fetra t ta kad bà man.
42022056	Ĥan da kad bogm man lee, ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔgɦii t yum-wu, n geed-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Daawwunwuna n ta bɛm ɦá man.»
42022057	Ĥá kii ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Taa nya! Mà kpaa mii-wu rii.»
42022058	L´ mɔɔ jaɦ' vola t ta yum-wu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ta ba na bá ni ɦiin.» Ĥá leed fɔg̈wii na: «Ĥaai! Mà kpaa ba ɦá man.»
42022059	Waarbilmu n ɦù kaann nidvola t ka ta bɔɦɔɔ ka tidr kpaalaa na: «Biilm, daawwunwuna nn bɛm ɦá man, ta Galilee tiin.»
42022060	Gwɛntaɦ' Fetra t leed na: «Ven! Mà kpaa mi vn bo na v` biir tii.» Fetra nn da ɦeewr n gwɛɛlb lee, yelmaa kɔdaaga t jawd.
42022061	Berma t bid ɦayen n geed-wu turrr. Lee wen, ɦá deed Berma nn da bed-wu tii na: ‟Jana, saɦ na kɔdaaga jawdgaa, v´ fɛtg foorb tɔmb mtaɦm na kpaa mii-ma.”
42022062	Ĥá rorm duun n kom n diɦ ɦá ni.
42022063	Nidba bá da mad Yeesuwu bee da laɦl-wu ka gbuu-wu.
42022064	Bà da fiidaa ɦà niini ɦɛn dimtoogu n ka gbuu-wu ka gbaama-wu na: «Tad! ¿T` ni wen gbudg-vii?»
42022065	Bà da ta bɔɦɔɔ gobɛɦt kɔd ka suu-wu.
42022066	Toŋu nn ragdg lee, Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba n gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba t kpogl taa. Bá san n Yeesuwu n bà kɔrgu yaagu tand ɦɛn,
42022067	n gbaam-wu na: «¿Ven nnii Krist Saŋgband nn bantg wii? Biir-t!» Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ka má biir-n na man nnii, n` kpaɦ n` tii.
42022068	Ka má gbaam-n gwɛɛt, n` kpaɦ n` leedg-ma t` ɦɛn.
42022069	L´ lɔg jana l` san n nɔngan, Nida Budaaga kee kà kad Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia najuudu ɦɛn.»
42022070	Lee wen, bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu bá mɛmbee na: «Ka welee, ¿ven nnii Saŋgband Budaagan?» Ĥá leed-ba na: «N` mɔmba n` bɔɦɔɔ tii nnii. Man nnii.»
42022071	Lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` ta kpaa haaraa na ɦii biir-t lii ɦà ɦɛn. T` mɔmba t` ɦomra ɦà noon gwɛɛt.»
42023001	Bá da yaa Yeesuwu n yaagu bee mɛmbee t vid bá jarii ɦɛn n san-wu n gomn Filaata man.
42023002	Bá tul-wu kan hoogu, ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` mug nidwunwuna ɦà fiwla t` tigr. Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ t` tigr tiiba na bá daa faadm Roomaa hurbermwu lambɦu, ka bɔɦɔɔ na wii mɔm nnii Saŋgband nn bantg wii, na Huraa.»
42023003	Filaata t gbaam-wu na: «¿Ven nnii Yuudaa tiiba huraa?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Beda tii nnii.»
42023004	Filaata t bɔɦɔɔ gotibermba n nidfigmii na: «Mà kpaa mi nidwunwuna nn koɦl bii.»
42023005	Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ ka tidr na: «Ĥà weraa t` tigr tiiba bii bɛɦb. Ĥà baɦ gwɛɛt weriib Galilee tantn n tag Yuudee tant mɛntn n taan kakeɦnan nnanaɦ'.»
42023006	Filaata nn ɦomr gwɛɛtii welee lee, n gbaam na: «¿Nidwunwuna ba na Galilee tiin?»
42023007	Ĥan dan n ɦom na huraa Ĥerooda tantn heɦl Yeesu lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na bá san-wu n ɦà man, Ĥerooda mɔma da ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgun goorɦeen.
42023008	Ĥan nyan Yeesu lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu lamɛɛgu. Ĥà da ɦomra bà bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt, ɦá ka la bag n jana na ɦà taŋ n wun ɦà ta nyaan ɦá hoolgu ɦɛb.
42023009	Ĥá gbaam Yeesuwu gwɛɛt kɔd, gwɛntaɦ', ɦà ba leedg-wu lii.
42023010	Gotibermba n baɦlb weriitba da ba kan ka kena n Yeesua jugun gobɛɦt ka gwɛɛla n talmt.
42023011	Ĥeroodwu n ɦà tawdba t ka laɦ-wu, ka kpaa lɔg-wu na wii nnii bii. Bá fid-wu huraamba dimgu n ŋmɛlgii-wu Filaataa.
42023012	Ĥeroodwu n Filaat bà da ba rafeedt weem. Goorii n jaɦ', bá ɦɛm tuurnt.
42023013	Filaata t kpogl gotibermba n huraamba n ta nidvolba
42023014	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` daan-ma n nidwunwuna ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà fiwla kɔrgu. Mà gbaam-wu n` nɔngan, lee, mà ba nyaan bii nn bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà koɦl bii.
42023015	Ĥerooda ŋmɛlgn-wu na ɦà ta ba nyaan bii ɦan koɦl bii. Tii lee, nidwunwuna ba ɦe bii b´ ba na ɦá kpi b´ kaa bii.
42023016	Maa mà biir bà gbuu-wu taŋgbanii, lee, mà saa-wu.» [
42023017	Gɛtgm kasant wen, gomna kena n rawd sarga tii ɦayen.]
42023018	Bá baɦ n ka toola bá mɛmbee na: «Biir bà ku nidwunwuna! Ree Barabaaswu sargan!»
42023019	–Bà da lo Barabaaswu sargan na bà da vidg huraamba jugun kɔrgun, ɦá ta ku nida.–
42023020	Wo Filaata nn da bag na ɦà saa Yeesu lee, ɦá ta gwɛɛl n nidfigmii.
42023021	Gwɛntaɦ', bà mɔɔ ka toola na: «Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn! Kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn!»
42023022	Filaata t lɔgm gwɛɛlb tɔmtaɦrm n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿Ĥà koɦl ben mɔmbii? Mà ba nyaan bii bɛɦb ɦan ɦer l´ ka ba na bá kuu-wu bii. Maa mà biir bà gbuu-wu taŋgbanii, lee, mà saa-wu.»
42023023	Bá ka la mɔɔ ŋmɛi ka tidr na bá kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn. Bá ŋmɛi t jum jugun.
42023024	Ĥá saa n tii na bá ɦe ban gbaama bii.
42023025	Ĥá ree ban da bag wii sargan, nid ban da lo sargan na bà da vidg huraamba jugun ɦá ta ku nid wii. Yeesu lee, ɦá saa-wu n ban na bá ɦe ban bag na bà ɦee-wu bii.
42023026	Ban da mad Yeesu ka ked n lee, n taŋ n Simoon Sirɛɛn kɔrgu tia kpena kpam. Tawdba t mug-wu n tul-wu dabragr na ɦá toɦd ka tagd Yeesua kaa.
42023027	Nidfigm da tagda bà kaa, fɔg̈ba kuum ka jokra bà hirii kwɛɛn Yeesua kaa.
42023028	Yeesua t bid ɦayen n fɔg̈bee ween n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Yerusalɛm fɔg̈ba-n! Daa kom-n-ma! Kom-n n` mɔmba n n` bii!
42023029	Biilm, vuugu kena ban kee bà bɔɦɔɔm na: ‟Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii jaantba n fɔg̈ba bá ban meed n bá ta ban ɦɛɛlg felaɦ bee!”
42023030	Tii lee, nidba kee bà bagm na duura lor bá ɦɛn, na dui fiid-ba.
42023031	Ka bá luug tigwɛɦɛɛb de, ¿bà da bà ɦe lan tikparmb?»
42023032	Bà da kena n nidbɛɦba biiba bareɦ na bà ta kuu-ba bá n Yeesua.
42023033	Ban san n taam kaalaŋa ban hoɦ na Jukuuga ree lee, bá kpaɦm Yeesuwu kaalaŋeen dabragr ɦɛn n ta kpaɦm nidbɛɦbee volwu ɦà najuudu ɦɛn, volwu ɦà galu ɦɛn.
42023034	Tii lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà Sa, lɔg v` si-ba! Bà kpaa mi ban ɦɛna bii.» Bá raarm taa ɦá dimt ka taaw t` ɦɛn waari na ɦá bee n jum dimgu kuuguu, ɦà lɔg-ku.
42023035	Kɔrgun nidfigm da jeɦra kan ka geewa. Yuudaa tiiba huraamba bee da laɦl Yeesu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Ndee ɦà da soɦda nidvolba kuumn laa? Ĥá ta soɦdg ɦayen ka ɦà ba na wii nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii!»
42023036	Tawdba mɛɦ da ta laɦl-wu. Bá nyuɦ ɦá man n saɦm-wu daŋmiigu
42023037	n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka ven nnii Yuudaa tiiba huraa, soɦdg vyenwu kuumn!»
42023038	Bá ta ɦoorm ɦá jugu faaga dabragr ɦɛn na: «Nidwunwuna ba na Yuudaa tiiba huraa.»
42023039	Nidbɛɦba bá da ba dabraga ɦɛn bee huuga bilma t ka su Yeesu ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wo ln ba na ven nnii Krist lee, soɦdg vyenwu kuumn, v` ta soɦdg tena!»
42023040	Nidbɛɦvolwii t kpalm-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Kpaa sol Saŋgbandn? Ven, v´ n wun nn ku kuyenm ven!
42023041	Ten lee, kuumnmina mag n tn. Bɛɦgu tn ɦer kuu kaa nnii tn ku kuumnmina. Wii lee, wii ba ɦe bii bɛɦgu.»
42023042	Ĥá ta lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Yeesu! Vn kee v` daan ka ba v` huraantn lee, v` deer mà ɦɛn.»
42023043	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa: Jana má n vn t` kee t` bɛm saŋgbambiim lamɛɛgun.»
42023044	L` da waɦda wo muunu huuga, muunu t lig, nyeet t fiid tant mɛnt kakeɦnan jabr waari ɦitaɦ'.
42023045	Dimbermr ban da radg Saŋgband haar n dii t sad d´ huuga.
42023046	Yeesua t mɔɔm ŋmɛɛga kimm ka bɔɦɔɔ na: « Mà Sa! Mà taagaa mà liliigu v` niɦin.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n kuum.
42023047	Roomaa tawdberm ɦá da ba kan wii nn nyan b` gɛtg bii lee, ɦá nyɔk Saŋgband n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gobiilm, nidwunwuna da ba na nidhɔmn.»
42023048	Bá da daan hiinu bee t yum b´ gɛtg bii. Tii lee, bá ka kulaa ka bakra bà juuni n godiila.
42023049	Yeesua tuurmba mɛmba n ta fɔg̈ba bá da baɦ-wu tagdm Galilee tantn bee t ka jeɦr vɔkun ka geewa b´ gɛta bii.
42023050	-
42023051	Nidɦii da bee bà hoɦ-wu na Yoosɛfa. Ĥà da ba na Yuudaa tiiba kɔrgu ban hoɦ na Ĥarimatee kuun tiin. Ĥà da ba na nidhɔmn, ka ɦɛna ln gbaama na bá ɦɛm lee. Ĥà da hɔda Saŋgband huraant. Ĥà da ba yaani yaadbermba kpaturun, ka kpaɦ bá da ko Yeesua ɦɛn kpaab bee man.
42023052	Ĥá san na Filaata si-wu huru na ɦà lɔg Yeesua gbanu.
42023053	Ĥá hoɦl-ɦu dabragr ɦɛn n fɔm-ɦu dimfeelgun n lo-ɦu bilu ɦuuɦu ban da tiir fiigun n ka ban kuur kan ɦiiwu ɦuu ni.
42023054	L` da ba goor ban maantra voɦoob goor want dii jabr, l` ba na bá baɦdg voɦoob.
42023055	Fɔg̈ba bá da baɦ Yeesuwu tagdm Galilee tantn bee t san Yoosɛfa kaa n ka geewa bilun ka yu Yeesua gbanu nn door kan lee.
42023056	Lee n l` kaan, bá ŋmɛtgii bá haya na bà lɔg kpaam n tlaar kpakunuukaɦm na bà san bà hakr ɦà gbanɦuu. Bá nan voɦoo Saabaat goor wo baɦlb nn gbaam lee.
42024001	Laad goor ɦateekwɛɛn weem, fɔg̈bee t san bilun, ka mad kpakunuukaɦm ban da ɦɔd mii.
42024002	Bá geedgii n midm tand ban da lɔgr n riw bilu noor ɦɛn dii t biruu n ka door kpamga.
42024003	Bá jib bilɦuun n ka ba nyaan Berm Yeesua gbanu.
42024004	Bá ka kpaa miigaa t´ ba na bá diilg tii. Yelmaa daba bareɦba t rorm bá ɦɛn ka fidr dimt t` ŋmɛdwa.
42024005	Fobɛɦgu t mug fɔg̈bee, bá liɦnt bá nɔnii n tiŋa. Dabee t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn bag nidneerwu kpiirmba huugaa?
42024006	Ĥà kpaɦ nnaɦ', ɦà himtg kuumn. Deedg-n gwɛɛt ɦan da bed ka nyi ba Galilee tantn tii ɦɛn!
42024007	Gwɛɛtii nnii na: ‟L` ba na bá mug Nida Budaaga bà taag-ka fubɛɦtiiba niɦin, bà kpaɦ-ka dabragr ɦɛn, l` ɦe goora ɦataɦ', kà himtg kuumn.”»
42024008	Lee, fɔg̈bee t deed gwɛɛtii ɦɛn
42024009	n san n bɔɦɔɔ l´ mɛnguu gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n ɦayenwii, n ta teelvolbee mɛmbee.
42024010	Fɔg̈bee da ba na Maarii Magdalaa tiiwu n Yohaanwu n Maarii Yakooba nya. Fɔgvolba bá da ta ba bà man bee t ka bɔɦɔɔ Yeesua tumtba goyentii.
42024011	Bee t ka diila na fɔg̈bee jaamaan, bá ka ba tii.
42024012	Fetr lee, wii t solm n san bilu ɦɛn, n gbaɦnt n luud ɦú ni n yum dimtofeent ban da fiid-wu tii n jaɦ'. Lee, ɦá ŋmɛt ka kulaa baa, ɦan nyan bii t ɦee-wu yɔlaa.
42024013	Goyendii, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba huuga bareɦba t ka ked kɔrgu kuugun bà hoɦ-ku na Ĥemawuus. Bà ror Yerusalɛm n ɦɛm wo tana kwiɦr n dyen n san kan.
42024014	Bà da bɔɦɔɔ taa bii b´ da gɛtg bii mɛmbii.
42024015	Ban da ked ka gwɛɛla n taa lee, Yeesua mɔma t gewd-ba, wú n ban l´ ka ked.
42024016	Bà da yul-wu gwɛntaɦ', bii ɦɛna na bá daa miig na wii nnii.
42024017	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ked ka bɔɦɔɔ tet?» Lee, bá jeɦnt ka ba n diila.
42024018	Bá ni bilma, ban hoɦ na Kelofaas wii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Ven n jaɦ' v´ goda Yerusalɛm kɔrgun ka kpaa mi bii b´ gɛtg goorɦanɦenan bii laa?»
42024019	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿Ben ɦer?» Bá leed-wu na: «Bii b´ gɛtg Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia ɦɛn bii. Da gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbermɦiin. Ĥà werii ɦà gemmnt ɦá gwɛɛlbn n ɦà ɦɛbn Saŋgband nɔngan n kɔrgu mɛngu nɔngan.
42024020	T` gotibermba n t` huraamba t to-wu na bá kuu-wu, lee, n kpaɦm-wu dabragr ɦɛn.
42024021	Tii da daaga na wii kee ɦà daɦ Yisraɦeel tigr jugu. Welee mɛnguu, jana nnii gotaɦrd ln ɦer.
42024022	L` ba gobiilm na t` huuga fɔg̈ba biiba ɦera l´ ɦɛm-t yɔlaa. Bà san ɦateekwɛɛn weem bilu ɦɛn,
42024023	gwɛntaɦ', bà ba nyaan ɦá gbanu bilun. Bá ŋmɛtgn n bɔɦɔɔ-t na bà nyana saŋgbantumtba t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na ɦà neeran.
42024024	T` tuurmba biiba t san bilu ɦɛn, n ta yum wo fɔg̈bee nn ta bed lee. Wii lee, bà ba nyaan-wu.»
42024025	Tii lee, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` kpaɦ n rarm! L` bee-n gemm na n` tii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed tii!
42024026	¿L` da kpaɦ na Saŋgband nn bantg wii di kunyɔŋu saɦ na ɦà soɦdg nyɔkb?»
42024027	Lee, ɦá ree ban da ɦɔd ɦà gwɛɛt tii kɔtɔd ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba, ka baɦ n Mohiisa wadii kakeɦnan gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadii mɛnii.
42024028	Ban san n taam kɔrgu gwɛɛt soɦdgtba nn ked kuu man lee, ɦá ɦɛm wo ɦà bo na ɦà kedii n nɔngan.
42024029	Gwɛntaɦ', bá kirm n wun ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpat t` man! Jabr fɛtg jabm, nyingu t ka nyinaa.» Ĥá jib haaga na wú n ban l´ go.
42024030	Wú n ban l´ kad diit deb, ɦá lɔgm kpoonu n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n gbeɦm n saɦm-ba.
42024031	Lee, bá niini t went bá miig-wu, gwɛntaɦ', ɦá boorm bá nɔngan.
42024032	Bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Ln bɛm wo t` kwɛɛwan hugl n nyaag̈b ɦá nn gwɛɛlm n tn hurun ka rea-t wadiin gwɛɛt kɔtɔd lee, ¿laa bee?»
42024033	Bá vid yelmaa n ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n san n midm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kwiɦr n ɦayenwii t kpogl taa bá n bà tuurmba.
42024034	Bá bɔɦɔɔ bareɦbee na: «Berma himtg gobiilm! Simoona nyana-wu!»
42024035	Bee mɔmba t ta kɛɛml b´ gɛtg hurun n lan nnii ban da miig-wu kpooni gbeɦb man lee.
42024036	Ban da ɦeewr gwɛɛtii n bɔɦɔɔb lee wenii, Yeesua mɔma t daan bá man, bá tud ɦan jeɦr bà huuga. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nigiigu bɛm n` man!»
42024037	Fobɛɦgu t kuum-ba. L` da ɦera-ba wo bà nyana kuum.
42024038	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿Ben haam n` rarm? ¿N` nigaa n bee?
42024039	Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan mà niɦi n mà nakpantaart! Mà mɔmn. Tarm-n mà gbanu n` nyaana! Kuum kpaɦ n gbanu n kowa mà dela, wo n` mɔmba nn ta yu n n` niini lee.»
42024040	Ĥan bed-ba gwɛɛtii lee, n werii-ba ɦá niɦi n ɦà nakpantaart.
42024041	Lamɛɛgu t hu bá kwɛɛwan biii, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa yem l` kpaɦ tinaɦ', bá ka la kpaa bea na bà tii. Lee, ɦá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` ba n bii nnaɦreen wo bá dia?»
42024042	Bá saɦm-wu ɦɔlfɛtkaɦga gbeɦr.
42024043	Ĥá soɦd-d, n jum-d bá nɔngan.
42024044	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Gwɛɛt man da ree n bɔɦɔɔ-n ka nyi bee n` man tii nnanaɦ': l` ba na bii ban ɦɔd l` baɦr n man Mohiisa wadiin, n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadiin, n yumii wadgan bii mɛmbii ɦe l´ jugun welee.»
42024045	Lee wen nnii ɦan saa bá rarm t went na bá bee bà ɦom Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt kɔtɔd hɔm,
42024046	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` ɦɔda na, l` ba na Saŋgband nn bantg wii di kunyɔŋu, l` saa gotaɦrd goorii, ɦà himtg kuumn ɦà neer.
42024047	Lee, bà faam Gohɔmt n ɦà hidrn tiga mɛna nɔngan. L` ba na bá baɦ Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bà hoɦ nidba na bá lagii neerm, ka bo na bà soɦdg fubɛɦii waam Saŋgband nuɦun.
42024048	Nen beel n` jeɦnt mà kaa gwɛɛtii ɦɛn.
42024049	Mà mɔma, mà daa mà tuun bii mà Sa nn da bed na ɦà nan saɦl bii, b` hoɦntn n` ɦɛn. Tii lee, l` ba na n` kpat n` bɛm Yerusalɛm kɔrgun kakeɦnan goor saŋgbambiimn gemmnt daa hoɦntna n` ɦɛn.»
42024050	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesua t lɔgm-ba n ree-ba kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn, l` nyɔɦr n Betaanii kɔrgu. Reekan, ɦá vii ɦá niɦi n kaawl bá ɦɛn.
42024051	Ĥan da ɦeewr bà ɦɛn n kaawlb lee, n sad n ban, l´ vii-wu n saŋgbambiimn.
42024052	L´ saa bee lee, bá doot-wu tiŋan ka jeeŋla-wu. L´ tog, bá ŋmɛt ka kulaa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, nyaag̈b t hu bà ni biii.
42024053	Reekan, bá ka kpogla taa Saŋgband haarn hɛruɦ ka nyɔka-d.
43001001	Weem kɔtɔdn, ɦii ɦà ba na gwɛɛt wii da beeln. Ĥà da ba Saŋgband man, ka ba na wii mɔm nnii Saŋgband.
43001002	Weem kɔtɔdn, ɦá ba na gwɛɛt wii n Saŋgband l´ da beeln.
43001003	Wii ree bii b´ bee bii mɛmbii. Bii byenb mɔmb kpaɦ l` kpaɦ na wii ree-b.
43001004	Wii ni nnii neerm nn da bee. Neermii nnii da nidba wiinga.
43001005	Wiinga wiira nyeetn, nyeetii t ka ba bee n fiid-ka.
43001006	Nidɦii t rorm, l` ba na Saŋgband tamn-wu. Bà da hoɦl-wu na Yohanɛɛsa.
43001007	Ĥà da daan na ɦà biir wiingee gwɛɛt, ka bo na nidba mɛmba ɦom-t, bà tii kà ɦɛn.
43001008	Lag da wii nnii wiingee, wii da daan na ɦà biir ká gwɛɛt n jaɦ'.
43001009	Gwɛɛtii nnii gobiint wiinga. Kee nnii ká da kena tant ɦɛn ka wiir nidba mɛmba.
43001010	Ĥii ɦà ba na gwɛɛt wii da ba weem tant ɦɛn. Biilm, Saŋgband tag n wii ɦɛn n ree tant, gwɛntaɦ, ɦii t ka ba miig-wu.
43001011	Ĥà daan ɦaa, gwɛntaɦ, ɦá reba t ka ba soɦdg-wu.
43001012	Biiba t la soɦd-wu n tii ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn. Biiba bá soɦdg-wu bee mɛmbee, ɦá saɦm-ba huru na bá kitg Saŋgband bii.
43001013	¿Bà kitg Saŋgband bii wo ban maad leen?, laa ¿wo ɦii nn kita daawɦii buga leen?, laa ¿mina nidɦii sɔklbnn? Ĥaai! Saŋgband sira-ba neerkwɛɛlm.
43001014	L´ saa, ɦá ba na gwɛɛt wii t kit nida. Ĥà da neera t` huuga ka hu hɔmgu n gobiint. T` nyana ɦá nyɔkb bermt. Nyɔkb Budaaga kayengee nn soɦdg ká Sa man bii.
43001015	Ká kaa tawd Yohanɛɛsa da faa na: «Kpay-n man da bed-n ɦà gwɛɛt mà wen da bɔɦɔɔ na: Ĥá kena mà kaa wii yatg-ma bermt. Ĥà da bee weem bà ban ɦe mà fuuga.»
43001016	L` hugl t` mɛmbee n ɦà kɛgt. Ĥà foɦlg t` ɦɛn hɔmgu jugu jugu taa kaa.
43001017	Biilm, Saŋgband da tag n Mohiis n to-t baɦlb. Hɔmgu n gobiint lee, Yeesu Krista daan n tii.
43001018	Ĥii ban nyaan Saŋgband felaɦ'. Gwɛntaɦaa, Saŋgband Budaaga kayenga, kà ta ba na Saŋgbandn, ká n Sa bà neera taa ni, kee ree-d n werii-t.
43001019	Kpay-n Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt! Yerusalɛm Yuudaa tiiba bermba da ree gotiiba n bà tɔrgtba biiba n tamn-ba ɦá man na bá gbaam-wu na ¿Wii nnii wenii?
43001020	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba gobiint ka kpaa rɔd bii felaɦ'. Ĥà da ree n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Lag man nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.»
43001021	Bá lilm-wu gbaamb na: «Lee de, ¿ven nnii wen mɔmn?, ¿ven nnii Ĥelii laa?» Ĥá leed na: «Lag man nnii Ĥelia.» Bá ŋmɛt n gbaam-wu na: «Ĥia! ¿Ven nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtn?» Ĥá leed na: «Ĥaai.»
43001022	Lee wen bá tid-wu na: «¿Ven nnii wenn? L` ba na t` san t` leedg lii bá tamn-t bee. ¿Vii lɔg vyen na wenn?»
43001023	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Man lee, man nnii noor gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya nn bɔɦɔɔ d´ gwɛɛt dii na: Nidɦii toola kpamloŋun na: Maantr-n Sabermwu huru!»
43001024	Ban da tamn bee da ba na Farisii kpaturu tiiban.
43001025	Bá lilm-wu gbaamb ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka l` kpaɦ na ven nnii Krist laa, Ĥelii laa, gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta, ¿v´ ka huur nidba Saŋgband nyaalm na la?»
43001026	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Man lee, maa huura-n n nyaalm. Lee, ɦii bee n` man n` kpaa mii-wu.
43001027	Ĥà kena mà kaa. Mà kpaa tɔn na mà gbentg ɦà nanawda ŋmiɦi.»
43001028	Gwɛɛtii da gɛtg Betaanii kɔrgun, Yɔrdaan kol toŋu kwɛɛn. Ree nnii Yohanɛɛsa nn da huur nidba.
43001029	Goorii toŋu vɛtr, Yohanɛɛsa t yum Yeesua kenna. Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n Saŋgband Fɛɛbuga! Kee nawda tant ɦɛn nidba fubɛɦga.
43001030	Kee gwɛɛt nnii man da kɛɛma-n, mà wen da bɔɦɔɔ na ‟daawɦii kena mà kaa, wii yatg-ma bermt, blaɦb kaa, ɦà da bee bà ban ɦe mà fuuga”.
43001031	Maa da kpaa mii-wu. Lee, mà huura nidba nyaalmn ka bo na Yisraɦeel tigr miig-wu.»
43001032	Nyaalm huurt Yohanɛɛsa ɦigaa gwɛɛtii jugun ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà nyana Voɦoom Buudm hoɦntna n saŋgbambiimn kurŋmɛnd dela n daan n kpat ɦà jugun.
43001033	Maa da kpaa mi na wii nnii. Lee, Saŋgband da tamn-ma na mà huurm nyaalmn. D` da beda-ma na: ‟Kee v` nyaan Voɦoom t hoɦntn n kpat ɦii ɦɛn. Wii nnii ɦá kee ɦà huurm nidba n Voɦoom Buudm”.
43001034	Tii lee, mà nyana-t n mà niini. Tii nnii man bɔɦɔɔ jana goorii na nidwii nnii Saŋgband Budaaga.»
43001035	Toŋu t vɛt, Yohanɛɛsa t ŋmɛtgn kan wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bareɦba t ka bee.
43001036	Ĥá yum Yeesua beraa n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n Saŋgband Fɛɛbuga!»
43001037	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtbee t ɦom gwɛɛt ɦan bed tii n ka tagd Yeesua kaa.
43001038	Yeesua t bid ɦayen n mid bà tagd-wu. Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿N` bag bee?» Bá leed-wu na: « Raabii, ¿go tee?» –Raabii kɔtɔd nnii na weriita.–
43001039	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Daan-n n` nyaan!» Bá tag-wu nan le n san n yum ɦá kan go. L` da ba jabr waari ɦinaaɦi weenn. Bá fɛl goorii ɦà man.
43001040	Simoon Fetra teel Ĥandrea da ba nidba bareɦbee huuga. Bee da ɦomra Yohanɛɛsa noon gwɛɛt n tag Yeesua kaa.
43001041	Ĥá san saɦ n yum ɦá teel Simoon n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «T` nyana Mesia.» –Mesia kɔtɔd nnii na Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii.–
43001042	L` saa ɦá san-wu n Yeesua man. Yeesua t geed-wu hɔm n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ven nnii Yohanɛɛsa kwɛɛl Simoona. Lee, gwelŋa, baa bà hoɦm-v na Sefaasa, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na fiigu.»
43001043	Toŋu t vɛt, Yeesua t ka bo na ɦà ŋmɛtgii Galilee tantn. Ĥá san n taŋ n Filf n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Tagd mà kaa!»
43001044	Filfa da ba na Betsayidaa tiin. Ta Ĥandreewu n Fetr bá kɔrgun.
43001045	Filfwii t san n yum Natanɦeel n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «T` nyana Mohiiswu n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed ɦá gwɛɛt bá wadiin wii. Wii nnii Yeesua, Nasarɛɛt tii Yoosɛfa kwɛɛla.»
43001046	Natanɦeela t leed-wu na: «Nasarɛɛtii, ¿bii hɔmb ba b` bee b` rɛn Nasarɛɛt?» Filfa t leed-wu na: «Daan v` nyaan n v` nɔmb!»
43001047	Yeesua t yum Natanɦeela kenna. Lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦá jugun na: «Kpay-n Yisraɦeel tia mɔma, rarbɛɦm kpaɦ ɦà ni!»
43001048	Natanɦeela t gbaam-wu na: «¿Ĥer lan n ka mii-ma?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Saɦ na Filfa hoɦ-v, v` wen nn bɛm tiib kwɛɛn, maa t nyaan-v.»
43001049	Natanɦeela t bɔɦɔɔ na: « Raabii, ven nnii Saŋgband Budaaga, ven nnii Yisraɦeel huraa.»
43001050	Ĥá tɔgd n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Tia welee na man bed na mà nyana-v tiib kwɛɛn laa? Kee v` nyaan wanvont t´ ba bermt ka yata wennaɦ'.»
43001051	Lee, n hewl na: «Biilm, mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, n` kee n` nyaan saŋgbambiim t rawdg, l` saa saŋgbantumtba kota ka hoɦntna Nida Budaaga jugun.»
43002001	Gotaɦrd goor bà da jul yaala kasant Kaanaa, Galilee tantn. Yeesua nya da ba kan.
43002002	Bà da hoɦ Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba kasantiin.
43002003	Daam t dan n ka fad. Yeesua nya t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bà halwa daam.»
43002004	Yeesuwii t leed-wu na: «Taa nya! ¿Má n vn n tet? Lag v` gwɛɛtn. Mà waaru ban taan.»
43002005	Ĥá nya t bɔɦɔɔ kasantii man ŋmɛɛɦeedba na: «Ĥee-n ɦan ba ɦà biir-n tii mɛntii jugun!»
43002006	Dafora ɦaroond da ba kan, bá ɦee-ɦa n tana. Yuudaa tiiba da ɦɛna-ɦa n bà nakakeet hig̈b kowt. Bilmr da lɔgl wo wombii kwɛɦniind laa wombii lɛmu n kwɛɛrɛɦ'.
43002007	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Hugl-n daforɦee n nyaalm!» Bá hugl-ɦa fimfim.
43002008	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «gwelŋa, koodg-n jaɦ n` san n kasant berma!» Bá kood n san n.
43002009	Kasant bermwii t lɛm n mid nyaalmii ba na daamn. Wii da kpaa mi daamii kan manan. Ŋmɛɛɦeedbee lee, bee mi, l` kɔtɔd na bee da riira nyaalmii. Kasant berma t hoɦ yaala tii
43002010	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bà saɦl dahɔmm saɦ', nidba wen nyi l` kuum-ba lee, bá ka saɦ daam m´ kpaɦ hɔm mii. Ven lee, vii kpɛɦdr dahɔmm kakeɦnan gwelŋa.»
43002011	Welee nnii Yeesua nn da ɦer ɦà hoolnoogrgu. Ĥà da ɦera-ku Kaanaa, Galilee tantn. Ĥà da ree ɦà nyɔkb n werii ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t tii ɦà jugun.
43002012	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá tiɦd Kafarnahuum kɔrgun wú n ɦá nyawu n ɦà teelba n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba. Bá ɦɛm kan goora ɦalanɦa n jaɦ'.
43002013	Yuudaa tiiba kasant ban hoɦ na Gɛtgm kasant tii da nyuɦnn. Lee, Yeesua t kot Yerusalɛm kɔrgun
43002014	n san Saŋgband haarn, n mid nidba yagla yaku ka gweedma naagi n fɛi n kurŋmɛna, lig̈blagiitba kad bà kpela man.
43002015	Ĥan nyan welee lee, n lɔgm ŋmiɦi n ɦɛm taŋgbanga n voom bá mɛmbee, bá rorm Saŋgband haarn bá n bà fɛi n bà naagɦii. Ĥá yadr lig̈blagiitba lig̈bia n daɦii bá kpela.
43002016	Lee, n bɔɦɔɔ kurŋmɛngweedmtba na: «Nyablg-n wenɦee nnaɦ'! Daa lɔg-n mà Sa haar d` kitg yaku!»
43002017	Lee wen, gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t deed Wadbuudgan gwɛɛtntina na: Ĥoo, Saŋgband! Sɔklb man ba n v` haar bnaa, b` hɔɦl mà ni wo bogm.
43002018	Lee, Yuudaa tiiba t tɔgd n bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Hoolteku nnii vn ba v` ɦe l` werii na ba n noor na v` ɦe wennaɦ?»
43002019	Yeesua t leed-ba na: «Gbuɦ-n Saŋgband disakunkuna, maa ba mà lɔg goora ɦataɦ mà vii-ku.»
43002020	Bá leed-wu na: «¿Lan nnii welee? Bà lɔgra bina kwɛɦnaa n ɦaroond n mɔɦm-ku, ¿vii t ka ba v` bee v` lɔg goora ɦataɦ n jaɦ v` ŋmɛtg v` vii-ku?»
43002021	Saŋgband disaku Yeesua nn da bɔɦɔɔ kù gwɛɛt kuu nnii ɦayen ɦà gbanu.
43002022	Kaa n kaann, Yeesua nn da himtg kuumn lee, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t deed na ɦà da beda gwɛɛtii, lee, n tii Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt ɦɛn, n ta tii gwɛɛt ɦan da bed tii ɦɛn.
43002023	Yeesua nn da ba Yerusalɛm na ɦà di Gɛtgm kasant lee, nidba kɔd t yum hoolgu ɦan da ɦɛna kuu n tii ɦá ɦɛn.
43002024	Gwɛntaɦaa, ɦà da kpaa nawla ɦayen n ban. Biilm, ɦà da miil bà mɛmbee hɔm.
43002025	Ĥà da kpaa haaraa na ɦii biir-wu tiit nidba jugun. Ĥà da miil bii b´ ba nida kwɛɛwrn bii.
43003001	Nidɦii da ba Farisii tiiba kpaturun bà hoɦ-wu na Nikɔɔdɛma. Ĥà da ba na Yuudaa tiiba huraaɦiin.
43003002	Ĥá daan n nyingu n yum Yeesu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: « Raabii, t` miil na Saŋgband tamn-v na v` weriim-t. Biilm, ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà ɦe hoolgu ɦɛb vn ɦɛna bii ka Saŋgband kpaɦ ɦà man.»
43003003	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà nyaan Saŋgband huraant ka l` ba lil-wu maadb.»
43003004	Nikɔɔdɛma t gbaam-wu na: «¿Lan nnii kpalma nn ba ɦà bee ɦà ɦe na bá lil-wu maadb? ¿Ĥà ba ɦà bee ɦà ta ŋmɛtg ɦà nya raawtn na bá mɔɔg-wu maadb?»
43003005	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà jib Saŋgband huraantn ka l` ba meed-wu n nyaalm n Voɦoom.
43003006	Ĥii nida nn meedr wii ba na nidn. L` saa ɦii Voɦoom Buudm nn maad wii ba na voɦoomn.
43003007	L´ daa ɦɛm-v yɔlaa na mà beda-v na: ‟L` ba na l` lil-v maadb”.
43003008	Ĥam fugl m´ kan sɔkl, v` ɦum m` damb, lee, kpaa mi m` kan manan, ta kpaa mi m´ kan ked, ¿laa bee? L` ta ba yenmii n ɦii Voɦoom Buudm nn meedr wii.»
43003009	Lee wen, Nikɔɔdɛma t leed ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Lan nnii welee nn ba l` bee l` ɦea?»
43003010	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ven nnii Yisraɦeel weriitberm nnii v` ka kpaa mi tintii.
43003011	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v gobiint na waa, t` gwɛɛla ka bɔɦɔɔ tn mi bii, ka ta taaw tn nyan bii kaa, gwɛntaɦ, nii kpaa bag na n` soɦdg tn taaw b` kaa bii.
43003012	Ka mà bɔɦɔɔ-n tantntina ɦɛn gwɛɛt n` kpaa bag na n` tii, ¿lan nnii nn kee n` ɦe n` tii man kee mà bɔɦɔɔm-n gobiint gwɛɛt t´ hɛl b´ ba saŋgbambiimn bii?
43003013	Ĥii ban kotg saŋgbambiimn ka l` kpaɦ na Nida Budaaga. Kee rɛn kan n hoɦntn tant ɦɛn.
43003014	Wo Mohiisa nn da kudr waag̈b n kudnaŋ̈mɔlgu kpamkparmgun n viil-b n faaga dabiir noon lee, ta welee nnii ln ba na l` vii Nida Budaaga n faaga,
43003015	ka bo na baaben tii ɦá tia ká ɦɛn wii yuuŋ neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii.
43003016	Biilm, Saŋgband sɔkl nidba mɛmba biii. Tii kaa nnii dn sir d` Buga kayenga na nid baaben tii ɦá tia ká ɦɛn wii fetg kuumn ɦà soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii.
43003017	Saŋgband ba tamn d` Budaaga na ká yaa nidba n yaagu, d` tamn-ka na nidba soɦdg jugu daɦb ka tagaa n kee ɦɛn.
43003018	Bà kpaa yaa ɦii ɦá tia ká ɦɛn wiiwu n yaagu, gwɛntaɦaa, ɦii ɦá kpaa tia kà ɦɛn wii, l` fɛtg ɦà tobr darm, blaɦb kaa na ɦà ba lo ɦà daag̈b Saŋgband Budaaga kayengee ɦɛn.
43003019	Kpay nan tobr darm kan mana! Yaagu nnii na wiinga daan tant ɦɛn, lee, nidba t sɔkl nyeet n saa-ka na bá ŋmɛɛgt ba bɛɦt.
43003020	Biilm, ɦá ɦɛna bɛɦgu wii kir wiinga, n ka kpaa bag na ɦà riir wiingan ka sol na bá daa nyaan ɦá bɛɦgu.
43003021	Lee, ɦii ɦà neerm magr n gobiint wii ror wiingan na bà nyaan bii ɦan ɦɛna bii hɔm, l` kɔtɔd na ɦà ɦɛna ɦà ŋmɛɛgt ka vala Saŋgband.»
43003022	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesuwu n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá san Yuudee tantn. Wú n ban bà ɦɛm kan goora ɦalanɦa, ɦà huur nidba.
43003023	Yohanɛɛsa da ta huura nidba Ĥenoon. Kɔrguu ba Saliim reku kpamga. Nyaalm da ba kan kɔd. Nidba kɔd da kena ɦà man na ɦà hor-ba.
43003024	Biilm, l´ vuugu, bà ban riw Yohanɛɛswu sarga.
43003025	Lee, Yohanɛɛsa gwɛɛt soɦdgtba biiba n Yuudaa tiiɦii bá ka gwɛɛla l` baɦr n nakakeet hig̈b kowt.
43003026	Bá san n yum Yohanɛɛs n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: « Raabii! ¿Deera nid ɦá da daan v` man Yɔrdaan kol bal wii ɦɛnii? Da beda-t ɦà gwɛɛt, gwelŋa ɦà huura nidba la! L` saa nidba mɛmba ked wii man.»
43003027	Ĥá tɔgd n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà lo ɦayenwu ŋmɛɛg̈b biib ka ba soɦdg-b Saŋgband man.
43003028	N` mɔmba, n` ba n` bee n` teew mà kaa na mà bam ka bɔɦɔɔ na lag man nnii Krista, Saŋgband nn bantg wii, gwɛntaɦ, bà tamn-ma ɦà nɔngan.
43003029	Ĥii ɦá heɦ fɔg wii nnii sida. Sida tuur lee, wii t ka ba sidwii kpamga ka kewla-wu. Ĥan ɦum ɦà noor lee, l´ ka saɦ-wu nyaag̈b. Mà nyaag̈b nn ba nnii. Gwelŋa b` ba b` kpaalaa.
43003030	L` ba na wii berŋ̈m, l` saa maa gwiɦda.
43003031	«Ĥá mana n faagan wii beel l` mɛnguu jugun. Ĥii ɦá ba na tant heɦl-wu wii bɔɦɔɔ want t´ ba tant jugun tii gwɛɛt. L` saa ɦii ɦá rɛn saŋgbambiimn n daan wii, wii beel l´ mɛnguu jugun.
43003032	Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ bii ɦan nyan n ɦom bii gwɛɛt, lee, ɦii kpaa tia ɦà ret bɔɦɔɔ tii.
43003033	Ĥii ɦá tia ɦan taaw t´ kaa tii wii rea ka bɔɦɔɔ na Saŋgband bɔɦɔɔ gobiint.
43003034	Saŋgband nn tamn wii bɔɦɔɔ d` mɔmr noon gwɛɛt, blaɦb kaa na, dii to-wu d´ Voɦoom kpaalaa.
43003035	Sa sɔkla Budaaga n lo want mɛnt ká nuɦun.
43003036	Ĥii ɦà tia Budaagee ɦɛn wii, ɦà ba n neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii. L´ saa ɦii ɦá kpaa tia kà ɦɛn wii kpaɦ n welee neermii. Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga ba ɦà jugun.»
43004001	Farisii tiiba t ɦom na Yeesua da huura nidba, ɦá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba yada ka yata Yohanɛɛsa reba.
43004002	Ka ba na t` biir gobiint, Yeesua mɔma da kpaa huur ɦii. Ĥà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba da huuran.
43004003	Yeesua wen miig welee, ɦá nyab Yuudee tantn n ŋmɛtgii Galilee tantn.
43004004	L` da ba na ɦà gɛtg n Samarii tantn.
43004005	Welee nnii ɦan da taai Samarii kɔrgu kuugun bà hoɦ-ku na Sikaar. Reekan nyɔɦra n koogu Yakooba nn da to ɦà kwɛɛl Yoosɛfwu kuu.
43004006	Ta ree nnii Yakooba lɔku nn da ta bee. Huru da gira Yeesua, ɦá kad lɔkuu gbiir ɦɛn. L´ da ba l` bɛm wo muunsɔbr.
43004007	Samarii fɔgɦii t daan na ɦà ri nyaalm, Yeesua t gwɛɛl n wun ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Hai! si-ma nyaalm mà nyi!»
43004008	Ĥá gwɛɛt soɦdgtba da san kɔrgun na bà daɦ diit.
43004009	Fɔg̈wii t leed-wu na: «Ven nnii Yuudaa tia, l` saa maa ba na Samarii tia, ¿l´ ɦɛm lan na v` jam-ma nyaalm na v` nyia?» –Biilm, Yuudaa tiiba n Samarii tiiba da kpaa gwɛɛla n taa.–
43004010	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ka vn miim hɔmgu Saŋgband nn saɦ kuu, ka ta mi ɦii ɦà bɔɦɔɔ na v` si-wu nyaalm ɦà nyi wii, ven nn ba v` jam-wu nyaalm, l` saa ɦan si-v neerm nyaalm.»
43004011	Fɔg̈wii t leed-wu na: «Berma, kpaa mad riidgu, l` saa lɔku ta ba kilmgu, ¿ɦn ba v` ree teekan neerm nyaalm laɦm v` si-ma?
43004012	¿Ba berm ka yata t` yandaa Yakooba? Wii da to-t lɔkunkuna. Wii mɔma nyira kù nyaalm, ɦá bii n ɦà kodiira t ta nyim-m.»
43004013	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ĥii ɦà nyi nyaalmnmina wii, nyunyuudu nan mɔɔ-wu kuuŋa.
43004014	L` ba na nyaalm man kee mà si mii, ɦii ɦà kee ɦà nyii-m wii lee, nyunyuudu nan kpaa kuu-wu felaɦ'. Yanta, nyaalm man ba mà si-wu mii ba m` kitg ɦà ni bilga ká kpaa nyiida kee, kà gbuɦm kakeɦnan neerm m` bee kakeɦnan miin.»
43004015	Fɔg̈wii t hel n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Berma, si-ma nan welee nyaalmii na nyunyuudu daa kuum-ma na mà daa ta kenm bii nnaɦreen ka ri nyaalm.»
43004016	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ked v` hoɦn v` sida!»
43004017	Fɔg̈wii t leed-wu na: «Mà kpaɦ n sida.» Ĥá ŋmɛl-wu na: «Ba n gobiint na v` biir na kpaɦ n sida.
43004018	Biilm, fɛtg yaala tɔmb mnu, lee, daaw vn ba ɦá man gwelŋalena wii kpaɦ na v` sidn. Vn bed tii ba gobiint.»
43004019	Fɔg̈wii t leed na: «Berma, mà ɦilwa na ven nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii.
43004020	T` yandaba da doora Saŋgband tiŋan duurndina jugun. Yuudaa tiiba nen lee, nii bɔɦɔɔ ka diɦaa n n` ni na Yerusalɛm nnii ln ba na bà door-d tiŋan.»
43004021	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Taa nya, tiim welee na waaru kenan, l` kpaa kee l` bɛm na duurndina ɦɛn laa Yerusalɛm nnii nn ba n` door Sawu tiŋan.
43004022	Nii doora n` reb kpaa mi bii tiŋan, ten lee, tii doora t` reb mi bii tiŋan na jugu daɦb rɛn Yuudaa tiiba man.
43004023	Waaru kenan, biilm, ɦù fɛtg taanm na bá door Sawu tiŋan gobiint bee, bá door-wu tiŋan n bà voɦoom n ta gobiint, blaɦb kaa na mà Sa bagl nidba bá door-wu tiŋan welee bee.
43004024	Saŋgband ba na Voɦoomn, l´ ka ba na bá door-d tiŋan bee, bá door-d tiŋan n bà voɦoom n ta gobiint.»
43004025	Fɔg̈wii t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà miil na Mesii, ban ta hoɦ na Krist wii ba ɦà daan. Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii. Ĥà daa kenaa, ɦà ree-t l` mɛnguu wiingan.»
43004026	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Man, man gwɛɛla n vn man, man nnii ɦii ɦá bee wii.»
43004027	Lee wen, ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t taan. L` ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa biii na bá nyaan Yeesua gwɛɛla n fɔga. Gwɛntaɦ, bà ni bilma mɔma ba gbaam-wu na ¿ɦà bag ben ɦà man?, laa, ¿ben kaa nnii ɦan gwɛɛla n wuna?
43004028	Yeesua nn leedg-wu welee lee, fɔg̈wii t saa kan ɦà dafod n san kɔrgun n san n baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ nidba na:
43004029	«Daan-n n` nyaan nidɦia! Ĥà beda-ma man ɦer bii mɛmbii, ¿l` kpaɦ l` ɦe na Krist Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii?»
43004030	Nidba t rorm ka ked Yeesua man.
43004031	Lee wen, ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba tidr-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: « Raabii, jum diit!»
43004032	Lee, wii t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Diit maa nn ba n na mà jum tii, nii kpaa mii-t.»
43004033	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ka gbaama taa na: «¿Ĥii daanii-wu n diit ɦá jum laa?»
43004034	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ ka nyata-ba na: «Mà diit nnii na mà ɦɛm ɦii ɦá tamn-ma wii sɔklb, na mà ta fɛlg hɔm ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦan taag mà nuɦun bii.
43004035	Gwelŋa, n` bɔɦɔɔ na l` guura kidii hinaa na bà lɔg dikaɦb, ¿laa bee? Man lee, maa bɔɦɔɔ-n na, muudg-n n` niini n` geedg n` nyaan kpamt nn ba lee, dikaɦb biira na bá lɔgm.
43004036	Ĥii ɦá lɔg dikaɦb gwelŋa wii soɦda ɦà fat, ka ta kpogla dikaɦb na b´ jib neerm m` bee kakeɦnan miin. Welee lee, ɦá da bodr n ɦá lɔg dikaɦb wii, bà nyaaga bà mɛmbee.
43004037	Nnaɦ weraa na nawdlam m´ bɔɦɔɔ na ɦii buuda jeena t lɔgm dikaɦb mii ba gobiint.
43004038	Maa tomra n´ lɔgm dikaɦb ka da ba gi kan bii. Jeenba da ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b l` giid-ba, nii t san n soɦd bá ŋmɛɛg̈b giidm.»
43004039	Kɔrguun, Samarii tiiba kɔd t tii Yeesua ɦɛn fɔg̈wii nn da bed-ba na ɦà beda-wu ɦan ɦer bii mɛmbii l` kaa.
43004040	Tii kaa nnii ban da daan Yeesua man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá bɛm bà man. Lee, Yeesua t ɦɛm bá man goora ɦarɛɦ'.
43004041	Nidba kɔd t hel n soɦd ɦá gwɛɛt
43004042	n ka bɔɦɔɔ fɔg̈wii na: «T` tia ɦà ɦɛn, lag na vn kɛɛm-t tii kaa, lee, t` tia t` mɔmba tn ɦomr ɦà noon tii kaa. Welee nnii tn miig na wii nnii tant juuni daɦd biilm.»
43004043	Yeesua nn da ɦer Samarii goora ɦarɛɦ lee, n dan n vid kan n ŋmɛtgii Galilee tantn.
43004044	Biilm, wii mɔma da bɔɦɔɔ na bà kpaa vala gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwu ɦayen ɦà kɔrgu.
43004045	Ĥan taai Galilee lee, kan tiiba t la soɦd-wu hɔm, l´ kɔtɔd na bee mɔmba da san kasant deb Yerusalɛm n ta yum hoolgu ŋmɛɛgt mɛnt ɦan da ɦer kan tii.
43004046	Ĥá ŋmɛtgii Kaanaa Galilee tantn, ɦá kan da ɦer nyaalm t kit daam ree. Huraa tawdbermɦii da ba Kafarnahuum, ɦà kwɛɛla ba n bɛɦii l` ba kakaku.
43004047	Nidwii nn ɦomr na Yeesua rɛn Yuudee tantn n ŋmɛtgn Galilee tantn lee, ɦá san n yum-wu n ka jobla-wu na ɦá daan ɦà gbaad ɦà kwɛɛl na ɦà bo na ɦà fɛlg.
43004048	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿L` ba na n` nyaan hoolgu ɦɛb n ŋmɛɛgi ɦí weraa Saŋgband gemmnt ɦii le n` tia?»
43004049	Tawdwii la ɦigr na: «Berma, ked weem mà kwɛɛla ban fɛlg!»
43004050	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Keda, kuliim vaa, v` kwɛɛla namtn ba hɔm!» Nidwii t tii Yeesua gwɛɛt ɦɛn n gɛt ka kulaa.
43004051	Ĥan da kulaa lee, ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba t tuug-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` kwɛɛla namtn ba hɔm.»
43004052	Ĥá gbaam-ba na: «¿Waarteɦu ɦɛn nnii ln da wentg-wu?» Bá leed-wu na: «Dindiin muunun waaru ɦuyenɦu ween nnii tulgu nn da nyab ɦà ɦɛn.»
43004053	Sawii t ɦiluu n yum na waarɦuu ɦɛn nnii Yeesua nn da bed-wu na ɦá kwɛɛla namtn ba hɔm. Tii lee, daawwii n ɦà haar mɛnd t tii Yeesua ɦɛn.
43004054	Yeesua hoolreɦdrgu nnii ɦan da ɦer Galilee. Ĥà da ɦera-ku ka rɛn n Yuudee tantn.
43005001	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesua t kot Yerusalɛm na ɦà di Yuudaa tiiba kowt tiit kasant.
43005002	Kɔrguun, biir diir da ba fiid noor ban hoɦ na Fɛɛbii Fiidnoor dii man ka ba n bibida dandai hinu bà hoɦ-d n hebrmn na Betesdaa.
43005003	Bɛɦtiiba kɔd da doora dandai kwɛɛn. Bɛɦtiibee nnii joomba n kparuuba n balmdindmba. [Bà da doora ka hɔd na biiriin nyaalm dam,
43005004	blaɦb kaa na Saberma tumtɦii da hoɦntna biiriin ka dama nyaalmii. Bɛɦtinoogr ɦá da jiba nyaalmiin m´ damb kaann wii, ɦá bɛɦii da wenta-wu ka hilaɦii la ba lana.]
43005005	Nidɦii da doora kan ka ba n bɛɦii, l` ba na bina kwɛɛtaɦ n ɦaniind nanaɦ ɦan door n hin.
43005006	Yeesua t yum ɦà door n miig na nidwii hiidg ka door n bɛɦii. Ĥá gbaam-wu na: «¿Sɔkla na l` gbaad-v?»
43005007	Bɛɦtiiwii t leed-wu na: «Berma, mà kpaɦ n ɦii na ɦá lɔɔlg-ma biirn nyaalm wen dama. Ka bo na mà ɦe gemm na mà lɔɔ kan, ɦii t fɛtg lɔɔb mà nɔngan.»
43005008	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vidg! Lɔg v` fiigu v` keda!»
43005009	L´ gbaad nidwii yelmaa, ɦá lɔgm ɦà fiigu n baɦ n ka ked. Gwɛntaɦaa, gwɛɛtii da gɛtg Saabaat goor.
43005010	Tii kaa nnii Yuudaa tiiba bermba nn da hoɦ nid ln gbaad wii n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Jana nnii Saabaat goor, t` baɦlb kpaa saɦ huru na v` toɦd v` fiigu.»
43005011	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Ĥá gbaad-ma wii beda-ma na mà lɔg mà fiigu mà ked.»
43005012	Bá ŋmɛt n gbaam-wu na: «¿Wen bed-v na v` lɔg v` fiigu v` keda?»
43005013	Nid ln da gbaad wii da kpaa mi ɦá da ɦer-wu welee wii, l` kɔtɔd na Yeesua da bɔda yem nidfigm m´ da ba kaalaŋeen mii kaa.
43005014	L´ mɔɔ jaɦ, Yeesua t taŋ-wu n Saŋgband haarn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpaya, l´ gbaad-v nnia! Daa mɔɔg fubɛɦga ɦɛb na bii jeenb daa daan v` jugun ka gwɛdg n kwɛɛn!»
43005015	Nidwii t san Yuudaa tiiba bermba man n ree n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na Yeesua gbaad-wu.
43005016	Lee wen, bee t baɦ n ka kpal Yeesua, l´ kɔtɔd na ɦà da ɦera welee Saabaat goor.
43005017	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Mà Sa la ɦeewra n ŋmɛɛg̈b ɦɛb, tii nnii man ta ba b` jugun welee.»
43005018	Gwɛɛt ɦan bed-ba tii kaa, Yuudaa tiiba bermba t ka bag kpaalaa na bà kuu-wu, lag na ɦan ba valg Saabaat goor baɦlb n jaɦ, na ɦà da ta hoɦl Saŋgband na ɦayen ɦà Sa, ka lɔg ɦayen wo wú n dn l` ba gbaraɦ'.
43005019	Yeesua t leed ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, Budaaga kpaɦ kà nyag yem kà ɦe bii. Kà geewa kà Sa nn ɦɛna bii le ka ɦɛna. Sa nn ɦɛna bii mɛmbii, Budaaga ta ɦɛna-b.
43005020	Biilm, Sa sɔkla ɦà Budaaga ka weraa-ka bii ɦan ɦɛna bii mɛmbii. Ĥà ba ɦà lag ɦà werii-ka na kà ɦɛm ŋmɛɛgt t´ ba bermt ka yata nn nyan n jana tii mɛntii n` yaɦr n` noora.
43005021	Biilm, wo Sa nn himaa kpiirmba ka saɦ-ba neerm lee, ta welee nnii Budaaga nn ta saɦ neerm ɦii kan bag wii.
43005022	L´ saa, lag Sa yaa yaagu, ɦà lɔgra yaanɦii mɛnɦii n taag Budaaga nuɦun,
43005023	ka bo na nidba mɛmba valgm-ka wo ban ta vala ká Sawu lee. Ka v` kpaa vala-ka, l` weraa na ta kpaa vala ká Sa ɦá tamn-ka wii.
43005024	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, ɦii tamn-ma. Ĥá kewla mà ret bɔɦɔɔ tii ka ta tia ɦá ɦɛn wii ba n neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii, l` saa bà nan kpaa yaa-wu n yaagu. Ĥà reda kuumn n jib neermn.
43005025	Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n gobiint na waa, waaru kenan, ɦù fɛtg taanm na kpiirmba nan ɦom Saŋgband Budaaga noor. Bá nan ɦum ká noor bee mɛmbee kee bà neer.
43005026	Wo mà Sa nn ba n gemmnt na ɦà saɦm neerm lee, ɦá ta saɦm Budaaga gemmnt na kee ta bɛm n neerm.
43005027	Kan ta ba na Nida Budaaga lee, ɦá to-ka gemmnt na kà yaam yaagu.
43005028	L´ daa ɦee-n yɔlaa, l´ kɔtɔd na waaru kena na biiba bá ba bilin bee mɛmbee ɦom Nida Budaaga noor.
43005029	Ban ba bà ɦom ká noor lee, bà riir. Lee wen, bá da ɦer tant ɦɛn hɔmgu bee himtg kuumn bà soɦdg neerm, l` saa bá da ɦer bɛɦgu bee, bà himtg kuumn na bà yaa-ba n yaagu.
43005030	Man lee, maa kpaɦ mà bee mà ɦe bii n mayen mà gemmnt. Mà yaa wo ɦá tamn-ma wii nn weraa-ma lee. L´ saa man yaa n mug bii, b` ba sɔbb l` kɔtɔd na mà kpaa bag na mà ɦe man sɔkla bii. Ĥá tamn-ma wii sɔklb nnii man ɦɛna.
43005031	Ka ln bɛm na man rea mayen mà gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ, mà ret bɔɦɔɔ tii kpaɦ t` bɛm na bà ɦee-t n ŋmɛɛg̈b.
43005032	Lee, jeena bɔɦɔɔ mà gwɛɛt, mà ta mi na ɦan bɔɦɔɔ mà jugun tii ba gobiint.
43005033	N` da tomra nidba Yohanɛɛsa man, bá san n wagii-wu. Ĥá gwɛɛl ka taaw gobiint kaa.
43005034	Man lee, maa kpaa bag na nida teew mà kaa. Mà bɔɦɔɔ welee na l´ bee l` daɦ n` juuni.
43005035	Biilm, Yohanɛɛsa da boo boglamilu ban tɔlg na ɦú wiir nidba ɦuu. Nen lee, nii t sɔkl n jaɦ na n` nyaag ɦà wiingan.
43005036	Man lee, bii b´ taaw mà kaa bii ba jeegu ka yata Yohanɛɛsa reb. Bii nnii ŋmɛɛgt mà Sa nn to-ma má ka ɦɛna tii. Ŋmɛɛgt man ɦɛna tii bɔɦɔɔ mà jugun gwɛɛt ka weraa na mà Sa tamn-ma.
43005037	Biilm, mà Sa tamn-ma, wii mɔma gwɛɛla ka taaw mà kaa. Lee, n` ban ɦom ɦá noor felaɦ', n` ta ban nyaan ɦá nɔnga felaɦ'.
43005038	N` kpaa mad ɦà gwɛɛt, l` kɔtɔd na n` kpaa tia ɦii Sa nn tamn wii ɦɛn.
43005039	N` wia ka nyigaa Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt ka diila na n` ba n` yuuŋ t´ ni neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii, l´ ba na gwɛɛtii mɔmt bɔɦɔɔ mat.
43005040	Gwɛntaɦ, n` kpaa bag na n` daan mà man na n` yuuŋ neerm mɔmm.
43005041	«Mà kpaa bag na nidba jaɦrm-ma.
43005042	Ka saa mà miil na n` kpaa sɔkla Saŋgband.
43005043	Mà daan mà Sa hidrn, n´ ka ba soɦdg-ma. Ka ɦii jeena t daan ɦayen ɦá hidrn, n´ soɦd-wu.
43005044	L` saa, n` sɔkla na n` nyɔkm taa, nyɔkb b´ rɛn Saŋgband dyend man bii ¿n` bagl-b mɛɦ? ¿Lan nnii nn bo na n` bɛm n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim?
43005045	Daa diilgm-n na man kee mà tulg-n hoogu mà Sa nɔngan! Mohiisa kee ɦà tulg-n-ku. Mohiisyenwii ɦɛn nnii nn daag.
43005046	Ka n` da tii ɦà ɦɛn biilm, nn ta ba n` tii mà ɦɛn. Maa gwɛɛt nnii ɦan bed ɦà wadiin.
43005047	Wo nn ta kpaa tia ɦan ɦɔd tii ɦɛn lee, ¿lan nnii nn ba n` tii maa gwɛɛt?»
43006001	Tii n t` kaan, Yeesua t san Galilee nyaam bal. Bà ta hoɦl-m na Tibɛryaad nyaam.
43006002	Nidfigm t tag ɦá kaa. M` da nyana hoolgu ɦɛb ɦan da ɦer ka gbaadaa bɛɦtiiba kuu, lee, n ka tagd ɦá kaa.
43006003	Ĥá kot duur jugun n kad wú n ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba.
43006004	Yuudaa tiiba Gɛtgm kasant da ba nyɔɦ'.
43006005	Ĥá geed ɦà kpama n yum nidfigm hɛɦrna ka kena ɦà man. Lee, ɦá gbaam Filf na: «¿Tee nnii tn ba t` bee t` daɦ kpooni na t` doow nidbambena mɛmbee?»
43006006	Ĥà da gbaama welee na ɦà nyaan ɦan ba ɦà leedg tii. Wii mɔma da miil ɦan ba ɦà ɦe bii.
43006007	Filfa t tɔgd n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka bá la lɔg ruuni kwiɦr, bà kpaɦ bà daɦ kpooni na baaben tia yuuŋ gbeɦga na ɦà di.»
43006008	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtvol bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥandrea, Simoon Fetra nyakwɛɛln, wii t bɔɦɔɔ na:
43006009	«Budaaga kiiga ba nanaɦ ka mad kpooni ɦinu n ɦɔlbii hireɦ'. ¿Welee ba l` ɦe ben nidfigmnmina?»
43006010	Lee wen, Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biir-n-ba bà kad bà mɛmbee!» Moot da ba kaalaŋeen kɔd, tii nnii nidfigmii nn da kad tiŋan. Nidba bá da ba kan bee, daba da taara wo ruuni ɦinu.
43006011	Ĥá lɔgm kpoonɦii n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b. Lee, n wed bá raarm-ɦi nidba bá kad bee mɛmbee. Ĥá ta saɦm-ba ɦɔlii wo ban bag lee.
43006012	Bá wen diir bà mɛmbee n togm, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ ɦà gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na bá kolm gbeɦa ɦá tɛl ɦee na bii daa bɔr.
43006013	Bá nan kolm gbeɦee, ɦá hugl furia kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ'. Ban da diir kpooni ɦinuɦi l´ tɔlm bii nnii.
43006014	Nidbee nn da nyan hoolgu Yeesua nn da ɦer kuu lee, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt ɦá da ba ɦà daan tant ɦɛn wii mɔma.»
43006015	Lee, Yeesua nn mi na baa bà mug-wu n kwɛgdi na bà lo-wu huraant lee, ɦá ta ree ɦayenwu kpamga ɦɛn duur jugun n ka ba kan ɦayen.
43006016	Jabr nn da jabaa lee, Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t tiɦdgii nyaam maaru.
43006017	Bá jib kpiirgun n ka kedaa Kafarnahuum, balvoln. Nyingu da nyinn, Yeesua ban vɔɦdg-ba.
43006018	Ĥam miim da baɦ n ka fug ka ba daat. Lee, nyaam t baɦ n ka dama kimm.
