43021020	Fetra t bid ɦayen n mid gwɛɛt soɦdgt Yeesua nn da sɔkla wii kena bà kaa. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtwii nnii ɦá da ɦilnt Yeesua jugun ban da ju diit lee wen n gbaam-wu na: «Berma, ¿wen nnii ɦá kee ɦà rɛɛ-v wii?»
43021021	Fetra nn nyan-wu lee, n gbaam Yeesu na: «Wunaɦ de, ¿ben nan kena wii jugunii?»
43021022	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ka má sɔkl na ɦà neer kakeɦnan mà daa ŋmɛtgna, ¿v` gwɛɛtn? ven lee, tagd mà kaa!»
43021023	Ĥan bed welee lee, bá ka faa bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee man na gwɛɛt soɦdgtwii nan kpaa ku. L` ba na Yeesua ba biir welee. Ĥá ret bed tii nnii na: «Ka mà sɔkla na ɦá neer kakeɦnan mà daa nan ŋmɛtgna, ¿v` gwɛɛtn?»
43021024	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtwii mɔma kɛɛma gwɛɛtii, wii ta ɦɔda-t. Lee, t` miil na ɦá ret bɔɦɔɔ tii ba gobiint.
43021025	Yeesua ta ɦera wanvont kɔd. Ka bá lo na bà ɦɔr-t kuyen kuyen, mà kpaa diila na tantntina mɛntii ba t` ta na t` lɔg wadii ban da ba bà ɦɔr hii.
44001001	Taa maar Tehofiil. Mà da beda-v mà wadnoogrgan Yeesua nn ɦer n ɦan werii nooga
44001002	kakeɦnan goor ln kolg-wu saŋgbambiimn dii. Saɦ na l´ kolg-wu saŋgbambiimnii, ɦá to ɦá baɦlb ɦan da roodg na ɦà tumtba bee. Ĥà da to-ba-b n Voɦoom Buudm gemmntn.
44001003	Ĥá kuum kaannaa, ɦá werii-ba ɦayen. Ĥà da werii-ba ɦayen tɔmb mliim na bá miig na ɦà neera biilm. Lee, ɦá ɦɛm tant ɦɛn goora kwɛɦnaa, ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt.
44001004	Wú n ban ban da ju diit goor diir lee, ɦá baɦl-ba na bá daa santg n Yerusalɛm kɔrgu, na bá bɛm kan ka hɔd ɦan da bed-ba na Sa nan kee ɦà si-ba bii,
44001005	na Yohanɛɛsa da hoda-ba n nyaalm, na goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaann Saberma kee ɦà hor-ba n Voɦoom Buudm.
44001006	Ban da kpogl taa Yeesua man lee, n gbaam-wu na: «Berma! ¿Goorɦanɦenan nnii vn kee v` vii Yisraɦeel huraant?»
44001007	Ĥá leed-ba na: «Lag nen beel n` miig vuugu laa waaru ln ba l` ɦe ɦuu, Sa yen lo waarɦuu n ɦayen ɦà gemmnt.
44001008	Voɦoom Buudm nn kee m` hoɦntn n` ɦɛn lee, n` yuuŋ m` gemmnt, n` bɛm mà kaa tiiba, n` bɔɦɔɔm mà gwɛɛt Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, n Yuudee tant mɛntn, n Samarii tantn, n tantii mɛntiin.»
44001009	Ĥan bed-ba welee lee, l´ vii-wu n faaga bà niinɦiin, wat t fiid-wu bá ka kpaa yuu-wu.
44001010	Ban da jeɦr ka geewa n faaga lee, nidba bareɦba biiba t rorm myenm ɦɛn bá nɔngan ka fidr dimfeent
44001011	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Galilee tiiba-n! ¿Ben kaa nnii nn jeɦr ka fudr welee n faaga? L` ree Yeesuwu n` huuga, ɦá kot saŋgbambiimn, ɦà nan ta ŋmɛtgna welee wo nn nyan-wu ɦà nyaba lee.»
44001012	Lee, tumtba t vid duuga bá kan da ba ree n ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Bà hoɦl duugee na Kpaamtiit duuga, kà nyɔɦra n kɔrguu, l` ba l` ta wo tand dyen.
44001013	Ban taai Yerusalɛm lee, n juul disaku ban daa ka ba kuun haar diir faaga. Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛswu n Yakoobwu n Ĥandrea, n Filfwu n Tomaasa, n Baatelmiiwu n Matewa, n Ĥalfea kwɛɛl Yakoobwu n Simoon ɦá ŋmɛta ɦá kɔrgu ɦɛn wii, n nan Yakooba kwɛɛl Yuuda bà da beel kan.
44001014	Bà da ɦuma n taa ka kpogla taa kan bá mɛmbee hɛruɦ bá n fɔg̈ba n Yeesua nya Maaria n nan Yeesua teelba ka seeŋa.
44001015	Goor diir, Krista tiiba da kpogl taa wo bà ta lɛmu n kwɛɛrɛɦ', Fetra t vid bá huuga n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
44001016	«Teelba-n, l` da ba na Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt Voɦoom Buudm nn da bed n Daviida noor tii ɦe t´ jugun. Ĥà da beda Yuudaas ɦá da san n nidba na bá mug Yeesu wii gwɛɛt weem n dool.
44001017	Yuudaasa da ba t` kpaturun ka ba n ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b.
44001018	Ĥà da lɔgra lig̈biir ɦan da gweedm Yeesu bá faadm-wu dii, n daɦm tant. Ĥan daɦr tantii lee, n luurm kan ɦá jugu ɦɛn n kit, ɦá fuutii mɛmɛntii t rorm bal.
44001019	Yerusalɛm kɔrguu mɛnguu tiiba t ɦom gwɛɛtii, n baɦd koogu ɦan da kpiir kù ni kuu n bà lamn na Hakeldamaa, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na ‟Jiim koogu”. ¿Lag welee?
44001020	Biilm, l` ɦɔda Yumii wadgan na: Ĥá haar kitg vuugu, ɦii daa goom kan felaɦ'! L` ta ɦɔda na: Ĥii jeena lɔg ɦá kaalaŋa!
44001021	-
44001022	Tii lee, l` ba na ɦii jeena daan t` man ka nyaan n ɦà nɔmb na Yeesua himtg kuumn. Ĥá ba ɦà daan t` man wii, l` ba na l´ bɛm ɦii ɦà da tag t` kaa vuugu Berm Yeesua nn da ba t` huuga kuun, lɔg Yohanɛɛsa nn da hod-wu nyaalm lee kakeɦnan vuugu ln da kolg-wu saŋgbambiimn kuun.»
44001023	Fetra nn bed welee lee, bá kɔt nidba bareɦ na bá roodg bà huuga ɦii. Yoosɛf ban da hoɦ na Barsabaas ka ta hoɦ na Yuustuuswii n nan Matiyaasa.
44001024	-
44001025	Ban kɔtg-ba lee, bá mɛmbee t seeŋ na: «Berma! Ven miil nidba mɛmba kwɛɛwan. Yuudaasa da ba na v` tumtn ka ba n ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b. Ĥá dan n nyab n san kaalaŋa ká da hɔd-wu keen. Gwɛɦŋa, werii-t nidbee huuga vn kotg na ɦá lɔg ɦá kaalaŋa wii.»
44001026	Ban seeŋ welee lee, n tam nidbee ɦɛn waari na bá nyaan ln ba l` roodg wii. L´ taŋ, bá rood Matiyaas n hewl nan tumtba kwiɦr n ɦayenvolbee ɦɛn.
44002001	Dikaɦnooga kasant goor nn da taan lee, l´ mir gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t kpogl taa bà mɛmbee yenlaŋa.
44002002	Myenm ɦɛnii, damb biib t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn, wo ɦambermm dela, n hugl haar ban da kpogl taa d` ni dii mɛndii.
44002003	Bá yum boglawiilm hoɦntna bà ɦɛn, ka raar n ka boo gelmii dela, n saɦdr bá juuni ɦɛn ɦayen ɦayen.
44002004	Voɦoom Buudm t jib bá mɛmbee ni, bá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla lam jugu jugu ka ba kpɛlŋ-m, wo Voɦoom Buudm nn da weraa na bá gwɛɛlm lee.
44002005	Yuudaa tiiba da ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgun ka rɛn tiga mɛnan. Bà da ɦɛna Saŋgband kowt deedee.
44002006	Dambii nn dam bá ɦom lee, n kpogl taa figm. Bá mɛmbee t ka yaɦr bà noora yem, blaɦb kaa baawena da ɦuma gwɛɛt soɦdgtba gwɛɛla n ɦayen ɦà lamn.
44002007	L` da ɦera-ba yɔlaa kpaalaa, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidba bá gwɛɛla bee, ¿lag Galilee tiiba nnii bá mɛmbee?
44002008	¿L` ɦer lan na t` mɛmbee t` ɦom bà gwɛɛla n tii mɔmba tyen t` lam jugu jugu nii?
44002009	T` huuga biiba ba na Faartmba, biiba ba na Mediimba, biiba ba na Ĥeelaammba. Biiba t rɛn Mesofotamii, biiba Yuudee, biiba Kafadɔsii, biiba Fɔɔnt, biiba Ĥasii tantn.
44002010	L´ saa biiba t rɛn Firgii, biiba Faŋfiilii, biiba Ĥejift tantn, biiba Sirɛɛn Liibii tantn, biiba Roomaa kɔrgun.
44002011	T` gidgu ba na Yuudaa tiiba mɔmba, volba t lagii bà kwɛɛwa n jib Yuudaa tiiba kpaturun. Kɛrɛɛt tiiba n Ĥaraabmba ta ba kan. Tn la sɔdr welee lee, t` ɦuma bà gwɛɛla t` mɛmbee t` lam jugu jugun, bà bɔɦɔɔ ŋmɛɛbermi Saŋgband nn ɦer ɦii gwɛɛt.»
44002012	L` da ɦera bà mɛmbee yɔlaa biii, bá ka kpaa miigaa t´ ba na bá diilg tii. Bá saa n ka gbaama taa na ¿Binbii kɔtɔd nnii na laa?
44002013	Volba t ka laɦ gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ka bɔɦɔɔ na daam kura-ba kpaalaa.
44002014	Lee wen, Fetra t vid, wú n tumtba kwiɦr n ɦayen volbee n vii noor ka toola ka bɔɦɔɔ nidfigm na: «Nen, Yuudaa tiiba nen, n ta nen n` mɛmba, nen ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgun nen, kewlg-n hɔm, n` ɦom gwɛɛt man bo na mà biir-n tii!
44002015	Benbambena, daam ba kuu-ba wo nn diila lee, t` ba ɦateekwɛɛn, l` waɦda waari ɦiwɛɦ nnii.
44002016	Gwelŋa nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yoɦeela nn da bed tii nn ɦɛna t´ jugun, tii nnii na:
44002017	Saŋgband bɔɦɔɔ na: ‟Gokaawra nii, mà nan lɔɔ mà Voɦoom baawena ni, n` kwɛɛlba n n` bɛɛrba nan kita gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba. N` kaaba nan ba bà yum bii ɦii nn kpaa yu n nɔmb bii, l` saa n` kpalmmba yum want bá goomn.
44002018	Gobiint, goorɦeen, mà nan lɔɔ mà Voɦoom mà ŋmɛɛɦeedba ni, daba n fɔg̈ba, bà reem mà jugun gwɛɛt ka faa.
44002019	Mà kee mà ɦɛm hoolgu saŋgbambiimn n tant ɦɛn: jiim n boglam n nyii wat kee l` bɛm.
44002020	Muunu kee ɦù bɛm nyeet, kidga ba siii wo jiim, saɦ na Saberma goor taan, dii nnii gobermr.
44002021	Ln kee l` ɦe welee lee, nid ɦá kee ɦà hoɦ Saberma hidr wii, ɦà daɦ ɦá jugu”.
44002022	«Yisraɦeel tiiba nen, kewlg-n man ba mà biir-n tii! Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia nn ba lee, nidwii nnii Saŋgband nn werii-n ɦá gemmnt n ɦɛm ɦá ɦɛm n` huuga hoolgu ɦɛb kɔd wo n` mɔmba nn ta mi lee.
44002023	Bà da gweedm-n daawwii wo Saŋgband nn da mi n lo na l´ da l` bɛm lee. N` da to-wu bá kpaa vala t` baɦlb bee, bá kpaɦm-wu dabragr ɦɛn, ɦá kuum, l` weraa na nen kura-wu.
44002024	Nn la ɦer welee lee, Saŋgband t himii-wu kuumn, n soɦd-wu m` nuɦun ɦá ka neer, na m` da kpaɦ m` bee m` mad-wu m´ gemmntn.
44002025	Biilm, Daviida da beda ɦà gwɛɛt na: ‟Mà da yul Sabermwu mà nɔngan kutuuu, ɦà ba mà najuudu ɦɛn na bii daa dam-ma.
44002026	Tii kaa nnii mà kwɛɛwrn nn ba lamɛɛgu, mà gwɛɛla ka nyaaga. Ka má la kpii, má ka la ba n daag̈b,
44002027	kɔtɔd na kpaɦ v` saa-ma kpiirmba huuga, kpaɦ v` saa mà gbanu boodg bilun, v` ŋmɛɛɦeedhɔm man.
44002028	Lee, weraa-ma neerm huru. Wo vn ba mà man lee, má ka ba nyaag̈bn kpaalaa ”.
44002029	«Teelba-n! L` sira-ma huru na mà biir-n hɔm t` yandaberm Daviida gwɛɛt. Ĥà da kpiira bá kuur-wu, ɦá bilu la bee t` man nnaɦ'.
44002030	Da wii nnii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta. Ĥà da miil hɔm na Saŋgband da beda-wu n foorm na d` kee d` si-wu yakiiga kiiga kà nan kad ɦà huraant jargan.
44002031	Lee, ɦá yum yelmaa b´ kee b` ɦe bii blaɦb ban taan n bɔɦɔɔ ln bantg wii kuumn himtgm gwɛɛt. Tii kaa nnii ɦá nn bed na bà ba saa-wu kpiirmba huuga, ɦá gbanu ba boodg bilun.
44002032	Sa Saŋgband himii Yeesu man gwɛɛla ɦá gwɛɛt wii, t` mɛmbee t´ yum.
44002033	D´ vii-wu n faaga n kal-wu d´ najuudu ɦɛn n saɦm-wu Voɦoom Buudm dn da bed na d` nan saɦl-wu mii, ɦá raarm-t-m, bii nnii nn ɦum ka yu gwɛɦmalena.
44002034	Daviida da ba juul saŋgbambiimn, gwɛntaɦ' ɦà da beda na: Saberm Saŋgband beda mà Berm na: ‟Daan v` kad mà najuudu ɦɛn!
44002035	Maa mà ɦe v` rafeedba bɛm v` kwɛɛn lee, v` nawdrm-ba ”.
44002036	Ln ba welee lee, l` ba na Yisraɦeel tigr mɛnd miig hɔm na, Yeesu n` nn kpaɦr dabragr ɦɛn wii, wii nnii Saŋgband nn bantg n ta ɦɛm Berma.»
44002037	Bá wen ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii, l´ ham bá rarm biii, bá gbaam Fetrwu n tumtba volbee na: «¿Teelba-n! L` ba na t` ɦɛm bee?»
44002038	Fetra t leed-ba na: «Lagii-n neerm! Baawena tii bà hor-wu Saŋgband nyaalm Yeesu Krista hidrn na l´ waa ɦà fubɛɦii, ɦà soɦdg Saŋgband nn saɦ bii, l´ kɔtɔd na Voɦoom Buudm.
44002039	Bii dn da bed na d` nan saɦl bii, b` hɛla nen, n n` bii, n ta biiba bà neer vɔkun, biiba Saberm Saŋgband nn nan hoɦaa bee mɛmbee.»
44002040	Fetra t ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛt kɔd, ka bag na l´ jib-ba hɔm. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Soɦdg-n juuni daɦb, n` sadg n̈yen n goona nidba bá fiwdg bee!»
44002041	Bá huuga nidba hag̈bermr t soɦd Fetra gwɛɛt, bá huurm-ba Saŋgband nyaalm. Goorii, bà da taara wo ruuni ɦitaɦi n hewl gwɛɛt soɦdgtba ɦɛn.
44002042	Yeesua kaa tagdtba da to bayen hɔm n ka nawr n tumtba na bà kewlgm Saŋgband gwɛɛt, ka neer taa man wo teelba, ka ju saŋgbandiit taa man, ka ta mad seeŋb.
44002043	Fobɛɦgu da mada baawena, Saŋgband da tagaa n tumtba ɦɛn ka ɦɛna hoolgu want kɔd l` ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa.
44002044	Gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiitbee mɛmbee da ɦera yenm, n ka raar taa bii ban da ba n bii mɛmbii.
44002045	Bà da gweedma bà koot n bà want, ka raar taa lig̈biir ban da soɦda dii, na l´ ta tɔrg baawen wo ɦan halwa lee.
44002046	Goor wo goor, bà da ɦɛna diilyena ka kpogla taa Saŋgband haarn. Bà da jul diit taa man bá hayan, ka nyaaga n bà kwɛɛwhaala.
44002047	Bà da nyɔka Saŋgband, kɔrgu biɦ sɔkla-ba, l´ saa, Saberma kpaɦaa biiba ɦan daɦr bà juuni bee ka hewla bá jugun goor wo goor.
44003001	Goor diir, Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bà da kotgaa Saŋgband haarn jabr waari ɦitaɦ seeŋb wen.
44003002	Saŋgband haar huturu ban hoɦ na «Bɛɛrm huturu» ɦuu man, balmdindɦii da ba kan bá meed-wu ɦà ba welee. Goor wo goor bà kena n wun n kal ree na ɦá jam bá jiba kan bee lig̈biir.
44003003	Ĥan kad kan lee, n dan n yum Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bà kena na bà jib, ɦá jam-ba lig̈biir.
44003004	Bá geed-wu turrr, Fetra t ŋmɛt n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Geedg-t!»
44003005	Ĥan bed welee lee, balmdindwii t geed-ba ka mii na bà bo na bà si-wu bii.
44003006	Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Mà kpaɦ n lig̈biir laa sika, gwɛntaɦ lee, man ba n bii, maa mà to-v-b. Mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na Yeesu Krist Nasarɛɛt tia hidrn, vidg v` keda!»
44003007	Fetra nn bed welee lee, n mug balmdindwii najuudu n vii-wu, yelmaa balmdindwii nakpai t maantr.
44003008	Ĥá for n jeɦnt hí ɦɛn n baɦ n ka ked. Ĥá san n jib Saŋgband haarn wú n ban, ɦà ked ka forwa ka nyɔka Saŋgband.
44003009	Nidfigmii mɛnmii t yum-wu ɦà ked ka nyɔka Saŋgband.
44003010	Bá miig-wu na wii daa ka kad Bɛɛrm huturu man ka jamaa lig̈bia, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa bá ka yaɦr bà noora b´ ɦer-wu bii kaa.
44003011	Balmdindwii da tagda Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bà kaa ka kpaa saa-ba. Nidba nn nyan welee lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa, bá san bá man Saŋgband haarn, bibida dandaŋu ban hoɦ na Salomoona dandaŋu kuun.
44003012	Fetra nn nyan welee lee, n gwɛɛl n nidfigmii ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Yisraɦeel tiiba-n! ¿Ben kaa nnii ln ɦɛna-n yɔlaa n bii b` gɛtg bii? ¿L` ba lan nn geewa-t welee wo tyen t` gemmnt kaa nnii nidwii nn ked, laa tn nawr n Saŋgband l´ kaa?
44003013	Saŋgband ɦera na l´ vii d´ ŋmɛɛɦeed Yeesua hidr n faaga. Dii nnii t` yandaba Ĥabrahaamwu n Yisɦaakwu n Yakoob ban da seeŋa. N` mɔmba nen da lo-wu bermba niɦin n kirm-wu Filaata nɔngan, l` ba na wii da bagl na ɦà saa-wu, n´ kirm.
44003014	N` kɔɦdg nidhɔm ɦá ba kelkel wii n gbaam Filaat na ɦà hoɦlg-n nidkuuda.
44003015	N` ɦera welee n kuum neerm saɦda. Gwɛntaɦ, Saŋgband t ree-wu kuumn ɦá ka neer. T` mɔmba t´ yum n t` niini.
44003016	Kpay-n nidwunwuna! N` miil-wu. Yeesua hidr gemmnt n ɦà hidr ɦɛn tiim ɦera l´ maant-wu. Yeesua ɦɛn tiim ɦera na ɦá gbaad kpaalaa wo n` mɔmba nn yu n` mɛmbee lee.
44003017	«Tii lee, teelba-n, mà miil hɔm na n´ n n` huraamba n` da kpaa mi bii le, n ɦɛm Yeesuwu welee.
44003018	Saŋgband ɦera dn da bed weem daa ka tagaa n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba mɛmba noora ɦɛn tii. D` da beda na l` ba na dn ba d` bantg wii nan di kunyɔŋu welee.
44003019	Gwɛɦŋa lee, lagii-n neerm, n` bidg n̈yen n Saŋgband wee na d´ waa-n n` fubɛɦii.
44003020	Lee wen, Saberma si-n nigiigu, l` saa ɦà tuun-n ɦan da bantg nooga na ɦà nan tuuna-n wii, wii nnii Yeesua.
44003021	L` ba na Yeesuwii bɛm saŋgbambiimn saɦ', kakeɦnan vuugu l´ mɛnguu daa maantra, wo Saŋgband nn da tag n d` weem daa gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbuudba ɦɛn n gwɛɛl lee.
44003022	Biilm, Mohiisa da beda na Saberm t` Saŋgband kee d` ree t` huuga gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii ɦà dela, tyen t` teela. Na l` ba na t` kewlg t` ɦom gwɛɛt ɦan ba ɦà bɔɦɔɔm-t tii mɛntii.
44003023	Na ɦii ɦà kpaa kee ɦà ɦom n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwii, bà voo-wu Saŋgband tigrn, bà kuu-wu.
44003024	L´ saa, gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbee mɛmbee, lɔg Samuɦeela n ɦà kaawrbee, bà da ta faa bà mɛmbee goorɦanɦena gwɛɛt.
44003025	Bii gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbee nn da bed bii, nen heɦl-b. Tuurnt Saŋgband nn da lo n n` yandaba tii, nen nnii tuurntii bii. Biilm, d` da beda Ĥabrahaam na d` nan tagaa n ɦà yakii ɦɛn d` kaawl tant jugun tiga mɛna ɦɛn.
44003026	Tii lee, Saŋgband tuun nenwu d` ŋmɛɛɦeed Yeesuwu saɦ', na ɦá kaawl n` ɦɛn, l` saa baawena saa ɦà ɦɛbbɛɦb.»
44004001	Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs ban da gwɛɛla n nidfigm lee, gotiiba n Saŋgband haar ɦɛn kigdba bermwu n Sadusii tiiba t daan.
44004002	Bá ni da weera na ben kaa nnii tumtba bareɦbee nn weraa tigr, ka faa-d na Yeesua da kpiira n himt, lee l` weraa na kpiirmba nan himta kuumn bà neer.
44004003	Bá mug-ba na bà yaa-ba n yaagu. Wo jabr nn da fɛtg jabm lee, bá riw-ba sargan kakeɦnan toŋu vɛtr.
44004004	Ban da la mug-ba n riw sargan lee, bá da fɛtg gwɛɛt ban da faa tii ɦumb bee huuga kɔd t tii t´ ɦɛn. Lee, nidba bá da tii Yeesua gwɛɛtii ɦɛn bee, bá huuga daba t bewl n ɦɛm wo ruuni ɦinu.
44004005	Toŋu nn vɛtg lee, Yuudaa tiiba huraamba n kpalmmba n baɦlb weriitba t kpogl taa Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44004006	Gotiberm Hanaana da ba kan, wú n Kayiifwu n Yohanɛɛswu n Ĥaleksandrwu n nan gotiberma haar tiiba mɛmba.
44004007	Bá bɔɦɔɔ bá daan n Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛsa. Bá gbaam-ba na: «¿Wen hidrn laa n gemmntetn nn gbaad nidwii?»
44004008	Lee wen, Voɦoom Buudm t dam Fetra, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Tigr huraamba n kpalmmba nen!
44004009	Jana goorii n` hoɦ-t, n ka gbaama-t gwɛɛt l` baɦr n na t` ɦera ɦajamɦiiwu hɔmgu, l´ ka ba na t` werii huru tn tag saɦ nidwii t gbaad.
44004010	Tii lee, n` mɛmbee, ɦom-n hɔm, l` saa Yisraɦeel tigr mɛnd ta ɦom hɔm na, Nasarɛɛt tii ban da hoɦ na Yeesu Krista, nn da kpaɦr dabragr ɦɛn ɦá kuum, Saŋgband t himii kuumn wii hidr gemmntn nnii nidwunwuna nn ree ɦayen n ka jeɦr n` nɔngan, ka ba n gbanun lamɛɛgu.
44004011	Yeesua gwɛɛt nnii Wadbuudga nn bɔɦɔɔ na: Disagmɔɦdba nen, tand nn da kɔɦdg dii, dii kitg bobogr tanbermr .
44004012	Tii kaa nnii tn bɔɦɔɔ-n na wii man n jaɦ nnii juuni daɦb nn bee. Tantii mɛntii jugunii, l` ta ba si nidba nidjeenɦii na bá tag n wiilaɦ jugun bà daɦ bá juuni.»
44004013	Ban bed welee lee, l´ ɦɛm tigr jugu tiibee yɔlaa biii. Bà da yul na Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bà da gwɛɛla ka ɦigaa gwɛɛtii jugun, bà da ta miil hɔm na nidkpaalban, bà kpaa mi wadii, bà da ta miil na Yeesua kaa tagdtkpeemban.
44004014	Bà da ta yul nid ln da gbaad ɦá ka jeɦr bà man wii, bá ka ta kpaɦ n tiit na bà leedg.
44004015	Lee wen, bá saɦm-ba huru na bá riir disakuun saɦ', n baɦ n ka wii taa gwɛɛt,
44004016	bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: ¿Baa bà ɦe lan nidbambena? Na Yerusalɛm tiibee mɛmbee miil hɔm na bee ɦera hoolbermgunkuna, na bà kpaɦ bà bee bà kii.
44004017	Na tii lee, ka bo na hoolguu gwɛɛt daa yadgii kɔd na tigr mɛnd ɦom-tii, bá bɔɦɔɔ na l` ba na bá ɦee-ba talmt bà kir n ban na bá daa lilm ɦiiwu tiit bɔɦɔɔb Yeesua hidrn.
44004018	Ban bed welee lee, n ŋmɛt n hoɦ-ba, n kirm n ban ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá daa hoɦm hidrii felaɦ', na bá daa ta weriim bii l` baɦr n hidrii.
44004019	Reekan, Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bá leed-ba na: «Nii mɔmba, ɦiluu-n n` nyaan Saŋgband nɔngan na, ¿l` ba hɔm welee na t` valg-n t` saa Saŋgband?
44004020	Ten lee, t` kpaɦ t` bee t` saa bɔɦɔɔb t` reb nyan n t` niini n ɦom n t` tobɦa bii.»
44004021	Wo kɔrgu bermba nn da mi na tigr nyɔka Saŋgband b´ da ɦer bii kaa lee, bá saa-ba ka lil-ba talmt ɦɛb ka ta kpaa mi ban ba bà dar bà tobr bii kaa.
44004022	–Nid ln da ɦer hoolgu ɦɛb n gbaad wii da ba n bina kwɛɦnaa n faɦt.–
44004023	Ban saa Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs lee, bá san bá tuurmba man n kɛɛml-ba gotibermba n kpalmmba nn da bed tii.
44004024	Bá tuurmbee nn ɦomr welee lee, bá ɦom n taa na bà seeŋ Saŋgband. Bà da seeŋ na: «Saberma! Ven ree saŋgbambiim n tant n nyaam n bii b` bee bii mɛmbii.
44004025	Ven da ɦera Voɦoom Buudm t jib t` yandaa v` ŋmɛɛɦeed Daviida ni v´ bɔɦɔɔ ka tagaa n ɦà noor na: ¿Ben kaa nnii tant ɦɛn tiga nn lɔɔ kwɛɛwweerga yemii? ¿Ben kaa nnii tant ɦɛn tiga nn ko kpaab yemii?
44004026	Tant ɦɛn huraamba toola taa na bà teew hoodr, bà kpogl taa na bà boow noor Saberma ɦɛn n nan ɦan bantg wii ɦɛn.
44004027	L` ba gobiint welee na Ĥeroodwu n Fɔɔns Filaat bà lagla nid ɦayen kɔrgunkunan bá n saanba n Yisraɦeel hui ka boow noor v` ŋmɛɛɦeedbuud Yeesu vn bantg wii ɦɛn.
44004028	Bà ɦɛna welee na v` gemmnt n v` sɔklb vn da bed weem daa na b` daa b` ɦe bii ɦe l´ jugun.
44004029	Gwɛɦma lee, Saberma, nyaan talmt ban ɦɛna-t tii, v` si v` ŋmɛɛɦeedba ten na t` faam v` gwɛɛt ka kpaa sol bii.
44004030	Teedg v` nuɦu na t` gbaadiim bɛɦtiiba, na t` ɦɛm hoolgu ɦɛb kɔd v` ŋmɛɛɦeedbuud Yeesua hidrn!»
44004031	Ban seeŋ l´ diɦ lee, kaalaŋa ban da kpogl taa kà ni kee t nyamr, Voɦoom Buudm t dam bá mɛmbee, bá baɦ n ka faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka kpaa sol bii.
44004032	Bá da tii Saŋgband gwɛɛt ɦɛn bee da ɦera ɦayen n ka sɔkla taa n bà kwɛɛwr mɛnd n bà diila mɛna. Nidfigmiin ɦii da kpaa bɔɦɔɔ na ɦá want ba na ɦayen ɦà retn. Ban da ba n bii, b´ ka ba na bá mɛmbee heɦln.
44004033	L´ saa, tumtba da bɔɦɔɔ Berm Yeesua kuumn himtgm gwɛɛt ka ba n gemmnt, lee, Saŋgband hɔmgu t ka ba bá mɛmbee ɦɛn kpaalaa.
44004034	Bá huuga ɦii da kpaa halwa bii b´ bee-wu daɦt bii. Biilm, bá da ba n koot n haya bee da gweedma n lɔgm lig̈biir
44004035	n dan n to tumtba, bá raarm-d ka kɛɛma wo baawena nn halwa lee.
44004036	Gotiiba tɔrgtba huuga ɦii da bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Yoosɛfa, tumtba da daarŋ-wu na Barnabaasa, l´ kɔtɔd na ‟ŋmeenm saɦda”. Bà da meedra-wu Siifr tantn.
44004037	Ĥá gweedm ɦá koogu n dan n to tumtba kú lig̈biir.
44005001	Daawɦii da ta bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥanan̈yaasa, ka hoɦ ɦá fɔg na Safiiraa. Wú n ɦà fɔg̈wii bá ɦom n taa n gweedm bá koogu kuugu.
44005002	Ban gweedm-ku lee, n ɦɛm noor n lɔgm lig̈biir gidgu n kpɛɦdr. Daawwii t lɔgm gidvolguu n san n to tumtba.
44005003	Ĥan san n to-ba-ku lee, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ĥanan̈yaas! ¿L` ɦer lan vn saa Saatana t jib v` ni? Hogl Voɦoom Buudm n lɔgm koogu lig̈biir gidgu n kpɛɦdr.
44005004	Saɦ na v` gweedm kooguu, kù da ba na v` rekun. Vn gweedm-ku lee, lig̈biir t ka ta ba na v` redn. ¿Laa bee? ¿Lan nnii vn diilg na v` ɦe wennaa? Lag nid nnii vn hogl, hogl Saŋgband.»
44005005	Ĥanan̈yaasa nn ɦomr welee lee, n luurm n kuum. Bá da ɦomr gwɛɛtii bee mɛmbee, fobɛɦgu t mug-ba biii.
44005006	Ĥan kpiir lee, kwɛɛlba t dan n fiid-wu n lɔgm-wu n ree n san n kuur.
44005007	L´ ɦɛm wo waari ɦitaɦ', Ĥanan̈yaasa fɔga t jibn ka kpaa mi na bii ɦeran.
44005008	Fetra t gbaam-wu na: «Ĥee waa! ¿N` kooguu daɦt nnii lig̈biirndina?» Ĥá leed-wu na: «Ĥiin! Kú daɦt nnii.»
44005009	Ĥan leedg welee lee, Fetra t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿L` ɦer lan nn ɦer noor na n` ŋmɛgii n Saberma Voɦoomii? Ka welee, bá san n kuur v` sidwu bee ŋmɛtgnn. Baa bà ta san n vn bà kuur.»
44005010	Yelmaa ɦá ta luurm ɦá tiŋa n kuum. Kwɛɛlbee t jibn n mid ɦá ta kpi. Bá lɔgm-wu n san n kuur ɦá sida man.
44005011	Kpaturu tiiba n nan bá da ɦomr gwɛɛtii bee, fobɛɦgu t mug bá mɛmbee biii.
44005012	Tumtba da ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛb kɔd nidba man. Bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee da ɦuma n taa bà mɛmbee ka ba Salomoona dandaŋun.
44005013	Ĥii jeena da ta kpaa haaraa na ɦà san bà man ka kpaɦ n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, gwɛntaɦ', tigr nyɔka-ba hɔm.
44005014	Nidfigm kɔd, daba n fɔg̈ba, da tia Berm Yeesua ɦɛn ka hewla bá jugun.
44005015	Nidba da baɦ n ka toɦd bɛɦtiiba ka doola hurun jatn n fiit ɦɛn na ka Fetra t dan n ka beraa, ɦá leemgu leeg bà ni ɦii ɦɛn.
44005016	Nidba kɔd da ta rɛna kɔrni ɦì ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgu kpama ɦiin ka toɦd bɛɦtiiba n nidba kunidba nn da jaarŋa bee, l` gbaadaa bà mɛmbee.
44005017	Lee, gotiberma n nan bá da ba ɦà man bee mɛmbee t ka lɔɔ tumtba n nɔmmɔlb. Bá da ba ɦà man bee da ba na Sadusii tiiban. Wú n ban bá ɦɛm noor dyen na bà ɦe lii.
44005018	Bá mug-ba n riw-ba kɔrgu sarga disakun.
44005019	Lee, nyingu huuga, Saberma tumtɦii t rawd sarga disaku noon n ree-ba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
44005020	«Ked-n Saŋgband haarn n` faam tigr neerkwɛɛlm gwɛɛt mɛnt!»
44005021	Tumtba nn ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii lee, n san Saŋgband haarn ɦateekwɛɛn weem n baɦ n ka weraa gwɛɛt. Gotibermwu n bá da ba ɦà man bee t kpogl Yisraɦeel tigr yaani yaadbermbee mɛmbee na bá kad bà mug gwɛɛt. Bá tom na bá hoɦ tumtba sarga disakun.
44005022	Tawdba t taai sarga disakun n ka ba nyaan-ba. Bá ŋmɛtgii
44005023	n san n bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` san n mid sarga disaku noora reewr kpimaɦ', kigdba ba ɦá noon. T´ rawdr huturi n jib, n mid ɦii kpaɦ kan.»
44005024	Saŋgband haar ɦɛn kigdba berma n gotibermba nn ɦomr welee lee, bá ka kpaa mi na baa bà diilg tet tumtba nyabmii gwɛɛt. Bá ka kpaa mi b´ ba b` ɦe bii.
44005025	Lee wen, ɦii t daan n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` nn riw sarga bee ba Saŋgband haarn ka weraa gwɛɛt.»
44005026	Kigdba bermwu n ɦà nidba t vid yelmaa n san n daan n ban ka kpaa ɦɛna-ba talmt. Bà da sol na nidba ba bà lɔd-ba tana.
44005027	Ban daan n ban lee, n san-ba n yaani yaadbermba man, l´ saa gotiberma t ka gbaama-ba gwɛɛt.
44005028	Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «¿T` da ba kir-n n kpaalaa na n` daa weriim ka hoɦ nidwii hidr? ¿N´ ɦɛm laa? N` yadgii n` weriibii Yerusalɛm kɔrguu mɛnguun n ka bo na n` biir na, ten nnii ɦá kuudba.»
44005029	Fetrwu n tumtbee t leed na: «L` kpaɦ na bá valgm nidba ka saa Saŋgband.
44005030	Dii nnii t` yandaba nn da seeŋa. Dii himii Yeesuwii kuumn, nii t da kpaɦ-wu dabragr ɦɛn ɦá kuum.
44005031	Wii nnii dn kalgr d´ najuudu ɦɛn n lo-wu huraant n ta lo-wu na juuni daɦd na l´ si Yisraɦeel tigr huru na d´ bee d` lagii neerm, l` saa Saŋgband waa d` fubɛɦii.
44005032	T` miil gwɛɛtii ka bɔɦɔɔ-t. Saŋgband sira bà vala-d bee Voɦoom Buudm. Mii ta miil gwɛɛtii ka weraa-t.»
44005033	Ban ɦomr welee lee, bá kwɛɛwa t bid kpaalaa, bá ka bag na bà ku tumtbee.
44005034	Farisii tiiɦii da ba yaani yaadbermba huuga, bà hoɦ-wu na Gamaliɦeela, l` ba na baɦlb weriitbermn. Kɔrgun baawena da sɔkla-wu ka vala-wu. Ĥá vid n gbaam na bá ree tumtbee saɦ'.
44005035	Bá wen ree-ba l´ togaa, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Yisraɦeel tiiba-n, mug-n n̈yen hɔm! Ĥiluu-n n` nyaan bii nn bo na n` ɦe nidbambena bia!
44005036	N` miil na l` ban hiidg bii, Tedaasa nn vidg welee, n bɔɦɔɔ na wii nnii nidjeeɦii. Nidba t rorm wo lɛmi ɦinaa n ka tagd ɦà kaa. Bá dan n kuum-wu, biiba bà da tagd ɦà kaa bee mɛmbee t yadr taa, ɦá kpaturu t kuum.
44005037	L´ saa, n` ta miil na wii kaann, Galilee tiiɦii, bà hoɦ-wu na Yuudaasa da ta vid n daruu nidhagr ɦá kaa. L` da ba kaalb vuugun. Bá dan n ta kuum-wu, ɦá kaa nidhagrii t ta yadr taa.
44005038	Gwɛɦŋa lee, mà bɔɦɔɔ-n, daa geem-n n benbee wee! Saa-n-ba bà keda! Ka l` ba na bii bá reb sowlg bii laa bá ŋmɛɛg̈bii rɛn nidba man, l´ mɛnguu daa l` kpi.
44005039	Ka l` ba na l` rɛn gobiilm Saŋgband man, n` kpaɦ n` bee n` kpii-b. Tii lee, mug-n n̈yen! L´ daa ɦe na n` teew hoodr n Saŋgband!» Yaani yaadbermbee t tii ɦá noon,
44005040	n ŋmɛt n hoɦ tumtbee, n wed bá gbum-ba. L´ tog, bá kirm n ban na bá daa ta hoɦm Yeesua hidr bá noon, lee n saa-ba.
44005041	Bá nyab kɔrgu yaani yaadbermba man, lamɛɛgu ba bá kwɛɛwan biii, na Saŋgband nyana na bà mag na bá dadr-ba Yeesua hidr kaa.
44005042	Lee, goor wo goor, bá ka ked Saŋgband haarn, ka ta jiba hayan ka faa Yeesua Gohɔmt na wii nnii Saŋgband nn bantg wii.
44006001	L´ vuuguu, bá da tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee da ɦɛna kɔd. Bá da ba na Yuudaa tiiba mɔmba n nan bá gwɛɛla grɛɛkm bee, bee t ka nyeera Yuudaa tiiba mɔmba gwɛɛt. Bà da nyeera ka bɔɦɔɔ na goorɦee mɛnɦee, diit saɦb wen, ɦii kpaa geewa n bà kuŋfɔg̈ba wee.
44006002	Ban nyeera welee lee, tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee t kpogl bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee mɛmbee n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «L` kpaɦ hɔm na tii saa Saŋgband gwɛɛt faam t` sugm n diit wee.
44006003	Ln ba welee lee, teelba-n, roodg-n daba balbleɦ n` huuga, bà ba nidhɔmba, Voɦoom Buudm ba bá ni, bà mi rarm, t` lo-ba bà ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈bii.
44006004	Ten lee, tii ɦɛm seeŋb, ka faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt n jaɦ'.»
44006005	Ban bed welee lee, bá mɛmbee t tii gwɛɛtii, bá rood Ĥetyɛɛna, ɦà ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, Voɦoom Buudm ba ɦá ni, n Filfwu n Fɔɔrkɔrwu n Nikanoorwu n Timoonwu n Farmenaaswu n nan Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgu tii Nikolaa ɦá da jib Yuudaa tiiba kpaturun weem wii.
44006006	Ban roodg-ba lee, n san n werii-ba tumtba, bá seeŋ n dee bá niɦi bá ɦɛn.
44006007	Saŋgband gwɛɛt da yadgaa kɔd. Bá tia Yeesua ɦɛn bee ta ɦɛna kɔd Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, gotiiba kɔd da ta tia ɦà ɦɛn.
44006008	Saŋgband da kaawl Ĥetyɛɛna ɦɛn n saɦm-wu gemmnt ɦá ka ɦɛna hoolbermgu ɦɛb nidba huuga.
44006009	Ĥan da ɦɛna welee lee, Yuudaa tiiba biiba t vid ɦá ɦɛn. Volba da ba na kpoglb disaku ban hoɦ na ‟Yuummba bá ba bayen bà bolmrn bee” kpaturu tiiban. Bee da rɛn Sirɛɛn n Ĥaleksandrii kɔrnin. Volba t rɛn Silisii n Ĥasii tantn. Bá baɦ n ka kpal-wu.
44006010	Bà da kpaa bea-wu, l´ kɔtɔd na ɦà da gwɛɛla n rarm Voɦoom Buudm nn da sir-wu mii.
44006011	Tii lee, bá faadm nidba na bá da bà biir na bà da ɦomra ɦà gwɛɛla Mohiiswu n Saŋgband bá gwɛɛt bɛɦgu.
44006012	Bá ta ɦɛm l´ jagdr kɔrguu tiiba n kpalmmba n baɦlb weriitba. Bá san Ĥetyɛɛna man n mug-wu n san n yaani yaadbermba man.
44006013	Bá ta san n nidba bá ɦɛna gokaat ɦà ɦɛn bee. Bee t san n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna bɔɦɔɔ Saŋgband haar n Mohiisa baɦlb l` gwɛɛt bɛɦgu hɛruɦ'.
44006014	T` da ɦomra ɦà bɔɦɔɔ na Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tiiwii ba ɦà gbuɦ haarii na ɦà ta lagii kowt Mohiisa nn da to-t tii.»
44006015	Bá da kad yaagu yaalaŋa bee mɛmbee da geewa Ĥetyɛɛna niinin. Bá yum na ɦá nɔnga tɔna wo saŋgbantumta.
44007001	Gotiberma t gbaam Ĥetyɛɛn na: «¿L` ba welee gobiint?»
44007002	Ĥá leed na: «Taa maaba-n n mà teelba-n, kewlg-n! Saŋgband heɦl n nyɔkb. D` da ree dyen n werii t` yandaa Ĥabrahaam ɦan da ba Mesofotamii tantn ka ban san Haaran kɔrgun lee wen,
44007003	n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá nyab ɦà kɔrgun, ɦà saa ɦà haar, ɦà san kɔrgu dn ba d` werii-wu kuun.
44007004	Ĥá nyab Kaldeemba tantn n san n ka ba Haaran kɔrgun. Ĥá sa kuum kaannaa, Saŋgband t ree-wu Haaran kɔrgun n daan-wu n kɔrgu nn ba gwɛɦma kunan.
44007005	D` ba si-wu kan bii bii, d` ba si-wu kan kogbeɦga mɔmga felaɦ'. Dn la ba si-wu kogbeɦga mɔmga lee, n bɔɦɔɔ ka foor na d` kee d` si-wu kɔrguu, ɦà yakii nan ta mad-ku ɦá kaann. Lee wen, Ĥabrahaama da kpaɦ n buga.
44007006	Saŋgband t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá yakii nan ba hì bɛm kɔrsaangu kuugun, hì kitg yuummba, bà ɦɛm-hi daddad kakeɦnan bina lɛmi ɦinaa.
44007007	Na kɔrgu hin kee hì bɛm na kú yuummba kuu, d` kee d` yaa-ku n yaagu. Na lee n l` kaan, hì nyab kan hì daan hì ɦee-d kowt nnaɦreen mɔmgu.
44007008	Saŋgband lo tuurnt d´ n Ĥabrahaam bà huuga. Tuurntii waaru nnii fomr bɔtgm. Welee nnii Ĥabrahaama nn da meedr Yisɦaak n bɔt-wu ɦá maadb goniindr goor. Yisɦaaka t dan n bɔt Yakooba. Yakoobwii t dan n ta bɔdm t` yandabermba kwiɦr n bareɦbee.
44007009	«Yandabermbee da lɔɔ Yoosɛfwu n nɔmmɔlb. Lee, bá lɔgm-wu n gweedm na ɦá bɛm yuumwu Ĥejift tantn. Bá la ɦɛm welee gwɛntaɦ' Saŋgband ba ɦá man.
44007010	D´ ree-wu kunyɔŋu mɛngun, n ɦɛm ɦá ka ba hɔm, ka ba rarm Ĥejift huraa Farɦoa nɔngan. Wii t lo-wu na ɦá kiigm Ĥejift kɔrgu ɦɛn n ɦà haar mɛnd ɦɛn.
44007011	Kɔm t dan n rorm Ĥejift tantii mɛntiin n Kanaɦaan tantii mɛntiin. Kunyɔŋu da yatgn, t` yandaba t ka kpaa yu bii na bà di.
44007012	Yakooba nn dan n ɦom na diit ba Ĥejift tantn lee, ɦá tom t` yandaba noogrm.
44007013	Ban dan n san reɦdrm lee, Yoosɛfa t ree ɦayen n werii ɦá teelba, Farɦoa t miig ɦá haar.
44007014	Lee wen, Yoosɛfa t tom bá daan n ɦà sa n ɦà haarii mɛndii. Haarii mɛndii da ba nidba kwɛɛlbleɦ n banuba.
44007015	Yakooba t nan san Ĥejift tantn n dan n kuum kan, ree nnii t` yandaba nn da ta kpiidr.
44007016	Bá dan n lɔgm-ba n kpen n Sikɛɛm n dan n kuur-ba bilu Ĥabrahaama nn da ree lig̈biir n daɦm Hamoora kwɛɛlba man Sikɛɛm tantn ɦuun.
44007017	«Saŋgband nn da bed Ĥabrahaam ka foor na d` kee d` ɦee-wu bii vuugu nn da nyuɦna lee, t` tigr nidba yada ka ɦɛna kɔd Ĥejift tantn, huraamba lagaa taa.
44007018	Hurjeenɦii t dan n kad jargan ka kpaa mii Yoosɛfa gwɛɛt lii.
44007019	Huraawii t hogl t` tigr n ɦɛm t` yandaba daddad ka ɦɛna na bá saam bá bii hì kpiidra.
44007020	L´ vuuguu nnii ban meedr Mohiis ɦà ba kwɛɛlm l` kpaɦ tinaɦ'. Bá dɔm-wu kidii hitaɦ ɦá sa haarn.
44007021	Ban dan n saa-wu lee, Farɦoa bɛɛra t lɔgm-wu n ka doow wo ɦayen ɦà buga.
44007022	Mohiisa t miig Ĥejift tiiba rarmii mɛnmii n ka ba n gemmnt ɦá gwɛɛlbn n ɦà ŋmɛɛgt ɦɛbn.
44007023	«Ĥan dan n ka ba n bina kwɛɦnaa lee, n diil na ɦà ba ɦà san ɦà nyaan ɦá teelba Yisraɦeel tiiba.
44007024	Ĥá san n yum Ĥejift tia gbu Yisraɦeel tiiɦii. Ĥá tam Yisraɦeel tia kaa n kuum Ĥejift tia.
44007025	Ĥà da mi na welee kaa, ɦá teelba ba bà miig na Saŋgband tuun-wu na ɦá soɦdg-ba kuumn, bá ka ba miig.
44007026	Toŋu t vɛt, ɦá yum Yisraɦeel tiiba bareɦba gbu taa, ɦá ka bag na ɦà maantr-ba n gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na teelba nnii ban mi, na ¿ben kaa nnii ban gbu taa?
44007027	Ĥan bed welee lee, ɦá da gbu ɦà tuurwii t tid-wu na ¿wen lo-wu huraant na ɦá yaam-ba n yaaguu?
44007028	¿Na ɦà bo na ɦà ta kuu-wu wo ɦan da kur Ĥejift tiiwu dindiin leen?
44007029	Mohiisa nn ɦomr welee lee n solm n san n ka ba Madyaan tantn, n maadm kan budai hireɦ'.
44007030	«Bina kwɛɦnaa n ɦà kaann, saŋgbantumtɦii t rɛn ɦá ɦɛn kpamloŋun l` nyɔɦr n Sinaayi duur. Saŋgbantumtwii da ba suŋsuŋa kiigan kà hulwa boglam.
44007031	Mohiisa nn nyan welee lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu yɔlaa. Ĥan da nyuɦaa na ɦà nyaan hɔm lee, n ɦom Saberma gwɛɛla ka bɔɦɔɔ na
44007032	wii nnii Saŋgband, na wii nnii ɦá yandaba Ĥabrahaamwu n Yisɦaakwu n Yakoob ban da seeŋa. Mohiisa nn ɦomr welee lee, fobɛɦgu t mug-wu ɦá ka deɦra ka kpaa bag na ɦà ta geed kan.
44007033	Saberm Saŋgband t hel n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá fitr ɦà nanawda, na ɦá kan jeɦr ree ba na kaalaŋbuudgan.
44007034	Na d` nyana d` tigr tiiba ɦigm Ĥejift tantn. Na d` ɦomra bà buusŋa, lee d` hoɦntn na d` soɦdg-ba kuumn. Na gwɛɦma lee, ɦà nyuɦn, na d` bo na d` tom-wu Ĥejift tantn.
44007035	«Welee nnii Mohiis Yisraɦeel tiiba nn da kid ka bɔɦɔɔ na wen lo-wu huraant na ɦá yaam-ba n yaagu wii, wii nnii Saŋgband nn lo huraant n tom na ɦá soɦdg-ba kuumn wú n saŋgbantumt ɦà da red ɦà ɦɛn suŋsuŋan wii.
44007036	Mohiisyenwii da ree-ba Ĥejift tantn ka ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛb kan n Nyaamɔlmn n kpamloŋun. Ĥà da ɦera kpamloŋun bina kwɛɦnaa.
44007037	Ta yenwii ta beda-ba na Saŋgband kee d` ree bà huuga gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii ɦà dela, bayen bà teela.
44007038	Yisraɦeel tigr nn da kpogl taa kpamloŋun lee, wii da beel saŋgbantumt ɦà da gwɛɛla-wu n Sinaayi duur ɦɛn wii n t` yandaba bá huuga. Wii nnii Saŋgband nn da bed neerm gwɛɛt na ɦá biir-t.
44007039	Dn da bed-wu neerm gwɛɛt na ɦá biir-t lee, t` yandaba t´ ka ba valg-wu, bá kirm ɦá gwɛɛt n ka bag na bà ŋmɛtg Ĥejift tantn.
44007040	Bá bɔɦɔɔ Ĥaroon na ɦá kud-ba boga, ɦee ked bá nɔngan. Na Mohiiswii laɦ ree-ba Ĥejift tantn, bà kpaa mi b´ ɦer-wu bii.
44007041	Bá kudm naag̈b n vidm b` man n ka ba nyaag̈bn ban kudr bayen bii kaa.
44007042	Ban ɦer welee lee, Saŋgband t gwid-ba kaawr n saa bá ka vid ŋmɛdii n kidga n muunu. L´ ɦɛm wo ln ɦɔd gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadgan lee na: Yisraɦeel tigr! ¿Man nnii nn da lɔg dɔm ka vid kpamloŋun kakeɦnan bina kwɛɦnaa?
44007043	Ĥaai! N` toɦda Mooloka suku n Refaana ŋmɛdga nn mɛɦr na n` vidm tii. Tii nnii man kee mà lɔg-n mà hilgrii-n n Babiloon tant nɔngan.
44007044	«Kpamloŋun, t` yandaba da ba n Saŋgband suku. Bà da ɦera-ku wo Saŋgband nn da bed Mohiis na bá ɦee-ku lee. Biilm, d` da beda Mohiis na ɦá ɦee-ku kù bɛm wo dn da werii-wu kuu.
44007045	Bee kwɛɛlba nn dan n soɦdg-ku lee, bá n bà jugu tii Yoosua bá jibl-ku tant Saŋgband nn da voor t` tiiba bá nɔngan tiin. Sukuu t ka bee kakeɦnan Daviida wen.
44007046	Saŋgband t ka ɦɛna-wu hɔm, ɦá gbaam-d huru na ɦà mɛɦ-d haar na Yakooba yakii seeŋ̈m-d kan.
44007047	Huraa Salomoona da hel n mɔɦm haarii.
44007048	Gwɛntaɦ', Saŋgband ba bermr, d` ba saŋgbambiimn, d` kpaa go haya nidba nn mɔɦ ɦeen. Wo gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta nn bɔɦɔɔ lee na,
44007049	Saberma bɔɦɔɔ na ɦá huraant jarga nnii saŋgbambiim, na tant ba na ɦá dɔɔm tii ɦɛn ɦá nakpai. Na ¿hated nnii ban ba bà mɛɦ-wu? Na ¿tee nnii ɦan ba ɦà bɛmaa?
44007050	Na ¿lag ɦayen ɦà gemmntn nnii ɦan ɦer l` mɛnguu?
44007051	«Germ tiit nen! N` ba soɦdg Saŋgband n` kwɛɛwan. Ka d´ hoɦ-n, n´ nyɔdm n` tobɦa. N` kpaa vala Voɦoom Buudm. N` boo n` yandaba dela.
44007052	¿Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwen nnii n` yandaba nn da ba ɦe daddad? Bà da kura bá da bɔɦɔɔ na gobiint tii ɦayenɦa nan kenan bee. Gwɛɦmaa, wii nnii nn gweedm n kuum n kit nidkuudt.
44007053	Saŋgbantumtba da to-n baɦlb, n´ ka ta ba ɦe b´ ɦɛn ŋmɛɛg̈b.»
44007054	Yaani yaadbermba nn ɦomr welee lee, n ɦɛm kwɛɛwweerga n ka duum bà nyina n Ĥetyɛɛna.
44007055	Wii lee, Voɦoom Buudm ba ɦà ni kpaalaa, ɦá geed saŋgbambiimn n yum Saŋgband wiinga n ta Yeesu ɦà jeɦr d` najuudu ɦɛn.
44007056	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n! Mà yul saŋgbambiim vuur, Nida Budaaga jeɦr Saŋgband najuudu ɦɛn.»
44007057	Ĥan bed welee lee, bá mɔɔm ŋmɛi n fiɦ bá tobɦa ɦɛn, bá bewl bá mɛmbee ɦà ɦɛn
44007058	n ree-wu kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn na bá lɔd-wu tana na bà kuu-wu. Bá da ɦomr ɦà gwɛɛla welee bee da fitr bà dimbermt n foɦl kwɛɛlɦii man bà hoɦ-wu na Soola na ɦá kiigm t´ ɦɛn.
44007059	Ban da lɔd-wu tana lee, ɦà seeŋa na: «Berm Yeesu, soɦdg mà liliigu!»
44007060	Lee, n gbaɦnt ɦá dina ɦɛn n tool kimm na: «Saberma, lɔg bá fubɛɦgankena v` waa-ba!» Ĥan bed welee lee, n kuum.
44008001	Ban da kuu Ĥetyɛɛn lee, Soola bɔɦɔɔ na tii nnii.
44008002	Nidhɔmba biiba da kuur Ĥetyɛɛna n kom-wu kɔd.
44008003	Soolwii da naka ɦà ni na ɦà kpii saŋgbantiiba kpaturu. Ĥà da linta n haya ka moog fɔg̈ba n daba bà tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee n kwɛgdi ka lɔɔ-ba sarga.
44008004	Bá da yadr taa bee da linta n kɔrni ka faa Yeesua Gohɔmt.
44008005	Filfa t san Samarii kɔrgu kuugun n ka faa Saŋgband nn bantg wii gwɛɛt kɔrguun tiiba ka ta ɦɛna hoolgu.
44008006	Nidfigm nn da ɦomr gwɛɛtii n yum hoolgu ɦɛb ɦan da ɦɛna bii lee, bá mɛmbee t ka lɔɔ tobr gwɛɛt ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ tii ɦɛn.
44008007	Biilm, kunidba da ror nidba kɔd ni ka mɔɔ ŋmɛɛga kimm, balmdindmba n kparuuba kɔd gbaadaa.
44008008	Lamɛɛgu da ɦera kan kɔrguun tiiba kɔd.
44008009	Nidɦii da ba kɔrguun saɦ', bà hoɦ-wu na Simoona, ɦà da ɦɛna ŋmɛŋmɛgt l` ɦɛna Samarii tiiba yɔlaa. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na wii nnii nidkilma,
44008010	kaabee n kpalmmbee da hirwa ɦà kaa ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna nnii Saŋgband gemmnt ban hoɦ na ‟gemmnt mɔmt” tii.»
44008011	Bà da hirwa ɦà kaa blaɦb kaa na ɦà mana ka ɦɛna ɦá ŋmɛŋmɛgt l` ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa.
44008012	Filfa nn daan lee, bá tii Gohɔmt ɦan da faa l` baɦr n Saŋgband huraant n ta Yeesu Krist tii. Ban tii lee, ɦá huurm-ba nyaalm, fɔg̈bee n dabee.
44008013	Simoona mɔma t ta tii t´ ɦɛn, bá huurm-wu nyaalm ɦá ka nawr n Filfa ka yu hoolgu ɦɛb ɦan ɦɛna bii l` ɦɛna-wu yɔlaa.
44008014	Tumtba da ba Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n ɦom na Samarii tiiba soɦdg Saŋgband gwɛɛt. Ban ɦomr welee lee, n tuui-ba Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛsa.
44008015	Bee nn taai Samarii kɔrguun lee, n seeŋ na Voɦoom Buudm hoɦntn bá tii Saŋgband gwɛɛt ɦɛn bee ɦɛn.
44008016	Biilm, Voɦoom Buudm da ban hoɦntn bà ni ɦii ɦɛn. Bà da hoda-ba nyaalm Berm Yeesua hidrn n jaɦ'.
44008017	Lee, Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs bá dee bá niɦi bá ɦɛn bá soɦd Voɦoom Buudm.
44008018	Lee wen, Simoona t yum na tumtba deaa bà niɦi ɦii ɦɛn ɦá soɦd Voɦoom Buudm, ɦá ka tɔɔ Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛswu lig̈biir
44008019	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ta si-n-ma welee gemmntii na ka má ta dee mà niɦi ɦii ɦɛnii, ɦà soɦdg Voɦoom Buudm.»
44008020	Fetra t leed-wu na: «Ven n v` lig̈biirii, jib-n taabuugun! ¿Diila na Saŋgband nn saɦ yem bii, baa bà bee bà daɦ-b n lig̈biirn?
44008021	Welee gwɛɛtii nii, kpaɦ n bii bii, v` kwɛɛwr kpaɦ hɔm Saŋgband nɔngan.
44008022	Lagii welee diilbɛɦee v` jugun v` jow Saŋgband na mig ¿d` ba d` waa-v diila vn ɦer ɦee laa?
44008023	Mà yul na bɛɦgu kɔd ba v` ni, fubɛɦga mad-v.»
44008024	Simoona t nan bɔɦɔɔ Fetrwu n Yohanɛɛs na: «Jow-n Saberma n` mɔmba na gwɛɛtii ni kuugu daa bee kù ɦe wo nn bed lee!»
44008025	Tumtba bareɦbee nn da bed gwɛɛt n faa Gohɔmt lee, n ŋmɛt Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Bà da kulaa ka faa-t Samarii kɔrni kɔdn.
44008026	Goor diir, Saberma tumtɦii da beda Filf na: «Ba v` lɔg huru v` kedii n toŋu faagan, baɦ kpamloŋun huru ɦú ror Yerusalɛm ka kedaa Gasaa kɔrgun ɦuu.»
44008027	Ĥá lɔɔm huru yelmaa. Ĥan lɔɔr huru n ka ked lee, n san n yum nidɦii, l` ba na Ĥetiyofii tiin. Ĥetiyofii tant fɔghuraa Kandaasa da to-wu karkbermt, ɦá ka sug ɦá kɛgt mɛnt ɦɛn, l` ba na dabɔtn. L` da mira nidwii t san Yerusalɛm na ɦà doot Saŋgband tiŋan,
44008028	n ka ŋmɛta ka kulaa ɦá kɔrgu, ka kad ɦà deera kekeŋun ka kaal gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya wadgan.
44008029	Voɦoom Buudm t bɔɦɔɔ Filf na: «San v` vɔɦdg kekeŋunkuna v` ked ka bɛd-ku!»
44008030	Ĥá solm kili, n nyuɦ kekeŋuu man, n ka kewla gwɛɛt nidwii nn kaal tii, n miig na Yesaaya wadgan gwɛɛtn, n gbaam-wu na: «¿Ĥuma gwɛɛt vn kaal tii kɔtɔd hɔm?»
44008031	Nidwii t leed na: «Ka ɦii ba ree-ma gwɛɛtii kɔtɔd, ¿mà ɦe lan mà ɦomaa?» Ĥan bed welee lee, n hoɦ Filf na ɦá jib kekeŋun ɦà kad ɦà man.
44008032	Gwɛɛt nidwii nn da kaal Wadbuudgan tii nnanaɦ': Ĥà da kitg wo fɛɛgu ban dad n muɦu ka ked n na bà ku kuu, wo fɛɛbuga nn kpaa dama bá wen kwe ká sɔrm lee wen. Ta welee nnii ɦan da ba huudg ɦà noor n bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛgu kuyengu felaɦ'.
44008033	Bà da hoɦlg-wu n tiŋa kpaalaa, ɦá yaagu t kuum. Bá kpii ɦá neerm tant ɦɛn. ¿Wen nan ta bea ɦà biir ɦá buudm gwɛɛt lii?
44008034	Karkwii t bɔɦɔɔ Filf na: «Taa maara, ree-ma nan l´ kɔtɔd! ¿Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta bɔɦɔɔ wen gwɛɛtii? ¿Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ ɦayen ɦà ret laa, nidjeenɦii ret le?»
44008035	Lee wen, Filfa t ree gwɛɛt ɦan kaal Wadbuudgan tii kɔtɔd, n tag n t` ɦɛn n bɔɦɔɔ-wu Yeesua Gohɔmt.
44008036	Ban da baɦr huru ka ked lee, n san n taam riikan, n yum nyaalm. Karkwii t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Kpay nyaalm! ¿Ben kewr na bá daa hor-ma?» [
44008037	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ka v´ tii n v` kwɛɛwr mɛnd, bii kpaa kewr.» Nidwii t leed na: «Mà tii na Yeesu Krist nnii Saŋgband Budaaga.»]
44008038	Ĥan bed welee lee, n wed bá jeɦl kekeŋu. Bá hoɦnt bá reɦdrbee, n jib nyaalmn, Filfa t huurm-wu.
44008039	Ban red nyaalmn lee, Saberma Voɦoom t lɔgm Filf n san-wu n kɔrvolgun, karkwii t ka ba lil-wu nyaanb, n baɦ huru n ka ked ka nyaaga.
44008040	Filfa t mid ɦan ba Ĥasdood kɔrgun. Ĥá baɦ n ree n ka tɔdma n kɔrni mɛni ka faa Gohɔmt kakeɦnan ɦá daa taai Sesaree.
44009001	Soola diɦ n ɦà ni n ka la tagd Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtba, ka bɔɔ n ban na ɦà ba ɦà ɦee-ba bɛɦgu ɦà yɔɦwr-ba. Ta welee nnii ɦan da san n gbaam gotiberm
44009002	na ɦá si-wu wadii, na l` si-wu huru ɦà jibm Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn, Damaas kɔrgun, na ka ɦá taŋ kan n nidba, daba laa fɔg̈ba bá tagd Yeesua kpaturu kaa bee, ɦà mɔg-ba ɦà san n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44009003	Ĥan soɦdg wadii n lɔɔm huru n san n ka nyuɦaa Damaas kɔrgu lee, myenm ɦɛn, wiinga kiiga t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn n fiid-wu.
44009004	Ĥá luurm tiŋan, n ɦom noor diir bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Sool! Sool! ¿Ben kaa nnii vn ɦɛna-ma daddad?»
44009005	Ĥá gbaam na: «Berma! ¿Ven nnii wenii?» Noorii t leed na: «Man nnii Yeesua, man nnii vn ɦɛna daddad.
44009006	Gwɛntaɦ lee, vidg v` jib kɔrgun! Reekan nnii ban kee bà biir-v l´ reb ba na v` ɦɛm bii.»
44009007	L´ saa, biiba bà da heɦla Soolwu bee t kpat n jeɦnt belaɦ', kuugu kpaa kɔta-ba felaɦ'. Bà da kewaa noorii gwɛɛlb, gwɛntaɦaa, ka kpaa yu ɦii.
44009008	Soolwii t ɦig n vid faaga, n muud ɦá niini, gwɛntaɦaa, n ka la kpaa yu bii. Bá dur-wu n jibl-wu Damaas kɔrgun.
44009009	Ĥá ɦɛm goora ɦataɦ', ɦà niini kpaa yu, ɦà kpaa ju bii ka ta kpaa nyi bii.
44009010	Yeesua gwɛɛt soɦdgtɦii da ba Damaas kɔrguun, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥanan̈yaasa. Berm Yeesua t ree ɦayen n werii-wu jaamiitn, n hoɦ-wu na: «Ĥanan̈yaas!» Ĥá hak n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, man nanaɦ'!»
44009011	Ĥá nan bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vidg yelmaa v` san huru ban hoɦ na «Tiɦ» ɦuun, v` jib Yuudaasa haarn, v` gbaam Taarsi tiiɦii ɦɛn, bà hoɦ-wu na Soola. Ĥà ba kan ka seeŋa. Ĥá seeŋbii nii,
44009012	ɦà nyana nidɦii, wo jaamiitn, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥanan̈yaasa, ɦá jibn ɦá jugun, n dee ɦá ɦɛn niɦi na ɦá niini wentg.»
44009013	Ĥanan̈yaasa t leed na: «Berma, nidba kɔd beda-ma nidwii gwɛɛt, ka kɛɛmla kunyɔŋu ɦan lɔɔ v` reba kuu Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44009014	Gotibermba lag n saɦm-wu gemmnt na ɦá daan nnaɦ ɦà mɔg biiba bà hoɦ v` hidr bee mɛmbee.»
44009015	Berma t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Keda! Mà bantg nidwii na, mà to-wu na ɦá ɦe tigvolɦee n ɦà huraamba, n Yisraɦeel tigr na bá miig mà hidr.
44009016	Mà mɔm mà kee mà werii-wu kunyɔŋu ln ba na ɦá di mà hidr kaa kuu mɛnguu.»
44009017	Lee wen, Ĥanan̈yaasa t lɔɔm huru, n san n jib haariin, n dee Soola ɦɛn ɦá niɦi, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Sool, mà teela! Berma tamna-ma v` man. Wii nnii Yeesu ɦá da ree ɦayen n werii-v hurun wii. Ĥà tamna-ma na v` niini wentg v` ŋmɛtg v` yum, na Voɦoom Buudm ta jib v` ni.»
44009018	Yelmaa, bii t rorm ɦá niinin ka boo ɦɔlkwɛgii n tɛɦr, ɦá ŋmɛt n ka yu. Lee wen, ɦá vid bá huurm-wu Saŋgband nyaalm.
44009019	Tii n t` kaan, ɦá jum diit n yuuŋ kwɛgdi.
44009020	n baɦd yelmaa n ka faa Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn na Yeesu nnii Saŋgband Budaaga.
44009021	Bá da ɦum ɦà bɔɦɔɔ welee bee mɛmbee, l` da ɦɛna-ba yɔlaa, bá ka gbaama taa na: «¿Lag wii da dɛɛra bá da hoɦ hidrii bee Yerusalɛm kɔrgu nii? ¿Lag ɦà daan nnaɦ na ɦà mug bá hoɦ hidrii bee ɦà san ɦà to gotibermba?»
44009022	Ban da la bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, Soola faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt ka ba n gemmnt. Ĥà da weraa na Yeesu nnii Saŋgband nn bantg wii. Ĥan da weraa hɔm kpaalaa lee, Yuudaa tiiba bá da ba Damaas kɔrgun bee t lag n ka kpaa mi ln ba na bá leedg-wu tii.
44009023	L´ hiid, Yuudaa tiibee t bɔm noor na bà kuu-wu.
44009024	Soola t miig na bà koora kpaab ɦá ɦɛn. Wo dabid nn kaadg kɔrguu lee, bá ka kiig kù fiid noora ɦɛn nyingu n muunu.
44009025	Lee, Soola gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t lɔgm-wu n nyingu n mɛwl n dabid kaan ka lo-wu futɛtɛɦgun. Ĥá san Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44009026	Ĥan taai Yerusalɛm lee, n ka bag na wú n gwɛɛt soɦdgtba bá bɛm, bee ba n fobɛɦgu ka kpaa tia na ɦà ta ba na gwɛɛt soɦdgtn biilm.
44009027	Barnabaasa t lɔgm-wu n san-wu n tumtba man n bɔɦɔɔ-ba lan nnii Soola nn da nyan Berm Yeesuwu hurun n lan nnii Berma nn da gwɛɛl n wun lee. Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba lan nnii Soola nn da faa gwɛɛt Yeesua hidrn Damaas kɔrgun ka ɦigaa t´ ɦɛn.
44009028	Lee wen, Soola t ka ba bá man, wú n ban bá ka bee ɦà linta n Yerusalɛm kɔrgu ka faa Saberma hidrn gwɛɛt.
44009029	Ĥà da gwɛɛla n Yuudaa tiiba bá gwɛɛla grɛɛkm bee, wú n ban bá ka kia n taa. Bee t ka bag na bà kuu-wu.
44009030	Krista tiibee nn dan n miig welee lee, n san-wu n Sesaree n nyabl-wu na ɦá san Taarsi kɔrgun.
44009031	Yuudee tantn n Galilee tantn n Samarii tantn kpaturu t ka haɦaa ka ba nigiigun, ka vala Saberma, Voɦoom Buudm tɔra-ɦu ɦù berŋa.
44009032	Fetrwii da lintgaa tantii mɛntiin, n dan n san goor diir bá go Liida kɔrgun ka tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee man.
44009033	Ĥá san n yum daawɦii, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥeenea, ɦà door ɦà fiigu ɦɛn ka ɦe bina ɦaniind l´ kaɦ-wu.
44009034	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Ĥeenee! Yeesu Krista gbaad-v. Vidg v` vil v` fiigu!» Yelmaa ɦá vid.
44009035	Liida kɔrgu tiiba mɛmba n Saroon tiibee mɛmbee t yum-wu n bid bayen n Berm Yeesua wee.
44009036	Fɔgɦii da ba Yafaa kɔrgun gwɛɛt soɦdgtba huuga, bà hoɦ-wu na Tabitaa, ka hoɦ n grɛɛkmn na Dɔrkaasa, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na ‟walga”. Fɔg̈wii da ɦɛna hɔmgu hɛngu, ka tɔra kunyɔŋtiiba.
44009037	L´ vuuguu, fɔg̈wii t ɦɛm bɛɦii, n kuum, bá huurm-wu n dool-wu disagfaagrgun.
44009038	Ree kan gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t ɦom na Fetra ba Liida kɔrgun, l` nyɔɦr n kan. Bá ree nidba bareɦba n tom ɦá man, ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá jowdr-wu ɦà daan bà man weem.
44009039	Ban taai lee, Fetra t vid yelmaa n tag nidbee. Ĥan taai lee, bá lɔgm-wu n kol-wu disagfaagrguun. L´ mir kuŋfɔg̈ba mɛmba t kpogl kan taa. Bá nyuɦ ɦá man ka kuum, n werii-wu tugt n dimbermt Dɔrkaasa nn da hɛd ka neer tii.
44009040	Fetra t ree nidba mɛmba duun, n gbaɦnt dind, n seeŋ Saŋgband. L´ diɦ, ɦá tint ɦayen n kpiira weenn, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tabitaa, vidg!» Ĥá wii ɦá niini. Ĥá wen nyan Fetraa, n vid n kad.
44009041	Fetra t mug ɦá nuɦu, n tɔr-wu, ɦá vid n jeɦnt. Ĥá hoɦ kuŋfɔg̈bee n Yeesua ɦɛn tiitvolbee, n to-ba-wu ɦá neer ka ba hɔm.
44009042	Yafaa kɔrguu mɛnguu t ɦom bii b` gɛtg bii mɛmbii, l´ saa nidba kɔd t tii Berm Yeesua ɦɛn.
44009043	Fetra t kad Yafaa kɔrgun l´ hiid ka go jungbant tii Simoonaa.
44010001	Nidɦii da ba Sesaree kɔrgun bà hoɦ-wu na Kɔrnɛɛya. Ĥà da ba na Roomaa tawdba fonfonu ban hoɦ na ‟Ĥitaalii fonfonu” ɦuu kaftɛɛnn.
44010002	Nidwii da ba nidhɔma, wú n ɦà haarii mɛndii bà tia Saŋgband ɦɛn ka vala-d. Ĥà da ta tɔra Yuudaa tiiba bá ba kunyɔŋun bee hɔm, ka seeŋa Saŋgband hɛruɦ'.
44010003	Goor diir jabr l` waɦda waari ɦitaɦ', l´ ree n werii-wu wiingan ɦá yum Saŋgband tumtɦii jibna ɦà ɦɛn ka hoɦ-wu na: «Kɔrnɛɛy!»
44010004	Ĥá geed saŋgbantumtwii, fobɛɦgu t mug-wu. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, ¿ben bee?» Saŋgbantumtwii t leed-wu na: «Saŋgband soɦdg v` seeŋb n hɔmgu vn ɦɛna kunyɔŋtiiba kuu, d` kpaa hɔŋaa v` ɦɛn.
44010005	Gwɛɦŋa lee, tom nidba Yafaa kɔrgun bà hoɦ kan Simoon ban daarŋ na Fetrwii na ɦá daan.
44010006	Ĥà gool jungbant tii Simoonaa, ɦà haar ba nyaam kpamga.»
44010007	Saŋgbantumtwii nn bed-wu gwɛɛt l´ diɦ ɦá nyab lee, Kɔrnɛɛya t hoɦ ɦá ŋmɛɛɦeedba bareɦ n tawdba bà ɦɛna ɦá ŋmɛɛg̈b bee ni bilma ɦà ba nidhɔma ka seeŋa Saŋgband
44010008	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba b´ ɦer bii mɛmbii, n tom-ba Yafaa kɔrgun.
44010009	Toŋu vɛtr, ban baɦ huru n san n ka nyuɦaa Yafaa kɔrgu lee, l´ mir Fetra t juul haar disaku faaga muunu huuga na ɦà seeŋ.
44010010	Kɔm t mug-wu ɦá ka bag na ɦà di diit. Ban da ɦeewr-wu diit n duug̈b lee, l´ ree n werii-wu wo jaamiitn,
44010011	ɦá yum saŋgbambiim t rawdg, bii t rorm kan, ka boo dimbermr diir, l` mad d` noora ɦanaaɦee, ka hoɦntna tant ɦɛn.
44010012	Dimrii nii, dɔm jugu jugu da ba kan, nakpai hinaa rem, n m` balma mii, n kɔŋkɔɦt rem.
44010013	Noor diir t gwɛɛl ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Fetr! Vidg v` ku v` di!»
44010014	Fetra t leed na: «Berma, mà kpaɦn! Man bee n janaa, mà ban di kirb bii n bii b` ba nakakeet bii felaɦ'.»
44010015	Noorii t ta lilm gwɛɛlb ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bii Saŋgband nn bɔɦɔɔ na b´ ba kelkel bii, vii daa biir na b` ba nakakeet.»
44010016	L´ ɦɛm welee tɔmb mtaɦ saɦ n ŋmɛt ka kota saŋgbambiimn.
44010017	Fetra t ka giid ka wii ka gbaama ɦayen na ¿jaamiitii kɔtɔd nnii na lan mɔmgu? Lee wen, nidba Kɔrnɛɛya nn da tamn bee t gbaam bá werii-ba Simoona haar, bá taai d´ fiid noon.
44010018	Bá hoɦ n gbaam na: «¿Nnaɦ nnii Simoon ban daarŋ na Fetr wii kan gon?»
44010019	Fetra nn da ɦeewr n diila ɦà jaamiitii kɔtɔd ɦɛn lee, Voɦoom Buudm t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Nidba bataɦba biiba bagl-v.
44010020	Vidg v` hoɦnt v´ n ban n` nyab ka kpaa nigaa! Man tamn-ba.»
44010021	Fetra t nan hoɦnt nidbee man n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Nid nn bag wii nnii man. ¿N` daan na laa?»
44010022	Bá leed-wu na: «Kaftɛɛn Kɔrnɛɛya tamn-t. Ĥà ba nidhɔma, ka seeŋa Saŋgband. Yuudaa tiibee mɛmbee sɔkla-wu. Saŋgbantumtbuudɦii baɦl-wu na ɦà tamn v` do, na v` daan ɦà ɦom vn ba v` biir-wu tii.»
44010023	Fetra t soɦd-ba hɔm n saɦm-ba dugu. Toŋu t vɛt wú n ban bá baɦ huru. Yafaa kɔrgun Krista tiiba biiba t heɦl-wu.
44010024	Bà da taai Sesaree goreɦdrd goor. Kɔrnɛɛya da hoɦ ɦà tuurnbuudba. Wú n ban n ɦà haarii mɛndii bà da hɔda-ba.
44010025	Fetra nn taai lee, Kɔrnɛɛya t tuug-wu n doot ɦá tiŋa na ɦà seeŋ-wu n valgm.
44010026	Fetra t vii-wu ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vidg! Ta man nnii nida, wo vn ta ba lee.»
44010027	Lee, wú n Kɔrnɛɛy bá ka gwɛɛla ka jibaa haaga. Ban jib lee, ɦá mid nidba kɔd t kpogl taa.
44010028	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «N` miil hɔm na l` ba si huru na Yuudaa tia nyɔɦr n saana, laa ɦá jib ɦà haarn, t` kirb nnii. L` ba welee gwɛntaɦaa, Saŋgband werii-ma na, l` kpaɦ na mà lɔg ɦii na ɦà ba nakakeet, laa wulaɦ kpaa tɔn.
44010029	Tii kaa nnii nn hoɦ-ma má daan ka kpaa nigaa. Man bagm nan na mà miig nn hoɦ-ma b´ kaa bii.»
44010030	Lee, Kɔrnɛɛya t leed na: «Jana nnii gonaard gaamanɦena jugun l` waɦda waari ɦitaɦ', man da ba taa ka seeŋa, n yum nidɦii t rɛn mà nɔngan myenm ɦɛn ka fidr dimgu kù nyinwa n hoɦ-ma
44010031	n bɔɦɔɔ na Saŋgband ɦomra mà seeŋb, na d` kpaa hɔŋaa hɔmgu man ɦɛna kunyɔŋtiiba kuu.
44010032	Na mà tom nidba Yafaa kɔrgun na bá hoɦ Simoon ban daarŋ na Fetr wii na ɦá daan. Na ɦà gool jungbant tii Simoonaa, ɦà haar ba nyaam kpamga.
44010033	Má tamn nidba yelmaa na bá hoɦ-v, v´ ta ɦɛm hɔm n daan. Gwɛɦma lee, t` kpogl taa t` mɛmbee Saŋgband nɔngan na t` ɦom Saberma nn tamn-v na v` biir-t tii.»
44010034	Fetra t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɦmaa, mà miig na Saŋgband dii kpaa geewa n nida nɔnga wee.
44010035	Nidbaaben tia, ka la kɔrteku tia, ka ɦà vala-d ka ɦɛna b´ ba hɔm bii, ɦá ka bee-d loogu.
44010036	N` miil na dii da toolg Yisraɦeel tigr d´ gwɛɛt. Tii nnii Gohɔmt t` kena n nigiigu Yeesu Krista hidrn tii. Yeesuwii nnii nidba mɛmba Berma.
44010037	N` miil Yohanɛɛsa nn da faa nidba Saŋgband nyaalm huurb gwɛɛt ka huur-ba lee, ka ta mi b` da gɛtg Galilee tantn saɦ n b` da ta gɛtg Yuudee tantn bii.
44010038	N` ta miil lan nnii Saŋgband nn da bantg Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tii n lo Voɦoom Buudm gemmnt ɦá ɦɛn lee, n ta lan nnii ɦan da linta n kɔrgu ka ɦɛna hɔmgu, ka gbaadaa Kunida nn da mad bee mɛmbee lee. L` weraa na Saŋgband da ba ɦà man.
44010039	Ten lee, tii nyana n t` niini ɦan da ɦer bii mɛmbii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun n Yuudaa tiiba tantn bii. Bá dan n kpaɦm-wu dabragr ɦɛn ɦá kuum.
44010040	Gwɛntaɦ', Saŋgband t himii-wu kuumn gotaɦrd goor n ɦɛm ɦá werii ɦayen.
44010041	Ĥà da ba werii ɦayen tigr mɛnd, ɦà da werii ɦayenwu biiba Saŋgband nn da roodg na bá da bà nyaan-wu bee. Bee nnii ten, t´ n wun ten da dir n nyim ɦá kuumn himtgm kaann ten.
44010042	Ĥà da beda-t na t` faam gwɛɛt tigr mɛnd ka bɔɦɔɔ na wii nnii Saŋgband nn lo na ɦá yaam neermba n kpiirmba n yaagu.
44010043	Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbee mɛmbee da beda ɦà gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦá hidrn nnii nid ɦá tii ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn wii nn soɦda ɦá fubɛɦii waam.»
44010044	Fetra nn da la gwɛɛla lee, Voɦoom Buudm t hoɦntn bá da kewla ɦà gwɛɛt bee mɛmbee ɦɛn.
44010045	L´ ɦɛm Yuudaa saŋgbantiiba bá daan Fetra kaa bee yɔlaa na Saŋgband ta sira Voɦoom Buudm bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee, n ɦɛm m´ hoɦnt bá ɦɛn.
44010046	Biilm, bà da ɦuma bà gwɛɛla lam jugu jugu ka ba kpɛlŋ-m ka nyɔka Saŋgband, Fetra t nan bɔɦɔɔ na:
44010047	«¿Ĥii ba ɦà bee ɦà kir na bá daa hor nidbambena nyaalm l` ba na bà ta soɦdg Voɦoom Buudm wo ten?»
44010048	Ĥá saɦm wad na bá hor-ba Yeesu Krista hidrn. Tii n t` kaan, bá gbaam Fetr na ɦá kad bà man goora ɦalanɦa.
44011001	Tumtba n Krista tiiba volba bá da ba Yuudee tantn bee t ɦom na bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ta soɦdg Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
44011002	Fetra nn dan n ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun lee, saŋgbantiiba bà da ba na Yuudaa tiiba bee t kpalm-wu
44011003	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Jib nidba ban ba bɔd bee man v´ n ban n´ jum diita? ¿Ben nnii welee?»
44011004	Lee wen, Fetra t ree b´ da gɛtg bii kuyen kuyen n bɔɦɔɔ-ba. Ĥà da beda-ba na:
44011005	«Mà da ba Yafaa kɔrgun ka seeŋa, l´ dan n ɦɛm-ma wo jaamiit dela, má yum bii hoɦntna mà ɦɛn. Blaɦb da boo dimbermr diir, l` mad d` noora ɦanaaɦee, ka hoɦntna saŋgbambiimn n daan mà man.
44011006	Má geed d´ ni hɔm n yum haaga dɔm n kpam rem n dɔm m` balma mii n kɔŋkɔɦt rem.
44011007	Lee wen, má ɦom noor diir hoɦ-ma ka bɔɦɔɔ na mà vidg mà ku mà di.
44011008	Má leed na berma, mà kpaɦn! Na man bee n janaa, mà ban di kirb bii n bii b` ba nakakeet bii felaɦ'
44011009	Noorii t ta lilm gwɛɛlb saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na bii Saŋgband nn bɔɦɔɔ na b´ ka ba kelkel bii, na maa daa biir na b` ba nakakeet.
44011010	L´ ɦɛm welee tɔmb mtaɦ saɦ', l´ hel n kol l´ mɛnguu saŋgbambiimn.
44011011	Yelmaa, nidba bataɦba t daan haar tn da ba d` ni diin. Bà da rɛn Sesaree kɔrgun, bá tamn-ba mà do.
44011012	Voɦoom Buudm t bɔɦɔɔ-ma na mà nyab bà kaa yelmaa ka kpaa nigaa. T` teelba baroondbambena t heɦl-ma, t´ san n jib nid ɦá tamn mà do wii haarn.
44011013	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-t lan nnii ɦan da nyan ɦà haarn saŋgbantumtɦii jeɦr ka bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá tom nidba Yafaa kɔrgun na bà daan n Simoon ban daarŋ na Fetr wii.
44011014	Na mà biir-wu gwɛɛt t´ ba t` ɦe na wú n ɦà haar mɛnd bá daɦ bá juuni tii.
44011015	Man da baɦ gwɛɛlb yelmaa lee, Voɦoom Buudm t hoɦntn bá ɦɛn wo mn da hoɦntn t` ɦɛn nooga saɦ lee.
44011016	Lee wen, má nan deed gwɛɛt Berma nn da bed tii. Ĥà da beda na Yohanɛɛsa hoda-t n nyaalm, na wii lee, wii kee ɦà hor-t n Voɦoom Buudm.
44011017	Welee lee, Saŋgband ta sira-ba dn da ta sir-t tn da tii Berm Yeesu Krista ɦɛn bii. ¿Man nnii wen na mà da kir n dna?»
44011018	Ban ɦomr welee lee, n kwiiŋl bayen n ka nyɔka Saŋgband ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka welee, l` ba gobiilm. Saŋgband ta sira bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee huru na bá lagii neerm bà soɦdg neerm mɔmm.»
44011019	Kunyɔŋu kú da daan Ĥetyɛɛna kuum wen kuu da ɦera bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee t yadr taa. Bá ni biiba t san kakeɦnan Feniisii tantn n Siifr tantn n Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun, n ka faa Yeesua Gohɔmt Yuudaa tiiba n jaɦ'.
44011020	Lee wen, biiba bà da tii gwɛɛtii ɦɛn ka ba na Siifr n Sirɛɛn tiiba t san Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun n ka ta gwɛɛla n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee. Bà da faa-ba Gohɔmt t` bɔɦɔɔ Berm Yeesua gwɛɛt.
44011021	Saberma gemmnt da tɔra-ba, nidba kɔd t tii n lagii bà kwɛɛwa n tint bayen n Berma wee.
44011022	Yerusalɛm Krista kpaturu tiiba t ɦom welee n vii Barnabaas n tom Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun.
44011023	Ĥan taai kan n yum lan nnii Saŋgband nn da kaawl bá tii d´ gwɛɛt bee ɦɛn lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu lamɛɛgu, ɦá haɦl bá kwɛɛwa bá mɛmbee n bɔɦɔɔ na bá nawr n Berm Yeesuwu hɔm.
44011024	Barnabaasa da ba nidhɔma. Voɦoom Buudm ba ɦá ni kpaalaa, ɦà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim haɦr. Nidba kɔd da hewla Yeesua kpaturun.
44011025	Ĥá vid ree n san Taarsi kɔrgun na ɦà bag Soola.
44011026	Ĥan san n yum-wu lee, n daan-wu n Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun, bá ɦɛm kan binbilmr kpaturɦuun n werii nidba kɔd gwɛɛt. Ĥantiyɔɔs nnii ban da hoɦ noogrm gwɛɛt soɦdgtba na «Krista tiiba».
44011027	L´ vuuguu, gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba biiba t vid Yerusalɛm n san Ĥantiyɔɔs.
44011028	Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtbee ni ɦii bee bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥagabuusa. Ĥá vid, Voɦoom Buudm t tɔr-wu ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na kɔmbermm ba m` riir tantii mɛntiin. –Kɔmii t ta rorm biilm vuugu Kulooda nn da ba Roomaa hurbermt lee wen.–
44011029	Gwɛɛt soɦdgtba t bɔɦɔɔ taa na baawena ba ɦà si wo ɦan ba ɦà bee lee, bà tuui Krista tiiba bá ba Yuudee tantn bee na l´ tɔrg-ba.
44011030	Bá ɦɛm welee n to Barnabaaswu n Sool na bá san n bà to kan Yeesua kpaturu bermba.
44012001	L´ vuuguu, huraa Ĥerooda t` baɦ n ka jaarŋa Yeesua kpaturu tiiba biiba.
44012002	Ĥá wed bá kuum Yohanɛɛsa teel Yakoobwu n hoodjuuga.
44012003	Ban kur-wu ɦá yum na l` ɦɛna Yuudaa tiiba hɔm lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ bá mug Fetra. L` da ba Kpooni kasant deb vuugun.
44012004	Ban mug-wu lee, n riw-wu sargan, n rood tawdba kwiɦr n baroond n rad-ba tɔmb mnaa na bá sugm-wu. Ĥà da lo na ɦà da ɦà yaa-wu n nidba huuga Gɛtgm kasant kaann.
44012005	Fetra t ka ba sargan, bà sug ɦá ɦɛn. Lee, Yeesua kpaturu tiiba t ka seeŋa Saŋgband ɦà ɦɛn ka kpaa saa.
44012006	Goor ln da ba na toŋu vɛta na Ĥerooda ree-wu ɦà yaa-wu yaagu nidba huuga dii nyingu, Fetra da gool tawdba bareɦba huuga, bá boow-wu n kona ɦarɛɦ', l´ saa kigdba t ka ba bá kaalai fiid noon.
44012007	Saberma tumtɦii t rɛn myenm ɦɛn, wiinga t wiid sarga disakun. Saŋgbantumtwii t faad ɦá fidun n himii-wu n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Vidg weem!» Kona ɦan bɛm ɦá niɦin ɦee t tɛɦr.
44012008	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Lo v` damr, v` fid v` nanawda!» Ĥá ɦɛm welee. Ĥá lilm-wu na: «Fid v` dimbermgu v` tagd mà kaa!»
44012009	Ĥá rorm sarga disakun ka tagd ɦà kaa. Ĥà da kpaa diila na saŋgbantumta nn ɦɛna bii ba gobiint. Ĥà da mi na ɦà jaamaan.
44012010	Bá gɛt kigdba kaalaŋnoogrga n gɛt reɦdrga n taai huturbermu man, bà ɦera-ɦu n kudnaŋu. Ĥú rawd ɦuyen, bá rorm. Bá mɔɔ kɛna n taai hurragrn, saŋgbantumtwii t boorm ɦá man myenm ɦɛn.
44012011	Lee wen, ɦá rarm t kpen, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɦŋa, mà yul na l` ba gobiilm: Saberma tamn ɦà tumt na ɦá soɦdg-ma Ĥerooda nuɦun, ɦà ta ree-ma Yuudaa tiiba bɛɦgu bá nn bagm-ma kuu mɛnguun.»
44012012	Ĥá niini nn wentg lee, ɦá lo na ɦà san Yohanɛɛs ban daarŋ na Markuus wii nya Maariimbaa. L` da mira nidba kɔd t kpogl taa kan n ka seeŋa Saŋgband.
44012013	Ĥan taai lee, n koɦoo fiid noon. Ŋmɛɛɦeedfɔka kiiga t daan na kà nyaan na wen nnii. Bà da hoɦl-ka na Roosa.
44012014	Ká miig ɦá noor l´ ɦɛm-ka lamɛɛgu. Ln ba na ká rawdg lee, ká ŋmɛt ka sol n san n bɔɦɔɔ volbee na Fetra ba duun.
44012015	Bá gbaam-ka na: «¿V` jugun kpaa ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈bn?» Ká bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gobiilmn.» Bá nan bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥá liliigun.»
44012016	Lee wen, Fetra la koɦaa fiid noon. Ban dan n rawd huturu lee, n yum-wu, l´ ɦɛm-ba yɔlaa.
44012017	Ĥá werii-ba n ɦà nabiir na bá kpat kpoɦ', n kɛɛml-ba lan nnii Saberma nn ree-wu sargan, n ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá biir Yakoobwu n volbee welee. Ĥan bed welee lee, n nyab n san jeenlaŋa.
44012018	Toŋu nn dan n ragd lee, tawdba t ka yɔɦwa ka gbaama taa na ¿Fetra tuur n tee?
44012019	Ĥerooda t bɔɦɔɔ bá bagm-wu, ɦii ba nyaan-wu. Ĥá hoɦ tawdba n gbaam-ba gwɛɛt n saɦm wad na bá kuu-ba. Lee, n vid Yuudee n san Sesaree n ɦɛm kan goora ɦalanɦa.
44012020	L´ vuuguu, Huraa Ĥerooda da ba n kwɛɛwweerga biii n Tiir n Sidoon kɔrni tiiba. Bá ɦom n taa na bà san bà nyaan-wu. Bá yum ɦá haar ɦɛn kigd Bilaastuusa n tag n wii wee na bà gbaam Ĥerood na bà ku taa n gwɛɛt, kɔtɔd na bá kɔrni da wayaa n Ĥerooda kɔrgu ka neer.
44012021	Bá baɦ goor. Goorii nn taan lee, Ĥerooda t fid ɦá huraant dimgu, n kad ɦà huraant jargan n ka bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt.
44012022	Nidba t baɦ n ka mɔɔ ka gbu niɦin ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgband gwɛɛlan, lag nidmɔma gwɛɛlan.»
44012023	Ĥá ka ba biir lii. Yelmaa Saberma tumtɦii t gbud-wu, na ¿ben kaa nnii ɦan lo ɦayenwu Saŋgband kaalaŋa? Ŋmeedɦi t nyim-wu ɦá kuum.
44012024	Saberma gwɛɛt lee, tii yadgaa kɔd n kɔrgu.
44012025	Barnabaaswu n Sool ban ɦer ban da tomr na bá ɦe Yerusalɛm bii l´ diɦ lee, bá ŋmɛtgii Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun. Bá bɔɦɔɔ Yohanɛɛs ban daarŋ na Markuus wii t heɦl-ba.
44013001	Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba n weriitba da ba Ĥantiyɔɔs Yeesua kpaturun. Bee nnii Barnabaaswu n Simɦoon ban hoɦ na Hool wiiwu, n Luusyuus Sirɛɛn tiiwu, n Mnayeem ban da doowr wú n kumandaa Ĥerood wiiwu, n nan Soola.
44013002	Goor diir ban da seeŋa Saberm ka boow noor lee, Voɦoom Buudm t bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Gwɛɦŋa, saa-n-ma Barnabaaswu n Sool bà ɦe ŋmɛɛg̈b man lo na bá ɦe bii!»
44013003	Lee wen, bá bɔm noora n seeŋ n dee bá niɦi bá ɦɛn n saa-ba bá nyab.
44013004	Voɦoom Buudm nn tomr-ba welee lee, bá san Seleesii n jib ree meel n san Siifr tantn, tantii ba nyaam huuga.
44013005	Bá taai kan n jib Salamiin kɔrgun, lee, n baɦ n ka faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn. Yohanɛɛs ban daarŋ na Markuus wii da ba bà man ka tɔra-ba.
44013006	Bá rorm Salamiin kɔrguun n lintgii kakeɦnan Faafɔs rekun. Reekan lee, bá taŋ n taadɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Baryeesua, ɦà ba na Yuudaa tia, ka lɔg ɦayen na gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta.
44013007	Ĥà da nyɔɦra n kɔrguun kumandaa Sergiyuus Fɔɔluusa. Kumandaawii da ba rarm. Ĥá hoɦ Barnabaaswu n Soola, kɔtɔd na ɦà da bagl na ɦà ɦom Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
44013008	Gwɛntaɦ', taadwii –bà da ta hoɦl-wu n grɛɛkmn na Ĥeliimasa–, wii t ka kir n ban ka ta bag na kumandaa daa bɛm n tiim n Saŋgband gwɛɛt ɦɛn.
44013009	Lee wen, Voɦoom Buudm t dam Soola, bà da ta hoɦl-wu na Fɔɔla, ɦá geed Ĥeliimasa niinin
44013010	n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Venaa! Rarbɛɦm ba v` ni, v` ba talmt! Ven nnii Kunidgu! Kpaa tiina n bii b` ba hɔm bii! ¿Kpaɦ v` saa Saberma gwɛɛt gɔntrb?
44013011	Gwɛɦma lee, Saberma ba ɦà gbudg-v, v` joom kakeɦnan goora ɦalanɦa, kpaɦ v` yum bii.» Yelmaa, ɦá niini t joom kpaalaa, ɦá ka bidra ɦayen ka bag na ɦii dad-wu.
44013012	Kumandaa nn nyan b` gɛtg bii lee, ɦá tii Yeesua ɦɛn. Bá ka weraa-wu Saberma gwɛɛt l` ɦɛna-wu yɔlaa biii.
44013013	Fɔɔlwu n ɦà tuurmba bá vid Faafɔs kɔrgun n jib meel n san Feerg kɔrgun, Faŋfiilii tantn. Yohanɛɛs ban daarŋ na Markuus wii t saa-ba reekan n ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44013014	Bee lee, bá vid Feerg n taai Ĥantiyɔɔs Fisidii tantn. Saabaat goor, bá jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun n kad.
44013015	Yuudaa tiiba mugaa n baɦ bá kpoglb ka kaal baɦlb wadiin n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadiin. Ban kal l´ diɦ lee, kpoglb disaku bermba t tom na bá biir-ba na: «Teelba-n! Ka n` ba n gwɛɛt tiit na n` biir nidba na n` haɦlg bà kwɛɛwa, n` ba n` bee n` gwɛɛl.»
44013016	Fɔɔla t vid n vii ɦá nuɦu na bá kpat kpoɦ n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Yisraɦeel tiiba nen, n nen, nen ta vala Saŋgband nen, kewlg-n n man!
44013017	Saŋgband nnii Yisraɦeel tigrndina Saŋgband. Dii roodg t` yandaba. Tigrii nn da ba Ĥejift tantn lee, Saŋgband t ɦɛm d´ yad kɔrsaanguun. Saŋgbandii da ta werii d` gemmnt n ree t` yandabee Ĥejift tantn
44013018	n dɔm-ba kpamloŋun kakeɦnan bina kwɛɦnaa.
44013019	Lee, d´ voom tiga ɦalbleɦ Kanaɦaan tantn n lɔgm tantii n to d´ tigr na d` mad
44013020	kakeɦnan wo bina lɛmi ɦinaa n kwɛɦnu. Lee n l` kaan, d´ saɦm t` yandaba yaani yaadba kakeɦnan gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Samuɦeela wen.
44013021	Lee kaann, bá gbaam Saŋgband na d´ si-ba huraa, d´ to-ba Kiisa kwɛɛl Saɦuula, Bɛn̈yamiina buudmn, ɦá kad jargan bina kwɛɦnaa.
44013022	Dn dan n kirm-wu lee, n to-ba Daviid na wii mad huraantii. D´ bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt na d` nyana Yisaaya kwɛɛl Daviida, na d´ loogu lɔɔra-wu. Na ɦà ba ɦà ɦɛm dn bag na ɦá ɦɛm bii mɛmbii.
44013023	Daviida yakii ni nnii Saŋgband nn daan n ɦá ba ɦà daɦ Yisraɦeel tigr jugu wo dn da bed n foorm na d` nan ɦɛnan lee. Wii nnii Yeesua.
44013024	Saɦ na ɦá baɦ ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈bii, Yohanɛɛsa da faa ka bɔɦɔɔ Yisraɦeel tiibee mɛmbee na bá lagii neerm l` saa bà hor-ba nyaalm.
44013025	Yohanɛɛsa nn da fɛla ɦà ŋmɛɛg̈b lee, n ka gbaama nidba na ¿bà diila na wii nnii wenii?, ka bɔɦɔɔ na lag wii nnii ban hɔd wii. Na bá miim na wiilaɦ kena n ɦà kaan, na ɦà kpaa tɔn na ɦà fitg ɦalaɦ nanawda.
44013026	«Teelba-n, Ĥabrahaama yakii nen, n nen, nen ta vala Saŋgband nen! Ten nnii Saŋgband nn tuun jugu daɦb gwɛɛtntina.
44013027	Biilm, Yerusalɛm kɔrgu tiiba n bà huraamba, bà ba miig na wen nnii Yeesua, bà ta ba ɦom gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba gwɛɛt ban kaal Saabaat goora mɛna tii kɔtɔd. Gwɛntaɦ', bá ɦɛm t´ ɦɛn n kuum-wu.
44013028	Bà da bà bee n yum b´ ba na bá kuu-wu bii kaa, bá la bɔɦɔɔ Filaat na ɦá kuu-wu.
44013029	Ban da ɦer gwɛɛt wadii nn da bɔɦɔɔ ɦà ɦɛn tii mɛntii l´ diɦ lee, biiba t hoɦl-wu dabragr ɦɛn n lo-wu bilun.
44013030	Gwɛntaɦ', Saŋgband t himii-wu kuumn ɦá ka neer.
44013031	Ĥá werii ɦayen goora kɔd bá da heɦlg-wu Galilee tantn kakeɦnan Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bee. Gwɛɦma, bee bɔɦɔɔ ɦá gwɛɛt Yisraɦeel tigr.
44013032	T` mɔmba t` ta kena-n n Gohɔmtii. Tii nnii na bii Saŋgband nn da bed na d` nan ɦɛna t` yandaba bii,
44013033	d` ɦera-t-b bá yakii ten gwɛɦma, ka himaa Yeesuwu kuumn wo ln ɦɔd yumreɦdrgan na: Wii nnii d´ kwɛɛla, na goorii n jaɦaa, dii nnii ɦá sa.
44013034	Saŋgband da beda na d` ba d` himii-wu kuumn ɦà neer, na ɦá daa ta boodg bilun. D` da beda na: D` kee d` kaawl d` reba ɦɛn hɔm biilm wo dn da bed Daviid lee.
44013035	Tii kaa nnii ln ta bɔɦɔɔ riikan Wadbuudgan na: D` kpaɦ d` saa ɦá gbanu boodg bilun, d´ ŋmɛɛɦeedhɔm wii.
44013036	Daviidwii lee, Saŋgband da lɔgra-wu ɦà vuugun na ɦá ɦɛm d´ ŋmɛɛg̈b. Ĥá dan n kuum, bá kuur-wu ɦá yandaba man bilun, ɦá gbanu t bood.
44013037	Saŋgband nn himii kuumn wii lee, wii gbanu ba boodg bilun.
44013038	-
44013039	Teelba-n! Miig-n na Yeesuwii kaa nnii tn faa-n na Saŋgband ba d` bee d` waa-n n` fubɛɦii. Ka n` tia ɦá gwɛɛtii ɦɛnii, wii beel ɦà ɦe n` kitg hɔmba d` nɔngan ka rea-n n` fubɛɦiin, Mohiisa baɦlb nn da ba bee n ɦɛm bii nnii.
44013040	Ĥee-n ŋmɛɛwa na gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba gwɛɛtii daa taan-n! Bà da beda na:
44013041	Nen, nen kpaa tiina n Saŋgband gwɛɛt nen! L´ ɦee-n yɔlaa n` bɔr. Maa mà ɦe n` neermn ŋmɛɛbermb biib b` ba na ka ɦii t la biir-n, n` kpaɦ n` tii.»
44013042	Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas ban da red Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun lee, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na bá da bà ŋmɛtgn Saabaat goor d´ kena dii bà ta biir-ba goyentii.
44013043	Kpoglb nn diɦ lee, Yuudaa tiiba n bá da jib bà kpaturun bee kɔd t tag Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas bà kaa, bee t ka gwɛɛla n ban ka haɦla bá kwɛɛwa na bá nawr n Saŋgband hɔmgu.
44013044	Saabaat goorii nn taan lee, kɔrguu mɛnguu t kpogl taa na kù ɦom Saberma gwɛɛt.
44013045	Yuudaa tiiba nn nyan nidfigmii lee, bá lo nɔmmɔlb n ka rɔta Fɔɔla gwɛɛt ɦan bɔɦɔɔ tii n tyen ka suu-wu.
44013046	Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas bá bɔɦɔɔ-ba kpaalaa na: «Nen nnii ln da ba na bá faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt saɦ'. Nn kpaa bag gwɛɛtii na n` ta kpaa tɔn na n` soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii lee, t` ba t` saa, t` san n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ween.
44013047	Saberma to-t wad ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà lo-t na tant ɦɛn wiinga na t` san n jugu daɦb gwɛɛt tant mɛntn.»
44013048	Bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nn ɦomr welee lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba lamɛɛgu, bá ka nyɔka Saberma gwɛɛt. Ln da ba na bá nan soɦdg neerm m` bee kakeɦnan mii bee mɛmbee t tii t´ ɦɛn.
44013049	Saberma gwɛɛt t ka yadgaa kan tantii mɛntiin.
44013050	Lee, Yuudaa tiiba t dam fɔg̈ba bá ba na bee ka door Saŋgband tiŋan bee, n kɔrgu bermba, bá baɦ n ka ɦɛna Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaaswu daddad, n voom-ba bá tantn.
44013051	Bá reɦdrbee t nit kɔrguun tiibee n bà niɦi n san Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm kɔrgun.
44013052	L´ saa, bá da tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee t ka ba lamɛɛgun biii, Voɦoom Buudm t ka ba bá ni kpaalaa.
44014001	Ban san Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm lee, n san n ta jib Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun n ka gwɛɛla, nidba kɔd t tii Yeesua ɦɛn, Yuudaa tiibee n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee mɛɦ'.
44014002	Yuudaa tiiba bá da kpaa bag na bà tii bee t dam bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee na bá diilgm Krista tiiba gwɛɛt bɛɦgu.
44014003	Lee, Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas bá hiid Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm kɔrguun. Bà da gwɛɛla ka kpaa sol bii ka ba n daag̈b n Saberma ɦɛn. Wii da saa bà ɦɛna hoolgu kɔd l` weraa na ɦá hɔmgu gwɛɛt ban faa tii ba gobiint.
44014004	Gwɛntaɦ, kɔrguun tiibee t rad taa saagu saagu. Volba t ka ŋmɛta n Yuudaa tiibee ɦɛn, volba ŋmɛta n tumtbee ɦɛn.
44014005	Yuudaa tiiba n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee n bà huraamba t ɦom n taa n ka bag na bà ɦe Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaaswu bɛɦgu, bà lɔd-ba tana na bà kuu-ba.
44014006	Ban miig welee lee, n solm n san Likawonii kɔrnin, Liistr n Deerb n kɔrni ɦì ba kpama ɦiin
44014007	n baɦ n ka faa ɦí ni Gohɔmt.
44014008	Ban san Liistr kɔrgun lee, n yum kan nidɦii kad l` ba na ɦá nakpai vaawran. Bà da meedra-wu ɦà ba welee, ɦà kpaa bea ka ked.
44014009	Ĥà da kada ka kewla Fɔɔla nn da bɔɦɔɔ tii. Fɔɔla t geed-wu turrr n yum na daawwii ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim na bá gbaad-wu.
44014010	Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ-wu kimm na: «Vidg v` jeɦnt tiɦ v` nakpai ɦɛn!» Nidwii t for n jeɦnt ɦá nakpai ɦɛn n baɦ n ka ked.
44014011	Nidfigm nn nyan Fɔɔla nn ɦer bii lee, n vii noora n ka bɔɦɔɔ n Likawonii lamn na: «T` tiini kitg nidba n daan t` man.»
44014012	Bá baɦm-ba bá kɔrgu tiini hida ka hoɦ Barnabaas na Jeesa. L´ saa, wo ln da ba na Fɔɔla bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt lee, bá hoɦ-wu na Hermɛɛsa.
44014013	Jeesa tiib disaku da ba kɔrgu kpamga. B´ tia t vid n san n daan n naagi ka maantr-ɦi n lɔgm moot fiit n ruugm n dɔɔm ɦí ɦɛn na bá vid Barnabaaswu n Fɔɔl kɔrgu fiid noon.
44014014	Tumtbee nn ɦomr welee lee, n sadr bá dimt na l` werii na l` jaarŋ-ba. Bá jib nidfigm huuga n ka toola na:
44014015	«Teelba-n! ¿N` ɦɛna ben nnii? Ta nidba nnii tn mi wo nn ba lee. Gohɔmt nnii tn kena n nn na n` tintg n̈yen n Saŋgband ween n` saa wenɦee, l` kpaa tɔra bii. Saŋgband bee, dii ree saŋgbambiim n tant n nyaam n bii b` bee bii mɛmbii.
44014016	Weem daa d` da saa tiga mɛna t ka ɦɛna ɦan sɔkl bii.
44014017	Gwɛntaɦaa, d` la ɦɛna-ɦa hɔmgu hɛruɦ', l` weraa na d` bee. Biilm, dii saɦl-n toŋu, ka saɦ-n dikaɦt t´ vuugu ɦɛn, ka saɦ-n diit, ka lɔɔ nyaag̈b n` kwɛɛwan.»
44014018	Tumtbee nn da la gwɛɛl welee lee, gemm n gemm nnii ban da ba vid-ba.
44014019	Yuudaa tiiba biiba t rɛn Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun Fisidii tantn n Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm kɔrgun n daan, n hogl kɔrgun tiibee, bá bewl n lɔdm Fɔɔlwu tana na bà kuu-wu, n viim-wu n ree-wu kɔrgu kpamga ɦɛn ka diila na ɦà kpiiran.
44014020	Bá tia Yeesua ɦɛn bee wen kpogl taa ɦá man n kaad-wu, ɦá vid n jib kɔrgun. Toŋu t vɛt, wú n Barnabaas bá vid n san Deerb kɔrgun.
44014021	Bá san n faa kan Yeesua Gohɔmt. Nidba kɔd t tii t´ ɦɛn. Lee, bá rorm Deerb n ŋmɛtgii Liistr n Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm n Ĥantiyɔɔs Fisidii tantn.
44014022	Bà da haɦla bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee kwɛɛwa, ka saɦ-ba ŋmeenm na bá neer ka ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim. Bà da bɔɦɔɔ-ba na l` ba na t` di kunyɔŋu kɔd saɦ t` nan jib Saŋgband huraantn.
44014023	Kpaturɦii mɛnɦiin bà da rooda-ba bà bermba. Bà da lɔɔ-ba Saberma nuɦun ka boow noor ka seeŋa. Wii ɦɛn nnii ban da tii.
44014024	Bá nyab ree n ber n Fisidii tant n taai Faŋfiilii tantn,
44014025	n faa Yeesua gwɛɛt Feerg kɔrgun n hel n san Ĥatalii.
44014026	Bá rorm ree n jib meel n san Ĥantiyɔɔs. Kɔrguun nnii ban da lo-ba Saŋgband nuɦun ŋmɛɛg̈b ban ɦer bii kaa.
44014027	Ban taai Ĥantiyɔɔs lee, n kpogl kpaturu tiiba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba Saŋgband nn da ɦer bá ɦɛm bii mɛmbii, n ta bɔɦɔɔ-ba lan nnii dn da ta ɦer na bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ta tii Yeesua ɦɛn.
44014028	Bá kad bá man l´ hiid.
44015001	Nidba biiba t rɛn Yuudee tantn n daan Ĥantiyɔɔs n dan n ka weraa Krista tiiba gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka bà ba bɔtg-n wo Mohiisa baɦlb nn gbaama lee, Saŋgband kpaɦ d` daɦ n` juuni.»
44015002	Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas bá kirm n ban, bá n ban bá kpalm taa gwɛɛtii kaa. Ban kpal taa lee, n yum na l` ba na Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaaswu n kan tiiba biiba bà san Yerusalɛm na bà nyaan tumtba n kan bermba gwɛɛtii kaa.
44015003	Ĥantiyɔɔs kpaturu tiiba t tɔr-ba bá hurɦuu kɛnan. Bá nyab ka beraa n Feniisii n Samarii tantn ka bɔɦɔɔ lan nnii bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nn lɔgr bayen n to Saŋgband. Gwɛɛtii t ka saɦ Krista tiibee mɛmbee nyaag̈b.
44015004	Ban taai Yerusalɛm kɔrgun lee, kan kpaturu n tumtba n bermba t soɦd-ba, bá bɔɦɔɔ-ba Saŋgband nn da ɦer na bá ɦɛm bii mɛmbii.
44015005	Ban bed-ba welee lee, Farisii tiiba biiba bá da tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee t vid n bɔɦɔɔ na l` ba na bá bɔd bá ta tii ɦà ɦɛn ka kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee, bà biir-ba na bá tagd Mohiisa baɦlb.
44015006	Tumtba n bermba t kpogl taa na bà nyaan gwɛɛtii.
44015007	Ban san n yum taa kpala t ka la hoda bogm lee, Fetra t vid n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Teelba-n! N` miil hɔm na Saŋgband roodg-ma n` huuga l` hiidgn, na mà faam Saŋgband Gohɔmt bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee, ka bo na bá ɦom-t bà tii t` ɦɛn.
44015008	Saŋgband miil nidba kwɛɛwa. D` sira-ba Voɦoom Buudm wo dn ta sir-t lee. L` weraa na d` soɦdg-ba,
44015009	na bà kpaɦ n bayen, t` ta kpaɦ n tyen. Ta bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa nnii dn higr bá kwɛɛwa.
44015010	Gwɛɦma lee, ¿ben kaa nnii nn bo na n` ŋmɛgii n Saŋgband na n` nyaanaa? ¿Ben kaa nnii nn bag na n` tulg bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee wanjeet? L` ba na ten laa t` yandaba t` ba bee n tu-t.
44015011	T` tia na Berm Yeesua hɔmgu kaa nnii ln daɦr t` juuni bà dela.»
44015012	Ĥan bed welee lee, nidhiinɦuu mɛnɦuu t kpat kpoɦ n ka kewla Barnabaaswu n Fɔɔl bà bɔɦɔɔ hoolgu Saŋgband nn da ɦer bá ɦɛm bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee huuga kuu mɛnguu.
44015013	Ban gwɛɛl l´ diɦ lee, Yakooba t yaɦd ɦá noor n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Teelba-n, kewlg-n n man!
44015014	Simoona kɛɛm-t lan nnii Saŋgband nn da roodg weem bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee huuga biiba na bá bɛm dyen d` tigr.
44015015	Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed tii n gwɛɛtntina ba yenm. Biilm, l` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na:
44015016	Saberma bɔɦɔɔ na: Tii n t` kaann, ɦà kee ɦà ŋmɛtgn ɦà maantr ɦà mɛɦ Daviida haar d´ da lod dii, ɦà ta vii d` dabira ɦà jeɦlg.
44015017	Na lee, tigvola tiibee mɛmbee bagm-wu, ɦan da roodg na bá kitg ɦà reba bee. Saberma noon gwɛɛt nnii,
44015018	wii werii welee gwɛɛtii weem.
44015019	Yakooba t lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Tii kaa nnii man ɦilwa na l` kpaɦ hɔm na bá jaarŋ bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba ka to bayen Saŋgband bee.
44015020	Gwɛntaɦ lee, tn ɦɔr-ba wadga t` biir-ba na bá daa jum vidnamt, bá daa ɦɛm yaruub, bá daa jum dɔm ban ba gitg m` lakwɛɛn mii namt, bá daa ta jum jiim.
44015021	Biilm, weem daa n jana, nidba faa Mohiisa baɦlb kɔrni mɛnin, bà ta kaala-b Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn Saabaat goora mɛna. Tii kaa nnii ln ba na t` biir-ba welee.»
44015022	Tii lee, tumtba n bermba n kpaturɦuu mɛnɦuu bá yum na l` ba na bá roodg bá huuga biiba bà tom-ba Ĥantiyɔɔs bá n Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaasa. Bá rood Yuud ban hoɦ na Barsabaas wii n Silaasa. Bà da vala bareɦdrbee.
44015023	Bá to-ba wadgankena na bá san n. Bà da ɦɔda na: mo Ten, tumtba n bermba, n` teelba ten, t` seeŋa t` teelba nen, nen nen kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba ka ba Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun n Siirii n ta Silisii tantn nen. m
44015024	T` ɦomra na biiba rɛn t` man n jaarŋ-n ka haam n` fuut n bà gwɛɛt. T` ba biir-ba na bá biir-n welee gwɛɛtii.
44015025	Tii kaa nnii tn diilg t` mɛmbee na t` roodg nidba t` tamn-ba n` man. Bee heɦlgna t` tuurmba Barnabaaswu n Fɔɔl
44015026	bá vidr bayen t` Berm Yeesu Krista hidr kaa bee. m
44015027	Welee lee, t` tuuna-n Yuudwu n Silaasa. Baa bà ta biir-n bá mɔmba tn ɦoorna bii.
44015028	Voɦoom Buudm n t` mɔmba t` diilg na t` kpaɦ t` tulg-n bii jeenb n ŋmɛɛgt t´ ba daɦt tina. Tii nnii na
44015029	n` daa jum vidnamt, n` daa jum jiim, n` daa jum dɔm ban ba gitg m` lakwɛɛn mii namt, n` daa ta ɦɛm-n yaruub. Ka n` ɦɛna l´ ɦɛnii, l` bɛm hɔm. mc L` ɦera nnii. Bɛm-n kan hɔm!»
44015030	Ban roodg na bá san bee t vid n san nan Ĥantiyɔɔs kɔrgun. Ban san lee, n kpogl bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee n to-ba wadgee.
44015031	Bá kaalm-ka l´ ɦɛm-ba lamɛɛgu n kwɛɛwhaɦlgm kan kena-ba n mii.
44015032	Yuudwu n Silaas bee nn ta ba na gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba lee, bá gwɛɛl n ban l´ hiid, ka saɦ-ba ŋmeenm n kwɛɛwhaɦlgm.
44015033	Bá ɦɛm Ĥantiyɔɔs ree goora ɦalanɦa n dan n ka nyaba ka ŋmɛtgaa bà tamn-ba bee man. Bá seeŋ-ba na bá san hɔm. [
44015034	Silaaswii t bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà ba ɦà kpat kan.]
44015035	Lee wen, Fɔɔlwu n Barnabaas bee t kpat Ĥantiyɔɔs, bá n nidvolba kɔd bá ka weraa ka faa Saberma gwɛɛt.
44015036	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaann, Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ Barnabaas na: «Tn ŋmɛtg-n kɔrni tn da faa Saberma gwɛɛt ɦii mɛnɦiin t` nyaan na Krista tiiba ba laa.»
44015037	Barnabaasa da bagl na bá n Yohanɛɛs ban daarŋ na Markuus wii bá san.
44015038	Fɔɔla t kirm na ɦá daa san, blaɦb kaa na ɦà da saa-ba Faŋfiilii n ka ta kpaa heɦla-ba ŋmɛɛg̈b ban da ked bii ɦɛb.
44015039	Fɔɔla nn kid welee lee, bá kpalm taa hɔm n saa taa. Barnabaasa t lɔgm Markuusa, wú n wun bá jib meel n san Siifr tantn.
44015040	L´ saa, Fɔɔla t lɔgm Silaasa. Krista tiiba t lo-ba Saberma nuɦun, bá nyab,
44015041	n ber n Siirii n ta Silisii tantn ka haɦla kan kpaturi tiiba gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim.
44016001	Bá taai Deerb, n rorm ree n san Liistr. Gwɛɛt soɦdgtɦii da ba Liistr kɔrguun bà hoɦ-wu na Timotea. Ĥá nya da ba na Yuudaa tiin ka tii Yeesua ɦɛn, ɦà sa ba na Grɛɛs tia.
44016002	Krista tiiba bá da ba Liistr n Ĥikɔɔn̈yɔm bee da nyɔka-wu na ɦà ba hɔm.
44016003	Fɔɔla t ka bag na wú n wun l´ bɛm. Wo kan Yuudaa tiiba mɛmba nn da mi hɔm na ɦá sa nnii Grɛɛs tii lee, ɦá lɔgm-wu n bɔt-wu bee kaa.
44016004	Kɔrni ban da beraa n ɦiin, bà da bɔɦɔɔ bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee na Yerusalɛm tumtba n bermba mug gwɛɛt tiit l´ ka ba na bá ɦɛm t´ ɦɛn ŋmɛɛg̈b.
44016005	Kpaturi da haɦaa n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ka yada goor wo goor.
44016006	Voɦoom Buudm da kida n ban na bá daa faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt Ĥasii tantn, bá saa n ber n Firgii n ta Galasii tantn.
44016007	Ban dan n taai Miisii faaŋu lee, n magii na bà bo na bà san Bitinii tantn, Yeesua Voɦoom t kirm n ban.
44016008	Bá saa n jib Miisii tantn n tiɦdgii Torwaas kɔrgun.
44016009	Nyingu t dan n nyin, Fɔɔla t yum ɦá goomn Masedonii tantn tiiɦii jeɦr ka jobla-wu na: «Daan Masedonii tantn v` tɔrg-t!»
44016010	Ln ɦer welee lee, t´ vid yelmaa na t` san Masedonii tantn ka mi hɔm na Saŋgband hoɦl-t na t` faa Gohɔmt kan tantiin.
44016011	T´ jib meel Torwaas n sanii Samɔtraas tuuu, toŋu t vɛt t´ san Neyaafɔliis.
44016012	T´ dan n rorm ree meeln n san Filiifi kɔrgun. Kɔrguu nnii Masedonii kparnoogrdn kɔrgu kuugu, Roomaa tiiba mada-ku. T` da ɦera kɔrguun goora ɦalanɦa.
44016013	Saabaat goor, t´ rorm kɔrgun n san kol kpamga ka bag Yuudaa tiiba seeŋlaŋa. Tn nyan-ka lee, n kad n ka gwɛɛla n fɔg̈ba bà da kpogl taa kan bee.
44016014	Fɔgɦii da ba bà huuga bà hoɦ-wu na Liidia ka rɛn Tiyaatir kɔrgun. Ĥà da gweedma dima bá hɔg-ɦa, ka ta door Saŋgband tiŋan. Ĥà da kewla-t, Saberma t rawd ɦá rarm na ɦá ɦom Fɔɔla nn bɔɦɔɔ tii hɔm.
44016015	Bá huurm-wu Saŋgband nyaalm wú n ɦaa haarii mɛndii. Ĥá hoɦ-t ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nn miig hɔm na mà tii Berm Yeesua ɦɛn lee, daan-n n` goom taa!» Ĥá ka tidr-t, t´ tii.
44016016	Goor diir, t` da kedaa bà seeŋlaŋeen. Lee, biiriiga kiiga t tuugn-t, l` ba na kà ba n kunida, ɦà ɦɛna kà kwɛɦɛɛ ka yu bii b` kena n nɔngan bii ka bɔɦɔɔ. Kà da ɦɛna welee ŋmɛɛg̈bii kà bermba yuuŋa lig̈bia kɔd.
44016017	Kan tuugn-t lee, n ka tagd t´ n Fɔɔl t` kaa ka toola na: «Nidbambena ɦɛna Saberm Saŋgband ŋmɛɛg̈b. Bà weraa-n juuni daɦb huru.»
44016018	Ká ka tagd t` kaa gormɛna ka ɦɛna welee. Goor diir, l´ dan n bid Fɔɔla kwɛɛwrn, ɦá bid ɦayen ká ɦɛn, n bɔɦɔɔ kunidwii na: «Yeesu Krista hidr nii, mà bɔɦɔɔ-v na, riir biiriigee ni!» Yelmaa ɦá rorm ká ni.
44016019	Lee wen, ká bermba nn nyan na bà kpaɦ bà ta wayiim n kan ka yuuŋa lig̈bia lee, bá mug Fɔɔlwu n Silaas n san-ba n baŋun kɔrgu bermba nɔngan,
44016020	n bɔɦɔɔ yaani yaadba na: «Nitntina ba na Yuudaa tiitn. T` dama t` kɔrgu
44016021	ka weraa kowt tiit, l` ba na t` baɦlb kpaa saɦ huru na Roomaa tiiba ten t` soɦdg welee kowtii laa t` ɦɛm t´ ɦɛn.»
44016022	Nidfigm t ta vid bá ɦɛn. Yaani yaadbee t sadr Fɔɔlwu n Silaas bà dimt n saɦm wad bá gbum-ba taŋgbanii.
44016023	Bá wen gbur-ba l´ ɦom-ba biii, bá lo-ba sargan, n baɦl sarga ɦɛn sagd na ɦá kiigm-ba hɔm.
44016024	Ĥan soɦdg wad na ɦá kiigm-ba hɔm lee, n san n riw-ba disaghiiga kiigan sarga disaku huuga, n lo bá nakpain turwiili.
44016025	Tuŋkoɦhurgan, Fɔɔlwu n Silaas bà da seeŋa ka yuuma yumii ka nyɔka Saŋgband, sarga tiiba volbee kewla.
44016026	Myenm ɦɛn, tant t nyamr kimm, sarga disaku boboga t dam hoghog. Huturi mɛni t rawdr yelmaa. Kona ban da kpaɦr sarga tiiba ɦee mɛnɦee t wɛwdr ka tɛɦra.
44016027	Sarga ɦɛn sagdwii t himt n ɦɛm kpiraɦ'. Ĥá wen nyan na sarga disaku huturi rawdr ɦì mɛnɦii, ɦá ka mi na sarga tiiba vuudg bà mɛmbee n solm. Ĥá rood ɦá hoodjuuga na ɦà ku ɦayen.
44016028	Yelmaa, Fɔɔla t tool-wu na: «Daa ku vyen! T` bee t` mɛmbee.»
44016029	Lee wen, sarga ɦɛn sagdwii t gbaam na bá daan n kand, ɦá jib kpidkpid Fɔɔlwu n Silaas bà man disaghiiga ɦan da riw-ba keen ka deɦra n fobɛɦgu, n baɦ dind bá tiŋa,
44016030	n ree-ba, n gbaam-ba na: «Taa maaba! ¿L` ba na mà ɦe ben na l´ daɦ mà jugu?»
44016031	Bá leed-wu na: «L` ba na v` tii t` Berm Yeesua ɦɛn, lee ɦà daɦ v` jugu, v´ n v` haar mɛɦ'.»
44016032	Ban leedg-wu welee lee, n werii-wu Saŋgband gwɛɛt, wú n biiba bà ba ɦá haarn bee mɛmbee.
44016033	Tuŋkoɦhurgeen yelmaa, sarga ɦɛn sagdwii t lɔgm-ba, n san n higm bá nɔt. Bá huurm-wu Saŋgband nyaalm yelmaa, wú n ɦaa reba mɛmba.
