44016034	Ln tog lee, ɦá san Fɔɔlwu n Silaaswu n ɦaa, n saɦm-ba diit bá jum. Wo nidwii n ɦaa reba ban tii Saŋgband ɦɛn lee, bá ka nyaaga biii.
44016035	Toŋu nn da ragdg lee, yaani yaadbee t tamn bá kwɛɛn tiiba na bá biir kigd na ɦá saa nidbee.
44016036	Kigda t san n bɔɦɔɔ Fɔɔlwu welee na: «Bà toolgn na mà saa-n. N` ba n` bee n` riir n` kuliim n` sɔklbn.»
44016037	Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ ban tamn bee na: «Bà gbura-t nidba nɔngan ka ba yaa-t n yaagu wo ln gbaama lee, l` ba na ten nnii Roomaa tiiba, n riw-t sargan. ¿Lan nnii welee? Gwɛɦma, bà bagl na t` riir sabaɦ nnii ɦii kpaa mi! Ten lee, tii kidan. Bá daan bà mɔmba bà saa-t!»
44016038	Ban tamn bee t san n bɔɦɔɔ bá bermba welee gwɛɛtii. Ban ɦomr na Fɔɔlwu n Silaas bà ba na Roomaa tiiba lee, l´ ɦɛm-ba fobɛɦgu.
44016039	Bá daan bá mɔmba n dan n jobl-ba n ree-ba sarga disakun n ligd-ba kuku na bá nyab kɔrguun.
44016040	Fɔɔlwu n Silaas ban red sarga disakun lee, n san Liidiaa. Bá yum kan Krista tiiba n haɦl bá kwɛɛwa, n nyab.
44017001	Ban nyab Filiifi kɔrgun lee, n ber n Ĥamfiifɔliis n Ĥafɔlonii kɔrnin n san Tesaloniik kɔrgun. Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku da ba kan.
44017002	Fɔɔla t san disakuun wo ɦan daa ka ɦɛna lee. Ĥá lɔgm Saabaat goora ɦataɦ', wú n nidba bá da ba kan bee bà sɔgaa Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt jugun.
44017003	Ĥà da rea t` kɔtɔd ka weraa-ba na l` ba na Saŋgband nn bantg wii di kunyɔŋu ɦà kpi, lee ɦà himtg ɦà neer. Fɔɔla da bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Yeesu man faa-n ɦá gwɛɛt wii, wii nnii.»
44017004	Yuudaa tiiba bá da ba kan bee ni biiba t tii n hewl Fɔɔlwu n Silaas bà ɦɛn. Grɛɛs tiiba bá da door Saŋgband tiŋan bee kɔd n fɔg̈ba bà da bee l` bee bee, bá kɔd t ta tii Yeesua ɦɛn.
44017005	Yuudaa tiiba t ɦɛm nɔmmɔlb n yum nidtalmba biiba bá tɛdwa yem n koot bee n kpogl-ba, bá ka dama kɔrgu l` ba tulgu. Bá siilii Yasoona haarn ka bag Fɔɔlwu n Silaas na bá san-ba n kɔrgu nɔngan.
44017006	Ban ba nyaan-ba lee, bá dar Yasoonwu n ta Krista tiiba biiba n san n kɔrgu bermba man n ka biira ka toola na: «Nidbee koɦl tant mɛnt, bà taan nnaɦ nnii,
44017007	Yasoona t soɦd-ba ɦaa. Bà ɦɛna bii b` kpaɦ na t` hurberma baɦlb bii, ka bɔɦɔɔ na hurjeenɦii bee bà hoɦ-wu na Yeesua.»
44017008	Welee gwɛɛtii t jagdr nidfigm n kɔrgu bermba.
44017009	Bá tag Yasoonwu n teelba volbee bá dool lig̈biir ln gbaama dii saɦ', bá saa-ba.
44017010	Nyingu nn dan n nyin lee, Krista tiiba t tuui yelmaa Fɔɔlwu n Silaaswu Beeree kɔrgun. Ban taai kan lee, n san Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun.
44017011	Kɔrguun Yuudaa tiiba da ba hɔm l` yata Tesaloniik reba. Bee t soɦd Yeesua gwɛɛt n kwɛɛwhɔmr, ka kaal Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt ka wii-t goor wo goor na bà nyaan na mii na Fɔɔla nn bɔɦɔɔ tii ba gobiint.
44017012	Bá ni kɔd t tii Yeesua ɦɛn, Grɛɛs kɔrgun fɔg̈ba kɔd bá da ba na bee bee n daba kɔd t ta tii ɦá ɦɛn.
44017013	Tesaloniik kɔrgu Yuudaa tiiba nn ɦomr na Fɔɔla ta faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt Beeree kɔrgun lee, bá ta san kan n ta dam nidfigm l´ jagdr-m.
44017014	Lee wen, Krista tiiba t nyabl Fɔɔlwu n nyaam ween. Silaaswu n Timotee bá kpat Beeree kɔrgun.
44017015	Bá da ked n Fɔɔl bee t san-wu n Ĥatɛɛn kɔrgun na bà ŋmɛtgii Beeree. Fɔɔla t tool-ba na bá biir Silaaswu n Timotee na bá kenm-wu weem Ĥatɛɛn.
44017016	Fɔɔla nn da hɔd Silaaswu n Timoteewu Ĥatɛɛn lee, ka yu na boga n tiini hɛni beel kan, lee, l´ ka jaarŋa-wu biii.
44017017	Tii kaa nnii, wú n Yuudaa tiiba n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba ka door Saŋgband tiŋan bee nn da sɔgaa Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun. Ĥà da keda bantn goor wo goor ka ta sɔgaa ɦan da taŋaa n kan bee.
44017018	Ĥefikuura kpaturu tiiba biiba n Sitoyiikmba kpaturu tiiba biiba t baɦ n ka gwɛɛla n wun. Volba bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Gogwɛɛltgunkuna bɔɦɔɔ na bee?» Volba bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ tigr diir tiini gwɛɛt.» Bà da bɔɦɔɔ welee kɔtɔd na Fɔɔla da faa kpiirmba himtgm n nan Yeesu l` gwɛɛt.
44017019	Bá jobl-wu na ɦá san bà kaa duuga kiiga ɦɛn bà hoɦ-ka na Ĥaarɛsa duuga, bá yaagu tand nnii. Ban taai lee, bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Ba v` bee v` biir-t weriikwɛɛlb vn weraa bii gwɛɛt?
44017020	Bɔɦɔɔ-t gosaant tiit, t´ ka bo na t` miig t` kɔtɔd.»
44017021	–Biilm, Ĥatɛɛn tiiba n saanba bá ba kan kɔrguun bee da kada ka sɔgaa diilkwɛɛla gwɛɛt ka kpaa ɦɛna bii n mɔɔ.–
44017022	Fɔɔla t jeɦnt Ĥaarɛsa duuga jugun, yaani yaadba nɔngan, n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥatɛɛn tiiba nen! Mà nyana n mà nɔmb na l´ mɛnguun na nen nnii seeŋtbiilba biiba.
44017023	Biilm, má nn gilm n` kɔrgun ka ɦilwa n` boga nn vid ɦee lee, n yum dukɔka kiiga bá ɦɔr ká ɦɛn na «Tiib ɦii nn kpaa mi bii». Biilm, bii n` reb door tiŋan ka kpaa mi bii, bii nnii man daan na mà saa na n` miig-b.
44017024	Saŋgband ree tant n bii b` ba t´ jugun bii mɛmbii. Dii nnii saŋgbambiim n tant Saberma. D` kpaa go disagt nidba nn mɛɦr-d tiin.
44017025	L` ta kpaa gbaama na nidba yaagr n d` wee na bà saɦm-d baabena. Dii saɦl nidba mɛmba neerm n voɦoom n want mɛnt.
44017026	D` ree nid ɦayen, tiga mɛna t rorm ɦá jiimn, d´ kalgr ɦá tiibee tantii mɛntii ɦɛn. D´ ɦɛm-ba kwɛɛr n yobr, n lo tiga ban go ɦee huuga faant.
44017027	D` ɦera welee na bá bagm-d, ka jaarŋa bayen na ka tiit bà nyaan-d. Biilm, d` kpaa ba vɔku n t` ni ɦii.
44017028	Dii ɦɛna t` neer, ka dama tyen, ka bee. Ta welee nnii n` yumyuumtba biiba nn da bed ka ɦigaa na: Ten nnii ta d` bii.
44017029	Ln ba na ten nnii d´ bii lee, l` kpaɦ na t` diilgm na Saŋgband tɔna wo bogr ban kud n sika dii laa, n kudnaŋu kuugu, laa bogr ban tig tandn dii. Nida diilg diiluɦ n kudm welee wantii.
44017030	Ln la ba welee lee, Saŋgband lo na d` kpaɦ d` deer bii nida nn da ɦɛna weem ka ba nyeetn bii ɦɛn. Lee, gwɛɦŋa, d` hoɦl nidba mɛmba baatee na bá lagii neerm.
44017031	Biilm, d` lo goor n bant nid ɦayen na ɦá da ɦà yaa nidba n yaagu ka tagd gobiint huru. D` himii-wu kuumn na d` werii nidba mɛmba na ɦá gwɛɛtii ba gobiint.»
44017032	Ban ɦomr Fɔɔla bɔɦɔɔ kuumn himtgm gwɛɛt lee, volba t ka laɦ-wu, volba bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` kee t` kewlg v` gwɛɛtii gojeend.»
44017033	Welee nnii Fɔɔla nn da nyab bà man.
44017034	Balanba t la tii Yeesua gwɛɛt n hewl ɦá ɦɛn. Bá da tii gwɛɛtii ɦɛn bee nnii yaani yaadba kpaturun tii ban hoɦ na Denii wii, n fɔgɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Daamarisa, n nan ta volba.
44018001	Lee n l` kaan, Fɔɔla t nyab Ĥatɛɛn n san Kɔrɛɛnt kɔrgun.
44018002	Reekan, ɦá taŋ n Yuudaa tiiɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥakiila, bá meed-wu Fɔɔnt tantn. Ĥà da taana taanuɦ ka rɛn Ĥitaalii tantn wú n ɦà fɔg Firsiila. Bà da nyab Ĥitaalii, l´ kɔtɔd na hurberm Kulooda da beda na Yuudaa tiiba mɛmba nyab Roomaa kɔrgun. Fɔɔla t san n yum-ba.
44018003	Wo ban da ɦɛna ŋmɛɛyenb lee, ɦá ka ba bá man bà ɦɛna ŋmɛɛg̈b taa man. Bà da nɔnl gbant na bà film sugt.
44018004	Saabaat goora mɛna, ɦà da keda Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun ka bɔɦɔɔ Yuudaa tiiba n Grɛɛs tiiba gwɛɛt ka bag na bá tii.
44018005	Fɔɔla nn da ba Kɔrɛɛnt lee, Silaaswu n Timotee bá rorm Masedonii n daan. Lee wen, ɦá to ɦayen kpaalaa n ka faa gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ Yuudaa tiiba na Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii Yeesua.
44018006	Ĥan da la bɔɦɔɔ-ba welee lee, bà kir ka suu-wu. Lee, ɦá nit-ba n ɦà niɦi n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Ka n´ bɔrii, n` ret nnii, lag mà retn. Gwɛɦma lee, maa mà san n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ween.»
44018007	Ĥá nan nyab ree n san daawɦii man bà hoɦ-wu na Titiyuus Yuustuusa, ɦà da doora Saŋgband tiŋan. Ĥá haar da bɛgra n Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku.
44018008	Kpoglb disakuu berm Kiriisfuusa t tii Berm Yeesua ɦɛn wú n ɦà haar mɛnd. Kɔrɛɛnt kɔrgu tiiba bá kewla Fɔɔlwu bee, bá kɔd t ta tii Yeesua ɦɛn, bá huurm-ba nyaalm.
44018009	Nyingu kuugu, Fɔɔla t yum Berm Yeesuwu ɦà goomn ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Daa solm fobɛɦgu! Gwɛɛlm, daa kpat kpoɦ'!
44018010	Mà ba v` man. Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà mug-v ɦà ɦee-v bɛɦgu. Kɔrgunkunan, nidba kɔd ba na mà reban.»
44018011	Fɔɔla t ɦɛm Kɔrɛɛnt kɔrguun bind n gidgu ka weraa nidba Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
44018012	Vuugu Galyoona nn da dir Roomaa kumandaant Ĥakayii tantn kuun, Yuudaa tiiba mɛmba t bɔm noor Fɔɔla ɦɛn n san-wu n yaani yaadba man
44018013	n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Nidwunwuna bagl na nidba tii bà seeŋ̈m Saŋgband l` kpaɦ wo t` baɦlb nn gbaama lee.»
44018014	Fɔɔla t ka bo na ɦà yaɦdg ɦà noor na ɦà gwɛɛl, yelmaa Galyoona t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ka ln bɛm na ɦà kura ɦii laa ɦà koɦl bii bermb, man ba mà di kwɛɛwr mà kewlg Yuudaa tiiba nen nn bɔɦɔɔ-ma tii wo ln gbaama lee.
44018015	Ln ba na gwɛɛt gwɛɛlb n hida hoɦb n n̈yen n` baɦlb gwɛɛt lee, l` nyana nen, maa kpaa yaa welee yaanɦii.»
44018016	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ welee n voom-ba yaagu yaalaŋa.
44018017	Lee wen, bá mug Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disaku berm Sosteen n ka gbuu-wu yaagu yaalaŋee noon, Galyoona tɔgr ɦayen.
44018018	Tii n t` kaann, Fɔɔla t ɦɛm goora ɦalanɦa Kɔrɛɛnt kɔrgun, n dan n saa kan Krista tiiba n jib meel na ɦà san Siirii. Firsiilwu n Ĥakiila bá ka heɦla-wu. Saɦ na ɦá nyab, ɦà da koora ɦà jugu Kaŋkree kɔrgun gwɛɛt ɦan da fɛd Saŋgband nɔngan tii kaa.
44018019	Bá taai Ĥefɛɛs kɔrgun, ɦá san Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun wú n Yuudaa tiiba bá ka gwɛɛla. Lee, ɦá saa Firsiilwu n Ĥakiila n ka bo na ɦà nyab.
44018020	Gwɛntaɦ, Yuudaa tiibee t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na ɦá hiidg bà man, ɦá kirm
44018021	n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na ka Saŋgband t tɔrg ɦà nan ŋmɛtgn bà man. Ĥá jib meel n nyab.
44018022	Ĥan jeɦnt Sesaree lee, n san n seeŋ Yerusalɛm kpaturu n vid ree n san Ĥantiyɔɔs.
44018023	Ĥá san n ɦɛm goora ɦalanɦa n ŋmɛt ka nyaba, n ber n Galasii n ta Firgii tantn, ka haɦla bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee bá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimn.
44018024	Yuudaa tiiɦii da taai Ĥefɛɛs kɔrgun, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥafɔloosa, bà da meedra-wu Ĥaleksandrii. Baaben tia da sɔkla na ɦà kewlgm ɦá gwɛɛt. Ĥà da miil Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt hɔm.
44018025	Ĥà da kpɛlŋ Berm Yeesua gwɛɛt, n ka faa, ka weraa-t l´ jugun n nyaag̈b ka kpaa saa. Ĥan da la weraa hɔm welee lee, ka mi Yohanɛɛsa nyaalm huurb gwɛɛt n jaɦ'.
44018026	Ĥá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun ka kpaɦ n fobɛɦgu. Firsiilwu n Ĥakiil ban ɦomr ɦà gwɛɛla lee, bá lɔgm-wu bá man n mɔɔ-wu weriib na ɦá miig Saŋgband huru hɔm kpaalaa.
44018027	Lee n l` kaan, l´ ɦɛm Ĥafɔlooswu loogu na ɦá san Ĥakayii tantn. Krista tiiba t saɦm-wu ŋmeenm n ɦoorm kan kpaturu tiiba wadga na bá soɦdg-wu hɔm. Ĥan taai lee, Saŋgband hɔmgu t ɦɛm ɦá tɔr bá da tii d` gwɛɛt ɦɛn bee hɔm.
44018028	Biilm, ɦà da bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt kpaalaa nidba nɔngan ka weraa Yuudaa tiiba na bà kpaɦ hurhɔmu ɦɛn. Ĥà da tagaa n Wadbuudgan gwɛɛt ka weraa na bá miig hɔm na Saŋgband nn bantg wii nnii Yeesua.
44019001	Ĥafɔloosa nn da ba Kɔrɛɛnt kɔrgun lee, Fɔɔla t ber n dui kɔrgu, n taai Ĥefɛɛs kɔrguun. Ĥá yum kan bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee ni biiba
44019002	n gbaam-ba na: «¿Nn da tii Yeesua ɦɛn lee, n soɦd Voɦoom Buudm?» Bá leed-wu na: «T` ba ɦom na Voɦoom Buudm miim bee rii mɛɦ'.»
44019003	Ĥá hel n gbaam-ba na: «¿Nyaalm huurteb nnii nn soɦdgaa?» Bá leed-wu na: «Yohanɛɛsa rebii nnii tn soɦdg.»
44019004	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Yohanɛɛsa da huura bá da tia na bà lagii neerm bee ka bɔɦɔɔ Yisraɦeel tigr na bá tii ɦá ba ɦà daan ɦà kaann wii ɦɛn. Wii nnii Yeesua.»
44019005	Ban ɦomr welee gwɛɛtii lee, bá huurm-ba nyaalm Berm Yeesua hidrn.
44019006	Fɔɔla t dee ɦá niɦi bá ɦɛn, Voɦoom Buudm t daan bá ɦɛn, bá baɦ n ka gwɛɛla lam jugu jugu ka ba kpɛlŋ-m, ka ta bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt t rɛn Saŋgband man tii.
44019007	Nidbee da ba bà bɛm wo daba kwiɦr n bareɦ'.
44019008	Fɔɔla da ɦera kidii hitaɦ ka ked Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disakun ka gwɛɛla ka kpaɦ n fobɛɦgu. Ĥà da faa Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt, ka ɦɛna l´ mɛnguu na bá kewla-wu bee tii gwɛɛtii ɦɛn.
44019009	Bá biiba t ɦɛm germ n ka kpaa bag na bà tii, ka gwɛɛla Gohɔmt gwɛɛt bɛɦgu bá kpogl taa bee nɔngan. Lee wen, Fɔɔla t lɔgm bá da tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee, wú n ban l´ nyab bá man. Ĥá san n ka faa Tiirana sukurn gormɛna.
44019010	Ĥá faa kan gwɛɛt kakeɦnan bina ɦarɛɦ', lee wen bá da ba Ĥasii tantn bee mɛmbee, Yuudaa tiiba n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee t ɦom Saŋgband gwɛɛt.
44019011	Saŋgband da tagaa n Fɔɔla ka ɦɛna hoolbermgu.
44019012	Welee nnii ban da lag n ka ked n dukii Fɔɔla gbanu nn da tad n hii, laa ɦá dimt ka tɔɔ bɛɦtiiba, bà bɛɦii wenta-ba, kunidba bá da ba bà ni bee ror.
44019013	Yuudaa tiiba biiba da linta rena n rena ka vɔɦd kunidba bɛɦtiiba ni. Bee t ta magii na bà vo kunidba ka ta hoɦ Yeesua hidr. Bà da bɔɦɔɔ kunidba na: «Mà bɔɦɔɔ-n, riir-n, Yeesu Fɔɔla nn faa ɦá gwɛɛt wii hidrn!»
44019014	Bá da ɦɛna welee bee, da Yuudaa tiiba gotiberm Sikeeva kwɛɛlban. Bà da ba balbleɦ'.
44019015	Ban bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, kunidwii t leed-ba na: «Mà miil Yeesua, ka ta mi Fɔɔla gwɛɛt, nen le, ¿teba nnii nen?»
44019016	Lee, kunida nn da ba ɦà ni wii t yat bá mɛmbee kowr n gbum-ba bá rorm ɦá haarn ka ba sɔtsɔt n nɔt, n solm ka ba hɛngu.
44019017	Ĥefɛɛs tiiba mɛmba, Yuudaa tiibee n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee t ɦom gwɛɛtii, fobɛɦgu t mug-ba, l´ vii Berm Yeesua hidr n faaga.
44019018	Nidba bá da tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee, bá kɔd t ka kena ka bɔɦɔɔ bɛɦgu ban da ɦer kuu baawena nɔngan.
44019019	Bá da ɦɛna kunidba ŋmɛɛgt bee, bá kɔd t daan n bà ŋmɛɛg̈b wadii n totr-hi boglam baawena nɔngan. Bá ɦiluu wadhii daɦt n yum na hì taara bà kɔrgu lig̈bkpaŋ̈m ruuni kwɛɦnu.
44019020	Welee nnii Saberma gemmnt nn da ɦɛna ɦà gwɛɛt yadgaa, nidba kɔd tia t´ ɦɛn.
44019021	Welee gwɛɛtii nn ɦer lee, Fɔɔla t ɦɛm diila na ɦà ba ɦà ber n Masedonii n Ĥakayii tantn ɦà san Yerusalɛm kɔrgun. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Man kee mà taai kan lee, l` ta bɛm na mà san Roomaa kɔrgun.»
44019022	Fɔɔla t tom ɦá ŋmɛɛg̈b tɔrgtba bareɦba Timoteewu n Ĥeerast Masedonii tantn, n kpat n ka ba Ĥasii tantn saɦ'.
44019023	L´ vuuguu, l´ ɦɛm tulgu l` kpaɦ jaɦ Yeesua huru kaa.
44019024	L´ da mir tobjilii kudtɦii bee, bà hoɦ-wu na Dɛmɛɛtiryuusa. Ĥà da kudl disag̈bii n sika bint hì tɔn tiniib ban hoɦ na Ĥartemiis bii disaku l` kena n welee kudtbee n lig̈biir kɔd.
44019025	Ĥá kpogl-ba n bá ta tɔra-ba bee n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Taa reba-n! N` miil na ŋmɛɛg̈bnbina ni nnii tn yu ka ju hɔm.
44019026	N` yul ka ta ɦum Fɔɔlwii laɦ nn ɦɛna bia, ¿laa laa? Ĥà bɔɦɔɔ na bii nida nn kud ɦá mɔm bii kpaɦ b` bee b` bɛm na ɦá Saŋgband. Ĥà ɦera welee, nidba kɔd t tii, lag Ĥefɛɛs nnaɦ n jaɦ, ɦà ta ɦera welee Ĥasii tantii mɛntiin.
44019027	Ka t` ba ɦe hɔm, welee ba l` koɦl t` ŋmɛɛg̈b, l` saa b` kpaɦ b` tɔn bii Ĥartemiis t` tibermb disakun. Tii lee, Ĥartemiisa ta kpaɦ ɦà bɛm n valgm miim, l` ba na Ĥasii n ta tantii mɛntii doora-wu tiŋan.»
44019028	Bá da kewla-wu bee nn ɦomr welee lee, bá ɦɛm kwɛɛwweerga n ka biira ka toola na: «Ĥefɛɛs Ĥartemiis nnii berma.»
44019029	Biirbii t yadgii n kɔrguu. Bá mug Fɔɔla tuurmba Gayuuswu n Ĥariistark n ka viid ka sol ka ked-ba n baŋun. Bà da ba na Masedonii tiiban, bá n Fɔɔl l` da keda huru.
44019030	Fɔɔla t ka bo na ɦà san bà man. Bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee t kirm n wun.
44019031	Ĥasii tant bermba biiba t tom na ɦá daa san bii. Da ɦà tuurmban.
44019032	Lee wen nnii, nidba nn bewlg n ka biira yɔɦ'. Volba toola tinaɦ', volba toola tinaɦ', bá kɔd da kpaa mi na ¿bà kpogl taa na la?
44019033	Nidfigmii huuga Yuudaa tiiɦii da bee bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥaleksandra. Yuudaa tiiba t lo-wu nɔngan na ɦá gwɛɛl. Biiba t kɛɛml-wu gwɛɛtii. Ĥá vii ɦá nuɦu na nidfigmii kpat kpoɦ', n ka bag na ɦà biir gwɛɛt ka taaw bà kaa.
44019034	Ban miig na ta Yuudaa tiin lee, bá baɦ n ka biira ka toola goyent kakeɦnan wo waari ɦiriɦ na: «Ĥefɛɛs Ĥartemiis nnii berma.»
44019035	Kɔrgu wadii ɦoorta t dan n kwiiŋl-ba n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥefɛɛs tiiba-n! ¿Wen kpaa mi na t` kɔrgu kiiga berm Ĥartemiisa disaku n ɦà tand d` tɛɦdgn n saŋgbambiimn dii ɦɛnii?
44019036	Ĥii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà kii. Tii lee, kwiiŋl-n n̈yen, daa kpiduum-n!
44019037	N` daan n nidbambena nnaɦ', bà ba koɦl bii t` tiib disakun, bà ta ba gwɛɛl b` gwɛɛt bɛɦgu.
44019038	Ka Dɛmɛɛtiryuuswu n ɦà ŋmɛɛtuurmba t nyaan na ɦii koɦl-ba n gwɛɛt, goora bee ban yaa yaagu, huraamba ta bee, ree nnii ban ba bà san bà sam.
44019039	Ka n` ta ba n tiit na n` gbaamaa, n` gbaam-t yaagu yaalant.
44019040	Jana b´ gɛtg bii, ka t` ba ɦe hɔm, bà kee bà biir na ten ɦera welee, l` ba na t` kpaɦ n tiit na t` biir tn kpogl taa b´ kaa bii.» Ĥan bed welee lee, n voom-ba bá nyab.
44020001	Ln dan n kwiim kɔrgun lee, Fɔɔla t kpogl Krista tiiba n haɦl bá kwɛɛwa n seeŋ-ba n nyab ka ked Masedonii tantn.
44020002	Ĥà ber n ree n haɦl kan teelba kwɛɛwa ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛt kɔd, n rorm ree n san Grɛɛs tantn
44020003	n ɦɛm ree kidii hitaɦ'. Ĥan dan n ka bo na ɦà jib meel ka ked Siirii tantn lee, n ɦom na Yuudaa tiiba kool ɦá ɦɛn kpaab. Ĥá ɦɛm diila na ɦà ŋmɛtg n Masedonii tantn, lee n lɔɔm huru.
44020004	Beeree kɔrgu tii Soofatɛra da heɦla-wu, wú n Tesaloniik kɔrgu tiiba Ĥariistarkwu n Sekunduusa, n Deerb kɔrgu tii Gayuusa, n Ĥasii tantn tiiba Timoteewu n Tisiikwu n Tɔɔrfima. Soofatɛrwii da ba na Fiiruusa kwɛɛln.
44020005	Bee t dɛɦd nɔngan n san n ka hɔd-t Torwaas kɔrgun.
44020006	Ten lee, Kpooni kasant deb kaann, t´ jib meel Filiifi kɔrgun. Goora ɦanu n ɦà kaan, t´ tagii bá kaa Torwaas, t´ n ban t´ ɦɛm kan laabilmr.
44020007	Laabuga goor jabr, t` da kpogl taa na t` soɦdg saŋgbandiit, lee, Fɔɔla t ka bɔɦɔɔ nidba gwɛɛt. Ln da ba na toŋu vɛta ɦà nyab lee, ɦá ka gwɛɛla kakeɦnan tuŋkoɦgu.
44020008	Kana da ba disagfaagrgu tn da kpogl taa kù ni kuun kɔd.
44020009	Kuliiga kiiga da kada tɔl gbiir ɦɛn bà hoɦ-ka na Ĥeetika. Fɔɔla nn da gwɛɛla l` hiida lee, kwɛɛlgee t hɔŋ n gor kpiɦ', n begd disagfaagrguun n tɛɦd tiŋan. Bá san n vii-ka n mid ka kpi.
44020010	Fɔɔla t hoɦntn kpidkpid n ɦog-ka n bɔɦɔɔ na: «L´ daa si-n fobɛɦgu! Kà ba kpi, kà neeran.»
44020011	Ĥan bed welee lee, n ŋmɛt ka juula. Bá soɦd saŋgbandiit n ta jum diit. Ĥá gwɛɛl kakeɦnan toŋragdgm n nyab.
44020012	Bá kulii n kuliigee kà neer, baawena kwɛɛwr t kpen.
44020013	Tii t vid ree n dɛɦd Fɔɔla nɔngan n jib meel na t` san Ĥasɔɔs kɔrgun, ree nnii tn da ba t` lɔg-wu. Wii mɔma nn da bed nnii, l´ kɔtɔd na ɦà da bo na ɦà san nakpai.
44020014	Ĥan da gitg-t Ĥasɔɔs kɔrgun lee, t´ lɔgm-wu n san Mitilɛɛn tantn.
44020015	T´ rorm ree n nyuɦ Kiiyɔ tant toŋu vɛtr. Toŋu t ta vɛt t´ taai Saamɔs tantn, l´ vɛt t´ taai Milɛɛt kɔrgun.
44020016	Biilm, ka bo na ɦà daa bɔrii gaama Ĥasii tant nii, Fɔɔla da beda na ɦà ba ɦà gɛtg n Ĥefɛɛs kɔrgu ɦɛn, ka ba jeɦnt kan. Ĥà da bagl weem na ka l´ tɔrg ɦà taai Yerusalɛm kɔrgun ɦà di Dikaɦnooga kasant.
44020017	Fɔɔla nn da taai Milɛɛt kɔrgun lee, n tom Ĥefɛɛs kɔrgun na bá hoɦ kpaturu bermba na bá daan.
44020018	Ban taan ɦá man lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Lɔg gonoogrd man niw mà nakpaŋa Ĥasii tantn, vuugu man da kad n` man kuu mɛnguu nii, n` miil neerm man da neer n nn mii.
44020019	Mà da ɦera Saberma ŋmɛɛg̈b n nyanyaam, ka hoɦla mayen n tiŋa. Yuudaa tiiba ko kpaab mà jugun ka lɔɔ-ma ɦigm.
44020020	N` miil na mà da ba foɦnt-n bii b´ da ba b` tɔrg-n bii. Mà da faa-n n werii-n t´ mɛntii nidba huuga, n ta n` hayan.
44020021	Mà da hoɦl Yuudaa tiiba n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee na bá bidg bayen n Saŋgband weenn bà tii t` Berm Yeesua ɦɛn, l` werii na bà lagii neerm.
44020022	«Gwɛɦma lee, mà keda Yerusalɛm wo Voɦoom Buudm nn hɛɦr-ma na mà ɦe lee, ka kpaa mi b´ kee b` lor kan mà ɦɛn bii.
44020023	Man mi bii nnii na kɔrgu kunaɦ wo kunaɦn na Voɦoom Buudm bɔɦɔɔ-ma na sarga n kunyɔŋu l` hɔda-ma kan.
44020024	Mà neerm ta kpaɦ daɦt mà nɔngan, mà kpaa lu m` wee. B´ bee bii nnii na mà bee mà ɦe ŋmɛɛg̈b t` Berm Yeesua nn to-ma bii kakeɦnan b` toglgm. Bii nnii na mà faam Saŋgband hɔmgu Gohɔmt.
44020025	«Mà gilm n` mɛmbee n` huuga ka faa Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt, lee gwɛɦŋa, mà miil na n` ni ɦii nan ta kpaɦ ɦà nyaan-ma felaɦ'.
44020026	Tii kaa nnii, man rea ka bɔɦɔɔ-n jana na, ka n` ni ɦii t bɔrii ɦayenii, lag mà gwɛɛtn.
44020027	Mà werii-n Saŋgband diila mɛna ka kpaa kpɛɦdra-n bii.
44020028	Tii lee, kiigm-n n̈yen n` ɦɛn! Kiigm-n kodiir Voɦoom Buudm nn to-n na n` sugm d´ ɦɛn dii ka ta kiima-d! Dii nnii kpaturu Saŋgband nn daɦr n d` mɔmr Budaaga jiim ɦuu.
44020029	Mà miil na, mà kuliib kaannaa, biiba nan jiba n` huuga, ka boo diidt, bà koɦl kodiirii.
44020030	L` kee l` lag n n` huuga volba, bee ta bɔɦɔɔm gokaat na l´ daruum Krista tiiba ka hewla bà ɦɛn.
44020031	Bɛm-n saw ka deer na mà da ɦera n` man bina ɦataɦ ka ba voɦoo ka baɦla-n ɦayen ɦayen n nyanyaam nyingu n muunun.
44020032	«Gwɛɦŋa lee, mà taagaa-n Saŋgband nuɦun, l` saa d` hɔmgu gwɛɛt kiigm n` ɦɛn! D` ba n gemmnt na d` haɦlgm-n na d` to-n wanhɔmt dn kpɛɦdr na d` nan to d` reba tii.
44020033	Man da ba n` man lee, mà nɔmb da ba mɔ n ɦii lig̈biir, laa ɦá sika, laa ɦá dima.
44020034	Mà da ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b n mà niɦinɦina na man n mà tuurmba t` yuuŋ̈m bii t` reb halwa bii, wo n` mɔmba nn ta mi lee.
44020035	Mà da ɦera welee ka bo na mà werii-n na l´ mɛnguun l` ba na nida ɦe ŋmɛɛg̈b na ɦà bee ɦà tɔrg kunyɔŋtiiba, ka deer gwɛɛt t` Berm Yeesua mɔma nn da bed tii. Ĥà da beda na: Ĥá saɦ wii ba lamɛɛgun l` yata ɦá soɦda wii.»
44020036	Fɔɔla nn bed welee lee, wú n ban bá gbaɦnt dina, ɦá seeŋ.
44020037	Bá hilgr nyanyaam ka ɦogaa-wu bà mɛmbee ka seeŋa-wu.
44020038	Bà da ba n himaɦr, blaɦb kaa, ɦà da beda-ba na bà nan ta kpaa yuu-wu. Tii n t` kaannaa, bá heɦl-wu kakeɦnan meel man.
44021001	Tn da sudg n bá da heɦla-t bee lee, n jib meel n san tuuu Koos tantn. Toŋu t vɛt t´ taai Rɔɔd kɔrgun n rorm ree n san Faatara.
44021002	Tn taai Faatara lee, n yum kan meel d´ ked Feniisii tantn, t´ jib d´ ni n nyab.
44021003	T´ san n nyuɦ Siifr tant, n saa-t t` galu ɦɛn n san Siirii tantn Tiir kɔrgun. Ree nnii meelii nn da ba d` ree d` want.
44021004	T` da bagra n yum kan kɔrguun Krista tiiba n ɦɛm bá man laabilmr. Voɦoom Buudm t bɔɦɔɔ-ba gwɛɛt, bá bɔɦɔɔ Fɔɔl na ɦá daa san Yerusalɛm kɔrgun.
44021005	Laadii nn dan n togl lee, t´ la nyab ka baɦraa t` huru. Bá heɦl-t bá mɛmbee, bá n bà fɔg̈ba n bà bii kakeɦnan kɔrguu kaann. T´ gbaɦnt dina nyaam kpamga n seeŋ.
44021006	Lee n l` kaan t´ seeŋ taa, tii t´ jib meeln, bee t ŋmɛt bá hai.
44021007	Welee nnii tn da fɛlgii t` nyaam ɦɛn huru n taai Fitɔlemayiis kɔrgun, n seeŋ kan Krista tiiba n ɦɛm bá man goor dyen.
44021008	L´ toŋu vɛtr, t´ baɦ huru n taai Sesaree kɔrgun. Reekanii, t´ jib Yeesua gwɛɛt faat Filfa haarn n goom. Filfwii nnii nidba balbleɦba ban da roodg Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bee huuga bilma.
44021009	Ĥà da ba n bɛɛrba banaa bà ba yal. Bà da bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛt Saŋgband nn da rea ka weraa-ba tii.
44021010	T` da ba kan ka fɛtg goora ɦɛb, lee wen, gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtɦii t rɛn Yuudee tantn n daan, bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥagabuusa.
44021011	Ĥá jibn t` ɦɛn n lɔgm Fɔɔla damr, n bɔm ɦayen ɦà nakpai n ɦà niɦi n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n Voɦoom Buudm nn rea ka bɔɦɔɔ! Nid ɦá heɦ damrndina wii, Yuudaa tiiba kee bà boow-wu wennaɦ' Yerusalɛm, bà taag-wu bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nuɦun.»
44021012	Tn ɦomr gwɛɛtii lee, t´ n Sesaree tiiba t` ka jobla Fɔɔl na ɦá daa san Yerusalɛm.
44021013	Ĥá leed-t na: «¿N` kuum na lan ka saɦ-ma fobɛɦguu? Mà maantr mayen n ka hɔd, lag na bá boow-ma n jaɦ, na bá ta kuu-ma Yerusalɛm kɔrgun Berm Yeesua kaa.»
44021014	Wo tn gir ɦà kpaa tia lee, t´ saa-wu joblb, n bɔɦɔɔ na l´ ɦe wo Saberma nn sɔkla lee.
44021015	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaann, t´ maantr tyen n vid ka ked Yerusalɛm.
44021016	Sesaree Krista tiiba biiba t heɦl-t, n san-t n Mnasoonaa na t` goom kan. Ĥà da ba na Siifr tiin, ka tii Yeesua ɦɛn weem.
44021017	Tn taai Yerusalɛm lee, kan Krista tiiba t soɦd-t n nyaag̈b.
44021018	Toŋu t vɛt t´ n Fɔɔl t´ san Yakoobaa. Kan kpaturu bermba mɛmba t kpogl taa haariin.
44021019	Fɔɔla t seeŋ-ba, n kɛɛml-ba kuyen kuyen Saŋgband nn da ɦer ɦá ɦɛm bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee huuga bii mɛmbii.
44021020	Ban kewlg-wu lee, n nyɔk Saŋgband, n bɔɦɔɔ Fɔɔl na: «Teela! Nyana lan nnii Yuudaa tiiba hiinu nn tii Yeesua gwɛɛt ɦɛn n ka mad bà mɛmbee Mohiisa baɦlb hɔm.
44021021	Bà beda-ba na weraa Yuudaa tiiba bá ba tigsaanan bee mɛmbee na bá daa tagd baɦlbii. Na bá daa bɔdm bá bii, na bá daa tagd Yuudaa tiiba ten t` kowt.
44021022	¿Lan nnii tn ba t` ɦea? Baa bà miig na taann.
44021023	Tii lee, ɦe tn ba t` biir na v` ɦe bii! Nidba banaaba ba t` kpaturun ka feer Saŋgband nɔngan na baa bà ɦe bii.
44021024	Lɔg-ba, v´ n ban n` san n` ɦe nakakeet hig̈b kowt, v` faad bá ɦɛn na bá bee bà ko bá juuni. Ka v´ ɦe welee, baawena miig na gwɛɛt ban bed v` jugun tii mɛntii kpaɦ gobiint. Bà miig na ta mada Mohiisa baɦlb hɔm.
44021025	Bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn ka kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee lee, t` ɦɔda-ba wadga ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba tn mug bii. T` beda-ba na bá daa jum vidnamt, bá daa jum jiim, bá daa jum dɔm ban ba gitg m` lakwɛɛn mii namt, na bá daa ta ɦɛm yaruub, ¿laa laa?»
44021026	Toŋu t vɛt, Fɔɔla t san n nidba banaabee, wú n ban bá ɦɛm nakakeet hig̈b kowt. Ĥá dan n san Saŋgband haarn na ɦà biir goor nakakeet hig̈b nn togaa dii, l´ kɔtɔd na goorii nnii ln ba na bá ɦe banaarbee vit ln gbaama na bá ɦee-ba tii.
44021027	Nakakeet hig̈b kowt goora ɦalbleɦee nn da bo na ɦà toglg lee, Ĥasii tantn Yuudaa tiiba biiba t yum Fɔɔlwu Saŋgband haarn. Bá mug-wu n vii nidba hiinu
44021028	ka toola na: «Yisraɦeel tiiba-n, tɔrg-n-t! Kpay-n nidwunwuna! Wii faa nidba mɛmba baatee ka bɔɦɔɔ t` tigr n Mohiisa baɦlb n Saŋgband haarndina gwɛɛt bɛɦgu. Gwɛɦma lee, ɦà lag n jiblgn bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee d´ ni, l´ hawl t` kaalaŋbuudga.»
44021029	Bà da bɔɦɔɔ welee blaɦb kaa na bà da nyana wú n Ĥefɛɛs tii Tɔɔrfimwu kɔrgun, bá ka diila na Fɔɔla ta jiblgn-wu Saŋgband haarn.
44021030	Kɔrgu mɛngu t vid kú nakpai ɦɛn, nidba t ka sana rena n rena. Bá mug Fɔɔl n ree-wu Saŋgband haarn n rɔm huturi yelmaa.
44021031	Bà da gbul-wu na bà ku. Biiba t san n bɔɦɔɔ Roomaa tawdba berm na Yerusalɛmɦii mɛnɦii nyag̈wan.
44021032	Ĥá lɔgm yelmaa ɦá tawdbermba n tawdba n solii nidhiinɦuu jugun. Bá wen nyan tawdba bermwu n tawdba, bá saa Fɔɔlwu gbuut.
44021033	Lee wen, tawdba berma t nyuɦ ɦá man n bɔɦɔɔ na bá mug-wu bà boow-wu n kona ɦarɛɦ', n nan hel n ka gbaama na ɦà miig-wu, ɦà ta miig ɦá reb koɦl.
44021034	Nidfigmii t ka biira, volba biira tinaɦ', volba biira tinaɦ'. Ban da biira yem yɔɦ lee, tawdba berma t ka kpaa bea na ɦà ɦom tiit hɔmt. Ĥá saa n bɔɦɔɔ na bá san Fɔɔlwu n barsin.
44021035	Ban da nyuɦ na bà taɦ bantɦa ɦɛn na bà jib lee, tawdba t saa n ɦɔgd Fɔɔlwu ɦɔgduɦ nidfigm talmt kaa,
44021036	kɔtɔd na bà da tagda-wu ka toola na l` ba na bá kuu-wu.
44021037	Ln dan n ka ba na bá jiblg Fɔɔlwu barsin lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ tawdba berm na: «¿Maa mà bee wo mà biir-v gwɛɛt?» Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «¿Miil grɛɛkmn?
44021038	¿Lag ven nnii Ĥejift tii ɦá da ɦer kɔrgun t ɦɛm tulgu l´ goorɦeen wiin? ¿Lag ven da lɔgra nidkuudba ruuni ɦinaa bá da dam kɔrgu bee n san n kpamloŋu nii?»
44021039	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Man nnii Yuudaa tia, bá meed-ma Taarsi kɔrgun, Silisii tantn. Kɔrbermgu tii nnii man mi. Mà ligdg-v kuku, si-ma huru na mà gwɛɛl n tigr.»
44021040	Tawdba berma t saɦm-wu huru na ɦá gwɛɛl. Ĥá jeɦnt bantr ɦɛn n ɦɛm-ba nuɦu na bá kpat kpoɦ'. Ban kpat kpoɦ lee, ɦá gwɛɛl-ba n hebrmn ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba na:
44022001	«Taa maaba-n n mà teelba-n, kewlg-n man ba n na mà biir-n mà hoodr ɦɛn tii!»
44022002	Ban ɦomr na ɦà gwɛɛla-ba n hebrmn lee, bá kpat belbelbel. Fɔɔla t ree n bɔɦɔɔ na:
44022003	«Man nnii Yuudaa tia, bá meed-ma Taarsi kɔrgun, Silisii tantn. Gwɛntaɦaa, Yerusalɛm nnaɦ nnii ban doowr-ma. Mà berm nnii Gamaliɦeela, wii da werii-ma sukur n ɦɛm má miig t` yandaba baɦlb hɔm. Mà da kpaɦ heee Saŋgband kaa wo nn ta ba n` mɛmbee goona lee.
44022004	Mà da ɦɛna bá tagd Yeesua huru bee daddad ka kuu-ba. Mà da mooga daba n fɔg̈ba ka roow sarga.
44022005	Gotibermwu n kɔrgun kpalmmba miil na mà bɔɦɔɔ gobiint. Mà da soɦdg bà do wadii na mà san mà to t` teelba bà ba Damaas bee, na mà mɔg bá tagd hurɦuu bee mà kpen-ba n Yerusalɛm kɔrgun bà dar bà tobr.
44022006	Mà da lɔgra huru n ka ked n san n ka nyuɦaa Damaas, myenm ɦɛn, muunsɔbr, wiinga kiiga t rɛn saŋgbambiimn n fiid-ma.
44022007	Má luurm tiŋan n ɦom noor diir bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: ‟Sool! Sool! ¿Ben kaa nnii vn ɦɛna-ma daddad?”
44022008	Má gbaam na: ‟Berma! ¿Ven nnii wenii?” Ĥá leed na wii nnii Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia, na wii nnii man ɦɛna daddad.
44022009	Bá da ba mà man bee t yum wiingee, bà ba ɦom ɦá da gwɛɛla-ma n wii noor.
44022010	Má nan gbaam na: ‟Berma! ¿L` ba na mà ɦe la?” Ĥá leed-ma na mà vidg mà san Damaas kɔrgun, na ree nnii ban kee bà biir-ma Saŋgband nn bag na mà ɦe bii.
44022011	Wiingee nn da ɦer welee n jɔml-ma lee, má n bà t` da ked bee t dar-ma n san n Damaas kɔrgun.
44022012	«Daawɦii da ba kan kɔrguun bà hoɦ-wu na Ĥanan̈yaasa, ɦà tagd Saŋgband gwɛɛt kaa hɔm, ka vala t` baɦlb, Yuudaa tiiba bá da ba kan bee mɛmbee nyɔka-wu.
44022013	Ĥá daan n yum-ma n jeɦnt mà man n hoɦ mà hidr n bɔɦɔɔ-ma na mà niini yum. Yelmaa mà niini t muud má yum-wu.
44022014	Ĥá ta lilm bɔɦɔɔb na t` yandaba Saŋgband roodg-ma weem na mà miig dn bag na mà ɦe bii, na mà nyaan gobiint tii ɦayen mà ɦom ɦá mɔma noor.
44022015	Na man beel mà biir ɦá gwɛɛt baawena nɔngan, man nyan n man ɦomr bii.
44022016	Na gwɛɦma lee, mà daa hɔd! Na mà vidg yelmaa bà hor-ma nyaalm ka hoɦ ɦá hidr l` hig mà fubɛɦii.
44022017	«Má ŋmɛtgii Yerusalɛm. Man dan n ka seeŋa Saŋgband haarn lee, l´ ɦɛm-ma wo jaamiit,
44022018	má yum-wu ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ma na mà nyab weem weem Yerusalɛm kɔrgun, na kɔrgun tiibee kpaɦ bà tii ɦà jugun gwɛɛt man bɔɦɔɔ tii.
44022019	Má leed na: ‟Berma! Mà da jiba Yuudaa tiiba kpoglb disagtn ka moog bá da tia v` gwɛɛt ɦɛn bee ka roow, ka gbuu-ba taŋgbanii, ¿bà kpaa mi welee?
44022020	Ban da kuu v` ŋmɛɛɦeed Ĥetyɛɛn lee, mà ta ba kan, ka sug bá kuu-wu bee dimt ɦɛn ka bɔɦɔɔ na tii nnii.”
44022021	Ĥá nan bɔɦɔɔ-ma na mà ked, na ɦà bo na ɦà tom-ma vɔkun bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ween.»
44022022	Yuudaa tiiba bá da kewla-wu bee nn ɦomr gokaawrtntina lee, bá baɦ yelmaa n ka toora na: «L` kpaɦ na welee nidwunwuna ta neer tant ɦɛn. L` ba na bá kuu-wu.»
44022023	Bá ka biira ka fug bá dimt ka mɛɛ tanjoom n faaga.
44022024	Tawdba berma t bɔɦɔɔ na bá jiblg-wu barsin bà gbuu-wu taŋgbanii ɦà biir nidba nn biira n wun tii.
44022025	Ban boowr-wu na bà gbuu-wu lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ tawdberm ɦà da ba ɦà man wii na: «¿L` sira huru welee na bá gbu Roomaa tiiwu taŋgbanii ka ban yaa-wu n yaagu?»
44022026	Tawdwii nn ɦomr welee lee, n san ɦá berma man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «¿Lan nnii vn ba v` ɦea? Daawwii ba na Roomaa tiin.»
44022027	Tawdba berma t san Fɔɔla man n gbaam-wu na: «¿Ven nnii Roomaa tiiwu biilm?» Fɔɔla t leed na ɦiin.
44022028	Tawdba berma t nan bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Maa da faadra lig̈bhaku saɦ na mà kitg Roomaa tia.» Fɔɔla t leed-wu na: «Man lee, bà meedra-ma mà ba na Roomaa tia.»
44022029	Ĥan bed welee lee, bá da bo na bà gbuu-wu na ɦá biir gobiint bee t nyab ɦá man yelmaa. Tawdba berma nn miig na Roomaa tii nnii ban boowr kona lee, l´ ɦɛm-wu fobɛɦgu.
44022030	Tawdba berma da bagl na ɦà miig Yuudaa tiiba nn bɔɦɔɔ na Fɔɔla koɦl bii mɔmb. Tii kaa nnii, toŋu nn da vɛtg ɦá bɔɦɔɔ bá kpaɦdr-wu kona n wed gotibermba n yaani yaadbermbee mɛmbee na bá kpogl taa. Ban kpogl taa lee, ɦá san n Fɔɔl n jeɦl bá nɔngan.
44023001	Fɔɔla t geed yaani yaadbermbee niinin n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Teelba-n! Man n mà kwɛɛwfeel nnii man neer Saŋgband nɔngan n jana.»
44023002	Gotiberm Ĥanan̈yaasa t bɔɦɔɔ bá da ba Fɔɔla kpamga bee na bá gbudg ɦà noor ɦɛn.
44023003	Lee wen, Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «V` gbanu faaga ba hɔm, v` ni ba jona! Saŋgband kee d` gbudg-v. Kad na v` yaa-ma n yaagu ka ɦigr baɦlb jugun, gwɛntaɦ, koɦl-b ka bɔɦɔɔ na bá gbudg-ma.»
44023004	Bá da ba Fɔɔla man bee t bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Saŋgband gotiberm nnii vn suuda!»
44023005	Ĥá leed na: «Teelba-n! Man kpaa n mi na gotibermn. Biilm, Wadbuudga bɔɦɔɔ na l` kpaɦ na v` suudg v` tigr huraa.»
44023006	Fɔɔla da miil hɔm na yaani yaadbee ba na Sadusii tiiba n Farisii tiiban. Tii kaa nnii ɦan da toolg bà nɔngan na: «Teelba-n! Man nnii Farisii tia, mà reba ta ba na Farisii tiiban. Man tia na kpiirmba nan himta bà neer nnii ban yaa-ma n yaagu.»
44023007	Ĥan bed welee gwɛɛtii lee, Farisii tiiba n Sadusii tiiba t baɦ taa kpala n rad taa saagu saagu.
44023008	–Biilm, Sadusii tiiba bɔɦɔɔ na kpiirmba nan kpaa himta bà neer, na saŋgbantumtba kpaɦ', na kpiimba ta kpaɦ', l` ba na Farisii tiiba tia na welee bee. Tii kaa nnii ban kpal taa.–
44023009	Bá baɦ n ka toora kimm. Baɦlb weriitba biiba t vid n gwɛɛl-ba n talmt. Bà da ba Farisii tiiba kpaturun. Bá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «T` ba nyaan nidwunwuna bɛɦgu kuugu. Saŋgbantumtɦii laa kpiimɦii gwɛɛlii n wun!»
44023010	Kpalɦee t hod bogm, tawdba berma kwɛɛwr t ka to na bá daa ɦe bà toodr Fɔɔlwu fɛku fɛku. Tii kaa nnii ɦan da bed tawdba t hoɦnt na bà lɔg-wu bà huuga bà ŋmɛlgii-wu barsin.
44023011	Nyingu t dan n nyin, Berm Yeesua t daan Fɔɔla man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Di kwɛɛwr! Wo vn bed mà gwɛɛt Yerusalɛm nnaɦ lee, l` ta ba na v` biir-t Roomaa kɔrgun.»
44023012	Toŋu t vɛt, Yuudaa tiiba biiba t koom kpaab Fɔɔla ɦɛn n foorm Saŋgband nɔngan na bà kpaɦ bà di bii, na bà ta kpaɦ bà nyi bii kakeɦnan ban ba bà kuu-wu.
44023013	Bá da koor kpaabii bee da ba nidba kwɛɦnaa n faɦt.
44023014	Bá san n yum gotibermba n kɔrgun kpalmmba n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «T` diɦ n t` ni n foorm Saŋgband nɔngan na t` kpaɦ t` di bii, na t` ta kpaɦ t` nyi bii kakeɦnan tn daa t` ku Fɔɔla.
44023015	Kpay-n ln ba na t` ɦea! Nen n yaani yaadbermba, gbaam-n tawdba berm na ɦá tuun-n Fɔɔla ka hogla na n` bo na n` nyaan ɦá gwɛɛtii kɔtɔd hɔm. Ten lee, tii t maantr n ka hɔd na, t` kuu-wu ɦà ban taan.»
44023016	Ban bed welee lee, Fɔɔla ɦɛɛma t ɦom ban ko kpaabii lee, n san barsin n jib n bɔɦɔɔ-wu.
44023017	Lee wen, Fɔɔla t hoɦ tawdbermɦii n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «San n kwɛɛlgankena n v` berma man! Kà ba n tiit na kà biir-wu.»
44023018	Tawdbermwii t lɔgm kwɛɛlgee n san n kan ɦà berma man n bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Sarga tii Fɔɔla hoɦ n bɔɦɔɔ-ma na mà daan-v n kwɛɛlgankena, na kà ba n tiit na kà biir-v.»
44023019	Tawdba berma t dar kwɛɛlgee, bá san kpamga ɦɛn bareɦ', ɦá gbaam-ka na: «¿Ba n tet na v` biir-ma?»
44023020	Ká leed na: «Yuudaa tiiba ɦomra n taa na bà gbaam-v na v` tuun Fɔɔlwu su, ka hogla na yaani yaadbermba bo na bà ɦiluu ɦà gwɛɛt hɔm bà nyaan t´ kɔtɔd.
44023021	Daa tii! Nidba kwɛɦnaa n faɦt kee bà foɦnt bà mug-wu bà ku. Bà fɛda na bà kpaɦ bà di bii, na bà ta kpaɦ bà nyi bii kakeɦnan ban daa bà kuu-wu. Bà maantr bayen n ka hɔd na v` leedgn-ba lii.»
44023022	Tawdba berma nn kewlg l´ diɦ lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ka na ká daa biir ɦii man na kà beda-wu gwɛɛtii, n bɔɦɔɔ-ka na ká nyabm.
44023023	Lee n l` kaan, tawdba berma t hoɦ ɦá tawdbermba bareɦ n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Kpogl-n tawdba lɛmi ɦiriɦ', n deera tawdba kwɛɛlbleɦ', n ta tawdba lɛmi ɦiriɦ bee ba na baanii madtba, n` maantr n̈yen nyingu waari ɦiwɛɦ ka ked Sesaree kɔrgun.
44023024	Ta maantr-n deera na ɦá da ɦà tu Fɔɔla, n` san-wu n kan gomn Feliksa man bii ba ɦee-wu.»
44023025	Ĥá ɦoorm wadga na bá san bà to-wu. Ĥà da ɦɔda na: mo
44023026	«Man, Kulood Lisyaasa, mà ɦoora ka seeŋ taa maar gomn Feliks ven. m
44023027	«Yuudaa tiiba da mug nidwunwuna n ka bo na bà kuu-wu. Má ɦom na Roomaa tiin, man n mà tawdba t´ soɦd-wu.
44023028	Má san-wu n bá yaani yaadbermba man na mà ɦom ɦan koɦl bii.
44023029	Má san n ɦom na bà kpal-wu bayen bà baɦlb kaa n jaɦ', ɦà ba koɦl bii na bá kuu-wu laa bá riw-wu sarga.
44023030	Lee, man dan n ta ɦom na Yuudaa tiiba kool ɦá ɦɛn kpaab lee, má yum na l` ba na mà tuun-wu v` man, bà daan bà biir ɦá reb koɦl bii v` nɔngan. mc [«L` ɦera nnii.»]
44023031	Tawdbee t ɦɛm ɦan bed na bá ɦe bii. Bá lɔgm Fɔɔlwu nyinguu n san-wu n kakeɦnan Ĥantifatriis kɔrgun.
44023032	Toŋu t vɛt, tawdba bá da ba nakpai bee t ŋmɛt barsin n saa bá da ba deera ɦɛn bee n Fɔɔl bá ka fɛlgaa bà huru.
44023033	Ban taai Sesaree lee, n to gomnwu wadgee, n ta to-wu Fɔɔla.
44023034	Gomna t kaalm wadgee n gbaam Fɔɔl na tantetn heɦ-wu. Ĥan ɦomr na Silisii tantn heɦl-wu lee,
44023035	ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Bá samr-v bee nn kee bà taan lee, mà gbaam-v gwɛɛt bà nɔngan.» Ĥá saɦm wad na bá lo-wu Ĥerooda haarn bà sugm-wu.
44024001	Goora ɦanu n ɦà kaann, gotiberm Ĥanan̈yaasa t taan Sesaree kɔrgun, wú n kɔrgun kpalmmba balanba n nidɦii ɦà taaw nidba kaa bà hoɦ-wu na Tɛrtuula. Ban taai lee, n san nan gomn Feliksa man na bà sam Fɔɔla.
44024002	Bá hoɦn Fɔɔla, Tɛrtuula t baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ gomnwu Fɔɔla nn koɦl bii. Ĥà da bɔɦɔɔ na: «Berma, v` kaa nnii nigiigu nn ba t` tigrn kpaalaa. Vn ta mad-ku hɔm nnii want kɔd nn lagii t´ ka neer lamɛɛgun.
44024003	Tn soɦdra welee gormɛna baatee lee, t´ ka seeŋa-v ka lil na ven ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b.
44024004	Lee, mà kpaa bo na mà jaarŋ-v kɔd, tii nnii tn bo na v` ɦe gemm v` kewlg-t jaɦ'.
44024005	T` nyana na nidwunwuna ba na kuum miimn. Ĥà linta tant mɛntn ka vuudra toora Yuudaa tiibee mɛmbee huuga. Wii nnii Nasarɛɛt tiiba kpaturu berma, kpaturbɛɦun.
44024006	Ĥà da lag n ka bo na ɦà hawlg Saŋgband haar, tii lee t´ mug-wu. [T` da bo na t` yaa n wun wo t` baɦlb nn gbaama lee,
44024007	gwɛntaɦ' tawdba berm Lisyaasa t soɦd-wu n kwɛgdi t` niɦin
44024008	n bɔɦɔɔ bá mad-wu na ɦà koɦln bee na bá daan v` man.] Ka v´ gbaam-wu v` mɔma, v` miig na tn bɔɦɔɔ ɦá ɦɛn tii ba gobiint.»
44024009	Yuudaa tiiba t bɔɦɔɔ goyentii n ta diɦ bá ni na l` ba gobiint.
44024010	Gomna t saɦm Fɔɔlwu huru na ɦá gwɛɛl. Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà miil na l` ɦera bina kɔd nnii vn ba na kɔrgunkuna yaani yaada. Tii nnii mà kwɛɛwrn ba lamɛɛgu na mà yaa mà yaagu v` nɔngan.
44024011	Ba v` bee v` gbaam v` ɦom, l` ban yatg goora kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦ man san Yerusalɛm na mà doot Saŋgband tiŋan.
44024012	Bà ba nyaan man n ɦii t` gwɛɛla Saŋgband haarn, laa mà jag̈wa nidfigm kɔrgun rii, laa t` kpoglb disaku kuugun.
44024013	Lee, nidbambena kpaɦ bà bee bà biir ban samr-ma tii mɔmt gwɛɦmalena.
44024014	V` nɔnga nii, maan mi tii nnanaɦ': Mà ɦɛna Saŋgband ŋmɛɛg̈b ka tagd hurkwɛɛlu bee nn bɔɦɔɔ na kpaturbɛɦu ɦuu. Dii nnii t` yandaba nn da seeŋa. Mà tia gwɛɛt ln ɦɔd baɦlb n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadiin tii mɛntii ɦɛn.
44024015	Mà daaga Saŋgband ɦɛn, ka mi hɔm na hɔmba n bɛɦba nan himta kuumn bà neer. Bee mɔmba ta ba n welee daag̈bii.
44024016	Welee daag̈bii kaa nnii, man ɦɛna gemm na bii man ɦɛna bii mɛmbiin, mà kwɛɛwrn ta bɛm yagaɦ d´ nɔngan n nidba nɔngan.
44024017	«Man da ɦer bina kɔd ka kpaɦ Yerusalɛm lee, má dan n ŋmɛtgii na mà to mà tigr lig̈biir, na mà lag mà ta ɦe Saŋgband vit.
44024018	Man da ɦɛna tii nnii, bá dan n yum-ma Saŋgband haarn. Mà da ɦera nakakeet hig̈b kowt. Nidfigm da kpaɦ mà man, biiba da ta kpaa ɦɛna yem yem.
44024019	Bá da nyan-ma bee da ba na Ĥasii tantn Yuudaa tiiba biiban. Ka bee n bɛmii, bee nn beel bà yaam n man ka bà ba n tiit na bà yaa n man.
44024020	Laa, bá ba nnaɦ bee biir ban da nyan na mà koɦl bii ban da san-ma n yaani yaadbermba nɔngan lee.
44024021	Biilm, man da jeɦnt bà nɔnga nii, mà da toolg na mà tia na kpiirmba nan himta kuumn bà neer, na tii kaa nnii ban yaa-ma n yaagu. ¿Mii na yentii kaa nnii ban ta mad-ma gwɛɦma laa?»
44024022	Feliksa nn da mi Yeesua gwɛɛt hɔm lee, ɦá tet yaagu goor n mɔɔgii-d n nɔngan ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Tawdba berm Lisyaasa nn kee ɦà daan lee, mà gitg yaagu.»
44024023	Ĥá bɔɦɔɔ tawdberm ɦà da kiig Fɔɔla ɦɛn wii na ɦá mad-wu sargan ka kpaa ɦɛna-wu daddad ka saɦ-wu huru na ɦá tuurmba beem ka kena ka yuu-wu ka tɔra-wu.
44024024	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaan, Felikswu n ɦà fɔg bá daan. Bà da hoɦl ɦá fɔg̈wii na Duursila, l` ba na Yuudaa tiin. Ĥá tom bá hoɦn Fɔɔla ɦá kewl ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ Yeesu Krista ɦɛn tiim gwɛɛt.
44024025	Fɔɔla nn dan n baɦ n ka bɔɦɔɔ lan nnii ln ba na bá neer hɔm, n lan nnii ln ba na nida mad ɦayen, n Saŋgband yaagu kù kena kuu gwɛɛt lee, Feliksa t ɦɛm fobɛɦgu n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Gwɛɦŋa lee, ŋmɛtg v` kaalaŋa saɦ'! Ka má dan n yum huru, mà hoɦ-v.»
44024026	Ĥà da ta daaga na Fɔɔla ba ɦà si-wu lig̈biir, tii kaa nnii ɦan da hoɦ-wu ka timla na wú n wun bá sɔgiim.
44024027	Bina ɦarɛɦ t gɛt. Fɔrkiyuus Fɛɛstuusa t lagii Felikswu jargan. Wo Feliksa nn da bag na l´ ɦe Yuudaa tiiba hɔm lee, ɦá saa Fɔɔla t ka ba sargan.
44025001	Fɛɛstuusa nn taan n baɦ ŋmɛɛg̈b l´ ɦɛm goora ɦataɦ lee, ɦá vid Sesaree n san Yerusalɛm.
44025002	Reekan, gotibermba n Yuudaa tiiba bá da bee l` bee bee t sam Fɔɔlwu ɦà man. Bá jobl Fɛɛstuus na
44025003	ɦá si huru bà daan Fɔɔlwu n Yerusalɛm. Biilm, bà da koora ɦà ɦɛn kpaab na bà da bà kuu-wu hurun.
44025004	Fɛɛstuusa t leed-ba na Fɔɔla ba sargan Sesaree kɔrgun, na wii mɔma ba ɦà ŋmɛtg kan didii lena.
44025005	Ĥá ta lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «N` huuga bá taar bayen bee, bá heɦlg-ma Sesaree, bà san nan bà yaam n daawwii ka l` ba na ɦà koɦl bii.»
44025006	Ĥá ɦɛm bá man goora ɦaniind laa kwiɦr n ŋmɛt Sesaree. Ĥan taai toŋu t vɛt lee, ɦá kad tand ɦɛn n tom na bá daan n Fɔɔla.
44025007	Ĥan taan lee, Yuudaa tiiba bá da red Yerusalɛm n san bee t kaad-wu n ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà koɦl gwɛɛt kɔd t` ba kakaku, gwɛntaɦaa, ka kpaa bea na bà ree gwɛɛtii wiingan.
44025008	Fɔɔla t ka maaw ɦayen ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Mà ba koɦl Yuudaa tiiba baɦlb, ka ta ba koɦl Saŋgband haar, laa Roomaa hurbermwu n gwɛɛt.»
44025009	Fɛɛstuusa nn da bag na l´ ɦe Yuudaa tiiba hɔm lee, ɦá gbaam-wu na: «¿Sɔkl na v` san Yerusalɛm na bá yaa-v n yaagu mà nɔngan gwɛɛtntina kaa?»
44025010	Ĥá leed na: «Mà jeɦra Roomaa gomnaa yaagu duun. Reekan nnii ban ba bà yaa-ma n yaagu. Yuudaa tiiba lee, mà ba koɦl-ba n gwɛɛt tiit, wo v` mɔm vn ta mi hɔm lee.
44025011	Ka má koɦl gwɛɛt tiit l´ ka ba na bá kuu-ma, mà kpaa sol kuum. Gwɛntaɦ', ka l` ba na gwɛɛt ban bɔɦɔɔ mà ɦɛn tii kpaɦ gobiintii, ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà taag-ma bà nuɦun. Mà bagl na Roomaa hurberma yaa mà yaagu.»
44025012	Fɛɛstuusa t gwɛɛl n ɦà sabaabmba l´ diɦ, n leed na: «Beda na hurberma ba ɦà yaa v` yaagu, ba v` san nan ɦá man.»
44025013	Goora ɦalanɦa n ɦà kaan, huraa Ĥagrifaawu n ɦà nyabɛɛr Berniisa bá taan Sesaree na bà seeŋ Fɛɛstuusa.
44025014	Wo ban da ɦɛna kan goora kɔd lee, Fɛɛstuusa t bɔɦɔɔ huraawu Fɔɔla gwɛɛt. Ĥà da beda-wu na: «Nidɦii ba nnaɦ', Feliksa t saa-wu sargan.
44025015	Man da san Yerusalɛm lee, gotibermba n Yuudaa tiiba kpalmmba t ka bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà koɦln, na mà dar ɦà tobr.
44025016	Má bɔɦɔɔ-ba na Roomaa tiiba kpaa tɔɔ nidwu welee ka bá samr-wu bee ban daan na wú n ban l´ taŋ, ɦà maaw ɦayen ban samr-wu tii kaa.
44025017	Bá daan mà kaa nnaɦ', má ka ba hilg, toŋu t vɛt má kad yaagu yaalaŋa n tom na bá daan n nidwii.
44025018	Bá tula-wu hoogu bee t vid. Ban vidg lee, bà ba biir bɛɦgu mà nn diilgm na ɦà ɦera kuu.
44025019	Bá n wun bà da kpala taa bayen bà kowt kaa, n nan Yeesuɦii kaa, ɦá kpi, Fɔɔla t ka diɦaa n ɦà ni na ɦà la neeran.
44025020	Má ka kpaa mi ln ba na mà ɦe gwɛɛtii lee, tii kaa nnii man da gbaam-wu na ¿ɦà ba ɦà san Yerusalɛm na bá yaa welee gwɛɛtii laa?
44025021	Ĥá kirm n bɔɦɔɔ na ɦà bagl na hurberma da ɦà yaa ɦà yaagu. Má bɔɦɔɔ na ɦá bɛm kan sargan saɦ', mà da mà tuui-wu hurberma.»
44025022	Ĥagrifaa t bɔɦɔɔ Fɛɛstuus na: «Mà ta bagl na mà ɦom daawwii noon mà mɔma.» Ĥá leed na: «Su kee v` ɦom ɦá noon.»
44025023	Toŋu t vɛt nan, Ĥagrifaawu n Berniis bá daan ka weraa bayen kpaalaa. Bá jib yaagu yaalaŋa bá n tawdbermba n kɔrgun bermba. Fɛɛstuusa t bɔɦɔɔ bá daan n Fɔɔla.
44025024	Ĥá ree n bɔɦɔɔ na: «Taa maara, taa reba-n! ¿N` yul nidwunwuna? Yuudaa tiiba mɛmba daan n yum-ma ɦá kaa Yerusalɛm n ta nanaɦ ka biira na l` kpaɦ na ɦá neer.
44025025	Man lee, mà nyana na ɦà ba koɦl bii na bá kuu-wu. Wo wii mɔma nn gbaam na ɦà bagl na hurberma yaa ɦà yaagu lee, maa mà tuui-wu-wu.
44025026	Gwɛntaɦ, mà kpaɦ n tiit na mà ɦɔr mà biir hurberma. Tii kaa nnii man jeɦla-wu n` nɔngan, n taa maar vii mɔm v` nɔngan, na nn ba n` gbaam-wu gwɛɛt lee, mà nyaan tiit mà ɦɔr.
44025027	Ka lag welee, l` kpaɦ hɔm na v` tuui sarga tia ka ba biir ban tula-wu hoogu b` kaa bii mɔmb.»
44026001	Ĥagrifaa t bɔɦɔɔ Fɔɔl na: «Teew vyen v` hoodr!» Fɔɔla t vii ɦá nuɦu n ka taaw ɦà hoodr ka bɔɦɔɔ na:
44026002	«Taa maara! Yuudaa tiiba nn tula-ma hoogu b` kaa bii mɛmbii, l` bee-ma lamɛɛgu na mà teew mà hoodr v` nɔngan.
44026003	Biilm, miil Yuudaa tiiba kowt mɛnt n gwɛɛt t` ba bá huuga tii hɔm. Hai, di kwɛɛwr v` kewlg-ma!
44026004	«Yuudaa tiibee mɛmbee miil lan nnii man da neer mà kaamn n jana. Bà miil lan nnii man da neer mà tigr huuga Yerusalɛm lee.
44026005	Bà miil-ma weem. Ka bá sɔkl, baa bà bee bà biir na mà da neera kpaturu ɦú ba deegu kpaalaa ɦuun, ka tagd t` kowt kaa hɔm. Ĥuu nnii Farisii reɦu.
44026006	Gwɛɦma lee, bà yaa-ma n yaagu na mà tia Saŋgband nn da bed na d` nan ɦɛna t` yandaba bii kaa.
44026007	T` hui kwiɦr n hireɦhii ɦɛna d` ŋmɛɛg̈b nyingu n muunu ka kpaa voɦaa ka daag na bà nyaan dn da bed na d` nan ɦɛna bii. Taa maara, welee daag̈bii kaa nnii Yuudaa tiiba nn tula-ma hoogu.
44026008	Yuudaa tiiba nen! ¿Saŋgband kpaɦ d` bee d` himii nidwu kuumn ɦà neern? ¿Ben kaa nnii nn bɔɦɔɔ na l` kpaɦ ɦɛb?
44026009	Mà mɔma mà da ta diila na mà nak mà ni mà kpii Yeesu Nasarɛɛt tia hidr.
44026010	Man da ɦer Yerusalɛm bii nnii. Gotibermba da sira-ma gemmnt má ka moog bá tii Yeesua ɦɛn bee kɔd ka lɔɔ sarga. Ka bà bo bá kuu-baa, má ka ɦigr l` ɦɛn ka bɔɦɔɔ na tii nnii.
44026011	Mà da ɦɛna bà daraa bà tobr Yuudaa tiiba ten t` kpoglb disagt mɛntn hɛruɦ', ka bag n mɔlm na bá saa bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim. Mà kwɛɛwr da bida n ban, má ka ta dɛɛr-ba kakeɦnan kɔrsaantn ka ɦɛna-ba daddad.
44026012	«Man da dɛɛr-ba welee lee, n dan n san Damaas kɔrgun. Gotibermba da sira-ma huru n gemmnt na mà moogm-ba.
44026013	Yuln, taa maara! Mà da mada huru ka ked, muunsɔbr, wiinga kiiga t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn myenm ɦɛn ka yatg muunu wiinga, n ka wiir mà kpama n má n bà t` da ked bee.
44026014	T´ luurm t` mɛmbee tiŋan, má ɦom noor diir gwɛɛla-ma n hebrmn na: Sool! Sool! ¿Ben kaa nnii vn ɦɛna-ma daddad? Nida koɦla ɦayen ɦá wen kpaa bag na bá werii-wu huru, ¿laa bee?
44026015	Má gbaam na: Berma! ¿Ven nnii wenii? Ĥá leed na wii nnii Yeesua, na wii nnii man ɦɛna daddad.
44026016	Na lee, mà vidg mà jeɦnt. Na ɦà bantg-ma na mà kitg ɦà ŋmɛɛɦeeda, na tii kaa nnii ɦan red mà ɦɛn. Na man beel mà biir volbee man nyan bii, na mà ta biir-ba ɦan kee ɦà ta ɦe mà nyaan bii.
44026017	Na ɦà kee ɦà soɦdg-ma Yuudaa tigr huuga n tigvola ɦan tuum-ma ɦà ween ɦee huuga.
44026018	Na ɦà tuuma-ma na mà muudg tigɦee tiibee niini. Na mà ree-ba nyeetn mà lo-ba wiingan. Na mà soɦdg-ba Saatana nuɦun mà lo-ba Saŋgband reɦun. Na ka bá tii ɦà ɦɛnii, ɦà waa-ba bà fubɛɦii, bà yuuŋ kaalaŋa Saŋgband nn heɦ bee man.
44026019	«Taa maara! Tii kaa nnii man ba gwid b´ rɛn saŋgbambiimn má yum bii kaawr
44026020	Tii lee, mà faa Saŋgband gwɛɛt Damaas tiiba, n Yerusalɛm tiiba, n Yuudee tant tiiba, n nan bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee, na bá lagii neerm, bà bidg bayen n Saŋgband weenn, bà ɦɛm l` weraa na bà lagii neerm biilm.
44026021	Tii kaa nnii Yuudaa tiiba nn da mug-ma n ka bo na bà ku, l´ mir man bɛm Saŋgband haarn.
44026022	Lee, Saŋgband t kiigm mà jugun kakeɦnan jana. Mà la bee n jana na mà biir bermbee n kaabee mɛɦ bii man nyan bii. Mà kpaa bɔɦɔɔ tiit ka hewla gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba n Mohiis ban da bed na b` kee b` gɛtg bii ɦɛn.
44026023	Bii nnii na Saŋgband nn bantg wii kee ɦà di kunyɔŋu, na wii nnii noogra ɦá kee ɦà himtg kuumn ɦà neer. Na ɦá kee ɦà werii t` tigr n tigvolɦee wiinga.»
44026024	Fɔɔla nn da taaw ɦá hoodr n bɔɦɔɔ welee lee, Fɛɛstuusa t mɔɔm n wun na: «Fɔɔl! ¿Tilnn? ¿Kpɛlŋ kɔd l´ tilgr-vn?»
44026025	Ĥá leed-wu na: «Berma! Mà ba til. Gwɛɛt man bɔɦɔɔ tii ba gobiint ka ba n jugu.
44026026	Huraa miil gwɛɛtii, maa mà bee mà gwɛɛlm ɦá nɔngan ka kpaɦ n fobɛɦgu. Mà miil hɔm na ba hɔŋ t` ni kuugu, l` da ba ɦe foɦmgan.
44026027	Taa maara! ¿Tia gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed tii? Mà miil na tia-t.»
44026028	Ĥagrifaa t bɔɦɔɔ Fɔɔl na: «¿Bo na v` ɦe mà kitg Krista tiiwu myenm ɦɛnn?»
44026029	Ĥá leed na: «Ka la myenm ɦɛn laa, ka la jaɦ jaɦ, mà jobla Saŋgband na lag ven n jaɦ, l` lag n bá kewlg-ma jana bee mɛmbee n` kitg wo man ba lee, ka kpaɦ konan wo man jeɦr lena.»
44026030	Ĥan bed welee lee, huraa t vid, wú n gomnwu n Berniiswu n bá da ba bà man bee
44026031	t rorm n ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Nidwunwuna ba koɦl bii na bá kuu-wu laa bá riw-wu sarga.»
44026032	Ĥagrifaa t bɔɦɔɔ Fɛɛstuus na: «Ka nidwunwuna nn ba biir na ɦà bagl na hurberma yaa ɦà yaagu, ban ba bà saa-wu.»
44027001	Ban da bed na t` jib meel t` san Ĥitaalii tantn lee, bá lɔgm Fɔɔlwu n ta sarga tiiba biiba n to tawdba bermɦii bà hoɦ-wu na Yuulyuusa. Wii da kiiga Roomaa tiiba tawdhiinu ban hoɦ na ‟hurberma tawdhiinu” ɦuu ɦɛn.
44027002	T´ jib meel diir n nyab. D` da rɛn Ĥadramiit ka ked na d` jeɦnt Ĥasii tant meela jeɦntlai. Masedonii tantn, Tesaloniik kɔrgu tii Ĥariistarka da ba t` man.
44027003	Toŋu t vɛt, t´ taai Sidoon kɔrgun. Yuulyuusa nn da ɦɛna Fɔɔlwu hɔmgu lee, ɦá saɦm-wu huru na ɦá san ɦà nyaan ɦá tuurmba bà tɔrg-wu.
44027004	T´ vid ree n jib meelii. Wo ɦam nn da tuuga-t lee, t´ ber n Siifr tant kpamga na t´ kewr-t.
44027005	T` da mɛwdg nyaam m´ ba Silisii n ta Faŋfiilii tant man mii n taai Miira, Liisii tantn.
44027006	Reekanii, tawdba bermwii t rorm n yum meel diir d´ riir Ĥaleksandrii ka ked Ĥitaalii tantn, t´ jib d´ ni.
44027007	Ĥam da fugln. Lee, t´ ɦɛm goora kɔd ka ked heee, gemm n gemm nnii tn da nyuɦ Kiniid tant. Ĥamii nn da fug l` kpaɦ na t` bee t` baɦrii n ree lee, t´ kagd n Salmoonee kɔrgu gbiir ween na Kɛrɛɛt tant leegr-t.
44027008	T` da keda n gemmnt ka kagr nyaam n san n taai riikan, meela kan jeɦnta ree, bà hoɦ kan na «Jeɦntlaŋhɔmga», Lasee kɔrgu man.
44027009	T` da bɔrii gaama kɔd, noora bɔb goor t gɛtg, yobr t fɛtg yobm, l´ ka ba gemm na meel la ked. Tii kaa nnii, Fɔɔla nn baɦl-ba na:
44027010	«Taa reba-n! Mà yul na, ka t` la ked, t` hurɦuu ba bɛɦgu n nɔngan. Meelii n dn toɦd bii kpaɦ l` ɦe hɔm. T` mɔmba, ka t` ba ɦe hɔm, t` ta bɔrii t` neerm.»
44027011	Ĥan da la bɔɦɔɔ-ba welee lee, tawdba berma t to ɦá kwɛɛwr ɦá kiig meel ɦɛn wii n meel tia. Ĥà da kpaa diila Fɔɔla nn da bɔɦɔɔ tii ɦɛn lii.
44027012	Meel jeɦntlaŋee da kpaɦ hɔm na bá jeɦnt kan yobr wen. Tii kaa nnii, t` huuga kɔd nn da bag na t` nyab. Bà da bagl na, ka l´ ɦe hɔm, t` taai Feeniksi kɔrgun, Kɛrɛɛt tantn meela jeɦntlaŋa kiigan ká jiblaŋa ba n toŋu faaga. Na ree nnii tn da ba t` jeɦnt yobr wen.
44027013	Toŋu faaga ɦawernyiiga kiiga t baɦ n ka fug ka manna n Liibii tantn, bá ka diila na baa bà bee bà ɦe wo bá nn diilgm lee. Bá vii koŋu kù ɦɛna n ka tɔgr meel jeɦr yenlaŋa kuu, n ka ked ka bɛgr n Kɛrɛɛt gbiir.
44027014	Yelmaa, ɦambermm miim t rɛn n toŋu kwɛɛn ka mana n kɔrguun. Bà hoɦ-m na «Ĥerɦakiloon».
44027015	Meel t ka dɛnwa, l` kpaɦ na t` bee t` ked ka tuuga ɦam n saaga. T´ saa n saa, l´ ka dɛnwaa n tn.
44027016	T´ ber n kɔrhiiga kiiga ka ba nyaam huuga, bà hoɦ-ka na Kooda, kee t leeg-t jaɦ'. T´ ɦɛm gemm n kol kpiirgu kú mugaa n ka soɦda nidba kuu.
44027017	Tn kolg-ku lee, meeln ŋmɛɛɦeedba t bɔm ŋmiɦi ka kaada meel. Ban da kuum na l´ daa l` viil-t Liibii hawtn lee, bá hoɦl meel dimbermgu, n saa l´ ka dɛnwa n tn.
44027018	Toŋu t vɛt, ɦamii t ka la fug kimm ka ba daat, bá baɦ n ka rea meeliin want ka kɔɦ nyaamn na d´ ɦe vɛliigu.
44027019	Govolii, bá lɔgm bá mɔmba meeln ŋmɛɛg̈b want n ta kɔɦm nyaamn.
44027020	T´ ɦɛm goora kɔd ka kpaa yu muunu, ka kpaa yu ŋmɛdii, ɦamii la fug kimm. T´ ka ta kpaa daag na t` ba t` neer.
44027021	T` da ɦera meeliin goora kɔd ka ba di bii. Lee, Fɔɔla t vid n jeɦnt nidba nɔngan n bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Taa reba-n! Nn ba n` kewlg n man, tn kpat t` bɛm Kɛrɛɛt. Tn kpaɦ t` bɔrii tn bɔrii bii.
44027022	Gwɛɦma lee, daa bɔrii-n ŋmeenm! N` ni ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bɔrii ɦà neerm. Meel n jaɦ' nnii tn ba t` bɔrii.
44027023	Saŋgband heɦl n man, má ka ɦɛna d´ ŋmɛɛg̈b. Jana nyingu, d´ tumtɦii daan mà man
44027024	n hoɦ-ma n bɔɦɔɔ na fobɛɦgu daa mad-ma, na l` ba na mà san hurberma man. Na Saŋgband ɦera hɔmgu na má n bà t` ked bee ni ɦii daa kpi.
44027025	Tii kaa nnii, taa reba-n, daa bɔrii-n ŋmeenm! Mà ba n daag̈b n Saŋgband. L` ba l` ɦe wo tumtwii nn bed-ma lee.
44027026	L` kee l` vaa-t kɔrgu kuugu gbiir ɦɛn, kù ba nyaam huuga.»
44027027	Laara ɦarɛɦ nnii tn da ɦer, ɦamii la hɛɦraa-t n Mediteranee nyaamii ɦɛn. Tuŋkoɦgu, meeln ŋmɛɛɦeedba t yum na, ka l` ba ɦe hɔm, t` nyɔɦr n tant.
44027028	Bá lɔɔl muɦu ɦuuɦu, ka togdg ɦù noon bii jeegu, na bà nyaan nyaalm kilmgu jaɦ'. Bá kɛɛml n yum na m´ kilmgu boo meetaai kwɛɛtaɦ n hilbleɦ'. Bá mɔɔgii jaɦ' n ta lilm kɔɦdgm n yum na kilmgu boo meetaai kwɛɛrɛɦ n hiniind.
44027029	Bà da sol na t` meelii daa gbuɦdg fii rii, tii kaa nnii ban da lɔɔlg konjeet tnaat n kaann n ka welaa na toŋu ragdg weem.
44027030	Meeln ŋmɛɛɦeedbee da bo na bà riir d´ ni. Bá hoɦl kpiirgu ban da kolg kuu ka hogla na bà bo na bà sanii nɔngan bà lɔɔlg konvont.
44027031	Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ tawdba bermwii n tawdvolbee na: «Ka nidbambena ba kpat meel nii, n` kpaɦ n` soɦdg n̈yen.»
44027032	Lee wen, tawdba t git ŋmiɦi ɦin mad kpiirgu ɦii n saa-ku.
44027033	Saɦ na toŋu ragdgaa, Fɔɔla t wed t` mɛmbee na t` di diit ka bɔɦɔɔ-t na: «Jana nnii goora kwiɦr n ɦanaa nn hɔd, ka ban di bii.
44027034	Mà miil na n` ni ɦii kpaɦ ɦà bɔrii ɦà jugun jiiga kayenga mɔmga. Tii lee, dii-n diit l` tɔrg-n, n` soɦdg n̈yen.»
44027035	Ĥan bed welee lee, n lɔgm kpoonu, n seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b t` mɛmbee nɔngan n gbeɦm-ɦu gbeɦa gbeɦa n baɦ n ka ju.
44027036	T` kwɛɛwa t kpen, t´ ta jum.
44027037	T` da ba meeliin nidba lɛmi ɦiriɦ n kwɛɛlbleɦ n baroond.
44027038	Tn dir l´ togm-t lee, bá lɔgm diit t´ da ba meeln tii n vaa nyaamn na d´ ɦe vɛliigu.
44027039	Toŋu nn dan n ragd lee, meeln ŋmɛɛɦeedba t yum kɔrguu n ka ba miig-ku. Bá bagm n yum riikan nyaam t lug tant, gwiɦiigbeɦga ba kan, n ka mi na baa bà bee bà jeɦlg kan meel.
44027040	Bá gbentr kontii n saa-t nyaamn, n ta gbentr dabia ban joow meel n ɦee ŋmiɦi. Bá baɦ meel dimkaagu n nɔngan na ɦam hɛɦr-d. Bá ka kedaa n gbiirii ween.
44027041	Bá san n taŋ n gwiɦiifoɦr diir d` ba nyaam kwɛɛn meel t kpat ka vɛl. Meelii nɔngan t viil gwiɦiimn n ka kpaa bea ka dama, nyaalm wada t ɦɛm d´ kaann t waagm.
44027042	Tawdba t ka bag na bà ku sarga tiiba na bá ni ɦii daa gbu ɦabara ɦà fetg.
44027043	Bá berma nn da bag na ɦà soɦdg Fɔɔl lee, ɦá kirm n ban na bá daa ɦe welee. Ĥá saɦm huru na bá mi ɦabara bee bá lɔɔ nyaalmn nooga saɦ bà mɛwdg,
44027044	bá kpaa mi ɦabara bee doot dabia ɦɛn laa meel dagwɛgt ɦɛn bà ta mɛwdg. Welee nnii ban da ɦer bá mɛmbee t mɛwd bii ba ɦee-ba.
44028001	Tn red kuumn lee, t´ ɦom na bà hoɦl kɔrguu na Maalta.
44028002	Kan tiiba t soɦd-t hɔm kpaalaa. Toŋu nn da baɦ n ka ni ɦawet bee lee, bá sal-t bogm t´ ka huura t` mɛmbee.
44028003	Fɔɔla t vaad dabit na ɦà lo bogmn, tulgu t ɦɛm waabɛɦgu t rorm dabitiin n nyaɦd ɦá nuɦu.
44028004	Kɔrguun tiiba nn nyan waag̈bii jil n ɦà nuɦu lee, bá ka bɔɦɔɔ taa na: «Nidwunwuna ba na nidbɛɦn. Ĥan la fetg nyaamn lee, t` tiib ba sɔkl na ɦá neer.»
44028005	Lee, Fɔɔla t koɦr waag̈bii bogmn, bii bɛɦgu t ka ba ɦee-wu.
44028006	Bà da mi na ɦà ba ɦà baɦ ɦà mɔdm laa ɦà ba ɦà lor ɦà kpi myenm ɦɛn. Ban hɔdg l´ hiid bii kpaa ɦɛna-wu lee, bá lagii diila n ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «T` tiib biib kitg nida.»
44028007	T` kan da ba ree kpamga, kɔrguu berma koot da ba kan. Bà da hoɦl-wu na Fuubliyuusa, ɦá ta soɦd-t hɔm n gool-t baa goora ɦataɦ'.
44028008	Ĥá sa da doora n tulgu bɛɦii n nɛnnɛɦga. Fɔɔla t san n yum-wu, n jow Saŋgband, n dee ɦá niɦi ɦá ɦɛn n gbaad-wu.
44028009	Lee n l` kaan, kan kɔrguu bɛɦtiiba t ta daan, l´ gbaad-ba.
44028010	Bà da vala-t ka saɦ-t want kɔd. Tn dan n ka nyaba, bá saɦm-t bii b` ba na t` mad n huru bii mɛmbii.
44028011	T´ ɦɛm kan kidii hitaɦ', n dan n jib meel d´ rɛn Ĥaleksandrii, bà hoɦ-d na ‟Dumbtiib”. D` da kpat yobrn n ka ba kɔrguun.
44028012	T´ taai Sirakuusa kɔrgun n ɦɛm kan goora ɦataɦ'.
44028013	T´ rorm ree n beg n nyaam gbiir n taai Reejo kɔrgun. Toŋu t vɛt, toŋu faaga ɦam t baɦ n ka fug, t´ ɦɛm goora ɦarɛɦ n taai Fusɔɔl kɔrgun.
44028014	T´ yum kan kɔrguun Krista tiiba, bá jobl-t na t` ɦe bá man laabilmr. Welee nnii tn da ɦer n nyab ka ked Roomaa.
44028015	Kan Krista tiiba da ɦomra na t` kenan, bá tuugn-t kakeɦnan Ĥafiyuusa yakun n bá kan hoɦ na ‟Daam faara ɦataɦ” ree. Fɔɔla wen nyan-ba, ɦá seeŋ Saŋgband na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b, ɦá kwɛɛwr t kpen.
44028016	Tn taai Roomaa lee, bá saɦm Fɔɔlwu huru na ɦá goom n ɦayen, tawdɦii kiig ɦà ɦɛn.
44028017	Goora ɦataɦ n ɦà kaann, Fɔɔla t hoɦ Yuudaa tiiba bermba ɦaa. Ban daan lee, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ba na: «Teelba-n! Man la ba ɦe t` tigr bɛɦgu laa t` yandaba kowt tiit bɛɦgu lee, bá mug-ma Yerusalɛm n to Roomaa tiiba bá mad t` kɔrgu bee.
44028018	Bee t gbaam-ma gwɛɛt n ka bo na bà saa-ma, kɔtɔd na bà da nyana na mà ba koɦl bii l´ ka ba na bá kuu-ma.
44028019	Ln da ba na bá saa-ma lee, Yuudaa tiiba t kirm, lee má saa n bɔɦɔɔ na hurberma beel ɦà yaa mà yaagu. Lag na mà daan na mà sam mà tigr.
44028020	Tii kaa nnii man gbaam na mà nyaan-n mà gwɛɛl n nn. Biilm, mà ba konɦanɦenan Yisraɦeel tigr nn daag b` ɦɛn bii kaa.»
44028021	Bá bɔɦɔɔ-wu na: «Tii ba soɦdg wadga kiiga v` hidrn ká rɛn Yuudee tantn, laa t` teelɦii ba rɛn kan n daan n bɔɦɔɔ-t na ɦera bii bɛɦgu.
44028022	Gwɛntaɦaa, t` bagl na v` biir-t v` mɔm b´ ba v` diilan bii. Biilm, t` miil na baatea, nidba kɔd kpaa sɔkla kpaturu vn tagd ɦuu.»
44028023	Bá n Fɔɔl bá baɦ goor n dan n daan goorii ka ta ba kɔd ka yata nooga daa, n yum-wu ɦá kan da go ree. Ĥá baɦ ɦateekwɛɛn kakeɦnan jabr, n ka rea gwɛɛt ka bɔɦɔɔ-ba, ka faa-ba Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt, ka ɦigr Mohiisa baɦlb n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba wadiin gwɛɛt ɦɛn, na bá tii Yeesua ret ɦɛn.
44028024	Volba t tii ɦan da bɔɦɔɔ tii, volba t ka ba tii.
44028025	Ban da nyaba ka kpaa bea na bà ɦom n taa bà hɛnba lee, Fɔɔla t bɔɦɔɔ-ba kuyengu na: «Voɦoom Buudm da ba n gobiint mn da gwɛɛla n n` yandaba ka tagaa n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt Yesaaya noor na
44028026	Ĥá san ɦà biir tigrndina tiiba na bà nan ba bà kewlgm hɔm gwɛntaɦ, ka kpaa ɦum. Bà nan ba bà geem hɔm gwɛntaɦ, ka kpaa yu.
44028027	Kɔtɔd na, tigrndina tiiba ba tangerm. Bà nyadra bà tobɦa n muur bá niini kimm, ka bo na bá niini daa yum, na bá tobɦa daa ɦom, na bá rarm haaw, na bá daa bidg bayen n mà ween na mà gbaad-ba. Saberma noon gwɛɛt nnii.
44028028	Fɔɔla t lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Miig-n hɔm na bà tuun Saŋgband jugu daɦb gwɛɛt bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee. Bee lee, bee ba bà kewlg gwɛɛtii.» [
44028029	Ĥan bed welee lee, Yuudaa tiiba t ka nyaba ka kpal taa tulgu tulgu.]
44028030	Fɔɔla t soɦd disaku n ɦɛm bina ɦarɛɦ deedee ka go kú ni ka faad. Reekan nnii ɦan da soɦda bá da kena ka yuu-wu bee.
44028031	Ĥà da faa Saŋgband huraant gwɛɛt ka weraa Berm Yeesu Krista gwɛɛt n ɦà kwɛɛwr ka ba ɦá sɔklbn.
45001001	Man nnii Fɔɔla, Yeesu Krista ŋmɛɛɦeeda. Man ɦoora-n wadgankena. Saŋgband hoɦ-ma na mà bɛm Yeesu Krista tumta n bant-ma na mà faam d´ Gohɔmt.
45001002	Welee Gohɔmtii nnii Saŋgband nn da bed weem n dool ka tagaa n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba. Tii nnii t´ ta ba Wadbuudgan.
45001003	-
45001004	Welee gwɛɛtii hɛla d` Budaaga. Kee nnii t` Berm Yeesu Krista. Ĥà da ba na nidn ka rɛn Daviida buudmn. Saŋgband Voɦoom da ba ɦà ni. L´ ree n bɔɦɔɔ wiingan kpaalaa na wii nnii d´ Budaaga d´ wen da himii-wu kpiirmba huuga lee wen.
45001005	Wii kaa nnii Saŋgband nn ɦer-ma hɔmgu na mà bɛm na tumta, ka bo na mà ɦe na bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee mɛmbee tiim ɦà ɦɛn ka vala-wu.
45001006	N` ta ba welee tiibee huuga, nen, nen hak Saŋgband hoɦt n ka ba na Yeesu Krista reba nen.
45001007	Mà ɦoora wadgee nen, nen ba Roomaa n` mɛmba nen. Saŋgband sɔkl-n n hoɦ-n na n` bɛm d´ reba. T` Sa Saŋgband n Berm Yeesu Krista si-n bà hɔmgu n bà nigiigu!
45001008	Nooga saɦ, mà seeŋa Saŋgband n` mɛmbee n` ɦɛn na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b ka tagaa n Yeesu Krista, l´ kɔtɔd na mà ɦuma bà gwɛɛla n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim gwɛɛt tant mɛntn.
45001009	Mà seeŋbn, mà deeda n` ɦɛn hɛruɦ'. Saŋgband mɔmr miil na man bɔɦɔɔ tii ba gobiint. Mà ɦɛna d´ ŋmɛɛg̈b n mà kwɛɛwr mɛnd ka faa Gohɔmt t´ hɛl d` Budaaga tii.
45001010	Mà ta gbaama hɛruɦ na d´ si-ma huru na ka mà daan n` man l´ ɦe hɔm,
45001011	l´ kɔtɔd na l` ɦɛna-ma loogu wo mà nyaan-n, mà si-n Voɦoom Buudm kɛgt tiit na l´ haɦlg n` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim,
45001012	ɦia! na má n nn t` laglg t` doolgm taa kwɛɛwa ka tagaa n t` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim tn ba n mii.
45001013	Teelba-n, man kpaa n bag na n` liɦr ka kpaa mi na mà ɦɛna diila hɛruɦ na mà daan n` man, ka bo na mà ŋmɛɛg̈b roon roona wo bn rɔn tigvolɦeen lee, gwɛntaɦ, hal n jana l` lakla-ma.
45001014	Mà ŋmɛɛg̈b hɛla nidbee mɛmbee, bá nɔnii wentg n bá nɔnii ba wentg bee, n nan wadmiidba n bá kpaa mi wadii bee.
45001015	Tii kaa nnii ln bee-ma loogu kpaalaa na mà ta faa-n Gohɔmtii nen, nen ba Roomaa nen.
45001016	Tii nnii man fan Gohɔmt ka kpaɦ n jiwɦi. Tii nnii Saŋgband gemmnt t´ daɦ bá tia bee mɛmbee juuni tii, ka laraa n Yuudaa tiiba ka tagla n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee.
45001017	Gohɔmtii rea ka weraa lan nnii Saŋgband nn ɦɛna nida t kit hɔmwu d` nɔngan lee. B´ ɦɛna nida t kit hɔmwu Saŋgband nɔngan bii nnii gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, mii n jaɦ'. Biilm, l´ ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na hɔma nan ba ɦà neer n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim.
45001018	Saŋgband ba saŋgbambiimn. D´ kwɛɛwweerga hoɦnta biiba bá kpaa jeeŋla-d ka ta kpaa vala d´ sɔklb bee ɦɛn. Welee tiibee neerbɛɦm nyɔdl gobiint gwɛɛt.
45001019	Biilm, Saŋgband daraa welee tiibee tobɦa l` baɦr n na b´ ba na bá miim d´ hidrn bii ba wiinga bá nɔngan. Dii mɔmr werii-ba-b.
45001020	Tant reem daa n jana, Saŋgband nn maantr b` kpaɦ nyaanb bii, d´ gemmnt t´ kpaɦ n faaŋu n d´ mɔmr beebii mɛmbii yul d´ ŋmɛɛgtn ka nida t diilg. Welee kaa nnii ɦii nn kpaa kee ɦà man n tiit na ɦà biir na ɦà fetg Saŋgband nuɦun.
45001021	Biilm, ban la mi Saŋgband lee, n ka kpaa nyɔka-d ka ta kpaa tia na bà seeŋ̈m-d na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b wo ln gbaama lee. L` ba na bii l´ nn bɛm na bà ɦɛm-d bii nnii. Bá diilyemreɦa bɔrii-ba, l´ saa bá rarm t haaw kpiraɦ'.
45001022	Bà kɔkma na bà ba n rarbiilm, l` ba na bà tiln.
45001023	L´ nn bɛm na bá door Saŋgband tiŋan na dii heɦl n nyɔkb ka ta kpaa ku lee, bá hel n ka door boga ban kudr ka tɔnaa n nid ɦee kwɛɛn, l` ba na wii kuuln. Bà ta kudra bogɦee ka tɔnaa-ɦa n ŋmɛnii, n nakpai hinaahi dɔm n waagi.
45001024	Welee kaa nnii Saŋgband nn saa bá jufot t haaw, bá ka lɔg bá gbani ka ɦɛtra wo ban ɦɛna lee. Welee ɦɛna bà tigla bayenwu jiwɦi vol wo vola.
45001025	Bee lagii gobiint gwɛɛt t´ hɛl Saŋgband tii n gokaat ret. Bà hel n ka door want tiit Saŋgband nn ree tii tiŋa ka ɦɛna t´ ŋmɛɛg̈b, l` ba na Saŋgband tiŋa nnii ln ba na bá door. Dii nnii want mɛnt reeta. Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband bina mɛna kakeɦnan! L´ bɛm welee!
45001026	Tii nnii Saŋgband nn saa bá nakakeet neerm t ka tigla-ba jiwɦi. Welee tiibee fɔg̈ba saa l´ nn bɛm na bá n daba l´ goom n taa lee, n hel n ka go n taa bayen, l` ba na welee ɦɛbii kpaa magr.
45001027	Ta welee nnii daba nn ta kpaa bag na bà goom n fɔg̈ba bà diila kulaa taa ɦɛn. Bà gool n taa bà hɛnba l` saɦ jiwɦi. Tii nnii ban soɦda fat t´ magr n bà ŋmɛɛbɛɦt tii.
45001028	Wo ban ba tii na bà miig Saŋgband hɔm lee, d´ saa bá jufot t haaw bá ka ɦɛna bii b` kpaa magr na bà ɦɛm bii.
45001029	Bá kwɛɛwa hugl n baaŋb, n dadrb, n nɔmvuurɦu, n talmt n nɔmmooga. Bà hugl n nidkuuŋa, n kpala, n rarbɛɦm, ka neer yɔɦ', ka ba hidkoɦlb.
45001030	Bà gbaɦra taa ka kpaa sɔkla Saŋgband, ka su nidba, ka jaɦra bayen, ka ta weraa bayen. Bà biira bɛɦgu ɦɛbn, ka kpaa vala bá reba,
45001031	ka ba joojoont, ka kpaa ɦɛna bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn. Bà kpaɦ n kwɛɛwr, ka kpaa yu ɦii ɦigm.
45001032	Bá miil hɔm na Saŋgband mug na bà neer welee bee mag kuum. Ban la mi welee lee, n ka la neer welee, ka fɛla ka ba baagr bà ta neer welee bee ɦɛn.
45002001	Nid ven yaa n volba ven, nan kpaɦ v` bɛm n tiit na v` biir na v` fetg ka v` la ba na ven nnii wena. V` wen yaa volba n yaagu ka ta neer wo ban neer lee, ¿kpaa tula vyenwu hoogu nnii?
45002002	T` miil na Saŋgband yaa n biiba bà neer welee bee ka tagd gobiint.
45002003	¿Diila na ven, ven yaa n bá neer welee bee n yaagu ka ta neer bà dela ven, nan feta n Saŋgband yaagun?
45002004	¿Laa nima Saŋgband hɔmgu n d´ kwɛɛwdeb le? ¿Kpaa mi na d´ hɔmguu ba l´ ɦe na v` lagii neermn?
45002005	V` jugun haɦran, v` kpaa tia na v` lagii. Tii kaa nnii vn fakaa v` ɦɛn Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga goor dn nan yaa n nidbee mɛmbee dii. Goorii, Saŋgband daa d` werii na d´ yaagu ba sɔbb.
45002006	L´ goorii, Saŋgband kee d` to baawenwu ɦà fat l` magr n ŋmɛɛgt ɦan ɦer tii.
45002007	Bá ɦɛna hɔmgu ka ked n nɔngan ka bag Saŋgband nyɔkb, n jeeŋlb, n neerm m` kpaa diɦaa mii bee lee, Saŋgband kee d` saa na bá neer d´ man kakeɦnan.
45002008	Gwɛntaɦ, bá kir gobiint ka vida Saŋgband ɦɛn ka ɦɛna bii bɛɦb bee lee, Saŋgband daat n d` kwɛɛwweerga kee l` lor bá ɦɛn.
45002009	Ĥigm n himaɦr hɔda baaben tii ɦà ɦɛna bɛɦgu wii ka foogaa n Yuudaa tia ka fɛla n ɦá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tii wii.
45002010	Baaben tii ɦà ɦɛna hɔmgu wii lee, Saŋgband kee d` si-wu nyɔkb, n jeeŋlb, n nigiigu ka ta foogaa n Yuudaa tiiwu saɦ', ka fɛla n ɦá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tii wii.
45002011	Biilm, Saŋgband kpaa lɔɔ raarb nidba huuga.
45002012	Tii kaa nnii bá ɦer fubɛɦga ka ba miig Mohiisa baɦlb bee nn kee bà kpi l´ ba yaa n ban ka tagd baɦlbii. Gwɛntaɦ lee, bá ɦer fubɛɦga ka mi Mohiisa baɦlb bee lee, bà kee bà yaa n ban ka ɦigr baɦlbii jugun.
45002013	¿Bá kewla baɦlbii kewluɦ bee beel hɔmba Saŋgband nɔngann? Ĥaai! Bá ɦɛna b´ jugun bee kee bà bɛm hɔmba d` nɔngan.
45002014	Bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba ka kpaa mi Mohiisa baɦlb, ka la ɦɛna bà sɔklbn bii bn gbaama bii bee, l` weraa na bà mada baɦlbii ka la kpaa mii-b.
45002015	Bá beeb weraa na baɦlb nn gbaama bii ba bà kwɛɛwan. Bá rarmn weraa welee, l´ saa ban bea na bà tulgm taa hoogu laa, bà jowiim taa vol wo vol lee, ta weraa welee.
45002016	L´ mɛnguu kee l` riir wiingan goor Saŋgband nn kee d` tag n Yeesu Krist d` yaa yaagu n bii nidba nn kpɛɦdra bà kwɛɛwan bii. Gohɔmt man fan tii nn bɔɦɔɔ nnii.
45002017	Ven, ven hoɦ vyen na Yuudaa tii ven, neera ka ɦigr baɦlb ɦɛn, ka nyɔka vyen na daaga Saŋgband ɦɛn,
45002018	ka mi d´ sɔklb, baɦlb t werii-v lan nnii vn ba v` bee v` miig bii b´ ba hɔm bii lee.
45002019	Ta lɔgl vyen na ven dada joomba, ka diila na ven nnii biiba bà gbuɦ nyeetn bee wiinga.
45002020	Ta diila na ven saɦl joojoomba rarm, ka lɔg vyen na bii weriita, blaɦb kaa na diɦaa n v` ni na baɦlbii mɛmbii nnii miib n gobiint.
45002021	Ĥee waa! Ven, ven weraa volba ven, ¿ben kaa nnii vn kpaa weraa vyen? Baɦla volba na bà daa bam, ¿l´ ɦɛm lan na vii bama?
45002022	¿Lag ven bɔɦɔɔ na bá daa yaruuma? ¿L´ ɦɛm lan vii t ka yarwa? Kpaa tiina n boga, ¿l´ ɦɛm lan v` ka ta baaw bugnɔniin want?
45002023	Nyɔka vyen na nen heɦl n baɦlb, l´ ba na ɦɛna bii b` rɔta n bn. ¿Welee kpaa weraa na kpaa jeeŋla Saŋgband?
45002024	¿Wadbuudga kpaa bɔɦɔɔ na: Nii kaa nnii bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee nn su Saŋgband?
45002025	L` ba welee biilm na, ka v` ɦɛna baɦlb jugun, bɔtgm t ka ba daɦt. Gwɛntaɦ, ka v` rɔta n baɦlb bá la bɔtg vii, l` ŋmɛtg wo bà ba bɔtg-v.
45002026	Tn biir na ɦii bee bà ba bɔtg-wu, ɦà tagd baɦlb sent, ¿Saŋgband kpaɦ d` lɔg-wu wo ɦii ban bɔtg wii?
45002027	Welee tii ban ba bɔtg ɦà tagd baɦlb wii kee ɦà yaa-v n yaagu ven ban bɔtg v´ ka rɔta n baɦlb ka mad b` wadii ven.
45002028	Ĥá ba na Yuudaa tii biilm wii kpaa bee-t ɦà gbanu ɦɛn, laa lag gbanu jugun lamba weraa na bà bɔtg ɦii.
45002029	Yuudaa tia mɔm nnii ɦá bee-t ɦá kwɛɛwrn wii. L´ saa bɔtgm mɔmm nnii m´ rɛna kwɛɛwrn mii. Mii nnii Saŋgband Voɦoom rem, lag baɦlb wadiin rem. Ĥá ba na Yuudaa tii biilm wii soɦda ɦà jeeŋlb Saŋgband man, lag nidba man.
45003001	Ĥee waa! ¿Yuudaa tiiba waym nnii tem? ¿Bɔtgm daɦt nnii tet?
45003002	Biilm, waybermm bee l` mɛnguun, blaɦb kaa Saŋgband da to d` gwɛɛt Yuudaa tiiba saɦ'.
45003003	¿T` ba t` biir nan na laa? ¿Na ka bá ni biiba ba tii gwɛɛtii ɦɛn l` bɛm na Saŋgband kpaɦ d` mad d´ gwɛɛt na bee nn ba mug-t laa?
45003004	Ĥaai! Lag welee. L` ba na t` miim na Saŋgband ba gobiint, ka nidbee mɛmbee la ba na gokaat tiiban. L` ɦɔda Wadbuudgan na: Saŋgband gwɛɛlb kee l` werii na d` ba sɔbb, l´ saa d` yaamn d` di jugun.
45003005	Man gwɛɛl wo nida nn gwɛɛla lee. Ka l` boo tii nn kpaɦ sɔbb lee weraa na Saŋgband ba sɔbb, ¿t` biir na laa? ¿Na d` kwɛɛwweerga nn luur t` ɦɛn lee weraa na d` baaŋa-t nnii laa?
45003006	Ĥaai! Ka l` ba welee de, ¿Saŋgband kee d` ɦe lan d` yaa tant mɛnt n yaagu?
45003007	Laa, ka l` boo mà gokaat man ɦɛna tii rea Saŋgband gobiint wiingan, l` helaa ka jeeŋla-d, ¿ben kaa nnii ban kee bà dar mà tobr wo fubɛɦtia?
45003008	¿Ben kaa nnii tn kpaɦ t` biir na: «Tn ɦɛm-n bɛɦgu ka bo na hɔmgu daan» wo bà gbaɦr-t bee nn tegda na tn bɔɦɔɔ nnii? ¿Welee tiibee tobr darm kpaɦ tii nnii?
45003009	¿Mɔmgu l` ba nan na t` mug na bee? ¿Na Yuudaa tiiba ten t` yata volbee laa? Ĥaai! Mà kpaa diila. Mà fɛtg-n reem n werii na Yuudaa tiiba n bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee vɛɦra fubɛɦgan.
45003010	Wadbuudga bɔɦɔɔ na: «Hɔma kpaɦ rii, ɦayenɦa mɔma kpaɦ'
45003011	Rarm tii ɦii kpaɦ', ɦii kpaɦ ka bag Saŋgband.
45003012	Bá mɛmbee, bà fiwdgn. Bà laglg n boorm, ɦii kpaa ɦɛna bii hɔmb ɦayenɦa mɔma kpaɦ' .
45003013	Bá lakpana yaɦra wo bilu noor, bà gelmii lɛlwa golamɛi. Bá gwia ɦɛn ba jukpata raɦm .
45003014	Bà gwɛɛla nobɛɦa, ka mool gwɛɛt .
45003015	Bà ba kɛliigu nidkuuŋan.
45003016	Bà koɦla l´ biɦ bá huri jugun ka lɔɔ kunyɔŋu.
45003017	Bà ba miig nigiigu huru.
45003018	Bà kpaa geewa n kan na l` ba na bá solm Saŋgband .
45003019	L´ ba na t` miil hɔm wadii nn bɔɦɔɔ l` hɛl baɦlb tii. Gwɛɛtii hɛla biiba bà neer baɦlb kwɛɛn bee. L` ɦera welee na ɦii daa bɛm n tiit na ɦà kɔɔ, l` saa bà miig na baaben tia koɦl Saŋgband nɔngan.
45003020	Tii kaa nnii ln kpaa kee l` hoɦ ɦii na hɔma Saŋgband nɔngan l` baɦr n na ɦà ɦera bii baɦlb nn gbaama bii. Biilm, baɦlb tɔra n jaɦ na nida miig na ɦà ɦera fubɛɦga.
45003021	Gwelŋa lee, Saŋgband werii lan nnii dn ɦɛna t´ kit hɔmba ka ba tag n baɦlb wo b´ wadii n gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba nn da bed lee.
45003022	Saŋgband saa nidba kita hɔmba d` nɔngan ka tagaa n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ban ba n Yeesu Krista ɦɛn mii. D` ɦɛna welee bá tia Yeesu Krista ɦɛn bee mɛmbee, blaɦb kaa d` kpaa lɔɔ raarb nidba huuga.
45003023	Biilm, bá mɛmbee ɦera fubɛɦga n ka ba vɔku n Saŋgband nyɔkb.
45003024	Gwɛntaɦ, Saŋgband hɔmgu kaa nnii dn lɔg-ba yem na hɔmba d´ nɔngan ka tagaa n Yeesu Krista. Wii rea-ba fubɛɦgan.
45003025	-
45003026	Wii nnii Saŋgband nn lɔgr n vidm ka bo na l´ waa bá tia vitii ɦɛn bee fubɛɦii. Welee nnii Saŋgband nn ɦer na d` werii na d` ba sɔbb. D` manna ka ba welee d´ wen da ju kwɛɛwr ka kpaa daraa nidba tobɦa bá fubɛɦii kaa. Hal n jana d` la ba welee ka bag na d` ɦe na bá tia Yeesua ɦɛn bee kitg hɔmba.
45003027	Lee de, ¿tiit ta bee na ɦii jaɦrm ɦayen? Ĥaai! Tiit kpaɦ. ¿Ben kaa? Na lag baɦlb valgm beel daɦt, na gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim beel daɦt.
45003028	Tn mug-n nan na gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim n jaɦ ɦɛna nida t kit hɔma, lag baɦlb valgm!
45003029	¿Laa Saŋgband ba na Yuudaa tiiba n jaɦ redn le? ¿Lag bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ta redn? Biilm, d` ta ba na bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee redn.
45003030	D` ba dyen n jaɦ'. Dii ɦɛna Yuudaa tiiba kita hɔmba bá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa wo dn ta ɦɛna bá kpaɦ na Yuudaa tiiba bee ta kita hɔmba ta bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa lee.
45003031	Ka welee, ¿gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiimii kpia baɦlbn? Ĥaai! Yanta gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim saɦl-b b´ jeeguu mɛnguu.
45004001	Tn lɔg-n tɔniiga n t` yandaa Ĥabrahaama! ¿Tet nnii tn ba t` biir ɦà hidr nii? ¿Ĥà da nyan ben t gɛtg ɦà neerm nii?
45004002	Ka l´ lɔg-wu na hɔma ŋmɛɛgt ɦan da ɦer tii kaa, ɦan ba ɦà bee ɦá jaɦrm ɦayen. Gwɛntaɦ, l` kpaɦ welee Saŋgband nɔngan.
45004003	¿Wadbuudga kpaa bɔɦɔɔ na: Ĥabrahaama da tii Saŋgband ɦɛn le d´ lɔgm-wu na hɔma l` baɦr n ɦà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim?
45004004	Ŋmɛɛɦeeda soɦda ɦà fat. ¿Laa bee? Fat ɦan soɦda tii kpaɦ na hɔmgu kuugu nnii ban ɦer-wu. Fɔmrn le.
45004005	Ka ɦii kpaa lɔɔ ɦà daag̈b ɦá ŋmɛɛgt ɦɛn, gwɛntaɦ, ka lɔɔ-b Saŋgband ɦɛn na dii yaa fubɛɦtiiba n yaagu, d` ba d` ɦig ɦà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ɦɛn d` hoɦ-wu na hɔma.
45004006	Ta welee nnii Daviida nn bɔɦɔɔ na lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦii Saŋgband nn lɔgr na hɔma l´ kpaɦ na ɦá ŋmɛɛgt kaa wii.
45004007	Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii biiba ln kpii bá ɦɛbbɛɦb n waa-ba bá bɛɦgu bee.
45004008	Lamɛɛgu tii nnii nid Saberma nn kpaa lɔg na ɦà koɦl bii wii .
45004009	Ka welee, ¿lamɛɛguu ba nan na ban bɔdr bee n jaɦ rekun laa kù ta ba na ban ba bɔd bee reku le? T` bɔɦɔɔ na Saŋgband da lɔgra Ĥabrahaam na hɔma ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa.
45004010	¿Laa wen nnii dn da miig-wu na ɦà ba sɔbbii? ¿Bá bɔtg-wu laa bà ban bɔtg-wu le? Ĥaai! Bà ban bɔtg-wu.
45004011	Saŋgband da lɔgra Ĥabrahaam na hɔma saɦ bà ban bɔtg-wu, ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa. Saŋgband t sɔkl na ɦá yuuŋ bɔtgm lamba l` weraa na ɦà ba na hɔma. Welee nnii ɦan kitg ban ba bɔd bà tia bee mɛmbee sa, ka bo na l´ ta lɔg-ba na hɔmba, ta bà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa.
45004012	Ĥà ba na ban bɔdr bee san, lag nan na bá nyɔka bayen na bà bɔdran bee, bá tagd t` sa Ĥabrahaama nakpaŋa bee. Ĥà da ba n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim saɦ le bà bɔta-wu.
45004013	¿Saŋgband da ba biir Ĥabrahaam n dool na wú n ɦà buudm bá nan kee bà heɦm n tant mɛnt? D` da ba feer welee na ɦan vala baɦlb l` kaa, gwɛntaɦ Saŋgband lɔgra-wu na hɔma ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa.
45004014	Ka ln bɛm na bá vala baɦlb bee n jaɦ heɦm n kɛgt Saŋgband nn saɦ tii, gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim nn ba m` bɛm yem, bii Saŋgband nn bed n foorm bii ta kpaɦ',
45004015	l´ kɔtɔd na baɦlb kena n Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga, l´ saa baɦlb kan kpaɦ ree, b´ koɦlb ta kpaɦ kan.
45004016	Tii kaa nnii Saŋgband nn bed n foorm tii nn baɦr n gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim, ka bo na l´ bɛm na hɔmgu kuugu nnii dn ɦer yem na l´ ta tɔrg Ĥabrahaama buudmii mɛnmii. Kù kpaa tɔra bá vala baɦlb bee n jaɦaa, kù ta tɔra bá tia wo Ĥabrahaama nn da tii lee bee. Wii nnii t` mɛmbee t` sa
45004017	wo Wadbuudga nn bɔɦɔɔ na: Mà ɦera v` kit tiga kɔd yandaa. Saŋgband nɔngan, wii nnii t` sa. Dii ɦɛn nnii ɦan tii. Dii himaa kpiirmba ka saa na b´ kpaɦ bii bɛm.
45004018	Daag̈b nn da kpaɦ lee, ¿Ĥabrahaama t ka la ba daag n tii Saŋgband ɦɛni? Welee kaa nnii ɦan kitg tiga kɔd yandaa wo Saŋgband nn da bed-wu lee na «v´ yakii kee hì bɛm kɔdgu kpaalaa».
45004019	Ĥá bina da nyɔɦra lɛmu, ɦà hɛdgaa kuum, ɦà fɔg Saraa kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà meed. Ln da la ba welee lee, ɦá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim ba gwiɦdg felaɦ'.
45004020	Biilm, ɦà ta ba nigii n bii Saŋgband nn da bed n foorm bii. Ĥá gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim t hel n haɦl-wu, ɦá yuum ka jeeŋla Saŋgband.
45004021	Ĥà da miil hɔm na bii Saŋgband nn bed n foorm bii, d` ba n gemmnt na d` ɦe l` jugun.
45004022	Tii kaa nnii Saŋgband nn lɔgr-wu na hɔma ɦà gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim kaa.
45004023	Ln ɦɔd Wadbuudgan na Saŋgband lɔgra-wu na hɔm lee kpaa hɛl Ĥabrahaamwu n jaɦ'.
45004024	Gwɛɛtii ta hɛla ten, ten tii Saŋgband ɦɛn d´ lɔgm-t na hɔmba ten. Dii himii t` Berm Yeesuwu kuumn.
45004025	L´ vidra-wu t` fubɛɦii kaa, Saŋgband t himii-wu kuumn na l´ bee l` ɦe na t` kitg hɔmba d` nɔngan.
45005001	Saŋgband hoɦ-t na hɔmba l` baɦr n t` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim. Gwɛɦŋa lee, t` neera nigiigun t´ n Saŋgband ka tagaa n t` Berm Yeesu Krista.
45005002	L´ tag n Yeesu le, t` gwɛɛt ɦɛn tiim t saa na t` yuuŋ Saŋgband hɔmgu. Kuu ni nnii tn bee gwɛɦŋa, t´ ka nyɔka tyen na t` daaga na t` nan soɦda Saŋgband nyɔkb.
45005003	B´ ba hɔm ka yata bii nnii na tyen nyɔkbii baɦra n t` kunyɔŋu deb, l´ kɔtɔd na kunyɔŋu saa na t` haɦr.
45005004	T` haɦrmii saa na t` di tarmga jugun. Tarmga jugun debii t daan n daag̈b.
45005005	Welee daag̈bii kpaa hogla. Biilm, Saŋgband hugl t` kwɛɛwa n d` sɔklb ka tagaa n Voɦoom Buudm dn sir-t mii.
45005006	Biilm, tn da kpaɦ n gemmnt lee, Krista t kuum fubɛɦtiiba kaa l` magr n vuugu Saŋgband nn da lo kuu.
45005007	L` ba gemm na ɦii tii ɦà kpi nidhɔma kaa. Ka tiit, ɦii ba ɦá bee ɦà tii ɦà kpi hɔmgu tiɦii kaa.
45005008	Kpay-n Saŋgband nn werii na d` sɔkla-t lee! T` wen da ba na fubɛɦtiiba lee wen, Krista t kuum t` kaa.
45005009	Gwelŋa lee, ka l´ tag n ɦà jiim Saŋgband t saa na t` kit hɔmbaa, ¿lan nnii ɦà neerm nn kpaa kee m` saa na t` fetg Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga nuɦu ni?
45005010	Ka t` wen da ba na Saŋgband rafeedba lee wen, d´ kuum gwɛɛt t´ n dn t` huuga ka tagaa n d` Budaaga kuum, wo t´ n dn tn kur taa n gwɛɛt lee, ¿lan nnii ln kpaa kee l` daɦ t` juuni ka tagaa n d` Budaaga neerm?
45005011	Lag tii n jaɦ, t` ta nyɔka tyen Saŋgband nɔngan t` Berm Yeesu Krista kaa na wii kura gwɛɛt t´ n Saŋgband t` huuga.
45005012	Nidbilma kaa nnii fubɛɦga nn daan tant jugun. Wii nnii Ĥadama. Fubɛɦga t daan n kuum, kuum t luurm nidbee mɛmbee ɦɛn na bá mɛmbee ɦera fubɛɦga.
45005013	Saɦ na Saŋgband to Mohiiswu baɦlb, fubɛɦga da manna tant ɦɛn. Gwɛntaɦaa, wo baɦlb nn da kpaɦ lee, Saŋgband t ka kpaa tula nidba bá fubɛɦii.
45005014	Ln da la ba welee lee, lɔg Ĥadama kakeɦnan Mohiisa, kuum da la bee ka kuu nidba. M` da kua ka lagaa n bá fubɛɦii da ba ta Ĥadama rekee bee mɛɦ'. Wii da ba valg Saŋgband noor. Ĥadama tɔna ɦii ɦá da ba ɦà daan wii.
45005015	Gwɛntaɦ lee, Saŋgband hɔmgu dn saɦ yem kuu n Ĥadama bɛɦgu kpaɦ kɛɛmlb. Ka nidbilma bɛɦgu saa nidba kɔd kpiidra, ¿lan nnii hɔmgu Saŋgband nn saɦ nidfigm yem ka tagaa n nidyena kuu nn kpaɦ kú bɛm daɦt l´ yata? Nidwii nnii Yeesu Krista.
45005016	Saŋgband hɔmguu nn kena n bii ba n byen n fubɛɦga nidyena nn ɦer kee. Bɛɦgu nidyena nn ɦer kuu kena n yaagu, kuu t daan n tobr darm. L` ba na hɔmgu dn sir nidfigm m´ bɛɦgu kɔd kaann yem kuu ɦɛna Saŋgband lɔg nid na hɔma.
45005017	Ka l` ba na nidbilma bɛɦgu kaa nnii kuum nn bee ka kuu nidba, ¿lan nnii tn kpaɦ t` way l` yatg ta nidbilm Yeesu Krista nn ɦer bii kaa? Biilm, bá soɦda Saŋgband hɔmbermgu d` ta saa na bá kitg hɔmba bee, bee kee bà neer ka ju huraant Yeesu Krista yen kaa. Wii n jaɦ ɦɛna welee.
45005018	Welee lee, nidbilma bɛɦgu kaa, l´ saa na l´ dar nidbee mɛmbee tobɦa. Ta welee nnii hɔmgu nidbilma nn ɦer kuu nn rea nidbee mɛmbee yaagu nuɦun ka saɦ-ba neerm.
45005019	Nidbilma da ba valg Saŋgband le nidfigm t kit fubɛɦtiiba. Ta welee nnii nidbilma nn da valg Saŋgband le, l´ ka kee l` lɔg nidfigm na hɔmban.
45005020	Baɦlb daan na bɛɦgu fodg. Gwɛntaɦ', fubɛɦga kan fodg ree, Saŋgband hɔmgu t ta tɔr kan kpaalaa.
45005021	Ka welee, fubɛɦga daan n kuum, ta welee nnii Saŋgband hɔmgu nn ɦɛna na nidba kitg hɔmba, ka bo na l´ san n tn neerm m` bee kakeɦnan miin ka tagaa n t` Berm Yeesu Krista.
45006001	¿T` ba t` biir nan na la? ¿Na t` kpat t` neer fubɛɦgan ka sug na Saŋgband hɔmgu tɔr laa?
45006002	Ĥaai! Bii b` hɛl fubɛɦga jugun bii lee, t` kpiiran. ¿Lan nnii tn ta ba t` kpat t` neer ká ni?
45006003	¿N` hɔŋaa na ban hod Saŋgband nyaalm ten t` mɛmbee, na t´ n Yeesu Krist t` laglgnn? Ĥá kuumn nnii ban hod-t.
45006004	Bà hoda-t ɦá kuumn, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na bà da kuur t´ n wun, ka bo na tii ta neer neerkwɛɛlm wo Krista nn da himtg kpiirmba huuga n ɦà Sa gemmnbermt lee.
45006005	Biilm, ka t´ kitg nidyena t´ n Krista, l` weraa na t´ n wun t` kpiira ɦà kuum. Ta welee nnii t´ n wun t` himtgm nn kee m` bɛm yenm.
45006006	L` ba na t` miim na l` kpaɦra Kristwu n t` weem neerm dabragr ɦɛn, n kpii t` weem beebii mɛmbii, ka bo na t` daa ta bɛm na fubɛɦga yuummba.
45006007	Biilm, ɦii ɦá kpiir wii ta kpaɦ fubɛɦga gemmnt kwɛɛn felaɦ'.
45006008	Ka t´ n Krist t´ kpii, t` tia na t´ n wun t` kee t` ta neer.
45006009	T` miil na Krista himtg kpiirmba huuga, lee, n ka ta kpaɦ kuum. Kuum ta kpaɦ n gemmnt tiit n ɦà ɦɛn.
45006010	Ĥan kpiir lee, ɦà kpiira t` fubɛɦii kaa myenm welee. Gwelŋa lee, ɦà neera Saŋgband hidrn.
45006011	Ta welee nnii ln ba na n` lɔgm n̈yen na bii b` hɛl fubɛɦga jugun bii lee, n` kpiiran, n ka neer Saŋgband hidrn n´ n Yeesu Krist n` laglgmn.
45006012	Tii lee, fubɛɦga daa ta kad n` jugun felaɦ'! Daa ta valgm-n bii n` gbani nn hɛɦr-n na n` ɦɛm bii!
45006013	Daa ta lɔgm-n n` gbani hulii na n` ɦɛm fubɛɦga wo want ban ɦɛna n bɛɦgu tii! Yanta l` ba na n` to n̈yen n` ɦɛm Saŋgband ŋmɛɛg̈b wo nidba ln himii kuumn n saɦm neerm bee. Lɔgm-n n` gbani ka ɦɛna-ɦi n hɔmgu wo want ban lɔg na bá ɦe n bii b´ ba na gobiint reb bii!
45006014	Tii lee, fubɛɦga ta kpaɦ kà bɛm n gemmnt tiit n` ɦɛn l` baɦr n na n` ta kpaɦ baɦlb kwɛɛn. Saŋgband hɔmgu kwɛɛn nnii nn bee.
45006015	¿T` ba t` biir nan na la? ¿Na t` kpat t` ɦɛm fubɛɦga na tn kpaɦ baɦlb kwɛɛn ka ba hɔmgu kwɛɛn laa? Ĥaai! Lag welee.
45006016	¿N` kpaa mi na ka v` lɔg vyen n tig ɦii kwɛɛn n ka vala-wu, v´ kit ɦá yuumn? Ka v` vala fubɛɦga, v´ kit ká yuuma, l` ba na fubɛɦga keda nidwu n kuumn. Ka v` vala Saŋgband, d´ saa na v` kitg hɔma.
45006017	Tn seeŋ̈m-n Saŋgband d´ hɔmgu kaa na dii ɦera ŋmɛɛg̈b! Biilm, n` da vala fubɛɦga ka ba na ká yuummba, lee gwelŋa, n` valg n n` kwɛɛwr mɛnd bii nn mug l` hɛl weriib nn soɦdg biin.
45006018	L` ree-n fubɛɦgan n´ kit gobiint yuummba.
45006019	Man gwɛɛl wo nida nn gwɛɛla lee na n` ɦom, l´ kɔtɔd na l` ba gemm n nid na ɦá ɦom. Wo nn da lɔgr n` gbani n ka ɦɛtra nakakeet n bɛɦgu ɦɛb l´ saa na n` vidg Saŋgband ɦɛn lee, welee lee, gwelŋa, ta lɔg-n nan n̈yen n` lo bii b´ ba gobiint bii kwɛɛn, ka bo na n` kitg Saŋgband reba!
45006020	N` wen da ba na fubɛɦga yuummba lee wen, n` da kpaɦ b´ ba gobiint bii kwɛɛn.
45006021	¿N` da way nan bɛ? ¿N` ret deeda gwelŋa l` saɦ-n jiwɦi tii laa? ¿Welee da kpaa ked-n n kuum ni?
