66014003	Welee nidbee mɛmbee yuuma yumkwɛɛlga huraant jargee nɔngan n wanneernt tnaatii nɔngan, n nan ta kpalmmbee nɔngan. Welee yumgee, ɦii da kpaɦ ɦà bee ɦà kpɛlŋ-ka, ka l` kpaɦ na nidba ruuni lɛmu n kwɛɦnaa n ɦinaa (144000) ln daɦr bà juuni tant ɦɛn bee.
66014004	Bee nnii bá kpaɦ n nakakeet. Bee kpat ka nawr n Fɛɛbugee, bee tagda kà kaa baatee ká kan ked ree. Bee juuni nnii ln daɦr nidba huuga na l` to-ba Saŋgband n nan d´ Budaaga.
66014005	Bà ba nyaan gokaat bà noon. Tiit kpaɦ na bá kpal-ba.
66014006	Lee, má yum saŋgbantumtvola leema n faaga liglig. Ĥà da ba n Gohɔmt na ɦà faa, tii bee kakeɦnan. Ĥà da bo na ɦà faa-t tant ɦɛn nidba mɛmba: kɔrni mɛni tiiba, tiga mɛna tiiba, n ta lam mɛnm tiiba.
66014007	Tumtwii da toola kimm na: «Valgm-n Saŋgband! Jeeŋlm-n-d na vuugu taara na d´ yaa yaagu! Door-n ɦá ree saŋgbambiim n tant n nyaam n nyabila wii tiŋa!»
66014008	Saŋgbantumtreɦdra t tagn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Jaɦ nnii! Babiloon kɔrgu bugdn, kɔrbermguu bugdn. Kù da nyilg tigɦee mɛnɦee kù yaruub daam ɦá ka yarwa. Biilm, kù da yarwa yaruuɦ'. Kù lag n tɔl tigɦee mɛnɦee kú yaruub, l´ kɔtɔd nnii na kù boga tiŋan doorm.»
66014009	Saŋgbantumttaɦra t ta tagn ka bɔɦɔɔ kimm na: «Ĥii ɦà door ŋmɛrwaŋu tiŋa laa kú tand tiŋa, ɦii ɦà tia na ɦà soɦdg kù lamba ɦà diir noon, laa ɦá natadn wii,
66014010	l` ba na welee tiiwii ta nyi Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga dabogm. Bà nan saɦl-wu daamii Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga kpowdgan, lee, ɦà di kunyɔŋu ka ɦum wiiru bogmn n nan kusawu bogmn saŋgbantumtbuudba nɔngan n nan Saŋgband Fɛɛbuga nɔngan.
66014011	Bogm m` lɔɔ-ba kunyɔŋu mii nyii ba hì vidgm n faaga bina mɛna kakeɦnan. Voɦoor kpaa kee d` bɛm muunun laa nyingu n biiba bà da door ŋmɛrwaŋu n kù tand tiŋa bee, ka ta soɦdg bà ɦɛn kú hidr lamba bee.»
66014012	Tii kaa nnii ln ba na saŋgbantiiba, biiba bà mad Saŋgband baɦlb ka tia Yeesua ɦɛn bee, ln ba na bá haɦr.
66014013	Lee, má ɦom noor diir rɛna n saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Ĥɔr na: ‟Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá kpiidra gwɛɦmna ka nawr n Saberm bee!”» Voɦoom bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biilm, bà voɦoo n bà ŋmɛɛgt giidm. Bá ŋmɛɛgt taawa bà kaa.»
66014014	Má ta yum bii. Yid toŋwadfeelgun, ɦii kad kù ɦɛn ka tɔn nida budaaga. Ĥà da ligra sika degrga ka mad losgu ɦà nuɦun kù ba deem kpaalaa.
66014015	Lee, saŋgbantumtvola t rɛn n Saŋgband haarn ka toolgaa ɦà da kad toŋwadguu ɦɛn wii na: «Teedg v` losgu v` sɔɦm dikaɦb! Biilm, dikaɦlɔg̈b vuugu taaran. Tant ɦɛn dikaɦb biiran.»
66014016	Lee, ɦá da kad toŋwadgu ɦɛn wii t teedgii ɦá losguu tant ɦɛn. L´ saa, bá lɔgm tant ɦɛn dikaɦbii mɛmbii.
66014017	Saŋgbantumtvola t rɛn saŋgbambiimn Saŋgband haariin ka ta mad losgu kù ta ba deem kpaalaa.
66014018	Lee, vola t ta rɛn vit daɦŋan. Wii beel n gemmnt n daɦŋee bogm jugun. Ĥá toolgii ɦá da mad losgu kù ba deem wii kimm na: «Teedg v` losgu v` kɛɦ tant ɦɛn daam tibitii na t´ roona biiran!»
66014019	Saŋgbantumtwii t teedgii ɦá losguu tant ɦɛn n sɔɦm tant ɦɛn daam tibitii. Ĥá lɔgm t´ roonɦee n hit vadbermgu kuugun. Kuu ni nnii ban da kaam daam. Ĥá lɔgm tiroonɦee n hit Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga daam kaamtgun.
66014020	Bá nawdr tibitii roonɦee daam kaamtguun kɔrgu kpamga na bà ree daam. Lee, jiim t gbuɦd n ka kulaa l` kpaɦ jaɦ'. M` da kula n taai wo tana ruugu n lɛmi ɦiroond (1600). M` da ba kpaalaa, ka waalaa deer, l` saa d` jugu n jaɦ'.
66015001	Lee, má ta yum hoolvolgu saŋgbambiimn kù ba bermgu ka ba kpaalaa, ka ɦɛna-ma yɔlaa. Kuu nnii saŋgbantumtba balbleɦ', bà mad bɛɦt tlbleɦ'. Da kaawrt nnii. Tii n nnii Saŋgband nn werii d` kwɛɛwweerga kpaalaa.
66015002	Má ta yum nyaam m` boo diini ka sɔd n bogm. Biiba bà da diir ŋmɛrwaŋuu jugun, n kù tand n nan kú hidr waari jugun bee jeɦr diini nyaamii ɦɛn ka mad Saŋgband janjali.
66015003	Bà yuuma Saŋgband ŋmɛɛɦeed Mohiisa yumga, n Saŋgband Fɛɛbuga reka. Bà yuuma na: «Saberm Gemm Mɛnm tia Saŋgband! V` ŋmɛɛgt ba bermt ka ɦɛna yɔlaa. Tiga huraa! V` huri ba sɔbb ka ba gobiint.
66015004	Saberma! ¿Wen bee ka kpaa vala-v? ¿Wen bee ka kir na ɦà kpaɦ ɦà nyɔk-v? Biilm, ven n jaɦ nnii buuda. V` yaagu reda wiingan. Tii lee, tiga mɛna nan kena ɦà door-v tiŋan.»
66015005	Welee kaann, má ta yum saŋgbambiimn Saŋgband haar t rawdg. D` ni ba bii. Bii nnii gwɛɛt Saŋgband nn da to d` tigr tii.
66015006	Saŋgbantumtba balbleɦba bà da mad bɛɦt tlbleɦt bee t rɛn Saŋgband haariin. Bà da fidra dimfeent t` nyinwa, ka tog sika damɦa bá fɔin.
66015007	Wanneernt tnaatii ni bilmgu t to saŋgbantumtba balbleɦbee sika kpowdii hilbleɦ'. Hì da hugl n Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga, dii bee kakeɦnan.
66015008	Lee wen lee, Saŋgband wiinga n d` gemmnt t hugl Saŋgband haarii n nyii, l´ ka kpaɦ na ɦii jib kan kakeɦnan na bɛɦgu saŋgbantumtbee nn toodg ɦɛb kuu toglg.
66016001	Lee, má ɦom noor diir rɛna kimm Saŋgband haarn, ka bɔɦɔɔ saŋgbantumtba balbleɦbee na: «Lɔg-n kpowdii hilbleɦhii n` san n` fut Saŋgband kwɛɛwweerga tant ɦɛn!»
66016002	Noogra t san n fut ɦá kpowdga tant ɦɛn. Nɔdjuntnbɛɦt t ɦɛm nidba bá da ba n dɔmii lamba bà ɦɛn ka ta door m` tand tiŋa bee ɦɛn.
66016003	Reɦdra t fut ɦá kpowdga nyaamn. Nyaamii t kit wo nidkpiira jiim. Want t´ da neer kan tii mɛntii t kpiidr.
66016004	Taɦra t fut ɦá kpowdga kolberma n bilii nyaalmn. M´ kit jiim.
66016005	Lee, má ɦom saŋgbantumt ɦà kiig nyaalm ɦɛn wii bɔɦɔɔ na: «V` yaaguu ba kù jugun, ba sɔbb, ven beeln, ka ta manna, ven nnii buuda.
66016006	Biilm, bà fut Krista tiiba jiim n nan gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba rem. Lee, v´ saɦm-ba ta jiim na bá nyi. L` mag tii nnii.»
66016007	Lee, má ɦom noor diir rɛna vit daɦŋeen ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biilm, Saberm Gemm Mɛnm tii Saŋgband, v` yaani ba sɔbb ka ba gobiint.»
66016008	Saŋgbantumtnaara t fut ɦá kpowdga muunu ɦɛn. L´ saɦm-ɦu huru na ɦú totrm nidba.
66016009	L´ totr nidba kpaalaa, bá baɦ n ka su Saŋgband, dii beel n gemmnt n welee bɛɦguu jugun. Lee, bá kirm n ka ba lagii neerm na bà jeeŋlm-d.
66016010	Nuura t fut ɦá kpowdga dɔmii huraant jarga ɦɛn. Lee, nyeet t fiid m´ huraantii kpimm. Nidba t ka duum bà nyina n wiiru.
66016011	Bá kunyɔŋu n bà nɔdjuntnt wiiru t ɦɛm, bá ka su Saŋgband saŋgbambiimn. Lee, bà ba lagii neerm na bà kir bá ɦɛbbɛɦb.
66016012	Saŋgbantumtroonda t fut ɦá kpowdga kolbermr ban hoɦ na Ĥefraat diin. Kolii t nyiid n kparŋ, n saɦm huru na toŋu kwɛɛnn huraamba gɛtg.
66016013	Lee, má yum voɦoobɛɦm mtaɦm m` tɔn saari. Má yum m` rɛna ŋmɛrwaŋu noon n dɔm noon n nan gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔta noon.
66016014	Welee voɦoomii ba na kunida remn, m` ɦɛna hoolgu. Voɦoomii taɦrbee keda n tant mɛnt ɦɛn huraamba wee, na m` kpogl-ba na bá teew hoodr Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia gobermr goor.
66016015	Saberma t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpaya! Mà kena wo bawda. Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦá neer ka sug ka fidr ɦà dimt na ɦà daa ked kpaŋ̈m bà yuu-wu welee jiwɦi kpal-wu wii.»
66016016	Kunidba voɦoomii da kpogl huraambee kaalaŋa ban hoɦ n hebrmn na Harmagedoon keen.
66016017	Saŋgbantumtleblwii t fut ɦá kpowdga ɦamn. Noor diir t rɛn n Saŋgband haarn kimm. Noorii da rɛn n huraant jarga weenn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «L` fɛlg soɦm nnii.»
66016018	Lee, toŋu t ŋmɛdii, damb dama, toŋu gbuɦ. Tant t ta dam kimm. Ĥii ban nyaan tant t dam kimm welee felaɦ'. T` da dam kpaalaa.
66016019	Kɔrbermguu t yɔkl n ɦɛm gbeɦa ɦataɦ'. Tantii mɛntii kɔrni t lotr. Saŋgband deedg kɔrbermgu ban hoɦ na Babiloon kuu ɦɛn. D` lo-ku n kwɛɛwweerga kpaalaa wo l´ hugl ɦii kpowdgan daam n kwɛɛwweerga na ɦá nyi.
66016020	Nyaam huuga tantii mɛntii t boorm. Ĥii t ka ta kpaa yu duura.
66016021	Sahirmberma t rɛn n saŋgbambiimn ka ba jeegu l` kpaɦ jaɦ n tɛɦr nidba jugun. Lee, nidbee t suum Saŋgband, bɛɦguu n sahirmɦee l` kaa. Biilm, bɛɦguu da kpaɦ heee.
66017001	Lee, saŋgbantumtba balbleɦba bá da mad kpowdii hilbleɦ bee ni bilma t daan n gwɛɛl n man ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Daan mà werii-v ban nan daraa yaruutbermwii tobr yaagu kaan lee, kɔrbermgu kù kad kola kɔd ɦɛn kuu.
66017002	Kú n tant ɦɛn huraamba bà ɦɛna yaruub. L´ saa tant ɦɛn nidba t nyim kú yaruub daam l´ kuum-ba.»
66017003	Saŋgbantumtwii t lɔgm-ma n voɦoomn n san n tankparmtn. Reekan má yum fɔgɦii kad dɔmmɔlm miim jugun, hida fiidr dɔmii. Hidɦee da suul Saŋgband. Dɔmii da ba n juut tlbleɦt n ɦiili kwiɦr.
66017004	Fɔg̈wii da yoɦra kwɛgdm dimmɔla ka toɦd sika tobjilii n tanhɔma n nan laalm. Ĥà da mada ɦà nuɦun sika kpowdga ká hugl n gwei, ɦà yaruub nakakeet wanbɛɦt.
66017005	Bà da ɦɔda ɦà diir noon hidr diir, d´ kɔtɔd ba foɦmgan. Bà da ɦɔda na: «Babiloon kɔrbermgu, kuu nnii yaruutba nya n nan tant mɛnt gwei nya, l´ kɔtɔd na boga tiŋan doorm nya.»
66017006	Má yum na fɔg̈wii nyira saŋgbantiiba jiim m´ kuum-wu. Biiba ban kur na bà tii n ka ba Yeesua ɦɛn baagr bee jiim da kura-wu. Man nyan-wu lee, l´ ɦɛm-ma yɔlaa yem.
66017007	Saŋgbantumtwii t nan bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «¿Ben kaan ln ɦɛna-v yɔlaa welee? Maa mà biir-v fɔg̈wii n nan dɔm ɦan da kad m` ɦɛn m` ba n juut tlbleɦt n nan ɦiili kwiɦr l´ kpɛŋkpɛɦgan gwɛɛt.
66017008	Dɔm vn nyan mii, weem m` da neeran, lee, gwɛɦma m` bɔdan. M` ba m` riir lɔgkilmgun m` jib boorlaŋa. Tant ɦɛn nidba ln da ba ɦɔr bá hida weem kɔtɔdn neerm wadgan bee, bà ba bà nyaan dɔmii bà yaɦr bá noora yem. Biilm, weem m` da neeran, gwɛɦma m` bɔdan, lee, m` nan ŋmɛta m` rɛn.
66017009	Nnaɦ nnii ln gbaama na nida jufot wentg ɦà bɛm n rarbiilm. Juut tlbleɦtii ba na duura ɦalbleɦa fɔg̈wii nn kad ɦà ɦɛn ɦee nnii.
66017010	T` ta ba na huraamba balbleɦban. Bá huuga banuba lodan. Ĥayenɦa kada huraantn gwelmina, l´ saa vola ban daan. Ĥan kee ɦà daan lee, ɦà kpaɦ ɦà hiidg.
66017011	Dɔm m´ da neer weem n boorm gwɛɦma mii mɔmm ba na hurniind nnii. M` ta ba huraamba balbleɦbee ni le, n ka jiba boorlaŋa.
66017012	Ĥiili kwiɦr vn nn nyan ɦii ba na huraamba kwiɦrn. Bee ban kad huraantn. Gwɛntaɦ, bà daa bà soɦdg huraant bá n dɔmii l` kad t` ni jaɦ'.
66017013	Bá kwiɦlmbee mɛmbee ba n diilyena. Ĥee nnii na bá to dɔmii bà gemmnt n bà bermt na m´ ɦɛm n ŋmɛɛg̈b.
66017014	Bà nan taawa hoodr n Fɛɛbuga, lee, kee di bá jugun, l´ kɔtɔd na kee nnii bermba Berma n nan huraamba Huraa. Ká n kà reba kan hoɦ n bant bá ka ba ká ɦɛn baagr bee, bà kee bà di bá jugun.»
66017015	Saŋgbantumta t lilm-ma bɔɦɔɔb na: «Kola vn nyan ɦee, yaruutwii kan da kad ree, ba na tigan, nidfigmn, kɔrnin, n nan lam kɔdn.
66017016	Ĥiili kwiɦr vn nyan ɦii n dɔmii nan ba l` nyaɦaam yaruutwii. Bà nan ba bà gbuɦ-wu bà soɦdg ɦà do ɦan ba n bii mɛmbii bà saa-wu kpaŋ̈m. Bà nan ba bà di ɦá namtii mɛntii bà totr ɦà kowa bugd,
66017017	l´ kɔtɔd na Saŋgband lo bà ni sɔklb na bá ɦe d´ diila, na bà ta ɦe noor dyen bà lɔg bà huraant gemmnt bà to dɔmii na m´ ɦɛm ŋmɛɛg̈b kakeɦnan Saŋgband gwɛɛt daa ba t` ɦe t´ jugun.
66017018	L` saa, fɔg vn nyan wii ba na kɔrbermgu kù mad tant mɛnt huraamba kú kwɛɛn kuu nnii.»
66018001	Welee kaann, má ta yum saŋgbantumtvola hoɦntna saŋgbambiimn, ka ba n gemmnt l` kpaɦ jaɦ'. Ĥà wiinga wiir tant ɦɛn.
66018002	Ĥá mɔɔm ka toola kimm na: « Kù lodan! Wuui, kù lodan! Kɔrbermgu ban hoɦ na Babiloon kuu lodan. Kù kitg kunida gbalaŋa. Voɦoobɛɦm mɛnm foɦntlaŋa nnii. Ŋmɛnbɛɦt ban kpaa vid tii mɛntii ta gool kan.
66018003	Kù loda na kù ɦera tiga mɛna t nyim kú yaruub daam. Tant ɦɛn huraamba laglg kù ɦɛn bá n kun bá ɦɛm yaruub. Kù sɔkla wanhɔmt kpaalaa, tii nnii tant ɦɛn yagtiiba nn ɦer kwɛgdm.
66018004	Lee, má ta ɦom novol t ta rɛn n saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: « Mà reba-n, riir-n kú ni na n´ n kun n` daa ɦe fubɛɦga, na n` da n` fetg bɛɦgu kù nan luur bà ɦɛn kuun.
66018005	Kù loda na kù foɦlg kù fubɛɦii taa ɦɛn hí taai saŋgbambiimn, lee, Saŋgband t deed kù muulŋb ɦɛn.
66018006	Ĥee-n-ku wo kun ta ɦer-n lee! Ŋmɛlg-n-ku kú bɛɦgu deedee! Lee, wiiru kpowdga kun da saɦ kee, ta si-n-ku-ka welee deedee!
66018007	Wo kun da neer ka nyɔka kuyen kpaalaa ka ta ba n wanhɔmt kɔd lee, ta lo-n-ku bɛɦgun welee kù bɛm kunyɔŋun kpaalaa! Kù da bɔɦɔɔ kuyen na: ‟ Mà kada nnaɦ huraantn. Mà ta kpaɦ na kuŋfɔgn. Kunyɔŋu nan ta kpaa luur mà ɦɛn felaɦ'.”»
66018008	Tii kaa nnii kɔrguu nn nan yu bɛɦgu ln ba na kú daan kù ɦɛn kuu t lɛn kù ɦɛn myenm ɦɛn. Bɛɦguu nnii kuum n kunyɔŋu n nan kɔm. Bogm nan ta ba m` di kuu mɔmgu kù kitg toom, l´ kɔtɔd na Saberm Saŋgband yaa n bɔɦɔɔ na kú ret koɦln. Wii beel n gemmnt.
66018009	Lee, tant ɦɛn huraambee, bee da tɔrg-ku yaruub neerm n nan wanhɔmt sɔklb, ban kee bà nyaan kɔrguu bugda kù nyii kota n faaga lee, bà kom ka jowdra.
66018010	Bà nan ba bà jeɦr vɔkun ka sol na welee bɛɦguu daa taan-ba. Bà nan ba bà ɦiirm ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wuui! Kunyɔŋu mɔmgu nnii. Ĥiii! Kɔrbermguu, Babiloon, gemmnt kɔrguu! ¿Waarbilmu n jaɦ mag nnii na yaagu lor v` ɦɛnii?»
66018011	L´ saa tant ɦɛn yagtiiba t ka ta kuum ka fɔgla kɔrguu na ɦii ta kpaɦ na ɦà daɦm bá yag̈want.
66018012	Bá yag̈wantii da ba na sika mɔma n sikfeela, n tanhɔma n laalm, n dimhɔma jugu jugu, ɦà ba daɦt ka nyinwa nyinnyin ka ba mɔla siii, n dabit kunuukaɦt, n ŋmɛŋmɛnyina want n dabhɔmt want jugu jugu n kudnaŋhoont n kudnaŋ̈mɔnt jugu jugu n nan kwɛɛlm tana.
66018013	Bà da ta gweedma jit ruɦu want jugu jugu t` ba hɔm kpaalaa, n tlaara, n kpakunuukaɦm, n nyab nyanyaam, n daam, n kpaam, n joom miim m` ba hɔm kpaalaa, n kpooni bia, n naagi, n fɛi, n deera n ɦà kekent, n nidba, l´ kɔtɔd na yuummba.
66018014	Yagtiibee t ka kuum ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥoo! Babiloon kɔrgu ven, want vn da sɔkla tii mɛntii sela n san-v n vɔku. Wanhɔmt, kwɛɛlm want vn da weraa vyen n tii bɔda v` man kpaalaa. Ĥii nan ta kpaa yu bii felaɦ'.»
66018015	Yagtiiba bá da ɦer kwɛgdm ka ɦɛna yaku kɔrguun bee kee bà jeɦr vɔkun ka sol na welee bɛɦguu daa taan-ba. Bà kee bà kom ka fɔgla,
66018016	ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Wuui! Kunyɔŋu nnii welee! Kɔrbermgu kù da fidr dimhɔmt jugu jugu t` ba daɦt ka nyinwa nyinnyin ka ba mɔnt siii kuu nnii! Kɔrbermgu kù da lɔɔ sika koŋbia ka nawla tanhɔma ka lɔɔ daɦt laalm kuu nnii!
66018017	Ĥoo! Babiloon kɔrgu ven! ¿Waaru ɦuyenɦu n jaɦ v` kwɛgdm t kit yemii?» L´ saa meel jowdba mɛmba n d` ni yagtiiba mɛmba, n nyaam kwɛɛn tawdba, n nyaamn ŋmɛgdba ta jeɦr vɔkun
66018018	ka geewa kɔrguu nn bugda kù nyii kota n faaga lee ka toola na: «¿Bii mɔmb bee ka ta tɔn kɔrbermgunkuna yaa?»
66018019	Bá ka fig bá juuni tanjoom ka kuum ka fɔgla ka toola na: «Wuui! Kunyɔŋu mɔmgu nnii welee n kɔrbermgunkuna, l` ba na kú wanhɔmt sɔklb da saa na bá da ba n meela bee mɛmbee ɦe kwɛgdm! Lee, ¿l´ ka ba na waarbilmu n jaɦ mag na kú kitg yemii?»
66018020	Saŋgbambiimn tiiba-n, nyaagm-n na kɔrguu bugdn! L` saa saŋgbantiiba-n, ta nyaagm-n! Tumtba-n, nyaagm-n! Gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba-n, ta nyaagm-n! Nyaagm-n n` mɛmbee na Saŋgband teewra n` kaa n yaa kɔrguu n yaagu n dar kú tobr!
66018021	Lee, gemmnt saŋgbantumtɦii t ɦɔgd tanbibibiɦgu kuugu wo neer n lɔɔl-ku n daat nyaamn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: « Ta welee nnii ban nan ta lɔɔla n daat Babiloon kɔrbermguu. Lee, ɦii nan ta kpaa yuu-ku felaɦ'.
66018022	Bà nan kpaa ɦum vaa janjali waɦdba n yumyuumtba gbu ka yuuma felaɦ'. Ĥii nan ta kpaa ɦum werii hoɦdba n muulii hoɦdba hoɦ-hi felaɦ'. Bà nan ta kpaa yu kan ŋmɛɛg̈b biib ŋmɛɛɦeed wo kudtba laa mɔɦdba felaɦ'. Ĥii nan ta kpaa ɦum kan neer naamb felaɦ'.
66018023	Kand wiinga nan kpaa kee kà ta wiir kan felaɦ'. Ĥii nan ta kpaa ɦum kan yaala tiiba noor felaɦ'. Welee mɛnguu nan ɦɛnan, l´ kɔtɔd na vii yagtiiba da beel n gemmnt ka yata tant ɦɛn reba. Welee nan ɦɛna na lɔgra v` nagmt n hogl tigɦee mɛnɦee,
66018024	na ta vaa nnii ban nyan gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba jiim kulaa, n nan saŋgbantiiba ban da kur tant ɦɛn bee mɛmbee rem.»
66019001	Lee n l` kaan, má ɦom wo nidfigm noor rɛna saŋgbambiimn ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥaleluya! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband! Dii heɦl n jugu daɦb n nyɔkb n nan gemmnt.
66019002	Ĥaleluya! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband na d´ yaagu ba sɔbb ka ba gobiint, na d` dar yaruutberm ɦà da fiwla kɔrgu n ɦà yaruub wii tobr. Lee, Saberma t gbaam-wu na ɦá faad Saŋgband ŋmɛɛɦeedba jiim ɦan da fut n ɦà mɔm ɦà nuɦu mii ɦɛn.»
66019003	Bá lilm bɔɦɔɔb na: «Ĥaleluya! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband! Yaruutwii nyii kota n faaga bina mɛna kakeɦnan.»
66019004	Kpalmmba kwɛɛrɛɦ n banaabee n nan wanneernt tnaatii t gbaɦnt Saŋgband tiŋa, d` kad huraant jargan. Bá ka door-d tiŋan ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «L´ bɛm welee! Ĥaleluya! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband!»
66019005	Noor diir t rɛn n huraant jargeen ka bɔɦɔɔ na: «Saŋgband ŋmɛɛɦeedba nen n` mɛmbee, nen, nen vala-d nen, bermba n kaaba, nyɔkm-n-d!»
66019006	Lee, má ɦom wo nidfigm noor, l` tɔn wo kol kpuuran, ka ta boo toŋu gbuɦln. Noorii bɔɦɔɔ na: «Ĥaleluya! Bá nyɔkm Saŋgband! Na bá nyɔkm-d na t` Saberm Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia kad ɦà huraantn!
66019007	Tn nyaagm-n ka ba lamɛɛgun! Tn nyɔkm-n Saŋgband! Kpay-n! Fɛɛbuga yaala taann. Ká fɔga maantr ɦayen.
66019008	Bà sira-wu huru na ɦá yoɦ dimfeelgu kù ba kelkel ka nyalwa.» Dimfeelguu da ba na saŋgbantiiba ŋmɛɛhɔmt ban ɦer tii nnii.
66019009	Saŋgbantumtwii t bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Ĥɔr na: ‟Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii ban hoɦ Fɛɛbuga yaala kasant man bee”.» Ĥá lilm na: «Saŋgband noon gobiint gwɛɛt mɔmt nnii.»
66019010	Man ɦomr welee lee, n gbaɦnt ɦá nɔngan na mà doot-wu tiŋan, ɦá bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Mug vyen, daa ɦe welee! Mà ba na v` ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurn. Mà ta boo v` teelba bá ta nawla bayen n gobiint gwɛɛt Yeesua nn weraa tii bee. Door Saŋgband n jaɦ tiŋan!» Biilm, gwɛɛt Yeesua nn rea ka bɔɦɔɔ tii jugun nnii Saŋgband Voɦoom nn bɔɦɔɔ gwɛɛtntina.
66019011	Lee, má yum saŋgbambiim t rawdg. Yid deefeel beel kan. Ĥá da kad d` ɦɛn wii, bà hoɦl-wu na «Ljuguna», ka ta hoɦ-wu na «Gobiinta». Ĥà yaa yaagu kù ba sɔbb ka taaw hoodr wo ln gbaama lee.
66019012	Ĥá niini boo boglawiilm. Ĥà ligra huraant degrii kɔd. Bà da ɦɔda ɦà ɦɛn hidr diir ɦii kpaa mii-d. Wii n jaɦ' miil hidrii kɔtɔd.
66019013	Ĥà da fidra dimbermgu bá veɦ-ku jiimn. Bà hoɦl-wu na «Saŋgbandgwɛɛta».
66019014	Saŋgbambiimn tawdba tagda ɦà kaa ka kad deefeela ɦɛn, ka fidr dimfeent t` ba kelkel.
66019015	Ĥà noon ror deem hoodjuuga. Kee n nnii ɦan ba ɦà waɦaa tiga. Ĥà kee ɦà kpaɦaam-ba n kudnaŋdabiir. Wii nan wadra-ba wo l´ naama kpadkwɛɛwa na bá miig na Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tia lo kwɛɛwweerga kpaalaa.
66019016	Bà da ɦɔda ɦà dimbermgu jugun, ɦà taagr ɦɛn hidr na: «Huraamba Huraa, bermba Berma».
66019017	Lee, má ta yum saŋgbantumtɦii jeɦr muunu ɦɛn. Ĥà mɔɔ ka toola kimm ka bɔɦɔɔ ŋmɛnii hí sol saŋgbambiimn liglig hii mɛnhii na: «Daan-n! Kpogl-n taa Saŋgband kasanbermt man!
66019018	Daan-n n` jum huraamba gbani, n tawdbermba gbani, n tawdba gbani, n deera n ta ɦà ɦɛn kadtbee gbani, nidbee mɛmbee gbani, l` lag n yuummba n bá ba bayen bolmrn bee gbani, bermba n kaaba.»
66019019	Lee, má ta yum dɔmii n tant ɦɛn huraamba n bà tawdba t kpogl taa na bà teew hoodr n deer ɦɛn kadtwii n ɦà tawdba.
66019020	Bee t´ mug dɔmii n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔt ɦà ɦɛna hoolgu ɦɛb dɔmii hidrn wii. Welee hoolgu ɦɛbii da ɦera ɦá hogl nidba bá soɦdg dɔmii lamba n ka door m` tand tiŋa bee. Bá lɔɔl bareɦdrbee taabuugu boglawiilm n kusawu boglamn bà neer.
66019021	Volbee lee, bá kuum-ba n hoodjuuga kà da ror ɦá da kad deer ɦɛn wii noon kee. L´ saa ŋmɛntii mɛntii t jum bá gbani n togm.
66020001	Lee, má yum saŋgbantumtɦii hoɦntna n saŋgbambiimn, ka mad kunidba sarga lɔgkilmgun saabr ɦá nuɦun, n nan konberma ɦiiɦa,
66020002	n mug ŋmɛrwaŋuu, weem kɔtɔdn waag̈bii, l´ kɔtɔd na Kunida, Saatana, n kpaɦm-wu kona na ɦá ɦe bina ruugu,
66020003	n lɔɔl-wu lɔgkilmguun n riw ɦá ɦɛn n gwɛɦdr na ɦá daa la fiwlgm tiga kakeɦnan bina ruuguu daa fɛla. Lee kaann, bá hoɦl-wu na ɦá ɦe goora ɦalanɦa.
66020004	Má ta yum huraant jarii. Bá saɦm bá daan n kad hì ɦɛn bee gemmnt na bá yaam yaagu. Má ta yum biiba ban da kur ka kwe bá juut bee liliit. Bà da kura-ba gobiint gwɛɛt Yeesua nn rea ka weraa tii n nan Saŋgband gwɛɛt l´ kaa. Má yum bá da ba tii na bà door ŋmɛrwaŋuu tiŋan laa kú tand tiŋan bee. Bà da ta kpaɦ n kù lamba bà diira noon laa bá niɦin. Má yum bá himtg n ka neer, bá n Krist bà kad huraantn bina ruugu.
66020005	Nidkpiirnvolbee t ka ba himtg kakeɦnan bina ruugu nn diɦ. Himtgm noogrm nnii.
66020006	Lamɛɛgu tiiba n nan buudba nnii bá nan himta noogrbee man bee. Kureɦdrm nan kpaɦ m` mam n gemmnt n bà ɦɛn. Lee, bà nan ba bà bɛm na bee nnii Saŋgband n Krist bà gotiiba. Bá n ban l` nan kadaa huraantn bina ruugu.
66020007	Bina ruuguu nn ba ɦà diɦ lee, bà hoɦlg Saatana, ɦà riir sargan,
66020008	ɦà san na ɦà fiwlgm tantii mɛntii tiga. Bà hoɦl-ɦa na Goog n Magoog. Ĥà nan kpogla tant ɦɛn tigɦee mɛnɦee na ɦá teew hoodr. Ĥà nan ba ɦà mam kɔd wo nyaam kpamga gwiɦiim.
66020009	Tigɦee tiiba t raag tantii mɛntii n kaad Krista tiiba barsi, Saŋgband kɔrgu dn sɔkla kpaalaa kuu. Gwɛntaɦaa, bogm t hoɦntn n saŋgbambiimn n bugd-ba.
66020010	L´ saa, ɦá da fiwla-ba wii, l´ kɔtɔd na Kunida, l´ lɔɔl wiiwu taabuugu boglawiilmn, kusawu bogmn, ɦá hewlii reekan ŋmɛrwaŋuu n gokaat gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtwii jugun. Ree nnii ban ba bà jum kunyɔŋu nyingu n muunu kakeɦnan.
66020011	Lee, má yum huraant jarbermga kiiga kà ba feelga. Má ta yum ɦá kad kà ɦɛn wii. Saŋgbambiim n tant t solm n san vɔku n wun, n boorm kpaalaa.
66020012	Má ta yum kpiirmba, bermba n kaaba bà jeɦr huraant jargee nɔngan. L´ wii wadii. L´ ta wii wadvolga, neerm wadgan. L´ yaa n kpiirmbee ka ɦigr bà ŋmɛɛgt ban da ɦer tii wo ln da ba wadhiin lee.
66020013	Nyaam t reen kpiirmba bá da ba m` ni bee. Kuum n kukurodga t ta reen kpiirmba ln da mad bee na bà yaa bà mɛmbee n yaagu ka ɦigr bà ŋmɛɛgt ban da ɦer tii ɦɛn.
66020014	Bá lɔɔl kuum n kukurodga taabuugu boglawiilmn. Boglawiilmii nnii kureɦdrm.
66020015	Baaben tii ɦá hidr da kpaɦ neerm wadgeen wii, bà lɔɔla-wu taabuugu boglawiilmn.
66021001	Lee, má yum saŋgbambikwɛɛlm n tankwɛɛnt. Saŋgbambinoogrm n tannoogrt da bɔdan, nyaam t ka ta kpaɦ'.
66021002	Má yum kɔrbuudgu, Yerusalɛm kɔrkwɛɛlgu, kù hoɦntna n saŋgbambiimn, Saŋgband tuuna-ku. Kù ba kwɛɛlm wo bà maantr fɔg ɦá ka hɔd ɦà sida.
66021003	Má ɦom noor diir rɛna n huraant jargan ka toola kimm na: i1 «Kpay-n suku Saŋgband kan go! Kù ba nidba huuga. Saŋgband ba d` bɛm bá man, bà kitg d` tiga. D´ mɔmr ba d` bɛm bá man ka ba na bá Saŋgband nnii.
66021004	D` ba d` kɛwdr nyanyaam mɛnm. Kuum kpaɦ m` bɛm, fɔglb kpaɦ', kuumb kpaɦ', kunyɔŋu kuugu ta kpaɦ', l´ kɔtɔd na wankpeemt bɔdan.»
66021005	Ĥá kad huraant jarga ɦɛn wii t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpay-n! Gwɛɦŋa mà ɦɛna wankwɛɛnt.» Ĥá lilm na: «Ĥɔr gwɛɛtii, l´ kɔtɔd na t` ba gobiint, ka mag na bá tiim t´ ɦɛn!»
66021006	Ĥá ta bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «L` diɦ nnii! Man nnii noogra, ta man nnii kaawra. Man nnii sowllaŋa, ta man nnii kuullaŋa. Ĥii ɦà ba n nyunyuudu wii, mà mɔm mà nan saɦl-wu neerm nyabilga yem.
66021007	Ĥá nan ju jugun wii nn nan soɦda mà do bii nnii. Lee, mà nan ba mà bɛm na ɦá sa Saŋgband, wii ba na mà kwɛɛla.
66021008	L` saa fobɛɦtiiba, biiba bá kpaa nawr n Yeesu bee, n nidbɛɦba, n nidkuudba, n yaruutba, n nagmba, n bá door boga tiŋan bee, bá neer gokaat jugun bee mɛmba lee, bà nan lɔɔla bee taabuugu boglawiilmn, kusawu bogmn, kureɦdrm nnii.»
66021009	Lee, saŋgbantumtba balbleɦba bá da mad kpowdii hilbleɦhii hí hugl n bɛɦgu jugu tɔmb mlbleɦm kaawrm bee ni bilma t daan n bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Daan mà werii-v biiriiga ká yɔl kee, Fɛɛbuga fɔga.»
66021010	Saŋgbantumtwii t lɔgm-ma n voɦoomn n san n duvɔgr diir jutaŋtaŋan n werii-ma reekan kɔrbuudgu, Yerusalɛm kɔrgu, kù hoɦntna n saŋgbambiimn, Saŋgband tuuna-ku.
66021011	D´ jeegu da ba kɔrguu ɦɛn kù nyinwa wo tanhɔmr diir, tanhɔmr d` boo diigu tand dii, d` yul ka tɔnta
66021012	Bà da mɛɦra dabira n kaad-ku. Dabirɦee da vɔk biii ka ba n huturi kwiɦr n ɦiriɦ'. Saŋgbantumtba kwiɦr n bareɦba da jeɦra huturɦii noon ka sug. Bà da ɦɔda ɦì ɦɛn Yisraɦeel hui kwiɦr n hireɦhii hida.
66021013	Ĥakpahii mɛnhii ɦɛn da ba huturi ɦitaɦ ɦitaɦ'. Toŋu kwɛɛnn da ba ɦitaɦ', kù faagan ba ɦitaɦ'. L´ saa fidɦiin ba ɦitaɦ ɦitaɦ'.
66021014	Kɔrguu dabira da jeɦra bobogr tana kwiɦr n ɦarɛɦa ɦɛn. L´ saa bá ɦɔr tanɦee ɦɛn Fɛɛbuga tumtba kwiɦr n bareɦbee hida.
66021015	Saŋgbantumt ɦá gwɛɛla n man wii mad kɛɛmtga, sika nyakaka na ɦà kɛɛm kɔrguu, n kù huturi n nan kú dabira.
66021016	Dabirɦee ba ɦakpai hinaa. Kú vɔku n kù yalmgu ba yenm. Saŋgbantumtwii t kɛɛm kɔrguu n ɦà nyakakee n tud wo tana ruuni kwiɦr n ɦiriɦ' (12000). Kú vɔku n kù yalmgu n kù vidgm n faaga da ta ba yenmii.
66021017	Ĥá kɛɛm kú dabirɦee n tud meetaaŋgidgu tɔmb lɛmu n kwɛɦnaa n mnaa (144). Ĥà da kɛɛm n nidba kɛɛmtga.
66021018	Bà da mɛɦra dabidii n tanhɔma, bà hoɦl-ɦa na: yaasfŋa. Kɔrguu mɔmgu, bà da mɛɦra-ku n sika mɔma. Ĥà da yul ka tɔnta wo kpalbsaat.
66021019	Bà da mɛɦra kɔrguu dabira boboga n tanhɔma jugu jugu. Bà da hoɦl noogrd na yaasfŋa, ka hoɦ reɦdrd na safiirŋa, ka hoɦ taɦrd na kalsedwaanŋa, ka hoɦ naard na ɦemroodŋa,
66021020	ka hoɦ nuurd na sardwaanŋa, ka hoɦ roondr na kɔrnaliinŋa, ka hoɦ leblr na kirsɔliitŋa, ka hoɦ niindr na beriilŋa, ka hoɦ wɛɦlr na tɔfaasŋa, ka hoɦ kwiɦlr na kirsɔfaarsŋa, ka hoɦ kwiɦr n noogrd na tirkwaasŋa, ka hoɦ nan kwiɦr n reɦdrd na ɦametiitstŋa.
66021021	Huturi kwiɦr n ɦiriɦii ba na laalm kwiɦr n mreɦmn. Bà da ɦera huturu ɦuyen n laalbilmm, ɦuyen n laalbilmm. L´ saa kɔrguu baŋu ba n sika mɔma, kú ka ba kpanyaɦ', ka yu ka tɔnta wo kpalbsaat.
66021022	Yid Saŋgband haar diir kpaɦ kɔrguun. Ĥase kú Saŋgband haar nnii Saberm Saŋgband Gemm Mɛnm tiiwu n ɦà Fɛɛbuga.
66021023	L` kpaa gbaama kɔrguu muunu laa kidga na l´ wiir-ku, l´ kɔtɔd na Saŋgband jeegu wiira kù ɦɛn, l´ saa d` Fɛɛbuga ba na kú kand nnii.
66021024	Tiga nidba nan ba bà ked kɔrguu wiingan, l` saa tant ɦɛn huraamba daan bà to-ku bà huraant kwɛgdm want.
66021025	Kɔrguu huturi kee ɦì yaɦr goorii mɛndii, l´ kɔtɔd na nyingu kpaa kee kù bɛm kan.
66021026	Bà nan ba bà daan kan n tiga kwɛgdm want.
66021027	B´ ba nakakeet bii nan kpaa jiba kan felaɦ'. Ĥii ɦà ɦɛna gwei ŋmɛɛgt ka neer gokaat jugun wii nan ta kpaa jiba kan felaɦ'. Ln ɦɔd bà hida Fɛɛbuga neerm wadgan bee n jaɦ' nan jiba kan.
66022001	Lee, saŋgbantumtwii t fɛl n werii-ma neerm nyaalm kolbermr. Nyaalmii ba kelkel wo kpalbsaat, ka yu ka tɔnta. M` gbuɦ Saŋgband n d` Fɛɛbuga bá huraant jargeen.
66022002	Kolii kulaa n kɔrgu baŋu huugan. D` radg reekan. Neerm tiib jeɦra radlaŋeen. B` roona tɔmb kwiɦr n mreɦm bindn. B` roona myenm kidgan. Bà taadma kɔrgun tiiba n b` vaat.
66022003	Saŋgband nn gwɛɛl nobɛɦr b` kaa bii nan kpaɦ b` jib kan. Saŋgband n Fɛɛbuga bà huraant jarga ba kɔrguun. D´ ŋmɛɛɦeedba nan ba bà door-d tiŋan.
66022004	Bà nan yul d´ nɔnga, l` ta ɦɔr d´ hidr bá diira noon.
66022005	Nyingu kpaa kee kù bɛm. Ĥii kpaa kee ɦà ta bagm kand na ɦà wiir, laa muunu wiinga, l´ kɔtɔd na Saberm Saŋgband wiinga nan ba kà wiir-ba. Bà nan ba bà bɛm huraantn kakeɦnan.
66022006	Lee, saŋgbantumtwii t bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Saberm Saŋgband lee, wii rea gwɛɛt ka weraa ɦá gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba. Wii tamn ɦá tumt na ɦà werii ɦà ŋmɛgdba bii b` nan kena kpidlaa bii. Gwɛɛtii ba gobiint, t` mag na bá tiim t´ ɦɛn.» Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na:
66022007	«Kpaya! Mà kena gwɛɦmna. Lamɛɛgu tii nnii ɦá mad gwɛɛt ln rea ka bɔɦɔɔ wadgankenan tii wii.»
66022008	Yohanɛɛs man, mà ɦomra n yum welee mɛnguu. Man ɦomr n yum welee l´ diɦ lee, má gbaɦnt saŋgbantumt ɦà da werii-ma welee wii tiŋa n ka bo na mà doot-wu tiŋan.
66022009	Wii t bɔɦɔɔ-ma na: «Ĥaai! Daa ɦe welee! Mà ba na v` ŋmɛɛɦeedtuurn, ka ta ba na v` teelba Saŋgband gwɛɛt bɔɦɔɔtba tuurn. Bá ta vala wadgankenan gwɛɛt bee tuurn man mi. Lee, door Saŋgband n jaɦ tiŋan!
66022010	Daa kpat v` mad gwɛɛt ln ree n bɔɦɔɔ wadgankenan tii vyen, l´ kɔtɔd na vuugu taana na gwɛɛtii ɦe t´ jugun.
66022011	¿Muulŋana? La muulŋ̈m welee! ¿Ba nakakeeta? La bɛm-t welee! ¿Ba sɔbba? La bɛm welee! ¿Ba buuda? La bɛm welee!»
66022012	Yeesua t bɔɦɔɔ na: «Kpaya! Mà kena gwɛɦmna. Mà kena ka mad fat na mà faad baaben tii l` magr n bii ɦan ta ɦer bii.
66022013	Man nnii noogra, ta man nnii kaawra, man nnii nooga, ta man nnii kɔtɔd, man nnii sowllaŋa ta man nnii kuullaŋa.»
66022014	Lamɛɛgu tiiba nnii bá satr bá tugvɔgt bee. Bee mag na bà nan di neerm tiib roond na bà jib n kɔrgu fiid noora.
66022015	Nidbɛɦjɔtnt lee, bá ɦɛna raga, laa bá yarwa, laa nidkuudba, laa bá door boga tiŋan, laa bá sɔkla na bà neer gokaat jugun bee mɛmbee lee, bee nan kpata duun.
66022016	«Yeesu man, mà tamn mà saŋgbantumt n` man na ɦá faa gobiint gwɛɛt t´ hɛl kpaturi tii. Man nnii Daviida buudmn nabtowga nn hɔd kee. Ta man nnii ɦateekwɛɛn ŋmɛddaagu.»
66022017	Voɦoom n biiriiga ká yɔl kee l´ bɔɦɔɔm na: «Daana!» Na ɦii ɦá ɦum welee gwɛɛtii wii ta biir na: «Daana!» L` ba na ɦii ɦá ba n nyunyuudu wii daan. L` ba na ɦii ɦá bag neerm nyaalm wii soɦdg-m yem.
66022018	L´ saa Yohanɛɛs man, mà baɦla biiba bà ɦum Saŋgband noon gwɛɛt t´ ba wadgankenan tii bee ka lil na: Ka ɦii t hewl wadgankenan gwɛɛtii ɦɛn bii, Saŋgband nan ta hewl ɦà tobr darm ɦɛn bɛɦgu ln ɦɔd kù gwɛɛt wadgankenan kuu ta welee.
66022019	Ka ɦii t kpii kà ni gwɛɛt tiit, Saŋgband nan ta kpii ɦà fat wadgee nn bɔɦɔɔ t´ gwɛɛt tii. Ĥà nan kpaɦ ɦà di tiib b` saɦ neerm bii roona, ɦà ta bɔrii ɦà kaalaŋa kɔrbuudguun.
66022020	Ĥii ɦà tia ka ɦigr ka bɔɦɔɔ na gwɛɛt ban ree n bɔɦɔɔ tii mɛntii ba gobiint wii bɔɦɔɔ na: «Biilm, mà kena gwɛɦmna». L´ bɛm welee! Kenm! Berm Yeesu, kenm!
66022021	Berm Yeesua hɔmgu bɛm n` mɛmbee n` man!
